quotes.quote: True intelligence requires fabulous imagination.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: If you allow yourself to feel fabulous, you are fabulous.
quotes.author: Natalia Kills

quotes.quote: If one could look this fabulous, one had an obligation to.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: If you don't feel fabulous, you have deviated from the path of who-you-really-are.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: If you can convince yourself that you look fabulous, you can save yourself the trouble of primping.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: The most important thing, darling, is to live a fabulous life. As long as it’s fabulous, I don’t care how long it is.
quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

quotes.quote: Act as young as you feel. You're not getting older; you're getting more entitled to be your fabulous self.
quotes.author: Gwen Stefani

quotes.quote: The fabulous places I've been, wonderful things that've happened, great people I've met ought to make a story.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: If we spend our days waiting for fabulous roses we could miss the beauty and wonder of the tiny forget-me-nots that are all around us.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Let's just be fabulously where we are and who we are. You be you and I'll be me, today and today and today, and let's trust the future to tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jerry Spinelli

quotes.quote: If anyone tells you it's impossible to be fabulous and smart and make a ton of money using math, well, they can just get in line behind you - and kiss your math.
quotes.author: Danica Mckellar

quotes.quote: People who have fabulous childhoods have this sense that nothing is ever going to be that good again. With me, I have the sense that nothing is going to be that bad.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: If you have enough people sitting around telling you you're wonderful, then you start believing you're fabulous, then someone tells you you stink and you believe that too!
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Your audacious life goals are fabulous. We're proud of you for having them. But it's possible that those goals are designed to distract you from the thing that's really frightening you--the shift in daily habits that would mean a re-invention of how you see yourself.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: The loner who looks fabulous is one of the most vulnerable loners of all.
quotes.author: Anneli Rufus

quotes.quote: Nothing here is more fabulous than the truth.
quotes.author: Jessie Burton

quotes.quote: There is no downside to winning. It feels forever fabulous.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: When your own romantic life is falling apart, everyone else's looks fabulous.
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: Think for a minute about what makes you fabulous and how you can celebrate it.
quotes.author: Laura Mercier

quotes.quote: Food is fabulous, and having a good relationship with it will make you healthy and happy.
quotes.author: Denise Austin

quotes.quote: Wear a fabulous smile, great jewelry and know that you are totally and utterly in control.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.quote: We remember childhood as the fabulous years of our lives, and nations remember their childhood as fabulous years.
quotes.author: Giacomo Leopardi

quotes.quote: Archive material is a fabulous starting point - individual documents are like signposted roads, heading to a variety of intriguing possibilities.
quotes.author: Sara Sheridan

quotes.quote: It's fabulous when you do that, when you discover somebody who you like, when you kind of feel those feelings, even though he articulates them better.
quotes.author: Bryan Ferry

quotes.quote: Making people laugh is a really fabulous thing because it means you're getting deep inside somebody, into their psyche, and their ability to look at themselves.
quotes.author: Jane Lynch

quotes.quote: All that is told of the sea has a fabulous sound to an inhabitant of the land and all its products have a certain fabulous quality, as if they belonged to another planet.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There's nothing more fabulous than an adult saying to you, "I think that you might like this one [book]." So I'm grateful every time that happens. It's an amazing thing that people care that passionately.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: What looks absolutely fabulous in rehearsal can fall flat in front of an audience. The audience dictates what you do or don't change.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: Learning something new is a fabulous way to be refreshed. When work can grind you down, something about learning a new activity thrills the soul. It reminds you that the world is bigger than your desk and your to-do list.
quotes.author: John Ortberg

quotes.quote: Women, you can have it all - a loving man, devoted husband, loving children, a fabulous career.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: Fabulous is as fabulous does.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee Simmons

quotes.quote: Everything was fabulous, even our breakdowns.
quotes.author: Colum Mccann

quotes.quote: This face is a dog's snout sniffing for garbage, snakes nest in that mouth, I hear the sibilant threat.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The face is more honest than the mouth will ever be.
quotes.author: Daphne Orebaugh

quotes.quote: God has given you one face, and you make yourself another.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Wash your face every morning in a bath of praise.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: If you get your face and your name out there enough, people will start to recognize you.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: The look on someone's face when they're doing what they love is contagious and inspiring.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Every face is born with a thousand masks to go with it.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Falling on your face, at the very least, is a forward movement.
quotes.author: Pat Mitchell

quotes.quote: There are quantities of human faces, but there are many more faces, for each person has several.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: If your face is swollen from the severe beatings of life, smile and pretend to be a fat man.
quotes.author: Chris Cleave

quotes.quote: Your face tells a story and it shouldn't be a story about your drive to the doctor's office.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: A man's face is his autobiography. A woman's face is her work of fiction.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The face is a picture of the mind with the eyes as its interpreter.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: If you want to make people laugh, your face must remain serious.
quotes.author: Giacomo Casanova

quotes.quote: A face is like the outside of a house, and most faces, like most houses, give us an idea of what we can expect to find inside.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: The face is the index of the mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Time engraves our faces with all the tears we have not shed.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: Family faces are magic mirrors. Looking at people who belong to us, we see the past, present and future.
quotes.author: Gail Buckley

quotes.quote: The tartness of his face sours ripe grapes.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Turn your face to the sun and the shadows fall behind you.
quotes.author: Charlotte Whitton

quotes.quote: A face is too slight a foundation for happiness.
quotes.author: Lady Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: Double face in a person is no problem as long as both faces are more or less the same!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Your face is a billboard advertising your philosophy of life!
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: The faces that have charmed us the most escape us the soonest.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: A man's face as a rule says more, and more interesting things, than his mouth, for it is a compendium of everything his mouth will ever say, in that it is the monogram of all this man's thoughts and aspirations.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine â€“ and shadows will fall behind you.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The face is the soul of the body.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: Your face is a book, where men may read strange matters.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Faces always talk too much. One line and all their plans are revealed.
quotes.author: Floriano Martins

quotes.quote: There's no art to find the mind's construction in the face.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The face is the mirror of the mind, and eyes without speaking confess the secrets of the heart.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: Face the facts of being what you are, for that is what changes what you are.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: Face your fears and doubts, and new worlds will open to you.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The human face is, after all, nothing more nor less than a mask.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Our faces will become works of art that our grandchildren will treasure.
quotes.author: Adriana Trigiani

quotes.quote: I think your whole life shows in your face and you should be proud of that.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: The face is commanding because of its very visibility and omnipresence.
quotes.author: Paul Ekman

quotes.quote: The face is also commanding because of its role in early development; it is prior to language in the communication between parent and child,.
quotes.author: Paul Ekman

quotes.quote: The face can send messages about such transient and sometimes fleeting events as a feeling or emotion, or the moment-to-moment fluctuations of a conversation.
quotes.author: Paul Ekman

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by the magazines: many successful executive, doctors, lawyers, engineers, and secretaries don't wear makeup. Indeed, it's better to wear no make up than to wear it badly.
quotes.author: Phyllis Mindell

quotes.quote: Beauty isn't about vapid and superficial pursuit that exists solely to sell products, wag tongues, and produce drool.
quotes.author: Michael F. Roizen

quotes.quote: Beauty is actually precisely perceived, purposeful, and rooted more in hard science than in abstract opinion.
quotes.author: Michael F. Roizen

quotes.quote: We already know that beauty is always on your mind, because it's on everyone's minds.
quotes.author: Michael F. Roizen

quotes.quote: This kind of traditional beauty--the outer kind--really isn't just about looking good. Outer beauty serves as a proxy of how healthy you are.
quotes.author: Michael F. Roizen

quotes.quote: How beautiful you are! You are more beautiful in anger than in repose. I don't ask you for your love; give me yourself and your hatred; give me yourself and that pretty rage; give me yourself and the enchanting scorn; it will be enough for me.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Beautiful elegies reflect our sense that the only fitting remembrance for one who lived is to renew life, and that our own march forward into dying is itself an affirmation of life, and in its basic character, is good.
quotes.author: Kathleen Marie Higgins

quotes.quote: There will be no need to cultivate a beautiful expression on your face. It will appear like magic if you are quite certain that you have done the most you can with your looks and are determined to leave it at that.
quotes.author: Beauty for Every Woman

quotes.quote: But inner beauty is a process, inner beauty allows a constant exploring; it never ends. And this is what love is being directed at: a deep, whole beauty.
quotes.author: Tobias Hurter

quotes.quote: The beauty might not be beauty in being beautiful; however, it might simply be a result of being different to the other offspring of one's kind, therefore being beautiful.
quotes.author: Christopher Monbelly

quotes.quote: Everyone is different in their own way and that's what makes us unique and exceptionally beautiful.
quotes.author: Devin Brown

quotes.quote: Beauty brings copies of itself into being. It makes us draw it, take photographs of it, or describe it to other people.
quotes.author: Elaine Scarry

quotes.quote: It is biologically possible to look beautiful at any age. If you do not see yourself beautiful, it is because your beauty has remained unclaimed.
quotes.author: Tonya Zavasta

quotes.quote: Beauty generates positive energy and arouses excitement within us when we see it. Imagine how exhilarating it would be to be beautiful yourself.
quotes.author: Tonya Zavasta

quotes.quote: Every woman should be beautiful at some point in her life. And your time is now!
quotes.author: Tonya Zavasta

quotes.quote: Looking and feeling amazing does not mean trying to be something you're not. It means being healthy and happy so you radiate your feminine beauty and confidence, enhancing everything you are and all that you have.
quotes.author: Donna Kennedy

quotes.quote: What is true beauty? This can be a hard question to answer, because beauty truly in is the eyes of the beholder, and everyone's truth can be and probably is different.
quotes.author: Robert Jones

quotes.quote: Embrace your own personal beauty--love who you are today and everyday.
quotes.author: Robert Jones

quotes.quote: Natural beauty is being beautiful without makeup and just being yourself.
quotes.author: Katherina Sheehan

quotes.quote: There were countries where the use of cosmetics was not allowed and noly without makeup were considered beautiful.
quotes.author: Gabriella Baki

quotes.quote: Even if you're the type of woman who is perfectly fine without any makeup on, you can't deny the fact that you feel like a better, up-leveled version of yourself with it on.
quotes.author: Trish McEvoy

quotes.quote: The decision to avoid makeup is perfectly legitimate. Men aren't expected to wear makeup. so women shouldn't be expected to either.
quotes.author: Phyllis Mindell

quotes.quote: If you choose to avoid cosmetics and let your natural beauty show, you'll emulate some of the handsomest women of our time.
quotes.author: Phyllis Mindell

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by the magazines: many successful executive, doctors, lawyers, engineers, and secretaries don't wear makeup. Indeed, it's better to wear no make up than to wear it badly.
quotes.author: Phyllis Mindell

quotes.quote: Who sees the human face correctly: the photographer, the mirror of the painter?
quotes.author: Picasso

quotes.quote: If our faces were not alike, we couldn't distinguish man from the beast; if they were not different, we couldn't distinguish man from man.
quotes.author: Montaigne

quotes.quote: I have come to look on my face as a mask behind which the reality is the reality that it hides.
quotes.author: William Allen White

quotes.quote: It is the common wonder of all men how, among so many millions of faces, there should be one alike.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: I never forget a face, but in your case I'll make an exception.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: When some people lose face, they feel worse but look better.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A woman's face is her fortune---or misfortune.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The more beautiful a girl's face, the less a man can tell you what clothes she has on.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Many woman has the kind of face that grows on a man instead of the kind that should grow on a woman.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The face that over cocktails seemed so sweet, is less alluring over shredded wheat.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Sometimes the face cab tell what the lips can't say.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Of all parts of the body, the face alone can stand in for the entire person and represent him to the world.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Accept the fact that we have to treat almost anybody as a volunteer.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: Facts do not cease to exist because they are ignored.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Facts are the most important thing in business. Study facts and do more than is expected of you.
quotes.author: Frederick Hudson Ecker

quotes.quote: If it weren't for the fact that the TV set and the refrigerator are so far apart, some of us wouldn't get any exercise at all.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: Facts are like cows. If you look them in the face long enough, they generally run away.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: For every fact there is an infinity of hypotheses.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: The fact that you can feel pain like this is your greatest strength.
quotes.author: J K Rowling

quotes.quote: Facts sometimes have a strange and bizarre power that makes their inherent truth seem unbelievable.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: The one fact pertaining to all conditions is that they will change.
quotes.author: Charles Dow

quotes.quote: The impossible is justified by the fact that it occurred.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The fewer the facts, the stronger the opinion.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: The facts are always friendly, every bit of evidence one can acquire, in any area, leads one that much closer to what is true.
quotes.author: Carl R. Rogers

quotes.quote: Facts are facts and will not disappear on account of your likes.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Facts are stubborn things, but statistics are pliable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We can have facts without thinking but we cannot have thinking without facts.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Some facts should be suppressed, or, at least, a just sense of proportion should be observed in treating them.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: The fact is that violence gives you a rush.
quotes.author: Penn Jillette

quotes.quote: There is nothing more deceptive than an obvious fact.
quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: So you have to accept facts as fact.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.quote: There are no facts, only interpretations.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Facts are many, but the truth is one.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: There are no eternal facts, as there are no absolute truths.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Ignoring facts does not make them go away.
quotes.author: Fran Tarkenton

quotes.quote: The fact that you can only do a little is no excuse for doing nothing.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: The fact that a belief has a good moral effect upon a man is no evidence whatsoever in favor of its truth.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Facts may be colored by the personalities of the people who present them.
quotes.author: Reginald Rose

quotes.quote: The fact that there is a general belief in a future life is no evidence of its truth.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Facts have a cruel way of substituting themselves for fancies. There is nothing more remorseless, just as there is nothing more helpful, than truth.
quotes.author: William C. Redfield

quotes.quote: The fact that a great many people believe something is no guarantee of its truth.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: The fact is that you are never too old to innovate.
quotes.author: Vivek Wadhwa

quotes.quote: If the facts don't fit the theory, change the facts.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In fact, the truth cannot be communicated until it is perceived.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: It is the absence of facts that frightens people: the gap you open, into which they pour their fears, fantasies, desires.
quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

quotes.quote: The plain fact is that there are no conclusions.
quotes.author: James Jeans

quotes.quote: Facts are the barren branches on which we hang the dear, obscuring foliage of our dreams.
quotes.author: Natalie Babbitt

quotes.quote: Get your facts first, then you can distort them as you please.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The facts are always less than what really happened.
quotes.author: Nadine Gordimer

quotes.quote: Fact is fact. Truth is Truth. It does not matter how you feel. We do not listen to our feelings. We believe the truth of God's word.
quotes.author: Eric Ludy

quotes.quote: A fact must be assimilated with, or discriminated fromm, some other fact or facts, in order to be raised to the dignity of a truth, and made to convey the least knowledge to the mind.
quotes.author: Henry Mayhew

quotes.quote: Facts are stubborn things.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The fact is the sweetest dream that labor knows.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: The fact of the matter is actions speak louder than words.
quotes.author: Barbara Boxer

quotes.quote: The world is the totality of facts, not of things.
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: The true facts are not always obvious. They often have to be looked for.
quotes.author: Oliver Tambo

quotes.quote: The fact is, we need help and we need each other.
quotes.author: Kris Carr

quotes.quote: The fact that we die, that makes life important. It's hard to take, but it's the truth.
quotes.author: Alan Ball

quotes.quote: Believe and create is a basic fact of successful living.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: The fact is one thing and the idea about the fact is another.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: The facts of life are very stubborn things.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.quote: There is nothing as mysterious as a fact clearly described.
quotes.author: Garry Winogrand

quotes.quote: I tell you the truth, if you have faith as small as a mustard seed, you can say to this mountain, 'Move from here to there,' and it will move. Nothing will be impossible for you.
quotes.author: Matthew 17:30

quotes.quote: We must not allow the clock and the calendar to blind us to the fact that each moment of life is a miracle and mystery.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Facts are apt to alarm us more than the most dangerous principles.
quotes.author: Junius

quotes.quote: No facts to me are sacred; none are profane.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: Rain beats leopard skin, but it did not wash off the spots.
quotes.author: Ashanti Proverb

quotes.quote: It is fatal as it is cowardly to blink at facts because they are not to our taste.
quotes.author: John Tyndall

quotes.quote: The frontiers are not east or west, north or south, but wherever a man fronts a fact.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: A fact is like a sack—it won't stand up if it's empty. To make it stand up, first, you have to put it in all the reasons and feelings that caused it in the first place.
quotes.author: Luigi Pirandello

quotes.quote: Fact is stranger than fiction.
quotes.author: T.C. Haliburton

quotes.quote: Falsehood is not easily exposed when it has had an early start in advance of the truth.
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: The fact, that hardly two leaves on a tree were exactly the same, could not escape observation: small deviations of the same kind were met with everywhere, among individuals as well as among the organs of the same plant.
quotes.author: Hugo Devries

quotes.quote: It is specific / It is exact / It is prolific / It is a fact / It is reality / It is valid.
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: The world, we are told, was made especially for man — a presumption not supported by all the facts.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: Facts are stubborn things; and whatever may be our wishes, our inclinations, or the dictates of our passion, they cannot alter the state of facts and evidence.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: You can spend your whole life building a wall of facts between you and anything real.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Facts don't care about your feelings.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: The main facts in human life are five: birth, food, sleep, love, and death.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: “Truth' and 'facts' are 'sworn enemies,' but facts are often torn into a smokescreen and camouflaged into an appearance of alluring reliability. Only gullible people might swallow this for fear of being treated like dummies.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Facts are too busy being true to worry about how you feel about them.
quotes.author: Dan Wells

quotes.quote: Truth and facts are woven together. However, sometimes facts can blind you from seeing what is actually going on in someone’s life.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: I am not one of those who in expressing opinions confine themselves to facts.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Everyone is entitled to his own opinion, but not his own facts.
quotes.author: Daniel Patrick Moynihan

quotes.quote: People will generally accept facts as truth only if the facts agree with what they already believe.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Facts are stupid until brought into connection with some general law.
quotes.author: Louis Agassiz

quotes.quote: That sun, that light had faded, and she had faded with them. Now she was as grey as the season itself.
quotes.author: Anita Brookner

quotes.quote: Some people seem to fade away but then when they are truly gone, it's like they didn't fade away at all.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I feel half faded away like some figure in the background of an old picture.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Faded the flower and all its budded charms, Faded the sight of beauty from my eyes, Faded the shape of beauty from my arms, Faded the voice, warmth, whiteness, paradise – Vanish’d unseasonably at shut of eve...
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Faded smiles oft linger in the face, While grief's first flakes fall silent on the heart!
quotes.author: Alfred Austin

quotes.quote: The older we get, the swifter time seems to pass and the quicker memories seem to fade.
quotes.author: Brian Sibley

quotes.quote: Faded way too long, I'm floatin in and out of consciousness
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: Piece by piece, I slowly fade away, I slowly drift apart
quotes.author: Five Finger Death Punch

quotes.quote: You want it or not but with time, memories are going to fade. Wounds will be healed and life will give you plenty opportunities to be happy.
quotes.author: Nitya Prakash

quotes.quote: It's better to burn out, than to fade away.
quotes.author: Neil Young

quotes.quote: I'd keep your beauty timeless. like a flower pressed in a book, yes I wouldn't let it fade, Folded in the chapters of my mind.
quotes.author: Richard L. Ratliff

quotes.quote: The moon is not full anymore. As it also started fading in the Darkness just like me.
quotes.author: Pen & Paper Thoughts

quotes.quote: The apple of my eye, had turned into an empty core.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Memories were fine but you couldn't touch them, smell them or hold them. They were never exactly as the moment was, and they faded with time.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: Love is all wasted, till it is not tested. Love is all faded, if it is only tested.
quotes.author: Heenashree Khandelwal

quotes.quote: Memories have no life. They're just pale reminders of a time that's gone-like faded photographs.
quotes.author: Kevin Brooks

quotes.quote: When the light has sharply faded And you have lost your way Let another's love guide you It can turn blackest night into day.
quotes.author: Kevin Myers

quotes.quote: You will never age for me, nor fade, nor die.
quotes.author: Marc Norman

quotes.quote: Life’s a harrowing echo only to be faded into exiled loneliness.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: You always have to believe in yourself and not let your confidence fade.
quotes.author: Naomi

quotes.quote: Politicians never fade away; they just keep carrying on, you know, their class.
quotes.author: Paul Keating

quotes.quote: Keep on beginning and failing. Each time you fail, start all over again, and you will grow stronger until you have accomplished a purpose - not the one you began with perhaps, but one you'll be glad to remember.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan Macy

quotes.quote: The answer lies in preventing failures not in looking for better ways to fix the children who are failing.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.quote: There's always failure. And there's always disappointment. And there's always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: You're never a failure until you fail to get up.
quotes.author: Evel Knievel

quotes.quote: You have to stop yourself from even thinking about failing.
quotes.author: Julie Taymor

quotes.quote: Failure isn't fatal, but failure to change might be
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all in which case, you fail by default.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: You don't go into anything contemplating failure, because if you did, you wouldn't make it.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: The secret to failing isn't failing; the secret to failing is failing forward.
quotes.author: Royce White

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with your failure.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: We will all fail in life, but nobody has to be a failure. Failing at a thing doesn't make you a failure. You are only a failure when you quit trying.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: When you are offended at anyone's fault, turn to yourself and study your own failings. By attending to them, you will forget your anger and learn to live wisely.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Success is most often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: It is not a disgrace to fail. Failing is one of the greatest arts in the world.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fail.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Without failing at one thing, there won't be an opportunity to try again, learn and grow. Life isn't static but dynamic. Learn to embrace whatever situation you may face and strive to overcome. Believe in yourself, knowing your best is yet to come.
quotes.author: Kemi Sogunle

quotes.quote: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: If you aren't failing, you aren't trying.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Failing is what we do, or stumbling is what we do on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Failing isn't bad when you learn what not to do.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Failure is an option here. If things are not failing, you are not innovating enough.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: Failing to plan is planning to fail.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: Failure is not an option. Failure is necessary. We try. We fail. We learn. We adjust.
quotes.author: Craig Groeschel

quotes.quote: You will fail many times but in failing you'll learn and in learning you'll find your way. Remember, there are no mistakes in life but only lessons, and lessons will keep on repeating until learned.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Failing doesn't have to mean not succeeding,
quotes.author: Astro Teller

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Don't waste energy trying to cover up failure. Learn from your failures and go on to the next challenge. It's OK to fail. If you're not failing, you're not growing.
quotes.author: H. Stanley Judd

quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: One of the greatest weaknesses in most of us is our lack of faith in ourselves. One of our common failings is to depreciate our tremendous worth.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry

quotes.quote: If you are not failing now and again, its a sign you are not doing anything very innovative.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Success is not in never failing, but rising everytime you fall!
quotes.author: Jonathan Taylor Thomas

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: It's fine to celebrate success but it is more important to heed the lessons of failure.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Failure is enriching. It's also important to accept that you'll make mistakesâ€”it's how you build your expertise. The trick is to learn a positive lesson from all of life's negative moments.
quotes.author: Alain Ducasse

quotes.quote: We need to accept that we won't always make the right decisions, that we'll screw up royally sometimesâ€”understanding that failure is not the opposite of success, it's part of success.
quotes.author: Arianna Huffington

quotes.quote: Just because you fail once doesn't mean you're gonna fail at everything.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustrations were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: You have to be able to accept failure to get better.
quotes.author: LeBron James

quotes.quote: Think like a queen. A queen is not afraid to fail. Failure is another steppingstone to greatness.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Failure is the foundation of success, and the means by which it is achieved.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Mistakes are the portals of discovery.
quotes.author: James Joyce

quotes.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Failure is success if we learn from it.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fail.
quotes.author: Confucious

quotes.quote: Negative results are just what I want. They're just as valuable to me as positive results. I can never find the thing that does the job best until I find the ones that don't.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
quotes.author: Shah Rukh Khan

quotes.quote: The only real failure in life is not to be true to the best one knows.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: There's always failure. And there's always disappointment. And there's always loss. But the secret is learning from the loss, and realizing that none of those holes are vacuums.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: I can accept failure, everyone fails at something. But I can't accept not trying.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Failure is the condiment that gives success its flavor.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: Like success, failure is many things to many people. With positive mental attitude, failure is a learning experience, a rung on the ladder, a plateau at which to get your thoughts in order and prepare to try again.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: If you try to be anyone but yourself, you will fail; if you are not true to your own heart, you will fail. Then again, there's no success like failure.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I think you have to try and fail, because failure gets you closer to what you're good at.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: Any man can make mistakes, but only an idiot persists in his error.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Failure after long perseverance is much grander than never to have a striving good enough to be called a failure.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: The chief cause of failure and unhappiness is trading what you want most for what you want right now.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You build on failure. You use it as a stepping stone. Close the door on the past. You don't try to forget the mistakes, but you don't dwell on it. You don't let it have any of your energy, or any of your time, or any of your space.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all, in which case you have failed by default.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Failure is a bend in the road, not the end of the road. Learn from failure and keep moving forward.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: There is no failure except in no longer trying.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You have committed a double mistake, firstly by not keeping the engagement yesterday and secondly, by coming when you were not expected.
quotes.author: Visvesvaraya

quotes.quote: Only those who dare to fail greatly can ever achieve greatly.
quotes.author: Robert F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, destroy all evidence that you tried.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to fail. Don't waste energy trying to cover up failure. Learn from your failures and go on to the next challenge. It's ok to fail. If you're not failing, you're not growing.
quotes.author: H. Stanley Judd

quotes.quote: My fault, my failure, is not in the passions I have, but in my lack of control of them.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: I thank God for my failures. Maybe not at the time but after some reflection. I never feel like a failure just because something I tried has failed.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Life is full of screwups. You're supposed to fail sometimes. It's a required part of the human existance.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: Every adversity, every failure, every heartache carries with it the seed of a greater or equal benefit.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Remember that failure is an event, not a person.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: The wise say that our failure is to form habits: for habit is the mark of a stereotyped world.
quotes.author: Anthony C. Grayling

quotes.quote: Why do I talk about the benefits of failure? Simply because failure meant a stripping away of the inessential. I stopped pretending to myself that I was anything other than what I was and began to direct all my energy into finishing the only work that mattered to me.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Failing to prepare is preparing to fail.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: My great concern is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Far better is it to dare mighty things, to win glorious triumphs, even though checkered by failure... than to rank with those poor spirits who neither enjoy nor suffer much, because they live in a gray twilight that knows not victory nor defeat.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: People usually fail when they are on the verge of success. So give as much care to the end as to the beginning. Then there will be no failure.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Your failures in life come from not realizing your nearness to success when you give up.
quotes.author: Yoruba Saying

quotes.quote: The great question is not whether you have failed, but whether you are content with failure.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The man who does things makes many mistakes, but he never makes the biggest mistake of all—doing nothing.
quotes.author: Franklin

quotes.quote: The most important of my discoveries have been suggested to me by my failures.
quotes.author: Humphrey Davy

quotes.quote: He only is exempt from failures who makes no efforts.
quotes.author: Richard Whately

quotes.quote: Failure is, in a sense, the highway to success, in as much as every discovery of what is false leads us to seek earnestly after what is true, and every fresh experience points out some form of error which we shall afterward carefully avoid.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: We learn wisdom from failure much more than from success; we often discover what will do, by finding out what will not do; and probably he who never made a mistake never made a discovery.
quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

quotes.quote: A man can fail many times but he isn't a failure until he begins to blame somebody else.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: The greatest mistake you can make is to be continually fearing you will make one.
quotes.author: Hubbard

quotes.quote: Failure is instructive. The person who really thinks learns quite as much from his failures as from his successes.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: I have found that failure is a far better teacher than success.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Failures, repeated failures are finger posts on the road to achievement. One fails forward toward success.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Failure is the key to success; each mistake teaches us something.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: By your stumbling, the world is perfected.
quotes.author: Sri Aurobindo

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of failures; those who thought and never did, and those who did and never thought.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Failure should be our teacher, not our undertaker. Failure is a delay, not defeat. It is a temporary detour, not a dead end. Failure is something we can avoid only by saying nothing. doing nothing, and being nothing.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage coaches ambition.
quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

quotes.quote: If we don't succeed, we run the risk of failure.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: I would rather fail in a cause that will ultimately succeed than succeed in a cause that will ultimately fail.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: A fool often fails because he thinks what is difficult is easy, and a wise man because he thinks what is easy is difficult.
quotes.author: Churton Collins

quotes.quote: Defeat is not the worst of failures. Not to have tried is the true failure.
quotes.author: George Edward

quotes.quote: We all have a few failures under our belt. It's what makes us ready for success.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Generally, it is our failures that civilize us. Triumph confirms us in our habits.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: Show me a thoroughly satisfied man— and I will show you a failure.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: Failure is more frequently from want of energy than want of capital.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: The line between failure and success is so fine that we scarcely know when we pass it; so fine that we are often on the line and do not know it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Whoever is aware of his own failing will not find fault with the failings of other men.
quotes.author: Sa'Di

quotes.quote: Mistakes are a fact of life. It is the response to the error that counts.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Use missteps as stepping stones to deeper understanding and greater achievement.
quotes.author: Susan L. Taylor

quotes.quote: You will be tested. You won't always succeed. But know that you have it within your power to try.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: I am never daunted. If I fail once, it is not a signal that it is the end of the road; it is an opportunity to do even better on the next attempt.
quotes.author: Norman Grant

quotes.quote: You will make mistakes. But our mistakes are even more valuable for our growth than getting it all 'right.' It's in the areas that are difficult for us to work with, that we make lots of mistakes in, that we gain our greatest experiences.
quotes.author: Angel Kyodo Williams

quotes.quote: The Fair Trade movement is growing as people realize that they can help alleviate poverty and protect the environment by choosing Fair Trade products.
quotes.author: Robert Alan Silverstein

quotes.quote: Fair Trade supports some of the most bio-diverse farming systems in the world. When you visit a Fair Trade coffee grower's fields, with the forest canopy overhead and the sound of migratory songbirds in the air, it feels like you're standing in the rainforest.
quotes.author: Professor Miguel Altieri

quotes.quote: It hit me very early on that something was terribly wrong, that I would see silos full of food and supermarkets full of food, and kids starving. In Fair Trade, we see ourselves as this infinitesimal part of the world economy. But somebody's got to come up with an alternative model that says children eating is No. 1.
quotes.author: Medea Benjamin

quotes.quote: It is very important for you to know that fair trade leads to better roads, better health and better lives for farmers not just in Nicaragua, but around the world.
quotes.author: Rosario Castellon

quotes.quote: Fair Trade is part of a larger movement about corporate social responsibility, influenced by the public's desire to deal with companies that are (committed) to workplace quality, the environment and employee well-being.
quotes.author: Mac McCoy

quotes.quote: Fair Trade is a market-based, entrepreneurial response to business as usual: it helps third-word farmers developing direct market access as well as the organizational and management capacity to add value to their products and take them directly to the global market. Direct trade, a fair price, access to capital and local capacity-building, which are the core strategies of this model, have been successfully building farmers' incomes and self-reliance for more than 50 years.
quotes.author: Paul Rice

quotes.quote: No business which depends for existence on paying less than living wages to its workers has any right to continue in this country. By living wages I mean more than a bare subsistence level --I mean the wages of decent living.
quotes.author: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Goods produced under conditions which do not meet a rudimentary standard to decency should be regarded as contraband and not allowed to pollute the channels of international commerce.
quotes.author: Franklin Delano Roosevelt

quotes.quote: When you buy Fairtrade products you can guarantee that the farmers who have worked hard to grow them get a minimum price. Fairtrade is a way of giving regular support – and enjoying delicious high quality foods at the same time.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: Thanks to Fair trade, we will not die of hunger. We will not lose our land. Our children can attend school. I want to send thanks to all of the churches that purchase our coffee. Thanks to you, we have a seed of hope in our lives.
quotes.author: Jose Luis Castillo Vasquez

quotes.quote: With Fair Trade we have an incentive to invest in social programs that benefit producers and the community. We also receive higher incomes to sustain ourselves. If it weren't for Fair Trade, we wouldn't exist as banana producers since the amount we receive for a box of conventional bananas does not cover our expenses.
quotes.author: Edinson Cabana Zapata

quotes.quote: To help U.S. workers, farmers and businesses, and America's long-term economic security, Congress should take decisive action to bring about fair trade with China, instead of squandering this opportunity on a weak Republican bill.
quotes.author: Joe Baca

quotes.quote: I am a firm believer in free but fair trade. However the United States should not be on the losing end of trade agreements that are not enforced. It is time that we make China play fairly.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Dole

quotes.quote: I am proud of all of our products across every category we're in - hair, bath and body, face, cosmetics, baby, and men's - because they reflect the highest quality natural, organic, fair trade, and community commerce-sourced ingredients available.
quotes.author: Richelieu Dennis

quotes.quote: I am appreciative of the Bush administration's commitment to fair trade by looking at the facts in this case and ruling affirmatively for the implementation of quotas in this specific category.
quotes.author: Howard Coble

quotes.quote: My priorities are a fair trade policy in this country, increasing the minimum wage, going after the drug companies for the way that they charge and their whole pricing structure that have put absolutely amazing drugs out of reach for so many Americans.
quotes.author: Sherrod Brown

quotes.quote: For a small country like Norway, it's important for our ability to trade and to invest across borders that we have fair trade and that we have multilateral trade systems, also.
quotes.author: Erna Solberg

quotes.quote: China's idea of fair trade is government subsidies of its textile and apparel exports to the United States, currency manipulation, and forgiveness of loans by its government banks.
quotes.author: Virginia Foxx

quotes.quote: It's all about fair trade, and helping people eating locally grown stuff. We're recycling everything. We're trying to tour in the most conscious way possible, environmentally and socially.
quotes.author: Andrew Dost

quotes.quote: We must work toward cyber doctrine that reflects the wisdom of free markets, private competition, and the important but limited role of government in establishing and enforcing the rule of law, honoring the rights of personal property, the benefits of free and fair trade, and the fundamental principles of liberty.
quotes.author: Tom Bossert

quotes.quote: The EU ignores the fact that 98 per cent of shoe manufacturers are funded by private and foreign capital. Refusing to grant market economy treatment to Chinese shoe makers is a discriminatory action violating the principles of fair trade.
quotes.author: Chong Quan

quotes.quote: Fair trade governed by rules is the basis for the growth of our economy. Institutions and procedures must be strengthened, not weakened.
quotes.author: Vicente Fox

quotes.quote: free and fair trade ... policies that raise standards so that everyone does better.
quotes.author: Dick Gephardt

quotes.quote: I pity the man who wants a coat so cheap that the man or woman who produces the cloth will starve in the process.
quotes.author: Benjamin Harrison

quotes.quote: Fair Trade is all about improving lives, but we don't do that through charity - there is no hand out in the Fair Trade movement. People are solving their own problems through Fair Trade.
quotes.author: Paul Ricec

quotes.quote: I often wonder why the West is much more interested in aid deliveries than in fair trade, for example. The fair exchange of goods would place far more money into the hands of the affected people than relief operations.
quotes.author: Paul Kagame

quotes.quote: That's at the root of the human interaction: fair trade.
quotes.author: Billy Corgan

quotes.quote: We are determined that our nation shall cease to be a burden on other countries but shall contribute positively to world prosperity, while observing fully the fair trade practices in international commerce.
quotes.author: Shigeru Yoshida

quotes.quote: I think that trade is an important issue. Of course, we are 5 percent of the world's population; we have to trade with the other 95 percent. And we need to have smart, fair trade deals.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: Fairness is not about statistical equality.
quotes.author: John Bercow

quotes.quote: The question of societal fairness is always pertinent.
quotes.author: Martin Schulz

quotes.quote: Lack of fairness to an opponent is essentially a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: Our sense of fairness tells us that people should pay for the wrong they do.
quotes.author: Lewis B. Smedes

quotes.quote: A man who deals in fairness with his own, he can make manifest justice in the state.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Some people believe that fairness comes with obeying the rules. I'm one of those people.
quotes.author: Al Green

quotes.quote: Fairness does not mean everyone gets the same. Fairness means everyone gets what they need.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised.
quotes.author: Brit Hume

quotes.quote: It wasn't fair, but fairness was something you had to go get; it wasn't delivered like the mail.
quotes.author: Tim Powers

quotes.quote: Fairness is giving all people the treatment they earn and deserve. It doesn't mean treating everyone alike.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: If we expect others to rely on our fairness and justice we must show that we rely on their fairness and justice.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Fair means everyone gets what they need. And the only way to get what you need is to make it happen yourself.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: My own mother always taught me that fairness was a family value - I think equal pay is about fairness for everyone.
quotes.author: Mike Honda

quotes.quote: Fairness means not to use fraud and trickery in the exchange of commodities and services and the exchange of feelings.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Fairness is an across-the-board requirement for all our interactions with each other ...Fairness treats everbody the same.
quotes.author: Barbara Jordan

quotes.quote: The Universe is about maintaining balance, not fairness. It is by means of balance that true fairness exists in the Universe.
quotes.author: Leot Felton

quotes.quote: These men ask for just the same thing, fairness, and fairness only. This, so far as in my power, they, and all others, shall have.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The universe had an odd sense of fairness; it took away things one did not want to give up, and then gave things one did not ask for.
quotes.author: Laila Lalami

quotes.quote: Objective is the wrong word. Rather, it's fairness. Objectivity is a false God. Instead we should strive for fairness and transparency.
quotes.author: Ken Auletta

quotes.quote: It's just better to promote love and fairness and equality than it is to promote something you think is based on your religious beliefs.
quotes.author: Jane Wiedlin

quotes.quote: Fairness does not consist so much of everybody's doing the same thing, but of everybody's being willing to do something that others don't want to do.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Fairness forces you - even when you're writing a piece highly critical of, say, genetically modified food, as I have done - to make sure you represent the other side as extensively and as accurately as you possibly can.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Fairness' is one of the great mantras of the left. Since everyone has his own definition of fairness, that word is a blank check for the expansion of government power. What fairness means in practice is that third parties -- busybodies -- can prevent mutual accommodations by others.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Free people can treat each other justly, but they can't make life fair. To get rid of the unfairness among individuals, you have to exercise power over them. The more fairness you want, the more power you need. Thus, all dreams of fairness become dreams of tyranny in the end.
quotes.author: Andrew Klavan

quotes.quote: Fairness is a concept that holds only in limited situations. Yet we want the concept to extend to everything, in and out of phase. From snails to hardware stores to married life. Maybe no one finds it, or even misses it, but fairness is like love. What is given has nothing to do with what we seek.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: I don't think fairness means that you give equal time to every point of view no matter how marginal. You weigh the sides, you do some truth-testing, you apply judgment to them.
quotes.author: Bill Keller

quotes.quote: Fairness does not require the redistribution of wealth; it requires the creation of wealth, geared to an economy that can provide employment for everyone able and willing to work.
quotes.author: Felix Rohatyn

quotes.quote: Fairness is man's ability to rise above his prejudices.
quotes.author: Wes Fesler

quotes.quote: Art is a way of showing greater fairness to things than is customary.
quotes.author: Eli Siegel

quotes.quote: Fairness dictates that the highest income people should pay the greatest share of taxes, and they do.
quotes.author: Mitt Romney

quotes.quote: Simple fairness dictates that government must not raise taxes on families struggling to pay their bills.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Fairness is actually not having presumptive negativity written about you and always assuming the worst about you.
quotes.author: Kellyanne Conway

quotes.quote: Someone who values fairness and expects or, even better, wants to do his share in the home. These men exist and, trust me, over time, nothing is sexier.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Fairness means not to use fraud and trickery in the exchange of commodities and services and the exchange of feelings...Exploitation and manipulation produce boredom and triviality; they cripple man, and all factors that make man into a psychic cripple turn him also into a sadist or a destroyer.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Principles focusing on equality and fairness, those are principles that we can't let go of.
quotes.author: Niki Ashton

quotes.quote: Justice as fairness provides what we want.
quotes.author: John Rawls

quotes.quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the Creator for all I have not seen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: None of us knows what might happen even the next minute, yet still we go forward. Because we trust. Because we have Faith.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I dont think that we're meant to understand it all the time. I think that sometimes we just have to have faith.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Faith is believing in something when common sense tells you not to.
quotes.author: From the movie, "Miracle On 34th Street"

quotes.quote: Just because you can't see it doesn't mean it isn't there. You can't see the future, yet you know it will come; you can't see the air, yet you continue to breathe.
quotes.author: Claire London

quotes.quote: I don't pray for God to take my problems away, I pray only for God to give me the strength to go through them.
quotes.author: Jose Lozano

quotes.quote: I am not moved by what I see. I am not moved by what I feel. I am moved only by what I believe.
quotes.author: Smith Wigglesworth

quotes.quote: Faith begins where the will of God is known.
quotes.author: Kenneth E. Hagin Sr.

quotes.quote: Faith obliterates time, annihilates distance, and brings future things at once into its possession.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: How can one come to possess great faith? Now listen, here is the answer to that: First, the blade, then the ear, then the full corn in the ear. Faith must grow by soil, moisture, and exercise.
quotes.author: Smith Wigglesworth

quotes.quote: A little faith will bring your soul to heaven, but a lot of faith will bring heaven to your soul.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Faith is like radar that sees through the fog.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Faith is reason grown courageous.
quotes.author: Sherwood Eddy

quotes.quote: Faith, to my mind, is a stiffening process, a sort of mental starch.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Faith is spiritualized imagination.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Faith is a passionate intuition.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: As your faith is strengthened you will find there is no longer the need to have a sense of control, that things will flow as they will, and that you will flow with them, to your great delight and benefit.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Teney

quotes.quote: Faith is a grand cathedral, with divinely pictured windows - standing without, you can see no glory, nor can imagine any, but standing within every ray of light reveals a harmony of unspeakable splendors.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: To fear is to expect punishment. To love is to know we are immersed, not in darkness, but in light.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Without faith a man can do nothing; with it all things are possible.
quotes.author: Sir William Osler

quotes.quote: Faith is a bird that feels dawn breaking and sings while it is still dark.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted in spite of your changing moods.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Faith is an excitement and an enthusiasm: it is a condition of intellectual magnificence to which we must cling as to a treasure, and not squander on our way through life in the small coin of empty words, or in exact and priggish argument.
quotes.author: George Sand

quotes.quote: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Our faith comes in moments... yet there is a depth in those brief moments which constrains us to ascribe more reality to them than to all other experiences.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: You can do very little with faith, but you can do nothing without it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Faith is unseen but felt, faith is strength when we feel we have none, faith is hope when all seems lost.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Faith is no irresponsible shot in the dark. It is a responsible trust in God, who knows the desires of your hearts, the dreams you are given, and the goals you have set. He will guide your paths right.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: Faith is a kind of knowing; it is different from hope. My faith is that life is purposeful; of that I'm sure. There is a God, there is intelligence, there is consciousness. And behind all of this, there is incredible compassion.
quotes.author: John Denver

quotes.quote: Faith is different from proof; the latter is human, the former is a gift from God.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Faith means being sure of what we hope for now. It means knowing something is real, this moment, all around you, even when you don't see it.
quotes.author: Joni Eareckson Tada

quotes.quote: You can be anything you want to be, if you only believe with sufficient conviction and act in accordance with your faith; for whatever the mind can conceive and believe, the mind can achieve.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Without faith it is impossible to please God, and without faith it is impossible for you to become great. The distinguishing characteristic of all really great men and women is an unwavering faith.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: Faith-not a faith in one's self or in one's own powers but faith in principle; in the Something Great which upholds right, and which may be relied upon to give us the victory in due time. Without this faith it is not possible for any one to rise to real greatness.
quotes.author: Wallace D. Wattles

quotes.quote: There is but one cause of human failure. And that is man's lack of faith in his true self.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Faith is an oasis in the heart which can never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Faith is a process of leaping into the abyss not on the basis of any certainty about where we shall land, but rather on the belief that we shall land.
quotes.author: Carter Heyward

quotes.quote: Faith is not a delicate flower which would wither away under the slightest stormy weather.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Faith is not trying to believe something regardless of the evidence; faith is daring something regardless of the consequences.
quotes.author: Sherwood Eddy

quotes.quote: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Let your door stand open to receive Him, unlock your soul to Him, offer Him a welcome in your mind, and then you will see the riches of simplicity, the treasures of peace, the joy of grace.
quotes.author: St. Ambrose

quotes.quote: Faith is letting down our nets into the transparent deeps at the Divine command, not knowing what we shall draw.
quotes.author: Francois Fenelon

quotes.quote: I trust in God, and His ways are not our ways. So we have to go with that, and there's nothing I can do about that.
quotes.author: Cissy Houston

quotes.quote: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Faith in God is an opening up, a letting go, a deep trust, a free act of love but sometimes it was so hard to love.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: Hold fast to your faith. Keep your hope in the Lord. Embrace the love of God.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Faith is all about trusting God even when you don't understand His plan.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
quotes.author: David Brainerd

quotes.quote: Faith is not the belief that everything will be all right tomorrow, but the belief that I possess the strength to make everything all right today.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Put up your guards, keep faith in God, I promise you all the world will be ours.
quotes.author: Puff Daddy

quotes.quote: God doesn't change his word, if He has promised you something;you better believe that is done before it's existence.
quotes.author: Euginia Herlihy

quotes.quote: He knows that as long as a man keeps his faith in God and in himself nothing can permanently defeat him.
quotes.author: Wilferd Peterson

quotes.quote: Faith in God includes faith in God's timing.
quotes.author: Neal A Maxwell

quotes.quote: Through faith in the Lord Jesus alone can we obtain forgiveness of our sins, and be at peace with God; but, believing in Jesus, we become, through this very faith, the children of God; have God as our Father, and may come to Him for all the temporal and spiritual blessings which we need.
quotes.author: George Muller

quotes.quote: Faith in God necessarily implies a lack of faith in humanity.
quotes.author: Barbara G. Walker

quotes.quote: Build a strong faith in God through daily commitment in reading and obeying God's word.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: A living faith in God means acceptance of the brotherhood of mankind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: You can believe in God without believing in immortality, but it is hard to see how anyone can believe in immortality and not believe in God.
quotes.author: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.quote: Trusting God means looking beyond what we can see to what God sees.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: If you need all the answers to trust God, you are not really trusting God.
quotes.author: David McGee

quotes.quote: The danger of loss of faith in God is not that one will believe in nothing, but rather that one will believe in anything.
quotes.author: Gilbert K Chesterton

quotes.quote: The great thing about faith in God is that it keeps a man undisturbed in the midst of disturbance.
quotes.author: Oswald Chambers

quotes.quote: You don't have any problems, all you need is faith in God.
quotes.author: R. W. Schambach

quotes.quote: Faith in God is the instrument which enables men and women to remove the hills of difficulty which block their path.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: The grace,faith,love and power of God will uplift you to greater heights.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Keep the faith. The vision is always for the appointed time. Be patient, prayerful and wait for the fulfillment of your visions.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: The word hope I take for faith; and indeed hope is nothing else but the constancy of faith.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: If our faith in God is not the veriest sham, it demands, and will produce, the abandonment sometimes, the subordination always, of eternal helps and material good.
quotes.author: Alexander Maclaren

quotes.quote: This is true faith, a living confidence in the goodness of God.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: Having faith in God means trusting in Him even when everything inside of you wants to take control.
quotes.author: Dan Ellis

quotes.quote: Faith in God life can never take you by surprise again.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.quote: As believers in Jesus Christ, our work is to believe while God works on our behalf.
quotes.author: Joyce Meyer

quotes.quote: Faith in God means believing absolutely in something with no proof whatsoever. Faith in humanity means believing absolutely in something with a huge amount of proof to the contrary. We are the true believers.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Having faith doesn't mean I have all the answers. It means trusting God especially in the midst of uncertainty.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: To be a strong and empathetic person always requires us to trust that God will send angels to the people's heart we tried to reach, but couldn't.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: I believe if you keep your faith, you keep your trust, you keep the right attitude, if you're grateful, you'll see God open up new doors.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: His faith was like the radar of a bat, it took him through the darkness that surrounded him. It would guide him through everything that evil would throw at him. When his body gave up, God's powers lifted him up and kept his heart thumping.
quotes.author: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to trust an unknown future to a known God.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: Many things are possible for the person who has hope. Even more is possible for the person who has faith. And still more is possible for the person who knows how to love. But everything is possible for the person who practices all three virtues.
quotes.author: Brother Lawrence

quotes.quote: Everyone who believes in God at all believes that he knows what you and I are going to do tomorrow.
quotes.author: C S Lewis

quotes.quote: To have faith in Christ means more than simply despising the delights of this life. It means we should bear all our daily trials that may bring us sorrow, distress, or unhappiness, and bear them patiently for as long as God wishes and until He comes to visit us. For it is said, I waited on the Lord and He came to me.
quotes.author: Symeon the New Theologian

quotes.quote: Having faith in God did not mean sitting back and doing nothing. It meant believing you would find success if you did your best honestly and energetically.
quotes.author: Ken Follett

quotes.quote: Only faith in God and trust in Him give us the strength to endure and obtain victory.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: There is never a moment when God is not in control. Relax! He's got you covered.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Faith is about trusting God when you have unanswered questions.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Even faith in God is only a stage on the way. Ultimately you abandon all, for you come to something so simple that there are no words to express it.
quotes.author: Sri Nisargadatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Let your life reflect the faith you have in God. Fear nothing and pray about everything. Be strong, trust God's word, and trust the process.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: Don’t be scared of anything. Trust in the Lord and face the battle of life. There is no power on earth that can lay you low.
quotes.author: Dada J.P. Vaswani

quotes.quote: When gloomy clouds across the sky / Cast shadows o'er the land, / Bright rays of hope illumine my path, / For Jesus holds my hand.
quotes.author: Laura Ingalls Wilder

quotes.quote: The will of God wouldn’t take you, where His grace wouldn’t protect you.
quotes.author: Gloria Shalom

quotes.quote: The situations that will stretch your faith most will be those times when life falls apart and God is nowhere to be found.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: So keep your faith in the God above, and faith in the righteous truth, / it shall bring you back to the absent love, and the joys of a vanished youth.
quotes.author: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.quote: Prayer will change a heartache into a cheerful song, / If in faith you ask it, the answer will soon come 'long.
quotes.author: Eldred Herbert

quotes.quote: My faith didn't remove the pain, but it got me through the pain. Trusting God didn't diminish or vanquish the anguish, but it enabled me to endure it.
quotes.author: Robert Rogers

quotes.quote: Faith is not only daring to believe, it is also daring to act. When I believe in myself as a son of God, I attribute to all men the same quality. This goes for men of every class, creed and color. The proof that I believe this way will be measured by the way I act towards others.
quotes.author: Wilfred Peterson

quotes.quote: God is capable of discerning the thoughts and intents of the heart, and answers prayers of faith both spoken and unspoken. It's all about faith.
quotes.author: Luis Ranzolin

quotes.quote: The beginning of anxiety is the end of faith, and the beginning of faith is the end of anxiety.
quotes.author: George Miller

quotes.quote: A tree is shown by its fruits, and in the same way those who profess to belong to Christ will be seen by what they do. For what is needed is not mere present professions, but perseverance to the end in the power of faith.
quotes.author: Ignatius of Antioch

quotes.quote: What greater rebellion, impiety, or insult to God can there be than not to believe his promises?
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: When principles that run against your deepest convictions begin to win the day, then battle is your calling, and peace has become sin; you must, at the price of dearest peace, lay your convictions bare before friend and enemy, with all the fire of your faith.
quotes.author: Abraham Kuyper

quotes.quote: If anyone cannot set his mind at rest by disregarding death, that man should know that he has not yet gone far enough in the faith of Christ.
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: Catch on fire with enthusiasm and people will come for miles to watch you burn.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: Faith enables the believing soul to treat the future as present and the invisible as seen.
quotes.author: J. Oswald Sanders

quotes.quote: Probabilities are the big temptation when it comes to exercising faith.
quotes.author: Miles Stanford

quotes.quote: Firstly I believe in the reality of God as the centre of human aspiration and history. What I believe about man, made in the image of God, derives first and foremost from what I believe about God.
quotes.author: David Sheppard

quotes.quote: I believe in Jesus Christ, in whom I get a picture of God within the limits of my comprehension. Upon Him rests the whole fabric of my life. He alone holds it together in form and purpose, and without Him it would disintegrate.
quotes.author: Hugh Redwood

quotes.quote: When I believe, I am no longer a mere man, I am already a son of God.
quotes.author: Carlo Carretto

quotes.quote: He does not believe, that does not live according to his Belief.
