quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: There comes a time when we have to believe where we cannot prove, and to accept where we cannot understand. If, even in the darkest hour, we believe that somehow there is a purpose in life, and that somehow that purpose is love, then even the unbearable becomes bearable, and even in the darkness there is still a glimmer of light.
quotes.author: William Barclay

quotes.quote: I believe in one God, the creator of the universe. That he governs it by his Providence. That he ought to be worshipped. That the most acceptable service we can render to him is doing good to his other children.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Religious faith does not consist in supposing that there is a God. It consists in personal trust in God rising to personal fellowship with God.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: The only faith that wears well and holds its colour in all weathers is that which is woven of conviction and set with the sharp mordant of experience.
quotes.author: J. R. Lowell

quotes.quote: To have faith is to meet the world with the conviction that in spite of all its ambiguities and its downright evils, there can be discerned in it the reality of love and a ground of hope.
quotes.author: John Macquarrie

quotes.quote: Proofs are the last thing looked for by a truly religious mind which feels the imaginative fitness of its faith and knows instinctively that, in such a manner, imaginative fitness is all that can be required.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: One in whom persuasion and belief / Had ripened into faith, and faith become / A passionate intuition.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: That man is perfect in faith who can come to God in the utter dearth of his feelings and his desires, without a glow or an inspiration, with the weight of low thoughts, failures, neglects, and wandering forgetfulness, and say to him, 'Thou art my refuge, because thou art my home.'
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: How do we stand in respect of our use of the watch-tower of Faith? Are we so busy on the ground floor that we take it for granted, and seldom go upstairs? It is true that those stairs are dark and steep; but if we never make the effort, never ascend to the soul's summit, we remain something less than human.
quotes.author: Evelyn Underhill

quotes.quote: The creeds are not objects of faith; they are expressions of a faith of which Christ is the object, and in regard to all such personal relationships there is scope for at least a great width of intellectual movement as we seek more and more perfectly to understand and to interpret the character with which we are confronted.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: Faith literally means to "give up, surrender, or commit." Faith is complete confidence.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Belief is a wise wager. Granted that faith cannot be proved, what harm will come to you if you gamble on its truth and it proves false? If you gain, you gain all; if you lose, you lose nothing. Wager, then, without hesitation, that He exists.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: Faith of our fathers, living still, / In spite of dungeon, fire, and sword; / O how our hearts beat high with joy / When e'er we hear that glorious word! / Faith of our fathers, holy faith! / We will be true to thee until death.
quotes.author: Carolyn Craig Franklin

quotes.quote: Those who are faithful know only the pleasures of love: it is the faithless who know love's tragedies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
quotes.author: J.R.R.Tolkien

quotes.quote: How unreliable is the woman caught being faithful! Today she is faithful to you, tomorrow to another.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: I have no faith in my faith. My faith is in the faithful God.
quotes.author: Leonard Ravenhill

quotes.quote: When we in faith embrace Christ as our Lord and Savior, our minds are transformed.
quotes.author: John MacArthur Jr

quotes.quote: Faith in the king comes easily in lovely times, but be faithful now and endure, pale lover.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Leave me if you must, but be faithful to me if you are with me.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: Have confidence. Return. Invoke our Lady and you'll be faithful.
quotes.author: Josemaria Escriva

quotes.quote: In all my life and in the future, I will always be a faithful and loyal servant to all of my compatriots.
quotes.author: Norodom Sihamoni

quotes.quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: If you be faithful, you will have that honor that comes from God: his Spirit will say in your hearts, Well done, good and faithful servants.
quotes.author: Adam Clarke

quotes.quote: We are not here to be successful, we are here to be FAITHFUL.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Otherwise without faith it becomes very difficult to keep pushing forward every day.
quotes.author: Darrin Wiggins

quotes.quote: The best thing about love is the trust, the best thing about trust is honesty, and the best thing about honesty is faithfulness.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Faithfulness and loyalty is not an option in a relationship, it's a priority if it must work.
quotes.author: Anne Nwakama

quotes.quote: We can only be faithful to what we remember, and we remember only what we have known.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: If your man were the faithful type you wouldn't have to worry about other women. Realize that it's his job to be faithful to you.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: You have to be faithful in little before you are entrusted with much.
quotes.author: Daniel Brown

quotes.quote: If you wonder how long Ill be faithful. I'll be happy to tell you again. I'm gonna love you forever & ever, forever & ever amen.
quotes.author: Randy Travis

quotes.quote: Being faithful in the smallest things is the way to gain, maintain, and demonstrate the strength needed to accomplish something great.
quotes.author: Alex Harris

quotes.quote: To love is to be faithful to those who cheat on us.
quotes.author: Nelson Rodrigues

quotes.quote: Hold faithfulness and sincerity as first principles.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: One secret to my success is that I am faithful to my dreams and don't cheat on my dreams by taking drugs or blaming others when things don't go right.
quotes.author: Mark Kostabi

quotes.quote: Become faithful to yourself, if you do, it will come natural towards everyone else.
quotes.author: Unarine Ramaru

quotes.quote: God wants to be faithful and make sure that He restores me and you to our original purpose, a pure and holy people when He comes again.
quotes.author: Happy Zhou

quotes.quote: We shouldn't have to be faithful, we should want to be faithful.
quotes.author: Larry Kramer

quotes.quote: Dont worry about being effective. Just concentrate on being faithful to the truth.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Faith is unseen but felt, faith is strength when we feel we have none, faith is hope when all seems lost.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Only the person who has faith in himself is able to be faithful to others.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: At times one remains faithful to a cause only because its opponents do not cease to be insipid.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I don't think there are any men who are faithful to their wives.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: It is a truism to say that the dog is largely what his master makes of him: he can be savage and dangerous, untrustworthy, cringing and fearful; or he can be faithful and loyal, courageous and the best of companions and allies.
quotes.author: Ranulph Fiennes

quotes.quote: He who loveth a book will never want a faithful friend, a wholesome counsellor, a cheerful companion, or an effectual comforter.
quotes.author: Isaac Barrow

quotes.quote: Fake friends; those who only drill holes under your boat to get it leaking; those who discredit your ambitions and those who pretend they love you, but behind their backs they know they are in to destroy your legacies.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: We fear our enemy but the bigger and real fear is that of a fake friend who is sweetest to your face and most vile behind your back.
quotes.author: Mufti Ismail Menk

quotes.quote: Fake friends are like shadows: always near you at your brightest moments, but nowhere to be seen at your darkest hourTrue friends are like stars, you don't always see them but they are always there.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Someone who smiles too much with you can sometime frown too much with you at your back.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: I despise the rituals of fake friendship. I wish we could just claw each other's eyes out and call it a day; instead we put on huge radiant smiles and spout compliments until our teeth hurt from the saccharine sweetness of it all.
quotes.author: Jody Gehrman

quotes.quote: Be very careful of who you share your problem with, remember that not every friend that smile at you is your best friend.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: It is hard to deal with someone who smiles and pretends to like you to your face and sticks that eight inch blade in your back when you turn around.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: A false friend and a shadow attend only while the sun shines.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: An honest enemy is better than a false friend. When in doubt, pay more attention to what people do and less to what they say. Actions not only speak louder than words, they are more difficult to fake.
quotes.author: Zero Dean

quotes.quote: Time alone can prove the worth of friendship. As time goes by we lose the the false ones and keep the best. True friends stay when all the rest are gone.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: An insincere and evil friend is moreto be feared than a wild beast;a wild beast may wound your body,but an evil friend will wound your mind.
quotes.author: The Buddha

quotes.quote: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces;but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
quotes.author: Richard Burton

quotes.quote: A friend who stands with you in pressure is more valuable than a hundred ones who stand with you in pleasure.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Most people want to see you to do better, but not doing better than them.
quotes.author: London Mond

quotes.quote: An honest enemy is better than a best friend who lies.
quotes.author: Vandi Tanko

quotes.quote: Always sleep with one eye open. Never take anything for granted. Your best friends might just be your enemies.
quotes.author: Sara Shepard

quotes.quote: Pretend to be poor in reality and you'll notice a decrease in your friends list and request.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Fake friends are like autumn leaves, they're scattered everywhere.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: You always knew after sh— things happened, who your friends really were.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Better an honest enemy than a false friend.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Watch who you call friend, because friends are the same ones that will leak your business to everyone after y'all not friends anymore.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: I've got more respect for someone who comes out and says they don't like me than for the ones who act like they do but talk bad about me when I'm not around.
quotes.author: Mitchell Perry

quotes.quote: You got nothing to lose.You don't lose when you lose fake friends.
quotes.author: Joan Jett

quotes.quote: Keep talking about me behind my back, and watch God keep blessing me in front of your face.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Every coin has two sides, just like most people have two faces.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: I used to think enemies were the worst people in the world, but that was until I met fake friends and realized that they're a lot worse.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The same person that speaks highly of you will be the same person that downs you. Be careful who you call friends.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Better to have an enemy who slaps you in the face than a friend who stabs you in the back.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: An enemy, who is honest and shows his/her hate openly is better than a friend who is liar and putting you down secretly.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A false friend, a friendly fraud: both are like thieves.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: A false friend is like the shadow of a sundial.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Friends are like melons. Shall I tell you why? To find a good one, you must a hundred try.
quotes.author: Claude Mermet

quotes.quote: To betray you must first belong. I never belonged.
quotes.author: Kim Philby

quotes.quote: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: Brother, even by our mother’s dust, I charge you, do not betray me to your mirth or hate.
quotes.author: John Ford

quotes.quote: In one respect indeed, our employment may be reckoned dishonest, because, like great Statesmen, we encourage those who betray their friends.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Is it possible to succeed without any act of betrayal?
quotes.author: Jean Renoir

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A friendship founded on business is good deal better than a business founded on friendship.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: A lot of problems in the world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A person's character is shown through their actions in life NOT where they sit on Sunday.
quotes.author: Navonne Johns

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success!
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Be yourself. An original is worth more than a copy.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: Betray a friend and you’ll often find you have ruined yourself.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Don’t fear the enemy that attacks you, but the fake friend that hugs you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fake friends are like shadows: they follow you in the sun, but leave your side when in gets dark.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Fear of something is at the root of hate for others, and hate within will eventually destroy the hater.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: Friends are born, not made.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It’s also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.author: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.quote: I hate two faced people, it makes it harder for me to decide which side to slap first.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If it comes, let it come. If it goes, it’s ok, let it go. Let things come and go. Stay calm, don’t let anything disturb your peace, and carry on.
quotes.author: Germany Kent

quotes.quote: In fact a lot of problems in this world would disappear if we talk to each other instead of about each other.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In life, you have a choice: Bitter or Better? Choose better, forget bitter.
quotes.author: Nick Vujicic

quotes.quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, can never know what true friendship means.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: It’s hard to tell who has your back, from who has it long enough just to stab you in it…
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Knowledge planted in truth grows in truth. Strength born of peace loses nothing to hate.
quotes.author: Aberjhani

quotes.quote: Learn to use the criticism as fuel and you will never run out of energy.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: Letting go of toxic people in your life is a big step in loving yourself.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Lovers have a right to betray you, friends don’t.
quotes.author: Judy Holliday

quotes.quote: Many people would be scared if they saw in the mirror, not their faces..but their character.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My fake plants died because I did not pretend to water them.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Once they stop talking to you, they start talking about you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Share your weaknesses. Share your hard moments. Share your real side. It’ll either scare away every fake person in your life or it will inspire them to finally let go of that mirage called "perfection," which will open the doors to the most important relationships you’ll ever be a part of.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Some people are going to leave, but that’s not the end your story. That’s the end of their part in your story.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Some people think that the truth can be hidden with a little cover-up and decoration. But as time goes by, what is true is revealed, and what is fake fades away.
quotes.author: Ismail Haniyeh

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you have to give up on people. Not because you don’t care but because they don’t.
quotes.author: Jennifer Green

quotes.quote: Stab the body and it heals, but injure the heart and the wound lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Mineko Iwasaki

quotes.quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
quotes.author: St. Jerome

quotes.quote: The jealous are troublesome to others, but a torment to themselves.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: The strong-minded rise to the challenge of their goals and dreams. The weak-minded become haters.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The worst part about success is trying to find someone who is happy for you.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: This is what happens. You tell your friends your most personal secrets, and they use them against you.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: What’s the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you’re so ugly on the inside?
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: You cannot always trust what you see. Even salt looks like sugar.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You don’t lose friends because real friends can never be lost. You lose people masquerading as friends, and you’re better for it.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Fake people have an image to maintain. Real people just don't care.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It's better to have an ENEMY who honestly says they hate you than to have a FRIEND who's putting you down secretly
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Fake people are like fools gold, it can be found everywhere yet it's worth nothing. Real people are like gold, they're very rare and worth a fortune
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: I hate fake people. You know what I'm talking about. Mannequins.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: People wears a mask of lie so they look attractive, so be careful.
quotes.author: Muhammad Saqib

quotes.quote: Everyone have two faces, but mine are twins.
quotes.author: Felix Caussan

quotes.quote: Sometimes its not the person who change, it's the mask that falls off.
quotes.author: Mhaj Porras

quotes.quote: Fake friends are like plastic, if you're finished using it, you can trash it.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Don't be fooled by their mask.Fake people eventually show their true colors. Just wait until their mask needs cleaning.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Fake friends are like autumn leaves, they're scattered everywhere.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It's funny how; The one person you'd take a bullet for tends to always be the one behind the gun.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's a good thing to have fake people in this world. It helps you find out who your real friends are.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: I hate two faced people. It's so hard to decide which face to slap first.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Cannot trust anyone these days. Fake is becoming the new trend
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The same person that speaks highly of you will be the same person that downs you. Be careful who you call friends.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to distance yourself from all the folks that only calls when they need something
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The only thing you get from being fake is losing your real friends and gaining more fake people in your circle
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Fake people have a hard time attaching themselves to people who have good self-esteem. Because people who feel good about themselves won't put up with them
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Fake people hate honesty. It's the lies that keep them feeling good about themselves and their lives. So share your true feelings about their actions and watch how they fade away
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Fake people will hang around as long as you let them. So, don't. Cut back on their time and spend it with your real friends
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Why be fake? In the end, the truth comes out and when that happens, you're standing alone
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Always sleep with one eye open. Never take anything for granted. Your best friends might just be your enemies.
quotes.author: Sara Shepard

quotes.quote: Faking your own death is illegal, yet faking your own life is celebrated.
quotes.author: Dean Cavanagh

quotes.quote: In the beginning, some people try to appear that everything about them is in black and white, until later their true colors come out.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Fake people are like soap bubbles, they pop out when the sun shines brightly.
quotes.author: Chiranjude Bird

quotes.quote: Fake people talk about other people being fake. Real people worry about their business, and no one else's.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Nice words and nice appearance doesn't conclude that someone is nice, i believe that the nicer you look, the more deceptive you appear.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Time passes and you begin to see, people for who they really are and not who they pretend to be.
quotes.author: Scarlet Koop

quotes.quote: What's the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you're so ugly on the inside?
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: I love fake people provided they are mannequins.
quotes.author: Pushpa Rana

quotes.quote: Fake people are real counterfeits.
quotes.author: Josh Parham

quotes.quote: All women are dishonest. If they weren't, the world would be divided into two classes of people: old maids and bachelors.
quotes.author: Helen Broderick

quotes.quote: These girls in love never realize they should be honestly dishonest instead of being dishonestly honest.
quotes.author: Clifton Webb

quotes.quote: A fair face, a foul heart.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: A fair skin often covers a crooked mind.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: He who caresses thee more than the occasion justifies has either deceived thee or intends it.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The laughter, the tears, and the song of a woman are equally deceptive.
quotes.author: Roman Proverbs

quotes.quote: For the most part, fraud, in the end, secures for its companions' repentance and shame.
quotes.author: C. Simmons

quotes.quote: All frauds, like the wall, daubed with untempered mortar, with which men things to buttress up an edifice, always tend to the decay of what they are devised to support.
quotes.author: Whately

quotes.quote: The first and worst of all frauds is to cheat oneself.
quotes.author: Bailey

quotes.quote: The more gross the fraud, the more glibly will it go down, and the more greedily be swallowed since folly will always find faith where impostors will find impudence.
quotes.author: Cotton

quotes.quote: It is time to fear when tyrants seem to kiss.
quotes.author: Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Our double-dealing generally comes down upon ourselves—To speak or act a lie is alike contemptible in the sight of God and man.
quotes.author: Everton

quotes.quote: Deceivers are the most dangerous members of society.—They trifle with the best affections of our nature, and violate the most sacred obligations.
quotes.author: Crabbe

quotes.quote: And if, to be sure, sometimes you need to conceal a fact with words, do it in such a way that it does not become known, or if it does become known, that you have a ready and quick defense.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: An open curse may prove a curse, / But a pretended friend is worse.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Speak what we feel, not what we ought to say.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I sit on a man's back, choking him and making him carry me, and yet assure myself and others that I am very sorry for him and wish to ease his lot by all possible means—except by getting off his back.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: A friend to all is not a friend to anyone.
quotes.author: Mike Skinner

quotes.quote: What's the whole point of being pretty on the outside when you're so ugly on the inside?
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: A person's character is shown through their actions in life NOT where they sit on Sunday.
quotes.author: Navonne Johns

quotes.quote: People wear a mask of lie so they look attractive, so be careful.
quotes.author: Muhammad Saqib

quotes.quote: In the beginning, some people try to appear that everything about them is 'in black and white,' until later their true colors come out.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Being too nice is a crime today. Fake friends are everywhere around you. they will use you and when you are of no use, throw you away like a wrapper.
quotes.author: Shizra

quotes.quote: Act like you trust people, but don't.
quotes.author: Mayank Chawla

quotes.quote: You don't lose friends because real friends can never be lost. You lose people masquerading as friends, and you’re better for it.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: What greater wound is there than a false friend?
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Be very careful of who you share your problem with, remember that not every friend that smiles at you is your best friend.
quotes.author: Kemmy Nola

quotes.quote: It looked like the world was covered in a cobbler crust of brown sugar and cinnamon.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: For man, autumn is a time of harvest, of gathering together. For nature, it is a time of sowing, of scattering abroad.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: I cannot endure to waste anything as precious as autumn sunshine by staying in the house. So I spend almost all the daylight hours in the open air.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: The leaves fall, the wind blows, and the farm country slowly changes from the summer cottons into its winter wools.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.quote: Falling leaves hide the path so quietly.
quotes.author: John Bailey Autumn

quotes.quote: No spring nor summer's beauty hath such grace as I have seen in one Autumnal face.
quotes.author: John Donne

quotes.quote: Autumn is a second spring when every leaf is a flower.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Nothing is more fleeting than external form, which withers and alters like the flowers of the field at the appearance of autumn.
quotes.author: Umberto Eco

quotes.quote: Delicious autumn! My very soul is wedded to it, and if I were a bird I would fly about the earth seeking the successive autumns.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Autumn, the year's last, loveliest smile.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: I've never known anyone yet who doesn't suffer a certain restlessness when autumn rolls around... We're all eight years old again and anything is possible.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton

quotes.quote: In the garden, Autumn is, indeed the crowning glory of the year, bringing us the fruition of months of thought and care and toil. And at no season, safe perhaps in Daffodil time, do we get such superb colour effects as from August to November.
quotes.author: Rose G. Kingsley

quotes.quote: Winter is an etching, spring a watercolor, summer an oil painting and autumn a mosaic of them all.
quotes.author: Stanley Horowitz

quotes.quote: October is a symphony of permanence and change.
quotes.author: Bonaro W. Overstreet

quotes.quote: The autumn always gets me badly, as it breaks into colours. I want to go south, where there is no autumn, where the cold doesn't crouch over one like a snow-leopard waiting to pounce.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Autumn arrives in the early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Autumn is a season followed immediately by looking forward to spring.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Action must be taken at the first signs of disruption or decay, otherwise disaster will follow as ice-bound water follows brief autumn frosts.
quotes.author: I Ching

quotes.quote: Youth is like spring, an over praised season more remarkable for biting winds than genial breezes. Autumn is the mellower season, and what we lose in flowers we more than gain in fruits.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: A wind has blown the rain away and blown the sky away and all the leaves away, and the trees stand. I think, I too, have known autumn too long.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Autumn burned brightly, a running flame through the mountains, a torch flung to the trees.
quotes.author: Faith Baldwin

quotes.quote: How beautifully leaves grow old. How full of light and color are their last days.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Autumn carries more gold in its pocket than all the other seasons.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: Now Autumn's fire burns slowly along the woods and day by day the dead leaves fall and melt.
quotes.author: William Allingham

quotes.quote: Bittersweet October. The mellow, messy, leaf-kicking, perfect pause between the opposing miseries of summer and winter.
quotes.author: Carol Bishop Hipps

quotes.quote: The autumn leaves blew over the moonlit pavement in such a way as to make the girl who was moving there seem fixed to a sliding walk, letting the motion of the wind and the leaves carry her forward.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: A few days ago I walked along the edge of the lake and was treated to the crunch and rustle of leaves with each step I made. The acoustics of this season are different and all sounds, no matter how hushed, are as crisp as autumn air.
quotes.author: Eric Sloane

quotes.quote: Fall has always been my favorite season. The time when everything bursts with its last beauty, as if nature had been saving up all year for the grand finale.
quotes.author: Lauren DeStefano

quotes.quote: Just before the death of flowers, and before they are buried in snow, there comes a festival season when nature is aglow.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The leaves are all falling, and they're falling like they're falling in love with the ground.
quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

quotes.quote: Listen! the wind is rising, and the air is wild with leaves, we have had our summer evenings, now for October eves!
quotes.author: Humbert Wolfe

quotes.quote: I'm so glad I live in a world where there are Octobers.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: Change is a measure of time and, in the autumn, time seems speeded up. What was is not and never again will be; what is is change.
quotes.author: Edwin Way Teale

quotes.quote: It was one of those perfect English autumnal days which occur more frequently in memory than in life.
quotes.author: P. D. James

quotes.quote: I saw old autumn in the misty morn Stand shadowless like silence, listening To silence.
quotes.author: Thomas Hood

quotes.quote: By all these lovely tokens September days are here, With summer's best of weather And autumn's best of cheer.
quotes.author: Helen Hunt Jackson

quotes.quote: Glorious are the woods in their latest gold and crimson.
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: Autumn seemed to arrive suddenly that year. The morning of the first September was crisp and golden as an apple.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Fall is my favorite season in Los Angeles, watching the birds change color and fall from the trees.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: I loved autumn, the one season of the year that God seemed to have put there just for the beauty of it.
quotes.author: Lee Maynard

quotes.quote: Autumn wins you best by this its mute appeal to sympathy for its decay.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: There is a harmony in autumn, and a luster in its sky, which through the summer is not heard or seen, as if it could not be, as if it had not been.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: After the leaves have fallen, we return To a plain sense of things. It is as if We had come to an end of the imagination, Inanimate in an inert savoir.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Sing a song of seasons; something bright in all, flowers in the summer, fires in the fall.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: It is only the farmer who faithfully plants seeds in the Spring, who reaps a harvest in the Autumn.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: Life starts all over again when it gets crisp in the fall.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: All in November's soaking mist We stand and prune the naked tree, While all our love and interest Seem quenched in the blue-nosed misery.
quotes.author: Ruth Pitter

quotes.quote: Of all the seasons, autumn offers the most to man and requires the least of him.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: Autumn is the harvest of greedy death.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: Autumn leaves shower like gold, like rainbows, as the winds of change begin to blow, signaling the later days of autumn.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Dead upon the field of glory, Hero fit for song and story.
quotes.author: John Randolph Thompson

quotes.quote: War is killing the individual in it unless he has learned livingness if he had it he wouldn't be a good soldier.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: No soldier outlives a thousand chances.
quotes.author: Erich Maria Remarque

quotes.quote: How red the rose that is the soldier's wound, The wounds of many soldiers, the wounds of all The soldiers that have fallen, red in blood, The soldier of time grown deathless in great size.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: You may hate the war, but never hate the ones that fight. For they do not choose when or where to fight. All they chose was to protect who they love and even the people they don't know.
quotes.author: Millie

quotes.quote: You have to be a soldier and a veteran, or a soldier who sacrificed your life for your country.
quotes.author: Rashid Khalidi

quotes.quote: The dead soldier's silence sings our national anthem.
quotes.author: Rev. Aaron Kilbourn

quotes.quote: We do not know one promise these men made, one pledge they gave, one word they spoke; but we do know they summed up and perfected, by one supreme act, the highest virtues of men and citizens. For love of country they accepted death, and thus resolved all doubts, and made.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Every soldier must know, before he goes into battle, how the little battle he is to fight fits into the larger picture, and how the success of his fighting will influence the battle as a whole.
quotes.author: Bernard Law Montgomery

quotes.quote: Our flag does not fly because the wind moves it. It flies with the last breath of each soldier who died protecting it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Only the dead have seen the end of war.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Although no sculptured marble should rise to their memory, nor engraved stone bear record of their deeds, yet will their remembrance be as lasting as the land they honored.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: The brave soldiers die. The cowards survive and write the history.
quotes.author: Ljupka Cvetanova

quotes.quote: Soldiers generally win battles; generals get credit for them.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Our debt to the heroic men and valiant women in the service of our country can never be repaid. They have earned our undying gratitude. America will never forget their sacrifices.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: Brave men rejoice in adversity, just as brave soldiers triumph in war.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: This nation will remain the land of the free only so long as it is the home of the brave.
quotes.author: Elmer Davis

quotes.quote: Die in obeying commands like a soldier, and go to Nirvana, but no cowardice.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: One can be a soldier without dying and a lover without sighing.
quotes.author: Edwin Arnold

quotes.quote: The patriot's blood is the seed of freedom's tree
quotes.author: Thomas Campbell

quotes.quote: The soldier who fights to death never dies, but the soldier who fights for existence never truly exists.
quotes.author: Yi Sun-sin

quotes.quote: We come, not to mourn our dead soldiers, but to praise them.
quotes.author: Francis A. Walker

quotes.quote: For love of country, they accepted death.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: On the battlefield, the military pledges to leave no soldier behind. As a nation, let it be our pledge that when they return home, we leave no veteran behind.
quotes.author: Dan Lipinski

quotes.quote: The woman and the soldier who do not defend the first pass will never defend the last.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: They are dead; but they live in each Patriot's breast, And their names are engraven on honor's bright crest.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Soldiers are citizens of death's grey land, drawing no dividend from time's tomorrows.
quotes.author: Siegfried Sassoon

quotes.quote: The soldiers that didn't come back were the heroes. It's a roll of the dice. If a bullet has your name on it, you're a hero. If you hear a bullet go by, you're a survivor.
quotes.author: Bob Feller

quotes.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: And they who for their country die shall fill an honored grave, for glory lights the soldier's tomb, and beauty weeps the brave.
quotes.author: Joseph Rodman Drake

quotes.quote: The brave die never, though they sleep in dust: Their courage nerves a thousand living men.
quotes.author: Minot J. Savage

quotes.quote: Soldiers willingly, sometimes foolishly, risk their own lives to keep their comrades out of enemy hands.
quotes.author: Alex Berenson

quotes.quote: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
quotes.author: Richard Branson

quotes.quote: And they who for their country die shall fill an honored grave, for glory lights the soldier's tomb, and beauty weeps the brave.
quotes.author: Joseph Rodman Drake

quotes.quote: Anyone who has ever looked into the glazed eyes of a soldier dying on the battlefield will think hard before starting a war.
quotes.author: Otto von Bismarck

quotes.quote: Happy Memorial day to our fallen soldiers. May their bravery, and heroism be remembered and honored forever.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The soldier above all others prays for peace, for it is the soldier who must suffer and bear the deepest wounds and scars of war.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: In war the heroes always outnumber the soldiers ten to one.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: These fallen heroes represent the character of a nation who has a long history of patriotism and honor and a nation who has fought many battles to keep our country free from threats of terror.
quotes.author: Michael N Castle

quotes.quote: Those who have long enjoyed such privileges as we forget in time that men have died to win them.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our battle-fields, safe in the keeping Of Nature's kind, fostering care, Are blooming, our heroes are sleeping, And peace broods perennial there.
quotes.author: John H. Jewett

quotes.quote: Soldiers are citizens of death's grey land, drawing no dividend from time's tomorrows.
quotes.author: Siegfried Sassoon

quotes.quote: Soldiers die not in hatred but in love.
quotes.author: Umar Aman

quotes.quote: The worse the man the better the soldier. If soldiers be not corrupt they ought to be made so.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: They fought the enemy, we fight fat living and self-pity. Shine, o shine, unfalsifying sun, on this sick scene.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: It doesn't take a hero to order men into battle. It takes a hero to be one of those men who goes into battle.
quotes.author: General Norman Schwarzkopf Jr.

quotes.quote: Old soldiers never die; they just fade away.
quotes.author: Douglas Macarthur

quotes.quote: Never make your home in a place. Make a home for yourself inside your own head. You'll find what you need to furnish it memory, friends you can trust, love of learning, and other such things. That way it will go with you wherever you journey.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: History is a people's memory, and without a memory, man is demoted to the lower animals.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: ghosts of fallen soldiers. Personal resurrection prefigures the more general mission of the fallen to redeem the nation.
quotes.author: George L. Mosse

quotes.quote: The intimate connection between the fallen soldier and Christ himself is written large on the iconography of the war.
quotes.author: George L. Mosse

quotes.quote: The painting depicts a fallen soldier literally sleeping in the lap of Christ. Through its fallen the nation was associated with the Passion of Christ, and at times the story of Christ's life itself was projected onto the nation.
quotes.author: George L. Mosse

quotes.quote: At a local celebration of the Volkstrauertag (Memorial Day) in 1926 a play was performed in which a man is caught in a web of greed, disloyalty, and hate until a fallen soldier rises from the grave and redeems him.
quotes.author: George L. Mosse

quotes.quote: The war cemetery was central to the cult of the fallen soldier. A new type of cemetery had developed by the first decade of the nineteenth century.
quotes.author: George L. Mosse

quotes.quote: We bring the fallen soldier from cold storage and place him or her in the coffin. Then the coffin is closed and sealed. I can't explain why I want to be present but I just feel that we owe it to our boys and girls to do it properly. They have, after all, made the ultimate sacrifice, he says.
quotes.author: Jan Grarup

quotes.quote: A lot of thoughts go through your mind, but it's actually very calm and quiet. No one says a word and everyone knows what to do. I always want to make sure the fallen soldiers receives the proper treatment, he explains.
quotes.author: Jan Grarup

quotes.quote: This is the part of the poem that Peter will read as the coffin with the fallen soldier is carried on board the aircraft. He has the same words tattooed on the right side of his torso.
quotes.author: Jan Grarup

quotes.quote: A fallen soldier's tear our nation's greatest treasure, aligned in perfect rows. The hopes and dreams and life unlived, which we shall never know. The painful price of freedom - A life that's swept away. Defending life and liberty, the highest price they pay.
quotes.author: Randal S. Doaty

quotes.quote: He reminded the crowd of Governor Curtin's promises to Pennsylvania regiments to care for the widows and orphans of her fallen soldiers. The Homestead, Hay declared, was one of the fulfillments of that pledge.
quotes.author: Mark H. Dunkelman

quotes.quote: The orphanage was flourishing when the Humistons left it; a well-run, financially secure, highly regarded facet of the Gettysburg community, sustaining scores of the offspring of the nation's fallen soldiers - which made it all the sadder when, within years after the Humistons departed, dastardly deeds and deceit brought the orphanage to a disgraceful demise.
quotes.author: Mark H. Dunkelman

quotes.quote: At that moment, dear soldiers, out of the camp rose the reverent sounds of our anthem Preserve For Us, Lord, which carried mightily and nobly down the battlefield. The fallen soldier, parting with his life, tried to pull himself together one more time.
quotes.author: Jaroslav Hasek

quotes.quote: Every pain and especial care is taken in the burial of the poor fallen soldier at this place. His grave is marked with his name, regiment, company, were killed, or when and where wounded or sickened, and died.
quotes.author: Timothy J. Orr

quotes.quote: The relatives (generally the families but sometimes also friends) of many fallen soldiers placed on the tombstones and in their surroundings various articles - beginning with planters (and developing the garden around the tombstone), following with passages of writing and poetry and culminating with arms paraphernalia and sometimes the picture of a fallen soldier - articles that one can define using the general terms embelishments.
quotes.author: Yossi Katz

quotes.quote: The focus of these events in honour of the dead are memorial services or masses for the fallen soldier; the memorial sarcophagus (Tumba) is decked in black and decorated with flowers. Numerous candles burn at its side, a steel helmet and crossed side arms lie on it.
quotes.author: Martyn Housden

quotes.quote: Or instead of this, a symbolic soldier's grave is set up in the church and is richly covered with flowers, a birch cross and a steel helmet or an Iron Cross. The cultish proceedings make special use of choirs and orchestral pieces, processions of children and poetry readings.
quotes.author: Martyn Housden

quotes.quote: Occasionally a side altar is transformed into an altar to the fallen soldier. Under flowers and burning candles, pictures of the fallen together with their names and their military decorations are set up. Relatives and the population (in general) can bury themselves in the memory of the fallen at any hour of the day.
quotes.author: Martyn Housden

quotes.quote: Without delaying an instant, Huang reached down and snatched up the fallen soldier's bayoneted rifle, yanking it off the man's shoulder, and then swung around to train the rifle's barrel on the soldiers stills standing.
quotes.author: Chris Roberson

quotes.quote: Similarly, they knew that if they were to fall in action they would receive a proper burial and their bodies would not be left on the battlefield. Indeed, during the war we launch a number of raids so as to retrieve the bodies of our dear fallen soldiers.
quotes.author: Raful Eitan

quotes.quote: The bodies of fallen soldiers are dragged back in those sleeping bags. You know you are sleeping with the blood of a fellow soldier who died with honor, fighting for his country. For some reason that makes their blood okay, besides, a bloody sleeping bag is better than no sleeping bag at all.
quotes.author: Thomas D. O'Dell

quotes.quote: No matter how sick you were, when you saw a fallen soldier slaughtered in cold blood, it gave you fresh energy to go on a little farther.
quotes.author: Franky T. Respicio

quotes.quote: If anyone tried to help a fallen soldier, they were beaten and killed too. I thought it would have been much better for those who died this way to have been shot.
quotes.author: Franky T. Respicio

quotes.quote: In a distant field grows a rose, it's beauty, from the ground which it owes, the rose sways with a gentle class, in the wind that blows across the grass, before long, war comes to this land, booms are heard as if from a band, a fallen soldier reaches for the rose, with his blood soaked hand, shaking with dread he uproots the rose from it's soil bed, with cries of pain, he kisses the rose.
quotes.author: Peter Murray

quotes.quote: The family of every fallen soldier feels this need—creating a memorial to a son who fell in battle is an integral part of how parents and siblings cope with their overwhelming sorrow. It is also an important part of the way that the society that sent the soldier into battle constructs its communal ethos.
quotes.author: Tuvia Friling

quotes.quote: While he did not want, God forbid, to say anything bad about the project, Rembah noted that not every fallen soldier who had left behind literary or artistic works.
quotes.author: Tuvia Friling

quotes.quote: They did all they could to ensure that he would not get any of the honor accorded to the fallen soldiers of Israel's War of Independence.
quotes.author: Tuvia Friling

quotes.quote: The fallen soldier (the word “hero” appears to be a later invention) has such humble honors as it is possible to give. His part in all the pomp that fills The circuit of the Summer hills Is that his grave is green. True, more than a half of the green graves in the Grafton cemetery are marked unknown, and sometimes it occurs that one thinks of the contradiction involved in honoring the memory of whom no memory remains to honor, but the attempt seems to do no great harm to the living, even to the logical.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: I still cry every time they have an In Memory of a fallen soldier. ... My breaking point was when I heard the story of the young soldier that gave up his life to actually SIT on a grenade that had fallen into his Hummer to save his fellow soldiers.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Cook

quotes.quote: Myths of fallen soldiers exercise a powerful hold over collective memory in the twentieth century, especially in the case of national groups in whose name the wars are usually waged. They acquire the extra and hallowed dimension of a foundation myth in the case of those wars of liberation that result in the creation of a nation state.
quotes.author: Jonathan Frankel

quotes.quote: The unintended consequence of these myriad initiatives has been to implant an entire generation in the collective memory. This process has been much reinforced by the fact that in many social circles the bereaved parents, their lives often shattered, remained as a central presence to represent the generation of the fallen soldiers.
quotes.author: Jonathan Frankel

quotes.quote: I saw one soldier fall, and three fighters plunged from their horses and clubbed and slashed at him. Our squadron ... He reached a hand down to the fallen soldier, shouting, “Give me an arm,” and pulled the other man up behind him. A ripping whistle zipped past again followed by a muffled boom from down toward the river and someone shouted.
quotes.author: Michael McEwen Randall

quotes.quote: The next insurgent in the group raced past his comrade, who was working quickly to confirm the fallen soldier's vitals, but as he was nearing the balcony inside the chamber, another sentry (who had just witnessed his friend's death and had since quickly prepared himself for battle) spun around the corner toward the insurgent, swinging a knife backhanded in his right toward the insurgent's neck.
quotes.author: K. J. Stinnet

quotes.quote: We are seeing it. We are seeing the fabric of this country fall apart, and it's falling apart because of single moms.
quotes.author: Rick Santorum

quotes.quote: Sometimes, two people have to fall apart to realize how much they need to fall back together.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: Laughter is the only strategy that has ever worked at all for me when my world is falling apart.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: There's people that get a chance to do the kind of work that changes the world, and make things really different. And there's the kind that just keeps the world from falling apart.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Change always involves a dark night when everything falls apart. Yet if this period of dissolution is used to create new meaning, then chaos ends and new order emerges.
quotes.author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quotes.quote: Memories fall apart, too. And then you're left with nothing, left not even with a ghost but with its shadow.
quotes.author: Miles 'Pudge' Halter

quotes.quote: Lives fall apart when they need to be rebuilt.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: In the beginning, she had haunted me, haunted my dreams, but even now, just weeks later, she was slipping away, falling apart in my memory and everyone else's, dying again.
quotes.author: Miles 'Pudge' Halter

quotes.quote: Don't be concerned that things appear to be falling apart: this has to happen in order for something new and wonderful to emerge.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Things can fall apart, or threaten to, for many reasons, and then there's got to be a leap of faith. Ultimately, when you're at the edge, you have to go forward or backward; if you go forward, you have to jump together.
quotes.author: Yo-Yo Ma

quotes.quote: The world as we know it is falling apart at the seams, because it's an inadequate container for the truth of who we are.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: When your world seems to be falling apart,look to Jesus who holds everything together.
quotes.author: Marianette Carbito

quotes.quote: Sometimes falling apart is the bravest act of all.
quotes.author: Sarah Hackley

quotes.quote: But things don't just fall apart. People break them.
quotes.author: Robin Wasserman

quotes.quote: Don't hold together what must fall apart. The familiar life crumbles so the new life can begin.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: When things fall apart, the broken pieces allow all sorts of things to enter, and one of them is the presence of God.
quotes.author: Shauna Niequist

quotes.quote: The loneliest moment in someone's life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart, and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Sometimes when we think our lives are falling apart what we don't see, is that they might just be falling into place.
quotes.author: LJ Vanier

quotes.quote: Just because your world is falling apart doesn't mean you have to fall apart. When everything seems crazy, you be calm. Don't let the outer chaos you are facing get inside of you.
quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

quotes.quote: Keep smiling and Stay strong. Even if things are falling apart. Even if you're breaking down.
quotes.author: Marshy Marsh

quotes.quote: It is good to realize that falling apart is not such a bad thing. Indeed, it is as essential to evolutionary and psychological transformation as the cracking of outgrown shells.
quotes.author: Joanna Macy

quotes.quote: Women often find great roles in revolution, simply because the rules fall apart and everyone has agency, anyone can act.
quotes.author: Rebecca Solnit

quotes.quote: The splendid thing about falling apart silently is that you can start over as many times as you like.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: Everything is falling together perfectly, even though it looks as if some things are falling apart. Trust in the process you are now experiencing.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: It is saying these things that keeps us from falling apart. And maybe by imagining these futures we can make them real, and maybe not, but either way we must imagine them. The light rushes out and floods in.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: When everything falls apart, only one thing sustains our hope: God loves us, he loves everyone!
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Sometimes good things fall apart so better things could fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: When you think your life is falling apart, it's usually falling together in disguise.
quotes.author: Charlotte Eriksson

quotes.quote: Things falling apart is a kind of testing and also a kind of healing.
quotes.author: Pema Chödrön

quotes.quote: Sometimes when things seem falling apart, they might actually be falling into place. Just have patience.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: All my life, I have been in love with the sky. Even when everything was falling apart around me, the sky was always there for me.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: It was always the power of love that pulled us through, and it was the power of laughter that kept us from falling apart.
quotes.author: Steve Rizzo

quotes.quote: Everyone wants someone they can hold and love. Someone who will be there to help pick up the pieces when everything falls apart.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Even during the worst hardships when the other things in our lives seem to fall apart we can still find peace in the eternal love of God.
quotes.author: Armstrong Williams

quotes.quote: Wise sayings often fall on barren ground, but a kind word is never thrown away.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: Maybe working on the little things as dutifully and honestly as we can is how we stay sane when the world is falling apart.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Relationships are two people; everyone is accountable. A lot goes into a relationship coming together, and a lot goes into a relationship falling apart. Even if it's 98 percent the other person's fault, it's 2 percent yours You can only clean up your side of the street.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Some people fall apart when they get hurt. Puddle into apathy and despair and never recover. They wait all their lives for someone to come along and rescue them.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: No matter how your world falls apart-and honey, that's what happens: we all build ourselves a world, and then it falls apart-but no matter how that happens, you still have the kind heart you've had since you were a child, and that's all that really counts.
quotes.author: Kate Bornstein

quotes.quote: I learned about the strength you can get from close family life. I learned to keep going, even in bad times. I learned not to despair, even when my world was falling apart. I learned that there are no free lunches. And I learned the value of hard work.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: One small crack doesn’t mean that you are broken. It means that you were put to test and you didn’t fall apart.
quotes.author: Linda Paindexter

quotes.quote: I believe that everything happens for a reason. People change so that you can learn to let go, things go wrong so that you appreciate them when they're right, you believe lies so you eventually learn to trust no one but yourself, and sometimes good things fall apart so better things can fall together.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to fall apart because it is an opportunity to rebuild yourself the way you wish you had been all along.
quotes.author: Rae Smith

quotes.quote: After all, computers crash, people die, relationships fall apart. The best we can do is breath and reboot.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: When real people fall down in life, they get right back up and keep walking.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: Insanity is everyone expecting you not to fall apart when you find out everything you believed in was a lie.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: It takes ten times as long to put yourself back together as it does to fall apart.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: The loneliest moment in someone’s life is when they are watching their whole world fall apart and all they can do is stare blankly.
quotes.author: The Great Gatsby

quotes.quote: Sometimes, all you can do is lie in bed, and hope to fall asleep before you fall apart.
quotes.author: William C.Hannan

quotes.quote: First best is falling in love. Second best is being in love. Least best is falling out of love. But any of it is better than never having been in love.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: You will always fall in love, and it will always be like having your throat cut, just that fast.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: Falling in love is the best way to kill your heart because then it's not yours anymore. It's laid in a coffin, waiting to be cremated.
quotes.author: Ville Valo

quotes.quote: When you fall in love, the natural thing to do is give yourself to it. That's what I think. It's just a form of sincerity
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Have you ever watched a leaf leave a tree? It falls upward first, and then it drifts toward the ground, just as I find myself drifting towards you.
quotes.author: Beth Kephart

quotes.quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others and the delight in the recognition.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Never rush into falling in love, because love never runs out; Let love be the one to knock at your door. Besides true love is worth waiting for.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: To fall in love is to create a religion that has a fallible god.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: The first time you fall in love, it changes your life forever, and no matter how hard you try, the feeling never goes away.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Sometimes you break your heart in the right way, if you know what I mean.
quotes.author: Gregory David Roberts

quotes.quote: As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slow, and then all at once.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Falling in love is great. It colors your whole world and makes your days inspiring. But for some reason, some people find it too scary. They decided it's to better hold that part of their feelings.
quotes.author: Ces Peta

quotes.quote: Falling in love doesn't fall by itself. There is always a desire to take the plunge. Just make sure that love sticks around, to pick you up when you fall.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To fall in love is awfully simple, but to fall out of love is simply awful.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Falling for someone is easy, getting back up after the fall is the problem.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: He is my unicorn, though... That's how I felt falling in love with him, as if I'd found a creature of myth.
quotes.author: Rivka Galchen

quotes.quote: Falling in love with YOU was never my intention, but it became my ADDICTION.
quotes.author: Abhishek Tiwari

quotes.quote: Falling for him would be like cliff diving. It would be either the most exhilarating thing that ever happened to me or the stupidest mistake I'd ever make.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: This thing about you that you think is your flaw - it's the reason I'm falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wyatt

quotes.quote: You know you're in love the moment you can touch the stars without reaching.
quotes.author: Melisa M. Hamling

quotes.quote: You know you're falling in love when the feeling of falling actually feels like you're floating.
quotes.author: Rashida Rowe

quotes.quote: Falling in love is easy. Falling in love with the same person repeatedly is extraordinary.
quotes.author: Crystal Woods

quotes.quote: To fall in love is easy, even to remain in it is not difficult; our human loneliness is cause enough. But is a hard quest worth making to find a comrade through whose steady presence one becomes steadily the person one desires to be.
quotes.author: Anna Strong

quotes.quote: He that falls in love with himself will have no rivals.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To fall in love with someone's thoughts - the most intimate, splendid romance.
quotes.author: Sanober Khan

quotes.quote: To fall in love is a legendry action that doesn't need any explanation.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: I fall into him like one would fall into a dream, ready to submit to your subconscious's inner most desires and your deepest fears.
quotes.author: Stephanie Binding

quotes.quote: Always try to come back to your senses when in love, because that's the moment you become almost carried away by sensuality and sentiments.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Because if I fell any deeper for the way his eyes crinkled with his smile or his habit of tapping on his nose to emphasize a point, my ship would be sunk.
quotes.author: Katherine McIntyre

quotes.quote: It's easy to fall in love. The hard part is finding someone to catch you.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Falling in love is a subtle process, a connection sparked by attraction, tested by compatibility, and forged by memory.
quotes.author: Jay Bell

quotes.quote: I don't know how to say this, or even if its true. But I love the way you make me feel, and I think I'm falling for you.
quotes.author: Nicole Kinder

quotes.quote: Everybody makes mistakes. I also make them. But the biggest mistake I ever made was falling for you
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You always fall for the most unexpected person at the most unexpected time and sometimes for the most unexpected reason.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Trying to make someone fall in love with you is about as pointless as trying to control who you fall in love with.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you fall in love with someone, you give them your heart. When you find out they love you too, you get it back, times two.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I have always been quite good at falling in love, but I don't pretend to know anything about literal happily ever afters.
quotes.author: Jennifer Harrison

quotes.quote: A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Fall in love when you're ready, not when you're lonely.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never love anybody who treats you like you're ordinary.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When you are missing someone, time seems to move slower, and when I'm falling in love with someone, time seems to be moving faster.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Don't fall for him to notice him, notice him to fall for him.
quotes.author: Eva Vasquez

quotes.quote: Two of hearts, lace and satin, something in the air feel like another crook that's been captured by your stare, Uh-oh, Uh-oh, falling in love, falling in love again.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: I couldn't help it, I have to see you again, Can't understand it, Just wanna feel you again. I couldn't help it, I guess I'm falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Vario Volinski

quotes.quote: Falling in love kiss the past till it's better Make it last if you can Tell me know you regret her I'll try to understand.
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.quote: Feel like falling in love tonight. All the stars aligning it feels perfect Melodies and verses Flowing through my mind I wanna lean in for a kiss I know it's worth it I barely know you baby but I know its time.
quotes.author: Fantasia

quotes.quote: I look in your eyes, I really think you're fooling me You're pretty and nice, it doesn't matter don't you see I falling in love, it happens to me every day I'm falling in love, love just seems to slip away.
quotes.author: Scorpions

quotes.quote: Feeling a spark deep inside of my heart and I want you babe (I'm falling in love with you) Starting a fire of burning desire yes I'm falling babe (I'm falling in love with you) Feeling as high as the stars in the sky when I'm with you babe (I'm falling in love with you, I'm falling) Falling in love
quotes.author: Will Downing

quotes.quote: If we're falling in love, we're falling in love There'll be nothing above And I won't give you up, no I won't give you up If we're falling in love.
quotes.author: Disclosure

quotes.quote: I can't believe I'm falling in love once again I can't believe I'm falling in love, but I am I never thought that I would be strong enough to move on No, this wasn't part of the plan I can't believe I'm falling in love But I'm falling in love once again.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Falling down Falling in love I'll paint you mornings of gold I'll spin you Valentine evenings Though we're strangers 'til now, We're choosing the path Between the stars I'll leave my love Between the stars
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: That's what I get for falling in love Trying to push and shove my way through That's what I get for falling in love Falling in love with you
quotes.author: Marcia Ball

quotes.quote: Oh I don't know And it makes me scared Because I'm falling in love And I don't know if you feel the same.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: Wise men say only fools rush in But I can't help falling in love with you Shall I say would it be a sin If I can't help falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Disney

quotes.quote: The first time I saw you I knew I'm falling in love again There's nothing that I can do so Let's not pretend Why is it always A look in your eyes.
quotes.author: Scout Durwood

quotes.quote: Falling in love with love Is falling for make believe Falling in love with love Is playing the fool Caring too much Is such a juvenile fancy Learning to trust Is just for children in school.
quotes.author: The Supremes

quotes.quote: I'm falling in love with you again Haven't felt this way Since I don't know when I coming like a rolling stone to you I'm falling in love again.
quotes.author: Danny Kirwan

quotes.quote: I can't help falling in love I fall deeper and deeper the further I go Kisses sent from heaven above They get sweeter and sweeter the more that I know.
quotes.author: Madonna

quotes.quote: Falling in love can be easy Staying in love is so tricky Falling in love can be easy But staying in love is so tricky.
quotes.author: Wynonna Judd

quotes.quote: And now I'm falling In love all over again, yeah How could I ever doubt That you were my friend I'm falling In love all over again.
quotes.author: Buju Banton

quotes.quote: Please help me, I'm falling in love with you Close the door to temptation, don't let me walk through Turn away from me darlin', I'm beggin' you to Please help me, I'm falling in love with you.
quotes.author: Charley Pride

quotes.quote: Night in the city It's getting in me, electricity everywhere And I'm falling in love With everyone and everything.
quotes.author: S Only Natural

quotes.quote: When we first met I knew that all the stars were in line I knew that you would always be mine I knew that I was falling in love Falling in love with you
quotes.author: Geri King

quotes.quote: She wasnt exactly sure when it happened. Or even when it started. All she knew for sure was that right here and now, she was falling hard and she could only pray that he was feeling the same way.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Falling in love is very real, but I used to shake my head when people talked about soul mates, poor deluded individuals grasping at some supernatural ideal not intended for mortals but sounded pretty in a poetry book.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Falling in love is like getting hit by a truck and yet not being mortally wounded. just sick to your stomach, high one minute, low the next.
quotes.author: Jackie Collins

quotes.quote: When you fall in love, the natural thing to do is give yourself to it. That's what I think. It's just a form of sincerity.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Maybe it's just hiding somewhere. Or gone on a trip to come home. But falling in love is always a pretty crazy thing. It might appear out of the blue and just grab you. Who knows — maybe even tomorrow.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Falling in love is not an act of will. It is not a conscious choice. No matter how open to or eager for it we may be, the experience may still elude us.
quotes.author: M. Scott Peck

quotes.quote: I realized one important fact: falling in love with her was not a choice. It just happened because it couldn't go any other way.
quotes.author: Nico J. Genes

quotes.quote: The secret about falling in love is how you can do it a million times over with the same person when the person is the right one.
quotes.author: Amy Spalding

quotes.quote: False hope is better than no hope at all.
quotes.author: Lois Greiman

quotes.quote: It is a healthy approach not to expect persons to turn out precisely how you would have wished.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Better to know the quick pain of truth than the ongoing pain of a long-held false hope.
quotes.author: Trudi Canavan

quotes.quote: And as far as false hope, there is no such thing. There is only hope or the absence of hope - nothing else.
quotes.author: Patti Davis

quotes.quote: False hope really makes you cynical.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: It is always the false that makes you suffer, the false desires and fears, the false values and ideas, the false relationships between people. Abandon the false and you are free of pain; truth makes you happy, truth liberates.
quotes.author: Nisardagatta Maharaj

quotes.quote: Hope is a word that can kill as well as save. A double-sided knife onto whose handle we all cling. If hope is our dreams, it takes courage to strive for those dreams; to not abandon hope as one of folly. A person lost can have hope of being found, but false hope, a hope that can torture a soul with promises never delivered, that is a hope we can all live without.
quotes.author: Paul Howsley

quotes.quote: False hope is clung to with all one's might and main, till a day comes when it has sucked the heart dry and it forcibly breaks through its bonds and departs. After that comes the misery of awakening, and then once again, the longing to get back into the maze of the same mistakes.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: To keep false hopes is to prolong misery.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: SugarÂ coating things makes people feel better, but it also gives themÂ false hope, and it keeps them holding onto the wrong people.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Because sometimes people who seem good end up being not as good as you might have hoped.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Hope itself is always genuine. It's only what it's placed in that can prove to be false.
quotes.author: Karen Maitland

quotes.quote: That would be the death of anyone - to recognize false hopes with a certainty. One mustn't know that. If it is offered, refuse!
quotes.author: Jesse Ball

quotes.quote: What is false about hope?
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: False hope is sometimes mistaken for true love. Don't rush into something until you're sure it actually exists.
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: False hope is sometimes much worse and sometimes much better than no hope.
quotes.author: Mike Caro

quotes.quote: If you expect nothing, you can never be disappointed.
quotes.author: Tonya Hurley

quotes.quote: False hope can lead to intemperate choices and flawed decision making. True hope takes into account the real threats that exist and seeks to navigate the best path around them.
quotes.author: Jerome Groopman

quotes.quote: Harsh reality is always better than false hope.
quotes.author: Julian Fellowes

quotes.quote: A false hope gives only false comfort.
quotes.author: Gene Brewer

quotes.quote: False hope is the bread - and - butter of my existence, the only thing that keeps me going.
quotes.author: Rob Payne

quotes.quote: Hope is such a tenuous quality. To feel it and then to be denied what one most longs for. Better, surely, not to hope at all, than to open the heart to a hope that is impossible.
quotes.author: Juliet Marillier

quotes.quote: There is something truly restorative, finally comforting, in coming to the end of an illusion - a false hope.
quotes.author: Sue Miller

quotes.quote: False hopes are more dangerous than fears.
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Expectations were like fine pottery. The harder you held them, the more likely they were to crack.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: False hope is nicer than no hope at all.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: False hope is worse than despair.
quotes.author: Jonathan Kozol

quotes.quote: A clear rejection is better than a fake promise.
quotes.author: Leonardo DiCaprio
