quotes.quote: If you are successful, you will win false friends and true enemies. Succeed anyway.
quotes.author: Pravinee Hurbungs

quotes.quote: False hope kills more readily than bitter truth.
quotes.author: Mexican Proverb

quotes.quote: Hope can animate challenge and invigorate a life and sometimes lead to false hopes or even delusions.
quotes.author: Nick Lyons & Tony Lyons

quotes.quote: It should be noted that throughout time, hope has been seen by some as a double-edged sword—as something that could be ephemeral and even destructive, as in 'false hope' or 'blind hope.'
quotes.author: Maggie Oman Shannon

quotes.quote: Canadians want to see real hope restored, not false hopes raised.
quotes.author: Kim Campbell

quotes.quote: Hope is not just a word, it includes trust, emotions, feelings, love, etc. So don't give false hope to anyone who trusts you unconditionally. It may destroy a pure soul's life.
quotes.author: K. Alagumani

quotes.quote: False hope is nicer than no hope.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: False hope is clung to with all one's might and main, till a day comes when it has sucked the heart dry and it forcibly breaks through its bonds and departs.
quotes.author: Sreechinth C.

quotes.quote: First, you are broken, then it looks like they rebuild you. Then they manipulate you, then you get frustrated. Then you choose to live or die.
quotes.author: Nadia McInnis

quotes.quote: When the ax came into the forest, the trees said, 'The handle is one of us.'
quotes.author: Russian Proverb

quotes.quote: Before you fall, / you've got to stand / Your voice once stalled, / fates reprimand / The paradigm floats, / on swamps that drain / Where praise cries out / —false hope again.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: False hope prolongs my ever certain grief, / Traitorous to me and faithful to my love; / A thousand times it promised me relief, / Yet never any true effect I prove.
quotes.author: Samuel Daniel

quotes.quote: And indeed it could be said that once the faintest stirring of hope became possible, the dominion of plague was ended.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Promises are worse than lies. You don't just make them believe, you also make them hope.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: False hope can lead to intemperate choices and flawed decision-making. True hope takes into account the real threats that exist and seeks to navigate the best path around them.
quotes.author: Jerome Groopman

quotes.quote: False hope is a terrible thing, if it's the only thing keeping you alive you'll be dead by dawn.
quotes.author: Charlie Rae

quotes.quote: Necessity, especially in politics, often occasions false hopes, false reasonings, and a system of measures, correspondingly erroneous.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: Wishes are false. Hope is true. Hope makes its own magic.
quotes.author: Laini Taylor

quotes.quote: Harshness to me is giving somebody false hopes and not following through. That's harsh. Telling some guy or some girl who've got zero talent that they have zero talent actually is kindness.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: In the unlikely story that is America, there has never been anything false about hope.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Everyone has read about or knows someone who has gone through fertility treatments. It is an emotional nightmare, fueled by false hope and the promise of a treatment that will work.
quotes.author: Ann Hood

quotes.quote: The unlimited power that many modern gurus offer is false hope. Their programs calling us to unlimited power have made them rich, not us. They touch our false selves and tap our toxic shame.
quotes.author: John Bradshaw

quotes.quote: For faith, as well-intentioned as it may be, must be built on facts, not fiction - faith in fiction is a damnable false hope.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: He, who had once been the declared optimist, had not once expressed hope. Now it was she who was offering it to him. And it might be false hope.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: A life without fame can be a good life, but fame without a life is no life at all.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: The longer a man's fame is likely to last, the longer it will be in coming.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: People confuse fame with validation or love. But fame is not the reward. The reward is getting fulfillment out of doing the thing you love.
quotes.author: Claire Danes

quotes.quote: Fame is like a shaved pig with a greased tail, and it is only after it has slipped through the hands of some thousands, that some fellow, by mere chance, holds on to it!
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.quote: Fame is hollow. It amplifies what is there. If there is any self-doubt, or hatred, or lack of ability to connect with people, fame will magnify it.
quotes.author: Alanis Morissette

quotes.quote: If you wanna be famous, then it's okay if the music is fake, because fame isn't real.
quotes.author: Josh Homme

quotes.quote: With fame, you can't trust everybody. You can't depend on them being there for you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got you as a person. They will only be there because of what you've got and what you can bring to their life. It's not a relationship-it's a leech.
quotes.author: Chris Brown

quotes.quote: Passion for fame: A passion which is the instinct of all great souls.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: The present condition of fame is merely fashion.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Fame can take interesting men and thrust mediocrity upon them.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: If you're lucky enough to be famous, then it's great if you can use your fame and the power your fame gives you to draw attention to things that really matter.
quotes.author: Michael Schumacher

quotes.quote: One of the downsides of being famous is that folks pay far more attention to you than they should. American celebrities are constantly under surveillance, and every word they say is subject to scrutiny. So, be careful what you wish for if you desire fame. No human being should be a goldfish.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: Worldly fame is but a breath of wind that blows now this way, and now that, and changes name as it changes direction.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Fame is a vapor; popularity an accident; riches take wings; the only earthly certainty is oblivion.
quotes.author: Horace Greeley

quotes.quote: Fame is the thirst of youth.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: For children preserve the fame of a man after his death.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Fame is indeed beautiful and benign and gentle and satisfying, but happiness is something at once tender and brilliant beyond all things.
quotes.author: Mary MacLane

quotes.quote: There's a funny thing about fame. The truth is you run as fast as you can towards it because it's everything you want. Not just the fame but what it represents, meaning work, meaning opportunity. And then you get there, and it's shocking how immediately you become enveloped in this world that is incredibly restricting.
quotes.author: George Clooney

quotes.quote: Fame or perceived success - it all comes from groupthink.
quotes.author: Chance The Rapper

quotes.quote: Fame is something that is bestowed upon you because of success. Success is something you have to chase.
quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

quotes.quote: Fame is like a big piece of meringue - it's beautiful, and you keep eating it, but it doesn't really fill you up.
quotes.author: Pierce Brosnan

quotes.quote: Fame itself... doesn't really afford you anything more than a good seat in a restaurant.
quotes.author: David Bowie

quotes.quote: You can't reverse fame. You can lose all the money, but you'll never lose people knowing you.
quotes.author: J. Cole

quotes.quote: If we should be blessed by some great reward, such as fame or fortune, it's the fruit of a seed planted by us in the past.
quotes.author: Bodhidharma

quotes.quote: In general, when you have success on the field, you're more popular, and you have that fame that comes with it. You realize you're in the public eye more, and you've got to be a little bit more careful about some of the things you're doing out in public and make sure you're smart about the things you say.
quotes.author: Aaron Rodgers

quotes.quote: Fame has also this great drawback, that if we pursue it, we must direct our lives so as to please the fancy of men.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Is fame without purpose and is fame without talent really where we are now? People used to be famous for what they did. Now, they're just famous.
quotes.author: John Carroll Lynch

quotes.quote: Fame can be just so annoying because people are so critical of you. You can't just say, 'hi'. You say hi and people whisper' man did you see the way she said hi? What an attitude.
quotes.author: Juliette Lewis

quotes.quote: Of all the possessions of this life fame is the noblest; when the body has sunk into the dust the great name still lives.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The highest form of vanity is love of fame.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Fame is damaging when people become reliant on it for their sense of self, and their identity, when fame is linked to how you see yourself.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: Fame is a weird one. You need to distance yourself from it. People see a value in you that you don't see yourself.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: Love of fame is the last thing even learned men can bear to be parted from.
quotes.author: Publius Cornelius Tacitus

quotes.quote: If you come to fame not understanding who you are, it will define who you are.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Never underestimate the power of being popular in pop culture. You have to be able to do something. You can have a good seat at the restaurant, but you still have to pay for the meal. Fame is important, but to be rich is more important.
quotes.author: Gene Simmons

quotes.quote: That equals to being a fool, having fame and no fortune. A lot of guys out there have fame doing this and doing that, but they are broke.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: Fame is like the dessert that comes with your achievements - it's not an achievement in itself, but sometimes it can overpower the work.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton

quotes.quote: Fame is like caviar, you know - it's good to have caviar but not when you have it at every meal.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Fame and fortune should never get in front of your passion. The passion will generate the fame and fortune, if you're good enough.
quotes.author: Max Walker

quotes.quote: All fame is is having people you don't know coming up to you and saying, 'Hello.' I'm always polite and people are always nice, but it's weird.
quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

quotes.quote: Fame and fortune are as hard to find as a lightning strike.
quotes.author: P. N. Elrod

quotes.quote: Fame is an unnatural construct and those who go in search of it are the least likely to find it.
quotes.author: Ryan Adams

quotes.quote: Fame doesn't end loneliness.
quotes.author: Claire Danes

quotes.quote: You know, fame is a funny thing, man, especially, you know, actors, musicians, rappers, rock singers, it's kind of a lifestyle and it's easy to get caught up in it - you go to bars, you go to clubs, everyone's doing a certain thing... It's tough.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: Fame is a series of misunderstandings surrounding a name.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: Fame is easy to acquire; impact is much more difficult.
quotes.author: Hans Rosling

quotes.quote: Fame comes and goes. Longevity is the thing to aim for.
quotes.author: Tony Bennett

quotes.quote: What is fame? The advantage of being known by people of whom you yourself know nothing, and for whom you care as little.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Fame is like a river, that beareth up things light and swollen, and drowns things weighty and solid.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Fame doesn't fulfill you. It warms you a bit, but that warmth is temporary.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: It is in vain to try and stop a star from rising, even with a ladder.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Fame and insecurity don’t usually mix well. Though the fame maybe easily attainable, acceptance by the masses to one’s satisfaction, usually isn’t.
quotes.author: Robert Black

quotes.quote: Fame is neither something to value nor to view as a threat.
quotes.author: Adrienne Posey

quotes.quote: The talent of success is nothing more than doing what you can do well; and doing well whatever you do, without a thought of fame.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Fame is the perfume of heroic deeds.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Fame is a fickle food upon a shifting plate.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Fame is no sure test of merit, but only a probability of such; it is an accident, not a property of man.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Fame sometimes hath created something of nothing.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Toil, says the proverb, is the sire of fame.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Even the best things are not equal to their fame.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I trust a good deal to common fame, as we all must.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There's not a thing on earth that I can name, so foolish, and so false, as common fame.
quotes.author: John Wilmot

quotes.quote: Fondness for fame is avarice of air.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Some to the fascination of a name surrender judgment, hoodwinked.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: What a heavy burden is a name that has too soon become famous.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: If I'm such a legend, why am I so lonely?
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: All is temporary and ephemeral—fame and the famous, as well.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: The way to fame is like the way to heaven, through much tribulation.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: Fame and honor sometimes fall more fitly on those who do not desire them.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: Even for the wise, the desire for glory is the last of all passions to be laid aside.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: If you would acquire fame, let not the sun shine on you in bed.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Fame and repute follow a man to the door.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Consider not death but the fame that will survive you.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: What is fame?—The advantage of being known by people of whom you yourself know nothing, and for whom you care as little.
quotes.author: Leszezynski Stanislaus

quotes.quote: There is not in the world so toilsome a trade as the pursuit of fame: life concludes before you have so much as sketched your work.
quotes.author: Jean de La Bruyère

quotes.quote: He that pursues fame with just claims, trusts his happiness to the winds; but he that endeavors after it by false merit, has to fear, not only the violence of the storm, but the leaks of his vessel.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The temple of fame stands upon the grave; the flame upon its altars is kindled from the ashes of the dead.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: It often happens that those of whom we speak least on earth are best known in heaven.
quotes.author: Nicolas Caussin

quotes.quote: Name, and not fame is the exact yardstick because fame is transitory, and in our times, fame is vulgar because it can actually be bought.
quotes.author: Sandeep Balakrishna

quotes.quote: Familiarity so dulls the edge of perception as to make us least acquainted with things forming part of our daily life.
quotes.author: Julia Ward Howe

quotes.quote: Great affection is often the cause of violent animosity. The quarrels of men often arise from too great a familiarity.
quotes.author: Sakya Pandita

quotes.quote: Comfort and familiarity were wonderful but they also dulled passion and excitement. Predictability and habit made surprises almost impossible.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: It's about finding that balance where you have one foot in the familiar, one foot in the unfamiliar. If you have two feet in the unfamiliar it's overwhelming. If you have two feet in the familiar then there's just boredom. It's about having both.
quotes.author: Humble the Poet

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's harder to notice a place you think you know well; your eyes glide over it, seeing it but not seeing it at all. It's almost as if familiarity gives you a kind of temporary blindness. I had to force myself to look harder and try to see beyond the concept of library that was so latent in my brain.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: Familiarity is a magician that is cruel to beauty but kind to ugliness.
quotes.author: Ouida

quotes.quote: Familiarity breeds contempt. How accurate that is. The reason we hold truth in such respect is because we have so little opportunity to get familiar with it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Sometimes attaining the deepest familiarity with a question is our best substitute for actually having the answer.
quotes.author: Brian Greene

quotes.quote: Familiarity is the root of the closest friendships, as well as the interests hatreds.
quotes.author: Antoine Rivarol

quotes.quote: The ways suited to confidence are familiar to me, but not those that are suited to familiarity.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: Familiarity is a suspension of almost all the laws of civility, which libertinism has introduced into society under the notion of ease.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It seems important to find ways of reminding ourselves that most 'familiarity' is meditated and delusive.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: The value of myth is that it takes all the things you know and restores to them the rich significance which has been hidden by the veil of familiarity.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Whenever you speak to someone, you are presuming the two of you have a certain degree of familiarity - which your words might alter. So every sentence has to do two things at once: convey a message and continue to negotiate that relationship.
quotes.author: Steven Pinker

quotes.quote: (What makes his world so hard to see clearly is not its strangeness but its usualness). Familiarity can blind you too.
quotes.author: Robert M. Pirsig

quotes.quote: Just because something is familiar, doesn't mean it's safe. And just because something feels safe, doesn't mean it's good for you.
quotes.author: Brittany Burgunder

quotes.quote: The Law of Familiarity. People feel comfortable with who and what they know.
quotes.author: Michelle Tillis Lederman

quotes.quote: What is familiar is what we are used to; and what we are used to is most difficult to 'Know' - that is, to see as a problem; that is, to see as strange, as distant, as 'outside us'.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: When you meet familiarity which demeans true integrity, run away!
quotes.author: Amanda Craig

quotes.quote: You can never be annoyed by anyone when you are just alone, insults comes from being too familiar even with the most respectful persons.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Tonight there was something different. Something both deeper and shallower than friendship. Familiarity, perhaps, the sudden realisation that we lived our sealed-up little lives in closeness to each other. That we had something to share and something to lose. Something to protect together.
quotes.author: Alexis Hall

quotes.quote: Familiarity can provide the misguided illusion of understanding. Assume nothing.
quotes.author: Truth Devour

quotes.quote: There was an awful lot to be said for familiarity, if you thought about it. It was an extremely underrated virtue, ignorable until the very moment that you were in danger of losing whatever or whoever it was that was familiar—a house, a view, a partner.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: You picked the seats you did for a reason, right? Familiarity. Too bad the best sleuths avoid familiarity. It dulls the investigative instinct.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: There is an excess of familiarity at the root of all hostility.
quotes.author: Albanian Proverb

quotes.quote: Familiarity is the thing -- the sense of belonging. It grants exemption from all evil, all shabbiness
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: I wanted to get that sense of peace and even boredom that comes with long familiarity.
quotes.author: Debbie Reynolds

quotes.quote: The aspects of a thing that are most important to us are hidden to us because of their simplicity and familiarity
quotes.author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quotes.quote: It is familiarity with life that makes time speed quickly. When every day is a step in the unknown, as for children, the days are long with gathering of experience.
quotes.author: George Gissing

quotes.quote: Through constant familiarity, we can definitely establish new behavior patterns, using our tendency to form habits to our advantage. If we make a steady effort, I think we can overcome any form of negative conditioning and make positive changes in our lives. But we need to remember that genuine change doesn't happen overnight.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Self-mastery calls for thorough familiarity with one's mental and emotional strengths. And it calls for sustaining a commitment to personal growth - the understanding of what makes you tick as an individual - as well as personal development.
quotes.author: Charles Garfield

quotes.quote: Many of the familiar little things that we use every day have typically evolved over a period of time to a state of familiarity. They balance form and function, elegance and economy, success and failure in ways that are not only acceptable, but also admirable.
quotes.author: Henry Petroski

quotes.quote: A reliable way to make people believe in falsehoods is frequent repetition, because familiarity is not easily distinguished from truth. Authoritarian institutions and marketers have always known this fact.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Familiarity with danger makes a brave man braver, but less daring. Thus with seamen: he who goes the oftenest round Cape Horn goes the most circumspectly.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: One of the main weaknesses of mankind is the average man's familiarity with the word 'impossible.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: It is not enough simply to wish that love and compassion should increase in us. We need to make a sustained effort, again and again, to cultivate the positive aspects within us - and the key here is constant familiarity. The nature of human thoughts and emotions is such that the more you engage in them, the more you consciously develop them, the more powerful they become.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: When a memory dies, the truth takes its place. Losing a memory is more painful than losing an arm. Because memories cannot be amputated. In familiarity, we find a sense of security. When this security leaves, the unfamiliar remains.
quotes.author: P. Wish

quotes.quote: Where nature is concerned, familiarity breeds love and knowledge, not contempt.
quotes.author: Stewart Udall

quotes.quote: The familiarity of superiors embitters one, because it may not be returned.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Small towns are sometimes like that; familiarity runs high, while regard for personal space is low, if nonexistent.
quotes.author: Laurie Notaro

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Johann Schiller

quotes.quote: An ounce of blood is worth more than a pound of friendship.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: We all grow up with the weight of history on us. Our ancestors dwell in the attics of our brains as they do in the spiraling chains of knowledge hidden in every cell of our bodies.
quotes.author: Shirley Abbott

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: A father's a treasure; a brother's a comfort; a friend is both.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A brother may not be a friend, but a friend will always be a brother.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Families are the compass that guides us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Families are messy. Immortal families are eternally messy. Sometimes the best we can do is to remind each other that we're related for better or for worse and try to keep the maiming and killing to a minimum.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.quote: Be it ever so humble there's no place like home.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open, and rules are flexible -- the kind of atmosphere that is found in a nurturing family.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Children are a poor man's riches.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Children have more need of models than critics.
quotes.author: French (on parents and children)

quotes.quote: What greater thing is there for human souls than to feel that they are joined for life - to be with each other in silent unspeakable memories.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Each day of our lives we make deposits in the memory banks of our children.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: That's what people do who love you. They put their arms around you and love you when you're not so lovable.
quotes.author: Deb Caletti

quotes.quote: Families ties are cherished things, forged in childhood days, by love of parents, deep and true, and sweet familiar ways.
quotes.author: Terri Burritt

quotes.quote: Having children makes you no more a parent than having a piano makes you a pianist.
quotes.author: Michael Levinve

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Theodore Hesburgh

quotes.quote: While we try to teach our children all about life, our children teach us what life is all about.
quotes.author: Angela Schwindt

quotes.quote: All parents damage their children. It cannot be helped. Youth, like pristine glass, absorbs the prints of its handlers. Some parents smudge, others crack, a few shatter childhoods completely into jagged little pieces, beyond repair.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Bringing up a family should be an adventure, not an anxious discipline in which everybody is constantly graded for performance.
quotes.author: Milton R. Saperstein

quotes.quote: Parents are like God because you wanna know they're out there, and you want them to think well of you, but you really only call when you need something.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Parents were the only ones obligated to love you; from the rest of the world you had to earn it.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life. Rarely do members of one family grow up under the same roof.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A mother is not a person to lean on, but a person to make leaning unnecessary.
quotes.author: Dorothy C. Fisher

quotes.quote: The best inheritance a parent can give to his children is a few minutes of their time each day.
quotes.author: M. Grundler

quotes.quote: The children despise their parents until the age of when they suddenly become just like them - thus preserving the system.
quotes.author: Quentin

quotes.quote: This is part of what a family is about, not just love. It's knowing that your family will be there watching out for you. Nothing else will give you that. Not money. Not fame. Not work.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Home is people. Not a place. If you go back there after the people are gone, then all you can see is what is not there any more.
quotes.author: Robin Hobb

quotes.quote: A daughter without her mother is a woman broken. It is a loss that turns to arthritis and settles deep into her bones.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: The informality of family life is a blessed condition that allows us to become our best while looking our worst.
quotes.author: Marge Kennedy

quotes.quote: We cannot destroy kindred: our chains stretch a little sometimes, but they never break.
quotes.author: Marquise de Sevigne

quotes.quote: This was the trouble with families. Like invidious doctors, they knew just where it hurt.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: Blood is thicker than water.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: A house divided cannot stand.
quotes.author: Bible (Matthew 12:25)

quotes.quote: The apple doesn't fall far from the tree.
quotes.author: Asian Proverb

quotes.quote: A crab walks, so walks his children.
quotes.author: African proverb Kpelle Tribe

quotes.quote: What children say, they have heard at home.
quotes.author: Wolof (West African (on parenting and children)

quotes.quote: You can do anything with children if only you play with them.
quotes.author: German (on parenting and children)

quotes.quote: To put the world right in order, we must first put the nation in order; to put the nation in order, we must first put the family in order; to put the family in order, we must first cultivate our personal life; we must first set our hearts right.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Like father, like son.
quotes.author: Asian Proverb

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart is.
quotes.author: J.J. McCloskey

quotes.quote: Give an extra piece of cake to a stepchild.
quotes.author: Korean (on parenting and children)

quotes.quote: Charity begins at home.
quotes.author: Tobias George Smollett

quotes.quote: When you educate a man you educate an individual. When you educate a woman you educate a whole family.
quotes.author: Robert M. Maciver

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Cherish your human connections – your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: A man that raises a large family does, indeed, while he lives to observe them, stand a broader mark for sorrow; but then he stands a broader mark for pleasure too.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: In time of test, family is best.
quotes.author: Burmese Proverb

quotes.quote: To understand your parents’ love, you must raise children yourself.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: The family – that dear octopus from whose tentacles we never quite escape, nor, in our inmost hearts, ever quite wish to.
quotes.author: Dodie Smith

quotes.quote: You are born into your family and your family is born into you. No returns. No exchanges.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don’t go according to any rules. They’re not like aches or wounds, they’re more like splits in the skin that won’t heal because there’s not enough material.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: You can kiss your family and friends good-bye and put miles between you, but at the same time you carry them with you in your heart, your mind, your stomach, because you do not just live in a world but a world lives in you.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: When trouble comes, it’s your family that supports you.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty. All other pacts of love or fear derive from it and are modelled upon it.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.quote: Being part of a family means smiling for photos.
quotes.author: Harry Morgan

quotes.quote: Nothing is better than going home to family and eating good food and relaxing.
quotes.author: Irina Shayk

quotes.quote: Family is a life jacket in the stormy sea of life.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Jane Howard

quotes.quote: Family is a unique gift that needs to be appreciated and treasured, even when they’re driving you crazy. As much as they make you mad, interrupt you, annoy you, curse at you, try to control you, these are the people who know you the best and who love you.
quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

quotes.quote: My mother used to tell me that when push comes to shove, you always know who to turn to. That being a family isn't a social construct but an instinct.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The most important thing in the world is family and love.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don’t let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.author: Josiah

quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: All happy families are alike; every unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: I am blessed to have so many great things in my life – family, friends, and God. All will be in my thoughts daily.
quotes.author: Lil’ Kim

quotes.quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Lisa Weed

quotes.quote: In truth a family is what you make it. It is made strong, not by number of heads counted at the dinner table, but by the rituals you help family members create, by the memories you share, by the commitment of time, caring, and love you show to one another, and by the hopes for the future you have as individuals and as a unit.
quotes.author: Marge Kennedy

quotes.quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: A dysfunctional family is any family with more than one person in it.
quotes.author: Mary Karr

quotes.quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing, it’s everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Having somewhere to go is home. Having someone to love is family. And having both is a blessing.
quotes.author: Nancy Parker Brummett

quotes.quote: Show me a family of readers, and I will show you the people who move the world.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Our most basic instinct is not for survival but for family. Most of us would give our own life for the survival of a family member, yet we lead our daily life too often as if we take our family for granted.
quotes.author: Paul Pearsall

quotes.quote: It didn’t matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.
quotes.author: Peter Buffett

quotes.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: I don't think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Family life is too intimate to be preserved by the spirit of justice. It can be sustained by a spirit of love which goes beyond justice.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: One’s family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I’ll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who’ll be with me will be my family.
quotes.author: Robert Byrd

quotes.quote: Let love be genuine. Abhor what is evil; hold fast to what is good.
quotes.author: Romans 12:9

quotes.quote: You must remember, family is often born of blood, but it doesn't depend on blood. Nor is it exclusive friendship. Family members can be your best friends, you know. And best friends, whether or not they are related to you, can be your family.
quotes.author: Trenton Lee Stewart

quotes.quote: Treat your family like friends and your friends like family.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family isn’t always blood. It’s the people in your life who want you in theirs; the ones who accept you for who you are. The ones that would do anything to see your smile and who love you no matter what.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Families are like branches on a tree. We grow in different directions, yet our roots remain as one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The Family is where life begins and love never ends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
quotes.author: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.quote: There’s nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: There is no doubt that it is around the family and the home that all the greatest virtues of human society are created, strengthened and maintained.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: You can kiss your family and friends good-bye and put miles between you, but at the same time you carry them with you in your heart, your mind, your stomach, because you do not just live in a world but a world lives in you.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: Stick to the basics, hold on to your family and friends - they will never go out of fashion.
quotes.author: Niki Taylor

quotes.quote: Nothing purchased can come close to the renewed sense of gratitude for having family and friends.
quotes.author: Courtland Milloy

quotes.quote: The length of one's days matters less than the love of one's family and friends.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: I've learned that all a person has in life is family and friends. If you lose those, you have nothing, so friends are to be treasured more than anything else in the world.
quotes.author: Trey Parker And Matt Stone

quotes.quote: Present your family and friends with their eulogies now - they won't be able to hear how much you love them and appreciate them from the grave.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches.
quotes.author: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.quote: Inspiring passion in family and friends has more enduring value than just staying alive for them.
quotes.author: Alex Lowe

quotes.quote: We love to be with our family and friends and I can tell you that lots of eating will be involved.
quotes.author: Julia Barr

quotes.quote: We don't have the luxury of time. We spend more because of how we live, but it's important to be with our family and friends.
quotes.author: Sara Blakely

quotes.quote: Cherish your human connections: your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Talking with my friends and family every day helps keep me grounded and connected to home. They are the most important things to me.
quotes.author: Colbie Caillat

quotes.quote: Love overflows and joy never ends in a home that is blessed with family and friends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I like to be judged by my family and friends because they know me.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.quote: Of course my family and friends are incredibly valuable to me. They keep me sane, they teach me things and I love spending time with them. I think that ranking what you value is a sort of western and linear way of looking at things.
quotes.author: Julia Stiles

quotes.quote: There's nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: If you want to really know what your friends and family think of you die broke, and then see who shows up for the funeral.
quotes.author: Gregory Nunn

quotes.quote: I have friends and family that are filled with massive amounts of integrity. And it shouldn't be an oddity.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: I've learned... that family and friends are what make us who we are today and without them
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's all about quality of life and finding a happy balance between work and friends and family.
quotes.author: Philip Green

quotes.quote: When I do get the chance I just love to hang around at home with friends and family.
quotes.author: Delta Goodrem

quotes.quote: I'm surrounded by great friends and family. I don't know what I would do without them.
quotes.author: Emma Roberts

quotes.quote: My friends and family always thought I was pretty funny, but I don't know if they thought I was get-my-own-show funny.
quotes.author: Nick Kroll

quotes.quote: Keep playing games. Make time to play games with your friends and family, because it's surprisingly heartbreaking to wipe a thin layer of dust off a game you love, before you put it back on the shelf because the real world is calling you.
quotes.author: Wil Wheaton

quotes.quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.quote: I love being at home, being with friends and family. I'm of European stock, brought up in Australia. I'm a passionate guy. I just love life.
quotes.author: Eric Bana

quotes.quote: Indeed, I was so afraid to dishonour my friends and family by my indiscreet actions, that I rather chose to be accounted a fool, than to be thought rude or wanton.
quotes.author: Margaret Cavendish

quotes.quote: I feel only my friends and family need to know what is happening in my personal life.
quotes.author: Virat Kohli

quotes.quote: Some of my friends and family have tried to challenge me to do jokes that aren't as self-deprecating, where I genuinely express my own opinion in my own voice.
quotes.author: Maria Bamford

quotes.quote: Family and friendships are two of the greatest facilitators of happiness.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: The books, along with family and friends, and sometimes even against family and friends, molded their characters.
quotes.author: Vick S

quotes.quote: What you need to understand when you choose specific friends and family members to help you with your depression is that they have lives too.
quotes.author: Joanna Jackson

quotes.quote: The real success of our personal lives and careers can best be measured by the relationships we have with the people most dear to us - our family, friends, and co-workers.
quotes.author: Mary Kay

quotes.quote: Families are the crucibles that transform infants into mature human beings. No matter how hard things are in your family right now, it is possible to create a home where differences are resolved amicably, and to raise children who are friends for life.
quotes.author: Laura Markham

quotes.quote: In case you feel quite low, try your best to not sit alone. Rather, go to a family member or a friend who you can trust. Everyone has that person in the life, who understands him/ her.
quotes.author: Ryan Michaelson

quotes.quote: Family, friends and the typical attitudes of society will, at different stages, try to tell you what you 'should' be doing with your life.
quotes.author: Philip West

quotes.quote: Your friends, family, and coworkers have a great impact on your self-confidence. Keep a steady stock of people who encourage, enable, and support you to be confident.
quotes.author: Kathleen Rao

quotes.quote: Family and close friends who are supportive of you should be integrated into your schedule regularly, to nourish and nurture your overall well being.
quotes.author: Ace McCloud

quotes.quote: I understand there are rules, but when it comes to family and friends, there's a time to break them!
quotes.author: Chris Fedak

quotes.quote: Remember: family and friends are everything. Money, greed, and power are a dance with Satan.
quotes.author: Chris Fedak

quotes.quote: Well, because she's family. I mean, 90% of the time, family just gets under your skin. That's the difference between family and friends.
quotes.author: Hart Hanson

quotes.quote: Families and friends make us vulnerable. Make us unable to pull the trigger.
quotes.author: Chris Fedak

quotes.quote: Find the source. But, if it comes to a choice between people and treasure, family and friends must come first.
quotes.author: Richard Beban

quotes.quote: That's the one day family and friends get together and show their love for each other! It's the one time when everybody gives instead of takes. I know that means nothing to you two sophisticates, but it's mighty important to the rest of the world.
quotes.author: Felix E. Feist

quotes.quote: Here's to family and friends / It's good to be here again / On the streets there's children laughing / People smile as they are passing
quotes.author: Dee Snider

quotes.quote: Here's to family and friends / The next time we meet again / God bless us everyone / The good and the bad / The happy, the sad / God bless us everyone
quotes.author: Dee Snider

quotes.quote: Knowing that you care / Always makes me smile / You are what makes living / Worthwhile / With my family, all of my friends / With my family and all of my friends / With my family, all of my friends and you
quotes.author: Allen Toussaint

quotes.quote: We're not related but here's good news / Friends are the family you can choose
quotes.author: Benjamin Connell

quotes.quote: Live everyday every possible ways / Spend your time with your family, your friends / Live it right down to the end / Take every road, every bend / Live every minute, get all there is in it my friend
quotes.author: Paul Anka

quotes.quote: In a perfect world our family and our friends provide us with the help we need when we go through difficult time in our lives.
quotes.author: Ann Palmer

quotes.quote: Our family and our friends accept us no matter what, forgive our mistakes and love us unconditionally.
quotes.author: Ann Palmer

quotes.quote: In a perfect world we can open up to our family and friends about our fears and our joys and know they will understand.
quotes.author: Ann Palmer

quotes.quote: When persons need help, our culture expects that they turn first to their family, and that the family will help to the extent that they can.
quotes.author: Diana R. Garland

quotes.quote: Support system are a network of people such as family and friends who remain close and provide assistance.
quotes.author: Kelvin L. Chou

quotes.quote: Family and friends. These are the people you love the most, choose to spend the most time with, love you the most.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: If we want our relationships with our family or friends to eb successful and for them to think the very best or us, then we do need to give those relationships some thought--a conscious approach rather than sailing on asleep at the wheel like most people.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: You have responsibilities toward both your children and your parents. You have a duty to your siblings. You have obligations, that have to be taken seriously, to your friends.
quotes.author: Richard Templar

quotes.quote: Remember to balance your time between friends, family, and relationships, even though its incredibly difficult.
quotes.author: Kevin M. Kacvinsky

quotes.quote: You want to believe that there's one relationship in life that's beyond betrayal. A relationship that's beyond that kind of hurt. And there isn't.
quotes.author: Caleb Carr

quotes.quote: Betrayal is the only truth that sticks.
quotes.author: Arthur Miller

quotes.quote: For there to be betrayal, there would have to have been trust first.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: To me, the thing that is worse than death is betrayal. You see, I could conceive death, but I could not conceive betrayal.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Though those that are betray'd Do feel the treason sharply, yet the traitor Stands in worse case of woe.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against betrayal.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though ... betrayal is the willful slaughter of hope.
quotes.author: Steven Deitz

quotes.quote: There is no greater blessing than a family hand that lifts you from a fall; but there is not lower curse than a family hand that strikes you when you're down.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: The thorn from the bush one has planted, nourished and pruned pricks more deeply and draws more blood.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: It's a shame that the very people who you protect are the first ones to turn there backs on you.
quotes.author: Autumn Kohler

quotes.quote: t's particularly hard to take being stabbed in the back close to home. There's always a feeling of betrayal when people of your own group oppose you.
quotes.author: Catharine MacKinnon

quotes.quote: Trust thy self, and another shall not betray thee.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Passions spin the plot: We are betrayed by what is false within.
quotes.author: George Meredith

quotes.quote: Lord, defend me from my friends; I can account for my enemies.
quotes.author: Charles D'Hericault

quotes.quote: Be certain that he who has betrayed thee once will betray thee again.
quotes.author: Johann Caspar Lavater

quotes.quote: Every betrayal contains a perfect moment, a coin stamped heads or tails with salvation on the other side.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: Anyone who hasn't experienced the ecstasy of betrayal knows nothing about ecstasy at all.
quotes.author: Jean Genet

quotes.quote: We have to distrust each other. It is our only defense against Betrayal
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: It's hard to tell who has your back from who has it long enough just to stab you in it .
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: Love is understood, in a historical way, as one of the great human vocations-but its counterspell has always been infidelity. This terrible, terrible betrayal that can tear apart not only another person, not only oneself, but whole families.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: In a broken nest there are few whole eggs.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Diaper backward spells repaid. Think about it.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Relations are simply a tedious pack of people, who haven't got the remotest knowledge of how to live, nor the smallest instinct about when to die.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Betrayal can only happen if you love.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: It was a mistake, you said. But the cruel thing was, it felt like the mistake was mine, for trusting you.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: I used to advertise my loyalty and I don't believe there is a single person I loved that I didn't eventually betray.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: etrayal is never easy to handle and there is no right way to accept it.
quotes.author: Christine Feehan

quotes.quote: The saddest thing about betrayal is that it never comes from your enemies... It comes from Friends n loved ones.
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: My love for you was bulletproof but you're the one who shot me.
quotes.author: Pierce The Veil

quotes.quote: There must be love, and understanding, to betray. Most men haven't the wit or the honor for betrayal: not to know it when they see it; not the stomach to apprehend it as they do it. Most men, blind and dumb in their self-centeredness, don't betray: they merely disappoint.
quotes.author: Janet Morris

quotes.quote: A traumatic experience of love can occur when a child’s experience of love, caring and affection collides with an on-going experience of abuse and betrayal. The union of love, trust and safety becomes fractured, while notions of love and betrayal become linked in tragic partnership.
quotes.author: Jennifer J. Freyd

quotes.quote: Betrayal. A form of abandonment. Often the abandonment is difficult to see because the betrayer can be still close, even intimate, or may be intruding in your life. Yet your interests, your well-being is continually sacrificed.
quotes.author: Patrick Carnes

quotes.quote: Family can bring us the greatest joy. Family can also bring the great pain not even a stranger can outdo. The painful and disappointing family episodes can bring many of us to our knees wondering how those who claim to love and chanted, 'Blood is thicker than water' treat us with such disdain without remorse.
quotes.author: Clarissa Burton

quotes.quote: The worst families are those in which the members never really speak their minds to one another; they maintain an atmosphere of unreality, and everyone always lives in an atmosphere of suppressed ill-feeling.
quotes.author: Walter Bagehot

quotes.quote: Far from being the basis of the good society, the family, with its narrow privacy and tawdry secrets, is the source of all our discontents.
quotes.author: Edmund Leach

quotes.quote: Family history, of course, has its proper dietary laws. One is supposed to swallow and digest only the permitted parts of it. the halal portions of the past, drained of their redness, their blood.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: I detest collaterals. Blood may be thicker than water, but it is also a great deal nastier.
quotes.author: Edith Somerville and Martin Ross

quotes.quote: Family! . . . the home of all social evil, a charitable institution for comfortable women, an anchorage for house-fathers, and a hell for children.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: If a man’s character is to be abused, say what you will, there’s nobody like a relation to do the business.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: The first half of our lives is ruined by our parents, the second half by our children.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: My Mom said she learned how to swim when someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. I said ‘Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.’
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: If life is a family, then sin is a feud between family members.
quotes.author: Brian D. McLaren

quotes.quote: Do you know what love is?... It is whatever you can still betray.
quotes.author: John Le Carre

quotes.quote: To betray, you must first belong. I never belonged.
quotes.author: Kim Philby

quotes.quote: The Family is a petty despotism; . . . a school in which men learn to despise women and women to mistrust men (much more than is necessary); a slaughterhouse for children (the firstborn succumbing to unskilled treatment, the lastborn to neglect) . . . Unfortunately, we cannot as yet do without it; and therefore we put a good face on the matter by conferring upon it the conventional attribute of sacredness, and impudently proclaiming it the source of all the virtues it has well-nigh killed in us.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The number one reason people fail in life is because they listen to their friends, family, and neighbors.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Sometimes the people closest to you betray you, and your home isn’t a place you can be happy anymore. It’s hard, but it’s true.
quotes.author: P.C. Cast

quotes.quote: Everyone suffers at least one bad betrayal in their lifetime. It’s what unites us. The trick is not to let it destroy your trust in others when that happens. Don’t let them take that from you.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Only those you trust can betray you.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: One should rather die than be betrayed. There is no deceit in death. It delivers precisely what it has promised. Betrayal, though, is the willful slaughter of hope.
quotes.author: Steven Deitz

quotes.quote: You can't keep snakes in your backyard and expect them only to bite your neighbors. You know, eventually those snakes are going to turn on whoever has them in the backyard.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: If you're very good, tomorrow night I'll tell you the story of emperor Claudius who was betrayed by those closest to him, by his own blood. They whispered in dark corners and went out late at night and conspired and conspired but the emperor Claudius knew they were up to something. He knew they were busy little bees. And one night he sat down with one of them and he looked at her and he said, 'Tell me what you've been doing busy little bee or I shall strike down those dearest to you. You shall watch as I bathe in their blood.' And the emperor was heartbroken. The little bee had wounded him more deeply than anyone else could ever have done.
quotes.author: Commodus

quotes.quote: If you're very good, tomorrow night I'll tell you the story of emperor Claudius who was betrayed by those closest to him, by his own blood. They whispered in dark corners and went out late at night and conspired and conspired but the emperor Claudius knew they were up to something. He knew they were busy little bees. And one night he sat down with one of them and he looked at her and he said, 'Tell me what you've been doing busy little bee or I shall strike down those dearest to you. You shall watch as I bathe in their blood.' And the emperor was heartbroken. The little bee had wounded him more deeply than anyone else could ever have done.
quotes.author: Commodus

quotes.quote: If you're very good, tomorrow night I'll tell you the story of emperor Claudius who was betrayed by those closest to him, by his own blood. They whispered in dark corners and went out late at night and conspired and conspired but the emperor Claudius knew they were up to something. He knew they were busy little bees. And one night he sat down with one of them and he looked at her and he said, 'Tell me what you've been doing busy little bee or I shall strike down those dearest to you. You shall watch as I bathe in their blood.' And the emperor was heartbroken. The little bee had wounded him more deeply than anyone else could ever have done.
quotes.author: Commodus

quotes.quote: There's one [traitor] in every family sire. Two in mine, actually. And they always manage to ruin special occasions.
quotes.author: Zazu [about Scar]

quotes.quote: Fredo, you're my older brother, and I love you. But don't ever take sides with anyone against the Family again. Ever.
quotes.author: Michael Corleone

quotes.quote: I, uh, betrayed my wife. I betrayed myself. I've killed men, and I ordered men to be killed. No, it's useless. I killed... I ordered the death of my brother; he injured me. I killed my mother's son. I killed my father's son.
quotes.author: Michael Corleone

quotes.quote: If a country is to be corruption free and become a nation of beautiful minds, I strongly feel there are three key societal members who can make a difference. They are father, the mother and the teacher.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote:
"One of the greatest things drama can do, at it’s best, is to redefine the words we use every day such as love, home, family, loyalty and envy. Tragedy need not be a downer.
"
quotes.author: Ben Kingsley

quotes.quote: A man that raises a large family does, indeed, while he lives to observe them, stand a broader mark for sorrow; but then he stands a broader mark for pleasure too.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The greatest legacy one can pass on to one's children and grandchildren is not money or other material things accumulated in one’s life, but rather a legacy of character and faith.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy home life is that members of the family learn to give and receive love.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The family is a haven in a heartless world.
quotes.author: Christopher Lasch

quotes.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Making amends is not only saying the words but also being willing to listen to how your behavior caused another’s pain, and then the really hard part…changing behavior.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: Having a place to go – is a home. Having someone to love – is a family. Having both – is a blessing.
quotes.author: Donna Hedges

quotes.quote: Learn to enjoy every minute of your life. Be happy now. Don't wait for something outside of yourself to make you happy in the future. Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Like all the best families, we have our share of eccentricities, of impetuous and wayward youngsters and of family disagreements.
quotes.author: Elizabeth II

quotes.quote: I explain to my patients that abused children often find it hard to disentangle themselves from their dysfunctional families, whereas children grow away from good, loving parents with far less conflict. After all, isn’t that the task of a good parent, to enable the child to leave home?
quotes.author: Irvin D. Yalom

quotes.quote: Family is supposed to be our safe heaven. Very often, it's the place where we find the deepest heartache.
quotes.author: Iyanla Vanzant

quotes.quote: In the process of letting go you will lose many things from the past, but you will find yourself.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: There comes a day when you realize turning the page is the best feeling in the world, because you realize there is so much more to the book than the page you were stuck on.
quotes.author: Zayn Malik

quotes.quote: Families always have these unspoken dramas, and at holidays, everyone is supposed to sit down and pretend that none of that is going on.
quotes.author: Richard LaGravenese

quotes.quote: In families you can find the source of every human drama. It is interesting because the cell of a society, the cell of a country, the cell of humanity - everything lies in the family.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quotes.quote: For all the drama we all have with our families and all the tension and hostility, I couldn't have done this without my family. Being the people that they are - they're crazy - made it possible for me to be crazy and to live a lifestyle of my own design.
quotes.author: Dan Colen

quotes.quote: The more dysfunctional, the more some family members seek to control the behavior of others.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: No one have a perfect family, but my family is perfect for Me
quotes.author: Beta Metani'Marashi

quotes.quote: We get married to have an ally against our family.
quotes.author: Jonathan Tropper

quotes.quote: Families living in dysfunction seldom have healthy boundaries. Dysfunctional families have trouble knowing where they stop and others begin.
quotes.author: David W. Earle

quotes.quote: A family without a black sheep is not a typical family
quotes.author: Heinrich Boll

quotes.quote: Sometimes it can be bad to have too much family. Everybody gets involved in your problems, giving their opinion, gossiping, and making drama. But when bad things happen, they will be there to support you.
quotes.author: Sofia Vergara

quotes.quote: With family dramas, it's hard to keep those stories alive.
quotes.author: Emily Vancamp

quotes.quote: Family likeness has often a deep sadness in it. Nature, that great tragic dramatist, knits us together by bone and muscle, and divides us by the subtler web of our brains; blends yearning and repulsion; and ties us by our heart-strings to the beings that jar us at every movement.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: You don't choose your family. They are God's gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart is.
quotes.author: J.J. McCloskey

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Johann Schiller

quotes.quote: Families are the compass that guides us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: To put the world right in order, we must first put the nation in order; to put the nation in order, we must first put the family in order; to put the family in order, we must first cultivate our personal life; we must first set our hearts right.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Bringing up a family should be an adventure, not an anxious discipline in which everybody is constantly graded for performance.
quotes.author: Milton R. Saperstein

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life. Rarely do members of one family grow up under the same roof.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Families ties are cherished things, forged in childhood days, by love of parents, deep and true, and sweet familiar ways.
quotes.author: Terri Burritt

quotes.quote: So many people prefer to live in drama because it's comfortable. It's like someone staying in a bad marriage or relationship - it's actually easier to stay because they know what to expect every day, versus leaving not knowing what to expect.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Free yourself from the complexities and drama of your life. Simplify. Look within. Within ourselves we all have the gifts and talents we need to fulfill the purpose we've been blessed with.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Family quarrels have a total bitterness unmatched by others. Yet it sometimes happens that they also have a kind of tang, a pleasantness beneath the unpleasantness, based on the tacit understanding that this is not for keeps; that any limb you climb out on will still be there later for you to climb back.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family. Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: They... threw themselves into the interests of the rest, but each plowed his or her own furrow. Their thoughts, their little passions and hopes and desires, all ran along separate lines. Family life is like this - animated, but collateral.
quotes.author: Rose Macaulay

quotes.quote: Money is just a form of trade to buy your wants, but it cannot be there for your needs in as much as the loving people around you.
quotes.author: Wayne Chirisa

quotes.quote: I don't care how poor a man is; if he has family, he's rich.
quotes.author: Dan Wilcox

quotes.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with family.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching — they are your family.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Christmas is the perfect time to celebrate the love of God and family and to create memories that will last forever. Jesus is God's perfect, indescribable gift. The amazing thing is that not only are we able to receive this gift, but we are able to share it with others on Christmas and every other day of the year.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: To each other, we were as normal and nice as the smell of bread. We were just a family. In a family even exaggerations make perfect sense.
quotes.author: John Irving

quotes.quote: That voice that cries out doesn't have to be a weakling's does it?
quotes.author: John Osborne

quotes.quote: One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don’t let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.author: Josiah

quotes.quote: I love all genres. The only thing I get stymied by is the Family Drama. I don't necessarily know how to approach that.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: When you look at your life, the greatest happinesses are family happinesses.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: The great gift of family life is to be intimately acquainted with people you might never even introduce yourself to, had life not done it for you.
quotes.author: Kendall Hailey

quotes.quote: No matter what you’ve done for yourself or for humanity, if you can’t look back on having given love and attention to your own family, what have you really accomplished?
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: All happy families are alike. Every unhappy family, however, is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leon Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Many times, the decisions we make affect and hurt your closest friends and family the most. I have a lot of regrets in that regard. But God has forgiven me, which I am very thankful for. It has enabled me to forgive myself and move forward one day at a time.
quotes.author: Lex Luger

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
quotes.author: Mark V. Olsen

quotes.quote: I can’t help detesting my relations. I suppose it comes from the fact that none of us can stand other people having the same faults as ourselves.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: It didn’t matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.
quotes.author: Peter Buffett

quotes.quote: To maintain a joyful family requires much from both the parents and the children. Each member of the family has to become, in a special way, the servant of the others.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Nothing like watching your relatives fight, I always say.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Family life is a bit like a runny peach pie – not perfect but who’s complaining?
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Sometimes our hearts get tangled, and our souls a little off kilter. Friends and family can set us right, and help guide us back to the light.
quotes.author: Sera Christann

quotes.quote: There's a reason Mia is currently an only child. Family drama takes on a whole new meaning when they're feuding gods who can't stand the sight of each other and always try to kill one another whenever they're in the same room.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, and communication is open, and rules are flexible - the kind of atmosphere that is found in a nurturing family.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Eva Burrows

quotes.quote: The love of a family is life's greatest blessing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: No Family Is Perfect. We Argue, We Fight. We Even Stop Talking to Each Other at Times. But in the End, Family Is Family. The Love Will Always Be There.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family love is messy, clinging, and of an annoying and repetitive pattern, like bad wallpaper
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: There's no vocabulary for love within a family, love that's lived in but not looked at, love within the light of which all else is seen, the love within which all other love finds speech. This love is silent.
quotes.author: T S Eliot

quotes.quote: The world, we'd discovered, doesn't love you like your family loves you.
quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

quotes.quote: Power, that's one thing, but love of family and of siblings is more important, is more powerful than any other power - at least earthly power, at least earthly power.
quotes.author: Sander Levin

quotes.quote: Love makes a family.
quotes.author: GIGI KAESER

quotes.quote: Because I had my family, I felt like I could be a bird and fly and experience and do. Because I had roots somewhere, I knew that they would love me no matter what, and I could always go back home and they were going to love me.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
quotes.author: Mark V. Olsen

quotes.quote: Don't let the fire of love ever go out for your family. Stay strong and be a provider, give as much as you can and love them with all your heart.
quotes.author: Paul Kipling

quotes.quote: There is no poverty in life when you have a loving, peaceful, happy family. They are a gift which cannot be bought nor traded for gold.
quotes.author: Ryan Dunn

quotes.quote: Family comes first. In a world full of unknown faces which do not care, the family comes in with all the love that there is to be found.
quotes.author: Timothy Kennedy

quotes.quote: The love of the family, the love of the person can heal. It heals the scars left by a larger society. A massive, powerful society.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The only people that you really have, that I learned, are your family, because they love you no matter what.
quotes.author: Miley Cyrus

quotes.quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Lisa Weedn

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beeche

quotes.quote: A family can develop only with a loving woman as its center.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm Friedrich Schlegel

quotes.quote: Family isn't about sharing the same genetics, Thats being related, Family is when you love someone to death, and You would do anything for them, You trust them, Take care of them, And in Return they do the same. Its the type of bond you hold together.
quotes.author: Tanya Bianco

quotes.quote: Our family is a circle of strength and love...Our family with ever birth and every union the circle grows, our family is a circle of strength every crisis faced together makes the circle stronger.
quotes.author: Harriet Morgan

quotes.quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A home with a loving and loyal husband and wife is the supreme setting in which children can be reared in love and righteousness and in which the spiritual and physical needs of children can be met.
quotes.author: David A. Bednar

quotes.quote: A loving family provides the foundation children need to succeed, and strong families with a man and a woman - bonded together for life - always have been, and always will be, the key to such families.
quotes.author: Jim Bunning

quotes.quote: Home is where you are loved the most and act the worst.
quotes.author: Marjorie Pay Hinckley

quotes.quote: It didn't matter how big our house was; it mattered that there was love in it.
quotes.author: Peter Buffett

quotes.quote: Your family and your love must be cultivated like a garden. Time, effort, and imagination must be summoned constantly to keep any relationship flourishing and growing.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The family. We were a strange little band of characters trudging through life sharing diseases and toothpaste, coveting one another's desserts, hiding shampoo, borrowing money, locking each other out of our rooms, inflicting pain and kissing to heal it in the same instant, loving, laughing, defending, and trying to figure out the common thread that bound us all together.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck
