quotes.quote: It all comes down to family, love, and forgiveness, and respect.
quotes.author: Bert Marcus

quotes.quote: That's how you know that your family loves you, when they feel free to scream at you.
quotes.author: Steven Levitan

quotes.quote: Family values may have declined over the last century, but we still help our families when we can. You're family, Will.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.quote: Every family loves differently. Every love is unique.
quotes.author: Bryan Fuller

quotes.quote: Family shouldn't leave family. I'll always love you.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti

quotes.quote: Family is power, Niklaus. Love, loyalty. That's power!
quotes.author: Julie Plec

quotes.quote: Please stay. There's nothing better than a happy family.
quotes.author: Jay Sommers

quotes.quote: I love the family / Longer than longevity / Mother tells me what to be / Taller than the tallest tree / I love the family / Sister loves me tenderly / Sitting on my daddy's knee
quotes.author: David Greenfield

quotes.quote: Can't outrun the family / It gets me where I want to be / Trough thick and thin it will help me
quotes.author: David Greenfield

quotes.quote: He says be faithful always maintain integrity / Stick to your guns but hurt no one / And love your family / Life love and honesty reside
quotes.author: Dave Nudo Band

quotes.quote: Heart don't fail me now / Courage don't desert me / Home love family / There was once a time / I must have had them too / Home love family / I will never be complete / Until I find you
quotes.author: Lynn Ahrens

quotes.quote: When it's family, you forgive them / For they know not what they do / When it's family, you accept them / 'Cause you have no choice but to
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: And when it's family, you trust them / And your heart's an open door / When it's family, you tolerate / What you'd kill others for
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: You take the trouble as it comes / And love 'em more than anyone / Good or bad or indifferent / It's still family
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Somehow you justify mistakes / Try to find some better way / To solve the problems day to day / In the family
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Need peace in the family / We all live many different lives / You and me, same inside / One love, same blood / Peace in the family
quotes.author: Rhett Walker

quotes.quote: All of the people around us, they say / How can they be that close / Just let me state for the record / We are family, we are family / I got all my sisters with me, I got all my sisters with me
quotes.author: Nile Rodgers

quotes.quote: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The best of believers in faith is one who is best in manners and soft in their dealings with their family members.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad

quotes.quote: Family culture is based on the primary laws of love, which reflect the reality, and love in its purest form is unconditional.
quotes.author: Rashid Rashad

quotes.quote: Creating a beautiful family culture is to be proactive.
quotes.author: Rashid Rashad

quotes.quote: Strong family ties based in sound moral values is the very foundation for a healthy society, healthy adults and healthy children.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life.
quotes.author: Kevin Marti

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: A woman can take care of the family. It takes a man to provide structure, to provide stability.
quotes.author: Tom DeLay

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: Grorge Bernanrd Shaw

quotes.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
quotes.author: Charles R Swindoll

quotes.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee lacocca

quotes.quote: Spend sometime this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: If one is desperate for love, I suggest looking at one's friends and family and see if love is all around. If not, get a new set of friends, a new family.
quotes.author: Jasmine Guy

quotes.quote: One of the things that binds us as family is a shared sense of humor.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.quote: Happy is said to be the family which can eat onions together. They are, for the time being, separate, from the world, and have a harmony of inspiration.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: One's family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I'll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who'll be with me will be my family.
quotes.author: Robert Byrd

quotes.quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
quotes.author: Amos Oz

quotes.quote: The foundation of family - that's where it all begins for me.
quotes.author: Faith Hill

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Call it clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family: Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: Families are about love overcoming emotional torture.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: In every dispute between parent and child, both cannot be right, but they may be, and usually are, both wrong. It is this situation which gives family life its peculiar hysterical charm.
quotes.author: Isaac Rosenfield

quotes.quote: Marriage and family life are one way - the most important way without doubt - to secure in our lives the most marvelous and the most wonderful experience that we could ever have and share in this life: the experience of love - the experience of becoming a gift for each other.
quotes.author: Hernán Alessandri

quotes.quote: A loving, caring family can help a child develop good self-esteem.
quotes.author: Cathy McAleese

quotes.quote: Healthy families make an effort to build relationships inside the home where their child can feel secure and loved.
quotes.author: Cathy McAleese

quotes.quote: Strong, stable, and healthy families are the foundation and building blocks our our society.
quotes.author: Cathy McAleese

quotes.quote: Families are what you make them and the ultimate connecting factor is love.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Walter-Goodspeed

quotes.quote: Families are ever changing in today's society. This shows that all families should be embraced and celebrated.
quotes.author: Dee Dee Walter-Goodspeed

quotes.quote: Every family is unique and every family has its own set of challenges, failures, joys, and successes.
quotes.author: Rachel Lynette

quotes.quote: Families are great! They may not all look the same. But the people all love one another.
quotes.author: Diana Kenney

quotes.quote: Let love be genuine. Abhor what is evil; hold fast to what is good.
quotes.author: Romans 12:9

quotes.quote: There’s nothing I value more than the closeness of friends and family, a smile as I pass someone on the street.
quotes.author: Willie Stargell

quotes.quote: Families are the compass that guides us. They are inspiration to reach great heights and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
quotes.author: Beck Martin

quotes.quote: The family is the best thing you could ever ask for. They are there for you during the ups and downs and love you no matter what.
quotes.author: Beck Martin

quotes.quote: Having a place to go - is a home. Having someone to love - is a family. Having both - is a family.
quotes.author: Beck Martin

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Beck Martin

quotes.quote: To maintain a joyful family requires much from both the parents and the children. Each member of the family has to become, in a special way, the servant of the others.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: Family. People in your life who are close to your heart. Who bring out the best in you, Who laugh, celebrate and dream with you. Who love you infinitely.
quotes.author: Fiona Poojara

quotes.quote: Family is people who loves us a lot. They are a special gift from God.
quotes.author: Fiona Poojara

quotes.quote: When you get married, your loyalty, first and foremost, is to your spouse, and to the family that you create together.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: I'll take fifty percent efficiency to get one hundred percent loyalty.
quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: An ounce of loyalty is worth a pound of cleverness.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Loyalty will not permit envy, hate, and uncharitableness to creep into our public thinking.
quotes.author: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.quote: So much of what is best in us is bound up in our love of family, that it remains the measure of our stability because it measures our sense of loyalty.
quotes.author: Haniel Long

quotes.quote: We both have a great loyalty to it, and I think that it's important to give it our best shot.
quotes.author: Nicholas Lea

quotes.quote: You've got to give loyalty down, if you want loyalty up.
quotes.author: Donald T. Regan

quotes.quote: Loyalty means nothing unless it has at its heart the absolute principle of self-sacrifice.
quotes.author: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.quote: When does loyalty become martyrdom?
quotes.author: Robert Charles Wilson

quotes.quote: Loyalty is something you give regardless of what you get back, and in giving loyalty, you're getting more loyalty; and out of loyalty flow other great qualities.
quotes.author: Charles Tremendous Jones

quotes.quote: Unless you can find some sort of loyalty, you cannot find unity and peace in your active living.
quotes.author: Josiah Royce

quotes.quote: Lack of loyalty is one of the major causes of failure in every walk of life.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: A family in harmony will prosper in everything.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life. Rarely do members of one family grow up under the same roof.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Loyalty means giving me your honest opinion, whether you think I'll like it or not. Disagreement, at this state, stimulates me. But once a decision is made, the debate ends. From that point on, loyalty means executing the decision as if it were your own.
quotes.author: General Colin Powell

quotes.quote: You cannot buy loyalty; you cannot buy the devotion of hearts, minds, and souls. You have to earn these things.
quotes.author: Clarence Francis

quotes.quote: Loyalty isn't grey. It's black and white. You're either loyal completely, or not loyal at all.
quotes.author: Sharnay

quotes.quote: You don't earn loyalty in a day. You earn loyalty day- by- day.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Gitomer

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a characteristic trait. Those who have it, give it free of charge.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: Be loyal to those who are not present. In doing so, you build the trust of those who are present.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Loyalty is what makes us trust, Trust is what makes us stay, Staying is what makes us love, and love is what gives us hope.
quotes.author: Glenn van Dekken

quotes.quote: Loyalty is the highest virtue taught by abusers, and used as a control tool.
quotes.author: Dr Bill Tollefson

quotes.quote: We are all in the same boat, in a stormy sea, and we owe each other a terrible loyalty.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Where there is loyalty, weapons are of no use.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The whole point of loyalty was not to change: stick with those who stuck with you.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: Nothing is more noble, nothing more venerable than fidelity. Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: The only true test of loyalty is fidelity in the face of ruin and despair.
quotes.author: Eric Felten

quotes.quote: I'm very loyal in relationships. Even when I go out with my mom I don't look at other moms.
quotes.author: Garry Shandling

quotes.quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: I don't like to give up on people when they need someone not to give up on them.
quotes.author: Carrol Bryant

quotes.quote: Birds of a feather flock together.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A healthy loyalty is not passive and complacent, but active and critical.
quotes.author: Harold Laski

quotes.quote: Loyalty is a major force making for unity in any life-even in the existence of a civilization.... It gives point and flavor, most of all meaning, to a life or a culture.
quotes.author: Harmon M. Gehr

quotes.quote: There is one element that is worth its weight in gold and that is loyalty. It will cover a multitude of weaknesses.
quotes.author: Philip Armour

quotes.quote: Loyalty will not permit envy, hate, and uncharitableness to creep into our public thinking.
quotes.author: Bainbridge Colby

quotes.quote: He speaketh not; and yet there lies a conversation in his eyes.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: It is better to be faithful than famous.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Commitment is an act, not a word.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Faithfulness lives where love is stronger than instinct.
quotes.author: Paul Carvel

quotes.quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: I like people who are loyal to me, and I like to be loyal, too.
quotes.author: George Strait

quotes.quote: It is the soul's duty to be loyal to its own desires. It must abandon itself to its master passion.
quotes.author: Rebecca West

quotes.quote: Very few people deserted me when I went to prison. They stayed loyal.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Archer

quotes.quote: A little thing is a little thing, but faithfulness in little things is a great thing.
quotes.author: Hudson Taylor

quotes.quote: It takes a deep commitment to change and an even deeper commitment to grow.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Commitment. This is my favorite word because in some way, people who are committed are always much more interesting and much more reliable, and much more, I would say, deep than people who are not.
quotes.author: Carlos Ghosn

quotes.quote: It gives me strength to have somebody to fight for; I can never fight for myself, but, for others, I can kill.
quotes.author: Emilie Autumn

quotes.quote: If by my life or death I can protect you, I will.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: If you have ever had to face the agonizing choice between family loyalty and informing the police about ongoing violence by a close relative, I'd hope loyalty would go by the way, not justice.
quotes.author: Julian Baggini

quotes.quote: Respect the members of your blood family.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: One loyal friend is worth 10 thousand relatives.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Loyalty has its roots in respect, and respect is the fruit of love.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: A little in drink, but at all times your faithful husband.
quotes.author: Richard Steele

quotes.quote: The secret of a good life is to have the right loyalties and hold them on the right scale of values.
quotes.author: Norman Mattoon Thomas

quotes.quote: The strength of a country or creed lies in the true sense of loyalty it can arouse in the hearts of its people.
quotes.author: Louis C. Gerstein

quotes.quote: We are born to a family where hopefully we learn our first lessons in loyalty and love.
quotes.author: Edith Songer

quotes.quote: But I'm always true to you, darlin' in my fashion, / Yes I'm always true to you, darlin' in my way.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: His honour rooted in dishonour stood, / And faith unfaithful kept him falsely true.
quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quotes.quote: I am very interested in loyalty, even if the person to whom one is loyal is flawed, criminal, or otherwise in the wrong.
quotes.author: A.M. Homes

quotes.quote: To be sure, the dog is loyal. But why, on that account, should we take him as example? He is loyal to man, not to other dogs.
quotes.author: Karl Kraus

quotes.quote: Resolute loyalty to a person or cause / is trusty fortitude worthy of applause. / Unflinching honesty to a person or cause / is tenacious candor worthy of applause.
quotes.author: Wallace Dean LaBenne

quotes.quote: See with loyalty it’s an action / No matter how you feel about me I'll know you have my back.
quotes.author: Evan Moss

quotes.quote: It isn't an easy thing to give your loyalty to someone you don't know, especially when that person chooses to reveal nothing of himself.
quotes.author: Megan Whaler Turner

quotes.quote: Together we shared a bond, not even death would violate.
quotes.author: Dee Remy

quotes.quote: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I’d have.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.quote: I have a loyalty that runs in my bloodstream, when I lock into someone or something, you can't get me away from it because I commit that thoroughly. That’s in friendship, that’s a deal, that’s a commitment. Don't give me paper – I can get the same lawyer who drew it up to break it. But if you shake my hand, that’s for life…
quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

quotes.quote: The highest compact we can make with our fellow is –Let there be truth between us two forevermore.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I used to advertise my loyalty and I don't believe there is a single person I loved that I didn't eventually betray.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: I belong to the people I love, and they belong to me--they, and the love and loyalty I give them, form my identity far more than any word or group ever could.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Love and loyalty run deeper than blood.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: Honesty and loyalty are key. If two people can be honest with each other about everything, that’s probably the biggest key to success.
quotes.author: Taylor Lautner

quotes.quote: One of the things that makes me who I am is the loyalty I have to people I hold close to my heart.
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: But what are loyalty and caring really worth? To me? Everything.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: Be loyal and trustworthy. Do not befriend anyone who is lower than yourself in this regard.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: What makes a woman beautiful is her loyalty to and her friendships with other women, and her honesty with men.
quotes.author: Vanessa Marcil

quotes.quote: Loyalty to the family must be merged into loyalty to the community, loyalty to the community into loyalty to the nation, and loyalty to the nation into loyalty to mankind. The citizen of the future must be a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: Thomas Cochrane

quotes.quote: One of the major causes of poverty is a lack of family planning. Governments and nonprofit organizations need to encourage poor people to use birth control so that they don't have unexpected babies, which will only make poorer families poorer.
quotes.author: Philip Kotler

quotes.quote: It's long been accepted as fact that the availability of family planning services saves lives. Where women have access to these services, children and families are healthier, and society at large benefits.
quotes.author: Martha Plimpton

quotes.quote: You cannot have maternal health without reproductive health. And reproductive health includes contraception and family planning and access to legal, safe abortion.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: A girl child who is even a little bit educated is more conscious of family planning, health care and, in turn, her children's own education.
quotes.author: Azim Premji

quotes.quote: Reproductive health, sexual health, family planning, and autonomy and equality for women are not the fruits of development; they are not even the fertilizer—they are the tree itself.
quotes.author: Dr. Nafis Sadik

quotes.quote: Third world nations are producing too many children too fast...it is time to ignore the controversy over family planning and cut out-of-control population growth.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Every second, every day, every year, we fail to address demand for reproductive health and family planning services. Lives are lost, and girls' opportunities to thrive and contribute to their country's development shrink. These are real people.
quotes.author: Jenny Shipley

quotes.quote: Family planning experts are now recommending giving men vasectomy gift cards for the holidays. Talk about taking the jingle out of the bells.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: To label family planning and legal abortion programs "genocide" is male rhetoric, for male ears.
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: The only life many of the leaders of the anti-family planning movement seem to care about—indeed obsess about—is life before birth and after death.
quotes.author: Riane Eisler

quotes.quote: UN studies conducted in more than forty developing countries show that the birth rate falls as women gain equality... I believe income-earning opportunities that empower poor women ... will have more impact on curbing population growth than the current system of "encouraging" family planning practices through intimidation tactics.. Family planning should be left to the family.
quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

quotes.quote: Which is more like genocide, I have asked some of my black brothers—this, the way things are, or the conditions I am fighting for in which the full range of family planning services is available to women of all classes and colors, starting with effective contraception and extending to safe, legal terminations of undesired pregnancies at a price they can afford?
quotes.author: Shirley Chisholm

quotes.quote: We know that the way to decrease unplanned pregnancies and abortions is to make birth control and family planning services accessible and affordable, not micromanage the type of medical information and reproductive health counseling that women around the world receive.
quotes.author: Jeanne Shaheen

quotes.quote: We know that when women have access to voluntary family planning services, supplies and information, society sees enormous gains in each of the three pillars of sustainable development—human development, economic growth and environmental sustainability. Without it, families, communities and natural resources are extraordinarily burdened.
quotes.author: Jenny Shipley

quotes.quote: Many of us were the unplanned children of talented, creative women whose lives had been changed by unplanned and unwanted pregnancies. We witnessed their bitterness, their rage, their disappointment with their lot in life and we were clear that there could be no genuine sexual liberation for women and men without better, safer contraceptives, without the right to a safe, legal abortion.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: The way to plan the family is natural family planning, not contraception...This (use of contraceptives) turns the attention to self and so it destroys the gift of love in him or her. In loving, the husband and wife must turn the attention to each other as happens in natural family planning, and not to self, as happens in contraception. Once that living love is destroyed by contraception, abortion follows easily . . . And abortion, which often follows from contraception, brings a people to be spiritually poor, and that is the worst poverty and the most difficult to overcome.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Deciding about pregnancy should be by choices, not chance. Having the information and means to do so is a basic human right. Family planning is one of the best investments that we can make for women's empowerment, gender equality, sustainable development, and creating the future we want.
quotes.author: Babatunde Osotimehin

quotes.quote: When we talk about ‘reproductive rights’ this is what we mean. It’s the difference between people as objects, and people as agents: between regarding people as pawns on the policy chessboard and recognizing them as the players, the decision-makers, the drivers of policy; autonomous individuals intimately concerned with the direction of their own lives. Under these conditions women, especially, enjoy better health and live fuller lives.
quotes.author: Dr. Nafis Sadik

quotes.quote: It is now quite lawful for a Catholic woman to avoid pregnancy by a resort to mathematics, though she is still forbidden to resort to physics and chemistry.
quotes.author: H.L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Those who in principle oppose birth control are either incapable of arithmetic or else in favor of war, pestilence and famine as permanent features of human life.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: A crying baby is the best form of birth control.
quotes.author: Carole Tabron

quotes.quote: To be engaged in the economic sphere, to create income, to contribute to family health and well-being and to the country’s development, we must have family planning services.
quotes.author: Roman Tesfaye

quotes.quote: World fertility surveys indicate that anywhere from one third to one half of the babies born in the Third World would not be if their mothers had access to cheap, reliable family planning, had enough personal empowerment to stand up to their husbands and relatives, and could choose their own family size.
quotes.author: Donella Meadows

quotes.quote: Family planning saves the lives of mothers and children. It empowers women with the right to make their own reproductive choices and control their own bodies. Through those choices, it empowers women to enter the workforce and pursue economic opportunities.
quotes.author: Rachel Silverman

quotes.quote: It is only when a woman is economically empowered that she can negotiate at household level with her husband about the number of children that body of hers can have.
quotes.author: Joyce Banda

quotes.quote: For most women, including women who want to have children, contraception is not an option; it is a basic health care necessity.
quotes.author: Louise Slaughter

quotes.quote: If and when family planning is the responsibility of females, males are best kept under lock and key.
quotes.author: Nell Zink

quotes.quote: We want far better reasons for having children than not knowing how to prevent them.
quotes.author: Dora Winifred Black Russell

quotes.quote: So let’s keep talking about it. Make family planning a part of every conversation. It’s a right, a method, and a discussion that we must have—openly and honestly—at every stage of life.
quotes.author: Katelyn Bryant-Comstock

quotes.quote: From China and India to Turkey and Brazil, when women have gotten access to education, to family planning and to a vital place in the economy, greater prosperity has followed. And when women are free to speak and learn, they temper the extremes of ideology and fanaticism and raise sons who are less likely to become human bombs.
quotes.author: David Horsey

quotes.quote: When the poor know that their children will survive, when they educate their daughters, when they access family planning, they have fewer children.
quotes.author: Nicholas Kristof

quotes.quote: The evidence is pretty strong: if you have access to family planning and birth control, the abortion rate is going to go down.
quotes.author: Bob Casey

quotes.quote: When you don’t have the ability to plan for your future, unfortunately, there are kids . . . who are in a situation where their parents are really not able to take care of them, and they end up in a system that, despite trying, can really fail them in the long run.
quotes.author: Emily Sullivan

quotes.quote: In the Buddhist scriptures, it said many births cause suffering, so Buddhism is not against family planning.
quotes.author: Mechai Viravaidya

quotes.quote: Contraceptives should be used on every conceivable occasion.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: The best contraceptive is the word no—repeated frequently.
quotes.author: Margaret Smith

quotes.quote: As a Christian and a feminist, the most important message I can carry and fight for is the sacredness of each human life, and reproductive rights for all women are a crucial part of that. It is a moral necessity that we not be forced to bring children into the world for whom we cannot be responsible and adoring and present. We must not inflict life on children who will be resented; we must not inflict unwanted children on society.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Reproductive freedom is not just the ability not to have a child through birth control. It's the ability to have one if and when you want.
quotes.author: Pamela Madsen

quotes.quote: We cannot confront the massive challenges of poverty, hunger, disease and environmental destruction unless we address issues of population and reproductive health.
quotes.author: Thoraya Obaid

quotes.quote: The problem of burgeoning population can be addressed if we begin with women itself. And, we need to educate them and spread awareness about birth control and family planning through TV channels and newspapers.
quotes.author: Geeta Phogat

quotes.quote: Deep inside us, we know what every family therapist knows: the problems between the parents become the problems within the children.
quotes.author: Roger Gould

quotes.quote: Any problem, big or small, within a family, always seems to start with bad communication. Someone isn't listening.
quotes.author: Emma Thompson

quotes.quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don't go according to any rules. They're not like aches or wounds, they're more like splits in the skin that won't heal because there's not enough material.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: In every dispute between parent and child, both cannot be right, but they may be, and usually are, both wrong. It is this situation which gives family life its peculiar hysterical charm.
quotes.author: Isaac Rosenfeld

quotes.quote: Most couples have not had hundreds of arguments; they've had the same argument hundreds of times.
quotes.author: Gay Hendricks

quotes.quote: Family quarrels have a total bitterness unmatched by others. Yet it sometimes happens that they also have a kind of tang, a pleasantness beneath the unpleasantness, based on the tacit understanding that this is not for keeps; that any limb you climb out on will still be there later for you to climb back.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what kind of problems a family is having; it should always stay in the family.
quotes.author: Scott Weiland

quotes.quote: We're a very close family and we're a very real family, and I think every real family has real problems.
quotes.author: Emilio Estevez

quotes.quote: I can't say it's not painful being estranged from most of my family. I wish it could be otherwise.
quotes.author: LaToya Jackson

quotes.quote: Family problems come in all shapes and sizes; some are short-lived and easily managed, while others are more chronic and difficult to handle.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sometimes problems don't require a solution to solve them; instead they require maturity to outgrow them.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: How many solutions are found to family problems if we take time to reflect? If we think of a husband or wife and we dream about their good qualities that they have? Don't ever lose the illusion of when you were boyfriend and girlfriend!
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: I don't think a female running a house is a problem, a broken family. It's perceived as one because of the notion that a head is a man.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You can't teach a son to be loyal if the father is not loyal. The same applies with the mother and her daughter.
quotes.author: Mercy Pheona

quotes.quote: The American family is not simply changing; it is getting weaker. . . . Family decline drives some of our most urgent social problems. . . . The heart of the family problem lies in the steady breakup of the two-parent home.
quotes.author: David Popenoe

quotes.quote: A busy mother makes slothful daughters.
quotes.author: Portuguese Proverb

quotes.quote: Otherwise, you just become partners managing the kids and life, and that makes your marriage more vulnerable to problems down the road.
quotes.author: Laura Berman

quotes.quote: The old problems - love, money, security, status, health, etc. - are still here to plague us or please us.
quotes.author: Shelley Berman

quotes.quote: Pick a dysfunction and it's a family problem.
quotes.author: Robert Downey, Jr.

quotes.quote: Families and their problems go on and on, and they aren't solved, they're dealt with.
quotes.author: Roger Ebert

quotes.quote: I was the black sheep of the family, and my mother never really understood me.
quotes.author: Andre Rieu

quotes.quote: After every storm the sun will smile; for every problem there is a solution, and the soul's indefeasible duty is to be of good cheer.
quotes.author: William R. Alger

quotes.quote: The best way to resolve any problem in the human world is for all sides to sit down and talk.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: The two of you — father and son— should take walks in the evening and talk (without purpose or routes) about this and that.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: My father left me his words. From them I remember both his outlook on life and his voice, positive, and clear. He was someone who didn't worry about small problems. His advice here—leave it; let it go— is inspiring.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Where but in Kenya can a man whose grandfather was a cannibal watch a really good game of polo?
quotes.author: Marina Sulzberger

quotes.quote: Smartness runs in my family. When I went to school I was so smart my teacher was in my class for five years.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Sometimes life can be difficult. Life happens. From financial problems to struggling children to marital stress, a father could easily get bogged down in the day to day drudge
quotes.author: Brooke Jorden

quotes.quote: Insanity is hereditary; you get it from your children.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: A family harmony would make so essential a part of my happiness that I could never enjoy myself without it.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: We have been a scattered family. If some of my children could now be collected round the parent Hive it appears to me, that it would add much to the happiness of our declining years.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: I want to spend more time with my family, but I'm not sure they want to spend more time with me.
quotes.author: Esther Rantzen

quotes.quote: My father is a bastard / My Ma's an S.O.B./ My grandpa's always plastered / My grandma pushes tea / My sister wears a moustache / My brother wears a dress / Goodness gracious, that's why I'm a mess.
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: Parentage is a very important profession, but no test of fitness for it is ever imposed in the interest of the children.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: All happy families resemble one another, but each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Do not display to others your family's ugly problems.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: There is no school equal to decent home and no teachers equal to honest virtuous parents.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is too much stress today on material things. Teach your children not so much the value of cents but the sense of values.
quotes.author: Morris Franklin

quotes.quote: The family has become too scared of its children; the children too insecure in their remoteness from their parents; and the church too much of a social welfare organization for the good of the family, the church, or society.
quotes.author: A. Whitney Griswold

quotes.quote: The best legacy a parent can leave his children is more of his time every day.
quotes.author: O.A. Battista

quotes.quote: It is only necessary to make war with five things; / with the maladies of the body / the ignorances of the mind / with the passions of the body / with the seditions of the city / and the discords of families.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don't let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.author: Josiah Royce

quotes.quote: If we're sitting at dinner and there's no conversation going on because everybody's got their head someplace else in their iPhone, that's a family problem that needs to be solved.
quotes.author: Ross W. Greene

quotes.quote: The more you’re loving and understanding, the more your kids will sing.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagace

quotes.quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching — they are your family.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: Any woman who understands the problems of running a home will be nearer to understanding the problems of running a country.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: Nobody has ever before asked the nuclear family to live all by itself in a box the way we do. With no relatives, no support, we've put it in an impossible situation.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Reunion after long separation is even better than one's wedding night.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: I love family reunions. Maybe next year we could pass out samurai swords.
quotes.author: Doug Solter

quotes.quote: Perhaps the greatest social service that can be rendered by anybody to this country and to mankind is to bring up a family.
quotes.author: G.B. Shaw

quotes.quote: Important families are like potatoes. The best parts are underground.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Every man sees in his relatives, and especially in his cousins, a series of grotesque caricatures of himself.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Family reunion quilted with love grounded by memories.
quotes.author: Thompson

quotes.quote: At the end of the day, a loving family should find everything forgivable.
quotes.author: Mark V. Olsen

quotes.quote: Nothing like watching your relatives fight, I always say.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Know from whence you came because if you know from whence you came, there is no limit to where you can go.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: Our most basic instinct is not for survival but for family. Most of us would give our own life for the survival of a family member, yet we lead our daily life too often as if we take our family for granted.
quotes.author: Paul Pearshall

quotes.quote: I think the family is the place where the most ridiculous and least respectable things in the world go on.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: Heirlooms we don't have in our family. But stories we've got.
quotes.author: Rose Cherin

quotes.quote: If minutes were kept of a family gathering, they would show that Members not Present and Subjects Discussed were one and the same.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: You ought to try surviving one of my family reunions. It's like having a bowling alley in your brain.
quotes.author: Edna Buchanan

quotes.quote: Family faces are magic mirrors. Looking at people who belong to us, we see the past, present and future. We make discoveries about ourselves.
quotes.author: Gail Lumet Buckley

quotes.quote: A food truce, the picnic suspension of oedipal feeling that permits the generations to love each other at family reunions.
quotes.author: Karen Russell

quotes.quote: One of the things that binds us as a family is a shared sense of humor.
quotes.author: Ralph Fiennes

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: There's an awful lot of blood around that water is thicker than.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if your grandfather completely executes the pull my finger trick at the family reunion.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: If you don't believe in ghosts, you've never been to a family reunion.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Home is the place where, when you have to go there, they have to take you in.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood, but heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: The great gift of family life is to be intimately acquainted with people you might never even introduce yourself to, had life not done it for you.
quotes.author: Kendall Hailey

quotes.quote: Let us open wide the windows of our hearts, that each family member may feel welcome and at home.
quotes.author: Thomas S. Monson

quotes.quote: When our relatives are at home, we have to think of all their good points or it would be impossible to endure them.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: If you share a common ancestor with somebody, you're related to them. It doesn't mean that you're going to invite them to the family reunion, but it means that you share DNA. I think it's fascinating.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: I don't have to look up my family tree, because I know that I'm the sap.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: A family reunion is an effective form of birth control.
quotes.author: Heinlein

quotes.quote: Call it a clan, call it a network, call it a tribe, call it a family. Whatever you call it, whoever you are, you need one.
quotes.author: Jane Howard

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as fun for the whole family.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: When you look at your life, the greatest happinesses are family happinesses.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: My encounters with racism are sort of second-hand situations where I might be standing around with a group of white friends and someone makes a comment that they wouldn't make at my family reunion.
quotes.author: Wentworth Miller

quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Be a storehouse of happy memories.
quotes.author: Gretchen Rubin

quotes.quote: In a world of fugitives, the person taking the opposite direction will appear to run away.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other's life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: What greater blessing to give thanks for at a family gathering than the family and the gathering.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if you look upon a family reunion as a chance to meet Ms. Right.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: David Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: The happiest moments of my life have been the few which I have passed at home in the bosom of my family.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life!
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: One wants to be together with one's family. That's what families are about.
quotes.author: Aung San Suu Yuki

quotes.quote: One would be in less danger / From the wiles of the stranger / If one's own kin and kith / Were more fun to be with.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: It is no use telling me that there are bad aunts and good aunts. At the core, they are all alike. Sooner or later, out pops the cloven hoof.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Family!... the home of all social evil, a charitable institution for comfortable women, an anchorage for house-fathers, and a hell for children.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: As a rule, you see, I’m not lugged into Family Rows. On the occasions when Aunt is calling to Aunt like mastodons bellowing across primeval swamps and Uncle James’s letter about Cousin Mabel’s peculiar behaviour is being shot round the family circle...the clan has a tendency to ignore me.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one’s own relations.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The family. I believe more unhappiness comes from this source than from any other—I mean the attempt to prolong family connection unduly, and to make people hang together artificially who would never naturally do so.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Santa Claus has the right idea — visit people only once a year.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Some people stay longer in an hour than others can in a week.
quotes.author: William Dean Howells

quotes.quote: I'll never stop dreaming that one day we can be a real family, together, all of us laughing and talking, loving and understanding, not looking at the past but only to the future.
quotes.author: LaToya Jackson

quotes.quote: Cherish your human connections — your relationships with friends and family.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Family reunion? We'd all cut each other's throats for a dime.
quotes.author: Marjory Morgan

quotes.quote: Well, here we are, a family reunion and what a collection.
quotes.author: Cabot Barr

quotes.quote: I think the rumors might be true... that their parents met at a family reunion.
quotes.author: Roz

quotes.quote: Apparently there was a fire at the family reunion. Lucky for my Uncle Dean, he was not welcome at the event.
quotes.author: Walter Peralta

quotes.quote: Family reunions can be brutal. Our last one, we lost two cousins and a sheep dog.
quotes.author: Monroe

quotes.quote: Honey, driving across town to a family reunion, cooking, cleaning, organizing and budgeting is not fun and *not* a vacation! Yet, it's what I do with my free time.
quotes.author: Beth Newton

quotes.quote: Family reunions are about uniting the family, bringing together the young and old. Singing and dancing and thanking God, giving him the glory. Thanking him for getting us over.
quotes.author: Myrtle

quotes.quote: Let's celebrate, have a basement party / A barbeque how we used to do / On the avenue, have a family reunion / Man, how I miss those days
quotes.author: Bobby Bush; Jerry Duplessis; Guerschom Farel Jean; Wyclef Jean; Patti Labelle

quotes.quote: There's momsey Tiggers and popsey Tiggers / And Tiggers I never knew / Like uncle Tiggers and nephew Tiggers / And grandma Tiggers too / And when we Tiggers all get together / We really have a ball! / The bounciest, trounciest, flounciest, pounciest / Most tiggerifigest family reunion of all!
quotes.author: Richard M. Sherman; Robert B. Sherman

quotes.quote: How ya doin', must have been years / I didn't see you guys at all, the whole time she was here / Let's break out the bottle, the party's just begun / We're havin' us a family reunion
quotes.author: John Scott Sherrill; Pebe Sebert

quotes.quote: Everybody stop what you're doing / No crying, quit your boo-hooing / Sun be shinin' / Barbequing / It's about to be a family reunion
quotes.author: C. Smith; Kim L. Waters; Martiz Ware

quotes.quote: We'll have that family reunion / The one you dreamed of / Until the day you died / This time Mama he's gonna stay / Forever by your side
quotes.author: Chick Rains; Harlan Howard

quotes.quote: Our family reunion / I'd rather be anywhere but here / It's like a pain you shouldn't ignore / But my uncle's here to open the door, and I don't like him
quotes.author: Alexander O'Connor; Jeff Kleinman; Michael Ozowuru

quotes.quote: This family reunion / I felt so uncomfortable, I left / They all decided to stay / So it's just me and my mistakes
quotes.author: Alexander O'Connor; Jeff Kleinman; Michael Ozowuru

quotes.quote: Everyday should be a family reunion / We should speak / From the heart / And let love be the solution
quotes.author: Tony Nicholas; Gerald Levert

quotes.quote: We're still reminded-: sometimes by a rain, / but we can no longer say what it means; / life was never again so filled with meeting, / with reunion and with passing on
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: The only thing sweeter than union is reunion.
quotes.author: Kathleen McGowan

quotes.quote: Generations pass like leaves fall from our family tree. Each season new life blossoms and grows benefiting from the strength and experience of those who went before.
quotes.author: Heidi Swapp

quotes.quote: When our hearts turn to our ancestors, something changes inside us. We feel part of something greater than ourselves. Our inborn yearnings for family connections are fulfilled when we are linked to our ancestors.
quotes.author: Russell M. Nelson

quotes.quote: No matter how you feel about your extended family or family gatherings you will be attending. This is because now the ultimate reason for attending family gatherings is for your children to have the time of their lives with their cousins. Little kids love their cousins. I’m not being cute or exaggerating here. Cousins are like celebrities for little kids. If little kids had a People magazine, cousins would be on the cover. Cousins are the barometers of how fun a family get-together will be. “Are the cousins going to be there? Fun!
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Some family trees bear an enormous crop of nuts.
quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.quote: Some family trees bear an enormous crop of nuts.
quotes.author: Wayne Huizenga

quotes.quote: Ugh, I'd like to go to JUST ONE family reunion where I don't run into someone I know.
quotes.author: Keaton Patti

quotes.quote: The strength of a family, like the strength of an army, is in its loyalty to each other.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Life is a secret lease from God and we should not allow ourselves to be bruised. Family life is our strength and success.
quotes.author: Joseph Losery

quotes.quote: Our family is a circle of strength and love...Our family with every birth and every union the circle grows, our family is a circle of strength. Every crisis faced together makes the circle stronger.
quotes.author: Harriet Morgan

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Families are the compass that guide us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: The strength of a nation derives from the integrity of the home.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Everyone needs to live within a house. But, having the love and support of your family? That is what makes your house a home.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Is this what family is like: the feeling that everyone's connected, that with one piece missing, the whole thing's broken?
quotes.author: Trenton Lee Stewart

quotes.quote: Like the seaweed that clings to each other after each passing boat separates them, so too a family will come together with the passing of each crisis.
quotes.author: Indonesian Proverb

quotes.quote: Families survive, one way or another. You have a tie, a connection that exists long after death, through many lifetimes.
quotes.author: Jessica Lange

quotes.quote: My sense of personal strength has always come from my family.
quotes.author: Benjamin Bratt

quotes.quote: I learned about the strength you can get from a close family life. I learned to keep going, even in bad times. I learned not to despair, even when my world was falling apart. I learned that there are no free lunches. And I learned the value of hard work.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Without a family, man, alone in the world, trembles with the cold.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: The only strength that really matters is the strength that makes you what you are in the eyes of those you love.
quotes.author: Wes Fessler

quotes.quote: If the family were a boat, it would be a canoe that makes no progress unless everyone paddles.
quotes.author: Letty Cottin Pogrebin

quotes.quote: I can get up in the morning and look myself in the mirror and my family can look at me too and that's all that matters.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong

quotes.quote: In time of test, family is best.
quotes.author: Burmese Proverb

quotes.quote: We cannot destroy kindred: our chains stretch a little sometimes, but they never break.
quotes.author: Marquise de Sevigne

quotes.quote: A man has to travel the world. It can help him find what he needs. But, when he returns home, he knows that he has found it.
quotes.author: George Moore

quotes.quote: While at work, keep a picture of your family on your desk. This reminds you that there is another world of yours at home.
quotes.author: M. K. Soni

quotes.quote: My family. I realized they are the most important part of my life. Throughout the year I had many challenges, but my family were always there offering support and encouragement.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: As the family goes, so goes the nation and so goes the whole world in which we live.
quotes.author: John Paul II

quotes.quote: Just as a house needs a foundation in order to stand firm, so does a person.
quotes.author: Jacquie McTaggart

quotes.quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: My family comes first. Maybe that's what makes me different from other guys.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.quote: When trouble comes, it's your family that supports you.
quotes.author: Guy Lafleur

quotes.quote: The happiest moments of my life have been the few which I have passed at home in the bosom of my family.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Family strengthen each other during storms. They help us to be strong. After all, it is a family tradition. Our roots are deeper, our hearts are stronger, we never give up.
quotes.author: Karen L Madewell

quotes.quote: You know sit with your arm around a little kid and read. It not only teaches them to read but it keeps the family strong.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: We will respect family life. We will develop it and encourage it in any way we can, for strong families are the foundation of strong communities.
quotes.author: Tony Blair

quotes.quote: I sustain myself with the love of family.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Family life contributes immensely to an individual's happiness. Only in a happy home life can complete contentment be found.
quotes.author: Dorthea Kopplin

quotes.quote: Where can a person be better than in the bosom of their family.
quotes.author: Marmontel Gretry

quotes.quote: When the head of the family dies, that family breaks up.
quotes.author: Swahili Proverb

quotes.quote: Families are about love overcoming emotional torture.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Family strength is a marvellous thing.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: My family is my strength and my weakness.
quotes.author: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: Other things may change us, but we start and end with the family.
quotes.author: Anthony Brandt

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Where will our country find leaders with integrity, courage, strength-all the family values-in ten, twenty, or thirty years? The answer is that you are teaching them, loving them, and raising them right now.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Family prayer is a fourth vital link in the chain of spiritual strength - a strength we are trying to build to protect us from a world gone mad. Practicing prayer as a family, not just a flippant blessing before a meal, can give us the security we need.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The love of family and the admiration of friends is much more important than wealth and privilege.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: Nothing purchased can come close to the renewed sense of gratitude for having family and friends.
quotes.author: Courtland Milloy

quotes.quote: That which you love most will then become both your strength and your weakness.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: You don’t choose your family. They are God’s gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of work to put together a marriage, to put together a family and a home.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Edwards

quotes.quote: A godly mother loves God with all her heart, soul, mind, and strength. And she passionately and consistently teaches her children to do the same.
quotes.author: Elizabeth George

quotes.quote: The strength of a man is in his character. A strong man is great man of wisdom who understands, his top priority is to his family.
quotes.author: Ellen J. Barrier

quotes.quote: In family life, love is the oil that eases friction, the cement that binds closer together, and the music that brings harmony.
quotes.author: Eva Burrows

quotes.quote: Family quarrels are bitter things. They don’t go according to any rules. They’re not like aches or wounds, they’re more like splits in the skin that won’t heal because there’s not enough material.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: You can kiss your family and friends good-bye and put miles between you, but at the same time you carry them with you in your heart, your mind, your stomach, because you do not just live in a world but a world lives in you.
quotes.author: Frederick Buechner

quotes.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Family is a life jacket in the stormy sea of life.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Many men can make a fortune, but very few can build a family.
quotes.author: J.S. Bryan

quotes.quote: Family is a unique gift that needs to be appreciated and treasured, even when they’re driving you crazy. As much as they make you mad, interrupt you, annoy you, curse at you, try to control you, these are the people who know you the best and who love you.
quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

quotes.quote: When everything goes to hell, the people who stand by you without flinching — they are your family.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don’t let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.author: Josiah

quotes.quote: My friends and family are my support system. They tell me what I need to hear, not what I want to hear, and they are there for me in the good times and bad times. Without them I have no idea where I would be and I know that their love for me is what's keeping my head above the water.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: You are blood. You are sisters. No man can break that bond.
quotes.author: Kim Boykin

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The informality of family life is a blessed condition that allows us all to become our best while looking our worst.
quotes.author: Marge Kennedy

quotes.quote: Love is the foundation of strength in a family.
quotes.author: Melissa Foster

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing. It’s everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: What can you do to promote world peace? Go home and love your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: The multiple angry assaults on the "traditional family" are the rotten fruit of Christians corrupting the beauty and strength of the "covenantal family" of the Bible into the hated "hierarchical family" of the stereotypes so loved by feminists and others.
quotes.author: Os Guinness

quotes.quote: The Canis Lupus, both wolf and man, were meant to be a family with one another. We gain strength through our bond with each other.
quotes.author: Quinn Loftis

quotes.quote: Family life is too intimate to be preserved by the spirit of justice. It can be sustained by a spirit of love which goes beyond justice.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life. Rarely do members of the same family grow up under the same roof.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Families are messy. Immortal families are eternally messy. Sometimes the best we can do is to remind each other that we’re related for better or for worse and try to keep the maiming and killing to a minimum.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: Whenever a woman strengthens the faith of a child, she contributes to the strength of a family - now and in the future.
quotes.author: The Church Of Jesus Christ Of Latter-day Saints

quotes.quote: No ordinary work done by a man is either as hard or as responsible as the work of a woman who is bringing up a family of small children; for upon her time and strength demands are made not only every hour of the day but often every hour of the night.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Families are like branches on a tree. We grow in different directions, yet our roots remain as one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family. A little bit of crazy, a little bit of loud and a whole lot of love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family–we may not have it all together, but together we have it all.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family: Where life begins and love never ends.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love your family. Spend time, be kind and serve one another. Make no room for regrets. Tomorrow is not promised and today is short.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them and enjoy their riches
quotes.author: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.quote: There is no doubt that it is around the family and the home that all the greatest virtues, the most dominating virtues of human society, are created, strengthened and maintained.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: At the end of your life, you will never regret not having passed one more test, not winning one more verdict, or not closing one more deal. You will regret time not spent with a husband, a friend, a child, a parent.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Your family and your love must be cultivated like a garden. Time, effort, and imagination must be summoned constantly to keep any relationship flourishing and growing.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you want to change the world, go home and love your family.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Love your family. Spend time, be kind and serve one another. Make no room for regrets. Tomorrow is not promised and today is short.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: In family relationships, love is really spelled T.I.M.E.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Family is not an important thing. It's everything.
quotes.author: Michael J. Fox

quotes.quote: If you want your children to turn out well, spend twice as much time with them and half as much money.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Rejoice with your family in the beautiful land of life!
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If you are too busy to enjoy time with your family, then you need to reevaluate your priorities.
quotes.author: Dave Willis

quotes.quote: Be sure to spend time with your parents while you can, because one day when you look up from your busy life, they won't be there anymore!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family time is sacred time and should be protected and respected.
quotes.author: Boyd K. Packer

quotes.quote: Do you spend time with your family? Good. Because a man that doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man.
quotes.author: Marlon Brando

quotes.quote: Valuing time with your family does not mean you've lost your ambition. Define success for yourself.
quotes.author: Claire Shipman

quotes.quote: A man should never neglect his family for business.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Your children can be around you all day, but if you don't spend quality time with them and you don't pay attention to them and talk to them and listen to them, it doesn't matter that they're just around you.
quotes.author: Brandy Norwood

quotes.quote: This is part of what a family is about, not just love. It's knowing that your family will be there watching out for you. Nothing else will give you that. Not money. Not fame. Not work.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Whether anybody was home meant everything to a house. It was more than a major fact: it was the only fact ... The family was the house's soul.
quotes.author: Jonathan Franzen

quotes.quote: Family is the most important thing in the world.
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: No amount of money or success can take the place of time spent with your family.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your children get only one childhood. Make it memorable.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: I think togetherness is a very important ingredient to family life.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
quotes.author: Robert Foster Bennett

quotes.quote: Having family time to reflect on your day is the best.
quotes.author: Buddy Valastro

quotes.quote: Time spent with family is worth every second.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I don't think quantity time is as special as quality time with your family.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Sticking with your family is what makes it a family.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: Family time is the best time.
quotes.author: Carmelo Anthony

quotes.quote: No matter what, it's family time over everything.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Going home and spending time with your family and your real friends keeps you grounded.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.quote: You need to make time for your family no matter what happens in your life.
quotes.author: Matthew Quick

quotes.quote: We must take care of our families wherever we find them.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Your cell phone has already replaced your watch, alarm clock and calendar. Don't let it replace your family.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Family is a life jacket in the stormy sea of life.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: It’s very important to prioritize. I know, for me, my family comes first. That makes every decision very easy.
quotes.author: Jada Pinkett Smith

quotes.quote: My family is my life, and everything else comes second as far as what’s important to me.
quotes.author: Michael Imperioli

quotes.quote: Your plays are read in family ciFcles with wonder and delight, While seated around the fireside on a cold winter's night.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: Four level highways across the land We're building a home for the family of man
quotes.author: Jack Conrad, Paul Williams

quotes.quote: I will fight for my family until my last breath.You know, difficulties aside, I value my family above everything. I am sorry that yours failed you.
quotes.author: Julie Plec

quotes.quote: In today's fast-paced world, it can be challenging to make time for your family. However, family is a strong value among many people.
quotes.author: Ace McCloud

quotes.quote: Making your spare time to look towards the precious things you have, the pastimes, and family makes life more satisfied and agreeable, as well as it will definitely help you in being more concentrated at work as well.
quotes.author: Adam Green

quotes.quote: In every conceivable manner, the family is a link to our past, bridge to our future.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: I just wanna protect my family. You'd do the same thing.These are choices everyone has to make. It is my family first!
quotes.author: Ali Adler, Greg Berlanti, Andrew Kreisberg

quotes.quote: I find the family the most mysterious and fascinating institution in the world.
quotes.author: Amos Oz

quotes.quote: And life could be so wonderful / A perfect home and a family / When you're lying next to me
quotes.author: Andy Wright,Mick Hucknall

quotes.quote: You leave home to seek your fortune and, when you get it, you go home and share it with your family.
quotes.author: Anita Baker

quotes.quote: When in doubt, choose the kids. There will be plenty of time later to choose work.”
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: Everyone needs a house to live in, but a supportive family is what builds a home.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: We're family. We believe in each other. That's everything.
quotes.author: Anthony McCarten

quotes.quote: The great thing about exercising with older kids is the fact that they need exercise as much as you do. Make the most of this by making exercise a family affair.
quotes.author: Ashlee Meadows

quotes.quote: Two arms around me / Heaven to ground me / And a family that always calls me home
quotes.author: Ashley Monroe, Sarah Siskind

quotes.quote: Family is your most reliable source of support in any situation because love from your family is unconditional.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Family means no one gets left behind or forgotten.
quotes.author: avid Ogden Stiers

quotes.quote: To us, family means putting your arms around each other and being there.
quotes.author: Barbara Bush

quotes.quote: Families are the tie that reminds us of yesterday, provide strength and support today, and give us hope for tomorrow. No government, no matter how well-intentioned, or well-managed, can provide what our families provide.
quotes.author: Bill Owens

quotes.quote: A Christian has a tremendous responsibilities to his own family.He or she has a responsibility of loving each member of the family.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Some of the most important conversations I’ve ever had occurred at my family’s dinner table.
quotes.author: Bob Ehrlich

quotes.quote: Families are the compass that guide us. They are the inspiration to reach great heights, and our comfort when we occasionally falter.
quotes.author: Brad Henry

quotes.quote: Everything I've learned persuades me it's possible to give our children a strong family culture they can carry with them throughout their lives.It's possible to have a happy family.
quotes.author: Bruce Feiler

quotes.quote: It's not a family without a children.We are going to keep this family together.
quotes.author: Carolyn Lefcourt , Brian Garfield

quotes.quote: Listen earnestly to anything your children want to tell you, no matter what. If you don’t listen eagerly to the little stuff when they are little, they won’t tell you the big stuff when they are big, because to them all of it has always been big stuff.
quotes.author: Catherine M. Wallace

quotes.quote: A family is a place where principles are hammered and honed on the anvil of everyday living.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: I never asked for a lot, I was happy with what I got / Enough to keep my family and my home.
quotes.author: Christy Moore

quotes.quote: I love spending time with my friends and family. The simplest things in life give me the most pleasure: cooking a good meal, enjoying my friends.
quotes.author: Cindy Morgan

quotes.quote: I believe family first. Blood is thicker than water. I grew up like that, and I want to continue to keep that goal in my heart. Just family first! Just honesty, integrity, and respect. All of that. I live by the code of those things. If you do that you’ll be fine.
quotes.author: Cory Hardrict

quotes.quote: Family comes first. 'Family, Duty, Honor'. How can she protect the family if she is not with her family?
quotes.author: David Benioff & D.B. Weiss

quotes.quote: Its family time its family time its family time / Now the world gets busy but its not hard to see / Family means the most to me / I'm so happy we found this time / We can all share whats on our minds
quotes.author: David Nesta Marley

quotes.quote: No other success can compensate for failure in the home.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: If anyone looked in on us that day, they would've seen a normal family. Sure, we had our problems, what family doesn't? From the outside it was close to perfect, on the inside, I was screaming.
quotes.author: Deborah Serra

quotes.quote: You don’t choose your family. They are God’s gift to you, as you are to them.
quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

quotes.quote: Life is indeed short. All of us are given the same hours in a day.What's important is how we use those hours.How can you enmjoy a happier family if you dont have time together as a family?
quotes.author: Dr. Kevin Leman

quotes.quote: You can have a happier family by Firday.In fact,you can have one by Wednesday.. or even by the end of today! And it has everything to do with you.You can change your family's world.
quotes.author: Dr. Kevin Leman

quotes.quote: Think how really precious is the time you have to spend, whether it's at work or with your family. Every minute should be enjoyed and savored.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: My family had been / In refuge / Everywhere / I did not stay, at one place / Since my childhood / I have a large family
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: The ultimate treasures on earth and in heaven are our children.
quotes.author: Elder Dallin H. Oaks

quotes.quote: My family needs me more than I need me / I won’t let them see me cry / I’m fading faster than I want / Then I see the Twinkle in their eye
quotes.author: Gary Dacus

quotes.quote: A happy family is but an earlier heaven.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The family is one of nature’s masterpieces.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Families is where our nation finds hope, where wings take dream.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Family shouldn't leave family. I'll always love you. Family. She protected us.
quotes.author: Greg Berlanti, Geoff Johns, Andrew Kreisberg

quotes.quote: If love isn't thought at home, it is almost impossible to learn it any-where else.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: The family defines our past and shapes our character.It is here were we learn the important lessons of self-discipline, the art of compromise, forgiveness, hocnedsty, and fair play.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Please stay. There's nothing better than a happy family.
quotes.author: Jay Sommers & Dick Chevillat

quotes.quote: Family is a unique gift that needs to be appreciated and treasured, even when they’re driving you crazy. As much as they make you mad, interrupt you, annoy you, curse at you, try to control you, these are the people who know you the best and who love you.
quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

quotes.quote: Sunday, for me, is all about being home with the family with no plans.
quotes.author: John Lasseter

quotes.quote: I have a wonderful shelter, which is my family. I have a wonderful relationship with my brother and sister; this makes me feel that I know always where I belong.
quotes.author: Jose Carreras

quotes.quote: The family is the most important organization in time or in eternity. Our purpose in life is to create for ourselves eternal family units.
quotes.author: Joseph Fielding Smith

quotes.quote: Think of your family today and every day thereafter, don’t let the busy world of today keep you from showing how much you love and appreciate your family.
quotes.author: Josiah

quotes.quote: My friends and family are my support system... Without them I have no idea where I would be.
quotes.author: Kelly Clarkson

quotes.quote: Finding happiness in the chaos of parenting life seems impossible most days.Until recently,I really did believe it was possible.
quotes.author: Kelly Holmes

quotes.quote: Going around causing disturbances / Don't you know you'll never win / You've got your family running around / Trying to stop you from going down
quotes.author: Kendell Smith, Thomas G. Lowry, Neville Staple, Sheena Staple

quotes.quote: It is more important than ever to make our families the center of our lives and the top of our priorities.
quotes.author: L. Tom Perry
