quotes.quote: The only rock I know that stays steady, the only institution I know that works, is the family.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Being a family means you are a part of something very wonderful. It means you will love and be loved for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Lisa Weedn

quotes.quote: The world, we'd discovered, doesn't love you like your family loves you.
quotes.author: Louis Zamperini

quotes.quote: Indeed, nothing is more critically connected to happiness—both our own and that of our children—than how well we love and support one another within the family.
quotes.author: M. Russell Ballard

quotes.quote: In truth, a family is what you make it. It is made strong, not by number of heads counted at the dinner table, but by the rituals you help family members create, by the memories you share, by the commitment of time, caring, and love...
quotes.author: Marge Kennedy

quotes.quote: Home should be an anchor, a port in a storm, a refuge, a happy place in which to dwell, a place where we are loved and where we can love.
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: Family time is precious , so finding even a few minutes can be a challenge.So whenever you find each other,savor the moments.Time with loveones is a gift from God.
quotes.author: Mary Manz Simon, Fátima Anaya

quotes.quote: The more you’re loving and understanding, the more your kids will sing.
quotes.author: Maxime Lagacé

quotes.quote: It is for parents to teach young people early on that in diversity fthere is beauty and there is strength.
quotes.author: Maya Anggelou

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is harder for us to smile at those who live with us, the immediate members of our families, than it is to smile at those who are not so close to us. Let us never forget: love begins at home.
quotes.author: Mother Teresa

quotes.quote: Think about the endless odes of blissful love that she'd receive; amidst the philanthropically synergistic members of your unceasingly caring family
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Yeah, they were sowin' love for the family / They were sowin' love, they took a little extra time / Lookin' forward to a bountiful harvest / They took good care of us they were sowin' love / Yeah, they did it all for us they were sowin' love
quotes.author: Paul Overstreet and Don Schlitz

quotes.quote: The family is the first essential cell of human society.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: I've been to the mountain top / I've been to the valley low / The one thing that never stopped / Was the love that my family showed / When my mama she passed away / My papa he gave us hope / He said there won't ever come a day / When your family won't help you cope
quotes.author: Prince Rogers Nelson

quotes.quote: When a believer spends something on his family intending to receive Allah's reward, it is charity for him.
quotes.author: Prophet Muhammad

quotes.quote: Creating a beautiful family culture is to be proactive.
quotes.author: Rashid Rashad

quotes.quote: The bond that links your true family is not one of blood, but of respect and joy in each other’s life.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Children will not remember you for the material things you provided, but for the feeling that you cherished them.
quotes.author: Richard L. Evans

quotes.quote: family is everything. We care for our parents and our children with equal devotion. In some houses 4 generations eat at the same table. Family - is everything.
quotes.author: Rick Berman, Michael Piller

quotes.quote: Every family will supply one man. / Loyal, brave, and true... it is my duty to protect my family.
quotes.author: Rick Jaffa , Amanda Silver

quotes.quote: One’s family is the most important thing in life. I look at it this way: One of these days I’ll be over in a hospital somewhere with four walls around me. And the only people who’ll be with me will be my family.
quotes.author: Robert Byrd

quotes.quote: She (Mother Teresa) encouraged that even if we are feeling overwhelmed we should try to 'make one point' and 'make time for each other in your family'.
quotes.author: Scarlett Johnson

quotes.quote: A family is a place where minds come in contact with one another.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Family life is the best method for achieving happiness in this world, and it is a clear pattern given to us from the Lord about what is to be in the next world.
quotes.author: Spencer W. Kimbal

quotes.quote: Unconditional love is loving your kids for who they are, not for what they do… it isn’t something you will achieve every minute of every day. But it is the thought we must hold in our hearts every day.
quotes.author: Stephanie Marston

quotes.quote: Keep it together in the family / They're a reminder of your history / Brothers and sisters they hold the key / To your heart and your soul / Don't forget that your family is gold
quotes.author: Stephen Pate Bray, Madonna Ciccone

quotes.quote: It is amazing just where you can source that extra time. Even taking a child to school can be a time of togetherness where you can talk to each other ....
quotes.author: T. K Oliver

quotes.quote: The ability of a family to work hand in hand and to successfully manage every event that takes their time on a daily basis is the key to a successful family.
quotes.author: T. P Stone

quotes.quote: Parents are usually the most important influence in thier childrens lives.
quotes.author: Timothy Smith

quotes.quote: Family and friends are hidden treasures, seek them out and enjoy their riches.
quotes.author: Wanda Hope Carter

quotes.quote: There is no doubt that it is around the family and the home that all the greatest virtues, the most dominating virtues of humans, are created, strengthened and maintained.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: A man without ethics is a wild beast loosed upon this world.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Without ethics, man has no future. This is to say, mankind without them cannot be itself. Ethics determine choices and actions and suggest difficult priorities.
quotes.author: John Berger

quotes.quote: Ethics is the activity of man directed to secure the inner perfection of his own personality.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Ethics and equity and the principles of justice do not change with the calendar.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A people and their religion must be judged by social standards based on social ethics. No other standard would have any meaning if religion is held to be necessary good for the well-being of the people.
quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar

quotes.quote: It is forbidden to kill; therefore all murderers are punished unless they kill in large numbers and to the sound of trumpets.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: We colour and mould according to the wants within us whatever our eyes bring in.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: The disappearance of a sense of responsibility is the most far-reaching consequence of submission to authority.
quotes.author: Stanley Milgram

quotes.quote: True education does not consist merely in the acquiring of a few facts of science, history, literature, or art, but in the development of character.
quotes.author: David O. McKay

quotes.quote: Virtue is more to be feared than vice, because its excesses are not subject to the regulation of conscience.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: True religion is real living; living with all one's soul, with all one's goodness and righteousness.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Man's duty is to improve himself; to cultivate his mind; and, when he finds himself going astray, to bring the moral law to bear upon himself.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: If it is not right do not do it; if it is not true do not say it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The truth of the matter is that you always know the right thing to do. The hard part is doing it.
quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: The meaning of good and bad, of better and worse, is simply helping or hurting.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: We do not act rightly because we have virtue or excellence, but we rather have those because we have acted rightly.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Price is what you pay. Value is what you get.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: To see what is right and not to do it is want of courage
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: The more they applaud, the bigger your salary will be.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.quote: Famous, adj.: Conspicuously miserable.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Being famous is such a gift for me because small things make people's lives brighter. You just shake somebody's hand. You just smile and write your name and people will talk about it for the rest of their lives.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: A man who is contented with what he has done will never become famous for what he will do.
quotes.author: Fred Estabrook

quotes.quote: The life of famous men was more glorious in antiquity; the life of obscure men is happier with the moderns.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: When you become famous, being famous becomes your profession.
quotes.author: James Carville

quotes.quote: The fellow that can only see a week ahead is always the popular fellow, for he is looking with the crowd. But the one that can see years ahead, he has a telescope but he can't make anybody believe that he has it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: There have been as great souls unknown to fame as any of the most famous.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The good part about being famous is being able to help people. The hard part is every day you have to be in a good mood, because that is what people expect. You learn to get good at it.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: All is ephemeral, - fame and the famous as well.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: What a heavy burden is a name that has become too famous.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: I handle fame by not being famous. I'm not famous to me.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: To be a star is to own the world and all the people in it. After a taste of stardom, everything else is poverty.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: To be famous is to stand on a pedestal and give the world permission to tell you all your flaws.
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Wood burns because it has the proper stuff in it; and a man becomes famous because he has the proper stuff in him.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: Once you become famous, there is nothing left to become but infamous.
quotes.author: Don Johnson

quotes.quote: Before a man can wake up and find himself famous he has to wake up and find himself.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Cheerfulness and contentment are great beautifiers, and are famous preservers of good looks
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Indeed, wretched the man whose fame makes his misfortunes famous.
quotes.author: Lucius Accius

quotes.quote: People think being famous is so glamorous, but half the time you're in a strange hotel room living out of a suitcase.
quotes.author: Ja Rule

quotes.quote: I think that fame removes true happiness. Because when you are famous, people know you for who they think you are and when you are happy, it's because people have met you and see you for who you really are. Of course, if you are not a great person, it's better to be famous. But if you have greatness, it's better to not be famous.
quotes.author: C. JoyBell C.

quotes.quote: I think everybody should get rich and famous and do everything they ever dreamed of so they can see that it's not the answer.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Exposure makes you famous, not just good work. Famous is being plastered everywhere.
quotes.author: Francesca Annis

quotes.quote: Becoming famous is a strange thing in your own right.
quotes.author: Carnie Wilson

quotes.quote: The whole earth is the sepulchre of famous men.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: A celebrity is a person who works hard all of their life to become well known, and then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: It is a mark of many famous people that they cannot part with their brightest hour.
quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

quotes.quote: To enjoy being famous, you need to have a screw loose.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.quote: A good listener is not only popular everywhere, but after a while he gets to know something.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: We all want to be famous people, and the moment we want to be something we are no longer free.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to be famous, but nobody wants to do the work.
quotes.author: Kevin Hart

quotes.quote: I always like to say to people who want to be rich and famous, try being rich first. See if that doesn't cover most of it.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: Those who have known the famous are publicly debriefed of their memories, knowing as their own dusk falls that they will only be remembered for remembering someone else.
quotes.author: Alan Bennett

quotes.quote: Martyrdom... is the only way in which a man can become famous without ability.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Famous men have the whole earth as their memorial.
quotes.author: Pericles

quotes.quote: A fantastic positive ATTITUDE makes a great day! SMILE!
quotes.author: Mary D. Bradford

quotes.quote: One of the more fantastic possibilities is that man will be able to make biological carbon copies of himself.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: What's fantastic is that there's a real growing appreciation for performance-capture technology as a tool for acting.
quotes.author: Andy Serkis

quotes.quote: It is fantastic to be found in a foreign country.
quotes.author: Ed O'Brien

quotes.quote: The more fantastic an ideology or theology, the more fanatic its adherents.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The fantastic cannot exist independently of that 'real' world which it seems to find frustratingly finite.
quotes.author: Rosemary Jackson

quotes.quote: A fantastic model of collaboration: thinking partners who aren't echo chambers.
quotes.author: Margaret Heffernan

quotes.quote: It's not that I wear fantastic clothes, it's just that clothes look fantastic on me.
quotes.author: Shahrukh Khan

quotes.quote: There are a few really fantastic stories left, and that kind of gives you some inspiration to find even new ones.
quotes.author: Malik Bendjelloul

quotes.quote: It's a fantastic thing to take the risk of getting so close to your desire, expressing your obsession so absolutely.
quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

quotes.quote: Here we are in this wholly fantastic universe with scarcely a clue as to whether our existence has any real significance.
quotes.author: Fred Hoyle

quotes.quote: Fantastic things happen - to the way we feel, to the way we make other people feel. All this simply by using positive words.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: One of the fantastic things about books, fiction or non-fiction, is the way they give you a chance to look into different lives.
quotes.author: Gillian Cross

quotes.quote: It's fantastic to put your hands in the earth. I enjoy spending my time in heaven here. I don't care what you say, this is my heaven.
quotes.author: Roy Harper

quotes.quote: It's fantastic that the world is becoming more open to different ways of working, but we still have a long way to go in terms of changing perceptions.
quotes.author: Maynard Webb

quotes.quote: There is incredible value in being of service to others.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: It is incredible how rich you can get by not being perfect.
quotes.author: Larry Hite

quotes.quote: The most incredible thing about miracles is that they happen.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.quote: There is, in fact, an incredible freedom in having nothing left to lose.
quotes.author: Marya Hornbacher

quotes.quote: Incredible things can be done simply if we are committed to making them happen.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: It's incredible to have people show their support when your doing something you love.
quotes.author: Louis Tomlinson

quotes.quote: It is incredible, when you start believing in angels your life becomes a lot smoother.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: The incredible thing about the human mind is that is didn't come with an instruction book.
quotes.author: Terry Riley

quotes.quote: A thing may be incredible and still be true; sometimes it is incredible because it is true.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: A thing is incredible, if ever, only after it is told -- returned to the world it came out of.
quotes.author: Eudora Welty

quotes.quote: It's incredible to realize that what we do each day has meaning in the big picture of God's plan.
quotes.author: Bill Hybels

quotes.quote: It's incredible how many emotions you feel when crossing the finish line and seeing that you are No. 1.
quotes.author: Marcel Hirscher

quotes.quote: The most incredible beauty and the most satisfying way of life come from affirming your own uniqueness.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: There is incredible generosity in the potentialities of Nature. We only have to discover how to utilize them.
quotes.author: E.F. Schumacher

quotes.quote: Anything that we think is incredible and beautiful and wonderful, we ascribe to something that we don't know what it is.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: It's incredible how nature sets females up to take care of people, and yet it is tricky for them to take care of themselves.
quotes.author: Bjork

quotes.quote: It's so fantastic for young kids to see a superhero going through the things they go through.
quotes.author: Tom Holland

quotes.quote: It's just fantastic to go out and meet people in the world and get to really remote places.
quotes.author: Ewan McGregor

quotes.quote: It's fantastic because I've been living thousands of lives, not only my life.
quotes.author: Claudia Cardinale

quotes.quote: In science fiction a fantastic event or development is considered rationally.
quotes.author: James Gunn

quotes.quote: The strangest and most fantastic fact about negative emotions is that people actually worship them.
quotes.author: P. D. Ouspensky

quotes.quote: It is so fantastic being an actress because you have the chance to be a thousand different people when you act.
quotes.author: Maria Grazia Cucinotta

quotes.quote: Fantastic fiction covers fantasy, horror and science fiction - and it doesn't get the attention it deserves from the literati.
quotes.author: China Mieville

quotes.quote: Our fantastic civilization has fallen out of touch with many aspects of nature, and with none more completely than with night.
quotes.author: Henry Beston

quotes.quote: I know that the fantastic amount of profit that people want to make on anything is damaging. And that none of us seem able to resist it.
quotes.author: Jamaica Kincaid

quotes.quote: It seems a fantastic paradox, but it is nevertheless a most important truth, that no architecture can be truly noble which is not imperfect.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: It's fantastic to have the opportunity to work abroad, and do all that, but there is a certain point where you're just like, 'Oh, I'd love to work at home.'
quotes.author: Keira Knightley

quotes.quote: There is incredible power in the arts to inspire and influence.
quotes.author: Julie Taymor

quotes.quote: People do incredible things for love, particularly for unrequited love.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: It is incredible how far women have come and women in sports have come.
quotes.author: Jennie Finch

quotes.quote: It's incredible how much intelligence is used in this world to prove nonsense.
quotes.author: Christian Friedrich Hebbel

quotes.quote: You are an incredible child of God having a dream that you are a human being on a tiny planet in the middle of nowhere.
quotes.author: Drunvalo Melchizedek

quotes.quote: Imagination is everything. It is the preview of life's coming attractions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Fantasy, if it's really convincing, can't become dated, for the simple reason that it represents a flight into a dimension that lies beyond the reach of time.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The pleasures of the imagination are as it were only drawings and models which are played with by poor people who cannot afford the real thing.
quotes.author: Georg Christoph Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: All fantasy should have a solid base in reality.
quotes.author: Max Beerbohm

quotes.quote: Fiction is an improvement on life.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: The interesting thing is how one guy, through living out his own fantasies, is living out the fantasies of so many other people.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: Stories of imagination tend to upset those without one.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
quotes.author: Lloyd Alexander

quotes.quote: I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: All truth is very ordinary. It is peoples fantasies of what is true that is so extraordinary.
quotes.author: Brian Perkins

quotes.quote: Fantasy allows you to get past defenses.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Moon

quotes.quote: People's fantasies are what give them problems. If you didn't have fantasies you wouldn't have problems because you'd just take whatever was there.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: My single-minded aim is to give existence to fantasy.
quotes.author: Claes Oldenburg

quotes.quote: Fantasy is one of the soul's brighter porcelains.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: Open the window of fantasy to know what reality can bring.
quotes.author: Raul D. Arellano

quotes.quote: We live in a fantasy world, a world of illusion. The great task in life is to find reality.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: We are lucky that our fantasy is for the picking. We can go back in time, stand still, or go forward.
quotes.author: Lida van Bers

quotes.quote: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: But in fantasy, you can make a complete break, and you can put people in a situation where they are confronted with things that they would not confront in the real world.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Moon

quotes.quote: Fantasy mirrors desire. Imagination reshapes it.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Fantasy is toxic: the private cruelty and the world war both have their start in the heated brain.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Fantasy, abandoned by reason, produces impossible monsters; united with it, she is the mother of the arts and the origin of marvels.
quotes.author: Francisco de Goya

quotes.quote: I've always said fantasy is sort of stealth philosophy.
quotes.author: Terry Goodkind

quotes.quote: As unrealistic as fairy tales always are, if there wasn't a reality that we could translate into our own fantasy, in our own life, it would be boring. The interest is only because of a potential reality.
quotes.author: Jan Harlan

quotes.quote: We don't create a fantasy world to escape reality. We create it to be able to stay.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: Without this playing with fantasy no creative work has ever yet come to birth. The debt we owe to the play of the imagination is incalculable.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: People frequently believe the creative life is grounded in fantasy. The more difficult truth is that creativity is grounded in reality, in the particular, the focused, the well observed or specifically imagined.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: I think the more stressful our times get, the more we look for fantasy escapes.
quotes.author: Jeri Ryan

quotes.quote: Creating fantasy is a very personal thing, but you can't take the process too personally.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbera

quotes.quote: Fantasies are more than substitutes for unpleasant reality; they are also dress rehearsals, plans. All acts performed in the world begin in the imagination.
quotes.author: Barbara Grizzuti Harrison

quotes.quote: When you compare the sorrows of real life to the pleasures of the imaginary one, you will never want to live again, only to dream forever.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: When fantasy turns you on, you're obligated to God and nature to start doing it right away.
quotes.author: Stewart Brand

quotes.quote: Humans need fantasy to be human. To be the place where the falling angel meets the rising ape.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The poet is in command of his fantasy, while it is exactly the mark of the neurotic that he is possessed by his fantasy.
quotes.author: Lionel Trilling

quotes.quote: Myth is supposed to bring us together, but fantasy alienates us.
quotes.author: Dustin Hoffman

quotes.quote: Fantasy is an exercise bicycle for the mind. It might not take you anywhere, but it tones up the muscles that can. Of course, I could be wrong.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: All the works of man have their origin in creative fantasy. What right have we then to depreciate imagination.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Closed in a room, my imagination becomes the universe, and the rest of the world is missing out.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Fantasy is the only canvas large enough for me to paint on.
quotes.author: Terry Brooks

quotes.quote: To be matter of fact about the world is to blunder into fantasy and dull fantasy at that, as the real world is strange and wonderful.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: When someone told me I lived in a fantasy land, I nearly fell off my unicorn.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let yourself unwind and get lost in the garden of your mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Don't forget no one else sees the world the way you do, so no one else can tell the stories that you have to tell.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: Right now, we're living in an ugly chapter of our lives, but books always get better!
quotes.author: Chris Colfer

quotes.quote: Death is unstoppable. One must face it as a fact of life.
quotes.author: D. Aswini

quotes.quote: Relationships are ropes. Love is a noose.
quotes.author: Durzo Blint

quotes.quote: The cost of oblivious daydreaming was always this moment of return, the realignment with what had been before and now seemed a little worse.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
quotes.author: J. M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Fantasy is escapist, and that is its glory. If a soldier is imprisoned by the enemy, don't we consider it his duty to escape?
quotes.author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Fairies have to be one thing or the other, because being so small they, unfortunately, have room for one feeling only at a time.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Do not meddle in the affairs of wizards, for they are subtle and quick to anger.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The treacherous are always distrustful.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: There's a time and place for everything, and I believe it’s called 'fan fiction'.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: I’m half living my life between reality and fantasy at all times.
quotes.author: Lady Gaga

quotes.quote: The best thing about dreams is that fleeting moment when you are between asleep and awake when you don't know the difference between reality and fantasy when for just that one moment you feel with your entire soul that the dream is reality, and it really happened.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: There are times when the mind is dealt such a blow it hides it self in insanity. While this may not seem beneficial, it is. There are times when the reality is nothing but pain, and to escape that pain the mind must leave reality behind.
quotes.author: Patrick Rothfuss

quotes.quote: May your feet ever walk in the light of two suns, and may the moon shadow never fall on you.
quotes.author: Robert Fanney

quotes.quote: Children know perfectly well that unicorns aren’t real, but they also know that books about unicorns, if they are good books, are true books.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: Fantasy and reality often overlap.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Here you leave today and enter the world of yesterday, tomorrow, and fantasy.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: All cartoon characters and fables must be an exaggeration, caricatures. It is the very nature of fantasy and fable.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: When I was your age, television was called books.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: Lovers and madmen have such seething brains, such shaping fantasies, that apprehend. More than cool reason ever comprehends.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Where shall we three meet again In thunder, lightning, or in rain? When the hurlyburly's done when the battle's lost and won.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Good-byes breed a sort of distaste for whomever you say good-bye to; this hurts, you feel, this must not happen again.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same.
quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are only for those who love with their eyes. Because for those who love with heart and soul there is no such thing as separation.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Shake hands with today; it is here already. Bid farewell to yesterday; it's gone already. Never let yesterday's pain rob you of today's gains. Drive yourself positively!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: That bitter word, which closed all earthly friendships and finished every feast of love farewell!
quotes.author: Robert Pollok

quotes.quote: It's always difficult to say goodbye, especially when one has spent a long time—literally years, in the case of a series—inside a character or two, suffering and celebrating with them.
quotes.author: Lilith Saintcrow

quotes.quote: Farewell, they cried, 'Wherever you fare till your eyries receive you at the journey's end!' That is the polite thing to say among eagles.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: It's been an incredible ride. Mission accomplished. With that, I have to bid farewell. I'm the happiest person in the world right now. It's better than I ever thought it would be.
quotes.author: Jerome Bettis

quotes.quote: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Not for everyone a darkest night is bid farewell by a bright sunrise.
quotes.author: Saud khan

quotes.quote: There should have been a better farewell. But in the end, there never is. And we take what meagre scraps we can find.
quotes.author: Richard K. Morgan

quotes.quote: Why can't we get all the people together in the world that we really like and then just stay together? I guess that wouldn't work. Someone would leave. Someone always leaves. Then we would have to say good-bye. I hate good-byes. I know what I need. I need more hellos.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Forever, and forever, farewell, Cassius! If we do meet again, why, we shall smile; If not, why then this parting was well made.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Goodbyes make you think. They make you realize what you've had, what you've lost, and what you've taken for granted.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: We need to say goodbye to the traditional methodologies of corporate universities.
quotes.author: Marcus Buckingham

quotes.quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: When I mount the scaffold at last these will be my farewell words to the sheriff: Say what you will against me when I am gone, but don't forget to add, in common justice, that I was never converted to anything.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Nothing hurts like a hostile farewell.
quotes.author: Regina Jennings

quotes.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
quotes.author: Carol Sobieski and Thomas Meehan

quotes.quote: We will put no impediment in your way and we will be at dockside bidding you a farewell as you set off into the sunset.
quotes.author: Charles Lichenstein

quotes.quote: Painful though parting be, I bow to you as I see you off to distant clouds.
quotes.author: Emperor Saga

quotes.quote: Farewell has a sweet sound of reluctance. Good-by is short and final, a word with teeth sharp to bite through the string that ties past to the future.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: Every farewell combines loss and new freedom.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Farewell all relations and friends in Christ; farewell acquaintances and all earthly enjoyments; farewell reading and preaching, praying and believing, wanderings, reproaches, and sufferings.
quotes.author: Donald Cargill

quotes.quote: We'll meet again, Don't know where,don't know when, But I know we'll meet again, some sunny day.
quotes.author: Vera Lynn

quotes.quote: May the road rise up to meet you, may the wind be ever at your back. May the sun shine warm upon your face and the rain fall softly on your fields. And until we meet again, may God hold you in the hollow of his hand.
quotes.author: Irish Blessing

quotes.quote: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Gone—flitted away, taken the stars from the night and the sun from the day! Gone, and a cloud in my heart.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: Goodbye, goodbye, I hate the word. Solitude has long since turned brown and withered, sitting bitter in my mouth and heavy in my veins.
quotes.author: R.M. Grenon

quotes.quote: It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
quotes.author: Ernie Harwell

quotes.quote: The return makes one love the farewell.
quotes.author: Alfred De Musset

quotes.quote: Learning to let go should be learned before learning to get. Life should be touched, not strangled. You've got to relax, let it happen at times, and at others move forward with it.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: Farewell is a beautiful and a soft word and yet it is a horrible and a heavy thing too!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Farewell, my sister, fare thee well. The elements be kind to thee, and make thy spirits all of comfort: fare thee well.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Farewell, my great one, my own, farewell, my pride, farewell, my swift, deep, dear river, how I loved your daylong splashing, how I loved to plunge into your cold waves.
quotes.author: Boris Pasternak

quotes.quote: A farewell to my shadow is not my death; it's my rebirth in darkness.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Farewell, dearest friend, never to see one another any more till at the right hand of Christ.
quotes.author: Donald Cargill

quotes.quote: Farewell! a word that must be, and hath been—A sound which makes us linger; yet—farewell!
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: While conscience is our friend, all is at peace;however once it is offended,farewell to a tranquil mind.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: You and I will meet again, When we're least expecting it, One day in some far off place, I will recognize your face, I won't say goodbye my friend, For you and I will meet again.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: Finally, brethren, farewell. Be perfect, be of good comfort, be of one mind, live in peace; and the God of love and peace shall be with you.
quotes.author: Paul

quotes.quote: The two hardest things to say in life are hello for the first time and goodbye for the last.
quotes.author: Moira Rogers

quotes.quote: Farewell, fair cruelty.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fare thee well! and if for ever, still for ever, fare thee well.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Farewell! God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I'll never see them again. I know that. And they know that. And knowing this, we say farewell.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Farewell is a word that,in any language, is full of sorrow. It is a word that promises absolutely nothing.
quotes.author: Kate Dicamillo

quotes.quote: Farewell is a father's good-by. It is - 'Go out in the world and do well, my son.' It is encouragement and admonition. It is hope and faith. But it passes over the significance of the moment; of parting it says nothing.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Farewell! Dearest and most beloved of men_whatever may be my fate_be happiness yours! Once more, my lingering, foreboding heart, repeats farewell.
quotes.author: Mary Hays

quotes.quote: Farewell to you and the youth I have spent with you. It was but yesterday we met in a dream.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: You yearn to stay in this in-between place, where the beauty of the times you have freshly bade farewell to is still alive and vivid in your mind – almost real – and the reality of your new circumstances has yet to fully sink in.
quotes.author: Agnes Chew

quotes.quote: There was something unfinished about not saying farewell, like a door left open in the chill night.
quotes.author: Julie C. Dao

quotes.quote: For me, the times I always regret are missed opportunities to say farewell to good people, to wish them long life and say to them in all sincerity.
quotes.author: Kevin Hearne

quotes.quote: This time, I want the hugs, kisses, and love that comes with a farewell … even if it’s a temporary one.
quotes.author: J. B. Mcgee

quotes.quote: Farewell!-God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Never say goodbye because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected. Maybe they always have been and will be. Maybe we've lived a thousand lives before this one and in each of them we've found each other. And maybe each time, we've been forced apart for the same reasons. That means that this goodbye is both a goodbye for the past ten thousand years and a prelude to what will come.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I still cannot understand how he could abandon me so unceremoniously, without any sort of goodbye, without looking back even once. The pain is like an axe that chops my heart.
quotes.author: Yann Martel

quotes.quote: I thought I was stronger than a word, but I just discovered that having to say goodbye to you is by far the hardest thing I’ve ever had to do.
quotes.author: Colleen Hoover

quotes.quote: Sadly enough, the most painful goodbyes are the ones that are left unsaid and never explained.
quotes.author: Jonathan Harnisch

quotes.quote: This is a long goodbye, yet not time enough. I have no aptitude for this. I cannot learn this. I would hold on, and hold on, until my hands clutch at emptiness.
quotes.author: Juliet Marillier

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye is a little like dying.
quotes.author: Marjane Satrapi

quotes.quote: It's the emptiest and yet the fullest of all human messages: 'Good-bye.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: I know too well how good-bye can steal more than just the future.
quotes.author: Talia Vance

quotes.quote: It's hard to say goodbye for good at any time or any place.
quotes.author: Cornell Woolrich

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are hard because now all I will have Is a beloved, but incomplete form of you.
quotes.author: Karl Kristian Flores

quotes.quote: We want to control our deaths, our goodbye to the world, and if we can't control is, we can at least control how we leave it behind.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: The best kind of goodbye is the kind where you don’t actually have to leave the person behind.
quotes.author: Dan Gemeinhart

quotes.quote: An honest goodbye is one that does not seek excuses or reasons, or explanations of any kind.
quotes.author: Roger Housden

quotes.quote: On any day no goodbye is forever.
quotes.author: Dahi Tamara Koch

quotes.quote: It’s so difficult to say goodbye because, really, we’ve only just said hello.
quotes.author: Margaret McMullan

quotes.quote: Don’t let the goodbye scare you from starting what could be the best story of your life.
quotes.author: Dawn Lanuza

quotes.quote: The ultimate goal of farming is not the growing of crops, but the cultivation and perfection of human beings.
quotes.author: Masanobu Fukuoka

quotes.quote: It is thus with farming: if you do one thing late, you will be late in all your work.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: Farming is a most senseless pursuit, a mere laboring in a circle. You sow that you may reap, and then you reap that you may sow. Nothing ever comes of it.
quotes.author: Joannes Stobaeus

quotes.quote: Life on a farm is a school of patience; you can't hurry the crops or make an ox in two days.
quotes.author: Henri Alain

quotes.quote: Let us not forget that the cultivation of the earth is the most important labor of man. When tillage begins, other arts will follow. The farmers, therefore, are the founders of civilization.
quotes.author: Daniel Webster

quotes.quote: If we estimate dignity by immediate usefulness, agriculture is undoubtedly the first and noblest science.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Farming looks mighty easy when your plow is a pencil and you're a thousand miles from the corn field.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Urban farming is not only possible, it is crucial. But it can't be like the farming techniques of yore.
quotes.author: Homaro Cantu

quotes.quote: Factory farming came about from a moral race to the bottom, with corporations vying against each other to produce more and bigger animals with less care at lower cost.
quotes.author: Matthew Scully

quotes.quote: So organic farming practices are something that, to me, are interlinked with the idea of using biodiesel.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.quote: Farming with live animals is a 7 day a week, legal form of slavery.
quotes.author: George Segal

quotes.quote: Agriculture not only gives riches to a nation, but the only riches she can call her own.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Agriculture for an honorable and highminded man, is the best of all occupations or arts by which men procure the means of living.
quotes.author: Xenophon

quotes.quote: Agriculture is our wisest pursuit, because it will in the end contribute most to real wealth, good morals, and happiness.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Agriculture is the noblest of all alchemy; for it turns earth, and even manure, into gold, conferring upon its cultivator the additional reward of health.
quotes.author: Paul Chatfield

quotes.quote: For of all gainful professions, nothing is better, nothing more pleasing, nothing more delightful, nothing better becomes a well-bred man than agriculture.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: You can make a small fortune in farming-provided you start with a large one.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Agriculture is the most healthful, most useful, and most noble employment of man.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Farming is a profession of hope.
quotes.author: Brian Brett

quotes.quote: A reasonable agriculture would do its best to emulate nature. Rather than change the earth to suit a crop it would diversify its crops to suit the earth.
quotes.author: Verlyn Klinkenborg

quotes.quote: With the introduction of agriculture mankind entered upon a long period of meanness, misery, and madness, from which they are only now being freed by the beneficent operation of the machine.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Agriculture engenders good sense, and good sense of an excellent kind.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: If you tickle the earth with a hoe she laughs with a harvest.
quotes.author: Douglas Jerrold

quotes.quote: It is obvious that the greatest and most important service that is required of our agriculture under existing conditions is an enlarged production of the staple food crops.
quotes.author: David F. Houston

quotes.quote: Organic farming has been shown to provide major benefits for wildlife and the wider environment. The best that can be said about genetically engineered crops is that they will now be monitored to see how much damage they cause.
quotes.author: Prince Charles

quotes.quote: The discovery of agriculture was the first big step toward a civilized life.
quotes.author: Arthur Keith

quotes.quote: Agriculture looks different today - our farmers are using GPS and you can monitor your irrigation systems over the Internet.
quotes.author: Debbie Stabenow

quotes.quote: To make agriculture sustainable, the grower has got to be able to make a profit.
quotes.author: Sam Farr

quotes.quote: African agriculture depends on labor. You can't produce crops if there is nobody to work on the farms.
quotes.author: Annmarie Kormawa

quotes.quote: There are two spiritual dangers in not owning a farm. One is the danger of supposing that breakfast comes from the grocery, and the other that heat comes from the furnace.
quotes.author: Aldo Leopold

quotes.quote: Teaching kids how to feed themselves and how to live in a community responsibly is the center of an education.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.quote: I think having land and not ruining it is the most beautiful art that anybody could ever want to own.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: Only he can understand what a farm is, what a country is, who shall have sacrificed part of himself to his farm or country, fought to save it, struggled to make it beautiful. Only then will the love of farm or country fill his heart.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: It is only the farmer who faithfully plants seeds in the Spring, who reaps a harvest in the Autumn.
quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

quotes.quote: There are only three things that can kill a farmer: lightning, rolling over in a tractor, and old age.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: My grandfather used to say that once in your life you need a doctor, a lawyer, a policeman, and a preacher. But every day, three times a day, you need a farmer.
quotes.author: Brenda Schoepp

quotes.quote: Becoming vegan is the most important and direct change we can immediately make to save the planet and its species.
quotes.author: Chris Hedges

quotes.quote: A good farmer is nothing more nor less than a handy man with a sense of humus.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: Farmers only worry during the growing season, but town's people worry all the time.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Even if a farmer intends to loaf, he gets up in time to get an early start.
quotes.author: Edgar Watson Howe

quotes.quote: Agriculture is the foundation of manufactures, since the productions of nature are the materials of art.
quotes.author: Edward Gibbon

quotes.quote: The farmer works the soil, The agriculturist works the farmer.
quotes.author: Eugene F. Ware

quotes.quote: It isn't the farmer that lives on the fat of the land; it's the fat of the land that lives on the farmer.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Our farmers round, well pleased with constant gain, like other farmers, flourish and complain.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: I had rather be on my farm than be emperor of the world.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: Farming, a vocation accursed of heaven, since one never saw a millionaire involved in it.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: Farmers are respectable and interesting to me in proportion as they are poor.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Measure the corn of others with your own bushel.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: The farmer is the only man in our economy who buys everything at retail, sells everything at wholesale, and pays the freight both ways.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Give fools their gold, and knaves their power; let fortune's bubbles rise and fall; who sows a field, or trains a flower, or plants a tree, is more than all.
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: My dream is to become a farmer. Just a Bohemian guy pulling up his own sweet potatoes for dinner.
quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

quotes.quote: Farmers are the only indispensable people on the face of the earth.
quotes.author: Li Zhaoxing

quotes.quote: In undertaking farming we undertake a responsibility covering the whole life cycle. We can break it or keep it whole.
quotes.author: Lord Northbourne

quotes.quote: Agriculture is the keystone of our economic structure. The wealth, welfare, prosperity, and even the future freedom of this nation are based upon the soil.
quotes.author: Louis Bromfield

quotes.quote: He was a very inferior farmer when he first begun ... and he is now fast rising from affluence to poverty.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The master’s eye is the best fertilizer.
quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

quotes.quote: Those too lazy to plow in the right season will have no food at the harvest.
quotes.author: Proverbs 20:4

quotes.quote: The first farmer was the first man. All historic nobility rests on the possession and use of land.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Farmers are philosophical. They have learned that it is less wearing to shrug than to beat their breasts.
quotes.author: Ruth Stout

quotes.quote: If the rain spoils our picnic, but saves a farmer's crop, who are we to say it shouldn't rain?
quotes.author: Tom Barrett

quotes.quote: We have neglected the truth that a good farmer is a craftsman of the highest order, a kind of artist.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The soil is the great connector of lives, the source and destination of all. It is the healer and restorer and resurrector, by which disease passes into health, age into youth, death into life. Without proper care for it we can have no community, because without proper care for it we can have no life.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Good farmers, who take seriously their duties as stewards of Creation and of their land's inheritors, contribute to the welfare of society in more ways than society usually acknowledges, or even knows. These farmers produce valuable goods, of course; but they also conserve soil, they conserve water, they conserve wildlife, they conserve open space, they conserve scenery.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: The farmer has to be an optimist or he wouldn’t still be a farmer.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: At a certain point, you have to face the fact that you've turned into an old fart.
quotes.author: Robert Gottlieb

quotes.quote: Verbal contracts are about as useful as a fart on a treadmill.
quotes.author: Robert Rinder

quotes.quote: A happy fart never comes from a miserable ass.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: Success is like a fart - only your own smells nice.
quotes.author: James P. Hogan

quotes.quote: If I could light my own farts I could fly to the moon or at least Uranus.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Home is where the heart is, home is where the fart is. Come let us fart in the home. There is no art in a fart. Still a fart may not be artless. Let us fart and artless fart in the home.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: What is like a smelly fart, that, although invisible is obvious? One's own faults, that are precisely as obvious as the effort made to hide them.
quotes.author: 7th Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Pity, I've learned, is like a fart. You can tolerate your own, but you simply can't stand anyone else's.
quotes.author: Jonathan Tropper

quotes.quote: Art is like a fart for the soul. Better out than in.
quotes.author: Martin Firrell

quotes.quote: Farts come from no one and nowhere; they are anonymous emanations that belong to the group as a whole, and even when every person in the room can point to the culprit, the only sane course of action is denial.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Most people enjoy the sight of their own handwriting as they enjoy the smell of their own farts.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Any man can fart in a closed room and say that he commands the wind
quotes.author: Scott Lynch

quotes.quote: Love is the fart of every heart: It pains a man when 'tis kept close, And others doth offend, when 'tis let loose.
quotes.author: Sir John Suckling

quotes.quote: A person who discreetly farts in an elevator is not a divine being, and a man needs to know this.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: Complaining is mouth farting. And like any farting, I don't mind hearing my own, but I don't want to hear anyone else's.
quotes.author: Buster Guru

quotes.quote: I tell you, we are here on Earth to fart around, and don't let anybody tell you different.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Actions defined a man; words were a fart in the wind.
quotes.author: Mario Puzo

quotes.quote: Having kids means there's always someone around to blame your fart on.
quotes.author: Dana Gould

quotes.quote: I'm a fart in a gale of wind, a humble violet, under a cow pat.
quotes.author: Djuna Barnes

quotes.quote: I always thought that farts were funny, and I always thought that they were mine to talk about because they came out of my body.
quotes.author: Jenny Slate

quotes.quote: Don't be ashamed if you fart while urinating, there is no rain without thunder.
quotes.author: Matthew Wineman

quotes.quote: He that lives upon hope will die farting.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A celebrity farts, and everyone endures, but the unpopular will be thrashed to death.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey

quotes.quote: Consciousness is a fascinating but elusive phenomenon: it is impossible to specify what it is, what it does, or why it evolved. Nothing worth reading has been written on it.
quotes.author: Stuart Sutherland

quotes.quote: It's fascinating how life works.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Gates

quotes.quote: The battle between good and evil is endlessly fascinating because we are participants every day.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: The thing that's fascinating about portraiture is that nobody is alike.
quotes.author: Imogen Cunningham

quotes.quote: What keeps life fascinating is the constant creativity of the soul.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Any powerful idea is absolutely fascinating and absolutely useless until we choose to use it.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: The fascinating thing about ideals is that no sooner have we gained a desired peak than we find farther and higher peaks beyond. The thrilling adventure never ends.
quotes.author: Alice Hegan Rice

quotes.quote: There are no fascinating people, only their works are fascinating.
quotes.author: Ned Rorem

quotes.quote: Memory is a fascinating trickster. Words and images have enormous power and can easily displace actual experience over the years.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: What's so fascinating about people is what they don't show. People are masters at it; usually actors show too much.
quotes.author: Gleen Close

quotes.quote: Any period is fascinating: the more ancient, the better.
quotes.author: Ridley Scott

quotes.quote: The most fascinating person is always the one of the most winning manners; not the one of greatest physical beauty.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: The world is a fascinating, difficult place, and in order to take full advantage of what the planet has to offer, we need to see and hear natural things.
quotes.author: Bill O'Reilly

quotes.quote: It's fascinating how much of our sense of attractiveness and feminine identity is bound up in our hair.
quotes.author: Natalie Dormer

quotes.quote: The fascinating thing, is not to show the source of light, but the effect of light.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: There is something fascinating about every human being. The question is how much they're willing to divulge.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Rich

quotes.quote: Every human being has a fascinating existence, with a big cast of good and evil characters in each. And almost always, somewhere along the way, magic.
quotes.author: Lucinda Riley

quotes.quote: It's fascinating to imagine two successful writers in one house. But when you think about it, it isn't very unusual. In fact, so many writers have writer spouses.
quotes.author: Heidi Julavits

quotes.quote: Families are endlessly fascinating. We all have one, and they have a great impact on who we are and what we do - Freudian as that is.
quotes.author: Susan Minot

quotes.quote: The fascinating thing about food is that if you have issues with it, you have to face it every single day.
quotes.author: Jami Attenberg

quotes.quote: There is no more fascinating subject in which a person may become occupied than an examination into the history of his ancestry.
quotes.author: Archibald F. Bennett

quotes.quote: Ordinary life is fascinating when viewed with extraordinary perspective.
quotes.author: Angela Howell

quotes.quote: Lexicography is a chastening as well as an illuminating and fascinating art.
quotes.author: Robert Burchfield

quotes.quote: What the brain does by itself is infinitely more fascinating and complex than any response it can make to chemical stimulation.
quotes.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quotes.quote: It is a fascinating and provocative thought that a body of water deserves to be considered as an organism in its own right.
quotes.author: Lyall Watson

quotes.quote: The fascinating thing about human beings is that they don't last, and everything eventuates, and everything is very, very brief. And even if you do manage to look reasonably well as you age, unfortunately you are attacked at every level by illness and so forth. It's a fact of life.
quotes.author: Steven Morrissey

quotes.quote: It's fascinating when you're from another place, but you don't speak the language.
quotes.author: Marcus Samuelsson

quotes.quote: Clouds are fascinating to paint because they are the only element in a landscape that possesses free movement.
quotes.author: John F. Carlson

quotes.quote: What is fascinating about marriage is why anyone wants to get married.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: One of the most fascinating things about the world of fashion is that practically no one knows who inhabits it or why it exists. There are a few people who know how it works, but they won't tell.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Hawes

quotes.quote: There is a fascination with fear. It grabs our attention.
quotes.author: Bernard Beckett

quotes.quote: Fascinations breeds preparedness, and preparedness, survival.
quotes.author: Peter Benchley

quotes.quote: Fascination is a key to productivity; it unites experiences; it is even its own reward.
quotes.author: Erving Polster

quotes.quote: For me the fascination with biography is the life of the individual in the context of history.
quotes.author: Rachel Holmes

quotes.quote: The fascination of shooting as a sport depends almost wholly on whether you are at the right or wrong end of the gun.
quotes.author: P. G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Fascination is one step beyond interest. Interested people want to know if it works. Fascinated people want to learn how it works.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The fascination of what's difficult has dried the sap out of my veins, and rent spontaneous joy and natural content out of my heart.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The thing that's between us is fascination, and the fascination resides in our being alike. Whether you're a man or a woman, the fascination resides in finding out that we're alike.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Learn how to turn frustration into fascination. You will learn more being fascinated by life than you will by being frustrated by it.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The deep fascination with the mysterious, and the impulse to seek and locate ourselves in the cosmic context, seems to be imprinted in our DNA and psyches.
quotes.author: Priyamvada Natarajan

quotes.quote: A modern fascination with the fantastic seems to come along every couple of generations, usually at a point when we're future saturated.
quotes.author: Steve Erickson

quotes.quote: There is a universal fascination with the living dead. There is more to a zombie story that a bunch of corpses attacking the living. The real power of such a story lies with the undercurrent of hopelessness compounded by a very real instinct to survive.
quotes.author: Julie Ann Dawson

quotes.quote: Fame and secrecy are the high and low ends of the same fascination.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: Getting old is a fascination thing. The older you get, the older you want to get.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: People like scary stories. There's a fascination with fear themes, and we want to face those things in a weird, subconscious way.
quotes.author: Mel Gibson

quotes.quote: In each life, no matter how it's lived, there is cause for fascination and often delight.
quotes.author: Hugh Massingberd

quotes.quote: My fascination with letting images repeat and repeat - or in film's case 'run on' - manifests my belief that we spend much of our lives seeing without observing.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: I think everyone has some fascination with what's outside our existence. It's a constant journey to find the truth.
quotes.author: Nicholas Lea

quotes.quote: Our fascination with weather: its caprices and changes as an antidote to the eternal repetition of daily life; a helpful illusion of novelty.
quotes.author: Derren Brown

quotes.quote: My fascination is broadly with biology and the fact that our increased understanding of biology allows for breakthroughs in a broad set of diseases.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Prison has a universal fascination. It's a real-life horror story because, given the right set of circumstances, anyone could find themselves behind bars.
quotes.author: Wentworth Miller

quotes.quote: Actually loneliness has a kind of fascination; it's a state of egotistical, inner grace that you can achieve only by standing guard on old, forgotten roads that no one travels anymore.
quotes.author: Arturo Pérez-Reverte

quotes.quote: Some of us will admit to a simple fascination with the inner world for its own sake, a fascination with no further goal than the thrill of discovery, the pleasure of engaging the mysterious, dark ground of our own nature.
quotes.author: Sandra Lee Dennis

quotes.quote: Flirting with the dark side has always had it's fascination. Because you learn, and there's wisdom there. Escpecially with the post-Freudian era with the young, the shadow is ninety percent gold. You hold treasures there that you need to learn about yourself to be a whole person.
quotes.author: Edward Herrmann

quotes.quote: Part of the fascination that photography holds is its ability to unlock secrets kept even from ourselves. Like dreams, the photograph can uncork a heady bouquet of recognition which can escape into the cognitive world.
quotes.author: Jack Welpott

quotes.quote: Fantasy consists in a morbid fascination with unrealities, which secretly transforms itself into a desire to make them real. Imagination is a form of intellectual control, which presents us with the image of unrealities in order that we should understand and feel distanced from them. In imagination we dominate; in fantasy, we are dominated.
quotes.author: Roger Scruton

quotes.quote: What a delighted fascination it is, to stand aside and watch our dearest friend perform on stage without us.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Fascination with the psychic - or the psychological - can be a dangerous sidetrack on any spiritual path.
quotes.author: Starhawk

quotes.quote: The peculiar fascination of the brain lies in the fact that there is probably no other object of scientific enquiry about which we know at once so much and yet understand so little.
quotes.author: Gerd Sommerhoff

quotes.quote: There is a fascination about crime, which is understandable, but hardly anyone talks about the families of victims of violent crime and the devastation that is beyond the victim alone.
quotes.author: Werner Herzog

quotes.quote: Develop a childlike fascination with life and people.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: When you cook, you never stop learning. That's the fascination of it all.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: Nothing matches the holiness and fascination of accurate and intricate detail.
quotes.author: Stephen Jay Gould

quotes.quote: People have always had a fascination with the supernatural going back to the beginning of time and with vampires in particular. This phenomenon is not new.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: There's a fascination frantic in a ruin that's romantic.
quotes.author: W.S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: Radio astronomy reflects our fascination with how audio can be used to understand information or ideas. Just as scientists visualize data through charts and pictures, we can use 'data sonification' to translate radio signals into sound that help us better understand some of our most enigmatic planetary systems.
quotes.author: Honor Harger

quotes.quote: Our fascination with gold is related to the fantasies of early childhood.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Fascism recognises the real needs which gave rise to socialism and trade-unionism, giving them due weight in the guild or corporative system in which diverent interests are coordinated and harmonised in the unity of the State.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Fascism is the stage reached after communism has proved an illusion.
quotes.author: Friedrich von Hayek

quotes.quote: Fascism is itself less ideological, in so far as it openly proclaims the principle of domination that is elsewhere concealed.
quotes.author: Theodor Adorno

quotes.quote: Fascism was a counter-revolution against a revolution that never took place.
quotes.author: Ignazio Silone

quotes.quote: Fascism is not in itself a new order of society. It is the future refusing to be born.
quotes.author: Aneurin Bevan

quotes.quote: Fascism is very much a mob movement.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Fascism should rightly be called corporatism as it is a merger of state and corporate power.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Fascism is definitely and absolutely opposed to the doctrines of liberalism, both in the political and economic sphere.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Fascism begins the moment a ruling class, fearing the people may use their political democracy to gain economic democracy, begins to destroy political democracy in order to retain its power of exploitation and special privilege.
quotes.author: Tommy Douglas

quotes.quote: Fascism is the consequence of economic jam and dictatorship is the product of Fascism, for Fascism cannot be managed save by a dictator.
quotes.author: John T. Flynn

quotes.quote: Fascism means first of all defending your nation against the dangers that threaten it. It means the destruction of these dangers and the opening of a free way to life and glory for your nation.
quotes.author: Corneliu Zelea Codreanu

quotes.quote: Fascism is when corporations become the government.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Fascism is relatively easy to explain. It is a reactionary phenomenon. Nazism was some bad guys having some bad ideas and unfortunately succeeding in realizing them.
quotes.author: Slavoj Zizek

quotes.quote: Fascism may be defined as a form of political behaviour marked by obsessive preoccupation with community decline, humiliation, or victimhood and by compensatory cult of unity, energy and purity, in which a mass-based party of committed nationalist militants, working with uneasy but effective collaboration with traditional elites, abandons democratic liberties and pursues with redemptive violence and without ethical or legal restraints goals of internal cleansing and external expansion.
quotes.author: Robert Paxton

quotes.quote: Fascism should more appropriately be called corporatism because it is a merger of state and corporate power.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Fascism itself can only be turned away if all those who are outraged by it show a commitment to social justice that equals the intensity of their indignation.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: Fascism accepts the individual only insofar as his interests coincide with the state's.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Fascism, the more it considers and observes the future and the development of humanity, quite apart from political considerations of the moment, believes neither in the possibility nor the utility of perpetual peace.
quotes.author: Benito Mussolini

quotes.quote: Every step which leads from capitalism toward planning is necessarily a step nearer to absolutism and dictatorship.
quotes.author: Ludwig Von Mises

quotes.quote: A new fascism promises security from the terror of crime. All that is required is that we take away the criminals rights which, of course, are our own. Out of our desperation and fear we begin to feel a sense of security from the new totalitarian state.
quotes.author: Gerry Spence

quotes.quote: The essence of fascism is to make laws forbidding everything and then enforce them selectively against your enemies.
quotes.author: John Lescroart

quotes.quote: Fascism is a system of political authority and social order intended to reinforce the unity, energy, and purity of communities in which liberal democracy stands accused of producing division and decline.
quotes.author: Robert O. Paxton

quotes.quote: You can never be overdressed or overeducated.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I don't know who invented high heels, but all women owe him a lot!
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Dress shabbily and they remember the dress; dress impeccably and they remember the woman.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fashions fade, style is eternal.
quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

quotes.quote: Fashion is not something that exists in dresses only. Fashion is in the sky, in the street, fashion has to do with ideas, the way we live, what is happening.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Women thrive on novelty and are easy meat for the commerce of fashion. Men prefer old pipes and torn jackets.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: The only rule is don't be boring and dress cute wherever you go. Life is too short to blend in.
quotes.author: Paris Hilton

quotes.quote: The difference between style and fashion is quality.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: Fashion is a form of ugliness so intolerable that we have to alter it every six months.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Style' is an expression of individualism mixed with charisma. Fashion is something that comes after style.
quotes.author: John Fairchild

quotes.quote: Fashion is what you adopt when you don't know who you are.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: It's a new era in fashion - there are no rules. It's all about the individual and personal style, wearing high-end, low-end, classic labels, and up-and-coming designers all together.
quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

quotes.quote: I have always believed that fashion was not only to make women more beautiful, but also to reassure them, give them confidence.
quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

quotes.quote: Fashion has two purposes: comfort and love. Beauty comes when fashion succeeds.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: Trendy is the last stage before tacky.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Fashion is a tool? to compete in life outside the home. People like you better, without knowing why, because people always react well to a person they like the looks of.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.quote: I like fashion to go down to the street, but I can't accept that it should originate there.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Because of the fashion, the young people don't have any access to the history of music, unless people like me revive it. There are very few people to revive it, because you can't earn any money doing it.
quotes.author: Bill Wyman

quotes.quote: Fashion is not necessarily about labels. It's not about brands. It's about something else that comes from within you.
quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

quotes.quote: What you wear is how you present yourself to the world, especially today, when human contacts are so quick. Fashion is instant language.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.quote: In difficult times, fashion is always outrageous.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: Fashions have done more harm than revolutions.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: I see that the fashion wears out more apparel than the man.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A fashion is nothing but an induced epidemic.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Fashion is architecture. It is a matter of proportions.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fashion is more usually a gentle progression of revisited ideas.
quotes.author: Bruce Oldfield

quotes.quote: Fashion is something barbarous, for it produces innovation without reason and imitation without benefit.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Always dress like you're going to see your worst enemy.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in fashion is not to be known for a logo, but to be known for a silhouette.
quotes.author: Giambattista Valli

quotes.quote: You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: You don't learn style from watching people on a runway. Fashion happens every morning when you wake up.
quotes.author: Shalom Harlow

quotes.quote: In the fashion industry, everything goes retro except the prices.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Fashion is very important. It is life-enhancing and, like everything that gives pleasure, it is worth doing well.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: I don't do fashion. I am fashion.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The fashionable woman wears clothes. The clothes don't wear her.
quotes.author: Mary Quant

quotes.quote: To me, clothing is a form of self-expression â€“ there are hints about who you are in what you wear.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Style is when they're running you out of town and you make it look like you're leading the parade.
quotes.author: William Battie

quotes.quote: Anyone can get dressed up and glamorous, but it is how people dress in their days off that are the most intriguing.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.quote: Fashion does not have to prove that it is serious. It is the proof that intelligent frivolity can be something creative and positive.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: If you wear clothes that don't suit you, you're a fashion victim. You have to wear clothes that make you look better.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: A woman's dress should be a like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.
quotes.author: Bill Cunningham

quotes.quote: Before you leave the house, look in the mirror and remove one accessory.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: In a machine age, dressmaking is one of the last refuges of the human, the personal, the inimitable.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: We built our fashion around three fundamental concepts: Sicily, tailoring, and tradition. Our dream is to create a style which is timeless, and to create clothes with such a strong personality that whoever sees them can instantly say without a shadow of a doubt: this is a Dolce & Gabbana.
quotes.author: Domenico Dolce

quotes.quote: Design is a constant challenge to balance comfort with luxe, the practical with the desirable.
quotes.author: Donna Karan

quotes.quote: Every generation laughs at the old fashions, but follows religiously the new.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Most women are dissatisfied with their appearance - it's the stuff that fuels the beauty and fashion industries.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: The principle of the design - the harmony, rhythm and balance are all the same with interior and fashion design.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: Fashion should be a form of escapism, and not a form of imprisonment.
quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

quotes.quote: I have always loved fashion because it's a great way to express your mood. And I'm definitely a shoe lover. The right pair of shoes can change the feel of an outfit, and even change how a woman feels about herself.
