A woman can wear confidence on her feet with a high stiletto, or slip into weekend comfort with a soft ballet flat.
quotes.author: Fergie

quotes.quote: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Everything in the universe has a purpose. Indeed, the invisible intelligence that flows through everything in a purposeful fashion is also flowing through you.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Fashion is not necessarily about labels. It's not about brands. It's about something else that comes from within you.
quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

quotes.quote: I design for the woman I wanted to be, the woman I used to be and to some degree, the woman I'm still a little piece of.
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Create your own style. Let it be unique for yourself and yet identifiable for others.
quotes.author: Anna Wintour

quotes.quote: When I design and wonder what the point is, I think of someone having a bad time in their life. Maybe they are sad and they wake up and put on something I have made and it makes them feel just a bit better. So, in that sense, fashion is a little help in the life of a person. But only a little.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.quote: You can't be melancholy in fashion because people don't respond to it.
quotes.author: Isaac Mizrahi

quotes.quote: Style is a simple way of saying complicated things.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: I am a fashion person, and fashion is not only about clothes -- it's about all kinds of change.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Fashion is chaotic, and it can be an aggravation, too, but it is at its best when it allows you to express yourself.
quotes.author: John Malkovich

quotes.quote: Fashion is only the attempt to realize art in living forms and social intercouse.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The customer is the final filter. What survives the whole process is what people wear. I'm not interested in making clothes that end up in some dusty museum.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Fashion is never made by designers. Fashion is made by fashionable people. If Mrs. William Paley wears my hat, it becomes fashion. If it hangs in m stockroom, it's nothing.
quotes.author: Halston

quotes.quote: Even the materials and chemicals and pharmaceutical industries have gone high-fashion— with a rash of 'products' spewing forth, each aimed at customers' ever-shifting, ever-narrower-gauge needs.
quotes.author: Tom Peters

quotes.quote: The fashion industry is no more able to preserve a style that men and women have decided to abandon than to introduce one they do not choose to accept.
quotes.author: Alison Lurie

quotes.quote: Fashion can be bought. Style one must possess.
quotes.author: Edna Woolman Chase

quotes.quote: Fashion is made to become unfashionable.
quotes.author: Gabrielle 'Coco' Chanel

quotes.quote: I base most of my fashion sense on what doesn't itch.
quotes.author: Gilda Radner

quotes.quote: Fashion is an imposition, a reign on freedom.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: No fashion has ever been created expressly for the lean purse or for the fat woman: The dressmaker's ideal is the thin millionaire.
quotes.author: Katherine Fullerton Gerould

quotes.quote: Fashion should not be expected to serve in the stead of courage or character.
quotes.author: Loretta Young

quotes.quote: If the trousers do not attract you, so much the worse; For the moment I do not want to attract you. I want to enjoy myself as a human being.
quotes.author: Dorothy Sayers

quotes.quote: Put even the plainest woman into a beautiful dress and unconsciously she will try to live up to it.
quotes.author: Lady Duff-Gordon

quotes.quote: Women dress alike all over the world: They dress to be annoying to other women.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: Cruelty is one fashion statement we can all do without.
quotes.author: Rue McClanahan

quotes.quote: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: People used to complain to me all the time, 'I can't even hear you sing because your clothes are so loud.'
quotes.author: Cindy Lauper

quotes.quote: Today, fashion is really about sensuality— how a woman feels on the inside. In the eighties, women used suits with exaggerated shoulders and waists to make a strong impression. Women are now more comfortable with themselves and their bodies—they no longer feel the need to hide behind their clothes.
quotes.author: Donna Karan

quotes.quote: If high heels were so wonderful, men would be wearing them.
quotes.author: Sue Grafton.

quotes.quote: Does fashion matter? Only if you're out of it.
quotes.author: Kim Campbell

quotes.quote: Fashion, though in a strange way, represents all manly virtue. It is a virtue gone to seed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Fashion is gentility running away from vulgarity, and afraid of being overtaken.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: Fashion matters considerably more than horoscopes, rather more than dog shows, and slightly more than hockey.
quotes.author: Roy Blount, Jr.

quotes.quote: How strange it is to see with how much passion / People see things only in their own fashion.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Fashion is born by small facts, trends, or even politics; never by the shortening or lengthening of the skirt.
quotes.author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quotes.quote: Fashion is the science of appearance, and it inspires one with the desire to seem rather than to be.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: Fashion changes. Style remains.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Art produces ugly things which frequently become more beautiful with time. Fashion, on the other hand, produces beautiful things which always become ugly with time.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: I don't design clothes. I design dreams.
quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

quotes.quote: Fashion is what one wears oneself. What is unfashionable is what other people wear.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: No woman can look as well out of fashion as in it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: That the clothes we wear make a statement is itself a statement that in this age of heightened self-consciousness has virtually become a cliche.
quotes.author: Fred Davis

quotes.quote: The original senses of fashion, then, referred to activities; fashion was something that one did, unlike now, perhaps, when fashion is something that one wears.
quotes.author: Malcolm Barnard

quotes.quote: One is never over-dressed or under-dressed with a Little Black Dress.” – Karl Lagerfeld	6. “One is never over-dressed or under-dressed with a Little Black Dress.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: She can beat me, but she cannot beat my outfit.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: Girls do not dress for boys. They dress for themselves, of course, each other. If girls dressed for boys, they'd just walk around naked at all times.
quotes.author: Betsey Johnson

quotes.quote: Style is knowing who you are, what you want to say, and not giving a damn.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: I'm not an artist. I'm a fashion designer of clothes.
quotes.author: Francisco Costa

quotes.quote: Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: The life of a designer is a life of fight: fight against the ugliness!
quotes.author: Massimo Vignelli

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in fashion is not to be known for a logo, but to be known for a silhouette.
quotes.author: Giambattista Valli

quotes.quote: Playing a fashion designer could be the bane of my existence because I am married to a fashion designer.
quotes.author: Lori Loughlin

quotes.quote: Being a fashion designers, it's almost like being a doctor. You can touch a person because they cough and you can tell whether they're ill.
quotes.author: Isaac Mizrahi

quotes.quote: People get this very romantic vision of a fashion designer who in one night makes 25 sketches and in the morning throws them on the table and there are a lot of women in white aprons with the pins on the lapel and they start to grab the sketches and... It's not like that.
quotes.author: Dries van Noten

quotes.quote: From since I could remember I've always been an artist, drawing, painting and so forth. I would also always draw made up rock n' roll characters in a band who each had their own style and personalities. I think by accident I was already becoming a fashion designer.
quotes.author: Ashley Purdy

quotes.quote: If one lazily thinks of what a fashion designer might do if he's going to conquer cinema next, it would be taking the opportunity to display his fashion sensibilities.
quotes.author: Colin Firth

quotes.quote: As for a fashion designer, you have those very precise deadlines to keep so you have to renew yourself constantly every three or six months. When you think about it, it's so intense.
quotes.author: Gaspard Ulliel

quotes.quote: Fashion designers are dictators of taste.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: As a fashion designer, I was always aware that I was not an artist, because I was creating something that was made to be sold, marketed, used, and ultimately discarded.
quotes.author: Tom Ford

quotes.quote: The best part of being a fashion designer is being a fashion designer.
quotes.author: Rena Do Jess

quotes.quote: As for a fashion designer, you have those very precise deadlines to keep so you have to renew yourself constantly every three or six months. When you think about it, it's so intense.
quotes.author: Gaspard Ulliel

quotes.quote: Intuition, if you are fashion designer is really the key to everything. I just really have a feeling it's the right moment in time to create a new business model. Obviously I have facts and figures that could back that up. It isn't a gamble; it's a calculated risk.
quotes.author: Monita Rajpal

quotes.quote: What's important to a fashion designer? It's much more than learning how to make clothes. In fact, that merely makes you a dressmaker. It doesn't make you into a fashion designer.
quotes.author: Tim Gunn

quotes.quote: Tailoring was considered to be a world that was very traditional, and basically going out of fashion. Fashion designers did not have a real link with tailoring or tradition, so I fused the two worlds together.
quotes.author: Ozwald Boateng

quotes.quote: The best fashion show is definitely on the street. Always has been, and always will be.
quotes.author: Bill Cunningham

quotes.quote: I love the entire ritual of getting dressed. When we do a fashion show, we try to send out a message; we couldn't do that without the hair and makeup. The whole is equal to the sum of its parts.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: When you see a fashion show, you see those seven minutes of what was six months of tedious work of, you know, going up an inch and down an inch, changing it from one shade of red to another shade of red. So it's the same as any creative process. The result is what we see, but the process is really labor intensive and work.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: I like the ritual, the liturgy of a well-crafted, emotional fashion show. I will never be jaded with this side of fashion. The catwalk is pure anthropology, something like an esoteric encrypted parade. It can totally be replaced but it will be missed.
quotes.author: Hedi Slimane

quotes.quote: If I see a fashion show with literal influences, it doesn't make me think any more. It doesn't make me dream.
quotes.author: Raf Simons

quotes.quote: A fashion show is like a 10-minute play, but there's all this anticipation; Everyone arriving, finding their seats, then there's 10 minutes of people walking past and clothes and music, then the whole thing is finished.
quotes.author: Felicity Jones

quotes.quote: The fashion show is an event, it is theater, it's drama. You do things differently on the catwalk than you do for other events.
quotes.author: Sass Brown

quotes.quote: During a fashion show, I want the clothes to speak. The effort I put into my work must be respected.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Life is a fashion show, the world is your runway.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: The entire spring and summer line from Marc Jacobs was stolen on the way to the fashion show in Paris. The thief is considered armed and fabulous.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: I was in the fashion shows in Milan; I was seventeen, I was doing like 100 shows. People were asking, 'How does it feel to be the model of the moment?' It was hard for me to answer as myself. I barely spoke English.
quotes.author: Gisele Bundchen

quotes.quote: We wanted to do something that will capture their attention with humor. With the comedy presentation and fashion show, we hope to make things more life-applicable.
quotes.author: Valerie Osborn

quotes.quote: For me, the fashion show, the image, the shooting, is just a step. It's just a moment, but it's not the final destination.
quotes.author: Christophe Lemaire

quotes.quote: Fashion shows used to be more crazy. Now they've become a bit too serious
quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

quotes.quote: It's great to show fashion to press and buyers, but there are only 700 or 800 of them who get to see the show. When you do a show on TV, millions of people get to see it. That works better for us.
quotes.author: Andy Hilfiger

quotes.quote: Going to a fashion show is almost as painful as being in one.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: I enjoy doing fashion shows and transforming myself into different looks for photo shoots.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: Before I started my modeling career at 20, I used to replay fashion show videos on-line and study how famous models walk and pose on runways.
quotes.author: Kim Woo Bin

quotes.quote: I love very much the night after every fashion show when I have all those invitations to parties and I stay quiet at home by myself.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: Daily life shouldn't be a fashion show all the time.
quotes.author: Leighton Meester

quotes.quote: You can limit the number of invitations to an in-person fashion show, but you can't police the Internet.
quotes.author: Erin Mckean

quotes.quote: Instead of doing a book lesson on fashion show promotion, I thought it would be much more exciting to actually implement a show.
quotes.author: Tricia Poythress

quotes.quote: You can watch Chanel fashion shows and watch the news. Fortunately you don't have to choose. I always vote, I go to rallies, but I also go to fashion shows.
quotes.author: Maiwenn

quotes.quote: Dress like you're going to meet your worst enemy today.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way to live.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
quotes.author: Adriana Lima

quotes.quote: Fashion should be a form of escapism, and not a form of imprisonment.
quotes.author: Alexander McQueen

quotes.quote: Fashion fades, only style remains the same.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Always dress like you're going to see your worst enemies.
quotes.author: Kimora Lee

quotes.quote: It's not about the dress you wear, it's about the life you lead in the dress.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland.

quotes.quote: Fashion is about comfort and feeling good
quotes.author: Max Azria

quotes.quote: People will stare. Make it worth their while.
quotes.author: Harry Winston

quotes.quote: Fashion is only the attempt to realize art in living forms and social intercourse.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: One is never over-dressed or under-dressed with a Little Black Dress.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Sweatpants are a sign of defeat. You lost control of your life so you bought some sweatpants.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Fashion should be stylish and fun.
quotes.author: Twiggy

quotes.quote: People walk differently in high heels. Your body sways to a different kind of tempo.
quotes.author: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.quote: The dress must follow the body of the woman, not the body following the shape of the dress.
quotes.author: Hubert de Givenchy

quotes.quote: Fashion is part of the daily air and it changes all the time, with all the events. You can even see the approaching of a revolution in clothes. You can see and feel everything in clothes.
quotes.author: Diana Vreeland

quotes.quote: Pure, intense emotions. It's not about design. It's about feelings.
quotes.author: Alber Elbaz

quotes.quote: Fashion is what you're offered four times a year by designers. And style is what you choose.
quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

quotes.quote: Style is wearing an evening dress to McDonald's, wearing heels to play football. It is personality, confidence and seduction.
quotes.author: John Galliano

quotes.quote: A woman is never sexier than when she is comfortable in her clothes.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.quote: Fashion is part of our culture, and it's about more than just a pretty dress.
quotes.author: Joan Smalls

quotes.quote: Trendy is the last stage before tacky.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Fashion is all about happiness. It's fun. It's important. But it's not medicine.
quotes.author: Donatella Versace

quotes.quote: Fashion is about dressing according to what's fashionable. Style is more about being yourself.
quotes.author: Oscar de la Renta

quotes.quote: We don't need fashion to survive, we just desire it so much.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Fashion is a trend. Style lives within a person.
quotes.author: Oscar de le Renta

quotes.quote: Fashion is very important. It is life-enhancing and, like everything that gives pleasure, it is worth doing well.
quotes.author: Vivienne Westwood

quotes.quote: Clothes mean nothing until someone lives in them.
quotes.author: Marc Jacobs

quotes.quote: Fashion is the armor to survive the reality of everyday life.
quotes.author: Bill Cunningham

quotes.quote: Shoes transform your body language and attitude. They lift you physically and emotionally.
quotes.author: Christian Louboutin

quotes.quote: Architecture is how the person places herself in the space. Fashion is about how you place the object on the person.
quotes.author: Zaha Hadid

quotes.quote: Fashion is an art and you are the canvas.
quotes.author: Velvet Paper

quotes.quote: Fashion is a reflection of the time.
quotes.author: Anna Wintour

quotes.quote: The principle of the design - the harmony, rhythm and balance are all the same with interior and fashion design.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: classy and fabulous.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Don't be into trends. Don't make fashion own you, but you decide what you are, what you want to express by the way you dress and the way you live.
quotes.author: Gianni Versace

quotes.quote: What you wear is how you present yourself to the world, especially today, when human contacts are so quick. Fashion is instant language.
quotes.author: Miuccia Prada

quotes.quote: In order to be irreplaceable one must always be different.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Fashion is architecture: it is a matter of proportions.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Give a girl the right shoes and she can conquer the world.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: A woman's dress should be a like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: Style is a way to say who you are without having to speak.
quotes.author: Rachel Zoe

quotes.quote: Clothes are like a good meal, a good movie, great pieces of music.
quotes.author: Michael Kors

quotes.quote: You can never take too much care over the choice of your shoes. Too many women think that they are unimportant, but the real proof of an elegant woman is what is on her feet.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: The difference between style and fashion is quality.
quotes.author: Giorgio Armani

quotes.quote: Fashions fade, style is eternal.
quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

quotes.quote: Anyone can get dressed up and glamorous, but it is how people dress in their days off that are the most intriguing.
quotes.author: Alexander Wang

quotes.quote: You have to be fast on your feet and adaptive or else a strategy is useless.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Move fast. Speed is one of your main advantages over large competitors.
quotes.author: Sam Altman

quotes.quote: Moving fast is not the same as going somewhere.
quotes.author: Robert Anthony

quotes.quote: Speed is the ability to take a decision in a few seconds.
quotes.author: Sunday Adelaja

quotes.quote: Speed is not always a constituent to great work, the process of creation should be given time and thought.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: You don't burn out from going too fast. You burn out from going too slow and getting bored.
quotes.author: Cliff Burton

quotes.quote: Speed will follow when the mechanism of the movements is more assured.
quotes.author: Rafael Sabatini

quotes.quote: Everything goes by so fast that if you want to be a part of it, you need to go that fast. But because you go that fast, you don't lead the life you should lead.
quotes.author: Guillaume Canet

quotes.quote: Life moves fast. As much as you can learn from your history, you have to move forward.
quotes.author: Eddie Vedder

quotes.quote: Speed is inconsequential if you are headed in the wrong direction.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: Speed is a great asset; but it's greater when it's combined with quickness - and there's a big difference.
quotes.author: Ty Cobb

quotes.quote: If you go too fast you might not notice everything. On the other hand, you don't want to be late.
quotes.author: Maira Kalman

quotes.quote: To fly as fast as thought, you must begin by knowing that you have already arrived.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're going fast, your instincts can be very useful.
quotes.author: Andrea Arnold

quotes.quote: We must go fast, because the race is against time.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.quote: Fast learners win.
quotes.author: Eric Schmidt

quotes.quote: Because running fast is more fun than running slow.
quotes.author: Frank Shorter

quotes.quote: Move fast and break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough.
quotes.author: Mark Zuckerberg

quotes.quote: The question is not whether we are able to change but whether we are changing fast enough.
quotes.author: Theodore Isaac Rubin

quotes.quote: Things can change so fast on the internet.
quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

quotes.quote: Fast food may appear to be cheap food and, in the literal sense it often is, but that is because huge social and environmental costs are being excluded from the calculations.
quotes.author: Prince Charles

quotes.quote: In twentieth-century Old Earth, a fast food chain took dead cow meat, fried it in grease, added carcinogens, wrapped it in petroleum-based foam, and sold nine hundred billion units. Human beings. Go figure.
quotes.author: Dan Simmons

quotes.quote: Simply by starting to cook again, you declare your independence from the culture of fast food. As soon as you cook, you start thinking about ingredients. You start thinking about plants and animals and not the microwave. And you will find that your diet, just by that one simple act, that is greatly improved.
quotes.author: Michael Polan

quotes.quote: A whole set of values comes with fast food: Everything should be fast, cheap and easy; there's always more where that came from; there are no seasons; you shouldn't be paid very much for preparing food. It's uniformity and a lack of connection.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.quote: McDonald's being the official restaurant of the Olympics is like smoking being the official medicine of cancer.
quotes.author: Robert Downey Jr.

quotes.quote: We were taken to a fast food café where our order was fed into a computer. Our hamburgers, made from the flesh of chemically impregnated cattle, had been broiled over counterfeit charcoal, placed between slices of artificially flavored cardboard and served to us by recycled juvenile delinquents.
quotes.author: Jean Michel Chapereau

quotes.quote: Sorry to hear about your Dad.' He shrugged. He was seventy, and we always told him fast food would kill him. 'Heart attack?' He was hit by a Pizza Express truck.
quotes.author: J.A. Konrath

quotes.quote: Fast food is popular because it's convenient, it's cheap, and it tastes good. But the real cost of eating fast food never appears on the menu.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: Like many other chef-entrepreneurs, I am convinced that fast food does not mean bad food.
quotes.author: Andrew Zimmern

quotes.quote: Get people back into the kitchen and combat the trend toward processed food and fast food.
quotes.author: Andrew Weil

quotes.quote: The problem is when that fun stuff becomes the habit. And I think that's what's happened in our culture. Fast food has become the everyday meal.
quotes.author: Michelle Obama

quotes.quote: If a wave of veganism washed over the land, in six months there would be Broccoli Kings, Taco Bell Peppers, and McTofu Drive-Thrus.
quotes.author: Brian Wansink

quotes.quote: Eating at fast food outlets and other restaurants is simply a manifestation of the commodification of time coupled with the relatively low value many Americans have placed on the food they eat.
quotes.author: Andrew F. Smith

quotes.quote: I think Americas food culture is embedded in fast-food culture. And the real question that we have is: How are we going to teach slow-food values in a fast-food world? Of course, its very, very difficult to do, especially when children have grown up eating fast food and the values that go with that.
quotes.author: Alice Waters

quotes.quote: I'd been eating fast food all my life without thinking about it. And the more I learned about the subject, the more intrigued I became.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: A generation ago, three-quarters of the money used to buy food in the United States was spent to prepare meals at home. Today about half of the money used to buy food is spent at restaurants—mainly at fast food restaurants.
quotes.author: Eric Schlosser

quotes.quote: Fast food is hugely important in the life of a comedy writer. All we do is order in, and what we're going to eat is hotly debated.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: The American political system is like fast food - mushy, insipid, made out of disgusting parts of things and everybody wants some.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: We talk about, you know, diet and that we shouldn't give our kids big things and obesity and fast food. Well, you know there are people who don't have that problem because they're not getting any food! We have so many deep problems and issues facing humanity.
quotes.author: Chris North

quotes.quote: I don't know any chef who doesn't like fast food.
quotes.author: Paul Hollywood

quotes.quote: When we get in late and the only thing open is fast food, it can be tough to maintain a healthy diet.
quotes.author: Mike Trout

quotes.quote: We have sold ourselves into a fast food model of education, and it's impoverishing our spirit and our energies as much as fast food is depleting our physical bodies.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: We observe that in the scriptures, fasting almost always is linked with prayer. Without prayer, fasting is not complete fasting; it's simply going hungry.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: A fast is not a hunger strike. Fasting submits to God's commands. A hunger strike makes God submit to our demands.
quotes.author: Edwin Louis Cole

quotes.quote: The philosophy of fasting calls upon us to know ourselves, to master ourselves, and to discipline ourselves the better to free ourselves. To fast is to identify our dependencies, and free ourselves from them.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: Instead of looking outside of ourselves and counting potential enemies, fasting summons us to turn our glance inward, and to take the measure of our greatest challenge: the self, the ego, in our own eyes and as others see us.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: The reason for fasting is to understand the relationship between what's you and what's the accumulative body.
quotes.author: Jaggi Vasudev

quotes.quote: We observe that in the scriptures, fasting almost always is linked with prayer. Without prayer, fasting is not complete fasting; it’s simply going hungry.
quotes.author: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quotes.quote: The goal of fasting is inner unity.
quotes.author: Thomas Merton

quotes.quote: Fasting breaks the spirit of heaviness.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: Fasting of the body is food for the soul.
quotes.author: Saint John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: Fasting is truly a secret source of power.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: Fasting is the first principle of medicine; fast and see the strength of the spirit reveal itself.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Fasting is like spring cleaning for your body.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: Fasting is a constant means of renewing yourself spiritually.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: Fasting is not just a physical discipline; it can be a spiritual feast.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: The discipline of fasting breaks you out of the world's routine.
quotes.author: Jentezen Franklin

quotes.quote: Fasting blinds the body in order to open the eyes of your soul.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Fasting is futile unless it is accompanied by an incessant longing for self-restraint.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Fasting and feasting are universal human responses, and any meal, shared with love, can be an agape.
quotes.author: Elise M. Boulding

quotes.quote: Fasting confirms our utter dependence upon God by finding in Him a source of sustenance beyond food.
quotes.author: Dallas Willard

quotes.quote: Fasting is calculated to bring a note of urgency and importance into our praying, and to give force to our pleading in the court of heaven. The man who prays with fasting is giving heaven notice that he is truly in earnest.
quotes.author: Arthur Wallis

quotes.quote: Fasting makes sense if it really chips away at our security and, as a consequence, benefits someone else, if it helps us cultivate the style of the good Samaritan, who bent down to his brother in need and took care of him.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Fasting cleanses the soul, raises the mind, subjects one's flesh to the spirit, renders the heart contrite and humble, scatters the clouds of concupiscence, quenches the fire of lust, and kindles the true light of chastity. Enter again into yourself.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The purpose of fasting is to loosen to some degree the ties which bind us to the world of material things and our surroundings as a whole, in order that we may concentrate all our spiritual powers upon the unseen and eternal things
quotes.author: Ole Hallesby

quotes.quote: A narrow mind and a fat head invariably come on the same person.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Fat men take a cushion with them wherever they go.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Fat is your friend. The brain thrives on a fat-rich, low-carbohydrate diet.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.quote: So to me, fat just seems to be right to the point and the most descriptive way to say it.
quotes.author: Camryn Manheim

quotes.quote: Every fat person says it's not their fault, that they have gland trouble. You know which gland? The saliva gland. They can't push away from the table.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Fat and fitness can go together, ... It depends on other factors.
quotes.author: Liz Applegate

quotes.quote: Excess body fat alters the levels of the hormones insulin, leptin, and estrogen, and these factors are believed to be responsible for the acceleration of pubertal timing by obesity.
quotes.author: Joel Fuhrman

quotes.quote: Kids are fat because of lack of parenting.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: It's not the fat that's making you fat: it's not understanding separating carbohydrates from protein and fat.
quotes.author: Suzanne Somers

quotes.quote: When you get fat, you get a new personality. You can't help it. Complete strangers ascribe it to you.
quotes.author: Hilary Mantel

quotes.quote: You can be fat and still be sexy . It all depends on how you feel about yourself.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: You can be fat and love yourself. You can be fat and have a great damn personality. You can be fat and sew your own clothes. But you can't be fat and healthy.
quotes.author: Susan Powter

quotes.quote: Fat people are funny â€¦ until obesity pays your loved one a visit.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: A fat man is never so happy as when he is describing himself as "robust".
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: She's a big, fat woman star, and all big, fat women stars have a tough time with men.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Fat is one of the chief enemies of the heart because it has to be plentifully supplied with blood and thus needlessly increases the pumping load that the heart must sustain.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: Fat chance. In my estimation he is not going to be released anytime soon because there is a dead baby that's charred. If they want to give someone a chance, it's not going to be someone who burned a baby.
quotes.author: Denue Quotes

quotes.quote: I'm fat, but I'm thin inside... there's a thin man inside every fat man.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: I was fat, and that was awful because when you're young and sensitive, you think the world is over because you're fat.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: Being fat worked, and I think that was what was confusing for me for a long time in my career.
quotes.author: Ricki Lake

quotes.quote: Two forms of fat that are vitally important for brain health are cholesterol and saturated fat.
quotes.author: David Perlmutter

quotes.quote: My fat never made me less money.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Fat people are so rarely included in visual culture that fat is perceived as a blot on the landscape of sleek and slim.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: Congealed fat is pretty much the same, irrespective of the delicacy around which it is concealed.
quotes.author: Clement Freud

quotes.quote: When you get fat and lose your hunger. That is when you know the sellout has happened.
quotes.author: Bruce Springsteen

quotes.quote: Imprisoned in every fat man a thin man is wildly signaling to be let out.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: A fat stomach sticks out too far. It prevents you from looking down and seeing what is going on around you.
quotes.author: Norman Reilly Raine

quotes.quote: Fat is a way of saying no to powerlessness and self-denial.
quotes.author: Susie Orbach

quotes.quote: Outside every fat man there is an even fatter man trying to close in.
quotes.author: Kingsley Amis

quotes.quote: Thin people are beautiful, but fat people are adorable.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: If you say you're fat, all of a sudden people like you.
quotes.author: Valerie Bertinelli

quotes.quote: A diet that is high in fat, sugar and salt makes it really hard for a body to function efficiently.
quotes.author: Tamra Davis

quotes.quote: The reason fat men are good natured is they can neither fight nor run.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: I like fat people more then I like thin people, things are always a lot more funnier when they happen to fat people.
quotes.author: Lloyd Kaufman

quotes.quote: The only way you get that fat off is to eat less and exercise more.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: Fat is mainstream, which is why everyone has become complacent. What used to be considered pudgy before isn't even worthy of a comment today.
quotes.author: Marion Nestle

quotes.quote: The reason fat people are happy is that their nerves are well protected.
quotes.author: Luciano Pavarotti

quotes.quote: We create our fate every day we live.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Fate leads the willing and drags along the unwilling.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: No power or virtue of man could ever have deserved that what has been fated should not have taken place.
quotes.author: Marcellinus Ammianus

quotes.quote: Fate is nothing but the deeds committed in a prior state of existence.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Fate is for those too weak to determine their own destiny.
quotes.author: Kamran Hamid

quotes.quote: Men are not prisoners of fate, but only prisoners of their own minds.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Sometimes our fate resembles a fruit tree in winter. Who would think that those branches would turn green again and blossom, but we hope it, we know it.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Wherever a man may happen to turn, whatever a man may undertake, he will always end up by returning to the path which nature has marked out for him.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Each player must accept the cards life deals him or her. But once they are in hand, he or she alone must decide how to play the cards in order to win the game.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Many men would take the death sentence without a whimper to escape the life sentence which Fate carries in her hand.
quotes.author: T.E. Lawrence

quotes.quote: We may become the makers of our fate when we have ceased to pose as its prophets.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.quote: How a person masters his fate is more important than what his fate is.
quotes.author: Karl Wilhelm von Humboldt

quotes.quote: When an inner situation is not made conscious, it appears outside as fate.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: As we move through life, the force of fate creates events that we only appreciate when we reflect on our existence.
quotes.author: Ronald Harmon

quotes.quote: One meets his destiny often in the road he takes to avoid it.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Nothing happens by chance, my friend... No such thing as luck. A meaning behind every little thing, and such a meaning behind this. Part for you, part for me, may not see it all real clear right now, but we will, before long.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Whatever the universal nature assigns to any man at any time is for the good of that man at that time.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Man is manacled only by himself; thought and action are the jailers of Fate.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: You cannot be lost on a road that is straight.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: It lies not in our power to love, or hate,For will in us is over-rul'd by fate.
quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

quotes.quote: I do not believe in a fate that will fall on us no matter what we do. I do believe in a fate that will fall on us if we do nothing.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: We are spinning our own fates, good or evil, never to be undone.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Whoever yields properly to Fate, is deemedWise among men, and knows the laws of heaven.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Man does not control his own fate. The women in his life do that for him.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Fate's sentence written on the brow no hand can e'er efface.
quotes.author: Bhartrhari

quotes.quote: Maybe Fate isn't the pond you swim in but the fisherman floating on top of it, letting you run the line wild until you are weary enough to be reeled back in.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Fate is not an eagle, it creeps like a rat.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: Man may his fate foresee, but not prevent ...'Tis better to be fortunate than wise.
quotes.author: John Webster

quotes.quote: We seal our fate with the choices we make.
quotes.author: Gloria Estefan

quotes.quote: Lots of folks confuse bad management with destiny.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Failure and success seem to have been allotted to men by their stars. But they retain the power of wriggling, of fighting with their star or against it, and in the whole universe the only really interesting movement is this wriggle.
quotes.author: E.M. Forester

quotes.quote: I will seize fate by the throat; it shall certainly never wholly overcome me.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Fate laughs at probabilities.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: They... who awaitNo gifts from Chance, have conquered Fate.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: A door that seems to stand open must be a man's size, or it is not the door that Providence means for him.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Again, you can't connect the dots looking forward; you can only connect them looking backwards. So you have to trust that the dots will somehow connect in your future. You have to trust in something - your gut, destiny, life, karma, whatever. This approach has never let me down, and it has made all the difference in my life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Fate is like a strange, unpopular restaurant, filled with odd waiters who bring you things you never asked for and don't always like.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Fate loves the fearless.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: It matters not how strait the gate, How charged with punishments the scroll, I am the master of my fate: I am the captain of my soul.
quotes.author: William Ernest Henley

quotes.quote: Do not be afraid; our fateCannot be taken from us; it is a gift.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Once you make a decision, the universe conspires to make it happen.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sometimes life has a cruel sense of humor, giving you the thing you always wanted at the worst time possible.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: There is no chance, no destiny, no fate, that can circumvent or hinder or control the firm resolve of a determined soul.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Fate is never fair. You are caught in a current much stronger than you are; struggle against it and you'll drown not just yourself but those who try to save you. Swim with it. and you'll survive
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Yet it would be your duty to bear it, if you could not avoid it: it is weak and silly to say you cannot bear what it is your fate to be required to bear.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: I can control my destiny, but not my fate. Destiny means there are opportunities to turn right or left, but fate is a one-way street. I believe we all have the choice as to whether we fulfil our destiny, but our fate is sealed.
quotes.author: Paulo Coehlo

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as accident; it is fate misnamed.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: What separates the winners from the losers is how a person reacts to each new twist of fate.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Just because Fate doesn't deal you the right cards, it doesn't mean you should give up. It just means you have to play the cards you get to their maximum potential.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: You often meet your fate on the road you take to avoid it.You often meet your fate on the road you take to avoid it.
quotes.author: Goldie Hawn

quotes.quote: What's meant to be will always find a way.
quotes.author: Trisha Yearwood

quotes.quote: Until you make the unconscious conscious, it will direct your life and you will call it fate.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Amy Tan

quotes.quote: It's choice, not chance, that determines your destiny.
quotes.author: Jean Nidetch

quotes.quote: It is what a man thinks of himself that really determines his fate.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Fate leads the willing, and drags along the reluctant.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: When fate hands you a lemon, make lemonade.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: There is no fate that cannot be surmounted by scorn.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A person often meets his destiny on the road he took to avoid it.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: Every man has his own destiny. The only imperative is to follow it, to accept it, no matter where it leads him.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Necessity is harsh. Fate has no reprieve.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: I believe in luck and fate and I believe in karma, that the energy you put out in the world comes back to meet you.
quotes.author: Chris Pine

quotes.quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: He cannot complain of a hard sentence, who is made master of his own fate.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: There's much to be said for challenging fate instead of ducking behind it.
quotes.author: Diana Trilling

quotes.quote: Fate is the endless chain of causation, whereby things are; the reason or formula by which the world goes on.
quotes.author: Zeno

quotes.quote: There is no armor against fate.
quotes.author: James Shirley

quotes.quote: The best of men cannot suspend their fate; The good die early, and the bad die late.
quotes.author: Daniel Defoe

quotes.quote: The fate of our times is characterized by rationalization and intellectualization and, above all, by the disenchantment of the world.
quotes.author: The Place of Enchantment: British Occultism and the Culture of the Modern

quotes.quote: Every individual acts and suffers in accordance with his peculiar teleology, which has all the inevitability of fate, so long as he does not understand it.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: My fate has been that what I undertook was fully understood only after the fact.
quotes.author: Benoit Mandelbrot

quotes.quote: Tis Fate that flings the dice, And as she flings Of kings makes peasants, And of peasants kings.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Death and life have their determined appointments; riches and honors depend upon heaven.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: I thank fate for having made me born poor. Poverty taught me the true value of the gifts useful to life.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: We may become the makers of our fate when we have ceased to pose as its prophets.
quotes.author: Karl Popper

quotes.quote: There is but one philosophy and its name is fortitude! To bear is to conquer our fate.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: The wheel of fortune turns round incessantly, and who can say to himself, I shall today be uppermost.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: We cannot bear to regard ourselves simply as playthings of blind chance, we cannot admit to feeling ourselves abandoned.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: If you believe in fate to your harm, believe in it, at least, for your good.
quotes.author: Emerson

quotes.quote: Go with your fate, but not beyond. Beyond leads to dark places.
quotes.author: Mary Renault

quotes.quote: Remember upon the conduct of each depends the fate of all.
quotes.author: Alexander The Great

quotes.quote: The true adventurer goes forth aimless and uncalculating to meet and greet unknown fate.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: Whatever limits us we call fate.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: What fates impose, that men must needs abide; it boots not to resist both wind and tide.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fate leads him who follows it, and drags him who resist.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The fates lead the willing, and drag the unwilling.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Control your fate or somebody else will.
quotes.author: Heinrich von Pierer

quotes.quote: The fate of love is that it always seems too little or too much.
quotes.author: Amelia Barr

quotes.quote: Fate is the friend of the good, the guide of the wise, the tyrant of the foolish, the enemy of the bad.
quotes.author: William Rounseville Alger

quotes.quote: Actions are the seed of fate deeds grow into destiny.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: All things are in fate, yet all things are not decreed by fate.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: To a father growing old nothing is dearer than a daughter.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: The father of a daughter is nothing but a high-class hostage. A father turns a stony face to his sons, berates them, shakes his antlers, paws the ground, snorts, runs them off into the underbrush, but when his daughter puts her arm over his shoulder and says, 'Daddy, I need to ask you something,' he is a pat of butter in a hot frying pan.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: There's something like a line of gold thread running through a man's words when he talks to his daughter, and gradually over the years it gets to be long enough for you to pick up in your hands and weave into a cloth that feels like love itself.
quotes.author: John Gregory Brown

quotes.quote: Fathers, be good to your daughters. You are the god and the weight of her world.
quotes.author: John Mayor

quotes.quote: They say that from the instant he lays eyes on her, a father adores his daughter. Whoever she grows up to be, she is always to him that little girl in pigtails. She makes him feel like Christmas. In exchange, he makes a secret promise not to see the awkwardness of her teenage years, the mistakes she makes or the secrets she keeps.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: The thing to remember about fathers is, they're men. A girl has to keep it in mind: They are dragon-seekers, bent on improbable rescues. Scratch any father, you find someone chock-full of qualms and romantic terrors, believing change is a threat - like your first shoes with heels on, like your first bicycle it took such months to get.
quotes.author: Phyllis McGinley

quotes.quote: A father should be his son's first hero, and his daughters first love.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again.
quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

quotes.quote: You fathers will understand. You have a little girl. She looks up to you. You're her oracle. You're her hero. And then the day comes when she gets her first permanent wave and goes to her first real party, and from that day on, you're in a constant state of panic.
quotes.author: Stanley T. Banks

quotes.quote: A daughter may outgrow your lap, but she will never outgrow your heart.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Certain is it that there is no kind of affection so purely angelic as of a father to a daughter. In love to our wives there is desire; to our sons, ambition; but to our daughters there is something which there are no words to express.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: A father is available to help his daughter balance both her love and her anger toward her mother, to moderate the inevitable emotional extremes in the intense mother-daughter equation. With Daddy's steadying influence daughters can learn to be comfortable with healthy anger, rather than feeling that they must be eternal good girls who must at all costs conceal it.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: A father... knows exactly what those boys at the mall have in their depraved little minds because he once owned such a depraved little mind himself. In fact, if he thinks enough about the plans that he used to have for young girls, the father not only will support his wife in keeping their daughter home but he might even run over to the mall and have a few of those boys arrested.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: I am not ashamed to say that no man I ever met was my father's equal, and I never loved any other man as much.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: It was my father who taught me to value myself. He told me that I was uncommonly beautiful and that I was the most precious thing in his life.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.quote: It is admirable for a man to take his son fishing, but there is a special place in heaven for the father who takes his daughter shopping.
quotes.author: John Sinor

quotes.quote: Fathers can seem powerful and overwhelming to their daughters. Let her see your soft side. Express your feelings and reactions. Te ll her where you came from and how you got there. Let her see that you have had fears, failures, anxious times, hurts, just like hers, even though you may look flawless to her.
quotes.author: Stella Chess

quotes.quote: When a father gives his daughter an emotional visa to strike out on her own, he is always with her. Such a daughter has her encour aging, understanding daddy in her head, cheering her on--not simply as a woman but as a whole, unique human being with unlimited possibilities.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: Many a man wishes he were strong enough to tear a telephone book in half, especially if he has a teenage daughter.
quotes.author: Guy Lombardo

quotes.quote: I am a princess not because I have a prince, but because my father is a king.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Any astronomer can predict with absolute accuracy just where every star in the universe will be at 11:30 tonight. He can make no such prediction about his teenage daughter.
quotes.author: James T. Adams

quotes.quote: Hopefully we were all daddy's little girl. He was and hopefully still is wrapped around our little finger. Not to take advantage of more just for the comfort of knowing he is there.
quotes.author: Violette DeSantis

quotes.quote: I may neither choose who I would, nor refuse who I dislike; so is the will of a living daughter curbed by the will of a dead father.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All fathers are invisible in daytime; daytime is ruled by mothers and fathers come out at night. Darkness brings home fathers, with their real, unspeakable power. There is more to fathers than meets the eye.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back.
quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

quotes.quote: Fathers are still considered the most important "doers" in our culture, and in most families they are that. Girls see them as the family authorities on careers, and so fathers' encouragement and counsel is important to them. When fathers don't take their daughters' achievements and plans seriously, girls sometimes have trouble taking themselves seriously.
quotes.author: Stella Chess

quotes.quote: A daughter needs a loving, available, predictable father or father figure who can be counted on, whether divorced or at home. She needs his best paternal intentions, even if his efforts occasionally fall short. She needs his maturity and limit setting and sexual oppositeness, so that she can function with confidence in the wider world of adult love and work.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: Our daughters are the most precious of our treasures, the dearest possessions of our homes and the objects of our most watchful love.
quotes.author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quotes.quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
quotes.author: Hesburgh

quotes.quote: My father didn't tell me how to live. He lived, and let me watch him do it.

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.

quotes.quote: As the lily among thorns, so is my love among the daughters.

quotes.quote: A good father is one of the most unsung, unpraised, unnoticed, and yet one of the most valuable assets in our society.

quotes.quote: Your daughter is your child for life.

quotes.quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.

quotes.quote: A daughter is the happy memories of the past, the joyful moments of the present, and the hope and promise of the future.

quotes.quote: By the time a man realizes that maybe his father was right, he usually has a son who thinks he's wrong.

quotes.quote: Fathers, be good to your daughters. You are the god and the weight of her world.

quotes.quote: A father is a banker provided by nature.

quotes.quote: His heritage to his children wasn't words or possessions, but an unspoken treasure, the treasure of his example as a man and a father.

quotes.quote: Noble fathers have noble children.

quotes.quote: My father didn't tell me how to live; he lived,and let me watch him do it.

quotes.quote: When my father didn't have my hand, he had my back.

quotes.quote: A father is neither an anchor to holdÂ us back, nor a sail to take us there, but a guiding light whose love shows us the way.

quotes.quote: The gift of a Father cannot been seen by our eyes, yet he sacrificed his every breath,sweat and everything to comfort us, his family.

quotes.quote: Becoming a father is easy enough, but being one can be very rough.

quotes.quote: A Father is someone you look up to no matter how tall you grow.

quotes.quote: A father is a man who fails every day.

quotes.quote: When you're young, you think your dad is Superman. Then you grow up, and you realize he's just a regular guy who wears a cape.Â

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.

quotes.quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.

quotes.quote: No one in this world can love a girl more than her father.

quotes.quote: Dads are most ordinary men turned by love into heroes, adventurers, story-tellers, singers of songs.

quotes.quote: Every father should remember that one day his son will follow his example instead of his advice.

quotes.quote: A king, realizing his incompetence, can either delegate or abdicate his duties. A father can do neither. If only sons could see the paradox, they would understand the delimma.

quotes.quote: One father is enough to govern one hundred sons, but not a hundred sons one father.

quotes.quote: One father is more than a hundred schoolmasters.

quotes.quote: To her, the name of father was another name for love.

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.

quotes.quote: Any man can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad.

quotes.quote: Lucky that man whose children make his happiness in life and not his grief, the anguished disappointment of his hopes.

quotes.quote: A father is someone who can take the place of all others, but whose place no one else can take.

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.Â
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fathers, like mothers, are not born. Men grow into fathers and fathering is a very important stage in their development.
quotes.author: David M. Gottesman

quotes.quote: Dad, I may not be the best, but I come to believe that I got it in me to be somebody in this world. And it's not because I'm so different from you either. It's because I'm the same. I mean, I can be just as hard-headed, and just as tough. I only hope I can be as good a man as you.Â

quotes.quote: The father who does not teach his son his duties is equally guilty as the son who neglects them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Anyone can be a father, but it takes someone special to be a dad, and that's why I call you dad, because you are so special to me. You taught me the game and you taught me how to play it right.Â

quotes.quote: I've had a hard life, but my hardships are nothing against the hardships that my father went through in order to get me to where I started.Â

quotes.quote: My dad, like any coach, has always stressed the fundamentals. He taught me responsibility, accountability, and the importance of hard work.

quotes.quote: The quality of a father can be seen in the goals, dreams and aspirations he sets not only for himself, but for his family.

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The nature of impending fatherhood is that you are doing something that you're unqualified to do, and then you become qualified while doing it.

quotes.quote: The imprint of the father, remains forever on the life of the child.

quotes.quote: My father taught me that the only way you can make good at anything is to practice, and then practice some more.Â
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: A good father is one of the most unsung, unpraised, unnoticed, and yet one of the most valuable assets in our society.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I can definitely say the older I've got the better I've become at being a dad and a husband.Â
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: He didn't tell me how to live; he lived, and let me watch him do it.
quotes.author: Clarence Budington Kelland

quotes.quote: A truly rich man is one whose children run into his arms when his hands are empty.

quotes.quote: I love my father as the stars - he's a bright shining example and a happy twinkling in my heart.

quotes.quote: You will find that if you really try to be a father, your child will meet you halfway.

quotes.quote: Why are men reluctant to become fathers? They aren't through being children.

quotes.quote: Being a great father is like shaving. No matter how good you shaved today, you have to do it again tomorrow.
quotes.author: Reed Markham

quotes.quote: Be a dad. Don't be 'Mom's Assistant'.... Be a man.... Fathers have skills that they never use at home. You run a landscaping business and you can't dress and feed a four-year-old? Take it on. Spend time with your kids.... It won't take away your manhood, it will give it to you.
quotes.author: Louis CK

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is pretending the present you love most is "soap-on-a-rope."
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: It is easier for a father to have children than for children to have a real father.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: A good father is one of the most unsung, unpraised, unnoticed, and yet one of the most valuable assets in our society.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any need in childhood as strong as the need for a father's protection.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: It was my father who taught me to value myself. He told me that I was uncommonly beautiful and that I was the most precious thing in his life.
quotes.author: Dawn French

quotes.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: It is a wise father that knows his own child.

quotes.quote: If the new American father feels bewildered and even defeated, let him take comfort from the fact that whatever he does in any fathering situation has a 50 percent chance of being right.

quotes.quote: When my kids were younger, I used to avoid them. I used to sit on the toilet 'til my legs fell asleep. You want to know why your father spends so long in the toilet? Because he's not sure he wants to be a father.

quotes.quote: The nature of impending fatherhood is that you are doing something that you're unqualified to do, and then you become qualified while doing it.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: The father who does not teach his son his duties is equally guilty with the son who neglects them.

quotes.quote: The fundamental defect with fathers is that they want their children to be a credit to them.

quotes.quote: Fathers, like mothers, are not born. Men grow into fathers and fathering is a very important stage in their development.
quotes.author: David Gottesman

quotes.quote: Be kind to thy father, for when thou were young, who loved thee so fondly as he? He caught the first accents that fell from thy tongue, and joined in thy innocent glee.

quotes.quote: Noble fathers have noble children.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Until you have a son of your own... you will never know the joy, the love beyond feeling that resonates in the heart of a father as he looks upon his son. You will never know the sense of honor that makes a man want to be more than he is and to pass something good and hopeful into the hands of his son. And you will never know the heartbreak of the fathers who are haunted by the personal demons that keep them from being the men they want their sons to be.

quotes.quote: To be a successful father there's one absolute rule: when you have a kid, don't look at it for the first two years.

quotes.quote: The older I get, the smarter my father seems to get.

quotes.quote: By the time a man realizes that maybe his father was right, he usually has a son who thinks he's wrong.

quotes.quote: The fathers who laugh with his kids more than he lectures them is way ahead of the game.

quotes.quote: It's a strange but pleasant evolution for fathers—realizing that the reality of your relationship with your children is not what you thought when you first had them.

quotes.quote: The best thing a father could do for his son is die.

quotes.quote: When you become a father, you get scared about everything.

quotes.quote: When I was a boy of fourteen, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be twenty one, I was astonished at how much he has learned in seven years.

quotes.quote: I was the same kind of father as I was a harpist—I played bye ear.

quotes.quote: My father was often angry when I was most like him.

quotes.quote: Being a dad is one of the oldest 'professions' around.

quotes.quote: The search for a father is a search for authority outside of yourself; you feel wraithlike,incomplete without him, in whatever form he takes.

quotes.quote: We're sure of this: it is an astonishingly happy, challenging, various, and always evolving relationship, or set of relationships, this fatherhood.

quotes.quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Never raise your hands to your kids, it leaves your groin unprotected.

quotes.quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family: The provider for all and the enemy of all.
quotes.author: J. August Strindberg

quotes.quote: The greatest tribute a boy can give to his father is to say, 'When I grow up, I want to be just like my dad.' It is a convicting responsibility for us fathers and grandfathers.

quotes.quote: A king, realising his incompetence, can either delegate or abdicate his duties. A father can do neither. If only sons could see the paradox, they would understand the dilemma.

quotes.quote: If there is any immortality to be had among us human beings, it is certainly only in the love that we leave behind. Father's like mine don't ever die.

quotes.quote: Every father should remember one day his son will follow his example, not his advice.

quotes.quote: A girl’s father is the first man in her life, and probably the most influential.

quotes.quote: It’s only when you grow up and step back from him — or leave him for your own home — it’s only then that you can measure his greatness and fully appreciate it.
quotes.author: Margaret Truman

quotes.quote: How pleasant it is for a father to sit at his child's board. It is like an aged man reclining under the shadow of an oak which he has planted.

quotes.quote: I would define a leader as a person who puts the welfare of the group above himself. It's the same thing with fathers.

quotes.quote: To be a father requires patience, love and giving up the 'all about me' attitude.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: I believe that what we become depends on what our fathers teach us at odd moments, when they aren't trying to teach us. We are formed by little scraps of wisdom.

quotes.quote: There must always be a struggle between a father and son, while one aims at power and the other at independence.

quotes.quote: Perhaps host and guest is really the happiest relation for father and son.

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood but the heart which makes us fathers and sons.

quotes.quote: By the time a man realizes that maybe his father was right, he usually has a son who thinks he's wrong.

quotes.quote: No love is greater than that of a father for His son.

quotes.quote: For thousands of years, father and son have stretched wistful hands across the canyon of time.

quotes.quote: Its a rare thing when a father and son can share the same experience. My father and I have seen all 19 Bond films together, two or three times.

quotes.quote: With sons and fathers, there's an inexplicable connection and imprint that your father leaves on you.

quotes.quote: When a father gives to his son, both laugh; when a son gives to his father, both cry.

quotes.quote: A man's desire for a son is usually nothing but the wish to duplicate himself in order that such a remarkable pattern may not be lost to the world.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Every son quotes his father, in words and in deeds.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: One father is enough to govern one hundred sons, but not a hundred sons one father.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: At the gambling table, there are no fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The father who does not teach his son his duties is equally guilty with the son who neglects them.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: When you teach your son, you teach your son's son.
quotes.author: The Talmud

quotes.quote: Every father should remember that one day his son will follow his example instead of his advice.
quotes.author: Charles F Kettering

quotes.quote: Not every father gets a chance to start his son off in his own footsteps.
quotes.author: Alan Ladd

quotes.quote: My father didn't tell me how to live; he lived, and let me watch him do it.
quotes.author: Clarence B. Kelland

quotes.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: The fact my relationship with my son is so good makes me forgiving of my father and also appreciative.

quotes.quote: What was silent in the father speaks in the son, and often I found in the son the unveiled secret of the father.

quotes.quote: Fathers and sons arrive at that relationship only by claiming that relationship: that is by paying for it. If the relationship of father to son could really be reduced to biology, the whole earth would blaze with the glory of fathers and sons.

quotes.quote: A man knows when he is growing old because he begins to look like his father.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: A son is not a judge of his father, but the conscience of the father is in his son.
quotes.author: Simon Soloveychik

quotes.quote: Son needs his father at every situation he faces in present, and a father needs his son at every situation he faces for his son in past.
quotes.author: Nishan Panwar

quotes.quote: For rarely are sons similar to their fathers: most are worse, and a few are better than their fathers.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: It is not flesh and blood, but heart which makes us fathers and sons.
quotes.author: Johann Friedrich Von Schiller

quotes.quote: My father gave me the greatest gift anyone could give another person, he believed in me.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: A new father quickly learns that his child invariably comes to the bathroom at precisely the times when he's in there, as if he needed company. The only way for this father to be certain of bathroom privacy is to shave at the gas station.

quotes.quote: You don't raise heroes, you raise sons. And if you treat them like sons, they'll turn out to be heroes, even if it's just in your own eyes.
quotes.author: Walter M. Schirra, Sr.

quotes.quote: We think our fathers fools, so wise we grow. Our wiser sons, no doubt will think us so.

quotes.quote: I love the comic opportunities that come up in the context of a father-son relationship.

quotes.quote: Forget Batman: when I really thought about what I wanted to be when I grew up, I wanted to be my dad.

quotes.quote: He followed in his father's footsteps, but his gait was somewhat erratic.
quotes.author: Nicolas Bentley

quotes.quote: As a father, my first priority is to help my sons set and attain personal goals so they will develop self-confidence and individual strength. Engaging in regular fitness activities with my children helps me fulfill those responsibilities.

quotes.quote: The greatest gift I ever had came from God, and I call him Dad!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Frank Capra was a prop man, I think. John Ford was a prop man. It was a little bit of a father and son thing, and you kind of worked your way up.

quotes.quote: My father and I made genetics history. We were the first African-Americans and the first father and son anywhere to have their genomes sequenced.

quotes.quote: Fathers and sons are much more considerate of one another than mothers and daughters.

quotes.quote: No one would be foolish enough to choose war over peace-in peace sons bury their fathers, but in war fathers bury their sons.

quotes.quote: Join me, and together we can rule the galaxy as father and son.
quotes.author: George Lucas

quotes.quote: Tiger father begets tiger son.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: It's a father's duty to give his sons a fine chance.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: If a father commands a son to commit a crime so terrible that the son can't do it and live with himself, then is it betrayal for the son to disobey his father?

quotes.quote: A man never stands as tall as when he kneels to help a child.

quotes.quote: Baseball is fathers and sons playing catch, lazy and murderous, wild and controlled, the profound archaic song of birth, growth, age, and death.

quotes.quote: I distrust any man who claims to have had a continuous friendship with his father. How did he get from fourteen to twenty six?

quotes.quote: Fathers send their sons to college either because they went to college or because they didn't.

quotes.quote: I think the saddest day of my life was when I realized I could beat my dad at most things and Bart experienced that at the age of four.

quotes.quote: If the past cannot teach the present, and the father cannot teach the son, then history need not have bothered to go on, and the world has wasted a great deal of time.

quotes.quote: Consider your son to be your apprentice in life. That's the way it used to be. The son was always with the father, either in the shop or in the field. So he learned from a very early age how being a man and a father was all about.

quotes.quote: I believe now that my father was perhaps the greatest fisherman and baseball player of all time, not because he was very good at either one but because he had the patience and wisdom to raise someone who was.
quotes.author: Joe Kita

quotes.quote: The first time my dad saw me in lipstick he said: 'Tell me the truth son, are you a nancy boy?'
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: The relationship between father and son can be notoriously tricky, as the younger man seeks to assert himself in adulthood. In a perfect world they can end up bestfriends but in other cases they may fight like Tom and Jerry.
quotes.author: Geoff Tibballs

quotes.quote: A king realising his incompetence can either delegate or abdicate his duties. A father can do neither. If only sons could see the paradox, they would understand the dilemma.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: The parent who could see his boy as he really is would shake his head and say, 'Willie is no good. I'll sell him.'
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: Growing up my father told me I could be whomever I wanted. What a cruel hoax that was! I'm still his son.
quotes.author: Kenny Smith

quotes.quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family: The provider for all and the enemy of all.
quotes.author: J. August Strindberg

quotes.quote: His little son into his bosom creeps. The lively picture of his father's face.
quotes.author: Phineas Fletcher

quotes.quote: Having a child ends forever a man's boyhood, if not his boyishness. Having a child means that the son has, in a real sense, become his father. Sons are for fathers the twice-told tale.
quotes.author: Victoria Secunda

quotes.quote: A good father believes that he does wisely to encourage enterprise, productive skill, prudent self-denial, and judicious expenditure on the part of his son.
quotes.author: William Graham Sumner

quotes.quote: A wise son maketh a glad father: but a foolish son is the heaviness of his mother.
quotes.author: The Bible

quotes.quote: The Father is the source of all blessings and the son is the channel of all blessing, and it is through the Holy spirit at work in us that all truth becomes living and operative in our lives.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Son when you grow up what shall you be? / Would I be a father that you could never be? / Mark a star and walk on my shoe / It’s easy as you go, I shall go beyond too.
quotes.author: Abiansh Parajuli

quotes.quote: A father sees his son nearing manhood. / What shall he tell that son? / 'Life is hard; be steel; be a rock.' / And this might stand him for the storms.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Now I am myself, father / But I still miss my father / That's why my heart showers love / For entire humanity.
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: His grave is growing old and green / And things have altered rather / But still I think ’twas mighty mean / The way I treated father. / He left a tidy sum to me / But I’d give all the money / To hear him say, “Will you get up / And bile the billy, Sonny?”
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Lord, as his father, now I pray / For manhood's strength and counsel wise / Let me deal justly, day by day / In all that fatherhood implies./ To be his father, keep me fit / Let me not play the hypocrite!
quotes.author: Edgar Albert Guest
