Keep your behavior positive because your behavior becomes your habits. Keep your habits positive because your habits become your values. Keep your values positive because your values become your destiny.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: We should always pray for help, but we should always listen for inspiration and impression to proceed in ways different from those we may have thought of.
quotes.author: John H. Groberg

quotes.quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think and twice as beautiful as you've ever imagined.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Just do your best. I find that if I set that goal for myself and no one else, I feel good.
quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

quotes.quote: Let your dreams be bigger than your fears, your actions louder than your words, and your faith stronger than your feelings.
quotes.author: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
quotes.author: Kenji Miyazawa

quotes.quote: How I feel about myself is more important than how I look. Feeling confident, being comfortable in your skin that's what really makes you beautiful.
quotes.author: Bobbi Brown

quotes.quote: Like anyone else, there are days I feel beautiful and days I don't, and when I don't, I do something about it.
quotes.author: Cheryl Tiegs

quotes.quote: Beauty is how you feel inside, and it reflects in your eyes. It is not something physical.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: I feel beautiful when I'm at peace with myself. When I'm serene, when I'm a good person, when I've been considerate of others.
quotes.author: Elle Macpherson

quotes.quote: It's not vanity to feel you have a right to be beautiful. Women are taught to feel we're not good enough, that we must live up to someone else's standards. But my aim is to cherish myself as I am.
quotes.author: Elle Mcpherson

quotes.quote: And barefoot or first thing in the morning, I feel beautiful. Because I feel like me. I didn't always feel that way, but I feel that way now. When somebody just loves you, and when you make somebody happy, when your presence seems to make them happy, you suddenly feel like the most beautiful person in the world.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Beauty is eternity gazing at itself in a mirror.But you are eternity and you are the mirror.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Although beauty may be in the eye of the beholder, the feeling of being beautiful exists solely in the mind of the beheld.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: It's important to feel beautiful; it's political to feel beautiful.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: I know now that it's really important to feel beautiful. There is a power to that.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: But looking beautiful isn't, I think, as important as feeling beautiful.
quotes.author: Julia Quinn

quotes.quote: You've got to get up every morning with a smile on your face / And show the world all the love in your heart / Then people gonna treat you better / You're gonna find, yes you will / That you're beautiful as you feel.
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: I don't look my best when I wake up. But, I do feel beautiful when I'm tired and happy and I've had a good laugh and a glass of champagne.
quotes.author: Maya Rudolph

quotes.quote: When I lay my head on the pillow at night I can say I was a decent person today. That's when I feel beautiful.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a woman more beautiful than the belief that she is beautiful.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.quote: You need to feel beautiful on your own before a guy can make you feel beautiful, because it wont be a healthy relationship.
quotes.author: Megan Park

quotes.quote: I want to feel beautiful, like when he told me I was.
quotes.author: Pamela L. Ritchie

quotes.quote: You should feel beautiful and you should feel safe. What you surround yourself with should bring you peace of mind and peace of spirit.
quotes.author: Stacy London

quotes.quote: I never think, Oh, I'm so beautiful. To me, feeling happy is more important.
quotes.author: Leslie Bibb

quotes.quote: I feel most beautiful at night, when I take my makeup off and it's just me.
quotes.author: Ashley Greene

quotes.quote: I believe that how you feel is very important to how you look - that healthy equals beautiful.
quotes.author: Victoria Principal

quotes.quote: Personally, I don't ever want to depend on makeup to feel beautiful.
quotes.author: Lupita Nyong'o

quotes.quote: To be beautiful means to be yourself. You don't need to be accepted by others. You need to accept yourself.
quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Beauty does not always feel beautiful.
quotes.author: Tynee Williams

quotes.quote: Looking beautiful starts by feeling beautiful.
quotes.author: Tresors De Luxe

quotes.quote: The first question I ask myself when something doesn't seem to be beautiful is why do I feel it's not beautiful? And very shortly you discover there is no reason.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: Confidence is the ability to feel beautiful without needing someone to tell you.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Despite the message of self-doubt and inadequacy hammered home by the beauty industry, the truth is simple: If you feel gorgeous, you'll look gorgeous.
quotes.author: Anita Roddick

quotes.quote: Beauty can't amse you, but brainwork— reading, writing, thinking— can.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: I am so beautiful, sometimes people weep when they see me. And it has nothing to do with what I look like really, it is just that I gave myself the power to say that I am beautiful, and if I can do that, maybe there is hope for them, too. And the great divide between the beautiful and the ugly will cease to be. Because we are all what we choose.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: I was sweaty, and my hair was matted all over the place. And I was happy and hot and accomplishing a lot and running around, and I could feel my heart beating, and I felt beautiful.
quotes.author: Angelina Jolie

quotes.quote: Taught from infancy that beauty is woman's sceptre, the mind shapes itself to the body, and roaming round its gilt cage, only seeks to adorn its prison.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: I think that the longer I look good, the better gay men feel.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: There is a certain age when a woman must be beautiful to be loved, and then there comes a time when she must be loved to be beautiful.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: Now that I'm pregnant I feel beautiful for the first time in my life.
quotes.author: Karen Alexander

quotes.quote: Remind yourself everyday that you are beautiful, whether you struggle to believe that or you already know.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: I think I'm a very pretty girl. I'm never going to pretend to think otherwise.
quotes.author: Milla Jovovich

quotes.quote: I am comfortable in my clothes. I am naturally beautiful. I recognize that I have true beauty.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: I see myself as sexy. If you are comfortable with it, it can be very classy and appealing.
quotes.author: Aaliyah

quotes.quote: I am healthy and attractive. I am free of negativity. I see myself as beautiful.
quotes.author: Becca Anderson

quotes.quote: Beauty is about being comfortable in your own skin . It's about knowing and accepting who you are.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Beauty as we feel it is something indescribable: what is or what it means can never be said.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Beauty is momentary in he mind— / The fitful tracing of a portal; / But in the flesh it is immortal; / The body dies; the body;s beauty lives.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Research shows the way someone feels about their looks has a far greater effect on their quality of life than how they actually look.
quotes.author: Jessamy Hibberd

quotes.quote: Recognising this difference (how you look versus how you feel about how you look) is the first step to feeling more beautiful.
quotes.author: Jessamy Hibberd

quotes.quote: What really makes me feel beautiful is that I can finally feel the powerful emotion of love.
quotes.author: Nancy Ostrov

quotes.quote: All that matters to me now is that people see me as a beautiful woman, and for the first time in my life, I feel beautiful.
quotes.author: Nancy Ostrov

quotes.quote: What we don't get is no one can make us feel beautiful, unless we know and we feel that we are.
quotes.author: Rosilia A. Albert

quotes.quote: I'm beautiful because I can feel it, I can taste it, I can smell it. It's all over me. I have a big heart, a beautiful heart. Anyone that comes in contact with me will always feel my beauty.
quotes.author: Rosilia A. Albert

quotes.quote: There is nothing to do except to be just who you are. You have the right to feel beautiful and enjoy it.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: What matters is how you feel inside, because feeling beautiful on the inside is key to looking good.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: I think that glamour is about confidence. I think however somebody feels beautiful, that's glamour.
quotes.author: Kate Upton

quotes.quote: As a woman, I believe you have to embrace your body, and feel beautiful both inside and out.
quotes.author: Tamara Ecclestone

quotes.quote: Beauty is really all about confidence. If you feel beautiful, then you are beautiful.
quotes.author: Sofia Vergara

quotes.quote: 'You can't be beautiful,' Brandy says about a thousand times, 'until you feel beautiful.'
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: I contend that every woman has the right to feel beautiful, no matter how scrambled her features, or how indifferent her features.
quotes.author: Marie Dressler

quotes.quote: When I despair, I remember that all through history the way of truth and love have always won. There have been tyrants and murderers, and for a time, they can seem invincible, but in the end, they always fall. Think of it — always.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Write your sad times in sand, write your good times in stone.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Breathing is hard. When you cry so much, it makes you realize that breathing is hard.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Even when you are feeling down, you have to live your life positively, that way, happy days and happy feelings will come to you some day.
quotes.author: Kim Hyun-joong

quotes.quote: As the light begins to intensify, so does my misery, and I wonder how it is possible to hurt so much when nothing is wrong.
quotes.author: Tabitha Suzuma

quotes.quote: Most of my life I've had long periods of feeling down and lost. That's why every five years or so I've smashed my life to pieces and started again.
quotes.author: Siobhan Fahey

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I guess that's what saying good-bye is always like — like jumping off an edge. The worst part is making the choice to do it. Once you're in the air, there's nothing you can do but let go.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: The rose and the thorn, and sorrow and gladness are linked together.
quotes.author: Saadi

quotes.quote: She had tricked him. She had made him leave his old self behind and come into her world, and then before he was really at home in it but too late to go back, she had left him stranded there — like an astronaut wandering about on the moon. Alone.
quotes.author: Katherine Paterson

quotes.quote: Whenever you're feeling down..And I am not around let the sight of me be the reason you smile.
quotes.author: Shahrukh Khan

quotes.quote: Whenever you leave behind failure that means you're doing better. If you think everything you've done has been great, you're probably dumb.
quotes.author: Louis CK

quotes.quote: I seldom think about my limitations, and they never make me sad. Perhaps there is just a touch of yearning at times; but it is vague, like a breeze among flowers.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: It feels like every other part of my body is broken too.
quotes.author: Missy Altijd

quotes.quote: You not supposed to feel down over whatever happen to you. I mean, you're supposed to use whatever happen to you as some type of upper, not a downer.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: When you are feeling down, look at the skies. You are not always alone.
quotes.author: EunB

quotes.quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: When someone you love dies, you don't lose them all at once. You lose them in pieces over time.
quotes.author: Simon Birch

quotes.quote: If you fell down yesterday, stand up today.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: This is what it felt like to have a broken heart. It felt less like a cracking down the middle and more like she had swallowed it whole and it sat bruised and bleeding in the pit of her stomach.
quotes.author: Wendy Wunder

quotes.quote: I just got tired of being sick and tired and feeling down. Unfortunately, you don't realize this until you're getting sober but the reason why you're depressed all the time is it's the drugs that are depressing you.
quotes.author: Steven Adler

quotes.quote: I try to make myself do things for other people when I'm feeling down. Like, you can call your local hospital and help out in the pediatric unit.
quotes.author: Abigail Breslin

quotes.quote: When you're feeling down, sad, lonely, negative, you don't want to take care of yourself - and the weight problem and the diabetic problem and the heart attack and stroke problems and high cholesterol set in.
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.quote: You were merely wishing for the end of pain, the monster said. Your own pain. An end to how it isolated you. It is the most human wish of all.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: I think I'm afraid to be happy because whenever I get too happy, something bad always happens.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Regrets are the tears of choices not made, and of good deeds left undone.
quotes.author: Jonathan Lockwood Huie

quotes.quote: Pick yourself up when you're feeling down. No one else is likely to.
quotes.author: Catherine DeVrye

quotes.quote: It's raining in my heart like it's raining in the city. What is this sadness that pierces my heart?
quotes.author: Sonya Sones

quotes.quote: Don't mind me. I'll just sit here, crying over yesterday.
quotes.author: P.M. Harrison

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Alas for those that never sing, But die with all their music in them!
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quotes.quote: Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A big part of letting go is recognizing when it is time to stay in a situation and when it is time to move on.
quotes.author: Darren L. Johnson

quotes.quote: You can go to the doctor a million times if you're feeling down, and get nowhere, but if you go for a run it makes you feel really good.
quotes.author: Gail Porter

quotes.quote: You're only given a little spark of madness. You mustn't lose it.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Be selective with your battles. Sometimes peace is better than being right.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Each day you only have a limited amount of time and energy. Don’t waste it stressing about things you cannot control.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Your thoughts are a steering wheel. Watch where you aim them.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: You have it within you to rise above whatever is bringing you down.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: It’s okay not to be okay – as long as you are not giving up.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Things change. And friends leave. Life doesn't stop for anybody.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: You cannot protect yourself from sadness without protecting yourself from happiness.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Tears come from the heart and not from the brain.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: To have felt too much is to end in feeling nothing.
quotes.author: Dorothy Thompson

quotes.quote: It's sad when someone you know becomes someone you knew.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: It will never rain roses: when we want to have more roses, we must plant more roses.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Life's under no obligation to give us what we expect.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: Sometimes you've got to be able to listen to yourself and be okay with no one else understanding.
quotes.author: Christopher Barzak

quotes.quote: One thing you can't hide — is when you're crippled inside.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Heavy hearts, like heavy clouds in the sky, are best relieved by the letting of a little water.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Mostly it is loss which teaches us about the worth of things.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: I didn't want to wake up. I was having a much better time asleep. And that's really sad. It was almost like a reverse nightmare, like when you wake up from a nightmare you're so relieved. I woke up into a nightmare.
quotes.author: Ned Vizzini

quotes.quote: Why do people have to be this lonely? What's the point of it all? Millions of people in this world, all of them yearning, looking to others to satisfy them, yet isolating themselves. Why? Was the earth put here just to nourish human loneliness?
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Any fool can be happy. It takes a man with real heart to make beauty out of the stuff that makes us weep.
quotes.author: Clive Barker

quotes.quote: They say when you are missing someone that they are probably feeling the same, but I don't think it's possible for you to miss me as much as I'm missing you right now
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: Imagine smiling after a slap in the face. Then think of doing it twenty-four hours a day.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: Tears shed for another person are not a sign of weakness. They are a sign of a pure heart.
quotes.author: Jose N. Harris

quotes.quote: Tonight I can write the saddest lines
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: The longer and more carefully we look at a funny story, the sadder it becomes.
quotes.author: Nikolai V. Gogol

quotes.quote: Tears are words that need to be written.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: There are two types of people in the world: those who prefer to be sad among others, and those who prefer to be sad alone.
quotes.author: Nicole Krauss

quotes.quote: Don't be ashamed to weep; 'tis right to grieve. Tears are only water, and flowers, trees, and fruit cannot grow without water. But there must be sunlight also. A wounded heart will heal in time, and when it does, the memory and love of our lost ones is sealed inside to comfort us.
quotes.author: Brian Jacques

quotes.quote: In time, every sad ending will become happy. The sad ending is only because the author stops telling the story. But it still goes on. It's just untold.
quotes.author: Mark Polish

quotes.quote: It's a sad, sad song that I'm singing, / It's a sad, sad tale that I tell, / About a love that a poor girl is bringing, / To a man who is destined for Hell.
quotes.author: Al C. Ward

quotes.quote: I would rather have a fool to make me merry than experience to make me sad.
quotes.author: Kenneth Branagh

quotes.quote: Well, when I'm sad, I like to read a really sad story because then I don't feel so sad myself.
quotes.author: Blanche Hanalis

quotes.quote: So it’s true, when all is said and done, grief is the price we pay for love.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: I woke up this morning / Feeling lonely / You were gone, and my cellphone too
quotes.author: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.quote: What is this feeling? / Empty inside my head / Feels like a heart attack
quotes.author: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.quote: I miss you so bad / A thought of you makes me sad / I'm going mad
quotes.author: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.quote: What a sick, sick feeling / To let you go, my dear / Cause I was not prepared to / Let you go, let you go
quotes.author: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.quote: I miss the way you sound / I miss to be around you / Just let me have another chance
quotes.author: Nicolas Pablo Munoz

quotes.quote: I'm the loneliest I've ever been tonight / I'm the loneliest I've ever been tonight / I'm inspired by your proposition, but I don't trust my intuition / I'm the loneliest I've ever been tonight
quotes.author: Sonny Moore

quotes.quote: I pray you, Sadness, leave me soon / In sweet invention thou art poor! / Thy sister, Joy can make ten songs / While thou art making four.
quotes.author: William Henry Davies

quotes.quote: Therefore sweet Sadness, leave me soon / Let thy bright sister, Joy, come more / For she can make ten lovely songs / While thou art making four.
quotes.author: William Henry Davies

quotes.quote: What are you buying and selling / Oh dear daughter of sadness / with open breasts / `Sir, I am a hawker of / sea water.'
quotes.author: Devil Poet

quotes.quote: From where comes / so much of tears / `Sir, my last resort is / to cry for sea.'
quotes.author: Devil Poet

quotes.quote: Holy Ghost! dispel our sadness / Pierce the clouds of nature's night / Come, Thou source of joy and gladness / Breathe Thy life, and spread Thy light.
quotes.author: Augustus Montague Toplady

quotes.quote: IT is not, Dear, because I am alone / For I am lonelier when the rest are near / But that my place against your heart has grown / Too dear to dream of when you are not here.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: I weep because my thoughts no more may roam / To meet, half-way, your longing thoughts of me / To turn with these and spread glad wings for home / For the dear haven where I fain would be.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: I knew it would happen / Everyone will leave me / I will remain alone / I knew it, I know it
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: It is my fate; it is my prize / To living alone / To smile alone / To cry alone / To dry my tears alone
quotes.author: Ehsan Sehgal

quotes.quote: Depression / even when the most enchantingly tantalizing of seductresses / unfurled their umpteenth flavors of vibrant seduction / just abreast of my impoverished countenance.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Depression / even when all the cuckoos of this Universe / boisterously chirped around me / for hours immemorial.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Depression / even when a fathomless garden of rose bountifully bloomed outside my bedroom window / insatiably wafting the scent of timeless happiness into my penuriously sagging ears.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Anxiety is the partner of depression. It accompanies half the cases of depression. Sometimes it triggers depression.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: Anxiety and depression are an interesting mix. In many ways they are opposite experiences, and yet mix them together and you don't get a happy medium.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: You can be a depressive and be happy, just as you can be a sober alcoholic. It doesn't have always have an obvious case.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: One in five people gets depression at some point in their life. Though obviously more than that will suffer from mental illness.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: Twice as many women as men will suffer a serious bout of depression in their lives.
quotes.author: Matt Haig

quotes.quote: The symptoms of clinical depression include excessive crying or sadness, extreme mood swings, erratic behavior, loss of interest in friends, loved ones, or any type of pleasure, loss of appetite, weight gain or loss, anger, irritability, fatigue.
quotes.author: Pat Love

quotes.quote: If you have a sad expression, it is much more likely you will make others feel this too. If you smile happily, you may have this effect on those around you as well.
quotes.author: I. C. Robledo

quotes.quote: A person who displays a negative character generates a negative atmosphere.
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: Encourage others today! So often the difference between success and failure is belief.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: Weed and feed. Our minds are like a garden; each day you need to weed out the negativity and feed it positivity.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You are more powerful than your circumstances. They don't define you. You do.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: The story you tell yourself defines the life you live and the actions you take. It's important to tell yourself a positive story.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: While fear and worry can weaken or harden you, love transforms you and the people and situations around you.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: You don't have to wait to feel positive enough for a smile to happen. You can generate a positive feeling by smiling. Your smile can be the source of your positivity, not the result of it. Smile more today.
quotes.author: Jon Gordon

quotes.quote: I can see that the sadness has returned. And it's not a beautiful sadness- beautiful sadness is a myth. Sadness turns our features to clay, not porcelain.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: Night is beautiful when you are happy--comforting when you are in grief--terrible when you are lonely and unhappy.
quotes.author: L.M. Montgomery

quotes.quote: We must also look into our feelings of grief and loss. When we accept that everything is constantly changing, when we accept the inevitability that people and animals die, we can deal with pain in a much better fashion.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Embrace your grief and your sadness felt towards those that have passed and remember them with love.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Replace your grief with love and appreciation. That is truly what any who have departed from our lives would wish for us.
quotes.author: Aaron Soltys

quotes.quote: Moments of suffering are meant to empty us so that we may have the potential to tap into our truest depths.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: The beginning of love is a horror of emptiness.
quotes.author: Robert Bly

quotes.quote: I am empty of everything. I am empty of everything but the thin, frail ghosts in my room.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: A sad soul needs an infinite horizon which can throw all his sorrow into the silence of the eternal emptiness!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Become totally empty. Quiet the restlessness of the mind. Only then will you witness everything unfolding from emptiness.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: You are not feeling empty because you don't have much money. You are feeling empty because you have not yet encountered your real self, you have not come to your authentic individuality.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: There are so many empty people walking around on this little planet. Lonely people. Angry people. Bitter. Forgotten.
quotes.author: Jeyn Roberts

quotes.quote: I swear, I end up feeling empty, like you've taken something out of me and I have to search my body for scars.
quotes.author: Richard Siken

quotes.quote: But what I did sense was an emptiness like a black hole inside of him, and there was no predicting what might emerge from a place like that.
quotes.author: Ryū Murakami

quotes.quote: Every word is like an unnecessary stain on silence and nothingness.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: It is beautiful, it is endless, it is full and yet seems empty. It hurts us.
quotes.author: Jackson Pearce

quotes.quote: We become aware of the void as we fill it.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: The artist's job is not to succumb to despair but to find an antidote for the emptiness of existence.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Life is an empty bottle filled with love.
quotes.author: Santosh Kalwar

quotes.quote: Emptiness which is conceptually liable to be mistaken for sheer nothingness is in fact the reservoir of infinite possibilities.
quotes.author: D.T. Suzuki

quotes.quote: One must know oneself. If this does not serve to discover truth, it at least serves as a rule of life and there is nothing better.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: But to me nothing, the negative, the empty, is exceedingly powerful.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: When I feel truly alone, with a sense of being lost, even empty inside, it is then I realize I have unknowingly moved away from God, so I move back.
quotes.author: David L. Weatherford

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as an empty space or an empty time. There is always something to see, something to hear. In fact, try as we may to make a silence, we cannot.
quotes.author: John Cage

quotes.quote: The more space and emptiness you can create in yourself, then you can let the rest of the world come in and fill you up.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: I decided I would fill the emptiness in me with God and with paint.
quotes.author: Kimberly Novosel

quotes.quote: This was the truth at the core of my existence: this yawning emptiness, scantily clad in rage.
quotes.author: Hillary Jordan

quotes.quote: The greatest tragedies in life is not untimely death, but to live a life for emptiness.
quotes.author: Topsy Gift

quotes.quote: The funny thing about having all this so-called success is that behind it is a certain horrible emptiness.
quotes.author: Sam Shepard

quotes.quote: The rest of my life stretches out as an emptiness before me.
quotes.author: Kazuo Ishiguro

quotes.quote: There's just something obvious about emptiness, even when you try to convince yourself otherwise.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: This world that I live in is empty and cold the loneliness cuts me and tortures my soul.
quotes.author: Waylon Jennings

quotes.quote: It's not the feeling of completeness I need, but the feeling of not being empty.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Everyday we used to slip away to talk. We would talk about the goodness of your heart. Now it seems I admit that never exist at all and it leaves me feeling empty with this hollow chord.
quotes.author: Regina Belle

quotes.quote: In all our searching, the only thing we've found that makes the emptiness bearable is each other.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Emptiness is not a great loss. It creates a great opportunity to fill yourself again and again with great love.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Illusion is needed to disguise the emptiness within.
quotes.author: Arthur Erickson

quotes.quote: If giving leaves you feeling empty, you're giving too much to the wrong person.
quotes.author: Maza Dohta

quotes.quote: Bowed by the weight of centuries he leans upon his hoe and gazes on the ground, the emptiness of ages in his face, and on his back the burden of the world.
quotes.author: Edwin Markham

quotes.quote: I said nothing for a time, just ran my fingertips along the edge of the human-shaped emptiness that had been left inside me.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: The void inside me starts to fill, but my heart has holes, and whatever it holds will run out, leaving me empty once again.
quotes.author: Danielle Esplin

quotes.quote: I felt myself being invaded through and through, I crumbled, disintegrated, and only emptiness remained.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: This will be a winter so desolate, only memory can fill the emptiness.
quotes.author: John Geddes

quotes.quote: You can only fit so many words in a postcard, only so many in a phone call, only so many into space before you forget that words are sometimes used for things other than filling emptiness.
quotes.author: Sarah Kay

quotes.quote: The inner emptiness is the door to God.
quotes.author: Swami Dhyan Giten

quotes.quote: If emptiness is endless, then everything rests in emptiness.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: To fake it is to stand guard over emptiness.
quotes.author: Arthur Herzog

quotes.quote: Nothingness not being nothing, nothingness being emptiness.
quotes.author: Isabelle Adjani

quotes.quote: Nothing has an unlikely quality. It is heavy.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: What had been quiet and restful was now silent and empty.
quotes.author: Frederick Barthelme

quotes.quote: We often feel proud of our knowledge even when it is filled with emptiness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: A busy life is filled with tremendous emptiness.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Life is empty and meaningless because life is empty and meaningless.
quotes.author: Werner Erhard

quotes.quote: When you're full of yourself, God can't fill you. But when you empty yourself, God has a useful vessel.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Depression isn't just being a bit sad. It's feeling nothing. It's not wanting to be alive anymore.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Now that I've won a slam, I know something very few people on earth are permitted to know. A win doesn't feel as good as a loss feels bad, and the good feeling doesn't last long as the bad. Not even close.
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: Saying thanks to the world, and acknowledging your own accomplishments, is a great way to feel good and stay positive.
quotes.author: Rachel Robins

quotes.quote: I used to work in a funeral home to feel good about myself, just the fact that I was breathing.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: If a great outfit gets you one step closer to feeling good about yourself, then it's worth every penny.
quotes.author: Rachel Roy

quotes.quote: Eliminating the things you love is not wellness. Wellness feeds your soul and makes you feel good.
quotes.author: Iman

quotes.quote: There is nothing that works out for the worst that won't work out for the better.
quotes.author: Karldon Okruta

quotes.quote: Real beauty is to be true to oneself. That's what makes me feel good.
quotes.author: Laetitia Casta

quotes.quote: I know only that what is moral is what you feel good after and what is immoral is what you feel bad after.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: When you're feeling your worst, that's when you get to know yourself the best.
quotes.author: Leslie Grossman

quotes.quote: Hard work makes you feel good because you have accomplished something.
quotes.author: Alcurtis Turner

quotes.quote: People who produce good results feel good about themselves.
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: When you look good, you feel good. Confidence with what you're wearing is very important. If you feel good, you will always perform your best without worrying about anything.
quotes.author: Maria Sharapova

quotes.quote: The best feeling in the world is realizing that you're perfectly happy without the thing you thought you needed.
quotes.author: Marxie

quotes.quote: If you know that all is well, you know all you need to know. And if you know life is supposed to be fun, you know more than almost anybody else knows.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: You can't stop the waves, but you can learn to swim.
quotes.author: Jon Kabat Zinn

quotes.quote: Laughter is the sensation of feeling good all over and showing it principally in one place.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Just do your best. I find that if I set that goal for myself and no one else, I feel good.
quotes.author: Cobie Smulders

quotes.quote: I feel pretty good. My body actually looks like an old banana, but it's fine.
quotes.author: Mike Piazza

quotes.quote: Laugh at yourself. It tones your facial muscles and attitude.
quotes.author: Kelly Rudolph

quotes.quote: Follow what feels good in the moment, every moment, and it will lead you through a most excellent life.
quotes.author: Jen Sincero

quotes.quote: As you think thoughts that feel good to you, you will be in harmony with who you really are.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: Giving back, doing motivational speeches and stuff like that, that's always made me feel good. If you repeatedly go out there, and you are the change that you want to see, then that's what you are.
quotes.author: Keke Palmer

quotes.quote: If we are always pushing away from feelings that we condemn as wrong, painful, or ugly, we are also pushing away from the very energy that can bring us incredible joy and ecstasy.
quotes.author: Shaeri Richards

quotes.quote: Feeling good about ourselves is essential in our being able to love others.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: See with the eyes of love and a thing becomes beautiful. See with the eyes of hate and things are ugly.
quotes.author: Joy Cowley

quotes.quote: When I do good, I feel good. When I do bad, I feel bad. That's my religion.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Even if happiness forgets you a little bit, never completely forget about it.
quotes.author: Jacques Prevert

quotes.quote: Those who can laugh without cause have either found the true meaning of happiness or have gone stark raving mad.
quotes.author: Norm Papernick

quotes.quote: Your dreams don't have to be lofty; they just have to be lived.
quotes.author: Kelly Bouchard

quotes.quote: To feel good, do good.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Be thankful for what you have and you will end up having more.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: I'm not about trying to get and get and get. I feel good when I get, but I kind of feel better when I give.
quotes.author: K'naan

quotes.quote: Just try to do the right thing, and that's immediate karma: I feel good about myself.
quotes.author: Linda Thompson

quotes.quote: It's always a nice day above the clouds.
quotes.author: James Stoddah

quotes.quote: The better you feel, the more in alignment you are. The worse you feel the more out of alignment you are.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: Being happy doesn't mean you're perfect. It just means you've decided to look beyond the imperfections.
quotes.author: K.B Indiana

quotes.quote: The next time you feel really good, just keep feeling that way for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Donny Miller

quotes.quote: If you're happy, if you're feeling good, then nothing else matters.
quotes.author: Robin Wright Penn

quotes.quote: Mining the moment for something that feels good, something to appreciate, something to savour, something to take in, that's what your moments are about.
quotes.author: Abraham-Hicks

quotes.quote: When you take care of yourself, you're a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
quotes.author: Solange Knowles

quotes.quote: Always remember you are braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, smarter than you think and twice as beautiful as you've ever imagined.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It's your life; live it well.
quotes.author: Judge Judy Sheindlin

quotes.quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Life is full of challenges, seen and unseen, so to look and feel great, you must hold your head up each day and project your inner confidence.
quotes.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

quotes.quote: God brings men into deep waters, not to drown them, but to cleanse them.
quotes.author: John Aughey

quotes.quote: I will always find a way and a way will always find me.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Don't water your weeds.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Our capacity to draw happiness from aesthetic objects or material goods in fact seems critically dependent on our first satisfying a more important range of emotional or psychological needs, among them the need for understanding, for love, expression and respect.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: Learn to value yourself, which means: fight for your happiness.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift; that’s why it’s called The Present.
quotes.author: Bil Keane

quotes.quote: Put your thoughts to sleep. Do not let them cast a shadow over the moon of your heart. Let go of thinking.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Take a deep breath. Inhale peace, exhale happiness.
quotes.author: A.D. Posey

quotes.quote: Life is the dancer and you are the dance.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or touched, they are felt with the heart.
quotes.author: The Little Prince

quotes.quote: The world is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our senses to grow sharper.
quotes.author: W.B. Yeats

quotes.quote: There’s as many atoms in a single molecule of your DNA as there are stars in the typical galaxy. We are, each of us, a little universe.
quotes.author: Neil deGrasse Tyson

quotes.quote: See what no one else sees. See what everyone chooses not to see – out of fear, conformity or laziness. See the whole world anew each day!
quotes.author: Patch Adams

quotes.quote: Wherever you are, you are one with the clouds and one with the sun and the stars you see. You are one with everything.
quotes.author: Shunryu Suzuki

quotes.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything gets accomplished.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Each morning when I open my eyes I say to myself: I, not events, have the power to make me happy or unhappy today. I can choose which it shall be. Yesterday is dead, tomorrow hasn’t arrived yet. I have just one day, today, and I’m going to be happy in it.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: When it is dark enough, you can see the stars.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Men are made stronger on realization that the helping hand they need is at the end of their own arm.
quotes.author: Sidney J. Phillips

quotes.quote: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: You're only here for a short visit. Don't hurry, don't worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.quote: To avoid criticism, do nothing, say nothing and be nothing.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: You can't get much done in life if you only work on the days when you feel good.
quotes.author: Jerry West

quotes.quote: Keep away from people who try to belittle your ambitions. Small people always do that, but the really great make you feel that you, too, can become great.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The free soul is rare, but you know it when you see it - basically because you feel good, very good, when you are near or with them.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Those who matter don't mind, and those who mind don't matter.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: Genius is more often found in a cracked pot than in a whole one.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: When I feel good about myself, things start happening for myself. When you look up, you go up.
quotes.author: Herschel Walker

quotes.quote: The culture we have does not make people feel good about themselves. And you have to be strong enough to say if the culture doesn't work, don't buy it.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: It sounds like a cliche but I also learnt that you're not going to fall for the right person until you really love yourself and feel good about how you are.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: We don't laugh because we feel good; we feel good because we laugh.
quotes.author: Bob Ross

quotes.quote: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Life's too short to pretend and play games like that. I want to spend my time hanging out with people who make me feel good about myself. People who make me happy.
quotes.author: Gena Showalter

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: If you want to be happy, do not dwell on the past, do not worry about the future, focus on living fully in the present.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, no matter what the weather, always bring your own sunshine.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D’Angelo

quotes.quote: Nothing ever goes away until it teaches us what we need to know.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Happiness is a habit - cultivate it.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Music is music, ultimately. If it makes you feel good, cool.
quotes.author: Prince

quotes.quote: The audience likes their emotions to be touched. They want to laugh and cry and feel good.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: Kindness makes a fellow feel good whether it's being done to him or by him.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: The true secret of happiness lies in the taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
quotes.author: William Morris

quotes.quote: As people spin faster and faster in the pursuit of merely personal happiness, they become exhausted in the futile effort of chasing themselves.
quotes.author: Andrew Delbanco

quotes.quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Everything real is in the present moment. Only here can we find happiness and harmony, feel alive and do something that will change our future. Only here can we be with the people we love, enjoy the things we like and see beautiful places.
quotes.author: Lidiya K.

quotes.quote: Maybe the reason nothing seems to be ‘fixing you’ is because you’re not broken.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli​

quotes.quote: As it was, I couldn't escape the feeling that I was out of my element. I found myself thinking of a book I'd left half-read at home and wishing I'd stuck it in my purse so I could pull it out now.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: Loneliness is a sign you are in desperate need of yourself.
quotes.author: Rupi Kaur

quotes.quote: One remedy for the fear of not being loved is to remember how good it feels to love someone. If you're feeling unloved and you want to feel better, go love someone, and see what happens.
quotes.author: Dossie Easton

quotes.quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: No one realized that, being left out in the cold, I was also very much in the dark.
quotes.author: Deborah Curtis

quotes.quote: When we feel left out, inadequate, or lonely, can we take a warriors perspective and contact bodhichitta?
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: In a way it's not so terrible to be left out, because then you could see at a very early age that there's an entire motherlode of stories that belong to you and nobody else.
quotes.author: Maxine Hong Kingston

quotes.quote: Our society distributes itself into Barbarians, Philistines, and Populace; and the America is just ourselves, with the Barbarians quite left out, and the Populace nearly.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: My face looks like a wedding cake left out in the rain.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: I left the room with silent dignity, but caught my foot in the mat.
quotes.author: George Grossmith

quotes.quote: God seems to have left the receiver off the hook, and time is running out.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: The writer is free to work in whatever place and whatever time he chooses; he is free to idle if he feels ill or dispirited.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Sports metaphors are one of the ways women feel left out of the language of the office.
quotes.author: Jan Levinson-Gould

quotes.quote: Sometimes I get the feeling the world kinda left us behind a long time ago.
quotes.author: Randal Graves

quotes.quote: In this world, feeling left out and alone / Thousands around you yet you're out there on / Your own / Let the power guide you like tittle David and the / Stone / And come, and come, come on home.
quotes.author: Dave Clark and Mike Smith

quotes.quote: I used to watch all the couples going by / Feeling left out and so alone / But now I feel so much a part of them / Because I've got a man of my own / It's never too late to fall in love again / And I know, and I know / That it's true / You treat me with so much tenderness, love and respect / And I just love everything that you do.
quotes.author: Carole King

quotes.quote: I used to hide in a party crowd / Bottled up inside / Feeling so left out / Standing in a corner wearing concrete shoes / With my frozen smile / And my lighted fuse / Now every time I start to feel like that / I roll my heart out like a welcome mat / Oh watch me go / I'm a happy girl / Everybody knows / That the sweetest thing that you'll ever see / In the whole wide world / Is a happy girl.
quotes.author: Annie Roboff and Beth Nielsen Chapma

quotes.quote: At least—to pray—is left—is left— / Oh Jesus—in the Air— / I know not which thy chamber is— / I'm knocking—everywhere— / Thou settest Earthquake in the South— / And Maelstrom, in the Sea— / Say, Jesus Christ of Nazareth— / Hast thou no Arm for Me?
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: I don’t feel like feeling anymore / I sit here in my thoughts / Trying to make sense / Of what I am supposed to think. / But all I get is pain / From the heart to my head / A knife digging in / To the very core of my soul.
quotes.author: Devon Cote

quotes.quote: I've always been more afraid of being left alone or left out than of things that go bump in the night.
quotes.author: Nelson Gidding

quotes.quote: If love is universal, no one can be left out.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Let's continue to stand up for those who are vulnerable to being left out or marginalized.
quotes.author: Hillary Clinton

quotes.quote: If nobody will help you, do it alone.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: It is only alone, truly alone that one bursts apart, springs forth.
quotes.author: Maria Isabel Barreno

quotes.quote: Be an outcast; be pleased to walk alone.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: I used to think the worst thing in life is to end up all alone. It's not. The worst thing in life is to end up with people who make you feel all alone.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than not knowing where she belonged was knowing where she didn't.
quotes.author: Tessa Shaffer

quotes.quote: In order to find out who you are, you will, at some point, have to feel really isolated, left out, different.
quotes.author: Jenna Marbles

quotes.quote: If you care about somebody, you should want them to be happy. Even if you wind up being left out.
quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

quotes.quote: Having come to live in this age is as though one were to have entered another country. Learn its language or risk being left out.
quotes.author: Theodore Bikel

quotes.quote: Never say you are alone for you are not alone, your God and your genius is within.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: I want to be in a relationship where you telling me you love me is just a ceremonious validation of what you already show me.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Being loved is the only thing that is admirable by any stretch of the imagination.
quotes.author: Auliq-Ice

quotes.quote: To have the chance of being loved we have to take a chance on being destroyed inside.
quotes.author: Jo Nesbo

quotes.quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves say rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: Because feeling love does make you feel superior. Until you find out you aren't loved back.
quotes.author: Kaui Hart Hemmings

quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: There is no happiness like that of being loved by your fellow creatures, and feeling that your presence is an addition to their comfort.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved any how this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: When I saw you I fell in love. And you smiled because you knew.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
quotes.author: Charles Morgan

quotes.quote: We're all a little weird. And life is a little weird. And when we find someone whose weirdness is compatible with ours, we join up with them and fall into mutually satisfying weirdness and call it love true love.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me. I love you for the part of me that you bring out.
quotes.author: Roy Croft

quotes.quote: Once you feel loved by the universe, you're already accepted, and you're not really concerned about offending people.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: I used to think being loved was the greatest thing to think about, but now I know love is never satisfied just thinking about it.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: I think that one of the things that you do learn is that falling in love and being in love with someone is a rarity. That you don't fall in love as many times as you think you're going to. And then when you do, it's really special; it's really important.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: No matter what has happened. No matter what you've done. No matter what you will do. I will always love you. I swear it.
quotes.author: C.J. Redwine

quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Eden Ahbez

quotes.quote: People fall in love without reason, without even wanting to. You can't predict it. That's love.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Behind every angry soul is a wounded child that just wanted you to love them for who they are.
quotes.author: Shannon L. Alder

quotes.quote: Feeling loved by God means feeling glad not only that he crushed his son so that I can be forgiven, but that he's crushing everything that takes away from my praising of the glory of his grace.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: To be loved but not known is comforting but superficial. To be known and not loved is our greatest fear. But to be fully known and truly loved is, well, a lot like being loved by God. It is what we need more than anything. It liberates us from pretense, humbles us out of our self-righteousness, and fortifies us for any difficulty life can throw at us.
quotes.author: Timothy Keller

quotes.quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: It is impossible to live without love. You must have the feeling of being loved.
quotes.author: Mireille Mathieu

quotes.quote: Being in love is the best feeling on the planet. I really believe that love makes the world go round.
quotes.author: Sonam Kapoor

quotes.quote: Being in love, I find myself smiling for no reason at all.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt because love is an amazing feeling.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: I loved the feeling of finally falling in love to someone who would love me back.
quotes.author: Kristine Cuevas

quotes.quote: A loving relationship is one in which the loved one is free to be himself to laugh with me, but never at me; to cry with me, but never because of me; to love life, to love himself, to love being loved. Such a relationship is based upon freedom and can never grow in a jealous heart.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: But the experience that I had, which was basically just feeling loved and taken care of in a room full of thousands of people I didn't know, seemed to be a pretty strong sign that what I was doing was a good thing.
quotes.author: Mariel Hemingway

quotes.quote: Love is the wisdom of the fool, and the folly of the wise.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The cure love is marriage, and the cure for marriage is love again.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: As soon as you cannot keep anything from a woman, you love her.
quotes.author: Paul Geraldy

quotes.quote: It's the nature of women not to love when we love them, and to love them not.
quotes.author: Cervantes

quotes.quote: Love brings light to darkness darkness; it reaches through, sees through and follows through.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Love is patient however; it does not sit on the fence.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Love is never fragmented; it's an inseparable whole which does not delight in bits and pieces.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: To love and be loved demands your best.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If love isn't flowing it's dying, and like the stream without it's source, one cannot give something which he does not first possess.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Being surrounded by love at home should be the base for your life.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Remember that the best relationships that in which mutual love is bigger that mutual necessity.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Love and cook with passion.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Rupert Everett

quotes.quote: Tell me whom you love, and I will tell you who you are.
quotes.author: Arsene Houssaye

quotes.quote: Love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Love is a superstition that doth fear. The idol which it itself has made.
quotes.author: Sir Thomas Overbury

quotes.quote: Love is life. And if you miss love, you miss life.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'I' of loving.
quotes.author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quotes.quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
quotes.author: Javan

quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
quotes.author: H.Jackson Brown Jr.

quotes.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: If you wan't to be loved. Be lovable.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: All mankind love a lover.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
quotes.author: Eva Gabor

quotes.quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Love consists in this, that two solitude protect and touch and greet each other.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Love that is not madness is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; it's eyes are for the stars.
quotes.author: Gilbert Parker

quotes.quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in other, and the delight in the recognition.
quotes.author: Alexander Smith

quotes.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Sound character provides the power with which a person may ride the emergencies of life instead of being overwhelmed by them.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Getting knocked down in life is a given. Getting up and moving forward is a choice.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: What is coming is better than what is gone. Let this belief aim you in the direction you need to go.
quotes.author: Karen Salmanson

quotes.quote: Just doing nothing and having those still moments is what really rejuvenates the body.
quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

quotes.quote: A woman who lives with the stress of an overwhelmed schedule will often ache with the sadness of an underwhelmed soul.
quotes.author: Lysa Terkeurst

quotes.quote: If we don't see a failure as a challenge to modify our approach, but rather as a problem with ourselves, as a personality defect, we will immediately feel overwhelmed.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: It is nice finding that place where you can just go and relax.
quotes.author: Moises Arias

quotes.quote: When you're overwhelmed by your emotion, you listen less and you judge more. This is also the reality of the dogmatic mind.
quotes.author: Tariq Ramadan

quotes.quote: We don't realize that, somewhere within us all, there does exist a supreme self who is eternally at peace.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Even from a dark night, songs of beauty can be born.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: Life can be magnificent and overwhelming, that is the whole tragedy. Without beauty, love, or danger it would almost be easy to live.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: When life gets hectic and you feel overwhelmed, take a moment to focus on the people and things you are most grateful for. When you have an attitude of gratitude, frustrating troubles will fall by the wayside.
quotes.author: Dana Arcuri

quotes.quote: When you do nothing, you feel overwhelmed and powerless. But when you get involved, you feel the sense of hope and accomplishment that comes from knowing you are working to make things better.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We should all relax about life because you don't have a clue as to what's really going on.
quotes.author: Barry Sonnenfeld

quotes.quote: If you don't do anything, you simply end up overwhelmed by something happening.
quotes.author: Matsuri Hino

quotes.quote: The benefit of carrying the entire world on your shoulders was that you didn't have to stare it in the face.
quotes.author: Rhian J. Martin

quotes.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. To be your own man is a hard business. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Don't give up now. Chances are your best kiss, your hardest laugh, and your greatest day are still yet to come.
quotes.author: Atticus

quotes.quote: Life has many ways of testing a person's will, either by having nothing happen at all or by having everything happen at once.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Sometimes you're overwhelmed when a thing comes, and you do not realize the magnitude of the affair at that moment. When you get away from it, you wonder, did it really happen to you.
quotes.author: Marian Anderson

quotes.quote: One must not let oneself be overwhelmed by sadness.
quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

quotes.quote: The feeling of overwhelm always means the same thing: You're too heavy on the action and not heavy enough on the alignment of energy.
quotes.author: Abraham Hicks

quotes.quote: The individual has always had to struggle to keep from being overwhelmed by the tribe. If you try it, you will be lonely often, and sometimes frightened. But no price is too high to pay for the privilege of owning yourself.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you're overwhelmed by a situation, when you're in the darkest of darkness that's when your priorities are reordered.
quotes.author: Phoebe Snow

quotes.quote: At some stages of your life you will deal with things and at others you are overwhelmed with misery and anxiety.
quotes.author: Nigella Lawson

quotes.quote: If you're overwhelmed, lost, or like you life is out of control, do whatever you can that matters to someone else or ever did to you... it might not help, but it certainly won't hurt.
quotes.author: Ingrid Weir

quotes.quote: Learning to ignore things is one of the great paths to inner peace.
quotes.author: Robert J. Sawyer

quotes.quote: Anxiety happens when you think you have to figure out everything all at once. Breathe. You're strong. You got this. Take it day by day.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: Every day we have plenty of opportunities to get angry, stressed or offended. But what you're doing when you indulge these negative emotions is giving something outside yourself power over your happiness. You can choose to not let little things upset you.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Sometimes being overwhelmed by emotions can leave you speechless but even then it is important to identify the correct emotion.
quotes.author: Sam Owen

quotes.quote: In most cases, you might just be overwhelmed by way too much sensory indoor distraught by taking in the emotions of others.
quotes.author: Vayana Ariz

quotes.quote: The person who hates you is surely overwhelmed by not just one delusion but many.
quotes.author: Josh Bartok

quotes.quote: Friends had told me in breathy tones that the moment my son appeared, I'd gaze into his little unblinking eyes and feel an overwhelming, boundless love, beyond anything I'd ever experienced in my life.
quotes.author: Kristin Van Ogtrop

quotes.quote: Willingly taking on suffering, we will never be overwhelmed by the suffering that we are bound to experience.
quotes.author: Yangsi Rinpoche

quotes.quote: The moment you think only of yourself, the focus of your whole reality narrows, and because of this narrow focus, uncomfortable things can appear huge and bring you fear and discomfort and a sense of feeling overwhelmed by misery.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Change begins with a decision: to be overwhelmed or to overcome.
quotes.author: Perry Noble

quotes.quote: What gets our attention ultimately determines our direction. If we are constantly focused on our circumstances, we will be overwhelmed.
quotes.author: Perry Noble

quotes.quote: If you continue to identify yourself by your circumstances rather than by Christ in you, then you will always feel overwhelmed and trapped.
quotes.author: Perry Noble

quotes.quote: As long as we identify ourselves by who we used to be, we fall back into that cycle of sin and become overwhelmed with guilt and shame.
quotes.author: Perry Noble

quotes.quote: Don't allow the fear to overpower you, allow love to overpower you.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: A mediator can sit joyously alone for months, for years. He does not hanker for the other, because his own inner ecstasy is so much, is so overpowering, that who bothers about the other?
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The role you undertook to play / does not strike anyone. / It itself is struck powerfully / by the irresistible aspiration of the Dialectic / to overwhelm the Human Being / with second opinions / in a second head.
quotes.author: Ilias Foukis

quotes.quote: I couldn't take it back to her shadow; that same unbearably pugnacious shadow; which had so torturously broken it in the first place; trying to lambaste and invidiously overwhelm every shade of my celestial existence,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: And from the realms / Of the shadowy elms / A tide-like darkness overwhelm / The fields that round us lie. / But the night is fair, / And everywhere / A warm, soft vapor fills the air, / And distant sounds seem near.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: You can't calm the storm, so stop trying. What you can do is calm yourself. The storm will pass.
quotes.author: Timber Hawkeye

quotes.quote: When my heart is overwhelmed, lead me to the rock that is higher than I.
quotes.author: Psalm 61:2

quotes.quote: I feel so much that it is hard for me at times to feel anything at all.
quotes.author: Mary Kate Teske

quotes.quote: I have been driven many times to my knees by the overwhelming conviction that I had absolutely no other place to go.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Some days you will feel like the ocean. Some days you will feel like you are drowning in it.
quotes.author: Lora Mathis

quotes.quote: I often think I can't do this anymore but then I realize what choice do I have?
quotes.author: Justin Blaney

quotes.quote: He was swimming in a sea of other people’s expectations. Men had drowned in seas like that.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: I could no longer discern what was real and what was fake. Everything, including the present, seemed to be both too much and nothing at all.
quotes.author: Clemantine Wamariya

quotes.quote: What’s on your mind? I don’t know. Nothing but everything at once.
quotes.author: Lidia Longorio

quotes.quote: Your past haunts you / Your present overwhelms you / Your future scares you / Yet you survive.
quotes.author: Lidia Longorio

quotes.quote: I had a dream that I was being drowned in a flood and I realized it was a flood of people.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.quote: People are being overwhelmed with social issues, political problems and economic problems - and this notion of giving everything up and going to live off-grid and to have a simpler way of life is quite attractive.
quotes.author: Ben Fogle

quotes.quote: Our greatest battles are with our minds.
quotes.author: Jameson Frank

quotes.quote: So many of us live in our own palace of pain, convinced that we are alone in our struggle, but the fact is… we're not alone.
quotes.author: Lisa Lieberman-Wang

quotes.quote: You might feel worthless to one person, but you are priceless to another.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You are not special. You are not a beautiful or unique snowflake. You're the same decaying organic matter as everything else.
quotes.author: Tyler Durden

quotes.quote: Sometimes it feels as if everything in life is just something we haul to the grave.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Keep courage. Whatever you do, do not feel sorry for yourself. You will win in a great age of opportunity.
quotes.author: Richard L Evans

quotes.quote: You are a piece of the puzzle of someone else's life. You may never know where you fit, but others will fill the holes in their lives with pieces of you.
quotes.author: Bonnie Arbon

quotes.quote: Self-pity in its early stages is as snug as a feather mattress. Only when it hardens does it become uncomfortable.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Self-pity is our worst enemy and if we yield to it, we can never do anything wise in this world.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: When one realizes that his life is worthless he either commits suicide or travels.
quotes.author: Edward Dahlberg

quotes.quote: Self-confidence gives you the freedom to make mistakes and cope with failure without feelingthat your world has come to an end or that you are a worthless person.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The pleasure we derive from doing favors is partly in the feeling it gives us that we are not altogether worthless. It is a pleasant surprise to ourselves.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: I don't deserve a soul, yet I still have one. I know because it hurts.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: I'm tired of feeling worthless. I'm tired of feeling hopeless. But above all, I'm tired of feeling tired.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When you know your worth, no one can make you feel worthless.
quotes.author: Luan

quotes.quote: No one is useless in this world who lightens the burden of it for anyone else.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Feeling sorry for yourself, and your present condition, is not only a waste of energy but the worst habit you could possibly have.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Honestly sitting around feeling sorry for yourself won't change anything. If you want your life to change you have to do something about it.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: Of all our infirmities, the most savage is to despise our being.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: You yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Never feel self-pity, the most destructive emotion there is. How awful to be caught up in the terrible squirrel cage of self.
quotes.author: Millicent Fenwick

quotes.quote: Self-pity dries up our sympathy for others.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Self-pity is like a snake that gets in your brain and lays its eggs there.
quotes.author: Steve Chandler

quotes.quote: God does not love us because we are valuable; rather we are valuable because God loves us.
quotes.author: Kevin Martin

quotes.quote: When your self-worth goes up, your net worth goes up with it.
quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen

quotes.quote: When I am not desperate, I am worthless.
quotes.author: Ivo Andric

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or think you can't you are right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Self-care is never a selfish act it is simply good stewardship of the only gift I have, the gift I was put on earth to offer to others.
quotes.author: Parker Palmer

quotes.quote: Pity is best taught by fellowship in woe.
quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quotes.quote: Pity costs nothing, and it ain't worth nothing.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: No one has the right to be sorry for himself for a misfortune that strikes everyone.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: You must realize that one day you will die. Until then you are worthless.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: In the absence of willpower the most complete collection of virtues and talents is wholly worthless.
quotes.author: Aleister Crowley

quotes.quote: Many great ideas go unexecuted, and many great executioners are without ideas. One without the other is worthless.
quotes.author: Tim Blixseth

quotes.quote: Real men are sadly lacking in this world, for when they are put to the test they prove worthless.
quotes.author: Franz Liszt

quotes.quote: If worthless men are sometimes at the head of affairs, it is, I believe, because worthless men are at the tail and the middle.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: An idea is worthless unless you use it.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Find value in what we've been taught is worthless.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: One day you'll discover that the opinions of worthless people are worthless.
quotes.author: Piers Anthony

quotes.quote: Whatever you seize for yourself is worthless. Only what is given you has value.
quotes.author: Gerald Morris

quotes.quote: You are worthless to others if you don't know your own self and self-worth.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Even the most worthless thing in the world can be beautiful, it just takes the right touch
quotes.author: Robert McCammon

quotes.quote: The currency of this world will be worthless at our death or at Christ's return, both of which are imminent.
quotes.author: Randy Alcorn

quotes.quote: Anyone who has accustomed himself to regard the life of any living creature as worthless is in danger of arriving also at the idea of worthless human lives.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Worrying is worthless. When you stop focusing on what has already happened and what may never happen, then you'll be in the present moment. Then you'll begin to experience joy in life.
quotes.author: Brian Weiss
