quotes.quote: If it requires a uniform, it's a worthless endeavor.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Consider before acting, to avoid foolishness. It is the worthless man who speaks and acts thoughtlessly.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: No human being, when you understand his desires, is worthless. No one's life is nothing.
quotes.author: Speaker for the Dead

quotes.quote: The mirror is a worthless invention. The only way to truly see yourself is in the reflection of someone else's eyes.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Socialists make the mistake of confusing individual worth with success. They believe you cannot allow people to succeed in case those who fail feel worthless.
quotes.author: Kenneth Baker

quotes.quote: I think the saddest people always try their hardest to make people happy because they know what it's like to feel absolutely worthless and they don't want anyone else to feel like that.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Every human being has the same potential. Whatever makes you feel I am worthless is wrong. Absolutely wrong. You are deceiving yourself. We all have the power of thought, so what could you possibly be lacking? If you have the willpower, then you can do anything.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: I learned that you are not free until you stop others from making you feel worthless. Because if you do not, you will eventually accept that you are worthless.
quotes.author: Ishmael Beah

quotes.quote: The emotion that can break your heart is sometimes the very one that heals it
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: The pain started years ago, but I'd lived with it for so long at that point that I'd accepted it as an inevitable part of me.
quotes.author: Ashley D. Wallis

quotes.quote: Some people use their own hurt as an excuse for hurting others.
quotes.author: Roland Merullo

quotes.quote: It's a lot easier to be angry at someone than it is to tell them you're hurt.
quotes.author: Tom Gates

quotes.quote: You can't stop loving someone if you had already fallen; all you can do is hurting yourself.
quotes.author: M.F. Moonzajer

quotes.quote: Positive feelings come from being honest about yourself and accepting your personality, and physical characteristics, warts and all; and, from belonging to a family that accepts you without question.
quotes.author: Willard Scott

quotes.quote: Thoughts are the shadows of our feelings - always darker, emptier and simpler.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Do not give in too much to feelings. A overly sensitive heart is an unhappy possession on this shaky earth.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A person will be just about as happy as they make up their minds to be.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I have feelings too. I am still human. All I want is to be loved, for myself and for my talent.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: We often confuse what we wish for with what is.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Sometimes your mind says No but your heart says Go.
quotes.author: Yvonne Urlanda

quotes.quote: It is a curious sensation: the sort of pain that goes mercifully beyond our powers of feeling. When your heart is broken, your boats are burned: nothing matters any more. It is the end of happiness and the beginning of peace.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: There is no remedy for love than to love more.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Never play with the feelings of others, because you may win the game, but the risk is that you will surely lose the person for life time.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You cannot make yourself feel something you do not feel, but you can make yourself do right in spite of your feelings.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: One of the greatest feelings in the world is knowing that we as individuals can make a difference. Ending hunger in America is a goal that is literally within our grasp.
quotes.author: Jeff Bridges

quotes.quote: The feeling is often the deeper truth, the opinion the more superficial one.
quotes.author: Augustus William Hare and Julius Charles

quotes.quote: They may forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.
quotes.author: Carl W. Buechner

quotes.quote: Feelings are not supposed to be logical. Dangerous is the man who has rationalized his emotions.
quotes.author: David Borenstein

quotes.quote: There is no feeling, except the extremes of fear and grief, that does not find relief in music.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: To feel valued, to know, even if only once in a while, that you can do a job well is an absolutely marvelous feeling.
quotes.author: Barbara Walters

quotes.quote: The deepest feeling always shows itself in silence; not in silence, but restraint.
quotes.author: Marianne Moore

quotes.quote: You can close your eyes to the things you do not want to see, but you cannot close your heart to the things you do not want to feel.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Whatever you do, you should do it with feeling.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Emotions are celebrated and repressed, analyzed and medicated, adored and ignored -- but rarely, if ever, are they honored.
quotes.author: Karla McLaren

quotes.quote: There is no instinct like that of the heart.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Our feelings are our most genuine paths to knowledge.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: We destroy ourselves when we stop feeling. If you bury your feelings within you, you become a graveyard.
quotes.author: Bernie S. Siegel

quotes.quote: My feelings are the language of my soul.
quotes.author: Uma Girish

quotes.quote: Since it is our thoughts that create our feelings and emotions and it is our perspective that creates our reality this is of the highest importance.
quotes.author: Joshua Stone

quotes.quote: Bear the pain of living with ugly feelings rather than attacking yourself for having them or attacking others to escape them.
quotes.author: Sarah Bennett

quotes.quote: Sometimes you cannot believe what you see, you have to believe what you feel.
quotes.author: Laura Lyseight

quotes.quote: People love others not for who they are, but for how they make them feel.
quotes.author: Irwin Federman

quotes.quote: Be who you are and say what you feel, because who mind don't matter and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Feelings of worth can flourish only in an atmosphere where individual differences are appreciated, mistakes are tolerated, communication is open and rules are flexible-the kind of atmosphere that is found a nurturing family.
quotes.author: Virginia Satir

quotes.quote: Your feelings most time go with the wind.
quotes.author: Laura Lyseight

quotes.quote: But try getting blindly carried away by your feelings, without reasoning, without a primary cause, driving conciousness away at least for a time; start hating; or fall in love, only so as not to sit with folded arms.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: There are no words to express the feeling and reality of completeness, our natural state of being. It can only be experienced.
quotes.author: Peter Erbe

quotes.quote: Decisions that apply to your feelings are the cause of great suffering.
quotes.author: Moonstone White

quotes.quote: Living people do not make excuses for their emotions. They accept that feelings come as part of the human package; they embrace and walk with them on their journey.
quotes.author: Shevrilere

quotes.quote: Best way to get away from negative feelings and emotions is to involve ourselves without getting involved. It comes by practice and is beneficial for our health; be it physical, mental, emotional or spiritual.
quotes.author: Mahesh

quotes.quote: Let everything happen to you, beauty and terror, no feeling is final.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Feeling and longing are the motive forces behind all human endeavor and human creations.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched. but are felt in the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Whatever you believe with feeling becomes your reality.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Deal with your feelings.
quotes.author: Tanisha Herrin

quotes.quote: Tired of hiding my feelings in the darkness so I must come clean.
quotes.author: Tanisha Herrin

quotes.quote: Some days it's difficult to explain the feelings that rush in and out of the bloodstream.
quotes.author: Tanisha Herrin

quotes.quote: I have to fight off those unwanted feelings of negativity
quotes.author: Tanisha Herrin

quotes.quote: For us, as human beings are feelings are our guide.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Our feelings are exactly what makes us human.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Never hide your true feelings because if you do you're hiding the best part of yourself that you want everybody to see not to mention punishing yourself.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: To feel so much love for one person is by far one of the greatest feelings you'll ever having your entire life
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: The Bible teaches us to be more concerned about the needs and feelings of others than our own.
quotes.author: Psalm 119:28

quotes.quote: Our culture puts feelings first, but true love isn't based on feelings.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Build standards that are not distorted or compromised by negative feelings.
quotes.author: Sarah Bennett

quotes.quote: The more you remember your goals and respect your restraint, the less power your negative feelings will have to shape your actions and reduce your self-respect.
quotes.author: Sarah Bennett

quotes.quote: Whether you are forced to live with hate, yearning, envy, or fear, respect what you do with your feelings, not what they do to you.
quotes.author: Sarah Bennett

quotes.quote: If you're self-critical about your negative feelings, you may be tempted to live with people who dislike you as much as you dislike yourself.
quotes.author: Sarah Bennett

quotes.quote: This is the greatest paradox: the emotions cannot be trusted; yet it is the emotions that tell us the greatest truths.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: Ridding yourself of negative emotions can make you a new person. Suddenly you will find you have time, energy and abilities you never dreamt you had.
quotes.author: Michael Leboeuf

quotes.quote: Your emotions can keep you well. If you are happy at home, content in your job, feel accepted by colleagues and receive praise for work done, healthy emotions are nourishing you.
quotes.author: Blake Clark

quotes.quote: Feelings can never be categorized simply as 'good' and 'bad'.
quotes.author: Beatrice Harris

quotes.quote: Feelings are symptoms of complex reactions.
quotes.author: Beatrice Harris

quotes.quote: Good manners include showing consideration for the feelings of others.
quotes.author: Jarmel Bell MSE

quotes.quote: Let yourself feel the real feelings, and stop living the lives of others.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: Respect for your own personality is your relationship with yourself when you don't blame yourself for any actions, don't follow others, and when you feel a harmony of feelings, thoughts and actions.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: Your feelings would have been coming from your external perceptions and satisfaction of egoism.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: In rushing to overtake something we don't even comprehend, we are always followed by fear, unease, envy, and other negative feelings.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: After losing our feelings, we usually try to bring them back at any price.
quotes.author: Zett Why

quotes.quote: Own feelings were not always what mattered most.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: Strong feelings which alone could estimate it truly, were the very feelings which ought to taste it but sparingly.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press

quotes.quote: It is hard for woman to define her feelings in language which is chiefly made by men to express theirs.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press TME

quotes.quote: After great pain, a formal feeling comes.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press TME

quotes.quote: Mankind are governed more by their feelings than by reason. Events which excite those feelings will produce wonderful events.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press TME

quotes.quote: Without them (feelings) there would not be I. And without me who will experience them? They are right near by. But we don't know what causes them.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press TME

quotes.quote: If you let people follow their feelings, they will be able to do good. This is what meant by saying that human nature is good.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press TME

quotes.quote: We cannot judge either of the feelings or of the character of men with perfect accuracy, from their actions or their appearance in public; it is from their careless conversation, their half-finished sentences, that we may hope with the greatest probability of success to discover their real character.
quotes.author: Oxford University Press TME

quotes.quote:
Time passed when people like inner feelings,. It is the time that people like outer dealings.
This time will also pass away. How kind of people have come in way.
quotes.author: Mazloom Gill

quotes.quote: Pain in the doing, ease in the writing. Memory calls distant,words answer back. Time of no meaning, experience flows. Images resurface—feelings attack.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: No, words can describe it. I let it lead me as I will in the future also. These inner feelings of yours.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: The perfume of your silence lingers,—in scented feelings without words.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: When the feelings are polished,--- the words can remain rough.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: The poet's job is to put into words those feelings we all have that are so deep, so important, and yet so difficult to name, to tell the truth in such a beautiful way, that people cannot live without it.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: Express the inner feelings of your gratification outwardly.
quotes.author: Franklin A. Ohiozebau

quotes.quote: One has to transcend all petty human feelings in order to attain supreme love.
quotes.author: Amma

quotes.quote: Women are as old as they feel - and men are old when they lose their feelings.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: In a healthy relationship when things come about, partners have feelings they talk and work out.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: It is unhealthy to have feelings deep to hold-eventually you will explode.
quotes.author: Arlene De’Sha Jennings

quotes.quote: I have no reason to harbor unjust feelings toward others, for there is nothing set in the stone that says my enemies must always be my enemies.
quotes.author: Jason B. Cunningham

quotes.quote: The feelings of hell exists only within the ego thought system.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr.

quotes.quote: May you continue to write your story and share it, knowing you are the only one who can fill those pages with your own thoughts, experiences, feelings and emotions.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: I choose to express my feelings and emotions, not keeping them locked up inside and not allowing anyone to tell me differently because I know that it's okay to cry and it's okay to talk about what I've been through because to hold it all inside is not healthy.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: Denying their true feelings, they star in a false act.
quotes.author: Jenna Kandyce Linch

quotes.quote: It is essential to master your feelings and emotions at all times and to maintain personal power, self-discipline, spiritual vigilance, focus, concentration, and single-pointedness, however, it is also essential to integrate them.
quotes.author: Joshua Stone

quotes.quote: Since it is our thoughts that create our feelings and emotions and it is our perspective that creates our reality this is of the highest importance.
quotes.author: Joshua Stone

quotes.quote: You are running to seek your friend. Let your feet run, but your mind need not.
quotes.author: Marsilio Ficino

quotes.quote: It is better to die on your feet than to live on your knees.
quotes.author: Emiliano Zapata

quotes.quote: You have to be fast on your feet and adaptive or else a strategy is useless.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Feet that run on willing errands!
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: You can't put your feet on the ground until you've touched the sky.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: There's man all over for you, blaming on his boots the fault of his feet.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: A severed foot is the ultimate stocking stuffer.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Commonly they must use their feet for defense whose only weapon is their tongue.
quotes.author: Philip Sidney

quotes.quote: When you see your feet with no footwear, also see those with no feet.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The human foot is a masterpiece of engineering and a work of art.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Along your pathway of life you will observe that you are not the only traveler. There are others who need your help. There are feet to steady, hands to grasp, minds to encourage, hearts to inspire, and souls to save.
quotes.author: Thomas Monson

quotes.quote: There is one rule, above all others, for a man. Whatever comes, face it on your feet.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is safer to read maps with your feet.
quotes.author: Kelly Link

quotes.quote: Better to trip with the feet than with the tongue.
quotes.author: Zeno of Citium

quotes.quote: The foot feels the foot when it feels the ground.
quotes.author: Gautama Buddha

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our perfect companions never have fewer than four feet.
quotes.author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quotes.quote: Better a barefoot than none.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: If someone wants to suck your toes, those toes should be worth sucking.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: My shoes are special shoes for discerning feet.
quotes.author: Manolo Blahnik

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground and your thoughts at lofty heights.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: My imperfections and failures are as much a blessing from God as my successes and my talents and I lay them both at His feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Be sure you put your feet in the right place, then stand firm.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Better to die on your feet than live on your knees.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Our feet are planted in the real world, but we dance with angels and ghosts.
quotes.author: John Cameron Mitchell

quotes.quote: Run your purpose on the toes of your feet before people can type your success stories with the fingers of their hands.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Don't place your mistakes on your head, their weight may crush you. Instead, place them under your feet and use them as a platform to view your horizons.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Forget not that the earth delights to feel your bare feet and the winds long to play with your hair.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter how green a blade of grass is expected to be, when it's already smashed beneath the feet.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: It's only out of reach when you choose to keep your feet flat on the floor.
quotes.author: Lana M. H. Wilder

quotes.quote: If you're going to kick authority in the teeth, you might as well use both feet.
quotes.author: Keith Richards

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground and keep reaching for the stars.
quotes.author: Casey Kasem

quotes.quote: The only thing I know is this: I am full of wounds and still standing on my feet.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: There's language in her eye, her cheek, her lip; Nay, her foot speaks.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A man's feet should be planted in his country, but his eyes should survey the world.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Choose the paths which are not worn out by many feet!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Power and speed be hands and feet.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The job of feets is walking, but their hobby is dancing.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: The place where you made your stand never mattered. Only that you were there. And still on your feet.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Stretching his hand up to reach the stars, too often man forgets the flowers at his feet.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: He who has imagination without learning has wings but no feet.
quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

quotes.quote: When you're at the end of your rope, all you have to do is make one foot move out in front of the other. Just take the next step. That's all there is to it.
quotes.author: Samuel Fuller

quotes.quote: I will not let anyone walk through my mind with their dirty feet.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Keep your feet on the ground, but let your heart soar as high as it will. Refuse to be average or to surrender to the chill of your spiritual environment.
quotes.author: Arthur Helps

quotes.quote: The foolish man seeks happiness in the distance. The wise grows it under his feet.
quotes.author: James Oppenheim

quotes.quote: A man who has both feet planted firmly in the air can be safely called a liberal as opposed to the conservative, who has both feet firmly planted in his mouth.
quotes.author: Jacques Barzun

quotes.quote: You can steer yourself in any direction you choose.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Your feet will bring you to where your heart is.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: When you jump for joy, beware that no one moves the ground from beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: No one regards what is before his feet. We all gaze at the stars.
quotes.author: Quintus Ennius

quotes.quote: The feet of the humblest may walk in the field Where the feet of the Holiest have trod, this, then, is the marvel to mortals revealed.
quotes.author: Phillips Brooks

quotes.quote: Put one foot in front of the other, focus on the little goal right in front of you, and almost anything is possible.
quotes.author: Joe De Sena

quotes.quote: It's the job that's never started as takes longest to finish.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: We need worship for our spirit, fellowship for our soul and committed subservience for our body.
quotes.author: Larry Norman

quotes.quote: A habit of devout fellowship with God is the spring of all our life, and the strength of it.
quotes.author: Henry Edward Manning

quotes.quote: Walking in close fellowship with God is a spiritual self.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Spiritual power comes out of inward fellowship with God and abandonment to his purposes.
quotes.author: E. Stanley Jones

quotes.quote: We are obliged to respect, defend and maintain the common bonds of union and fellowship that exist among all members of the human race.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: There is a fellowship more quiet even than solitude, and which, rightly understood, is solitude made perfect.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Most Christians do not have fellowship with God; they have fellowship with each other about God.
quotes.author: Paris Reidhead

quotes.quote: The first service that one owes to others in the fellowship consists of listening to them.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Good-fellowship, unflagging, is the prime requisite for success in our society, and the man or woman who smiles only for reasons of humor or pleasure is a deviate.
quotes.author: Marya Mannes

quotes.quote: The fellowship of true friends who can hear you out, share your joys, help carry your burdens, and correctly counsel you is priceless.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: It is the fellowship of the Cross to experience the burden of the other. If one does not experience it, the fellowship he belongs to is not Christian. If any member refuses to bear that burden, he denies the law of Christ.
quotes.author: Dietrich Bonhoeffer

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is the very price and condition of man's survival.
quotes.author: Carlos Pena Romulo

quotes.quote: Fellowship is a place of grace, where mistakes aren't rubbed in but rubbed out. Fellowship happens when mercy wins over justice.
quotes.author: Rick Warren

quotes.quote: Today there's more fellowship among snakes than among mankind. Wild beasts spare those with similar markings.
quotes.author: Juvenal

quotes.quote: We get in the grip of doubt and straightway we turn from the fellowship of those who know the Lord to the fellowship of those who confessedly do not know Him.
quotes.author: Clovis G. Chappell

quotes.quote: If a person loves only one other person, and is indifferent to his fellow men, his love is not love but a symbiotic attachment, or an enlarged egotism.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: The principle of the brotherhood of man is narcissistic for the grounds for that love have always been the assumption that we ought to realize that we are the same the whole world over.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Brotherhood is not just a Bible word. Out of comradeship can come and will come the happy life for all.
quotes.author: Heywood Broun

quotes.quote: The Christian's fellowship with God is rather a habit than a rapture.
quotes.author: Richard Cecil

quotes.quote: The brotherhood of man is evoked by particular men according to their circumstances. But it seldom extends to all men. In the name of our freedom and our brotherhood we are prepared to blow up the other half of mankind and to be blown up in our turn.
quotes.author: R. D. Laing

quotes.quote: There is nothing in this world that can compare with the Christian fellowship; nothing that can satisfy but Christ.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: God is so unique in giving His people ways to fellowship, witness, and remember what a mighty and merciful God He is.
quotes.author: Monica Johnson

quotes.quote: The next best thing to being wise oneself is to live in a circle of those who are.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Our love to God is measured by our everyday fellowship with others and the love it displays.
quotes.author: Andrew Murray

quotes.quote: One of the signs of passing youth is the birth of a sense of fellowship with other human beings as we take our place among them.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: There is no sweeter fellowship with Christ than to bring our wounds and our sores to him.
quotes.author: Samuel Rutherford

quotes.quote: Fellowship with God means warfare with the world.
quotes.author: Charles E. Fuller

quotes.quote: Good fellowship and friendship are lasting, rational and manly pleasures.
quotes.author: William Wycherley

quotes.quote: There is always a chance that he who sets himself up as his brother's keeper will end up by being his jail-keeper.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: To love our neighbor as ourselves is such a truth for regulating human society, that by that alone one might determine all the cases in social morality.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The church is being itself then, as a missional community, in fellowship. That gathering is a living reminder of God's presence to this world and to itself as well.
quotes.author: Jane Holslag

quotes.quote: Christian fellowship is a group or community of people or friends who have similar interests and spiritual goals, and hold Jesus Christ as their focal point by seeking to worship and serve God in the power of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: David O. Ekundayo

quotes.quote: The principal purpose of spiritual fellowship is to furnish the believer the right environment for spiritual growth.
quotes.author: David O. Ekundayo

quotes.quote: Church fellowship is the exercise of the social principle in matters of religion and in obedience to the authority of Christ.
quotes.author: John Angell James

quotes.quote: Man is a social being, by which we mean that he instinctively seeks the company of his fellows; is capable of enjoying their society, and derives from their communion no small portion of his improvement and felicity.
quotes.author: John Angell James

quotes.quote: Church fellowship is no less a duty than the observance of the first Sabbath, as the same reasons may be advanced for one as for the other.
quotes.author: John Angell James

quotes.quote: Fellowship is the instituted way of making a public profession of the faith and hope of the gospel.
quotes.author: John Angell James

quotes.quote: Fellowship was ordained of God as a means of building up believers in the Faith.
quotes.author: Smith

quotes.quote: When fellowship is based in the foundation of compromise with error, however, its effect is just the opposite.
quotes.author: Smith

quotes.quote: A good fellowship--a people supporting each other by love and prayer, surrounding each other with an encouraging witness to the power and mercy of God.
quotes.author: AuthorHouse

quotes.quote: We are human beings, and we have been given a mind to be able to reason thinks out with, but we can't just talk to ourselves. We need to discuss things with other human beings. We need to fellowship, and if we don't have it we may get lonely and depressed at times.
quotes.author: Henry Miranda

quotes.quote: We were made to have fellowship, and we will always feel alone until we get back to the fellowship God intended us to have with Him from the beginning of time when he created us.
quotes.author: Henry Miranda

quotes.quote: God created us for fellowship with him. Lacking that fellowship, we may find ourselves miserable at times and disoriented,
quotes.author: Henry Miranda

quotes.quote: Fellowship is the bond of common purpose and devotion that binds Christians together and to Christ.
quotes.author: Henry Miranda

quotes.quote: Being without God's fellowship leads to loneliness and isolation.
quotes.author: Henry Miranda

quotes.quote: When we sin, as Christians, we lose our fellowship with God. We lose our closeness to Him. We can have it restored by confessing or acknowledging our sins to God.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: When we talk about having fellowship with God we mean being close to Him, spending time with Him, and getting to know Him.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: When a Christian has fellowship with God, he can enjoy God's peace, love and purpose for his life.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: Having fellowship with God allows us to pray and get our prayers answered. It gives us a peace and a joy because we are close to our savior and creator.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: Fellowship is an integral part of a growing church.
quotes.author: Paul Chappell

quotes.quote: Fellowship extends to the utmost limits of the church. The passion, that feeds it, glows in the heart of every believer.
quotes.author: Chauncey Lee

quotes.quote: Today is Christmas, isn't it? The time for cheer and good fellowship, and for peace.
quotes.author: Allan Scott

quotes.quote: He's got my heart / I know that he needs nothing more / I await His call.... ali ali in come free / Fellowship is one / All I need is inside / Fellowship of one
quotes.author: Jesse Herron Davis

quotes.quote: If we walk in the light as he is in the light, we have fellowship with one another, and the blood of Jesus Christ his son cleanses us from all sin.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Many of us are looking to find a church or fellowship to join with a concept that this is where God wants me to be permanently.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Christian Fellowship. It is the observation of a thoughtful and powerful writer of the present day, that intercourse and combination must never be regarded as the ultimate and perfect condition of social beings.
quotes.author: N. T. Wright

quotes.quote: Farewell... my brave Hobbits. My work is now finished. Here at last, on the shores of the sea... comes the end of our Fellowship. I will not say, Do not weep... not all tears are an evil.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Hold your ground, hold your ground! Sons of Gondor, of Rohan, my brothers! I see in your eyes the same fear that would take the heart of me. A day may come when the courage of men fails, when we forsake our friends and break all bonds of fellowship, but it is not this day.
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: The Anglo-German Fellowship is discreet, diplomatic, careful, profoundly English
quotes.author: Peter Moffat

quotes.quote: There is a fellowship more quiet even than solitude and which rightly understood is solitude made perfect.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Feminism loves men enough to expect them to act more honorably and actually believes them capable of doing so.
quotes.author: Michael Kimmel

quotes.quote: Feminism is something you do. It's a verb. It's what you are. It's an activity; it's something you're actively engaged in."
quotes.author: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.quote: Feminism is equality: politically; culturally; socially; economically. That's it, that simple.
quotes.author: Emma Watson

quotes.quote: Feminism was about making women's lives less constrained and giving them more choices.
quotes.author: Hanna Rosin

quotes.quote: Feminism is the radical notion that women are human beings.
quotes.author: Cheris Kramarae

quotes.quote: Feminism has never been about getting a job for one woman. It's about making life more fair for women everywhere. It's not about a piece of the existing pie; there are too many of us for that. It's about baking a new pie.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Feminism means something - legislation, cultural change - but 'Girl Power' meant nothing more than being friends with your friends.
quotes.author: Caitlin Moran

quotes.quote: Feminism is the ability to choose what you want to do.
quotes.author: Nancy Reagan

quotes.quote: Really feminism is about being all that you are and not having to trade one thing for another on your way up.
quotes.author: Gina Torres

quotes.quote: Feminism's agenda is basic: It asks that women not be forced to â€˜choose' between public justice and private happiness.
quotes.author: Susan Faludi

quotes.quote: Feminism was established so as to allow unattractive women access to the mainstream of society.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Feminism means to me being comfortable with who you are as a woman and being unapologetic about it.
quotes.author: Charissa Thompson

quotes.quote: The word feminism needs to be taken back. It needs to be reclaimed in a way that is inclusive of men.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: Feminism is the single most powerful social movement of our time, one that addresses every aspect of human and social life.
quotes.author: Richard Allen Epstein

quotes.quote: Feminism is a socialist, anti-family, political movement that encourages women to leave their husbands, kill their children, practice witchcraft, destroy capitalism and become lesbians.
quotes.author: Pat Robertson

quotes.quote: Feminism is a belief that although women and men are inherently of equal worth, most societies privilege men as a group. As a result, social movements are necessary to achieve political equality between women and men, with the understanding that gender always intersects with other social hierarchies.
quotes.author: Estelle Freedman

quotes.quote: Feminism isn't called the longest revolution for nothing.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Feminism is an entire world view or gestalt, not just a laundry list of women's issues.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.quote: Feminism isn't about making women stronger. Women are already strong. It's about changing the way the world perceives that strength.
quotes.author: G.D. Anderson

quotes.quote: Feminism's ultimate success is that we don't need it anymore.
quotes.author: S. E. Cupp

quotes.quote: here's nothing bad about feminism. We have to help each other, because there's a lot of women in the world who are suffering because the fact is we're not equal. It's as plain as that. It's still a men's world. I don't know. We'll go on with it.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: Feminism is a political mistake. Feminism is a mistake made by women's intellect, a mistake which her instinct will recognize.
quotes.author: Valentine de Saint-Point

quotes.quote: Feminism is just about equality, really, and there's so much stuff attached to the word, when it's actually so simple. I don't know why it's always so bogged down.
quotes.author: Mia Wasikowska

quotes.quote: Feminism is doomed to failure because it is based on an attempt to repeal and restructure human nature.
quotes.author: Phyllis Schlafly

quotes.quote: Feminism is a transformational force, an individual and social force. It is a way of looking at the world-a questioning of power/domination issues, an affirmation of women's energy.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bunch

quotes.quote: Feminism is not just about women; it's about letting all people lead fuller lives.
quotes.author: Jane Fonda

quotes.quote: Feminism is a program for making different beings â€” men and women â€” turn out alike, andâ€¦ it must do a good deal of chopping to fit the real world into its ideal.
quotes.author: Michael Levin

quotes.quote: Feminism is a good venue for getting yourself across as much as for getting your point across.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Wurtzel

quotes.quote: Feminism has led the way in demystifying personal relations, forcefully insisting they are political to the core.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Fox-Genovese

quotes.quote: Feminism is what I do with my life, it's how I spend my days, it's my job, it's not just an opinion I have among many other opinions.
quotes.author: Jaclyn Friedman

quotes.quote: Feminism starts out being very simple, and it ends up being a world view that questions hierarchy altogether.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Women have to harness their power â€“ it's absolutely true. It's just learning not to take the first no. And if you can't go straight ahead, you go around the corner.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: The extremists are afraid of books and pens, the power of education frightens them. They are afraid of women.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: Feminism was established so as to allow unattractive women access to the mainstream of society.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: I say if I'm beautiful. I say if I'm strong. You will not determine my story â€“ I will.
quotes.author: Amy Schumer

quotes.quote: There's just as many different kinds of feminism as there are women in the world.
quotes.author: Kathleen Hanna

quotes.quote: Until women learn to want economic independence, and until they work out a way to get this independence without denying themselves the joys of love and motherhood, it seems to me feminism has no roots
quotes.author: Crystal Eastman

quotes.quote: It matters more what's in a woman's face than what's on it.
quotes.author: Claudette Colbert

quotes.quote: I am a woman and when I think, I must speak.
quotes.author: Beyonce

quotes.quote: It's not about women acting like men. It's about women acting like women and being successful.
quotes.author: Zooey Deschanel

quotes.quote: She wins who calls herself beautiful and challenges the world to change to truly see her.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: Women are always at the front of revolutions.
quotes.author: Buthayna Kamel

quotes.quote: If men could see us as we really are, they would be a little amazedâ€¦.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: A woman is the full circle. Within her is the power to create, nurture and transform.
quotes.author: Diane Mariechild

quotes.quote: I think the girl who is able to earn her own living and pay her own way should be as happy as anybody on earth. The sense of independence and security is very sweet.
quotes.author: Susan B Anthony

quotes.quote: A beautiful woman looking at her image in the mirror may very well believe the image is herself. An ugly woman knows it is not.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Feminism isn't about making women stronger. Women are already strong. It's about changing the way the world perceives that strength.
quotes.author: G.D Anderson

quotes.quote: The most notable fact our culture imprints on women is the sense of our limits.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: A feminist is anyone who recognizes the equality and full humanity of women and men.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: You must understand: they fear you.There is nothing scarier in their minds than a girl who knows the power of her flames.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.quote: A girl should be two things: who and what she wants.
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Feminism is the radical notion that women are people.
quotes.author: Cheris Kramarae and Paula Treichler

quotes.quote: The connections between and among women are the most feared, the most problematic, and the most potentially transforming force on the planet.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: It's not my responsibility to be beautiful. I'm not alive for that purpose. My existence is not about how desirable you find me.
quotes.author: Warsan Shire

quotes.quote: Life on the planet is born of woman.
quotes.author: Adrienne Rich

quotes.quote: Women may be the one group that grows more radical with age.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: A woman with a voice is, by definition, a strong woman.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: The beauty myth is always actually prescribing behaviour and not appearance.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: Feminism directly confronts the idea that one person or set of people has the right to impose definitions of reality on others.
quotes.author: Liz Stanley and Sue Wise

quotes.quote: In the end there is nothing more unattractive to men than radical feminism.
quotes.author: Helen Fielding

quotes.quote: People have accepted the media's idea of what feminism is, but that doesn't mean that it's right or true or real. Feminism is not monolithic. Within feminism, there is an array of opinions.
quotes.author: Judy Chicago

quotes.quote: As soon as a woman gets to an age where she has opinions and she's vital and she's strong, she's systematically shamed into hiding under a rock.
quotes.author: Sarah Silverman

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: It's wonderful to watch a pretty woman with character grow beautiful.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: To tell a woman everything she may not do is to tell her what she can do.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: To be a femme fatale you don't have to be slinky and sensuous and disastrously beautiful, you just have to have the will to disturb.
quotes.author: Alice Munro

quotes.quote: The mystique of the femme fatale cannot be perfectly translated into male terms.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: She was a femme fatale with creative license, and she was sharpening her pen just for me.
quotes.author: M.K.Williams

quotes.quote: I think that plain old intellectualism a more powerful force than the idea of the femme fatale.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: I've never considered myself a femme fatale as I've never seduced anyone and ruined their lives. At least as far as I know.
quotes.author: Scarlett Johansson

quotes.quote: I think it's not a femme fatale when someone is not doing it to manipulate men or be like a black widow. She loves him. She does it out of love. She wants him so badly to stay with her.
quotes.author: Salma Hayek

quotes.quote: There's the good girl leading a charmed life who secretly covets to be the rare and elusive femme fatale and the femme fatale who yearns to be good and then there is their nemesis - men who dream and desire both.
quotes.author: Donna Lynn Hope

quotes.quote: Feminism has tried to dismiss the femme fatale as a misogynist libel, a hoary cliche. But the femme fatale expresses woman's ancient and eternal control of the sexual realm. The specter of the femme fatale stalks all of men's relationships with women.
quotes.author: Camille Paglia

quotes.quote: I resent it when they write the part of a woman who's just a sexy femme fatale who seduces people to get her way, perpetrating the myth that that's how woman have to operate, instead of using their brains or their wit.
quotes.author: Teri Garr

quotes.quote: When men create movies about femme fatales, it really is always about how that female can destroy that male. It's not really about what's happening on the interior of that female.
quotes.author: Anna Biller

quotes.quote: I suppose you could pass for a starlet. You do have that femme fatale air about you. Like you crush boys' dreams in your spare time.
quotes.author: Janette Rallison

quotes.quote: I'm from New York; I've been in show business all my life. I'm a wild and crazy gal, yet I always play these soft, warm, loving earth mothers. It's a pain in the butt. I'm a femme fatale!
quotes.author: Bonnie Badelia

quotes.quote: Well, I'm not at all like the tough, sexy femme fatale in Confidence but it's fun to play people who're really different from you, from different cultures and places. I suppose I'm a bit quieter than most of the people I play.
quotes.author: Rachel Weisz

quotes.quote: And I always had this idea for making a movie about a femme fatale, because I like these characters. They're a lot of fun, they're sexy, they're manipulative, they're dangerous.
quotes.author: Brian De Palma

quotes.quote: I've been playing sexually aware women most of my life. At this point I expected to be playing moms and wives. It's exciting to play a femme fatale.
quotes.author: Kim Cattrall

quotes.quote: I guess I'm just not the film femme fatale type. I giggle too much. I have freckles and a turned-up nose, and I walk like an athlete.
quotes.author: Joan Caulfield

quotes.quote: Blondes are the girlfriend, brunette is the femme fatale, but the heroine, she's the redheaded girl.
quotes.author: Marlon Roach

quotes.quote: The tradition is a fence around the law, tithes are a fence around riches, vows are a fence around abstinence, a fence around wisdom is silence.
quotes.author: Akiva ben Joseph

quotes.quote: If a person can build a fence around himself, he is bound to do it.
quotes.author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quotes.quote: Whenever you remove any fence, always pause long enough to ask why it was put there in the first place.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The only fence against the world is a thorough knowledge of it.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: Ride at any fence hard enough, and the chances are you'll get over. The harder you ride the heavier the fall, if you get a fall; but the greater the chance of your getting over.
quotes.author: Anthony Trollope

quotes.quote: When you look at it that way, you can see how absurd it is that we individualize ourselves with our fences and hoarded possessions.
quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

quotes.quote: Good fences make good neighbors.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Safety is a fence, and fences are for sheep. I would rather die at twenty-two, knowing the truth, then live in a cage of lies for a hundred years.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Beyond the fence the forest stood up spectrally in the moonlight, and through the dim stir, through the faint sounds of that lamentable courtyard, the silence of the land went home to one's very heart its mystery, its greatness, the amazing reality of its concealed life.
quotes.author: Joseph Conrad

quotes.quote: Opportunity never sneaks up on those who straddle the fence of indecision.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Everybody has barriers and obstacles. If you look at them as containing fences that don't allow you to advance, then you're going to be a failure. If you look at them as hurdles that strengthen you each time you go over one, then you're going to be a success.
quotes.author: Benjamin Carson

quotes.quote: The fence and the boundary line are the symbols of the spirit of justice. They set the limits upon each man's interest to prevent one from taking advantage of the other.
quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quotes.quote: If you put fences around people, you get sheep. Give people the room they need.
quotes.author: William L. McKnight

quotes.quote: Ridicule has historically proven itself a rickety fence for great ideas.
quotes.author: Vanna Bonta

quotes.quote: Don't ever take a fence down until you know why it was put up.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Most folks are like a barb-wire fence. They have their good points.
quotes.author: Texas Bix Bender

quotes.quote: The wide world is all about you, you can fence yourselves in, but you cannot for ever fence it out.
quotes.author: J R R Tolkien

quotes.quote: Where there is a fence, there is no terror. Where there's no fence, there is terror.
quotes.author: Tzachi Hanegbi

quotes.quote: There is no fence or hedge round time that has gone. You can go back and have what you like if you remember it well enough.
quotes.author: Richard Llewellyn

quotes.quote: A fence to wisdom is silence.
quotes.author: Akiba Ben Joseph

quotes.quote: Fences are made for those who cannot fly.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The fence around a cemetery is foolish, for those inside can't come out and those outside don't want to get in.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter which side of the fence you get off on sometimes. What matters most is getting off. You cannot make progress without making decisions.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: He has sat on the fence so long that the iron has entered his soul.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: If there is a fence and you don't know its purpose, don't just assume there isn't one and tear it down. Find out what the fence is intended to accomplish. You might see it needs to stay.
quotes.author: Jerry Vines

quotes.quote: If the stable gate is closed, climb the fence.
quotes.author: Julie Krone

quotes.quote: Build a little fence of trust around today; Fill the space with loving deeds, and therein stay.
quotes.author: Mary Butts

quotes.quote: Fences and borders are a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Yanis Varoufakis

quotes.quote: Fences and walls can be effective and even soothing, at least for those who build them.
quotes.author: Richard Engel

quotes.quote: Someone's always going to come down on the side of the fence.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: The best way to catch a horse is to build a fence around it.
quotes.author: Emmylou Harris

quotes.quote: It makes a difference doesn't it, whether we fully fence ourselves in, or whether we are fenced out by the barriers of others.
quotes.author: E M Forster

quotes.quote: There's only one thing I never did and wish I had done: climbed over a fence.
quotes.author: Mary of Teck

quotes.quote: A good neighbor is a fellow who smiles at you over the back fence, but doesn't climb over it.
quotes.author: Arthur Baer

quotes.quote: If you strive for the moon, maybe you'll get over the fence.
quotes.author: James Woods

quotes.quote: If I am more fortunate than others I need to build a longer table not a taller fence.
quotes.author: Tamlyn Tomita

quotes.quote: How well I have learned that there is no fence to sit on between heaven and hell. There is a deep, wide gulf, a chasm, and in that chasm is no place for any man.
quotes.author: Johnny Cash

quotes.quote: Fear is the highest fence.
quotes.author: Dudley Nichols

quotes.quote: A fence to wisdom is silence.
quotes.author: Rabbi Akiva

quotes.quote: The security fence is reversible. Human lives are irreversible.
quotes.author: Silvan Shalom

quotes.quote: I just swung for the fence. That's my whole philosophy in life.
quotes.author: Ronnie Van Zant

quotes.quote: As long as our civilization is essentially one of property, of fences, of exclusiveness, it will be mocked by delusions.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If you have a big expenditure right around the corner, you don't want to be swinging for the fences with your savings.
quotes.author: Thomas Raymond

quotes.quote: When you swing for the fences, you’re putting every ounce of strength into hitting the ball as far as possible. You know that your bat might miss the ball entirely—but that if you succeed in making contact, the rewards can be huge.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: A fence between makes love more keen.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: A fence lasts three years, a dog lasts three fences, a horse three dogs, and a man three horses.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: Build the fence or you will pay for the plunder.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: Everyone tries to cross the fence where it is lowest.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: Some people build fences to keep people out, and other people build fences to keep people in.
quotes.author: Bono

quotes.quote: Make not a fence more expensive or more important than the thing that is fenced.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: There is no fence against ill fortune.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Oh, give me land, lots of land under starry skies above, / Don't fence me in. / I want to ride to the ridge where the West commences. / Gaze at the moon till I lose my senses, / Can't look at hobbles and I can't stand fences, / Don't fence me in.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: Some may believe the more important written words don't ever need to be heard. But if it doesn't read out loud to make sense, you ought to leave it sitting on the fence.
quotes.author: Rolland E. Stroup

quotes.quote: Winning depends on where you put your priorities. It's usually best to put them over the fence.
quotes.author: Slugger Jason Giambi

quotes.quote: A woman's dress should be like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: My question is, why does everybody want to be blonde? The grass may always be greener, but once you hop the fence, you step in dog crap.
quotes.author: Monica Potter

quotes.quote: To bring on rain, hang a snake on a fence.
quotes.author: Southern Mothers

quotes.quote: Celebrities love the season of goodwill to all men. No need to put up Christmas lights—they just crank up the power on the electric fence until it's white hot.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Too many people want to have one foot in the world and one foot in the kingdom of God, and it is like straddling a fence.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Providing a framework doesn't take away children's individuality. In fact, structure generally helps them to be more free because it provides boundaries. It's like a fence that offers security for what can happen inside the enclosure. Respect flourishes best within a clear framework, and it's that framework that can allow us all to express more of who we really are.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: When you're 40, you can't ride the fence anymore. You gotta make definite decisions about your life.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Anytime you see a turtle up on top of a fence post, you know he had some help.
quotes.author: Alex Haley

quotes.quote: Those prancing little pants-wetters come here to learn the colorful and gentlemanly art of fencing, with its many sporting limitations and its proscriptions against dishonorable engagements. You on the other hand, you are going to learn how to kill men with a sword.
quotes.author: Scott Lynch

quotes.quote: I do, my lady. Fencing is an excellent sport for ladies- it develops strength, posture, and proper breathing.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: I find that fencing and training give me more stamina and help me deal with the craziness of being on the road so much.
quotes.author: Bruce Dickinson

quotes.quote: The studio thought I was crazy to perform all of my own fencing stunts, but I loved it.
quotes.author: Maureen O'Hara

quotes.quote: I loved fencing and dancing and elocution.
quotes.author: Vivien Leigh

quotes.quote: Fencing and shooting kind of came naturally. From the start, I knew that I had it in me.
quotes.author: Elodie Clouvel

quotes.quote: Train like you've never won, fence like you're never lost.
quotes.author: Latifa Salimo

quotes.quote: In point of substantial merit the law school belongs in the modern university no more than a school of fencing or dancing.
quotes.author: Thorstein Veblen

quotes.quote: This fencing, this clashing of steel, are the uproar Of youth when it becomes a prey to puling love.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: The grass is tough as fencing-wire, And just as good for fodder.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: The grass is tough as fencing-wire, And just as good for fodder.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Where these dwelt who at dawn abandoning tent and thorn--bush fencing fled to the wilderness
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: Splitting timber for the fencing, Stripping bark to roof the shed.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Or darns his hose, or mends his breeches, While Harry's fencing up his ditches.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: For the price of a field we have wrangled While the weather rusted the plow, ' twas yours and 'twas mine and 'tis ours yet ' twas yours and 'twas mine and 'tis ours yet.
quotes.author: Francis Ledwidge

quotes.quote: Here is the same sky," she said, "only free from the fencing hills,--
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: And to explain what your forefathers meant, By real presence in the sacrament, After long fencing pushed against a wall, Your salvo comes, that he's not there at all:
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Dexterous in fencing, skilled in horsemanship-- His voice and hand preferred to spur or whip;
quotes.author: Caroline Elizabeth Sarah Norton

quotes.quote: Fair war with black--legs, men who dared to gauge My youth's bright honour as an antique thing, A broadsword to their fencing point and edge.
quotes.author: Wilfrid Scawen Blunt

quotes.quote: He's shearing here and fencing there, a kind of waif and stray-- He's droving now with Conroy's sheep along the Castlereagh.
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: Creativity is the essence of fencing.
quotes.author: Charles Allen

quotes.quote: Safety is a fence, and fences are for sheep.
quotes.author: Karen Marie Moning

quotes.quote: Someone's always going to come down on the side of the fence.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: Fencing is a funny sport. Competitive fencing is not really very applicable to the stage world unless you're fighting with a rapier during the Renaissance, you know?
quotes.author: Kris Holden-Ried

quotes.quote: Fencing isn't really fighting. It's more like chess with the risk of puncture wounds.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: As a pirate, she once undressed a fencing instructor using only her sword!
quotes.author: Kathy Reichs

quotes.quote: The secret to fencing consists in two things: to give and to not receive.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Fencing is a game of living chess, a match where reflexes only work in combination with intent, and mind and body must work together at every moment.
quotes.author: V. E. Schwab

quotes.quote: Fences and borders are a sign of weakness.
quotes.author: Yanis Varoufakis

quotes.quote: Fences and walls can be effective and even soothing, at least for those who build them.
quotes.author: Richard Engel

quotes.quote: Where there is a fence, there is no terror. Where there's no fence, there is terror.
quotes.author: Tzachi Hanegbi

quotes.quote: Ferrari or Lamborghini. Never fancied one of those - too flash for me. I don't really like seeking too much attention.
quotes.author: Gary Lineker

quotes.quote: It's not the Ferrari that makes the driver, It's the driver who make ferrari.
quotes.author: Krishna Timbadiya

quotes.quote: You buy a Ferrari when you want to be somebody. You buy a Lamborghini when you are somebody.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: The Ferrari is a dream - people dream of owning this special vehicle and for most people it will remain a dream apart from for those lucky few.
quotes.author: Enzo Ferrari

quotes.quote: We don't sell a car, we sell a dream. We are Italy's national team. There are many great soccer teams in our country, but there is only one Ferrari.
quotes.author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quotes.quote: Let's make it clear: it's Ferrari I'm interested in. Drivers, we've had a lot, some very good, some great, but drivers come and go, while Ferrari remains.
quotes.author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quotes.quote: The body is like a car: the older you become the more care you have to take care of it - and you don't leave a Ferrari out in the sun.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: If your fateline is equal to a Ferrari but you are a bad driver, then the car will not run smooth for so long.
quotes.author: Boka Kobi

quotes.quote: Once you've reached the highest level, you always want to get back there. It's like, once you drive a Ferrari, you're not satisfied driving a Honda anymore.
quotes.author: Jordan Burroughs

quotes.quote: Ferrari never spoke to me again. He was a great man, I admit, but it was so very easy to upset him.
quotes.author: Ferrucio Lamborghini

quotes.quote: It’s not important how we play. If you have a Ferrari and I have a small car, to beat you in a race I have to break your wheel or put sugar in your tank.
quotes.author: Jose Mourinho

quotes.quote: Ferrari's only objective is to be at the top, in other words, to compete for the World Championship. That's our right. Winning is another matter. It wouldn't be a disgrace to come in second after a tough fight.
quotes.author: Michael Schumacher

quotes.quote: Resolution without routine is like a Ferrari without gas...it might look real good but it will get you no where.
quotes.author: Steven Furtick

quotes.quote: You want to have fun but you also want to work well. Sometimes I was quite happy at Ferrari, because we would have fun, but then they could Anot stop having fun and go back to the real work.
quotes.author: Alain Prost

quotes.quote: An insult makes Lamborghini more powerful, stylish, rich and performance freak than Ferrari.
quotes.author: Nilesh Vishwakarma

quotes.quote: Ever wondered why Ferrari have two seats while the others have more than two? It's all because if you can own a Ferrari...you know you can't trust many people.
quotes.author: Yugantar Rathore

quotes.quote: We do not invest in advertising... So racing is the best advertising for Ferrari.
quotes.author: Luca Cordero di Montezemolo

quotes.quote: I don't like being famous - it is like a prison. And driving for Ferrari would make it far worse.
quotes.author: Valentino Rossi

quotes.quote: A good teacher will show you the ropes in the world of power. They will give you the wisdom that is necessary to be able to use power. You just don't give a kid a new Ferrari. You teach him how to drive it.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: I run like an electric golf cart. Now I look at eating as a way to feed my body and keep me younger. It's not about starving your body, but treating your body like a Ferrari. You don't put in the crappiest gas you can find. You use supreme. In the long term, you'll run clean.
quotes.author: Carol Alt

quotes.quote: Gaining attention without 'respect' is like gaining a Ferrari without 'engine'.
quotes.author: Yashlo Chasmis

quotes.quote: You loved ferris wheels more than roller coasters because life shouldn't be lived at full speed, but in anticipation and appreciation.
quotes.author: Amy Harmon

quotes.quote: Life is like a ferris wheel. One minute you're on top, the next you're at the bottom. Just stay in your seat, enjoy the ride, and hang on until you reach the top again.
quotes.author: Susan Gale

quotes.quote: Hope is a Ferris wheel- It takes low and high; And when you reach the top, It's like you can touch the sky! And when it takes you down hope becomes a thing that, When you're getting off, You take with you to bring.
quotes.author: Robin Herrera

quotes.quote: Ride the ferris wheel. There's something romantic about riding the ferris wheel, especially when it stops and you're feeling like you're on top of the world. Remember to kiss your Valentine when you're staring at the stars together.
quotes.author: Julie Spira

quotes.quote: I see nothing in space as promising as the view from a Ferris wheel.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: When you're on a Ferris wheel all anyone ever talks about is being on the Ferris wheel and the view from the Ferris wheel and whether the Ferris wheel is scary and how many more times it will go around. Dating is like that. Nobody who's doing it ever talks about anything else. I have no interest in dating.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Ferris wheel carried its passengers high and brought them low and raised them high and brought them low again, as if it were not merely a carnival ride but also a metaphor for the basic pattern of human experience.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Moons and Junes and Ferris wheels The dizzy dancing way you feel As every fairy tale comes real I've looked at love that way.
quotes.author: Joni Mitchell

quotes.quote: The first week of August hangs at the very top of summer, the top of the live long year, like the highest seat of a Ferris wheel when it pauses in its turning.
quotes.author: Natalie Babbitt

quotes.quote: You never know how great a kiss can feel, when you're stop at the top of a Ferris wheel.
quotes.author: Freddy Cannon

quotes.quote: They can't hurt me. Sure, they can crush you and kill you. They can lay you out on 42nd and Broadway and put hoses on you and flush you in the sewers and put you on the subway and carry you out to Coney island and bury you on the Ferris wheel. But I refuse to sit here and worry about dying.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: A Boat O beautiful was the werewolf in his evil forest. We took him to the carnival and he started crying when he saw the Ferris wheel. Electric green and red tears flowed down his furry cheeks. He looked like a boat out on the dark water.
quotes.author: Richard Brautigan

quotes.quote: The first lights of the evening were springing into pale existence. The Ferris wheel, pricked out now in lights, revolved leisurely through the dusk. A few empty cars of the roller coaster rattled overhead.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: I once knew a man who stole a Ferris Wheel.
quotes.author: Dashiell Hammett

quotes.quote: Live every day as if it is a festival. Turn your life into a celebration
quotes.author: Shri Radhe Maa

quotes.quote: The greatness of a culture can be found in its festivals.
quotes.author: Siddharth Katragadda

quotes.quote: Festivals are fun for kids, fun for parents and offer a welcome break from the stresses of the nuclear family. The sheer quantities of people make life easier: loads of adults for the adults to talk to and loads of kids for the kids to play with
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: A national festival is an occasion to refine and rebuild the national character.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: The festivals are like a map charting our spiritual progress in God.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Festivals promote diversity, they bring neighbors into dialogue, they increase creativity, they offer opportunities for civic pride, they improve our general psychological well-being. In short, they make cities better places to live.
quotes.author: David Binder

quotes.quote: Festivals are great because you get to just walk around the corner and see a new band that you've heard but not had the chance to check out.
quotes.author: Johnny Marr

quotes.quote: Each year, every city in the world that can should have a multiday festival. More people meeting each other, digging new types of music, new foods, new ideas. You want to stop having so many wars? This could be a step in the right direction.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: There are as many festivals as there are mosquitoes after a rain.
quotes.author: Kent Jones

quotes.quote: Festival of the impassioned efforts and manifold ambitions of all forms of youthful activity of every generation springing from the threshold of life.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: To celebrate a festival means: to live out, for some special occasion and in an uncommon manner, the universal assent to the world as a whole.
quotes.author: Josef Pieper

quotes.quote: Feasts and festivals are a feature of all major religions.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The true essentials of a feast are only fun and feed.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Festivals are a time to play the songs people know and are looking forward to hearing.
quotes.author: Scott Hutchison

quotes.quote: Before it became known as St. Valentine's Day, February 14 was the eve of the ancient Roman spring fertility and purification festival Lupercalia.
quotes.author: Deborah A. Levine

quotes.quote: Inspired by St. George's chivalrous deed, a Rose festival celebrating romance and gallantry has been held in Barcelona since the Middle Ages.
quotes.author: Deborah A. Levine

quotes.quote: A band of musicians plays throughout the days-long festivities.
quotes.author: Deborah A.Levine

quotes.quote: Our redeemer was born today, we must celebrate with festive joy. We cannot be sad today because it is the birthday of life.
quotes.author: Leo The Great

quotes.quote: Most holidays are wrapped up in tradition and are tied to the past. People add special foods and celebrations to make holidays memorable and exciting.
quotes.author: Whitney Stewart

quotes.quote: Holidays and festivals are rooted in history and tradition.
quotes.author: Whitney Stewart

quotes.quote: The festivals have become abstractions, matters of indifference to modern people.
quotes.author: Matthew Barton

quotes.quote: The great festivals exist to bear witness to our connection with the whole universe, and to help us use our powers of feeling and thinking in such a way that we become fully aware of this connection.
quotes.author: Matthew Barton

quotes.quote: The image of a destination, product or service can be enhanced or damaged by the success or failure of a festival or event.
quotes.author: Ian Yeoman

quotes.quote: No matter what the reason is for hosting a festival or event, there is a wide range of customers, each with different expectations and this will impact on the management processes considered for each individual festival or event.
quotes.author: Ian Yeoman

quotes.quote: The festivals appear to be part of a broader social phenomenon of the contemporary world.
quotes.author: David Picard

quotes.quote: At the core of folk festivals are a large number of enthusiasts, who actively shape and construct the festival, give it direction and vitality and for whom it is a significant part of their lives.
quotes.author: Chris Gibson

quotes.quote: Some critics even accused certain festival activities of extracting money from the ethnic community.
quotes.author: Chiou-ling Yeh

quotes.quote: No festival is improvised. Even a festival called on short notice required time for planning and preparation.
quotes.author: Sarah Bonnemaison

quotes.quote: FESTIVALS ARE FUN FOR KIDS, FUN FOR PARENTS AND OFFER A WELCOME BREAK FROM THE STRESSES OF THE NUCLEAR FAMILY. THE SHEER QUANTITIES OF PEOPLE MAKE LIFE EASIER: LOADS OF ADULTS FOR THE ADULTS TO TALK TO AND LOADS OF KIDS FOR THE KIDS TO PLAY WITH.
quotes.author: Tom Hodgkinson

quotes.quote: FESTIVALS ARE HAPPY PLACES, AND YOU DON'T REALLY WANT TO ENJOY THEM ON YOUR OWN.
quotes.author: Christine and the Queens

quotes.quote: 7) FESTIVALS PROMOTE DIVERSITY, THEY BRING NEIGHBORS INTO DIALOGUE, THEY INCREASE CREATIVITY, THEY OFFER OPPORTUNITIES FOR CIVIC PRIDE, THEY IMPROVE OUR GENERAL PSYCHOLOGICAL WELL-BEING. IN SHORT, THEY MAKE CITIES BETTER PLACES TO LIVE.
quotes.author: David Binder

quotes.quote: Festivals become a family because you start seeing the same people.
quotes.author: Phillipp Wolter

quotes.quote: Life is a happy thing, a festival to be enjoyed rather than a drudgery to be endured.
quotes.author: Luci Swindoll

quotes.quote: Life should be a continual celebration, a festival of lights the whole year round. Only then can you grow up, can you blossom.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: You cannot celebrate the festival of light before combating the darkness within.
quotes.author: Kapil Raj

quotes.quote: Sabbath - a weekly festival having its origin in the fact that God made the world in six days and was arrested on the seventh.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Revolution is the festival of the oppressed.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: A national festival is an occasion to refine and rebuild the national character.
quotes.author: Narendra Modi

quotes.quote: A fiance is neither this nor that: he's left one shore, but not yet reached the other.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: You cannot tie your fiance to the railroad track of self-reflection and personal improvement.
quotes.author: Amy Dickinson

quotes.quote: It is tempting to think of your husband-to-be as just another bridal accessory. It may be easier for him to play along with this too. After all, you don't expect your shoes or your beaded bag to help you make decisions.
quotes.author: Mimi Pond

quotes.quote: We will have rings and things, and fine array; and kiss me, Kate, we will be married a' Sunday.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You will be surprised that he proposed seven times, once in a hackney-coach once in a boat once in a pew once on a donkey at Tunbridge Wells and the rest on his knees.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I have a theory that it is always the women who propose to us, and not we who propose to women.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Daisy, Daisy, Give me your answer, do! I'm half crazy, all for the love of you! It won't be a stylish marriage, I can't aford a carriage, but you'll look sweet on the seat of a bicycle built for two!
quotes.author: Harry Dacre

quotes.quote: Courtship to marriage is as a very witty prologue to a very dull play.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: To speak frankly, I am not in favour of long engagements. They give people the oppurtunity of finding out each other's character before marriage, which I think is never advisable.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I will bring you a whole person and you will bring me a whole person and we will have twice as much of love and everything.
quotes.author: Mari Evans

quotes.quote: My fiance and I are having a little disagreement. What I want is a big church wedding with bridesmaids and flowers and a no-expense-spared reception; what he wants is to break off our engagement.
quotes.author: Sally Poplin

quotes.quote: You are lonely; I love you; I want you to consent to be my wife; I will wait, but I want you to promise that you will marry me--no one else.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: And at home by the fire, whenever you look up, there I shall be--and whenever I look up, there will be you.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: I have nothing to offer you but my strength for your defence, my honesty for your surety, my ability and industry for your livelihood, and my authority and position for your dignity. That is all it becomes a man to offer a woman.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Like two swimmers who love the water, their souls knit together without being sewn, no seam.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: It was my duty to marry Bertie and I fell in love with him afterwards
quotes.author: The Queen Mum

quotes.quote: It's no wonder that truth is stranger than fiction. Fiction has to make sense.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The reason that fiction is more interesting than any other form of literature, to those who really like to study people, is that in fiction the author can really tell the truth without humiliating himself.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Literature is a luxury; fiction is a necessity.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Fiction is to the grown man what play is to the child; it is there that he changes the atmosphere and tenor of his life.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: One can be absolutely truthful and sincere even though admittedly the most outrageous liar. Fiction and invention are of the very fabric of life.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: Stories are consoling, fiction is one of the consolation prizes for having lived in the world.
quotes.author: Don DeLillo

quotes.quote: Fiction was invented the day Jonah arrived home and told his wife that he was three days late because he had been swallowed by a whale.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: The good ended happily, and the bad unhappily. That is what fiction means.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Fiction is based on reality unless you're a fairy-tale artist, you have to get your knowledge of life from somewhere. You have to know the material you're writing about before you alter it.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Fiction is such a world of freedom, it’s wonderful. If you want someone to fly, they can fly.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Fiction is burdened for me with a sense of duty.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Fiction is like a spider's web, attached ever so slightly perhaps, but still attached to life at all four corners. Often the attachment is scarcely perceptible.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Fiction gives us a second chance that life denies us.
quotes.author: Paul Theroux

quotes.quote: Fiction is too beautiful to be about just one thing. It should be about everything.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: Fiction's about what it is to be a human being.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: Fiction reveals truths that reality obscures.
quotes.author: Jessamyn West

quotes.quote: Kids, fiction is the truth inside the lie, and the truth of this fiction is simple enough: the magic exists.
quotes.author: Stephen King
