quotes.quote: That's what fiction is for. It's for getting at the truth when the truth isn't sufficient for the truth.
quotes.author: Tim O'Brien

quotes.quote: There is no doubt fiction makes a better job of the truth.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Fiction is not imagination. It is what anticipates imagination by giving it the form of reality. This is quite opposite to our own natural tendency which is to anticipate reality by imagining it, or to flee from it by idealizing it. That is why we shall never inhabit true fiction; we are condemned to the imaginary and nostalgia for the future.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Good fiction’s job is to comfort the disturbed and disturb the comfortable.
quotes.author: David Foster Wallace

quotes.quote: Good fiction creates its own reality.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: The fictional eye sees in, through, and around what is really there.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: Good fiction is made of that which is real, and reality is difficult to come by.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: Fiction is life with the dull bits left out.
quotes.author: Clive James

quotes.quote: Fiction is not a dream. Nor is it guesswork. It is imagining based on facts, and the facts must be accurate or the work of imagining will not stand up.
quotes.author: Margaret Culkin Banning

quotes.quote: For if the proper study of mankind is man, it is evidently more sensible to occupy yourself with the coherent, substantial and significant creatures of fiction than with the irrational and shadowy figures of real life.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Fiction is experimentation; when it ceases to be that, it ceases to be fiction.
quotes.author: John Cheever

quotes.quote: Fiction is harder for me than nonfiction - more gratifying, as a result, when it succeeds.
quotes.author: Rick Bass

quotes.quote: A mans face is his autobiography. A women's face is her work of fiction.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Do what you will, this world's a fiction and is made up of contradiction.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Let your fiction grow out of the land beneath your feet.
quotes.author: Willa Cather

quotes.quote: No more fiction, for now we calculate; but that we may calculate, we had to make fiction first.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Fiction must convince our bodies for it to have any chance of convincing our minds.
quotes.author: Bonnie Friedman

quotes.quote: Fiction wouldn't be much fun without its fair share of scoundrels, and they have to live somewhere.
quotes.author: Jasper Fforde

quotes.quote: I didn’t lie! I just created fiction with my mouth!
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: The truer the facts the better the fiction.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Fiction just makes it all more interesting. Truth is so boring.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: Fiction works when it makes a reader feel something strongly.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: If there were a better, clearer, shorter way of saying what the fiction says, then why not scrap the fiction?
quotes.author: J. M. Coetzee

quotes.quote: Nothing is more noble, nothing more venerable than fidelity.— Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Fidelity is the sister of justice.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: His words are bonds; his oaths are oracles; his heart is as far from fraud as heaven from earth.
quotes.author: Willliam Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Trust reposed in noble natures obliges them the more.
quotes.author: Dryden

quotes.quote: It goes far toward making a man faithful to let him understand that you think him so; and he that does but suspect I will deceive him, gives me a sort of right to do it.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: I am constant as the Northern star, of whose true-fixed and resting quality there is no fellow in the firmament.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Total loyalty is possible only when fidelity is emptied of all concrete content, from which changes of mind might naturally arise.
quotes.author: Hannah Arendt

quotes.quote: Fidelity to the subject's thought and to his characteristic way of expressing himself is the sine qua non of journalistic quotation.
quotes.author: Janet Malcolm

quotes.quote: Faithfulness and sincerity are the highest things.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Faithfulness and truth are the most sacred excellences and endowments of the human mind.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Faithfulness is to the emotional life what consistency is to the life of the intellect simply a confession of failures.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Fidelity to conscience is inconsistent with retiring modesty. If it be so, let the modesty succumb. It can be only a false modesty which can be thus endangered.
quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

quotes.quote: Constancy has nothing virtuous in itself, independently of the pleasure it confers, and partakes of the temporizing spirit of vice in proportion as it endures tamely moral defects of magnitude in the object of its indiscreet choice.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: Fidelity in love requires abstinence, but only through it one can know the hidden beauty of love.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: What the human eye observes causally and incuriously, the eye of the camera notes with relentless fidelity.
quotes.author: Berenice Abbott

quotes.quote: Fidelity is a virtue which should be frequently proved, but not always.
quotes.author: Omar Sharif

quotes.quote: Fidelity, enforced and unto death, is the price you pay for the kind of love you never want to give up, for someone you want to hold forever, tighter and tighter, whether he's close or far away, someone who becomes dearer to you the more you've sacrificed for his sake.
quotes.author: Marguerite Duras

quotes.quote: Fidelity is seven-tenths of business success.
quotes.author: James Parton

quotes.quote: Infidelity raises profound questions about intimacy.
quotes.author: Junot Diaz

quotes.quote: Realism is not a matter of any fidelity to an empirical reality,but of the discursive conventions by which and for which a sense of reality is constructed.
quotes.author: John Fiske

quotes.quote: Fidelity is seven-tenths of business success.
quotes.author: Parton

quotes.quote: Faithful found among the faithless, his loyalty he kept, his love, his zeal, nor number, nor example, nor example with him wrought to swerve from truth, or change his constant mind.
quotes.author: Milton

quotes.quote: O heaven! where man but constant, he were perfect; that one error fills him with faults.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To God, thy country, and thy friend be true, then thou'lt ne'er be false to any one.
quotes.author: Vaughan

quotes.quote: The temporal world rests on a very few simple ideas, notably on the idea of fidelity.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Fidelity. What it means to be a one-woman man.
quotes.author: Douglas Wilson

quotes.quote: It is however, only by fidelity in little things that a true and constant love of God can be distinguished from a passing fervor of spirit.
quotes.author: Francois de la Mothe Fenelon

quotes.quote: Loyalty is so fierce and contagious an energy that it is safe only when the object of it is something that we can love or worship when we are alone.
quotes.author: William L. Sullivan

quotes.quote: Many persons have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Helen Adams Keller

quotes.quote: True happiness... is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: Fidelity - a virtue peculiar to those who are about to be betrayed.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The moral code of Heaven for both men and women is complete chastity before marriage and full fidelity after marriage.
quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

quotes.quote: One of the things that makes me who I am is the loyalty I have to people I hold close to my heart.
quotes.author: Simon Elkeles

quotes.quote: Across the years I will walk with you - / in deep green forests; on shores of sand: / and when our time on earth is through, / in heaven, too, you will have my hand.
quotes.author: Robert Sexton

quotes.quote: And we shall walk through all our days with love remembered and love renewed.
quotes.author: Robert Sexton

quotes.quote: Thank God (my wife) and I were both born poor so the concept of fidelity was allowed to take root in us.
quotes.author: Allan Wolf

quotes.quote: Fidelity is the single most important element in solidly enduring marriages.
quotes.author: Frank Pittman

quotes.quote: Faithful women are all alike, they think only of their fidelity, never of their husbands.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Truth and fidelity are the pillars of the temple of the world; when these are broken, the fabric falls, and crushes all to pieces.
quotes.author: Owen Feltham

quotes.quote: O, where is loyalty? / If it be banished from the frosty head, / Where shall it find a harbor in the earth?
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The public is a ferocious beast; one must either chain it or flee from it.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: War is a brutal and fierce means of pacification; it means the suppression of resistance by the destruction or enslavement of the conquered.
quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quotes.quote: Be steady and well-ordered in your life so that you can be fierce and original in your work.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: You will make all kinds of mistakes; but as long as you are generous and true, and also fierce, you cannot hurt the world or even seriously distress her.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Wolves travel in packs, but the fiercest travel alone.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: If ever you feel like an animal among men, be a lion.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The thing women have yet to learn is nobody gives you power. You just take it.
quotes.author: Roseann Barr

quotes.quote: Pain dies quickly, and lets her weary prisoners go; the fiercest agonies have shortest reign.
quotes.author: William Cullen Bryant

quotes.quote: The mountains, the forest, and the sea, render men savage; they develop the fierce, but yet do not destroy the human.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: A fierce unrest seethes at the core, of all existing things:, it was the eager wish to soar, that gave the gods their wings.
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Fair peace becomes men ferocious anger belongs to beasts.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Feelings can be like wild animals-we underrate how fierce they are until we’ve opened their cage.
quotes.author: Richard Paul Evans

quotes.quote: Does our ferocity not derive from the fact that our instincts are all too interested in other people? If we attended more to ourselves and became the center, the object of our murderous inclinations, the sum of our intolerances would diminish.
quotes.author: E. M. Cioran

quotes.quote: It is certain, in any case, that ignorance, allied with power, is the most ferocious enemy justice can have.
quotes.author: James A. Baldwin

quotes.quote: I do not believe in using women in combat, because females are too fierce.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Fierce eagles breed not the tender dove.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Of all the tyrants the world affords, our own affections are the fiercest lords.
quotes.author: John Sterling

quotes.quote: Fierce language and pretentious advances are signs that the enemy is about to retreat.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: It is unfair to blame man too fiercely for being pugnacious; he learned the habit from nature.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: If the impulse to daring and bravery is too fierce and violent, stay it with guidance and instruction.
quotes.author: Xun Zi

quotes.quote: Young love is a flame; very pretty, often very hot and fierce, but still only light and flickering. The love of the older and disciplined heart is as coals, deep-burning, unquenchable.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: No beast so fierce but knows some touch of pity. But I know none, and therefore am no beast.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I like that there's no love as fierce as the love you feel for your family; that there's no one you feel more protective of than the very same people who can drive you crazy.
quotes.author: Kate Klise

quotes.quote: When the fierce, burning winds blow over our lives-and we cannot prevent them-let us, too, accept the inevitable. And then get busy and pick up the pieces.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: From hence, let fierce contending nations know, what dire effects from civil discord flow.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: I am the blood of the dragon. I must be strong. I must have fire in my eyes when I face them, not tears.
quotes.author: Jorah Mormont

quotes.quote: After all those years as a woman hearing ‘not thin enough, not pretty enough, not smart enough, not this enough, not that enough,’ almost overnight I woke up one morning and thought, ‘I’m enough.'
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: The lust of dominion burns with a flame so fierce as to overpower all other affections of the human breast.
quotes.author: Tacitus

quotes.quote: You need to claim the events in your life to make yourself yours. When you truly possess all you have been and done, which may take some time, you are fierce with reality.
quotes.author: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quotes.quote: The lion is not so fierce as they paint him.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: There's a moment in fighting when strength of muscle ain't everything because the enemy has already given you enough energy to gain the victory.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: A fight is not won by one punch or kick. Either learn to endure or hire a bodyguard.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: You must not fight too often with one enemy, or you will teach him all your art of war.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: To fight and conquer in all your battles is not supreme excellence; supreme excellence consists in breaking the enemy's resistance without fighting.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: If you know the enemy and know yourself you need not fear the results of a hundred battles.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: In a way fighting was just like using magic. You said the words, and they altered the universe. By merely speaking you could create damage and pain, cause tears to fall, drive people away, make yourself feel better, make your life worse.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Everyone has a plan until they've been hit.
quotes.author: Joe Lewis

quotes.quote: Fighting is like champagne. It goes to the heads of cowards as quickly as of heroes. Any fool can be brave on a battlefield when it's be brave or else be killed.
quotes.author: Margaret Mitchell

quotes.quote: The direct use of force is such a poor solution to any problem, it is generally employed only by small children and large nations.
quotes.author: David Friedman

quotes.quote: First they ignore you, then they ridicule you, then they fight you, and then you win.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Whenever we want to combat our enemies, first and foremost we must start by understanding them rather than exaggerating their motives.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Strategy without tactics is the slowest route to victory. Tactics without strategy is the noise before defeat.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig, you get dirty; and besides, the pig likes it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The full value of this life can only be got by fighting; the violent take it by storm. And if we have accepted everything we have missed something -- war. This life of ours is a very enjoyable fight, but a very miserable truce.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Never contend with a man who has nothing to lose.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracin Y Morales

quotes.quote: That is the whole secret of successful fighting. Get your enemy at a disadvantage; and never, on any account, fight him on equal terms.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: To do anything truly worth doing, I must not stand back shivering and thinking of the cold and danger, but jump in with gusto and scramble through as well as I can.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: Part of the happiness of life consists not in fighting battles, but in avoiding them. A masterly retreat is in itself a victory.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: For to win one hundred victories in one hundred battles is not the acme of skill. To subdue the enemy without fighting is the acme of skill.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Once we have a war there is only one thing to do. It must be won. For defeat brings worse things than any that can ever happen in war.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The foolish race of mankind are swarming below in the night; they shriek and rage and quarrel -- and all of them are right.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Where there is only a choice between cowardice and violence, I would advise violence.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Who overcomes by force, hath overcome but half his foe.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: Of old the expert in battle would first make himself invincible and then wait for his enemy to expose his vulnerability.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: The road to hell was paved with the bones of men who did not know when to quit fighting.
quotes.author: Paulette Jiles

quotes.quote: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: It's not the size of the dog in the fight, it's the size of the fight in the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: He who hesitates, meditates in a horizontal position.
quotes.author: Ed Parker

quotes.quote: A military man can scarcely pride himself on having smitten a sleeping enemy; it is more a matter of shame, simply, for the one smitten.
quotes.author: Isoroku Yamamoto

quotes.quote: We make war that we may live in peace.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Where there is no peril in the fight, there is no glory in the triumph.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

quotes.quote: He who fights with monsters might take care lest he thereby become a monster. And if you gaze for long into an abyss, the abyss gazes also into you.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There is such a thing as a man being too proud to fight.
quotes.author: Woodrow T. Wilson

quotes.quote: Violence is the last refuge of the incompetent.
quotes.author: Salvor Hardin

quotes.quote: Many a man will have the courage to die gallantly, but will not have the courage to say, or even to think, that the cause for which he is asked to die is an unworthy one.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Nobody can hurt me without my permission.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Blood is just red sweat.
quotes.author: Enson Inoue

quotes.quote: Let him that is without stone among you cast the first thing he can lay his hands on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: You cannot love a thing without wanting to fight for it.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Wise men do not quarrel with each other.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: People who fight fire with fire usually end up with ashes.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Quarrel? Nonsense; we have not quarreled. If one is not to get into a rage sometimes, what is the good of being friends?
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: The fight is never about grapes or lettuce. It is always about people.
quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

quotes.quote: Don't fight a battle if you don't gain anything by winning.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.quote: The race is not always to the swift, nor the battle to the strong--but that is the way to bet it.
quotes.author: Damon Runyon

quotes.quote: All my life I've been fighting and all my life I've got into trouble from it.
quotes.author: Paul Newman

quotes.quote: I'm fighting for this woman's life, not her temporal innocence.
quotes.author: Ann Bancroft

quotes.quote: A colonial war is a very dirty kind of war. You're not fighting armed forces. You're fighting mostly unarmed people.
quotes.author: Chomsky

quotes.quote: It is always easier to fight for one's principles than to live up to them.
quotes.author: Phyllis Bottome

quotes.quote: Satan is not fighting churches; he is joining them. He does more harm by sowing tares than by pulling up wheat. He accomplishes more by imitation than by outright opposition.
quotes.author: Vance Havner

quotes.quote: It's hard enough resisting the real enemy. That's a full-time job. If we start fighting other Christians, we're fighting two wars— and one of them is suicidal.
quotes.author: John Richard Wimber

quotes.quote: You are but a poor soldier of Christ if you think you can overcome without fighting, and suppose you can have the crown without the conflict.
quotes.author: St. John Chrysostom

quotes.quote: Fight the good fight with all thy might; / Christ is thy strength, and Christ thy right; / Lay hold on life, and it shall be / Thy joy and crown eternally.
quotes.author: John Samuel Bewley Monsell

quotes.quote: Beauty is mysterious as well as terrible. God and devil are fighting there, and the battlefield is the heart of man.
quotes.author: Fedor Dostoevsky

quotes.quote: The enemy we're fighting is a bit different than the one we war-gamed against.
quotes.author: William Wallace

quotes.quote: We shall fight in France, we shall fight on the seas and oceans, we shall fight with growing confidence and growing strength in the air. We shall fight on the beaches, we shall fight on the landing grounds, we shall fight in the fields, and in the streets, we shall fight in the hills. We shall never surrender.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I'm going to fight hard. I'm going to give them hell.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: From the moment a child is born, the death process, and the fight against it, begins.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Fighting comes in many forms. It involves struggle of some sort and a lot of emotion. It's not just a physical act— it can be verbal, too.
quotes.author: Elaine Slavens

quotes.quote: No matter who starts it, fighting is always the wrong way out of a bad situation.
quotes.author: Elaine Slavens

quotes.quote: Switzerland is a place where they don't like to fight, so they get people to do their fighting for them while they ski and eat chocolate.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: The world is a fine place and worth the fighting for and I hate very much to leave it.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Older men declare war. But it is youth that must fight and die.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: You will never be entirely comfortable. This is the truth behind the champion – he is always fighting something. To do otherwise is to settle.
quotes.author: Julien Smith

quotes.quote: Wisdom is merely the movement from fighting life to embracing it.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: The fight is won or lost far away from witnesses – behind the lines, in the gym, and out there on the road, long before I dance under those lights.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: I've been fighting to be who I am all my life. What’s the point of being who I am, if I can't have the person who was worth all the fighting for?
quotes.author: Stephanie Lennox

quotes.quote: If you hurt me, I wouldn't cry. I would hurt you back.
quotes.author: Holy Black

quotes.quote: Anything worth having is worth fighting for.
quotes.author: Susan Elizabeth Phillips

quotes.quote: I will not die without fighting for a life I am not yet done living.
quotes.author: Bethany Wiggins

quotes.quote: As we advance in life it becomes more and more difficult, but in fighting the difficulties the inmost strength of the heart is developed.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: You can be a victim of cancer, or a survivor of cancer. It's a mindset.
quotes.author: Dave Pelzer

quotes.quote: Cancer can take away all of my physical abilities. It cannot touch my mind, it cannot touch my heart, and it cannot touch my soul.
quotes.author: Jim Valvano

quotes.quote: Cancer is a word, not a sentence.
quotes.author: John Diamon

quotes.quote: We have two options, medically and emotionally: give up or fight like hell.
quotes.author: Lance Armstrong.

quotes.quote: Cancer may have started the fight, but I will finish it.
quotes.author: gotCancer.org.

quotes.quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is the only choice you have.
quotes.author: Cayla Mills

quotes.quote: The most important thing in illness is never to lose heart.
quotes.author: Nikolai Lenin

quotes.quote: Cancer is a journey, but you walk the road alone. There are many places to stop along the way and get nourishment you just have to be willing to take it.
quotes.author: Emily Hollenberg

quotes.quote: The human spirit is stronger than anything that can happen to it.
quotes.author: C.C. Scott

quotes.quote: The worst thing in your life may contain the seeds of the best
quotes.author: Joe Kogel

quotes.quote: The important thing is not that we can live on hope alone, but that life is not worth living without it.
quotes.author: Harvey Milk

quotes.quote: There is no medicine like hope, no incentive so great, and no tonic so powerful as expectation of something tomorrow.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Time is shortening. But every day that I challenge this cancer and survive is a victory for me.
quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

quotes.quote: Once you choose hope, anything's possible.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D.

quotes.quote: I will live a hope-filled life every day. I will handle my problems as opportunities in a different, more effective manner, based on the power of advanced mathematics; You + God = Enough
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
quotes.author: Friedrich Wilhelm Nietzsche

quotes.quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that a human being can alter his life by altering his attitude.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Be a tough-minded optimist
quotes.author: Frosty Westering

quotes.quote: If you do not hope, you will not find out what is beyond your hopes.
quotes.author: Clement of Alexandria

quotes.quote: Remember, that of all the elements that comprise a human being, the most important, the most essential, the one that will sustain, transcend, overcome and vanquish obstacles is Spirit!
quotes.author: Buddy Ebsen

quotes.quote: Cancer is not a death sentence, but rather it is a life sentence; it pushes one to live.
quotes.author: Marcia Smith

quotes.quote: Strength is born in the deep silence of long-suffering hearts; not amidst joy.
quotes.author: Felicia Hemans

quotes.quote: Oh, my friend, it's not what they take away from you that counts-it's what you do with what you have left.
quotes.author: Hubert Humphrey

quotes.quote: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Life is without meaning. You bring the meaning to it. The meaning of life is whatever you ascribe it to be. Being alive is the meaning.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Today we fight. Tomorrow we fight. The day after, we fight. And if this disease plans on whipping us, it better bring a lunch, 'cause it's gonna have a long day doing it.
quotes.author: Jim Beaver

quotes.quote: Cancer didn't bring me to my knees, it brought me to my feet.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: Scars are tattoos with better stories.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you stop struggling then you stop life.
quotes.author: Huey Newton

quotes.quote: The current strategy to fighting breast cancer, as well as most cancers, is simple:detect it early and remove the tumor before it spreads, and you have a good chance of surviving.
quotes.author: Sergery Kalintenko MD

quotes.quote: Did you know that having specific reasons to fight—the will to live— is one of the single most important things you can do to fight cancer?
quotes.author: Francisco Contreras

quotes.quote: Choose to be a victor rather than a victim—find meaning in the crisis. Define your reasons to survive and the purpose of your life.
quotes.author: Francisco Contreras

quotes.quote: Antioxidants are substances that scavenge free radicals. Remember free radicals can damage cells and the gene expression process. Therefore tomatoes are rich in the stuff that may prevent cancer from beginning.
quotes.author: Francisco Contreras

quotes.quote: All in all I found that the best way I could battle my cancer began with my own strength.
quotes.author: April Brewster Smythe

quotes.quote: I have found that those of us who battle lung cancer are not just battling a disease; we are also battling a larger societal attitude.
quotes.author: April Brewster Smythe

quotes.quote: No single game is a guaranteed victory, but if you keep putting yourself in position to win, you have the best chance of doing so, whatever your game including fighting cancer.
quotes.author: Dr. Martin L. Rossman

quotes.quote: Fighting cancer is most often a marathon rather than a sprint, because modern cancer treatment has changed many cancer journeys from short-term illnesses to illnesses that people live with over long periods of time.
quotes.author: Dr. Martin L. Rossman

quotes.quote: It's natural to feel depressed, angry, or hopeless after your diagnosis. But it's important to remember that as long as you're fighting there's hope.
quotes.author: Virginia B. Morris

quotes.quote: Some patients liken their fight against cancer to training for the Olympics. Like an athlete, you want to make sure that your body is in peak form for the challenges ahead.
quotes.author: Virginia B. Morris

quotes.quote: Fighting to live is not incompatible with preparing to die. Acceptance of the danger, even the inevitability, of dying is realistic, bt does not preclude fighting to prolong life and enjoying as much as possible of what remains.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.quote: Fighting cancer almost certainly includes some failures. We all fail as we go along through life, but most failures are not fatal just minor roadblocks.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.quote: Fitness may be the most important contribution you personally can make to the success of your fight against cancer.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.quote: The best way to fight death is to accept the reality of it and prepare yourself years in advance. Then you can more fearlessly conquer the illnesses that may precede it.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.quote: There were always lines in the sand, all around me. Fighting cancer was merely an extension of that attitude.
quotes.author: John Roberts

quotes.quote: We fight cancer with every weapon available through modern science as well as with age-old weapons of faith: prayer, worship, compassion, and encouragement.
quotes.author: Michael S. Barry

quotes.quote: In some instances, patients prefer to focus on developing relationships and support systems than on fighting cancer.
quotes.author: Michael S. Barry

quotes.quote: You beat cancer by how you live, why you live and in the manner in which you live.
quotes.author: Stuart Scott

quotes.quote: When you have exhausted all possibilities, remember this: You haven't.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: I'm going to beat this cancer or die trying.
quotes.author: Michael Landon

quotes.quote: I think cancer is a hard battle to fight alone or with another person at your side, but I will say having someone to pick you up when you fall, stand by your side through every appointment and delivery of bad news, is priceless.
quotes.author: Jenna Morasca

quotes.quote: I'm in good shape. My cancer means I have lost a lot of organs and I’m a lot lighter. I have devoted myself to yoga and I'm doing handstands.
quotes.author: Eve Ensler

quotes.quote: Working out is my way of saying to cancer, ‘You're trying to invade my body; you're trying to take me away from my daughters, but I'm stronger than you. And I'm going to hit harder than you.
quotes.author: Stuart Scott

quotes.quote: Beating cancer is personal battle. It was one of the toughest opponents I have faced so far, and I think I did reasonably well. Touch wood.
quotes.author: Yuvraj Singh

quotes.quote: You know, once you've stood up to cancer, everything else feels like a pretty easy fight.
quotes.author: David H. Koch

quotes.quote: Cancer is messy and scary. You throw everything at it, but don't forget to throw love at it. It turns out that might be the best weapon of all.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: I am not thankful for cancer but I am thankful for what cancer has taught me.
quotes.author: Brett Conley

quotes.quote: I'm battling cancer. It’s another battle I intend to win.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: I started to figure skate at the age of five, and the first thing my coach taught me was how to fall. I remember gazing up with a puzzled expression, thinking, Shouldn’t I be learning to skate? Looking back, I realize that my coach was very smart. She knew I was bound to fall many times throughout my career and that I needed to know how to handle it.
quotes.author: Michelle Kwan

quotes.quote: The hardest part of skating is the ice.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Male figure skating is different than female figure skating; we're not America's sweetheart.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: A figure skater is not just a figure skater who does great jumps. He is an artist on ice.
quotes.author: Alexei Yagudin

quotes.quote: Figure skating is theatrical. It's artistic. It's elegant. It's extremely athletic. And there's a very specific audience for that.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: Without strength and courage it's really hard to perform at the highest levels of international figure skating, because you're alone on the ice and you only have seven minutes over two nights to prove yourself.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: It's a strange world of language in which skating on thin ice can get you into hot water.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: In skating over thin ice our safety is in our speed.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Skating was the vessel into which I could pour my heart and soul.
quotes.author: Peggy Fleming

quotes.quote: There's always that first step in skating, from dry ground to slick ice, when it just seems impossible. Impossible that two thin blades of metal will support you, impossible that because its molecules have begun to dance a little slower water will hold you up.
quotes.author: Carol Goodman

quotes.quote: In this crazy, crazy world of figure skating, it is easy to focus on a name or a target. But when you are going after someone, it really only holds you back from what you are capable of yourself.
quotes.author: Ashley Wagner

quotes.quote: Figure skating is an unlikely Olympic event but its good television. It's sort of a combination of gymnastics and ballet. A little sexy too which doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: To me, figure skating is a diving sport. It's a sport made by the gods. It inspires people to cry, it inspires people to cheer, it pulls the emotions out of people.
quotes.author: Frank Carroll

quotes.quote: There's something about putting on a pair of skates, and getting out there and moving like nobody else can. Freedom is a word that comes to mind
quotes.author: Randy Gardner

quotes.quote: If you're walking on thin ice, you may as well dance.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.quote: If you don't know a lot about figure skating, it's easy to fall in love with ice dancing because it's so romantic and so theatrical.
quotes.author: Dorothy Hamill

quotes.quote: In skating there's always another jump or another spin variation or another thing to learn, and that's what I liked about it.
quotes.author: Gracie Gold

quotes.quote: Figure skating is a mixture of art and sport.
quotes.author: Katarina Witt

quotes.quote: Half of figure skating is opinion, convincing judges.
quotes.author: Scott Hamilton

quotes.quote: Ice skating is very difficult. It takes a lot of discipline and a lot of hard work. It's fun, but you are there on the ice every morning freezing and trying to do these moves and these tricks.
quotes.author: Michelle Trachtenberg

quotes.quote: High sticking, tripping, slashing, spearing, charging, hooking, fighting, unsportsmanlike conduct, interference, roughing.... everything else is just figure skating.
quotes.author: Scotty Bowman

quotes.quote: Ice dance should not be seen as a rigid conformist form of figure skating. There is a great deal of freedom and originality to be had.
quotes.author: Robin Cousins

quotes.quote: Figure skating is a bit dated - it's like that tweed jacket you pull out of the back of your closet from time to time, and I'm going to try to Chanel it up a little bit.
quotes.author: Johnny Weir

quotes.quote: Being a filmmaker is kind of like being a glorified spy.
quotes.author: Jehane Noujaim

quotes.quote: Filmmakers have to find the right materials to match their voice.
quotes.author: M. Night Shyamalan

quotes.quote: A filmmaker chooses an actress keeping the best interest of the film in mind. If he doesn't cast you, it doesn't mean there's a personal agenda. Change is constant, and if you have agreed to be part of this industry, you will have to go with the change. The films and filmmakers, even the audience has changed.
quotes.author: Rani Mukerj

quotes.quote: Filmmakers are going to make films, just like painters are going to paint.
quotes.author: Richard Linklater

quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, you aspire to want to make movies that can hopefully stand the test of time, but you never know when that will happen or if that will happen.
quotes.author: James Wan

quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, you have to stand in front of what you did and make choices that you could do with a clear conscience.
quotes.author: Taylor Sheridan

quotes.quote: Films are always pretentious. There's nothing more pretentious than a filmmaker.
quotes.author: John Milius

quotes.quote: Make films that purify the soul with the flow of rational, vigorous and compassionate thinking.
quotes.author: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.quote: As filmmakers, we can show where a person's mind goes, as opposed to theater, which is more to sit back and watch it.
quotes.author: Darren Aronofsky

quotes.quote: Film is an emotional medium; it's not a logical medium. It's not an intellectual medium, so every decision you make as a filmmaker and an actor has to be emotional in some way, even in the rejection of logic.
quotes.author: Paul Haggis

quotes.quote: Every filmmaker imbues a movie with their own point of view.
quotes.author: Ava Duvernay

quotes.quote: The filmmakers always have a great level of control.
quotes.author: John Milius

quotes.quote: When you start out as a filmmaker, you do parodies, because you can't really compete on a studio level.
quotes.author: Bill Paxton

quotes.quote: When you're a filmmaker you're part of a very expensive art form.
quotes.author: Kevin Smith

quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, you're looking to reveal something. When other people relate to it, it makes an otherwise lonely world a little less lonely.
quotes.author: Bennett Miller

quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, you're always supposed to be with your characters, in all movies, even if they're villains.
quotes.author: Robert Zemeckis

quotes.quote: The filmmaker's got to make it his story and the actors have got to make it their story.
quotes.author: Rachel Griffiths

quotes.quote: A filmmaker doesn't have to suffer to show suffering. You just have to understand it. You don't have to die to shoot a death scene.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: We don't make movies to make money, we make money to make more movies.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, you complete a film you have spent years obsessively making, and you know the release prints will never look quite the same; prints get scratched and dirty.
quotes.author: Asif Kapadia

quotes.quote: As a filmmaker, you take reality and you tell a story from it.
quotes.author: Hany Abu Assad

quotes.quote: Film making is an expensive, as well as a serious business. We should be able to entertain our audiences, who are fully aware of what they want. Every filmmaker has a different point of view and presents facets of society.
quotes.author: Rohit Shetty

quotes.quote: Film is that much powerful to show any negative fact through a very positive way what blows humans mind.
quotes.author: Maria Tusar

quotes.quote: A filmmaker has almost the same freedom as a novelist has when he buys himself some paper.
quotes.author: Stanley Kubrick

quotes.quote: Filmmaking can be a fine art.
quotes.author: Terri Windling

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a much more collaborative thing than literature, so you know you're going to be working with a group of people at the start. You know it's going to be a compromise.
quotes.author: Irvine Welsh

quotes.quote: Everything about filmmaking tries to distract you from that first fine rapturous vision you have of the film.
quotes.author: Ted Kotcheff

quotes.quote: The essence of documentary filmmaking is how you manipulate the material to create an emotional impact, as opposed to just delivering information.
quotes.author: Richard Ray Perez

quotes.quote: Any filmmaking, any film is a collaborative process. There's always a lot of people working on things together.
quotes.author: Olivia Thirlby

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is like any kind of art form. You have to try to figure it out, and you're going to do that by trying. It's like teaching a child to walk. It may start by walking, but eventually it will fall. And I have kids, but I know that that will enable them to stand up again and understand why they fell, and how they can avoid that. They will walk better and faster, and stronger. Filmmaking is the same.
quotes.author: Nicolas Winding Refn

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is incredible introspective. It forces you to sort of examine yourself in new ways.
quotes.author: Drew Goddard

quotes.quote: It's a cliche that filmmaking is a team sport. However, let me say just say it again: filmmaking is a team sport.
quotes.author: Ramona S. Diaz

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a very privileged art form. It costs a lot of money to make these things.
quotes.author: Barry Jenkins

quotes.quote: Filmmaking can give you everything, but at the same time, it can take everything from you.
quotes.author: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarri

quotes.quote: One of the nice things about the world of filmmaking is that you make friends in the business.
quotes.author: Tom Stoppard

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is finding a piece of granite and you start to chip away and then you have the shape of a head, the shape of the arm, you can see the shape of the face and the face starts to gather character. You have to find it.
quotes.author: Jason Reitman

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a business and at the bottom line people who don't make fiscally responsible decisions end up going into another line of work.
quotes.author: Gale Anne Hurd

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is exploring. Why would I want to make a film about something I already understand?
quotes.author: John Cassavetes

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is always about keeping the right distance, and it's always a struggle. You struggle for more access. It's a little bit of a seduction process, trying to get more access.
quotes.author: Frederic Tcheng

quotes.quote: Part of filmmaking is always a guessing game, and part of it is always a game of trust.
quotes.author: Greg Kinnear

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is such a collaborative medium.
quotes.author: Daryl Hannah

quotes.quote: Filmmaking for me is always aiming for the imaginary movie and never achieving it.
quotes.author: Peter Jackson

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a completely imperfect art form that takes years and, over those years, the movie tells you what it is. Mistakes happen, accidents happen and true great films are the results of those mistakes and the decisions that those directors make during those moments.
quotes.author: Jason Reitman

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a thousand choices a day, and it's important to just let those choices potentially be informed by something deeper.
quotes.author: Shane Carruth

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a chance to live many lifetimes.
quotes.author: Robert Altman

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a huge privilege; it's not brain surgery. It's art, and art is supposed to be an enjoyable process, and it is an enjoyable experience for me.
quotes.author: Lake Bell

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a miracle of collaboration.
quotes.author: James McAvoy

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a very complex form - ya know, acting, lighting, screenwriting, storytelling, music, editing - all these things have to come together.
quotes.author: Jay Duplass

quotes.quote: Filmmaking, like any other art, is a very profound means of human communication; beyond the professional pleasure of succeeding or the pain of failing, you do want your film to be seen, to communicate itself to other people.
quotes.author: Kenneth Lonergan

quotes.quote: Filmmaking, at the end of the day, is a business and a balance must be struck between that and emotional ties.
quotes.author: Arjun Kapoor

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is just a very luxurious and efficient way of expressing yourself.
quotes.author: Gaspar Noe

quotes.quote: Filmmaking has always involved pairs: a director coupled with a producer, a director alongside an editor. The notion of couples is not foreign to cinema.
quotes.author: Luc Dardenne

quotes.quote: Nobody will ever notice that. Filmmaking is not about the tiny details. It's about the big picture.
quotes.author: Ed Wood

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is always sort of building a mosaic of this arc of what the character is going through.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: I think of filmmaking as a form of communication. Maybe it's also an art, but that's for somebody else to decide.
quotes.author: Roger Deakins

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is about moments. In real life, things might take six months, a year, but [in filmmaking] you have to create the moment where it happened.
quotes.author: Morten Tyldum

quotes.quote: This is such a cliche, but I feel like filmmaking is a collaborative experience.
quotes.author: Steve Antin

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is not a balancing act, although some directors think it is. I don't believe in it. I like ups and downs. They're the best way to translate my feelings to the screen.
quotes.author: Takashi Miike

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is, a sort of uncontrolled process. I think it's very important to be open to the unexpected and at the same time, of course, maintain your vision, be open to the all the things you didn't think of yourself that can make the film better.
quotes.author: Dagur Kari

quotes.quote: Filmmaking is a creative process so there is a lot of collaboration that happens on set between an actor and director, but at the end of the day, we're there to actualize the director's vision and things happen organically.
quotes.author: Aamir Khan

quotes.quote: The point is that filmmaking is a collaborative effort; it isn't about imposing your vision on other people. It's about the talking, you know?
quotes.author: Luca Guadagnino

quotes.quote: Filmmaking in general is about feeling and not about theory. You need to know a lot of rules about filmmaking: character development, grammar, and all these thing, but then you use it instinctively. I ask myself this question all the time. I have no solid theory, I just do what I feel is right.
quotes.author: Hany Abu-Assad

quotes.quote: It's a common mistake to speak the same to everybody. We all have different filters.
quotes.author: Julian Treasure

quotes.quote: Without a filter, a man is just chaos walking.
quotes.author: Patrick Ness

quotes.quote: Stop filtering your nutrients through somebody else's body.
quotes.author: Gary Yourofsky

quotes.quote: Filter your pain through the brevity of this life and the unending beauty of the next.
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: When the filter is weakened by a powerful drug, what we see is not delusion but the truth.
quotes.author: William Peter Blatty

quotes.quote: In general, the final filter of Hollywood is for-profit. Nothing goes through unless it can make money.
quotes.author: Adam McKay

quotes.quote: You don't filter smokestacks or water. Instead, you put the filter in your head and design the problem out of existence.
quotes.author: William McDonough

quotes.quote: We have no filter for music, but we feel it when what's being spoken and sung is telling a story and evidencing a character.
quotes.author: Marc E. Platt

quotes.quote: It's like there's a filter set up in my brain, except instead of making things better, it twists everything around so what comes out of my mouth is totally wrong, totally different from what I was thinking.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Strain your brain more than your eye... You can copy a thing to a certain limit. Then you must use intellect.
quotes.author: Thomas Eakins

quotes.quote: You cannot sift out the poor from the community. The poor are indispensable to the rich.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: As you sift through this very solid-looking body, you have to go only so far before you end up with a handful of nothing.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Sift each of us through the great sieve of circumstance and you have a residue, great or small as the case may be, that is the man or the woman.
quotes.author: Marjorie Kinnan Rawlings

quotes.quote: Sifting daylight dissolves the memory, turns it into dust motes floating in light.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: Purify the mind through selfless service.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Purify your eyes, and see the pure world. Your life will fill with radiant forms.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Purify your life by keeping the commandments. This will help you qualify for the Spirit, who will assist you in your quest.
quotes.author: Ann M. Dibb

quotes.quote: Purify yourself from the attributes of self, so that you may see your own pure, untarnished essence.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: You can filter certain stuff - it depends what artist you are - but you're never going to be true to yourself if you're worried about what other people think.
quotes.author: Stefflon Don

quotes.quote: We are the strongest filter we can place before the lens. We point the lens both outward and inward.
quotes.author: John Paul Caponigro

quotes.quote: In the digital age, we filter forward instead of filtering out. As a result, all that material is still available to us and to others to filter in their own ways, and to bring forward in other contexts.
quotes.author: David Weinberger

quotes.quote: Quality without virtue is elevated filth.
quotes.author: François-Xavier-Joseph Droz

quotes.quote: Troubles come to us like mire and filth; but, when mingled with the soil, they change to flower and fruit.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Many things about our bodies would not seem to us so filthy and obscene if we did not have the idea of nobility in our heads.
quotes.author: Georg Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Filthy language is used by people who don't have the maturity or intelligence to express themselves with better words.
quotes.author: Nouman Ali Khan

quotes.quote: Don't call the world dirty because you forgot to clean your glasses.
quotes.author: Aaron Hill

quotes.quote: When the soul, through its own fault... becomes rooted in a pool of pitch-black, evil smelling water, it produces nothing but misery and filth.
quotes.author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who takes off his filthy garment, to put on a new clean robe.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: People make filthy things with the freedom they regained.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Lem

quotes.quote: The greatest sin of political imagination: Thinking there is no other way except the filthy rotten system we have today.
quotes.author: Shane Claiborne

quotes.quote: Life is the jailer of the soul in this filthy prison, and its only deliverer is death.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: The world is polluted with the filth of egotism, suffering in pain. This filth sticks to them because of their love of duality. This filth of egotism cannot be washed away, even by taking cleansing baths at hundreds of sacred shrines.
quotes.author: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.quote: To him who has nothing it is forbidden not to relish filth.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: We who burrow in filth every day may be forgiven perhaps the one sin that ends all sins.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Never use a big word when a little filthy one will do.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Leaders don't fall in gutters of fear; only negative ideas flow in that canal. There, you will see filthy things like doubts and disbelief.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Real filth is the one inside. The rest simply washes off. There is only one type of dirt that cannot be cleansed with pure waters, and that is the stain of hatred and bigotry contaminating the soul. You can purify your body through abstinence and fasting, but only love will purify your heart.
quotes.author: Elif Shafak

quotes.quote: All our righteousnesses are as filthy rags; and we all do fade as a leaf.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: How grimy did God get when He reached down to clean you up? How grimy are you willing to get in order to be an 'imitator of God'?
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: Filthy does not equal unhealthy, necessarily.
quotes.author: Katya Zamolodchikova

quotes.quote: Greed is a dog; falsehood is a filthy street-sweeper.
quotes.author: Sri Guru Granth Sahib

quotes.quote: I learned long ago, never to wrestle with a pig. You get dirty, and besides, the pig likes it.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: We get richer and richer in filthier and filthier communities until we reach a final state of affluent misery - crocus on a garbage heap.
quotes.author: John W. Gardner

quotes.quote: Often a noble face hides filthy ways.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Filthy water cannot be washed.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: We live in a world that is filled with filth and sleaze, a world that reeks of evil. You cannot afford that filthy poison to touch you. Stay away from it. Avoid it.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Show me a filthy public restroom and I'll show you a society where discipline and order have broken down.
quotes.author: Lourd Ernest H. de Veyra

quotes.quote: Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure nineteen six, result happiness. Annual income twenty pounds, annual expenditure twenty pound ought and six, result misery.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: I try not to borrow, first you borrow then you beg.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: You don't have to be like most people around you, because most people never become truly rich and wealthy.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they earned to buy things they don't want to impress people that they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Instead of filling a vacuum, it makes one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Our incomes are like our shoes; if too small, they gall and pinch us; but if too large, they cause us to stumble and to trip.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
quotes.author: Phillip Fisher

quotes.quote: Invest in yourself. Your career is the engine of your wealth.
quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.quote: An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There can be no rise in the value of labour without a fall of profits.
quotes.author: David Ricardo

quotes.quote: Your net worth to the world is usually determined by what remains after your bad habits are subtracted from your good ones.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: What we really want to do is what we are really meant to do. When we do what we are meant to do, money comes to us, doors open for us, we feel useful, and the work we do feels like play to us.
quotes.author: Julia Cameron

quotes.quote: It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
quotes.author: George Horace Lorimer

quotes.quote: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Empty pockets never held anyone back. Only empty heads and empty hearts can do that.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.quote: Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Try to save something while your salary is small; it's impossible to save after you begin to earn more.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: Never spend your money before you have it.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The individual investor should act consistently as an investor and not as a speculator.
quotes.author: Ben Graham

quotes.quote: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: All money is a matter of belief.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: I would not pre-pay. I would invest instead and let the investments cover it.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Money is a good servant but a bad master.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Every once in a while, the market does something so stupid it takes your breath away.
quotes.author: Jim Cramer

quotes.quote: Finance is critical. If sufficient investment is made in infrastructure and venture capital is made available, there will be a big improvement in the situation.
quotes.author: Sanjay Kumar

quotes.quote: The avoidance of taxes is the only intellectual pursuit that still carries any reward.
quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

quotes.quote: Many people take no care of their money till they come nearly to the end of it, and others do just the same with their time.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I made my money the old-fashioned way. I was very nice to a wealthy relative right before he died.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Personal finances are like people's personal health, crucial and tragic to the sufferer but tedious to the listener.
quotes.author: Thomas Keneally

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I will tell you how to become rich. Close the doors. Be fearful when others are greedy. Be greedy when others are fearful.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.quote: I finally know what distinguishes man from the other beasts: financial worries.
quotes.author: Jules Renard

quotes.quote: The first rule in making money is not to lose it.
quotes.author: Steven J. Lee

quotes.quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Wide diversification is only required when investors do not understand what they are doing.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Price ain't merely about numbers. It's a satisfying sacrifice.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: Thou shalt not forget that money is only money and not character or fame.
quotes.author: Steven J. Lee

quotes.quote: A budget tells us what we can't afford, but it doesn't keep us from buying it.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: In investing, what is comfortable is rarely profitable.
quotes.author: Robert Arnott

quotes.quote: Money often costs too much.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: There is more dementia about finance than there is about sex.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: By and large, I don't think too much of finance professors. It is a field with witchcraft.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: Where you have complexity, by nature you can have fraud and mistakes...This will always be true of financial companies, including ones that run by governments. If you want accurate numbers from financial companies, you're in the wrong world.
quotes.author: Charlie Munger

quotes.quote: There exists today an overwhelming consensus on the need to wrest from the grip of terrorists the funding they rely upon to finance their violence.
quotes.author: Paul Martin

quotes.quote: If merely looking up past financial data would tell you what the future holds, The Forbes 400 would consist of librarians.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: If you can actually count your money, then you are not really a rich man.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: It is wonderful to think how men of very large estates not only spend their yearly income but are often actually in want of money. It is clear, they have not valued for what they spend.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: When it comes to finances, remember that there are no withholding taxes on the wages of sin.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Money is a poor man's credit card.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Money-lust has always existed, but not in the history of the world was it ever a craze, a madness, until your time and mine.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A dollar picked up in the road is more satisfaction to you than the ninety-and-nine which you had to work for, and money won at faro or in stock snuggles into your heart in the same way.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A holding company is the people you give your money to while you are being searched.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Profit is part of the mechanism by which society decides what it wants to see produced.
quotes.author: Henry C. Wallich

quotes.quote: A bank is a financial institution from which you can borrow money as long as you can provide sufficient evidence to show you don't need it.
quotes.author: Sally Poplin

quotes.quote: If you owe the bank $100, that's your problem. If you owe the bank $100 million, that's the bank's problem.
quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

quotes.quote: Money frees you from doing things you dislike. Since I dislike doing nearly everything, money is handy.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Money is good for bribing yourself through the inconveniences of life.
quotes.author: Gottfried Reinhardt

quotes.quote: Without money, it is difficult to enjoy your wealth.
quotes.author: Remco Campert

quotes.quote: The way to become rich is to make money, not to save it.
quotes.author: Kate Chopin

quotes.quote: If you want to make money, go where the money is.
quotes.author: Joseph P. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The dollar will never fall as low as some people will do to get it.
quotes.author: Alfred E. Neuman

quotes.quote: The dollar will never fall as low as some people will do to get it.
quotes.author: Alfred E. Neuman

quotes.quote: Lack of money is no obstacle, lack of idea is an obstacle.
quotes.author: Ken Hakuta

quotes.quote: Rich or poor, it's good to have money.
quotes.author: Sid Lance

quotes.quote: Give a beggar a dime and he'll bless you. Give him a dollar and he'll curse you for withholding the rest of your fortune.
quotes.author: Anzia Yezierska

quotes.quote: Money will come to you when you are doing the right thing.
quotes.author: Michael Philips

quotes.quote: Politics don't control the world, money does.
quotes.author: Andrew Young

quotes.quote: While many believe that only the wealthy have economic power, all of us have the power to spend our money where we choose, whether we're making a million-dollar purchase or buying a box of detergent.
quotes.author: Camille Cosby

quotes.quote: If possible honestly, if not, somehow make money.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Always try and rub up against money long enough, some of it may rub off on you.
quotes.author: Damon Runyon

quotes.quote: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons.
quotes.author: Woody Alllen

quotes.quote: Every time you borrow money, you're robbing your future self.
quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.quote: I live, eat, spend, travel, support a family, entertain.....but I do not go to work. There is something wrong. My nest egg just keeps growing.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: Do not save what is left after spending, but spend what is left after saving.
quotes.author: Warren Buffet

quotes.quote: Financial peace isn't the acquisition of stuff. It's learning to live on less than you make, so you can give money back and have money to invest. You can't win until you do this.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Financial peace of mind is not determined by how much we make, but is dependent upon how much we spend!
quotes.author: Marvin J. Ashton

quotes.quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness.
quotes.author: Muhammed Yunus

quotes.quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Financial literacy is just as important in life as the other basics.
quotes.author: John W. Rogers

quotes.quote: The struggle for Financial Freedom is very unfair. Just look at the rewards.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: Beware of little expenses. A small leak will sink a great ship.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially.
quotes.author: Joel Osteen

quotes.quote: Financial freedom is freedom from fear.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free. If our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Financial Freedom is less about Financials and more about freedom.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: My definition of financial freedom is simple: it is the ability to live the lifestyle you desire without having to work or rely on anyone else for money.
quotes.author: T. Harv Eker

quotes.quote: To achieve what 1% of the worlds population has (Financial Freedom), you must be willing to do what only 1% dare to do..hard work and perseverance of highest order.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: The best thing money can buy is financial freedom
quotes.author: Rob Berger

quotes.quote: Every financial worry you want to banish and financial dream you want to achieve comes from taking tiny steps today that put you on a path toward your goals.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Financial freedom is a mental, emotional and educational process.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: When you understand that your self-worth is not determined by your net-worth, then you'll have financial freedom.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: It's not how much money you make, but how much money you keep, how hard it works for you, and how many generations you keep it for.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The first principle to financial freedom is to spend less than you earn, but never deprive yourself to have those good vehicles,make those lake trips provided you don't fall in debts.You don't need to be rich to be financially successful, provided you don't worry when paying the bills and you have enough left in the bank
quotes.author: Ekari Mtewa

quotes.quote: The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Pursuing your passion is fulfilling and leads to financial freedom.
quotes.author: Robert G. Allen

quotes.quote: So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Financial freedom is available to those who learn about it and work for it.
quotes.author: Robert T. Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep.
quotes.author: David Bailey

quotes.quote: Unless you have financial resources of your own, you can't be free.
quotes.author: Georgette Mosbacher

quotes.quote: Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Instead of filling a vacuum, it makes one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: We tend to focus on assets and forget about debts. Financial security requires facing up to the big picture: assets minus debts.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: A budget isn't about restricting what you can spend. It gives you permission to spend without guilt or regret.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: The real key to making money in stocks is not to get scared out of them.
quotes.author: Peter Lynch

quotes.quote: Money is like a river. It flows where the conditions are conducive to its flow.
quotes.author: Jacinta Mpalyenkana

quotes.quote: You must gain control over your money or the lack of it will forever control you.
quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

quotes.quote: Financial independence is about having more choices.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: The speed of your success is limited only by your dedication and what you're willing to sacrifice.
quotes.author: Nathan W. Morris

quotes.quote: Wealth is like sea-water; the more we drink, the thirstier we become; and the same is true of fame.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Money is a terrible master but an excellent servant.
quotes.author: P.T. Barnum

quotes.quote: Working because you want to, not because you have to is financial freedom.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Money won't create success, freedom to make it will.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It's good to have money and the things that money can buy, but it's good, too, to check up once in a while and make sure that you haven't lost the things that money can't buy.
quotes.author: George Lorimer

quotes.quote: More important than the how we achieve financial freedom, is the why. Find your reasons why you want to be free and wealthy.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: You must tell your money how you want to live your life, and not the other way round.
quotes.author: Manoj Arora

quotes.quote: To obtain financial freedom, one must be either a business owner, an investor, or both, generating passive income, particularly on a monthly basis.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Financial dependence on the state is the foundation of modern serfdom.
quotes.author: G. Edward Griffin

quotes.quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Men can starve from a lack of self-realization as much as they can from a lack of bread.
quotes.author: Richard Wright

quotes.quote: People often say that this or that person has not yet found himself. But the self is not something one finds, it is something one creates.
quotes.author: Thomas Szasz

quotes.quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Know yourself. Don't accept your dog's admiration as conclusive evidence that you are wonderful.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Know thyself? If I knew myself, I'd run away.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The only journey is the journey within.
quotes.author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quotes.quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: One must know oneself. If this does not serve to discover truth, it at least serves as a rule of life, and there is nothing better.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: I think that somehow, we learn who we really are and then live with that decision.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Should we say the self, once perceived, becomes the soul?
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: Resolve to be thyself: and know, that he who finds himself, loses his misery.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: To find yourself, think for yourself.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: If a man happens to find himself, he has a mansion which he can inhabit with dignity all the days of his life.
quotes.author: James A. Michener

quotes.quote: In the end you don't so much find yourself as you find someone who knows who you are.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Don't spend all of your time trying to FIND yourself. Spend your time CREATING yourself into a person that you'll be proud of.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: Mohandas Karamchand Gandhi

quotes.quote: Know, first, who you are, and then adorn yourself accordingly.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Don't worry about finding your soul mate. Find yourself.
quotes.author: Jason Evert

quotes.quote: Whatever it takes to find the real you, don't be daunted if the rest of the world looks on in shock.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: When you fight yourself to discover the real you, there is only one winner.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Someday, somewhere – anywhere, unfailingly, you'll find yourself, and that, and only that, can be the happiest or bitterest hour of your life.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Each man's life represents a road toward himself.
quotes.author: Herman Hesse

quotes.quote: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom. Mastering others is strength; mastering yourself is true power.
quotes.author: Lao-Tzu

quotes.quote: First find the man in yourself if you will inspire manliness in others.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Lose yourself wholly; and the more you lose, the more you will find.
quotes.author: Catherine Of Siena

quotes.quote: You've got to know yourself so you can at last be yourself.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Be who you are, and find yourself so you can be your own person and enjoy life with no regret.
quotes.author: Bonnie Zackson Koury

quotes.quote: Your real self may be hiding somewhere, look for it within, when you find yourself, you can freely be what you want to be.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: Find yourself first-like yourself first-love yourself FIRST & friendship & love will naturally find YOU.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Finding oneself and one's path is like waking up on a foggy day. Be patient, and presently the fog will clear and that which has always been there can be seen. The path is already there to follow.
quotes.author: Rasheed Ogunlaru

quotes.quote: Find the love you seek, by first finding the love within yourself. Learn to rest in that place within you that is your true home.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: You can always find the sun within yourself if you will only search.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: If you're being ignored, that's a good time to concentrate on finding yourself and creating your own mystery.
quotes.author: Lykke Li

quotes.quote: It's a life's journey of finding ourselves,finding our power, and living for yourself,not for everyone else.
quotes.author: Mariska Hargitay

quotes.quote: You really have to look inside yourself and find your own inner strength, and say, 'I'm proud of what I am and who I am, and I'm just going to be myself.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: You've got to find yourself first. Everything else'll follow.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: You never find yourself until you face the truth.
quotes.author: Pearl Bailey

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you lose your way, you find YOURSELF.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: The only way to find yourself is when you start being true to everyone around you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We lose ourselves in things we love. We find ourselves there, too.
quotes.author: Kristin Martz

quotes.quote: All the wonders you seek are within yourself.
quotes.author: Thomas Browne

quotes.quote: Sometimes we must lose ourselves to find ourselves.
quotes.author: Sonny Long
