quotes.quote: Know thyself means this, that you get acquainted with what you know, and what you can do.
quotes.author: Menander

quotes.quote: It's not about finding a home so much as finding yourself.
quotes.author: Jason Behr

quotes.quote: Go find yourself firstSo you can also find me.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Find out who you are and do it on purpose.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Committing yourself is a way of finding out who you are. A man finds his identity by identifying.
quotes.author: Robert Terwilliger

quotes.quote: One does not 'find oneself' by pursuing one's self, but on the contrary by pursuing something else and learning through discipline or routine... who one is and wants to be.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Your imagination is your preview of life’s coming attractions.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Somehow, we'll find it. The balance between whom we wish to be and whom we need to be. But for now, we simply have to be satisfied with who we are.
quotes.author: Brandon Sanderson

quotes.quote: I think you travel to search and you come back home to find yourself there.
quotes.author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie

quotes.quote: Don’t ask yourself what the world needs. Ask yourself what makes you come alive and then go do that. Because what the world needs is people who have come alive.
quotes.author: Dr. Howard Thurman

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Our greatest fear in life shouldn’t be of failure, but of succeeding at things that don’t really matter.
quotes.author: Francis Chan

quotes.quote: You learn to speak by speaking, to study by studying, to run by running, to work by working; and just so you learn to love… by loving.
quotes.author: St. Francis de Sales

quotes.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to kind of die inside in order to rise from your own ashes and believe in yourself and love yourself to become a new person.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: Without leaps of imagination or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Never look back unless you are planning to go that way.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t… You’re right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: One’s destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things.
quotes.author: Henry Miller

quotes.quote: When we find a purpose that is bigger than ourselves, we become more powerful in our ability to create.
quotes.author: Jack Delosa

quotes.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you design for the present.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If you don’t design your own life plan, chances are you’ll fall into someone else’s plan. And guess what they have planned for you? Not much.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: Learn how to separate the majors and the minors. A lot of people don’t do well simply because they major in minor things.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: I can’t change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
quotes.author: Jimmy Dean

quotes.quote: Knowledge comes by taking things apart: analysis. But wisdom comes by putting things together.
quotes.author: John A. Morrison

quotes.quote: When I was 5 years old, my mother always told me that happiness was the key to life. When I went to school, they asked me what I wanted to be when I grew up. I wrote down ‘happy’. They told me I didn’t understand the assignment and I told them they didn’t understand life.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Follow your bliss and don’t be afraid, and doors will open where you didn’t know they were going to be.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: We must be willing to get rid of the life we've planned so as to have the life that is waiting for us.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: A year from now you will wish you had started today.
quotes.author: Karen Lamb

quotes.quote: When you’re committed to something you accept no excuses only results!
quotes.author: Kenneth H. Blanchard

quotes.quote: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Life is not about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
quotes.author: Lolly Daskal

quotes.quote: Not all dreamers are winners, but all winners are dreamers. Your dream is the key to your future.
quotes.author: Mark Gorman

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Don’t count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The man who has no imagination has no wings.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: I learned that courage was not the absence of fear, but the triumph over it… The brave man is not he who does not feel afraid, but he who conquers that fear.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: What seems to us as bitter trials are often blessings in disguise.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Only put off until tomorrow what you are willing to die having left undone.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: When I discover who I am, I’ll be free.
quotes.author: Ralph Ellison

quotes.quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Don’t let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Don't watch the clock. Do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: The very nature of creativity is coming up with things that have never been tried before.
quotes.author: Shelly Lazarus

quotes.quote: You combine hard work, creativity, and self-determination things start to happen.
quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

quotes.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Live out of your imagination, not your history.
quotes.author: Stephen R. Covey

quotes.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Remember to muster up your courage and silence your fear.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Doubt kills more Dreams than failure ever will.
quotes.author: Suzy Kassem

quotes.quote: I have not failed. I’ve just found 10,000 ways that won’t work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: The pessimists are usually right, but it’s the optimists that change the world.
quotes.author: Thomas Friedman

quotes.quote: I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If you don’t build your dream, someone else will hire you to build theirs.
quotes.author: Tony Gaskins

quotes.quote: The one who says it’s not possible should move out of the way of those doing it.
quotes.author: Tricia Cunningham

quotes.quote: No masterpiece was ever created by a lazy artist.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing in the world is more common than unsuccessful people with talent.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: I will tell you the secret of getting rich on Wall Street. You try to be greedy when others are fearful and you try to be very fearful when others are greedy.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn’t last. Well, neither does bathing–that’s why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Fine art is the only teacher except torture.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Fine art is the discipline of breaking rules.
quotes.author: M.B. Dallocchio

quotes.quote: Fine art is in the last consequence, philosophy expressed visually.
quotes.author: Max Bill

quotes.quote: Poetry is an art, and chief of the fine art; the easiest to dabble in, the hardest in which to reach true excellence.
quotes.author: Edmund Clarence Stedman

quotes.quote: My goal is to make fine art, and fine art comes from the soul. If you have virtuosity and facility, you can take and create something of significance.
quotes.author: Richard MacDonald

quotes.quote: Fine art is the subtlest, the most seductive, the most effective instrument of moral propaganda in the world, excepting only the example of personal conduct; and I waive even this exception in favor of the art of the stage, because it works by exhibiting examples of personal conduct made intelligible and moving to crowds of unobservant unreflecting people to whom real life means nothing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Fine art is knowledge made visible.
quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

quotes.quote: If you're looking for something to be brave about, consider fine arts.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Fine art is that in which the hand, the head, and the heart of man go together.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Fine art is something wonderful that’s left long into the future … eternal beauty.
quotes.author: Masashi Kishimoto

quotes.quote: The fine arts once divorcing themselves from truth are quite certain to fall mad, if they do not die.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: The greatest fine art of the future will be the making of a comfortable living from a small piece of land.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Cartooning at its best is a fine art. I'm a cartoonist who works in the medium of animation, which also allows me to paint my cartoons.
quotes.author: Ralph Bakshi

quotes.quote: In our fine arts, not imitation, but creation is the aim… The details, the prose of nature, he should omit, and give us only the spirit and splendour.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The problem with fine art is that in most cases people have to make a special excursion to go and look at it: they can't afford to own it. So it isn't really part of their life in the way that music can be.
quotes.author: Brian Eno

quotes.quote: The fine arts, both in those who cultivate and those only who admire them, open and expand the mind to great ideas. They inspire liberal feelings, create a harmony of temper, favorable to a sense of justice and a habit of moderation in our social intercourse.
quotes.author: Joel Barlow

quotes.quote: Painting is a fine art: not merely because it gives us trees and faces and lovely things to see, but because paint is a finely tuned antenna, reacting to very unnoticed movement of the painter's hand, fixing the faintest shadow of a thought in color and texture.
quotes.author: James Elkins

quotes.quote: The fine art of preparing sushi is something that you watch and learn.
quotes.author: Nobu Matsuhisa

quotes.quote: In the fine arts, as in many other things, we know well only what we have not learned.
quotes.author: Nicolas Chamfort

quotes.quote: Originality is the fine art of remembering what you hear but forgetting where you heard it.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: There is a fine art to making enemies and it requires diligent cultivation. It's not as easy as it looks.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: The fine arts are five in number, namely: painting, sculpture, poetry, music, and architecture, the principal branch of the latter being pastry.
quotes.author: Marie-Antoine Careme

quotes.quote: There is always, in the fine arts, a physical interface between the artist's esthetic vision and the material result he seeks. The interface may be the application of brush to canvas, chisel to marble, bow to string... It may be the control of voice in song or the control of body in dance. It is the mastery of the interface that comprises the artistry; it is what constitutes the 'art' in fine art.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: A man can make do with seven fingers. Seven is a sacred number.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: You can count friends on fingers, but you count love in hearts.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: There is only a finger's difference between a wise man and a fool.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: Fate gives you the finger and you accept.
quotes.author: William Shatner

quotes.quote: There is no surprise more magical than the surprise of being loved: It is God's finger on man's shoulder.
quotes.author: Charles Morgan

quotes.quote: Fate, or some mysterious force, can put the finger on you or me, for no good reason at all.
quotes.author: Martin Goldsmith

quotes.quote: When a man points a finger at someone else, he should remember that four of his fingers are pointing at himself.
quotes.author: Louis Nizer

quotes.quote: Experience is in the fingers and head. The heart is inexperienced.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The fingers must be educated, the thumb is born knowing.
quotes.author: Marc Chagall

quotes.quote: Every man's life is a fairy tale written by God's fingers.
quotes.author: Hans Christian Andersen

quotes.quote: The moving finger writes; and having writ, moves on.
quotes.author: Omar Khayyam

quotes.quote: The fingers of your thoughts are molding your face ceaselessly.
quotes.author: Charles Reznikoff

quotes.quote: Everybody wants to take responsibility when you win, but when you fail, all these fingers are pointing.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Before you point fingers at someone, clean them well. You better remove that log on your lens before you can see the speck on someone's own afar!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: Run your purpose on the toes of your feet before people can type your success stories with the fingers of their hands.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: If you are a finger, your honesty is the hand to make your existence worth living.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: Sometimes we can’t quite put our finger on something important because we’ve got our fingers wrapped around so many other things that are not important.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Failures are finger posts on the road to achievement.
quotes.author: C.S Lewis

quotes.quote: To aim and hit, you need one eye only, and one good finger.
quotes.author: Moshe Dayan

quotes.quote: Learn to listen with your fingers.
quotes.author: Helen B. Taussig

quotes.quote: But the law of God came from heaven indeed. God wrote it with his finger, it is the fountain of all wisdom, and therefore shall it continue forever, and never have an end.
quotes.author: John Jewel

quotes.quote: The world belongs to those who think and act with it, who keep a finger on its pulse.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Your heart just breaks, that's all. But you can't judge or point fingers. You just have to be lucky enough to find someone who appreciates you.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: The point is to solve problems, not point fingers.
quotes.author: Jane Harman

quotes.quote: That difficult place to put your finger on about the world - it needs to be illustrated.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Rohm

quotes.quote: A goal is a dream with a finish line.
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: When you cross the finish line, it will change your life forever.
quotes.author: Dick Beardsley

quotes.quote: There is no finish line. When you reach one goal, find a new one.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes on the finish line and not on the turmoil around you.
quotes.author: Rihanna

quotes.quote: In choosing joy, the finish line dissolves into a different matter altogether.
quotes.author: Mary Anne Radmacher

quotes.quote: During a race where everyone holds their own truth, the finish line is a surprise.
quotes.author: Akiane Kramarik

quotes.quote: Sometimes we become so focused on the finish line, that we fail to find joy in the journey.
quotes.author: Dieter F. Uchtdorf

quotes.quote: Maybe the start line was supposed to be your finish line. Don't be afraid to walk backwards.
quotes.author: Tablo

quotes.quote: Suffering produces the very endurance that will enable you to reach the finish line of the race set before you.
quotes.author: Catherine Martin

quotes.quote: Keep moving in the direction of your dreams. No matter how slows it may seems, stay focus, you will get to the finish line.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Winning does not always mean coming in first...real victory is in arriving at the finish line with no regrets because you know you've gone all out.
quotes.author: Apolo Ohno

quotes.quote: Being the first to cross the finish line makes you a winner in only one phase of life. It's what you do after you cross the line that really counts.
quotes.author: Ralph Boston

quotes.quote: No one has a problem with the first mile of a journey. Even an infant could do fine for a while. But it isn't the start that matters. It's the finish line.
quotes.author: Julien Smith

quotes.quote: Why is it that the finish line always tends to appear just after the point at which we most want to give up? is it the universe's way of reserving the best for those who can give the most? What I do know, from nature, is that the dawn only appears after the darkest hour.
quotes.author: Bear Grylls

quotes.quote: Leaders need to remember that the point of leading is not to cross the finish line first. It's to take people across the finish line with you. For that reason, leaders must deliberately slow their pace, stay connected to their people, enlist others to help fulfill the vision, and keep people going. You can't do that if you're running too far ahead of your people.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: Life is the only race you'll run where you don't know where the finish line is.
quotes.author: Steve Farrar

quotes.quote: To get to the finish line, you'll have to try lots of different paths.
quotes.author: Amby Burfoot

quotes.quote: It is not how you start the race or where you are during the race-it is how you cross the finish line that will matter.
quotes.author: Robert D. Hales

quotes.quote: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.quote: You can't always expect a certain result, but you can expect to do your best.
quotes.author: Anita Hill

quotes.quote: It is not enough to do your best; you must know what to do, and THEN do your best.
quotes.author: W. Edwards Deming

quotes.quote: Under any circumstance, simply do your best, and you will avoid self-judgment, self-abuse and regret.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: You have nothing to lose by giving your best.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To be nobody but yourself in a world that's doing its best to make you somebody else, is to fight the hardest battle you are ever going to fight. Never stop fighting.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: Do more than is required. What is the distance between someone who achieves their goals consistently and those who spend their lives and careers merely following? The extra mile.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Doing the best at this moment puts you in the best place for the next moment.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: I do the very best I know how, the very best I can, and I mean to keep on doing so until the end.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Almost everything you do will seem insignificant, but it is important that you do it
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: When we do the best that we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Do not look for approval except for the consciousness of doing your best.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: If you're doing your best, you won't have any time to worry about failure.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Don't waste your time striving for perfection, instead, strive for excellence - doing your best.
quotes.author: Laurence Olivier

quotes.quote: If you believe in what you are doing, then let nothing hold you up in your work. Much of the best work of the world has been done against seeming impossibilities. The thing is to get the work done.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: It's human nature to gripe, but I'm going ahead and doing the best I can.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Let us begin by doing our best to do our best, every single time, no matter what, forever.
quotes.author: Edward Albert

quotes.quote: Doing your best means never stop trying.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Just go out there and do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: You have to accept whatever comes and the only important thing is that you meet it with the best you have to give.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do all the good you can, in all the ways you can, to all the souls you can, in every place you can, at all the times you can, with all the zeal you can, as long as ever you can.
quotes.author: John Wesley

quotes.quote: It's simply a matter of doing what you do best and not worrying about what the other fellow is going to do.
quotes.author: John R. Amos

quotes.quote: Whenever you have taken up work in hand, you must see it to the finish. That is the ultimate secret of success. Never, never, never give up!
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.quote: I ran and ran and ran every day, and I acquired this sense of determination, this sense of spirit that I would never, never give up, no matter what else happened.
quotes.author: Wilma Rudolph

quotes.quote: I know from experience that you should never give up on yourself or others, no matter what.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Don't give up at half time. Concentrate on winning the second half.
quotes.author: Paul Bryant

quotes.quote: Never give up. You only get one life. Go for it!
quotes.author: Richard E. Grant

quotes.quote: Never give up. Keep your thoughts and your mind always on the goal.
quotes.author: Tom Bradley

quotes.quote: When you get in a tight place and everything goes against you, until it seems as if you could not hold on a minute longer, never give up then, for that is just the place and time when the tide will turn.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go so long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: No matter how hard the battle gets or no matter how many people DON'T believe in your dream,Never give up!
quotes.author: Eric Thomas

quotes.quote: Be true to the best you know. This is your high ideal. If you do your best, you cannot do more.
quotes.author: H. W. Dresses

quotes.quote: Keep on going, and the chances are that you will stumble on something, perhaps when you are least expecting it. I never heard of anyone ever stumbling on something sitting down.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: You must accept that you might fail; then, if you do your best and still don't win, at least you can be satisfied that you've tried. If you don't accept failure as a possibility, you don't set high goals, you don't branch out, you don't try - you don't take the risk.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: Make the choice to be your highest and best self, regardless of the circumstances.
quotes.author: Rosalene Glickman, Ph.D.

quotes.quote: Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Don't settle for average. Bring your best to the moment. Then, whether it fails or succeeds, at least you know you gave all you had. We need to live the best that's in us.
quotes.author: Angela Bassett

quotes.quote: Give the world the best you have and you may get hurt. Give the world your best anyway.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: When you have choices, choose the best. When you have no choice, do your best.
quotes.author: Rosalene Glickman, Ph.D.

quotes.quote: To give your best is to receive the best.
quotes.author: Raymond Holliwell

quotes.quote: The ultimate victory in competition is derived from the inner satisfaction of knowing that you have done your best and that you have gotten the most out of what you had to give.
quotes.author: Howard Cosell

quotes.quote: That's what I try to do each and every week is give my best effort and not give up, no matter what comes at us.
quotes.author: Kurt Busch

quotes.quote: On the other hand, always aim to be the best in what you do and give 100%.
quotes.author: Benjamin Cohen

quotes.quote: I usually say I did the best I could with what I had. I have no major regrets.
quotes.author: Stokely Carmichael

quotes.quote: When you know you are doing your very best within the circumstances of your existence, applaud yourself!
quotes.author: Rusty Berkus

quotes.quote: Doing your best is more important than being the best.
quotes.author: Shannon Miller

quotes.quote: Never stop doing your best just because someone doesn't give you credit.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I've always tried to do my best on the ball field. I can't do any more than that. I always try to give one hundred percent; and if my team loses, I come back and give one hundred percent the next day.
quotes.author: Jesse Barfield

quotes.quote: When you combine finish with strong, you create a powerful platform for action.
quotes.author: Dan Green

quotes.quote: Believe and acts as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Charles F. Kettering

quotes.quote: Strong foundations are built on strong fundamentals; there is no shortcut to mastery.
quotes.author: Gary Ryan Blair

quotes.quote: Regardless of what came before or of what is yet to come, what matters most right now is how I choose to respond to the challenge before me. Will I lie down or will I fight? The choice is mine, and I choose to finish strong.
quotes.author: Dan Green

quotes.quote: I have tried my best to show what it is to preserve and what it means to be strong.
quotes.author: Miles Levin

quotes.quote: Never give up! Do not settle for remaining in your comfort zone. Remaining complacent is a good way to get nowhere.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Be passionate! If you love what you're doing, it will never seem like work.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Be focused! Ask yourself: What should I be thinking about right now?
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Keep momentum! Listen, apply and move forward. Do not procrastinate.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: See yourself as victorious! That will focus you in the right direction.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Be lucky! The old saying, "The harder I work, the luckier I get" is absolutely right on.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Believe in yourself! If you don't, no one else will either. Think of yourself as a one-man army.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Ask yourself: What am I pretending not to see? There may be some great opportunities right around you, even if things aren't looking so great. Great adversity can turn into great victory.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Look at the solution, not the problem. And never give up! Never never never give up. This thought deserves to be said (and remembered and applied) many times.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Strong people have a strong sense of self-worth and self-awareness; they don’t need the approval of others.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: The strongest people find the courage and caring to help others, even if they are going through their own storm.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: If you feel lost, disappointed, hesitant, or weak, return to yourself, to who you are, here and now and when you get there, you will discover yourself, like a lotus flower in full bloom, even in a muddy pond, beautiful and strong.
quotes.author: Masaru Emoto

quotes.quote: The one who falls and gets up is stronger than the one who never tried. Do not fear failure but rather fear not trying.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: I will prove myself strong when they think I am sick. I will prove myself brave when they think I am weak.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: Stay strong, stay positive, and never give up.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Every challenge you face today makes you stronger tomorrow. The challenge of life is intended to make you better, not bitter.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: That is the rule of the Wilds: You must be bigger and stronger and tougher. You must hurt or be hurt.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: You must be strong enough to strike and strike and strike again without tiring. The first lesson is to make yourself that strong.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: The weak fall, but the strong will remain and never go under!
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of the world but those who fight and win battles that others do not know anything about.
quotes.author: Jonathan Harnisch

quotes.quote: It is not in victory that you learn how strong you truly are.
quotes.author: Kate Elliott

quotes.quote: Fire that's closest kept burns most of all.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fire is the most tolerable third party.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Fire and gunpowder do not sleep together.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: The fire you kindle for your enemy often burns yourself more than them.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Playing with fire is bad for those who burn themselves. For the rest of us, it is a very great pleasure.
quotes.author: Jerry Smith

quotes.quote: Fire in the heart sends smoke into the head.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: One can enjoy a wood fire worthily only when he warms his thoughts by it as well as his hands and feet.
quotes.author: Odell Shepherd

quotes.quote: What matters most is how well you walk through the fire.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: He who sits by the fire, thankless for the fire, is just as if he had no fire. Nothing is possessed save in appreciation, of which thankfulness is the indispensable ingredient.
quotes.author: W.J. Cameron

quotes.quote: Fire, water, and government know nothing of mercy.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: The most tangible of all visible mysteries - fire.
quotes.author: Leigh Hunt

quotes.quote: Among the notable things about fire is that it also requires oxygen to burn - exactly like its enemy, life. Thereby are life and flames so often compared.
quotes.author: Otto Weininger

quotes.quote: The United States is like giant boiler. Once the fire is lighted under it, there is no limit to the power it can generate.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life is a flame that is always burning itself out, but it catches fire again every time a child is born.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: A man can be short and dumpy and getting bald but if he has fire, women will like him.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Words are only painted fire; a look is the fire itself.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Big fires flare up in a wind, but little ones are blown out unless they are carried in under cover.
quotes.author: St Frances De Sales

quotes.quote: If you ever catch on fire, try to avoid seeing yourself in the mirror, because I bet that's what really throws you into a panic.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: Fire is never a gentle master
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Just as a candle cannot burn without fire, men cannot live without a spiritual life.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The fire is the main comfort of the camp, whether in summer or winter, and is about as ample at one season as at another. It is as well for cheerfulness as for warmth and dryness.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Success isn't a result of spontaneous combustion. You must set yourself on fire.
quotes.author: Arnold Glascow

quotes.quote: Where there is smoke there is fire.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: People who fight fire with fire usually end up with ashes.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: Love is friendship that has caught fire. It is quiet understanding, mutual confidence, sharing and forgiving. It is loyal through good and bad times. It settles for less than perfection and makes allowances for human weaknesses.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: To those who do not know that the world is on fire, I have nothing to say.
quotes.author: Bertolt Brecht

quotes.quote: The difference between a good life and a bad life is how well you walk through the fire.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Affection is a coal that must be cooled; else, suffer'd, it will set the heart on fire.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: To poke a wood fire is more solid enjoyment than almost anything else in the world.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: The passions are like fire, useful in a thousand ways and dangerous only in one, through their excess.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The fire was followed by a period of grieving and then by an incredible lightness, freedom, and mobility.
quotes.author: Martin Puryear

quotes.quote: Keep a little fire burning; however small, however hidden.
quotes.author: Cormac Mccarthy

quotes.quote: The hero and the coward both feel exactly the same fear, only the hero confronts his fear and converts it into fire.
quotes.author: Cus D'amato

quotes.quote: Heat cannot be separated from fire, or beauty from The Eternal.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: We are told to let our light shine, and if it does, we won't need to tell anybody it does. Lighthouses don't fire cannons to call attention to their shining- they just shine.
quotes.author: Dwight L. Moody

quotes.quote: Trust your heart if the seas catch fire, live by love though the stars walk backward.
quotes.author: E. E. Cummings

quotes.quote: The fires of suffering become the light of consciousness.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The deepest lessons come out of the deepest waters and the hottest fires.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
quotes.author: Ferdinand Foch

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature that dares to light a fire and live with it. The reason? Because he alone has learned to put it out.
quotes.author: Henry Jackson Vandyke

quotes.quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Man is so made that whenever anything fires his soul, impossibilities vanish.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: If these little sparks of holy fire which I have thus heaped up together do not give life to your prepared and already enkindled spirit, yet they will sometimes help to entertain a thought, to actuate a passion, to employ and hallow a fancy.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: One of the strongest characteristics of genius is the power of lighting its own fire.
quotes.author: John Foster

quotes.quote: A church can be unified in one of two ways. You can freeze together, as the Church of the Frozen Chosen; or you can melt together with the fire of the Holy Spirit.
quotes.author: John Hagee

quotes.quote: Time is the substance from which I am made. Time is a river which carries me along, but I am the river; it is a tiger that devours me, but I am the tiger; it is a fire that consumes me, but I am the fire.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: While I was looking the other way your fire went out Left me with cinders to kick into dust What a waste of the wonder you were In my living fire I will keep your scorn and mine In my living fire I will keep your heartache and mine At the disgrace of a waste of a life.
quotes.author: Kristin Cashore

quotes.quote: Each of us is born with a box of matches inside us but we can't strike them all by ourselves.
quotes.author: Laura Esquivel

quotes.quote: Music should strike fire from the heart of man, and bring tears from the eyes of woman.
quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quotes.quote: Bitterness is like cancer. It eats upon the host. But anger is like fire. It burns it all clean.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: I am building a fire, and every day I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: To feel the love of people whom we love is a fire that feeds our life.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Someday, after mastering the winds, the waves, the tides and gravity, we shall harness for God the energies of love, and then, for a second time in the history of the world, man will have discovered fire.
quotes.author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quotes.quote: The mind is not a vessel to be filled but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The finest steel has to go through the hottest fire.
quotes.author: Richard M. Nixon

quotes.quote: If you break your neck, if you have nothing to eat, if your house is on fire, then you got a problem. Everything else is inconvenience.
quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

quotes.quote: Set your life on fire. Seek those who fan your flames.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Light up the fire of love inside and blaze the thoughts away.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Build a man a fire, and he'll be warm for a day. Set a man on fire, and he'll be warm for the rest of his life.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Don't let your dreams go up in smoke - practice fire safety.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To learn to read is to light a fire; every syllable that is spelled out is a spark.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Someone has a great fire in his soul and nobody ever comes to warm themselves at it, and passers-by see nothing but a little smoke at the top of the chimney and then go on their way.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: Education is not the filling of a pail, but the lighting of a fire.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: I have a need to be all on fire, for I have mountains of ice about me to melt.
quotes.author: William Lloyd Garrison

quotes.quote: Stars, hide your fires; Let not light see my black and deep desires.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: O for a muse of fire, that would ascend the brightest heaven of invention.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The sun's a thief, and with his great attraction Robs the vast seas. The moon's an arrant thief, And her pale fire she snatches from the sun.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: the only fire he can't put out is the one he started in my heart.
quotes.author: Adeline

quotes.quote: Wherever a man turns he can find someone who needs him.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: A hero has faced it all: he need not be undefeated, but he must be undaunted.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernstein

quotes.quote: The hero is the man who lets no obstacle prevent him from pursuing the values he has chosen.
quotes.author: Andrew Bernstein

quotes.quote: When tempted to fight fire with fire, remember that firefighters usually use water.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Aspire rather to be a hero than merely appear one.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.
quotes.author: Bob Riley

quotes.quote: Neither fire nor wind, birth nor death, can erase our good deeds.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The difference between a good life and a bad life is how well you walk through the fire.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: The guts carry the feet, not the feet the guts.
quotes.author: Cervantes

quotes.quote: "Safety First" is "Safety Always."
quotes.author: Charles M. Hayes

quotes.quote: I think a hero is an ordinary individual who finds strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Unselfish and noble actions are the most radiant pages in the biography of souls.
quotes.author: David Thomas

quotes.quote: When a man becomes a fireman his greatest act of bravery has been accomplished. What he does after that is all in the line of work.
quotes.author: Edward F. Crocker

quotes.quote: For safety is not a gadget but a state of mind.
quotes.author: Eleanor Everet

quotes.quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
quotes.author: General George Patton

quotes.quote: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow. That’s what courage is.
quotes.author: General Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: If crime fighters fight crime and fire fighters fight fire, what do freedom fighters fight?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: The hero is commonly the simplest and obscurest of men.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Man is the only creature that dares to light a fire and live with it. The reason? Because he alone has learned how to put it out.
quotes.author: Henry Jackson Vandyke Jr.

quotes.quote: No duty is more urgent than that of returning thanks.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: I became a firefighter because I wanted to save people. But I should have been more specific. I should have named names.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Greater love hath no man than this, that a man lay down his life for his friends.
quotes.author: John 15:13

quotes.quote: A hero is someone who has given his or her life to something bigger than oneself.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Real heroes are men who fall and fail and are flawed, but win out in the end because they’ve stayed true to their ideals and beliefs and commitments.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.quote: I can think of no more stirring symbol of man’s humanity to man than a fire engine.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Where fear is present, wisdom cannot be.
quotes.author: Lucius C. Lactantius

quotes.quote: How important it is for us to recognize and celebrate our heroes and she-roes!
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgement that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: Courage can't see around corners, but goes around them anyway.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: Bravery is the capacity to perform properly even when scared half to death.
quotes.author: Omar Bradley

quotes.quote: Not the glittering weapon fights the fight, but rather the hero's heart.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Better a thousand times careful than once dead.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is brave five minutes longer.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: You may not have saved a lot of money in your life, but if you have saved a lot of heartaches for other folks, you are a pretty rich man.
quotes.author: Seth Parker

quotes.quote: My heroes are those who risk their lives every day to protect our world and make it a better place – police, firefighters and members of our armed forces.
quotes.author: Sidney Sheldon

quotes.quote: The bravest are surely those who have the clearest vision of what is before them, glory and danger alike, and yet notwithstanding, go out to meet it.
quotes.author: Thucydides

quotes.quote: It's easy to make a buck. It's a lot tougher to make a difference.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: All men are created equal, then a few become firemen.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Firefighters save hearts and homes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: They bravely march into the depths of hell to face the fears of many, and extinguish the demons that rage free.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you think it’s tough being a firefighter, try being a firefighter’s wife or husband.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When fire is cried and danger is neigh, ‘God and the fireman’ is the people’s cry; but when ‘tis out and all things righted, God is forgotten and the firemen slighted.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No one is more cherished in this world than someone who lightens the burden of another. Thank you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Safety doesn't happen by accident.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Feeling gratitude and not expressing it is like wrapping a present and not giving it.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Something that has always puzzled me all my life is why, when I am in special need of help, the good deed is usually done by somebody on whom I have no claim.
quotes.author: William Feather

quotes.quote: I have no ambition in this world but one, and that is to be a fireman. The position may, in the eyes of some, appear to be a lowly one; but we who know the work which the fireman has to do believe that his is a noble calling. Our proudest moment is to save lives. Under the impulse of such thoughts, the nobility of the occupation thrills us and stimulates us to deeds of daring, even of supreme sacrifice.
quotes.author: Chief Edward F. Croker

quotes.quote: Every firefighter knows that he is always susceptible to this type of tragedy. They go to work every day knowing that they are doing something so positive, that people really respect them and appreciate them.
quotes.author: Thomas Von Essen

quotes.quote: Firefighters don't go on strike.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: The innovative leader has to be an arsonist and a firefighter.
quotes.author: Paul Sloane

quotes.quote: Firefighter required to perform all the necessary task in order to control an emergency situation.
quotes.author: Dennis

quotes.quote: You have to do something in your life that is honorable and not cowardly if you are to live in peace with yourself, and for the firefighter it is fire.
quotes.author: Larry Brown

quotes.quote: Delaware's firefighters put their lives in jeopardy every day in an effort to keep families safe.
quotes.author: Thomas Carper

quotes.quote: With better gear, firefighters no longer surround and drown a fire they go in.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.quote: When a man becomes a fireman his greatest act of bravery has been accomplished. What he does after that is all in the line of work.
quotes.author: Edward F. Croker

quotes.quote: But aloud the praises, and give the victor-crown. To our noble hearted Firemen, who fear not danger's frown.
quotes.author: Fredric G. W. Fenn

quotes.quote: Once you have a firefighter in your family, your family and the families from his crew become one big extended family.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: A good firefighter knows how, an educated firefighter knows why.
quotes.author: Chris Walker

quotes.quote: Firefighters are essential to the safety and security of our local communities. We owe it to these men and women to provide them with better training and equipment so they can do their jobs more effectively and safely.
quotes.author: Carl Levin

quotes.quote: That's the life, being a fireman. It sure beats being a ballplayer. I'd rather be a fireman.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: Police officers, firefighters, EMTs they are all out there every single day literally just a phone call away for anyone who needs them.
quotes.author: Doreen Croni

quotes.quote: Firemen never die, they just burn forever in the hearts of the people whose lives they saved.
quotes.author: Susan Diane Murphree

quotes.quote:
Firefighters, police officers and state troopers place themselves in
harm's way every day, every week, every year.
quotes.author: James McGreevey

quotes.quote: Our firefighters are our last line of defense, baby.
quotes.author: Jack Scalia

quotes.quote: Police and firefighters are great, but they don't create wealth. They protect it. That's crucial. Teaching is a wonderful profession. Teachers help educate people to become good citizens so that citizens can then go create wealth. But they don't create the wealth themselves.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: Firefighter is one of the few jobs kind enough to warn me away by containing two words I'm not interested in, unlike the deceptive bookkeeper.
quotes.author: Joel Stein

quotes.quote: As the member of a firefighter family myself, supporting the widowed families of rescue workers is an important, personal cause of mine.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.quote: Firefighters are indispensable foot soldiers here at home.
quotes.author: Christopher Dodd

quotes.quote: A fireman banged on my back door, and I couldn't breathe. It scared me to death. I came out the back door, and it just took my breath.
quotes.author: Pat Alexander

quotes.quote: Firemen are going to get killed. When they join the department they face that fact. When a man becomes a fireman his greatest act of bravery has been accomplished. What he does after that is all in the line of work. They were not thinking of getting killed when they went where death lurked. They went there to put the fire out, and got killed. Firefighters do not regard themselves as heroes because they do what the business requires.
quotes.author: Chief Edward F. Croker

quotes.quote: What firefighters and people in our military and cops do is separate from what the rest of us do; basically these people say, 'I'm going to protect all these strangers.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Firefighters are some of the most selfless public servants you will ever encounter.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Fireman never know what they will encounter on each call but proceed with the same level of commitment and service.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Being a firefighter is as close as you get to being a modern day soldier in your home country.
quotes.author: Tom Dawson

quotes.quote: Nothing cries out for compassion, concern, and danger as a fire engine screams by carrying firefighters ready to do battle without flinching from any demand.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: In fire you can plan everything out to the minute, and a minute before that everything changes.
quotes.author: Dan Felix

quotes.quote: Firefighter appreciation isn't just a once a year affair because firefighters are there for each of us everyday.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Good Firefighters will know their job. Great Firefighters will also know the job of the person above them as well as teach their job to the person below them.
quotes.author: Bob Muszynski

quotes.quote: The funny thing about firemen is, night and day, they are always firemen.
quotes.author: Gregory Widen

quotes.quote: Some people procrastinate so much that all they can do is run around like firefighters all day - putting out fires that should not have gotten started in the first place.
quotes.author: Nido R Qubein

quotes.quote: People are always asking me how is it that firefighters run into a burning building when everyone else is running out. Courage is the answer.
quotes.author: Chief Kennedy

quotes.quote: Firefighters go where they're needed, sometimes ignoring the dangers even when no one is inside a burning building to be saved.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.quote: Firefighters save more than homes. They save hearts, memories, and dreams.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Firefighting is all about ass - busting ours to save yours.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A hero is no braver than an ordinary man, but he is brave five minutes longer.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Firefighters save hearts and homes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Deliberate violence is more to be quenched than a fire.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: People are always asking me how is it that firefighters run into a burning building when everyone else is running out. Courage is the answer.
quotes.author: Chief Kennedy

quotes.quote: You might be a firefighter if your kids are afraid to get into water fights with you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Firefighter is one of the few jobs kind enough to warn me away by containing two words I'm not interested in, unlike the deceptive bookkeeper.
quotes.author: Joel Stein

quotes.quote: With better gear, firefighters no longer surround and drown a fire - they go in.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.quote: Firefighters are indispensable foot soldiers here at home.
quotes.author: Christopher Dodd

quotes.quote: You have to do something in your life that is honorable and not cowardly if you are to live in peace with yourself, and for the firefighter it is fire.
quotes.author: Larry Brown

quotes.quote: Nothing cries out for compassion, concern, and danger as a fire engine screams by carrying firefighters ready to do battle without flinching from any demand.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Every firefighter knows that he is always susceptible to this type of tragedy. They go to work every day knowing that they are doing something so positive, that people really respect them and appreciate them.
quotes.author: Thomas Von Essen

quotes.quote: The funny thing about firemen is, night and day, they are always firemen.
quotes.author: Gregory Widen

quotes.quote: As the member of a firefighter family myself, supporting the widowed families of rescue workers is an important, personal cause of mine.
quotes.author: Mark Sanchez

quotes.quote: In fire you can plan everything out to the minute, and a minute before that everything changes.
quotes.author: Dan Felix

quotes.quote: Some people procrastinate so much that all they can do is run around like firefighters all day - putting out fires that should not have gotten started in the first place.
quotes.author: Nido R Qubein

quotes.quote: Being a firefighter is as close as you get to being a modern day soldier in your home country.
quotes.author: Tom Dawson

quotes.quote: Firefighter required to perform all the necessary task in order to control an emergency situation.
quotes.author: Dennis

quotes.quote: Firefighter appreciation isn't just a once a year affair because firefighters are there for each of us everyday.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Firemen never die, they just burn forever in the hearts of the people whose lives they saved.
quotes.author: Susan Diane Murphree

quotes.quote: Firefighters go where they're needed, sometimes ignoring the dangers even when no one is inside a burning building to be saved.
quotes.author: Bill Dedman

quotes.quote: What firefighters and people in our military and cops do is separate from what the rest of us do; basically these people say, 'I'm going to protect all these strangers.
quotes.author: Denis Colin Leary

quotes.quote: But aloud the praises, and give the victor-crown. To our noble hearted Firemen, who fear not danger's frown.
quotes.author: Fredric G. W. Fenn

quotes.quote: Firefighters are some of the most selfless public servants you will ever encounter.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: Real heroes are men who fall and fail and are flawed, but win out in the end because they've stayed true to their ideals and beliefs and commitments.
quotes.author: Kevin Costner

quotes.quote: When a man becomes a fireman his greatest act of bravery has been accomplished. What he does after that is all in the line of work.
quotes.author: Edward F. Crocker

quotes.quote: Firefighting one of the few professions left that still makes house calls
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fireman never know what they will encounter on each call but proceed with the same level of commitment and service.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Delaware's firefighters put their lives in jeopardy every day in an effort to keep families safe.
quotes.author: Thomas Carper

quotes.quote: If you put out the fire, you won't have to jump out the window
quotes.author: Andy Freidricks

quotes.quote: Being a fireman, the whole neighborhood looks up to you. Being a good fireman, the other firefighters look up to you.
quotes.author: Edward Allen Bernero

quotes.quote: Life doesn't always go the way you expect it, but you came here to become a firefighter. If you give up today, think of all the lives you won't save tomorrow.
quotes.author: Roberts Gannaway

quotes.quote: People are always asking me how is it that firefighters run into a burning building when everyone else is running out. Courage is the answer.
quotes.author: Lewis Colick

quotes.quote: I was a firefighter, and because I couldn't save the children I saw in the burning building, then I am forever, every night, trapped in a nightmare.
quotes.author: Nicole Russin-McFarland

quotes.quote: Fire fighting is a low-frequency, high-risk business. That's why they train and trian in these simulated environments.
quotes.author: Ellen Kirschman

quotes.quote: No simulation can ever be perfect because every fire is different and every foreground is unique. The key is consistent practice and teamwork.
quotes.author: Ellen Kirschman

quotes.quote: Fire fighters worldwide regard themselves as a brotherhood. The fire service is built on traditions of service to the community and traditions of mutual support and hospitality to each other.
quotes.author: Ellen Kirschman

quotes.quote: The fire service is a profession where enduring friendships triumph over conflicts; stunning victories trump tragic tales; and acts of selfless courage and heroism overshadow occasional incidents of incompetence or lack of discipline.
quotes.author: Ellen Kirschman

quotes.quote: Firefighters are true heroes that you can see every day. They work long hours each and every week, and they do not ask for special attention.
quotes.author: Brian Rogers

quotes.quote: When everyone else is trying to run out of a burning building, the firefighters are the ones running into it to save their people trapped inside.
quotes.author: Brian Rogers

quotes.quote: Firefighters in every town are special because they are willing to give their time and energy to help their neighbors, no matter who these neighbors might be.
quotes.author: Brian Rogers

quotes.quote: Firefighters are a special type of person, and not everyone can do their job.
quotes.author: Brian Rogers

quotes.quote: Firefighters also fill a variety of roles that help to keep the community safe.
quotes.author: Brian Rogers

quotes.quote: Our firefighters are not just called to house fires. They respond to sorts of rescue situation: motor vehicle accidents, swimming and boating accidents, chemical leaks and gas leaks, just to name a few.
quotes.author: Rev Dr Cynthia Huling Hummel

quotes.quote: Firefighting is a science and a passion. Firefighters do what they do because the love their work.
quotes.author: Rev Dr Cynthia Huling Hummel

quotes.quote: Being a firefighter is a combination of routine activities, intense training, and life-threatening situations--and those activities can switch instantly at the sound of an alarm.
quotes.author: Lisa Thompson

quotes.quote: When the bell rang, a firefighter was expected to stop everything to help others.
quotes.author: Glenn Corbett

quotes.quote: Firefighters had to be creative in budgeting and acquiring funds to protect those they swore and serve.
quotes.author: Glenn Corbett

quotes.quote: This job isn't for everybody. It takes someone special to be a firefighter.
quotes.author: Glenn Corbett

quotes.quote: As a rookie firefighter, you must understand from the moment you walk into the firehouse that you create your own legacy.
quotes.author: Glenn Corbett

quotes.quote: A firefighter starts in the morning because an emergency knows no time and can happen without warning.
quotes.author: The Firefighter Writer

quotes.quote: Firefighters are people who are trained to put out fires. They help people in many ways. Firefighters rescue people and animals in trouble. It is hard work.
quotes.author: Melissa A. Settle

quotes.quote: It is not easy to become a firefighter. They also have to show that they are strong and in good shape.
quotes.author: Melissa A. Settle

quotes.quote: Fighting fires is very risky. Some firefighters have to climb very tall buildings. They have to enter rooms that are on fire. They have to be brave. And, they have to know how to stay calm.
quotes.author: Melissa A. Settle

quotes.quote: Being a firefighter is hard. But, it is also rewarding. It feels good to help people when they are in trouble.
quotes.author: Melissa A. Settle

quotes.quote: The firefighter do not just put out fires. They help solve all kinds of problems.
quotes.author: Richard Scarry

quotes.quote: Another benefit of being a firefighter is your sense of self-worth. You go out on a job, you eat some smoke, you take a little heat, and you get the great satisfaction of confronting the flames and defeating them. You know you're doing a good job, and that's a very valuable benefit.
quotes.author: Dennis Smith

quotes.quote: Sometimes people get killed. Every firefighter has to deal with death of a brother firefighter at some point in his life.
quotes.author: Dennis Smith

quotes.quote: There is something that happens to a man when he becomes a firefighter. That something is that he begins to care about what he is doing, about the people he works with, and about the department's reputation in a way that surprises, a depth of feeling that is entirely new.
quotes.author: Dennis Smith

quotes.quote: It is that feeling that enables people to enter burning buildings, and it is that feeling that will preserve the histories of fire departments throughout the land. It becomes a part of the man, and a part of every action.
quotes.author: Dennis Smith

quotes.quote: Being a firefighter defines who you are. If you are not proud of being a firefighter, consider doing something else.
quotes.author: Billy Goldfeder

quotes.quote: A successful firefighter has the right mix of formal education, vocational training, and common sense. All are required to be recognized, promoted, and ultimately respected by peers.
quotes.author: Billy Goldfeder

quotes.quote: Nothing is wrong with saying hello to everyone in the firehouse when you walk in. The least you can do is speak. This is brotherhood, you know.
quotes.author: Billy Goldfeder

quotes.quote: Being called a firefighter is the greatest compliment you will ever receive.
quotes.author: Billy Goldfeder

quotes.quote: Becoming a firefighter is not easy, but if you spend some quality time researching the position and the entire testing process, your chances should increase greatly at obtaining that badge you have been coveting.
quotes.author: Steve Prziborowski

quotes.quote: The job of a firefighter can be both exciting and dangerous. Fire is unpredictable.
quotes.author: Jim Ollhoff

quotes.quote: On any day, firefighters may have to risk their lives to save others. This career requires a lot of courage and dedication.
quotes.author: Jim Ollhoff

quotes.quote: Firefighters are in the business of helping people and saving lives.
quotes.author: Jim Ollhoff

quotes.quote: Firefighters are community helpers. Community helpers are people who work to keep communities safe, healthy, and fun.
quotes.author: Bobbie Kalman

quotes.quote: A true firefighter is someone who exemplifies the passion and dedication of a humble public servant.
quotes.author: Steve Prziborowski

quotes.quote: Your actions as a firefighter at times will undoubtedly be labeled by some as heroic, but it's your humility and dedication to being the best you can be that will ultimately bring you success.
quotes.author: Steve Prziborowski

quotes.quote: Today's firefighter is a physically fit, compassionate, blue-collar technician, who carries the education and training credentials of a white-collard professional. On rare occasions we are asked to take extraordinary risks to save life of another, but more frequently, we are asked to extend a helping hand to a less fortunate citizen in need.
quotes.author: Steve Prziborowski

quotes.quote: Firefighters are very busy. They can be called to a fire at any time of day or night. They must be ready at all times in case of an emergency.
quotes.author: Diana Herweck

quotes.quote: You are a firefighter, an engineer, a captain, a chief, or a paramedic. You are not average!
quotes.author: Justin Lewis

quotes.quote: From guys on the front lines to guys in the office / To the firefighters tryna stop it, we ain't perfect / There's flaws, but in times of crisis we drop it.
quotes.author: Alasdair David George Murray

quotes.quote: So many of our firefighters and officers have worked hard to get the fire service to where it is at today; for that very reason, we need to protect it. We're all about family. We're all about taking care of people. We're all about supporting and promoting family values. We need to protect what we're all about.
quotes.author: Rick Lasky

quotes.quote: Firefighters truly are jacks-of-all-trades, but we are also masters of them all. Give us any challenge; we'll face it and overcome it.
quotes.author: Rick Lasky

quotes.quote: Firefighters are talented and are the cream of the crop in society.
quotes.author: Rick Lasky

quotes.quote: Treat people like family. Get your firefighters to treat the people they are responding to as if the people were their mom, dad, grandparent, or child.
quotes.author: Rick Lasky

quotes.quote: Your firefighters are going to enjoy the accolades for doing a good job and the tahnk you notes for going above and beyond the normal expectations of a firefighter. And most of the public, whom we have sworn to serve and protect, will be grateful for the services we provide. That's our mission. It's simple. Our mission is to take care of people.
quotes.author: Rick Lasky

quotes.quote: Fireworks can make us both happy and sad. It just depends if we are talking about fireworks in the sky or fireworks with another.
quotes.author: Anthony T.Hincks

quotes.quote: Assuming what people want is about as controlled as using fireworks to start a fire.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: If Paris is a city of lights, Sydney is the city of fireworks.
quotes.author: Baz Luhrmann

quotes.quote: Happy white peoples independence day the slaves weren't free but I'm sure they enjoyed fireworks.
quotes.author: Chris Rock

quotes.quote: Sparklers are the gay cousins of the fireworks family.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: Now I'm a spent firework, but at least I've been a firework.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: The fireworks begin today. Each diploma is a lighted match. Each one of you is a fuse.
quotes.author: Ed Koch

quotes.quote: All architecture is great architecture after sunset; perhaps architecture is really a nocturnal art, like the art of fireworks.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Against a dark sky, all flowers look like fireworks.
quotes.author: Gilbert Keith Chesterton

quotes.quote: In childhood the daylight always fails too soon except when there are going to be fireworks.
quotes.author: Jan Struther

quotes.quote: Love isn't always fireworks. Sometimes, love just comes softly.
quotes.author: Janette Oke

quotes.quote: Perhaps all romance is like that; not a contract between equal parties but an explosion of dreams and desires that can find no outlet in everyday life. Only a drama will do and while the fireworks last the sky is a different colour.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: You might be a redneck if your lifetime goal is to own a fireworks stand.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Well, not all magic is fireworks and fanfare. Sometimes magic is quiet and sneaks up on you.
quotes.author: Jeff Guinn

quotes.quote: Because beautiful things never last. Not roses nor snow and not fireworks, either.
quotes.author: Jennifer Donnelly

quotes.quote: A good relationship is like firework, loud, explosive, and liable to maim you if you hold on too long.
quotes.author: Jeph Jacques

quotes.quote: If you can't see the sun you will be impressed with a street light. If you've never felt thunder and lightning you'll be impressed with fireworks. And if you turn your back on the greatness and majesty of God you'll fall in love with a world of shadows and short lived pleasures.
quotes.author: John Piper

quotes.quote: Laughter is the fireworks of the soul.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Leave the fireworks for those who cast no spark of their own.
quotes.author: Karen Abbott

quotes.quote: You're much better than fireworks. They're all over in a moment, and you're going to stay for a whole fortnight. Besides, fireworks are noisy, and they make too much smoke.
quotes.author: Kate Ross

quotes.quote: Baby you're a firework, come on, let your colors burst, make them go!
quotes.author: Katy Perry

quotes.quote: There should be fireworks at last, when a dream dies.
quotes.author: Kirby Larson

quotes.quote: But when someone that you love dies. Well, I can tell you that you really feel what it means and it really really hurts. It's like fireworks suddenly burning out in the sky and everything going black.
quotes.author: Muriel Barbery

quotes.quote: I guess we all like to be recognized not for one piece of fireworks but for the ledger of our daily work.
quotes.author: Neil Armstrong

quotes.quote: You are like fireworks. You go out into your children, your friends, your society, and the whole world.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: You have to find what sparks a light in you so that you in your own way can illuminate the world.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: What church could compete with the fireworks of the pure soul?
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: The world needed more fireworks especially now that there was going to be a shortage of beautiful, useless things.
quotes.author: Scott Westerfeld

quotes.quote: I'm shining like fireworks over your sad, empty town.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Don't look to the sky for fireworks when you can watch them light up in the eyes of all the people passing by.
quotes.author: Tyler Kent

quotes.quote: Don't let anyone ever dull your sparkle. If you want to fly, give up everything that weighs you down.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The first wealth is health.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The first dish pleaseth all.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: First be best, then be first.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: The first human who hurled an insult instead of a stone was the founder of civilization.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The first step toward change is awareness. The second step is acceptance.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Branden

quotes.quote: We call first truths those we discover after all the others.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: First learn the meaning of what you say, and then speak.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The first principle is that you must not fool yourself and you are the easiest person to fool.
quotes.author: Richard P. Feynman

quotes.quote: One of the first signs of the beginning of understanding is the wish to die.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: The first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: Decide what you want.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: You must take the first step. The first steps will take some effort, maybe pain. But after that, everything that has to be done is real-life movement.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: The first step towards getting somewhere is to decide that you are not going to stay where you are.
quotes.author: Chauncey Depew

quotes.quote: Be first and be lonely.
quotes.author: Ginni Rometty

quotes.quote: First thought, best thought.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: The first cut is the deepest.
quotes.author: Rod Stewart

quotes.quote: The first quality that is needed is audacity.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: After the first blush of sin comes its indifference.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The first requisite of a good citizen in this republic of ours is that he shall be able and willing to pull his own weight.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The first requisite of civilization is that of justice.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: The first idea the child must acquire is that of the difference between good and evil.
quotes.author: Maria Montessori

quotes.quote: The first forty years of life give us the text; the next thirty supply the commentary on it.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Our first responsibility in the midst of violence is to prevent it from destroying us.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: The first step in the evolution of ethics is a sense of solidarity with other human beings.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: The first precept was never to accept a thing as true until I knew it as such without a single doubt.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable.
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: We first make our habits, and then our habits make us.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: If you first fortify yourself with the true knowledge of the Universal Self, and then live in the midst of wealth and worldliness, surely they will in no way affect you.
quotes.author: Ramakrishna

quotes.quote: The first ingredient in conversation is truth, the next good sense, the third good humor, and the fourth wit.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: The first thing anyone can do, about any issue, is get informed.
quotes.author: Adora Svitak

quotes.quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
quotes.author: Mark Caine

quotes.quote: First be a good animal.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The first method for estimating the intelligence of a ruler is to look at the men he has around him.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: The first reaction to truth is hatred.
quotes.author: Tertullian

quotes.quote: The first thing that strikes a visitor to Paris is a taxi.
quotes.author: Fred A. Allen

quotes.quote: The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant.
quotes.author: Max De Pree

quotes.quote: The first sentence of a book is a handshake, perhaps an embrace.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.quote: The first law of ecology is that everything is related to everything else.
quotes.author: Barry Commoner

quotes.quote: The First Amendment doesn't give anybody the right to be heard. People don't have to listen to you.
quotes.author: Rush Limbaugh

quotes.quote: The first amendment ensures not that speech will be fair, but that it will be free. It cannot be both.
quotes.author: David Mamet

quotes.quote: The First Amendment was designed to protect offensive speech, because nobody ever tries to ban the other kind.
quotes.author: Mike Godwin

quotes.quote: The spirit of the First Amendment has been effectively repealed for conservative speech by a censorious, accusatory mob.
quotes.author: Ann Coulter

quotes.quote: The First Amendment was designed to allow for disruption of business as usual. It is not a quiet and subdued amendment or right.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: The First Amendment serves not only the needs of the polity but also those of the human spirit- a spirit that demands self-expression.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: The dominant purpose of the First Amendment was to prohibit the widespread practice of government suppression of embarrassing information.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: We have a First Amendment for good reasons. We need a free press because without an educated electorate we cannot have a functioning democracy.
quotes.author: Jill Stein

quotes.quote: The First Amendment makes confidence in the common sense of our people and in the maturity of their judgement the great postulate of our democracy.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas
