quotes.quote: The First Amendment is often inconvenient. But that is beside the point. Inconvenience does not absolve the government of its obligation to tolerate speech.
quotes.author: Anthony Kennedy

quotes.quote: If the First Amendment means anything, it means that a state has no business telling a man, sitting alone in his house, what books he may read or what films he may watch.
quotes.author: Thurgood Marshall

quotes.quote: The basis of the First Amendment is the hypothesis that speech can rebut speech, propaganda will answer propaganda, free debate of ideas will result in the wisest governmental policies.
quotes.author: Fred M. Vinson

quotes.quote: No one understands that the First Amendment is only important if you are going to offend somebody. If you're not going to offend somebody, you don't need protection of the First Amendment.
quotes.author: Larry Flynt

quotes.quote: The First Amendment is not an altar on which we must sacrifice our children, families, and community standards. Obscene material that is not protected by the First Amendment can and must be prohibited.
quotes.author: Orrin Hatch

quotes.quote: The First Amendment isn't about free thought and free opinion and free belief. The First Amendment is about free exercise--the carrying into practice of religious principles, and beliefs, and convictions.
quotes.author: Alan Keyes

quotes.quote: The First Amendment applies to rogues and scoundrels. You don't lose your First Amendment rights because of a sleazy personality, or even for having committed a crime. Felons in jail are protected by the First Amendment.
quotes.author: Naomi Wolf

quotes.quote: The First Amendment has created a wall of separation between the church and the State. But that wall is one directional. It is to keep the government from running the Church. But it is not to keep Christian principles out of the government.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Thus if the First Amendment means anything in this field, it must allow protests even against the moral code that the standard of the day sets for the community. In other words, literature should not be suppressed merely because it offends the moral code of the censor.
quotes.author: William O. Douglas

quotes.quote: First Amendment freedoms are most in danger when the government seeks to control thought or to justify its laws for that impermissible end. The right to think is the beginning of freedom, and speech must be protected from the government because speech is the beginning of thought.
quotes.author: Anthony Kennedy

quotes.quote: To those who cite the first amendment as reason for excluding God from more and more of our institutions and everyday life, may I just say: The first amendment of the Constitution was not written to protect the people of this country from religious values; it was written to protect religious values from government tyranny.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: The First Amendment is very important, but it's not everything.
quotes.author: Anthony Lewis

quotes.quote: The First Amendment rejects red tape, cover-up and double-speak.
quotes.author: Roy Barnes

quotes.quote: The notion that the First Amendment has no limitations whatsoever is balderdash.
quotes.author: Trey Gowdy

quotes.quote: The First Amendment says keep government out of religion. It doesn't say keep religion out of government.
quotes.author: Rand Paul

quotes.quote: The First Amendment freedom of religion is as important today as when the Bill of Rights was first written.
quotes.author: Arlen Specter

quotes.quote: The First Amendment has the same role in my life as a citizen and a writer as the sun has in our ecosystem.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: First Amendment speech and press rights may also be subordinated to the overriding need to wage war successfully.
quotes.author: John Yoo

quotes.quote: The very reason for the First Amendment is to make the people of this country free to think, speak, write and worship as they wish, not as the Government commands.
quotes.author: Hugo Black

quotes.quote: The First Amendment is not a blanket freedom-of-information act. The constitutional newsgathering freedom means the media can go where the public can, but enjoys no superior right of access.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: The First Amendment does not guarantee the press a constitutional right of special access to information not available to the general public, nor does it cloak the inmate with special rights of freedom of speech.
quotes.author: Pete Wilson

quotes.quote: The first amendment makes it clear that we are free to practice religion without government interference. The Constitution also establishes the separation of church and state so that the laws we live by our never guided by religious zeal.
quotes.author: Roxane Gay

quotes.quote: The First Amendment provides the only kind of security system that can preserve a free government – one that leaves the way wide open for people to favor, discuss, advocate, or incite causes and doctrines however obnoxious and antagonistic such views may be to the rest of us.
quotes.author: Hugo Black

quotes.quote: The best thing about being cheated on is I get to go on more first dates.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: I spent the weekend after our date wishing I could stab him with my fluffy duck pen and staring at the phone hoping he'd call. Dating is a very tricky business.
quotes.author: Cath Crowley

quotes.quote: Men don't realize that if we're sleeping with them on the first date, we’re probably not interested in seeing them again either.
quotes.author: Chelsea Handler

quotes.quote: I was on a date with this really hot model. Well, it wasn't really a date date. We just ate dinner and saw a movie. Then the plane landed.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: I'm always looking for meaningful one night stands.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.quote: At first I thought he was walking the dog and then I realized it was his date.
quotes.author: Edith Massey

quotes.quote: This is one rule about mixing boys and girls: that a date always comes first.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Berg

quotes.quote: Memory has always fascinated me. Think of it. You can recall at will your first day in high school, your first date, your first love.
quotes.author: Eric Kandel

quotes.quote: I'm dating a woman now who, evidently, is unaware of it.
quotes.author: Garry Shandling

quotes.quote: The worst thing a man can ever do is kiss me on the first date.
quotes.author: Halle Berry

quotes.quote: Dating is about finding out who you are and who others are. If you show up in a masquerade outfit, neither is going to happen.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: Dating is a give and take. If you only see it as ‘taking,’ you are not getting it.
quotes.author: Henry Cloud

quotes.quote: The cry of the soul is for freedom. It longs for liberty, from the date of its first conscious moments.
quotes.author: J. G. Holland

quotes.quote: For our first date we went Dutch. We would have gone another nationality, but they are the tallest.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: If you kiss on the first date and it's not right, then there will be no second date. Sometimes it's better to hold out and not kiss for a long time. I am a strong believer in kissing being very intimate, and the minute you kiss, the floodgates open for everything else.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lopez

quotes.quote: Dating is pressure and tension. What is a date, really, but a job interview that lasts all night?
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: What is a date, really, but a job interview that lasts all night? The only difference is there aren't many job interviews where you'll wind up naked.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: The joy of intimacy is the reward of commitment.
quotes.author: Joshua Harris

quotes.quote: Yeah, well, not many boys take their girls out on a duck shoot with them as the target for a first date. You have to give me points for style.
quotes.author: Joss Stirling

quotes.quote: I'd like to start a family, but you have to have a date first.
quotes.author: Larry David

quotes.quote: I don't kiss on the first date. My friends always make fun of me for that! But I will hold hands.
quotes.author: Lauren Conrad

quotes.quote: It’s always been my personal feeling that unless you are married, there is something that is not very dignified about talking about who you are dating.
quotes.author: Luke Wilson

quotes.quote: Better to put your heart on the line, risk everything, and walk away with nothing than play it safe. Love is a lot of things, but safe isn't one of them.
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Good looking individuals are treated better than homely ones in virtually every social situation, from dating to trial by jury.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: Dating is where you pretend you're someone you're not to impress someone you don't know.
quotes.author: Melanie White

quotes.quote: As for me, I was already in love and ready to get engaged, which we did three and a half weeks after we met. Four months later we got married.
quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

quotes.quote: A man on a date wonders if he'll get lucky. The woman already knows.
quotes.author: Monica Piper

quotes.quote: It is the same way with dating. The time you are most prepared for dating is when you don't need anyone to complete you, fulfill you, or instill in you a sense of worth or purpose. You are ready to date when you have first learned how to be single.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: A person’s readiness to date is largely a matter of maturity and environment.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: If you think there are no new frontiers, watch a boy ring the front doorbell on his first date.
quotes.author: Olin Miller

quotes.quote: She realized she'd never felt this happy, even at her old school, she had been an outsider, always the lonely girl, the one who stayed at home watching tv on Saturday nights while her friends went to parties and out on dates.
quotes.author: R.L. Stine

quotes.quote: I tell ya, my wife was never nice to me. On our first date, I asked her if I could give her a goodnight kiss on the cheek, she bent over!
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: A guy should make the woman he is dating feel different and more special than anyone else in his life.
quotes.author: Samantha Daniels

quotes.quote: Love is so unpredictable. Sometimes you'll know a man for years and then one day, boom! Suddenly you see him in a different way. And other times, it's that first date, that first moment. That's what makes it so great.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: I went on a date recently and the guy took me horseback riding. That was kind of fun, until we ran out of quarters.
quotes.author: Susie Loucks

quotes.quote: A first date should be elegant. In comfortable surroundings. A place with excellent food, where you can talk easily and get to know each other.
quotes.author: Oleg Cassini

quotes.quote: I shake hands on the first date.
quotes.author: Nargis Fakhri

quotes.quote: Beware the man who doesn't ask you any questions about yourself on your first date.
quotes.author: Merrill Markoe

quotes.quote: The perfect date is the one where anything and everything goes wrong, but at the end of it, all you want is to see them again.
quotes.author: Dylan O'Brien

quotes.quote: The most important day of a person's education is the first day of school, not Graduation Day.
quotes.author: Harry Wong

quotes.quote: Waking your kids up for school the first day after a break is almost as much fun as birthing them was.
quotes.author: Jenny McCarthy

quotes.quote: You're off to great to great places. Today is your first day! Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I felt abandoned - watching my mum leave me with strangers. I'll never forget that feeling. Then I had very happy years at school.
quotes.author: Claire Sweeney

quotes.quote: I felt like the first day of school or someting. My heart was beating a litttle faster, my anticipation was building up. It was like the first day of school when you go to kindergaten or something.
quotes.author: Carlos Boozer

quotes.quote: I've always loved the first day of school better than the last day of school. Firsts are best because they are beginnings.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: On the first day of a college you will worry about how will you do inside the college and at the last day of a college you will wonder what will you do outside the college
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Describing her first day back in grade school after a long absence, a teacher said, It was like trying to hold 35 corks under water at the same time.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The child who desires education will be bettered by it; the child who dislikes it disgraced.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: He who opens a school door, closes a prison.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: What we want is to see the child in pursuit of knowledge, and not knowledge in pursuit of the child.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The first day of school is always a fashion show, The rest of the school year? A pajama party.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: What makes a child gifted and talented may not always be good grades in school, but a different way of looking at the world and learning.
quotes.author: Chuck Grassley

quotes.quote: The first day of school is our second New Year’s. It is our day to make resolutions, to look backward to former lapses and triumphs and to look ahead, usually with a mix of anxiety and hope, to the year to come.
quotes.author: Mark Edmundon

quotes.quote: I'm not going.
quotes.author: Kate Berube

quotes.quote: My memories on my first day of school included the classic never-ending search for that one classroom that did not seem to exist.
quotes.author: Sean C. Cusak

quotes.quote: Learn as much as you can while you are young, since life becomes too busy later.
quotes.author: Dana Stewart Scott

quotes.quote: Education is our passport to the future, for tomorrow belongs to the people who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Why do people cry on the last day of school?You should be crying on the first day of school.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sending your child off to school for the first time in their life is terrifying.
quotes.author: Arabella Weir

quotes.quote: You must get an education. You must go to school, and you must learn to protect yourself. And you must learn to protect yourself with the pen, and not the gun.
quotes.author: Josephine Baker

quotes.quote: The first day of school - The day when the countdown to the last day of the school begins.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: That awkward moment on the first day of school when you'll go in front of the class and introduce yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You learn something every day if you pay attention.
quotes.author: Ray LeBlond

quotes.quote: Studies serve for delight, for ornaments, and for ability.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: School bells are ringing loud and clear; vacation's over, school is here.
quotes.author: Winifred C. Marshal

quotes.quote: School success is not predicted by a child’s fund of facts or a precocious ability to read as much as by emotional and social measures.
quotes.author: Daniel Goleman

quotes.quote: You come here for one thing and one thing only, and that is to learn. I used to spend a lot of my life waiting for the day I could quit school, but then came to realize that so long as we are alive we never leave school. Life is a series of high schools, one after the other.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: Time to rise. Time for school! Open your eyes.
quotes.author: Tammie Jones

quotes.quote: You are graduating from college. That means that this is the first day of the last day of your life. No, that's wrong. This is the last day of the first day of school. Nope, that's worse. This is a day.
quotes.author: Andy Samberg

quotes.quote: On the first day of school, you got to be real careful where you sit. You walk into the classroom and just plunk your stuff down on any old desk, and the next thing you know the teacher is saying, 'I hope you all like where you're sitting, because these are your permanent seats.'
quotes.author: Jeff Kinney

quotes.quote: First day of school, make sure that you know your locker combination.
quotes.author: Jordan Francis

quotes.quote: I had the feeling that to get into a schoolhouse and study... would be about the same as getting into paradise.
quotes.author: Booker T. Washington

quotes.quote: On the first day of school, my father told me I'd be the most popular girl and everyone would love me and want to be my friend. It wasn't so, but it gave me an enormous amount of confidence.
quotes.author: Maeve Binchy

quotes.quote: From your first day at school you are cut off from life to make theories.
quotes.author: Taisen Deshimaru

quotes.quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: And this was the cause of my suffering when I was sent to school. For all of a sudden I found my world vanishing around me, giving place to wooden benches and straight walls staring at me with the blank stare of the blind. But the legend is that eating of the fruit of knowledge is not consonant with dwelling in paradise. Therefore men's children have to be banished from their paradise into a realm of death dominated by the decency of a tailoring department. So my mind had to accept the tight-fitting encasement of the school which, being like the shoes of a mandarin woman, pinched and bruised my nature on all sides and at every movement.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: What if they mispronounce my last name and everyone laughs? What if my teacher doesn't make her D's like Mom taught me? What if I spend the whole day without a friend?
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: we pray / you will learn easily / in this new place / you will laugh and share / loving people other than us
quotes.author: Lucy Tapahanso

quotes.quote: My first year has been as disappointing as it was rewarding... I have lost and found hope, reviewed and revised, and finally concluded that my presence here is much more important that I had thought it would be.
quotes.author: Catherine McTamaney

quotes.quote: Our problem as educators is that far too often we begin the academic year worrying more about our courses and about our academic responsibilities than about our students, those fragile human beings who sit across from us and stare, waiting to learn and eager to know.
quotes.author: Frank Pajares

quotes.quote: The distance between pupil and teacher diminishes as the former gets older: by the end of high school the teacher should be a a fellow student.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: When kids look back on today, they won't remember the stack of work and supplies you sent home with them, but they will remember the love and compassion you showed them on a day full of uncertainty and anxiousness they likely can't describe.
quotes.author: Tricia Kannberg

quotes.quote: You're perfect when you're comfortable being yourself.
quotes.author: Ansel Elgort

quotes.quote: All children start their school careers with sparkling imaginations, fertile minds, and a willingness to take risks with what they think.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: Every day is the first day of school.
quotes.author: Dr. Edoardo Zeloni Magelli

quotes.quote: My number one goal at the end of the first day is not that they know the rules and consequences. It's that they're excited to be part of the class. That they run home to their parents and say, "Oh my gosh. I have the best teacher. I have this awesome class. It's going to be great."
quotes.author: Michael Linsin

quotes.quote: Reach as high as you can, and then reach a little higher. There you will find magic and possibility. And maybe even cookies.
quotes.author: Marc Johns

quotes.quote: The first day of school is tough on all my kids. Especially the one I married.
quotes.author: Claire Dunphy

quotes.quote: First I was born young and healthy / I told my mother one day I'd be wealthy / Can't forget my first day at school / Got stabbed in the head with a pencil, but it's cool
quotes.author: Joseph Bruce

quotes.quote: And I had a dream it blows the autumn through my head / It felt like the first day of school / But I was going to the moon instead / And I walked down the hall / With the notebooks they got for me / My dad led me through the house / My mom drank instant coffee / And I knew that I would crash / But I didn't want to tell them / There are just some moments when your family makes sense / They just make sense
quotes.author: Robert Peter Williams

quotes.quote: And I know that this is new / Like your first day of school / And you're feeling awkward / Like you miss your home / And it leaves you with an empty feeling / I just can't take it anymore
quotes.author: Chad Everett Gilbert

quotes.quote: It was the first day of school / Just like that you meet new people, isn't that cool / But oh, you just did not fit in, and what a shame / You'll never make new friends, you say; but all that's gonna change
quotes.author: Peter Michaels Jr.

quotes.quote: Greener than the first day at school / Wiser now but I'm still a fool / Packed my bags and I left too soon / Broke my promises, bent the rules
quotes.author: Jordan Randall

quotes.quote: And Mother is cutting lunches, / There are only four as a rule, / But to-day another is added, / For Baby is going to school. / ‘You’ll take her on Laddie between you, / And hold her tight at the creek.” / And Mother parts with her darling / With a kiss on her dimpled cheek.
quotes.author: Alice Guerin Crist

quotes.quote: An old man's thought of School; / An old man, gathering youthful memories and blooms, that youth itself cannot. / Now only do I know you! / O fair auroral skies! O morning dew upon the grass! / And these I see--these sparkling eyes, / These stores of mystic meaning--these young lives, / Building, equipping, like a fleet of ships--immortal ships! /Soon to sail out over the measureless seas, / On the Soul's voyage.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: In this little school / Life goes so sweetly, / Day on azure day / Is lost completely. / No one thinks too much, / Or worries greatly. / In a pleasant shade / We dream sedately. / There's no struggle here / Or conflict showing; / Only the sweet pain / Of young limbs growing.
quotes.author: Lesbia Harford

quotes.quote: School, School, School, / Without any frightening rule, / It’s not a place for fools and cools, / But a place for cute and artfuls. / It is the time when our pencils get shorten, / And notebooks get fat. / Our crayons get broken, / And erasers get flat. / Teachers here are very kind, / But wrong doings, they do mind. / Infused into us is not fear, / School days are very dear. / Studying in a school is not just a pleasure, / It’s truly a lifetime treasure.
quotes.author: Tungon Dugi

quotes.quote: A stunning first impression was not the same thing as love at first sight. But surely it was an invitation to consider the matter.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Possibly the most interesting first impression of my life came from the world of dreams.
quotes.author: P. D. Ouspensky

quotes.quote: We don't know where our first impressions come from or precisely what they mean, so we don't always appreciate their fragility.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: It is only at the first encounter that a face makes its full impression on us.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: What I am after is the first impression - I want to show all one sees on first entering the room - what my eye takes in at first glance.
quotes.author: Pierre Bonnard

quotes.quote: First impressions matter. Experts say we size up new people in somewhere between 30 seconds and two minutes.
quotes.author: Elliott Abrams

quotes.quote: Almost everyone will make a good first impression, but only a few will make a good lasting impression.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The first impression is the truth, and all that follows is merely the excuse of memory.
quotes.author: Andrew Crumey

quotes.quote: No great thought, no great object, satisfies the mind at first view, nor at the last.
quotes.author: Abel Stevens

quotes.quote: We sometimes encounter people, even perfect strangers, who begin to interest us at first sight, somehow suddenly, all at once, before a word has been spoken.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: A firm, hearty handshake gives a good first impression, and you'll never be forgiven if you don't live up to it.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: It's pretty simple, pretty obvious: that people's first impressions of people are really a big mistake.
quotes.author: Vincent D'Onofrio

quotes.quote: For me it's always about first impressions. I trust my instincts. I love to prepare if it's something that requires training. But I don't like to prepare the psychology too much. I enjoy the psychology of the character but I work better from a first impression.
quotes.author: Billy Zane

quotes.quote: You never get a second chance to make a first impression.
quotes.author: Andrew Grant

quotes.quote: If you want to make a good first impression, smile at people. What does it cost to smile? Nothing. What does it cost not to smile? Everything, if not smiling prevents you from enchanting people.
quotes.author: Guy Kawasaki

quotes.quote: Never forget that you only have one opportunity to make a first impression - with investors, with customers, with PR, and with marketing.
quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

quotes.quote: I don't know if you've ever noticed this, but first impressions are often entirely wrong.
quotes.author: Lemony Snicket

quotes.quote: Our first impressions are generated by our experiences and our environment, which means that we can change our first impressions . . . by changing the experiences that comprise those impressions.
quotes.author: Malcolm Gladwell

quotes.quote: A good first impression can work wonders.
quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

quotes.quote: The first impression of a new subject is not necessarily the best. Seen from a different angle or under different condition it might look even better. Always study a three - dimensional subject with one eye closed.
quotes.author: Andreas Feininger

quotes.quote: Never lose the first impression which has moved you.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste Camille Corot

quotes.quote: My first feeling about the paper and the attitude is that it is absurd.
quotes.author: Arthur Holly Compton

quotes.quote: Realize the value of putting down your first impression quickly.
quotes.author: Charles Webster Hawthorne

quotes.quote: I influence anybody who is able to get through the chaos of my first impression.
quotes.author: Gary Vaynerchuk

quotes.quote: Don't second guess your professional first impression.
quotes.author: Mitch Miles

quotes.quote: My first impressions of people are invariably right. right, people.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Adjust your philosophy of First Impressions - You should know they're meaningless by now.
quotes.author: Timothy Correa

quotes.quote: First impressions are rarely worth preserving. Men typically fall short of our expectations.
quotes.author: Renate Linnenkoper

quotes.quote: Sometimes one creates a dynamic impression by saying something, and sometimes one creates as significant an impression by remaining silent.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: How you first meet the public is how the industry sees you. You can't argue with them. That's their perception.
quotes.author: Meryl Streep

quotes.quote: From the very first instances of perception, some things are grateful and others unwelcome to us; some things we incline to, and others we fly.
quotes.author: Locke

quotes.quote: To find out your real opinion of someone, judge the impression you have when you first see a letter from them.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: First impressions are always unreliable.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: People sometimes talk about the power of first impressions, and believe me, there is truth to it.
quotes.author: Ann Brashares

quotes.quote: Go out of your way to make an outstanding first impression.
quotes.author: Robert Cheeke

quotes.quote: The first impression of a work of art is its otherness from reality.
quotes.author: Susanne Katherina Langer

quotes.quote: First feelings are always the most natural.
quotes.author: Louis XIV

quotes.quote: I believe that first impressions are very important.
quotes.author: F. W. de Klerk

quotes.quote: First impressions matter more in basketball than in any other sport, and they can be savored only in person. Players can't hide behind pads or helmets, so we can stare at them, evaluate every move they make: running, jumping, walking, even ogling the cheerleaders. We can see every ripple and tattoo. If they're lazy, we can tell.
quotes.author: Bill Simmons

quotes.quote: We have a bad image in the world, I've got to admit. I just want people to think twice about Colombia. Don't go by the first impression.
quotes.author: Camilo Villegas

quotes.quote: Never ignore a gut feeling, but never believe that it's enough.
quotes.author: Robert Heller

quotes.quote: A first impression is a lasting impression. When we're out talking to a prospect about their business, it helps us to know what exactly it is that they do and how that affects their industry.
quotes.author: Andrew Kaplan

quotes.quote: My first impression when I made it through was 'Good, because I'm going to prove to you that I deserve to be here', because they told me that sometimes I lack confidence in my performance and sometimes I'm not as consistent as they'd like me to be.
quotes.author: Naima Adedapo

quotes.quote: The same principles which at first view lead to skepticism, pursued to a certain point, bring men back to common sense.
quotes.author: George Berkeley

quotes.quote: You only have one first chance to make one first impression that lasts a lifetime.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: Two things remain irretrievable: time and a first impression.
quotes.author: Cynthia Ozick

quotes.quote: First impressions never have a second chance.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: You only get one chance to make a good first impression, and yours may be in the hands of the receptionist.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: In difficult circumstances always act on first impressions.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: You know who makes a great first impression? Liars.
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: Each of us is full of too many wheels, screws and valves to permit us to judge one another on a first impression or by two or three external signs.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: The first impression is always the right one. I rarely change my mind upward about people.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: Sometimes people can't see past us to hear our message. We never have a second chance to leave a first impression.
quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.quote: With me it's always about first impressions.
quotes.author: Billy Zane

quotes.quote: Your initial opinion on just about anything may change over time.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: First impressions are often the truest, as we find (not unfrequently) to our cost when we have been wheedled out of them by plausible professions or actions. A man's look is the work of years, it is stamped on his countenance by the events of his whole life, nay, more, by the hand of nature, and it is not to be got rid of easily.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt

quotes.quote: You make a first impression and people never forget it. If people want to think of me as the wacky 'Juno' lady forever, I could think of worse ways to be labeled.
quotes.author: Diablo Cody

quotes.quote: It's important to make a great first impression, so make sure to hold on to your damn weave.
quotes.author: RuPaul

quotes.quote: It is sometimes difficult to get rid of first impressions.
quotes.author: Sherrilyn Kenyon

quotes.quote: The mind's impression too on every face.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: My first impression of you was something indescribably new. I stood there looking at you smiling at me.
quotes.author: Teddy Wilson

quotes.quote: You'll simply have to hope your first impression sells. So take the plunge and don't you doubt.
quotes.author: Amalgam Effect

quotes.quote: You better take advice. Never trust-first impressions.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love. That is their clumsy vanity. We women have a more subtle instinct about things.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The magic of first love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No, this trick won't work...How on earth are you ever going to explain in terms of chemistry and physics so important a biological phenomenon as first love?
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A man always remembers his first love with special tenderness, but after that he begins to bunch them
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: First love is dangerous only when it is also the last.
quotes.author: Branislav Nusic

quotes.quote: First romance, first love, is something so special to all of us, both emotionally and physically, that it touches our lives and enriches them forever.
quotes.author: Rosemary Rogers

quotes.quote: Since the first day I met you,that first glance at your eyes,the first time you told me you loved me, my life was changed forever, your love made me who I am today,your presence in my life inspires me to be better every day, I love you with all my senses.
quotes.author: Michael Hayssus

quotes.quote: The first time you fall in love, it changes your life forever, and no matter how hard you try, the feeling never goes away.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a mans last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Every man is thoroughly happy twice in his life: just after he has met his first love, and just after he has left his last one.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: First love, with its frantic haughty imagination, swings its object clear of the everyday, over the rut of living, making him all looks, silences, gestures, attitudes, a burning phrase with no context
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bowen

quotes.quote: First love is a kind of vaccination which saves a man from catching the complaint the second time.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: The way he stared at her, like a blind man seeing the light for the first time, like a mother looking into the eyes of her newborn baby, like an explorer discovering a new divinci.
quotes.author: Twilight

quotes.quote: You know the first moment you look at him or her and you felt that feeling that you've never felt before then you know you have fallen in love with just one look.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Our first and last love is self-love.
quotes.author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quotes.quote: The advantage of love at first sight is that it delays a second sight.
quotes.author: Natalie Clifford Barney

quotes.quote: No, there's nothing half so sweet in life as love's young dream.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Like an old photograph, time can make a feeling fade, but the memory of a first love never fades away.
quotes.author: Tim McGraw

quotes.quote: We only love truly once. It is the first time and succeeding passions are less uncontrolled.
quotes.author: Du Coeur

quotes.quote: We must never expect discretion in first love: it is accompanied by such excessive joy that unless the joy is allowed to overflow, it will choke you.
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: The first stab of love is like a sunset, a blaze of color ? oranges, pearly pinks, vibrant purples
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: No matter what the people say, I m gonna love you anyway. Girl, you re my first love.
quotes.author: Anthony Hamilton

quotes.quote: Italy, and the spring and first love all together should suffice to make the gloomiest person happy.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: They say that your first love never dies. You can put out the flames, but not the fire.
quotes.author: Bonnie Tyler

quotes.quote: Woman's happiness begins with her first love and ends about then
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I fall in love with you just thinking about you, remembering all the memories we've made... falling in love for the first time, our first kiss, saying our first I love you's, finding more to love about each other every day. And whenever I think about all
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Being someone's first love may be great, but to be their last is beyond perfect.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: You know the first moment you look at him/her and you felt that feeling that you've never felt before then you know you have fallen in love with just one look.
quotes.author: When You Know

quotes.quote: Every morning I still wake up and the first thing I want to do is see your face.
quotes.author: P.S. I Love You

quotes.quote: Keep feeling the need for being first. But I want you to be the first in love. I want you to be the first in moral excellence. I want you to be the first in generosity.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The future for me is already a thing of the past - You were my first love and you will be my last.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: There's no love like the first.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I am glad it cannot happen twice, the fever of first love. For it is a fever, and a burden, too, whatever the poets may say.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: He smiles at me, and I am suddenly seventeen again - the year I realize that love doesn't follow the rules, the year I understood that nothing is worth having so much as something unattainable
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: That first love. And the first one who breaks your heart. For me, they just happen to be the same person.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
quotes.author: Stendhal

quotes.quote: They say, when you meet the love of your life, time stops, and that's true. What they don't tell you is that when it starts again, it moves extra fast to catch up.
quotes.author: Big Fish

quotes.quote: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had, and no matter what happens to us in the future, everyday we are together is the greatest day of my life. I will always be yours.
quotes.author: The Notebook

quotes.quote: You had me at hello.
quotes.author: Jerry Maguire

quotes.quote: What she had realised was that love was that moment when your heart was about to burst.
quotes.author: The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo

quotes.quote: She was a smart girl; Until she fell in love.
quotes.author: Sex & The City Movie

quotes.quote: You are the answer to every prayer I've offered. You are a song, a dream, a whisper, and I don't know how I could have lived without you for as long as I have.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I've never done anything for money. My first love is things of limited commercial appeal. I could be happy doing Shakespeare for the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Karen Allen

quotes.quote: No matter how love-sick a woman is, she shouldn't take the first pill that comes.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Wait for the one you love? not the one who found you first.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: We are all very much alike when we are in our first love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: In first love, a choice is seldom and blinding.
quotes.author: Robert Lowell

quotes.quote: Love is the flower of life, and blossoms unexpectedly and without law, and must be plucked where it is found, and enjoyed for the brief hour of its duration.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Love is a madness; if thwarted it develops fast.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I have learned not to worry about love, but to honor its coming with all my heart.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: I cannot fix on the hour, or the spot, or the look, or the words, which laid the foundation. It is too long ago. I was in the middle before I knew that I had begun.
quotes.author: Fitzwilliam Darcy

quotes.quote: It is an extra dividend when you like the girl you've fallen in love with
quotes.author: Clark Gable

quotes.quote: Falling in love consists merely in uncorking the imagination and bottling the common sense.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Many people when they fall in love, look for a little haven of refuge from the world, where they can be sure of being admired when they are not admirable, and praised when they are not praiseworthy.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Birds do it, bees do it, / Even educated fleas do it, / Let's do it, let's fall in love. / The ancient Romans and Greeks did it / Even nice young men who sell antiques do it, / Let's do it, let's fall in love.
quotes.author: Cole Porter

quotes.quote: And what do all the great words come to in the end, but that?— I love you— I am at rest with you— I have come home.
quotes.author: Dorothy L. Sayers

quotes.quote: They loved each other beyond belief; She was a harlot and he was a thief.
quotes.author: Lord Lytton

quotes.quote: To see coming toward you the face that will mean an end of oneness is— far more than birth itself— the beginning of life.
quotes.author: Holly Roth

quotes.quote: I never saw so sweet a face / As that I stood before: / My heart has left its dwelling place / And can return no more.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: My heart has made its mind up / And I'm afraid it's you / Whatever you've got lined up / My heart has made its mind up / And if you can't be signed up / This year, next year will do. / My heart has made its mind up / And I'm afraid it's you.
quotes.author: Wendy Cope

quotes.quote: You were my first of everything, I love you to this day / I tried to love and move on, but with you, my heart did stay.
quotes.author: Christine Stratton

quotes.quote: Your first love isn't the first person you give your heart to―it's the first one who breaks it.
quotes.author: Lang Leav

quotes.quote: One's first love is always perfect until one meets one's second love.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Aston

quotes.quote: Every young girl tries to smother her first love in possessiveness. Oh, what tears and rejection await the girl who imbues her first delicate match with fantasies of permanence, expecting that he at this gelatinous stage will fit with her in a finished puzzle for all the days.
quotes.author: Gail Sheehy

quotes.quote: I think a lot of people still fantasize about that first love and what might happen if they rekindled the relationship.
quotes.author: Sophie Kinsella

quotes.quote: First loves are often terrible, probably because they are first and there is no conscious history into which they may be absorbed.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: A young man loves the first woman who flatters him.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: You remember your first love because they show you, prove to you, that you can love and be loved, that nothing in this world is deserved except for love, that love is both how you become a person and why.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: The first stab of love is like a sunset, a blaze of color -- oranges, pearly pinks, vibrant purples.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: Before we belonged to anyone else, we were each others'.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Noble

quotes.quote: My heart no longer felt as if it belonged to me. It now felt as it had been stolen, torn from my chest by someone who wanted no part of it.
quotes.author: Meredith Taylor

quotes.quote: I love you. I can't remember when I fell in love with you but very naturally, I had fallen in love with you before I knew it. The first time I met you, you were a strong and kind boy. You always protected me.
quotes.author: Makoto Shinkai

quotes.quote: I think, I first fell in love / when I was in fifth grade / with this boy who kept his glass ruler in the sunlight / and made rainbows on my desk with it.
quotes.author: Saiber

quotes.quote: There is something extraordinary about the first time falling.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: My first love, I'll never forget, and it’s such a big part of who I am, and in so many ways, we could never be together, but that doesn't mean that it’s not forever. Because it is forever.
quotes.author: Rashida Jones

quotes.quote: The first time anything happens to you - your first love, your first success - the second one is never the same.
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: You can remember the second and the third and the fourth time, but there's no time like the first. It's always there.
quotes.author: Shelagh Delaney

quotes.quote: The first time you do a thing is always exciting.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: To wake for the first time in a new place can be like another birth.
quotes.author: Rumer Godden

quotes.quote: First time it's a stranger. Second time its just a coincidence. Third time it's a tail.
quotes.author: Ally Carter

quotes.quote: The first time you make something, follow the recipe, then figure out how to tailor it to your own tastes.
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.quote: The first time you say something, it's heard. The second time, it's recognized, and the third time it's learned.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The first time you quit, it's hard. The second time, it gets easier. The third time, you don't even have to think about it.
quotes.author: Bear Bryant

quotes.quote: The first time you see something that you have never seen before, you almost always know right away if you should eat it or run away from it.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: When someone shows you who they are, believe them the first time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: For the first time in the history of mankind, one generation literally has the power to destroy the past, the present and the future, the power to bring time to an end.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: When you have your heart broken for the first time, you gain depth.
quotes.author: Sienna Miller

quotes.quote: If you are seeing something for the first time, one of your first reactions should be fascination.
quotes.author: Sushant Singh Rajput

quotes.quote: I think the first time you try anything in a public way, you feel really exposed.
quotes.author: Amy Grant

quotes.quote: From the first time someone says, Who do you think you are? we learn how to repress.
quotes.author: Lauryn Hill

quotes.quote: For the first time, the object of what I want is more important than fulfilling my desires.
quotes.author: Abbi Glines

quotes.quote: When you meet someone for the first time, that's not the whole book. That's just the first page.
quotes.author: Brody Armstrong

quotes.quote: The first time you are reconciled to the terrible unfairness of disappointment, you are getting old.
quotes.author: Mary Lee Settle

quotes.quote: For the very first time the young are seeing history being made before it is censored by their elders.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Once you tell your first lie, the first time you lie for him, you are in it with him, and then you are lost.
quotes.author: Anita Shreve

quotes.quote: Every time feels like my first time. And I just find that the process of it feeds into one's own self-obsession.
quotes.author: Ben Harper

quotes.quote: You never get another first time. I just remember being excited and that feeling of "Wow my dream is really coming true".
quotes.author: Brooke Valentine

quotes.quote: For the first time in my life I've done something for me and by choice and not because somebody told me it was good or bad.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: If you do something for the first time, you will always remember it. If your Dad has something to do with it, you write about it.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: It was the first time she'd discovered something she really didn't want to find, and she didn't know what to do once she'd found it.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: For the first time I realized adults could back themselves into corners so remote that love, or its memory, could no longer reach them.
quotes.author: Kirby Wright

quotes.quote: The first time you meet someone, the conversation is sort of on life support. You're just trying to live another moment in the life of the conversation.
quotes.author: Sam Yagan

quotes.quote: The first time you buy a house you see how pretty the paint is and buy it. The second time you look to see if the basement has termites. It's the same with men.
quotes.author: Lupe Velez

quotes.quote: The first time you meet someone, they're a new acquaintance, the second time you have a bit of an understanding, and the third time you meet them, you're old hats.
quotes.author: Kathryn Minshew

quotes.quote: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship.
quotes.author: Kennedy Onassis

quotes.quote: The first time I saw her, everything in my head went quiet.
quotes.author: Neil Hilborn

quotes.quote: The first time you blow someone away is not an insignificant event.
quotes.author: James Mattis

quotes.quote: For the first time in my life, I'm proud of myself.
quotes.author: Mary J. Blige

quotes.quote: For the first time, the weird and the stupid and the coarse are becoming our cultural norms, even our cultural ideal.
quotes.author: Carl Bernstein

quotes.quote: For the first time in our history it is possible to conquer poverty.
quotes.author: Ned Vizzini

quotes.quote: It was the first time I'd ever felt truly jealous of anyone else in my entire life.
quotes.author: Stephenie Meyer

quotes.quote: The first time a student realizes that a little learning is a dangerous thing is when he brings home a poor report card.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The first time with artistic endeavors is, if it's working, it was your idea, and if it's not, it's somebody else's idea.
quotes.author: Tom T. Hall

quotes.quote: For the first time since her return, she felt pain, a violent pain, but it made her feel alive, because it was worth feeling.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: If you're entering a room for the first time, do it the way you would in life - look around; see how they have the furniture arranged. If your character is meeting another character for the first time, meet them the way you would in life.
quotes.author: Charles Nelson Reilly

quotes.quote: When you're a guy and meet a girl the first time, you do whatever it takes.
quotes.author: David Copperfield

quotes.quote: Fish is the only food that is considered spoiled once it smells like what it is.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Remember folks, fish are like relatives. After two days, they stink.
quotes.author: Bobby Heenan

quotes.quote: Give me a fish and I eat for a day. Teach me to fish and I eat for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverbs

quotes.quote: No good fish goes anywhere without a porpoise.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: A little bait catches a large fish.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: The biggest fish he ever caught were those that got away.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: Fish in another man's pond and you will catch crabs.
quotes.author: Habeeb Akande

quotes.quote: Net the large fish and you are sure to have the small fry.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: In a shared fish, there are no bones.
quotes.author: Democritus

quotes.quote: He that would fish, must venture his bait.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The best way to observe a fish is to become a fish.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: The fish who keeps on swimming is the first to chill upstream.
quotes.author: Nick Hexum

quotes.quote: Dont give a child a fish but show him how to fish.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Fish, to taste right, must swim three times - in water, in butter, and in wine.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A fish may love a bird, but where would they live?
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: If the fish had not opened its mouth, it would not have been caught.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: A fish is more valuable swimming in the sea maintaining the integrity of oceanic eco-systems than it is on anyone's plate.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: The fish once caught, new bait will hardly bite.
quotes.author: Edmund Spenser

quotes.quote: It's okay to eat fish because they don't have any feelings.
quotes.author: Kurt Cobain

quotes.quote: Fish always stinks from the head downwards.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Only dead fish go with the flow.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you want to be a different fish, jump out of school.
quotes.author: Don Van Vliet

quotes.quote: Fish die belly upward, and rise to the surface. Its their way of falling.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: Even a fish could stay out of trouble if it would just learn to keep its mouth shut.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't bargain for fish which are still in the water.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: When you bait the hook with your heart, the fish always bite.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: Venture a small fish to catch a great one.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: It is better to be a big fish in a small pond than a small fish in a mighty ocean.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Remember, a dead fish can float down stream, but it takes a live one to swim upstream.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Bait the hook well. This fish will bite.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A fish has no concept of water.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: There are plenty of fish in the sea.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: Empty the pond to get the fish.
quotes.author: Robert Bresson

quotes.quote: The fish in the water that is thirsty needs serious professional counseling.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: The last thing a fish would ever notice would be water
quotes.author: Ralph Linton

quotes.quote: Never leave fish to find fish.
quotes.author: Moses

quotes.quote: If you want to catch more fish, use more hooks.
quotes.author: George Allen Sr

quotes.quote: It's no fish ye're buying, it's men's lives.
quotes.author: Walter Scott

quotes.quote: There are fish in the sea better than have ever been caught.
quotes.author: Irish Sayings

quotes.quote: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day; teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Maimonides

quotes.quote: Fish recognize a bad leader.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Fishing is much more than fish. It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Everybody is a genius. But if you judge a fish by its ability to climb a tree, it will live its whole life believing that it is stupid.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Knowledge does not keep any better than fish.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: Throw a lucky man into the sea, and he will come up with a fish in his mouth.
quotes.author: Arabic Proverbs

quotes.quote: Guests, like fish, begin to smell after three days.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: He missed you like a fish in a bowl misses the open sea.
quotes.author: Catherynne M. Valente

quotes.quote: The tiny fish enjoy themselves in the sea.
quotes.author: D.H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: If you give a person a fish, they'll fish for a day. But if you train a person to fish, they'll fish for a lifetime.
quotes.author: Dan Quayle

quotes.quote: One fish. Two fish. Red fish. Blue fish. Black fish. Blue fish. Old fish. New fish. This one has a little star. This one has a little car. Say! What a lot of fish there are.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: The one thing that a fish can never find is water; and the one thing that man can never find is God.
quotes.author: Eric Butterworth

quotes.quote: A great lie is like a great fish on dry land; it may fret and fling and make a frightful bother, but it cannot hurt you. You have only to keep still, and it will die of itself.
quotes.author: George Crabbe

quotes.quote: A woman without a man is like a fish without a bicycle.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Fishing is great discipline in the equality of men - because All men are equal before fish.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Only when the last tree has died and the last river has been poisoned and the last fish been caught will we realize that we cannot eat money.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
quotes.author: Jim Hightower

quotes.quote: No human being, however great, or powerful, was ever so free as a fish.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and a smelly fish.
quotes.author: Jose Rizal

quotes.quote: Life is a big sea full of many fish. I let down my nets and pulled. I'm still pulling.
quotes.author: Langston Hughes

quotes.quote: If you believe in your heart that you are right, then you must fight with all your might to do it your way. Only dead fish swim with the stream all the time.
quotes.author: Linda Ellerbee

quotes.quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Love is the net where hearts are caught like fish.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Always have your hook baited, in the pool where least think it, there will be a fish.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: I want to get out in the water. I want to see fish, real fish, not fish in a laboratory.
quotes.author: Sylvia Earle

quotes.quote: At high tide the fish eat ants; at low tide the ants eat fish.
quotes.author: Thai Proverb

quotes.quote: Fish should smell like the ocean. If they smell like fish, it's too late.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The fish only knows that it lives in the water, after it is already on the river bank. Without our awareness of another world out there, it would never occur to us to change.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Shakespearean fish swam the sea, far away from land; Romantic fish swam in nets coming to the hand.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Fishes live in the sea, as men do a-land; the great ones eat up the little ones.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I know the joy of fishes in the river through my own joy, as I go walking along the same river.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: The fish in the deep water do not know how the fish by the river's edge feel.
quotes.author: G. Llewellyn Watson

quotes.quote: Fish is brain food. People who eat fish have large, well-developed brains. Peopl with large, well-developed brain don't fish.
quotes.author: Macr Anello

quotes.quote: A little fish in a big pond has plenty of room to swim.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: A fish won't do anything, but swim in a brook.
quotes.author: Johnny Burke

quotes.quote: The great fish eat the small.
quotes.author: Alexander Barclay

quotes.quote: The fish is the star of the plate.
quotes.author: Eric Ripert

quotes.quote: Every fish in the ocean is in danger.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: Fish are not the best authority on water.
quotes.author: Jane Yolen

quotes.quote: Fish without wine is like egg without salt.
quotes.author: Auguste Escoffier

quotes.quote: The fun of fishing is catching 'em, not killing 'em.
quotes.author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quotes.quote: If your concentration is getting bad, take up bass fishing. It will really improve your ability to focus. If you aren't ready when that fish hits, you can't set the hook.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: Calling fishing a hobby is like calling brain surgery a job.__
quotes.author: Paul Schullery

quotes.quote: Many men go fishing all of their lives without knowing that it is not fish they are after.__
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Most of the world is covered by water. A fisherman's job is simple: Pick out the best parts.
quotes.author: Charles Waterman

quotes.quote: My Biggest worry is that when I'm dead and gone, my wife will sell my fishing gear for what I said I paid for it.
quotes.author: Koos Brandt

quotes.quote: I fish because I love to . . . because I love the environs where trout are found . . . because I suspect that men are going along this way for the last time, and I for one don't want to waste the trip . . . and, finally, not because I regard fishing as being so terribly important but because I suspect that so many of the other concerns of men are equally unimportant and not nearly so much fun.
quotes.author: Robert Traver

quotes.quote: Some go to church and think about fishing, others go fishing and think about God.
quotes.author: Tony Blake

quotes.quote: I went fishing, and I caught a minnow. If you think that's tiny, you should see the bait I was using. What micro fish could resist my love?
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Don't worry, he said, that grandfatherly smile spreading across his face once more, 'I've been fishing for over forty years._ You've got plenty of time to catch up, maybe even pass what I've done._ You're a perspicacious piscatorial pursuer, and I'm sure you'll catch the big ones.'
quotes.author: S. Bradley Stoner

quotes.quote: There are two types of fisherman - those who fish for sport and those who fish for fish.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There is certainly something in angling that tends to produce a serenity of the mind.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: I love fishing._ You put that line in the water and you don't know what's on the other end._ Your imagination is under there._
quotes.author: Robert Altman

quotes.quote: The charm of fishing is that it is the pursuit of what is elusive but attainable, a perpetual series of occasions for hope.
quotes.author: John Buchan

quotes.quote: Fishing is much more than fish._ It is the great occasion when we may return to the fine simplicity of our forefathers.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a fish bigger than almost being caught._
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Be patient and calm - for no one can catch fish in anger.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: If I fished only to capture fish, my fishing trips would have ended long ago.
quotes.author: Zane Grey

quotes.quote: There are always new places to go fishing. For any fisherman, there's always a new place, always a new horizon.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Fishing provides that connection with the whole living world. It gives you the opportunity of being totally immersed, turning back into yourself in a good way. A form of meditation, some form of communion with levels of yourself that are deeper than the ordinary self.
quotes.author: Ted Hughes

quotes.quote: Bragging may not bring happiness, but no man having caught a large fish goes home through an alley.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Scholars have long known that fishing eventually turns men into philosophers._ Unfortunately, it is almost impossible to buy decent tackle on a philosopher's salary.
quotes.author: Patrick McManus

quotes.quote: I've gone fishing thousands of times in my life, and I have never once felt unlucky or poorly paid for those hours on the water.
quotes.author: William Tapply

quotes.quote: In every species of fish I've angled for, it is the ones that have got away that thrill me the most, the ones that keep fresh in my memory._ So I say it is good to lose fish._ If we didn't, much of the thrill of angling would be gone.
quotes.author: Ray Bergman

quotes.quote: A trout is a moment of beauty known only to those who seek it.
quotes.author: Arnold Gingrich

quotes.quote: One thing becomes clearer as one gets older and one's fishing experience increases, and that is the paramount importance of one's fishing companions.
quotes.author: John Ashley-Cooper

quotes.quote: The great charm of fly-fishing is that we are always learning.
quotes.author: Theodore Gordon

quotes.quote: Most fishermen swiftly learn that it's a pretty good rule never to show a favorite spot to any fisherman you wouldn't trust with your wife
quotes.author: John Voelker

quotes.quote: More than half the intense enjoyment of fly-fishing is derived from the beautiful surroundings, the satisfaction felt from being in the open air, the new lease of life secured thereby, and the many, many pleasant recollections of all one has seen, heard and done.
quotes.author: Charles F. Orvis

quotes.quote: Fishing is not an escape from life, but often a deeper immersion into it...
quotes.author: Harry Middleton

quotes.quote: In the best stories about fly fishing ... big fish are caught or lost; people say wild and spontaneous words; event becomes memory and sometimes, in the hands of a master, bleeds into art.
quotes.author: Nick Lyons

quotes.quote: There will be days when the fishing is better than one's most optimistic forecast, others when it is far worse. Either is a gain over just staying home.
quotes.author: Roderick Haig-Brown

quotes.quote: A fishing rod is a stick with a hook at one end and a fool at the other.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The agony and the ecstasy is a six-year-old boy trying to go to sleep, knowing he's going fishing in the morning.
quotes.author: Frank P. Baron

quotes.quote: Opportunity is ever worth expecting; let our hood be ever hanging ready. The fish will be in the pool where you least imagine it to be.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Quite possibly this is the key to fishing: the ability to see glamour in whatever species one may fish for.
quotes.author: Harold F. Blaisdell

quotes.quote: Those who fish get to know and understand a river in a way few others can.
quotes.author: W.D. Wetherell

quotes.quote: All earth is full of happy things when the angler goes a-trolling!
quotes.author: Thomas Tod Stoddart

quotes.quote: Perhaps all you can say is that there are great lapses or discrepancies in time; that and the simple if inexplicable fact that some people have fishing in their hearts.
quotes.author: Russell Chatham

quotes.quote: Fishing, with me, has always been an excuse to drink in the daytime.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: The wildness and adventure that are in fishing still recommend it to me.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Fishing is marvelous... there is the irresistible urge to tangle with the mysterious and unknown, to rely on intuition and hunches.
quotes.author: Katharine Weber

quotes.quote: A boy and his dad on a fishing trip— / there is a glorious fellowship!
quotes.author: Edgar A. Guest

quotes.quote: There is nothing like the thrill of expectation over the first cast in unfamiliar waters. Fishing is like gambling, in that failure only excites hope of a fortunate throw next time.
quotes.author: Charles Dudley Warner

quotes.quote: If you ever wondered why fishing is probably the most popular sport in this country, watch that boy beside the brook and you will learn. If you are really perceptive you will. For he already knows that fishing is only one part fish.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: The fishermen know that the sea is dangerous and the storm terrible, but they have never found these dangers sufficient reason for remaining ashore.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: When we fish, we are awake. We are attuned to the environment, to the world, to the reverence and wonder of life.
quotes.author: Dan Baughman

quotes.quote: Fishing is fundamentally a game of chance, and at heart we are all gamblers.
quotes.author: Dorothy Noyes Arms

quotes.quote: Ours is the grandest sport. It is an intriguing battle of wits between an angler and a trout; and in addition to appreciating the tradition and grace of the game, we play it in the magnificent out-of-doors.
quotes.author: Ernest G. Schwiebert Jr.

quotes.quote: He catches the best fish who angles with a golden hook.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: He who wants to catch fish must not mind getting wet.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: No fishing like fishing in the sea.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: The fishing is good in troubled waters.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: I love fishing. It's like transcendental meditation with a punch-line.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: If fishing is a religion, fly fishing is high church.
quotes.author: Tom Brokaw

quotes.quote: Fishing is unquestionably a form of madness but, happily, for the once-bitten there is no cure.
quotes.author: Lord Home

quotes.quote: It is to be observed that 'angling' is the name given to fishing by people who can't fish.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: It has always been my private conviction that any man who pits his intelligence against a fish and loses has it coming.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Fly fishing is to fishing as ballet is to walking.
quotes.author: Howell Raines

quotes.quote: I still don't know why I fish or why other men fish, except that we like it and it makes us think and feel.
quotes.author: Roderick L. Haig-Brown

quotes.quote: You will search far to find a fisherman to admit that a taste for fishing, like a taste for liquor, must be governed lest it come to possess its possessor.
quotes.author: Sparse Grey Hackle

quotes.quote: Enjoy thy stream, O harmless fish; / And when an angler for his dish, / Through gluttony's vile sin, / Attempts, the wretch, to pull thee out, / God give thee strength, O gentle trout, / To pull the rascal in!
quotes.author: John Wolcot

quotes.quote: If people concentrated on the really important things in life, there'd be a shortage of fishing poles.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: There is a fine line between fishing and just standing on the shore like an idiot.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If fishing is interfering with your business, give up your business.
quotes.author: Sparse Grey Hackle

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter if the rod is or isn't bent. Time spent fishing is time well spent.
quotes.author: Justin Morgan

quotes.quote: I got 99 problems and fishin' solves all of 'em.
quotes.author: Earl Dibbles Jr.

quotes.quote: There is no greater fan of fly fishing than the worm.
quotes.author: Patrick F. McManus

quotes.quote: Woke up this morning / Wanting to cry / Then I remember / Yes I know why / She's a real good one for having her cake / I'm gonna go fishing or jump in the lake / Yeah, I'm gonna go fishing / That's what I'll do / Think about nothing / Not even you / Catch a real big one, a big speckled trout / Snapping in the water I'll pull him on out
quotes.author: Lee Ellington

quotes.quote: There's a piping wind from a sunrise shore / Blowing over a silver sea, / There's a joyous voice in the lapsing tide / That calls enticingly; / The mist of dawn has taken flight / To the dim horizon's bound, / And with wide sails set and eager / hearts / We're off to the fishing ground.
quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

quotes.quote: I'm going fishing / Where the catfish bite / I'm going fishing / We can stay all night / I'm going fishing / And I ain't coming back.
quotes.author: James Reyne

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Exercise to stimulate, not to annihilate. The world wasn't formed in a day, and neither were we. Set small goals and build upon them.
quotes.author: Lee Haney

quotes.quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.quote: If we could give every individual the right amount of nourishment and exercise, not too little and not too much, we would have found the safest way to health.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Fitness needs to be perceived as fun and games or we subconsciously avoid it.
quotes.author: Alan Thicke

quotes.quote: It's easier to stay in shape if you never let yourself get out of shape in the first place.
quotes.author: Bill Loguidice

quotes.quote: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.author: Bill Loguidice

quotes.quote: Every time you work out you strengthen your body. Every time you don't you weaken it.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Getting more exercise isn't only good for your waistline. It's a natural anti-depressant, that leaves you in a great mood.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Fitness is like marriage. You can't cheat on it and expect it to work.
quotes.author: Bonnie Pfiester

quotes.quote: The only real insurance you have against disease is a healthy body. Invest wisely, generously and often in that policy.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: Do yourself a favor, and realize that there's no technique in the world that will save you. There are no pills, no secrets, no passwords on the path to greatness. You've got to embrace the pain, push the threshold, and feel the suck, and then you've got to muster the courage to go back six times a week.
quotes.author: Jon Gilson

quotes.quote: A man's health can be judged by which he takes two at a time pills or stairs.
quotes.author: Joan Welsh

quotes.quote: Living a healthy lifestyle will only deprive you of poor health, lethargy, and fat.
quotes.author: Jill Johnson

quotes.quote: If you don't do what's best for your body, you're the one who comes up on the short end.
quotes.author: Julius Erving

quotes.quote: To keep the body in good health is a duty - otherwise we shall not be able to keep our mind strong and clear.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Those who think they have not time for bodily exercise will sooner or later have to find time for illness.
quotes.author: Edward Stanley

quotes.quote: The higher your energy level, the more efficient your body. The more efficient your body, the better you feel and the more you will use your talent to produce outstanding results.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: When it comes to eating right and exercising, there is no I'll start tomorrow. Tomorrow is disease.
quotes.author: V.L. Allinear

quotes.quote: Lack of activity destroys the good condition of every human being, while movement and methodical physical exercise save it and preserve it.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Movement is a medicine for creating change in a person's physical, emotional, and mental states.
quotes.author: Carol Welch

quotes.quote: It is exercise alone that supports the spirits, and keeps the mind in vigor.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: Aerobics: a series of strenuous exercises which help convert fats, sugars, and starches into aches, pains, and cramps.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man too busy to take care of his health is like a mechanic too busy to take care of his tools.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Warning: Before beginning an program of physical inactivity, consult your doctor. Sedentary living is abnormal and dangerous to your health.
quotes.author: Frank Forencich

quotes.quote: Fit is not a destination, it is a way of life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If a man achieves victory over this body, who in the world can exercise power over him? He who rules himself rules over the whole world.
quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

quotes.quote: You can feel sore tomorrow or you can feel sorry tomorrow. You choose.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A vigorous five-mile walk will do more good for an unhappy but otherwise healthy adult than all the medicine and psychology in the world.
quotes.author: Paul Dudley White

quotes.quote: Never let hope die when pursuing worthy goals, such as improved character, health, fitness or weight loss.
quotes.author: Bob Weinstein

quotes.quote: The best way to keep healthy is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Health is something that makes you feel it's a fine day when it isn't.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Youth thinks nothing of health, and age thinks of nothing but.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Your health depends more on the number of years that have passed over your head than on the number of colds that have passed through it.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The picture of health requires a happy frame of mind.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Money cannot buy health, but I'd settle for a diamond-studded wheelchair.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: I have to exercise in the morning before my brain figures out what I'm doing.
quotes.author: Marshe Doble

quotes.quote: A man's health can be judged by which he takes two at a time-pills or stairs.
quotes.author: Joan Welsh

quotes.quote: I did not become a vegetarian for my health. I did it for the health of the chickens.
quotes.author: Isaac Bashevis Singer

quotes.quote: Without health no pleasure can be tasted by man.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: I really believe the only way to stay healthy is to eat properly, get your rest and exercise.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative activity.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I believe that the best buy in public health today must be a combination of regular physical exercise and a healthy diet.
quotes.author: Julie Bishop
