quotes.quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus

quotes.quote: I think exercise tests us in so many ways, our skills, our hearts, our ability to bounce back after setbacks.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: Exercise should be regarded as tribute to the heart.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: When we life weights, exercise, or physically exert ourselves, we may become uncomfortable in some way, but that is how we grow our muscles to improve.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: To get in better shape, we need to build on what we've already done.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Don't go to the gym for the hell of it. Go for the health of it.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: A good exercise for the heart is to bend down and help another up.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: By adopting a healthy lifestyle, one can experience a sense of freedom from addictions of various sorts.
quotes.author: Hiawatha Cromer

quotes.quote: Chronic lack of exercise adds to the grotesque features of bodies deprived of the enzymes that are found only in raw foods.
quotes.author: Hiawatha Cromer

quotes.quote: My own prescription for health is less paperwork and more running barefoot through the grass.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Poor health is not caused by something you don't have; it's caused by disturbing something that you already have.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: People who are always taking care of their health are like misers who are hoarding a treasure which they have never spirit enough to enjoy.
quotes.author: Laurence Sterne

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: You need to eat normally and healthfully , and you need to exercise. I'm so passionate about this because I think people spend their lives not happy in their bodies.
quotes.author: Courtney Thorne Smith

quotes.quote: It's not about weight, it's about fitness, and one component of being fit is to have relatively low body fat, because fat is not very efficient, whereas muscle is.
quotes.author: Deborah Bull

quotes.quote: I concentrate on exercises from the waist down, since that is the laziest part of a woman's body.
quotes.author: Tina Louise

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Your health account, your bank account, they're the same thing. The more you put in, the more you can take out. Exercise is king and nutrition is queen. Together you have a kingdom.
quotes.author: Jack Lalanne

quotes.quote: We are the custodians of our bodies. We must take action to employ healthy lifestyle habits to prevent, reduce, and/or manage disease and illness.
quotes.author: Bridgette L. Collins

quotes.quote: To enjoy the glow of good health, you must exercise.
quotes.author: Gene Tunney

quotes.quote: Biceps are like ornaments on a Christmas tree.
quotes.author: Ed Coan

quotes.quote: I know that if I set my mind to something, even if people are saying I can't do it, I will achieve it.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: You're going to have to let it hurt. Let it suck. The harder you work, the better you will look. Your appearance isn't parallel to how heavy you lift, it's parallel to how hard you work.
quotes.author: Joe Manganiello

quotes.quote: Eating healthy nutritious food is the simple and right solution to get rid of excess body weight effortlessly and become slim and healthy forever.
quotes.author: Subodh Gupta

quotes.quote: I don't do this to be healthy, I do this to get big muscles.
quotes.author: Markus Ruhl

quotes.quote: In training, you listen to your body. In competition, you tell your body to shut up.
quotes.author: Rich Froning Jr.

quotes.quote: The best activities for your health are pumping and humping.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: May I have more please? May I have more pain? May I have more torture? Because I know this shit is gonna make me grow!
quotes.author: CT Fletcher

quotes.quote: There's more to life than training, but training is what puts more in your life.
quotes.author: Brooks Kubik

quotes.quote: As your training moves from base training to more intense work, to tapering, your nutrition needs to change.
quotes.author: Charlotte Campbell

quotes.quote: I'm not sold on one diet philosophy. I'm sold on whatever will work for you.
quotes.author: Dave Tate

quotes.quote: Physical fitness is not only one of the most important keys to a healthy body, it is the basis of dynamic and creative intellectual activity.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The purpose of training is to tighten up the slack, toughen the body, and polish the spirit.
quotes.author: Morihei Ueshiba

quotes.quote: If a man achieves victory over this body, who in the world can exercise power over him? He who rules himself rules over the whole world.
quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

quotes.quote: When working out, length is not a substitute for intensity.
quotes.author: Bill Loguidice

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as over training, just under nutrition and under sleeping.
quotes.author: The Barbarian brothers

quotes.quote: Life is one big gym where we need to constantly workout to stay fit for this world. And indeed love here is the treadmill.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Weight loss doesn't begin in the gym with a dumb bell; it starts in your head with a decision.
quotes.author: Toni Sorenson

quotes.quote: A fit, healthy bodyâ€”that is the best fashion statement.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Success isn't given. It's earned. In the kitchen, in the gym, in the workout, all day. With blood, sweat, and the occasional tear.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: There's no secret formula. I lift heavy, work hard, and aim to be the best.
quotes.author: Ronnie Coleman

quotes.quote: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Jim Ryan

quotes.quote: If you ever lack the motivation to train then think what happens to your mind and body when you don't.
quotes.author: Shifu Yan Lei

quotes.quote: Squat like Channing Tatum is watching.
quotes.author: Erin Weiss

quotes.quote: Fitness is not 30% gym and 70% diet. It's 100% dedication to the gym and your diet!
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.quote: A feeble body weakens the mind.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: It's easier to stay in shape if you never let yourself get out of shape in the first place.
quotes.author: Bill Loguidice

quotes.quote: You shall gain, but you shall pay with sweat, blood, and vomit.
quotes.author: Pavel Tsatsouline

quotes.quote: Exercise is done against one's wishes and maintained only because the alternative is worse.
quotes.author: George A. Sheehan

quotes.quote: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths. When you go through hardships and decide not to surrender, that is strength.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Bodybuilding is much like any other sport. To be successful, you must dedicate yourself 100% to your training, diet and mental approach.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Before you worry about the beauty of your body, worry about the health of your body.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Fitness is not about being better than someone else. It's about being better than you used to be.
quotes.author: Greg Plitt

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If a man tells you he doesn't lift because he doesn't want to get too bulky, then his testicles have been removed.
quotes.author: Paul Carter

quotes.quote: True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
quotes.author: Wilhelm Von Humboldt

quotes.quote: The last three or four reps is what makes the muscle grow. This area of pain divides the champion from someone else who is not a champion.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Stay hungry, stay healthy, be a gentleman, believe strongly in yourself and go beyond limitations.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Today it hurts. Tomorrow it works.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sell yourself short on nutrition and you're selling yourself short on maximizing your physique development.
quotes.author: Ernie Taylor

quotes.quote: Diet food is not a meal its a medicine.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: You have to push past your perceived limits, push past that point you thought was as far as you can go.
quotes.author: Drew Brees

quotes.quote: I'm not in the best shape, but I want to prove to myself I can do something that seems insurmountable and inspire others by showing them no matter where they are in their fitness goals, they can do it, too.
quotes.author: Ruben Studdard

quotes.quote: There are no shortcutsâ€”everything is reps, reps, reps.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: I don't believe in bodybuilders using steroids. If a man doesn't have enough male hormones in his system to create, a nice hard, muscular body, he should take up ping pong.
quotes.author: Steve Reeves

quotes.quote: Pain plants the flag of truth within a rebel fortress.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: People who enjoy waving flags don't deserve to have one.
quotes.author: Banksy

quotes.quote: The man who is always waving the flag usually waives what it stands for.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: There is no flag large enough to cover the shame of killing innocent people.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: If you're passionate about something, then you should pick up your flag and run with it.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: A thoughtful mind, when it sees a Nation's flag, sees not the flag only, but the Nation itself.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: We have but one flag, one country; let us stand together. We may differ in color, but not in sentiment. Many things have been said about me which are wrong, and which white and black persons here, who stood by me through the war, can contradict.
quotes.author: Nathan Bedford Forrest

quotes.quote: We are far more concerned about the desecration of the flag than we are about the desecration of our land.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: Not another flag has such an errand, carrying everywhere, the world around, such hope for freedom such glorious tidings.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Flags are bits of colored cloth that governments use first to shrink-wrap people’s minds & then as ceremonial shrouds to bury the dead.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: The man who tries to make the flag an object of a single party is a greater traitor to that flag than any man who fires at it.
quotes.author: David Lloyd George

quotes.quote: We do not consecrate the flag by punishing its desecration, for in doing so, we dilute the freedom this cherished emblem represents.
quotes.author: William J. Brennan

quotes.quote: Our flag is a proud flag, and it stands for liberty and civilization. Where it has once floated, there must be no return to tyranny.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A regime that wraps itself in the flag of truth fears truth most of all, for if its story is falsified to the slightest degree, its authority is gone.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: If the flag needs protection at all, it needs protection from members of Congress who value the symbol more than the freedoms that the flag represents.
quotes.author: Jerrold Nadler

quotes.quote: In uniform patriotism can salute one flag only, embrace but the first circle of life—one's own land and tribe. In war that is necessary, in peace it is not enough.
quotes.author: BILL MOYERS

quotes.quote: Unquestionably we do stand by our national flag as stoutly as any people in the world; and I myself have felt the heart-throb at sight of it, as sensibly as other men
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Nowhere else in history has there ever been a flag that stands for the right to burn itself. This is the fractal of our flag. It stands for the right to destroy itself.
quotes.author: Ken Kesey

quotes.quote: The flag is the embodiment, not of sentiment, but of history.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Only one flag Flies above all the rest:The flag of universal oneness.
quotes.author: Sri Chinmoy

quotes.quote: Plant your flag, respectfully stand for truth, justice, and freedom for all.
quotes.author: LM Fields

quotes.quote: A flag doesn't cause someone to sit in a prayer meeting for an hour, and then stand up and shoot people.
quotes.author: Rich Lowry

quotes.quote: Our flag is not just one of many political points of view. Rather, the flag is a symbol of our national unity.
quotes.author: Adrian Cronauer

quotes.quote: Flag desecration is not a constitutional issue for the courts. It is a political one that belongs to the people.
quotes.author: Larry Craig

quotes.quote: Anyone who says the Confederate Flag is a symbol of hate should be required to go to sensitivity training classes.
quotes.author: Ezola B. Foster

quotes.quote: I feel these days like a very large flamingo. No matter what way I turn, there is always a very large bill.
quotes.author: Joseph O'Connor

quotes.quote: The reason birds can fly and we can't is simply because they have perfect faith, for to have faith is to have wings.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The bird of paradise alights only upon the hand that does not grasp.
quotes.author: John Berry

quotes.quote: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: It is not only fine feathers that make fine birds.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: God loved the birds and invented trees. Man loved the birds and invented cages.
quotes.author: Jacques Deval

quotes.quote: No one is free, even the birds are chained to the sky.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: Faith without works is like a bird without wings; though she may hop with her companions on earth, yet she will never fly with them to heaven.
quotes.author: Francis Beaumont

quotes.quote: Be grateful for luck. Pay the thunder no mind - listen to the birds. And don't hate nobody.
quotes.author: Eubie Blake

quotes.quote: A flock of flirting flamingos is pure, passionate, pink pandemonium-a frenetic flamingle-mangle-a discordant discotheque of delirious dancing, flamboyant feathers, and flamingo lingo.
quotes.author: Charley Harper

quotes.quote: The bird is powered by its own life and by its motivation.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: No bird soars too high if he soars with his own wings.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light And sings when the dawn is still dark.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Be as a bird perched on a frail branch that she feels bending beneath her, still she sings away all the same, knowing she has wings.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: We're not flamingo nuts, but we are flamingo crazy.
quotes.author: Marian Woods

quotes.quote: Be a Flamingo in a flock of Pigeons.
quotes.author: Savannah Larsen

quotes.quote: You cannot make yourself have a flashback, nor will you have one unless you are emotionally ready to remember something. Once remembered, the memory can help you to face more of the truth. You can then express your pent-up feelings about the memory and continue on your path to recovery. Think of the flashback as a clue to the next piece of work. No matter how painful, try to view it as a positive indication that you are now ready and willing to remember.
quotes.author: Beverly Engel

quotes.quote: The inability to get something out of your head is a signal that shouts, “Don’t forget to deal with this!” As long as you experience fear or pain with a memory or flashback, there is a lie attached that needs to be confronted. In each healing step, there is a truth to be gathered and a lie to discard.
quotes.author: Christina Enevoldsen

quotes.quote: The advantage of a bad memory is that one enjoys several times the same good things for the first time.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Memory is more indelible than ink.
quotes.author: Anita Loos

quotes.quote: By having good memories on every place you just visit, you are building paradise in your own heart and your life.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: We do not know the true value of our moments until they have undergone the test of memory.
quotes.author: Georges Duhamel

quotes.quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: The brief flashbacks are sun-kissed, summery and optimistic. It's the only place in the movie you will see red, yellow, orange, or any vibrant colors.
quotes.author: Steven Soderbergh

quotes.quote: Flashback in film rarely works.
quotes.author: Susan Hill

quotes.quote: The Greek word for "return" is nostos. Algos means "suffering." So nostalgia is the suffering caused by an unappeased yearning to return.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: Remembrance of things past is not necessarily the remembrance of things as they were.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: God gave us memory so that we might have roses in December.
quotes.author: James M. Barrie

quotes.quote: The price of a memory, is the memory of the sorrow it brings.
quotes.author: Pittacus Lore

quotes.quote: Every man's memory is his private literature.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.quote: Memory believes before knowing remembers. Believes longer than recollects, longer than knowing even wonders.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Memory is the happiness of being alone.
quotes.author: Lois Lowry

quotes.quote: Memory's truth, because memory has its own special kind. It selects, eliminates, alters, exaggerates, minimizes, glorifies, and vilifies also; but in the end it creates its own reality, its heterogeneous but usually coherent version of events; and no sane human being ever trusts someone else's version more than his own.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Memory was supposed to fill the time, but it made time a hole to be filled.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Memory is the space in which a thing happens for a second time.
quotes.author: Paul Auster

quotes.quote: Memory is like plaster: peel it back and you just might find a completely different picture.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Memory loss is one way of coping with damage.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: Memories aren't stored in the heart or the head or even the soul, if you ask me, but in the spaces between any given two people.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: Excellent memories are often coupled with feeble judgments.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Life isn't a matter of milestones, but of moments.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakimi

quotes.quote: It's surprising how much memory is built around things unnoticed at the time.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The work of memory collapses time.
quotes.author: Walter Benjamin

quotes.quote: Memory is imagination in reverse.
quotes.author: Stephen Evans

quotes.quote: He that flatters you more than you desire either has deceived you or wishes to deceive.
quotes.author: Italian Proverb

quotes.quote: Flattery makes friends and truth makes enemies.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: Look closely at those who patronize you. Half are unfeeling, half untaught.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Flattery is like chewing gum. Enjoy it but don't swallow it.
quotes.author: Hank Ketcham

quotes.quote: A little flattery will support a man through great fatigue.
quotes.author: James Monroe

quotes.quote: Flattery corrupts both the receiver and the giver.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Flattery succeeds best on minds previously occupied by conceit.
quotes.author: Norman Macdonald

quotes.quote: Although a skillful flatterer is a most delightful companion if you have him all to yourself, his taste becomes very doubtful when he takes to complimenting other people.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Flattery is refined deception--it is the froth of language--it is the alcohol of social intercourse--it is the prescription of the subtle--and the nectar of fools.
quotes.author: William Scott Downey

quotes.quote: Flattery is like cologne water, to be smelt, not swallowed
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Flattery is all right if you don't inhale.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

quotes.quote: A fool flatters himself, a wise man flatters the fool.
quotes.author: Edward Bulwer-Lytton

quotes.quote: Nothing in this world is harder than speaking the truth, nothing easier than flattery.
quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoyevsky

quotes.quote: I pay no attention whatever to anybody's praise or blame. I simply follow my own feelings.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

quotes.quote: The public wants work which flatters its illusions.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: It is possible to be below flattery as well as above it.
quotes.author: Thomas B. Macaulay

quotes.quote: A compliment is a statement of an agreeable truth; flattery is a statement of an agreeable untruth.
quotes.author: Sir John A. MacDonald

quotes.quote: Between flattery and admiration there often flows a river of contempt.
quotes.author: Minna Antrim

quotes.quote: Flattery is never so agreeable as to our blind side; commend a fool for his wit, or a knave for his honesty, and they will receive you into their bosoms.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: There is no effect more disproportionate to its cause than the happiness bestowed by a small compliment.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Some folks pay a compliment like they went down in their pocket for it.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Like pollen on a honeybee, flattery clings to the things you tell yourself.
quotes.author: Willis Goth Regier

quotes.quote: Flattery is a form of hatred.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: He who says he hates every kind of flattery, and says it in earnest, certainly does not yet know every kind of flattery.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: I cannot think of any character below the flatterer, except he who envies him.
quotes.author: Sir Richard Steele

quotes.quote: Do not offer a compliment and ask a favor at the same time. A compliment that is charged for is not valuable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The voice of flattery affects us after it has ceased, just as after a concert men find some agreeable air ringing in their ears to the exclusion of all serious business.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Here comes Glib-tongue: who can out-flatter a Dedication; and lie, like ten Epitaphs.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Flattery is like friendship in show, but not in fruit
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Flattery is telling the other person precisely what he thinks about himself
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Sweet words are like honey, a little may refresh, but too much gluts the stomach.
quotes.author: Anne Bradstreet

quotes.quote: None are more taken in by flattery than the proud, who wish to be the first and are not.
quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

quotes.quote: Some indeed there are who profess to despise all flattery, but even these are nevertheless to be flattered, by being told that they do despise it.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Popular culture is a place where pity is called compassion, flattery is called love, propaganda is called knowledge, tension is called peace, gossip is called news, and auto-tune is called singing.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The aim of flattery is to soothe and encourage us by assuring us of the truth of an opinion we have already formed about ourselves.
quotes.author: Edith Sitwell

quotes.quote: Flattery is no more than what raises in a man's mind an idea of a preference which he has not.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: Flattery is a counterfeit money which, but for vanity, would have no circulation.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: If we did not flatter ourselves, the flattery of others could never harm us.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Baloney is flattery laid on so thick it cannot be true, and blarney is flattery so thin we love it.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: No man flatters the woman he truly loves.
quotes.author: Henry Theodore Tuckerman

quotes.quote: Flattery is the worst and falsest way of showing our esteem.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: The flattery of posterity is not worth much more than contemporary flattery, which is worth nothing.
quotes.author: Jorge Luis Borges

quotes.quote: The most skillful flattery is to let a person talk on, and be a listener.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: Listening, not imitation, may be the sincerest form of flattery.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: In the best, the friendliest and simplest relations flattery or praise is necessary, just as grease is necessary to keep wheels turning.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: We despise no source that can pay us a pleasing attention.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Flattery pleases very generally. In the first place, the flatterer may think what he says to be true; but, in the second place, whether he thinks so or not, he certainly thinks those whom he flatters of consequence enough to be flattered.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: No visor does become black villainy so well as soft and tender flattery.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: You're flawless when you embrace the things about you that you don't necessarily like, but you own them because they're yours.
quotes.author: Amanda Seals

quotes.quote: Life is not about making it flawless, It's about not letting the flaws steal your courage and happiness.
quotes.author: Deepanshi Gupta

quotes.quote: My mother was extremely controlled, sort of flawless. And I always tend to be a bit more hippie.
quotes.author: Vera Wang

quotes.quote: Don't paint yourself with layers of foundation, carry yourself with a smile! Don't conceal your so called flaws, because God is perfect in his work and has made each one of us Flawless.
quotes.author: Komal Kataria

quotes.quote: Many girls aspire to a version of selfhood that puts a psychological glass ceiling on their potential to succeed. They suffer from what I call the Curse of the Good Girl: the pressure to be liked by everyone, generous to a fault, and flawless at everything you do.
quotes.author: Rachel Simmons

quotes.quote: You don't always need to be this flawless female with amazing skin and done hair. Perfect doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Iska Lawrence

quotes.quote: I can't get into all that physical stuff of having to have flawless skin... Sometimes you see people and it looks like someone's got an eraser and made their face a little blurry - their traits seem to go out of focus.
quotes.author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quotes.quote: I was the daughter of an immigrant, raised to feel that I needed to get excellent, flawless grades and a full scholarship and a graduate degree and a good job - all the stepping stones to conventional success.
quotes.author: Susan Choi

quotes.quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.quote: The cruelest thing you can do to an artist is tell them their work is flawless when it isn't.
quotes.author: Yahtzee Croshaw

quotes.quote: When did creating a flawless facade become a more vital goal than learning to love the person who lives inside your skin?
quotes.author: Ellen Hopkins

quotes.quote: I would rather dance as a ballerina, though faultily, than as a flawless clown.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: In my family, you can rot to hell on the inside as long as you’re flawless on the outside, which is really sick, but also hard to unlearn.
quotes.author: Laura Wiess

quotes.quote: Angels don't exist. Flawless skin, perfect hair, flowing white robes, all topped off with an adorable set of fluffy pink wings. Yeah. If you see that wandering around, you've probably stumbled onto the set of a Victoria's Secret catalog shoot. Prepare to get your butt kicked by security.
quotes.author: Cecily White

quotes.quote: No one expects us to love them flawlessly, but we can love them fearlessly, furiously, and unreasonably.
quotes.author: Bob Goff

quotes.quote: Before backbitting someone to someone else, make sure you are flawless.
quotes.author: Ramya

quotes.quote: And what are scars if not words on your body's canvas telling the story of your resilience? More precious than being flawless.
quotes.author: Arshi Dokadia

quotes.quote: If you have flaws, it doesn't mean you are not flawless. If you are flawless, it doesn't mean you have no flaws.
quotes.author: Anjali

quotes.quote: Stop pointing at my flaws, you aren't perfect either. But somehow that's ok for you. Then, why can't it be for me?
quotes.author: Elienai Aviles

quotes.quote: The sun rose on the flawless brimming sea into a sky all brazen-all one brightening for gods immortal and for mortal men on plowlands kind with grain.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Happiness is an accident of nature, a beautiful and flawless aberration.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: The love loving the flawed, is flawless.
quotes.author: Abriti

quotes.quote: Success doesn’t necessarily come from breakthrough innovation but from flawless execution. A great strategy alone won’t win a game or a battle; the win comes from basic blocking and tackling.
quotes.author: Naveen Jain

quotes.quote: Ask me when your belly is full like the moon, and our love has stretched your body with my child, leaving your skin, once flawless, now silvered, traced, scarred, I will worship you. My eyes will never stray. My heart will never wander, gladly leashed to you all my days. I am fixed on you.
quotes.author: Kennedy Ryan

quotes.quote: I cling to my imperfection, as the very essence of my being.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.quote: When nobody around you seems to measure up, it's time to check your yardstick.
quotes.author: Bill Lemley

quotes.quote: There's no flaw within you. You're beautifully made; just the way you are supposed to be.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You need to overlook your flaws, mistakes and regrets if you want to get ahead and move on towards the finish line.
quotes.author: Hermann J Steinherr

quotes.quote: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing, the next best thing is the wrong thing, and the worst thing you can do is nothing.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: By the flaws in the picture the truth will emerge.
quotes.author: William S Burroughs

quotes.quote: Weak people see flaws in others where strong people see potential. What they really see is a part of themselves.
quotes.author: Alexander Den Heijer

quotes.quote: Flaws would not only bring death but, far worse, humiliation.
quotes.author: William Goldman

quotes.quote: None of us is perfect and have some or the other flaws. But flaws can always be done away with if we just try.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash

quotes.quote: For better or worse, I am as fascinated with human flaws as anything.
quotes.author: Greg Mottola

quotes.quote: Everyone has flaws. It's a matter of finding the ones you can live with.
quotes.author: Moon Unit Zappa

quotes.quote: To me the interesting main character is never the one without flaws.
quotes.author: J. J. Abrams

quotes.quote: Better to do something imperfectly than to do nothing flawlessly.
quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

quotes.quote: Understand the flaws and you will know the perfection of the Universe.
quotes.author: Ka Chinery

quotes.quote: The flaws, the mistakes I make that's the real me.
quotes.author: Nas

quotes.quote: Better a diamond with a flaw than a pebble without.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Do not think of your faults, still less of other's faults; look for what is good and strong, and try to imitate it. Your faults will drop off, like dead leaves, when their time comes.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Have no fear of perfection, you'll never reach it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dalí

quotes.quote: What seems like a flaw is merely our higher consciousness telling us we're not looking at it in the right light yet.
quotes.author: A.J. Darkholme

quotes.quote: I have my flaws but I want to be with someone who knows that and accepts it.
quotes.author: Mario Tomasello

quotes.quote: Another flaw in the human character is that everybody wants to build and nobody wants to do maintenance.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Only in grammar can you be more than perfect.
quotes.author: William Safire

quotes.quote: It is in our faults and failings, not in our virtues, that we touch each other, and find sympathy. It is in our follies that we are one.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Our flaws are what makes us human. If we can accept them as part of who we are, they really don't even have to be an issue.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Appreciate your flaws to reach the potential of your greatness.
quotes.author: Behdad Sami

quotes.quote: The flaws you see in others are actually a reflection of yourself.
quotes.author: Eve Branson

quotes.quote: Flaws reveal a lot about a character and who people are. The flawed elements of a character are where I find their humanity. Those are the things I tend to identify with the weaknesses. I don't know why, but I identify with struggle more than with success.
quotes.author: Liev Schreiber

quotes.quote: What you call flaws are really just scars and wounds accumulated over a lifetime.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: Be happy with being you. Love your flaws. Own your quirks. And know that you are just as perfect as anyone else, exactly as you are.
quotes.author: Ariana Grande

quotes.quote: Your flaws are not enough obstacles to block those who truly love you.
quotes.author: Terry Mark

quotes.quote: We're miserable because we think that we are mere individuals, alone with our fears and flaws and resentment and mortality.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Certain flaws are necessary for the whole. It would seem strange if old friends lacked certain quirks.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: If you focus on the flaws of others it takes away from the improvements that you may need to make.
quotes.author: Christofer Drew

quotes.quote: The flawed must be quiet; they must not bring attention to their aberrations
quotes.author: Olukemi Amala

quotes.quote: It's the flaw that brings out the beauty.
quotes.author: Holly Black

quotes.quote: When your flaws are stitched together with good intentions, your flaws make you beautiful.
quotes.author: Darren McGreevy

quotes.quote: We all have our flaws, but we overcome them. And sometimes, it's our flaws that make us who we are.
quotes.author: Erin Hunter

quotes.quote: Striving for excellence motivates you; striving for perfection is demoralizing.
quotes.author: Harriet Braiker

quotes.quote: Someone will always be prettier. Someone will always be smarter. Someone will always be younger. But they will never be you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Never let a few flaws make you hate everything else about yourself. The people that love you won't care about them anyway.
quotes.author: Sonya Parker

quotes.quote: The pause between the errors and trials of the day and the hopes of the night.
quotes.author: Herbert Hoover

quotes.quote: Love is blind, but friendship closes its eyes.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To be acceptable is for one to ignore his weakness while knowing his strength, to cover the scar even though it's always there, however, to be impossible is for one to see his weakness as, not an adversary, but the cherry on top of his strength, to rearrange the scar so that it compliments his features.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Our flaws are obvious, yet we are loved and able to love, if we choose, because there is that bit of the divine still smoldering in us.
quotes.author: Susan Meissner

quotes.quote: We look harder for flaws in a study when we don't agree with its conclusions.
quotes.author: Sharon Begley

quotes.quote: Accepting your flaws is a hard thing to do when you're constantly reminded of them.
quotes.author: Auliq Ice

quotes.quote: Perfection is not attainable. But if we chase perfection, we can catch excellence.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: In your flaws are hidden your strength. Your perfect imperfection will lead you to change.
quotes.author: Tonto Dikeh

quotes.quote: Unlike the world that points out your flaws to ridicule you, when GOD points out your flaws, it's because He want to walk you out of it.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Life is not always perfect. Like a road, it has many bends, ups and downs, but that’s its beauty.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The thing that is really hard, and really amazing, is giving up on being perfect and beginning the work of becoming yourself.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions.
quotes.author: Augusten Burroughs

quotes.quote: All men have their frailties and whoever looks for a friend without imperfections, will never find what he seeks.
quotes.author: Cyrus the Great

quotes.quote: A single prop that does not look real to an audience can louse you up. The same is true of the smallest flaw in setting up the motivation in a story line.
quotes.author: Desi Arnaz

quotes.quote: We are all wonderful, beautiful wrecks. That’s what connects us that we’re all broken, all beautifully imperfect.
quotes.author: Emilio Estevez

quotes.quote: Success does not consist in never making mistakes but in never making the same one a second time.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Once you’ve accepted your flaws, no one can use them against you.
quotes.author: George R. R. Martin

quotes.quote: Being happy doesn’t mean that everything is perfect. It means that you’ve decided to look beyond the imperfections.
quotes.author: Gerard Way

quotes.quote: The absence of flaw in beauty is itself a flaw.
quotes.author: Havelock Ellis

quotes.quote: I suspect the secret of personal attraction is locked up in our unique imperfections, flaws and frailties.
quotes.author: Hugh Mackay

quotes.quote: Persuade thyself that imperfection and inconvenience are the natural lot of mortals, and there will be no room for discontent, neither for despair.
quotes.author: Ieyasu Tokugawa

quotes.quote: Your imperfections are marks of authenticity and that is the beauty of you.
quotes.author: Isaac Fowler

quotes.quote: Perhaps it is our imperfections that make us so perfect for one another.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: What I am is how I came out. No one's perfect and you just have to accept your flaws and learn to love yourself.
quotes.author: Kelly Brook

quotes.quote: I realized that I don’t have to be perfect. All I have to do is show up and enjoy the messy, imperfect and beautiful journey of my life.
quotes.author: Kerry Washington

quotes.quote: If you can learn to love yourself and all the flaws, you can love other people so much better. And that makes you so happy.
quotes.author: Kristin Chenoweth

quotes.quote: To realize that you do not understand is a virtue. Not to realize that you do not understand is a defect.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Any affectation whatsoever in dress implies, in my mind, a flaw in the understanding.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: All creatures are flawed, but out of the flaw may come the universe.
quotes.author: Marguerite Young

quotes.quote: Imperfection is beauty. Madness is genius. It is better to be absolutely ridiculous than absolutely boring.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: If you look closely at a tree you’ll notice it’s knots and dead branches, just like our bodies. What we learn is that beauty and imperfection go together wonderfully.
quotes.author: Matthew Fox

quotes.quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: Maybe the most any of us can expect of ourselves isn’t perfection but progress.
quotes.author: Michelle Burford

quotes.quote: You were born to be real, not to be perfect. You are here to be you, not to live someone else’s life.
quotes.author: Ralph Marston

quotes.quote: Sometimes when you innovate, you make mistakes. It is best to admit them quickly, and get on with improving your other innovations.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Stop trying to ‘fix yourself; you’re NOT broken! You are perfectly imperfect and powerful beyond measure.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: I know my flaws before other people point them out to me.
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Better to be a strong man with a weak point, than to be a weak man without a strong point. A diamond with a flaw is more valuable than brick without a flaw.
quotes.author: William J. H. Boetcker

quotes.quote: Don't flail against the world, use it. Flexibility is the operative principle in the art of war.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Even though we require flexibility to negotiate our changing circumstances, we are rather built to anxiously turn away from alternatives.
quotes.author: Eric Maisel

quotes.quote: Flexibility - In all aspects of life, the person with the most varied responses 'wins'.
quotes.author: Kelly Perdew

quotes.quote: Flexibility comes from having multiple choices; wisdom comes from having multiple perspectives.
quotes.author: Robert Dilts

quotes.quote: Flexibility has become a modern day value that everyone wants. But flexibility comes with a cost.
quotes.author: Maynard Webb

quotes.quote: Flexibility is an essential part of Jazz. It's what gives Jazz music the ability to combine with all other types of music and not lose its identity.
quotes.author: Wynton Marsalis

quotes.quote: Flexibility is the key to stability.
quotes.author: John Wooden

quotes.quote: Flexibility makes buildings to be stronger, imagine what it can do to your soul.
quotes.author: Carlos Barrios

quotes.quote: Intelligence is the handmaiden of flexibility and change.
quotes.author: Vernor Vinge

quotes.quote: The brain's strong point is its flexibility. It is unsurpassed at making shrewd guesses and at grasping the total meaning of information presented to it.
quotes.author: Jeremy Campbell

quotes.quote: The definition of flexibility is being constantly open to the fact that you might be on the wrong track.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The flexibility we gain in asana is the living symbol of the suppleness we gain in relation to life’s problems and challenges.
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: The mental flexibility of the wise man permits him to keep an open mind and enables him to readjust himself whenever it becomes necessary for a change.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: The person with the most flexibility has the best chance of achieving the outcome he or she desires
quotes.author: Tony Jeary

quotes.quote: The quickness and flexibility of a well mind, a belief or hope that things will eventually sort themselves out-these are the resources lost to a person when the brain is ill.
quotes.author: Kay Redfield Jamison

quotes.quote: The very flexibility and ease which make men's friendships so agreeable while they endure, make them the easier to destroy and forget.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: Training for strength and flexibility is a must. You must use it to support your techniques. Techniques alone are no good if you don't support them with strength and flexibility.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Yes, flexibility of body and physical perfection for Yogasana is important. However more important is the state of your mind, Meditative mind. Your flexibility might be excellent but if your mind is not attentive, you are merely doing some physical exercise, not Yoga
quotes.author: B.K.S. Iyengar

quotes.quote: Yielding flexibility is a virtue of an ever-expanding heart.
quotes.author: Molly Friedenfeld

quotes.quote: You must always be able to predict what's next and then have the flexibility to evolve.
quotes.author: Marc Benioff

quotes.quote: Creativity has always depended on openness and flexibility, so let us hope for more of both in the future.
quotes.author: Siri Hustvedt

quotes.quote: English has more flexibility. It's a very plastic, very shapeable, very expressive language. In that sense it feels quite natural.
quotes.author: Ha Jin

quotes.quote: Flexibility in a time of great change is a vital quality of leadership.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Flexibility is a requirement for survival.
quotes.author: Roger Von Oech

quotes.quote: Flexibility is one of the main roads leading to happiness.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you're willing to restrict the flexibility of your approach, you can almost always do something better
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: Players have a great deal of flexibility when conducting diplomatic relations with their allies.
quotes.author: Michael K. Simpson

quotes.quote: Scheduling flexibility is the single greatest non-financial tool -- and the number-one dream-job factor -- at your disposal for winning battles in the talent wars. Use it.
quotes.author: Bruce Tulgan

quotes.quote: The key to conversation at work is flexibility and understanding how what you say might be perceived by others.
quotes.author: Deborah Tannen

quotes.quote: There needs to be a similar degree of flexibility and generosity in the recognition of the humaneness and worth of people who we generally consider as adversaries.
quotes.author: Jimmy Carter

quotes.quote: True flexibility can be achieved only when all muscles are uniformly developed.
quotes.author: Joseph Pilates

quotes.quote: When you are frustrated and do not know a way out, only flexibility and moderation towards difficulties will save you.
quotes.author: Husayn ibn Ali

quotes.quote: You know flexibility is a good thing but it shouldn't - you shouldn't be flexible on core principles.
quotes.author: Ted Cruz

quotes.quote: I think the eyes flirt most. There are so many ways to use them.
quotes.author: Anna Held

quotes.quote: She learned to say things with her eyes that others waste time putting into words.
quotes.author: Corey Ford

quotes.quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
quotes.author: Charles Reade

quotes.quote: You are adorable, mademoiselle. I study your feet with the microscope and your soul with the telescope.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Flirting is a woman's trade, one must keep in practice.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: When I want to smile, I know exactly what to do. I just close my eyes and think of you.
quotes.author: Rakii Retondo

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is a day without you.
quotes.author: Kenna

quotes.quote: I always have many roads to travel, but I take the one which leads to you.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: If you stood in front of a mirror holding 11 roses; you will see 12 of the most beautiful things in this word.
quotes.author: Scemaa

quotes.quote: A woman's dress should be like a barbed-wire fence: serving its purpose without obstructing the view.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: You already caught me, but everyday, you pull me in deeper and deeper.
quotes.author: KYB

quotes.quote: I guess your name is Google. Because you have everything that I am searching for.
quotes.author: Ryan Gosling

quotes.quote: Feel my shirt. Does that feel like boyfriend material?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When I look at you, my mind goes blank and my heart beats faster. All I can do is feel and keep losing myself in you.
quotes.author: KYB

quotes.quote: If you were a tear, i would never cry in fear of losing you.
quotes.author: Walt Dizzle

quotes.quote: If you were a bullet i would shoot myself to have you in me.
quotes.author: Maygin Nikki

quotes.quote: I think I can die happy now, coz I've just seen a piece of heaven.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The best thing about me is you.
quotes.author: Max

quotes.quote: Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm so in love, every time I look at you my soul gets dizzy.
quotes.author: Jaesse Tyler

quotes.quote: My parents told me angels aren't real. I used to believe them, but then I saw you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You remind me of my next girlfriend.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Oops! I lost my mobile number! Could I have yours?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You can fall from the sky, you can fall from a tree, but the best way to fall is in love with me.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Hey beautiful! You must be tired after running all day in my mind.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If I fall asleep texting you, it's because I didn't want to say goodbye.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If your heart was a prison, I would like to be sentenced for life.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every once in a while I have to pinch myself, because I'm so lucky to have such a beautiful person in my life.
quotes.author: KYB

quotes.quote: Being flirty is a way of letting a guy know you're interested without making a fool out of yourself.
quotes.author: Carmen Electra

quotes.quote: What’s your poison or should I just waste my money by guessing something you probably won’t even drink? I’d much rather get you something you like.
quotes.author: Jason Medina

quotes.quote: If goodness is its own reward, shouldn’t we get a little something for being naughty?
quotes.author: Lauren Bacall

quotes.quote: I have a question for you. "If your shadow is the second most beautiful thing in the world, which is the first?
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: How did it happen that their lips came together? How does it happen that birds sing, that snow melts, that the rose unfolds, that the dawn whitens behind the stark shapes of trees on the quivering summit of the hill? A kiss, and all was said.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Because of you, I can feel myself slowly, but surely, becoming the me I have always dreamed of being.
quotes.author: Tyler Knott Gregson

quotes.quote: All I've ever wanted was to be near you.
quotes.author: Shannon Hale

quotes.quote: I love you and that's the beginning and end of everything.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Oh! no, not flirts. A woman in love with one man cannot flirt with another.
quotes.author: (Henry Tilney) Jane Austen

quotes.quote: A smile is the chosen vehicle for all ambiguities.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: She gave me a smile I could feel in my hip pocket.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: She knew her distance and did angle for me, / Madding my eagerness with her restraint, / As all impediments in fancy's course / Are motives of more fancy.
quotes.author: (Bertram) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Tricks he hath had in him, which gentleman have... He did love her, sir as a gentleman loves a woman... He loved her, sir, and loved her not.
quotes.author: (Parolles) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: O times! / I laughed him out of patience, and that night / I laughed him into patience, and next morn, / Ere the ninth hour, I drunk him to his bed.
quotes.author: (Cleopatra) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I spy entertainment in her: she discourses, she carves, she gives the leer of invitation.
quotes.author: (Falstaff) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: There's a language in her eye, her cheek, her lip— / Nay, her foot speaks; her wanton spirits look out / At every joint and motive of her body.
quotes.author: (Ulysses) William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Merely innocent flirtation, / Not quite adultery, but adulteration
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Thanks. I love cake.
quotes.author: Samira Ahmed

quotes.quote: Thirty, flirty and thriving.
quotes.author: Jenna

quotes.quote: Out to make some new friends. Male, of course. I'm gonna start out with a little witty conversation and then a flirtatious smile.
quotes.author: Audrey Wyatt

quotes.quote: I'm gonna buy a Paper Doll that I can call my own / A doll that other fellows cannot steal / And then the flirty, flirty guys with their flirty, flirty eyes / Will have to flirt with dollies that are real / When I come home at night she will be waiting / She'll be the truest doll in all this world / I'd rather have a Paper Doll to call my own / Than have a fickle-minded real live girl
quotes.author: Johnny S. Black

quotes.quote: Flowers candy flirty late nights / On the speed dial, that was you too / Dinner movie sweet heart kisses / He don't dance, but tangles with two / I thought you plus me divided me from him / But I discovered, many more and again again
quotes.author: Makeba Riddick

quotes.quote: Over in the corner / I could see this other guy / He was kinda flirty / He was giving me the eye / So I took advantage / Of the fact that I'm a star / Shook my hair and took / A casual stroll up to the bar / And as sure as hell / This guy was coming up to me / He said, who am I and / Who are you and who are we / What's our situation do / We have some time for us? / I said, I was not exactly / Waiting for the bus / He said, if you're going / Somewhere can I come along? / I said, keep on rocking baby / 'Til the night is gone?
quotes.author: Benny Goran Bror Andersson

quotes.quote: Flirt is love afore marriage, / It is the adman since marriage, / Afore wedding it makes indecency, / Since marriage is the independency, / Indecency creates a lust, / And it also makes a rust.
quotes.author: Mazloom Gill

quotes.quote: Yes, leave my side to flirt with Maude, / To gaze into her eyes, / To whisper in her ear sweet words, / And low impassioned sighs; / And though she give you glance for glance, / And smile and scheme and plot, / You cannot raise a jealous thought, / I know you love her not. / Let us cease this cruel warfare, / Come back to me again! / Ah, what do we reap from flirting / But heartaches, mutual pain? / You’ll forgive my past shortcomings— / Be tender as of yore / And we both will make a promise / To henceforth flirt no more.
quotes.author: Rosanna Eleanor Leprohon

quotes.quote: I was so enchanted by your beauty that I ran into that wall over there. So I am going to need your name and number for insurance purposes.
quotes.author: A.J. Baker

quotes.quote: You may fall out of the sky or out of a tree, but the best way to fall is in love with me.
quotes.author: A.J. Baker

quotes.quote: Sorry, but you owe me a drink. Because when I looked at you, I dropped mine.
quotes.author: A.J. Baker

quotes.quote: Rejection can lead to emotional stress for both parties involved and emotional stress can lead to physical complications such as headaches, ulcers, cancerous tumours and even death! So for my health and yours, JUST SAY YES!
quotes.author: A.J. Baker

quotes.quote: Doing nothing feels like floating on warm water to me. Delightful, perfect.
quotes.author: Ava Gardner

quotes.quote: We all have an edge. We all are floating our psyche on top with a great ocean underneath.
quotes.author: Brad Dourif

quotes.quote: The floating vapour is just as true an illustration of the law of gravity as the falling avalanche.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: She would be half a planet away, floating in a turquoise sea, dancing by moonlight to flamenco guitar.
quotes.author: Janet Fitch

quotes.quote: I liked the idea of the words floating in space and the space behind it moving all the time, ever changing.
quotes.author: Robert Barry

quotes.quote: If a stick is floating down a river and gets stuck, it doesn't need years of therapy. It just needs a little nudge and then it will get back into the flow of the river.
quotes.author: Michael Neill

quotes.quote: In this life, your so-called ordinary life, you must be rooted; and in your inner space, in the spiritual life, you must be weightless and flying and flowing, floating.
quotes.author: Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The vast sky is not hindered by the floating clouds.
quotes.author: Shitou Xiqian

quotes.quote: The floating world is the realm of the graphic designer.
quotes.author: Aaron Betsky

quotes.quote: Wind is a floating wave of air, whose undulation continually varies.
quotes.author: Marcus V. Pollio

quotes.quote: Puberty for a girl is like floating down a broadening river into an open sea.
quotes.author: Granville Stanley Hall

quotes.quote: Ignore your thoughts. As you focus more intensely, you may feel as if you are floating.
quotes.author: Frederick Lindemann

quotes.quote: Floating in a lake, lying in a hammock, playing a bit of Scrabble...that's what I'm in need of.
quotes.author: Karen Walker

quotes.quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Love is floating somewhere in the beautiful horizon with an equal wave length with same frequency of intense feelings.
quotes.author: Seema Gupta

quotes.quote: You may feel a sensation of floating. You may see colors, maybe no phenomena, it doesn't matter. You are absorbing power.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: At night, when the sky is full of stars and the sea is still you get the wonderful sensation that you are floating in space.
quotes.author: Natalie Wood

quotes.quote: The soul, light as a feather, fluid as water, innocent as a child, responds to every movement of grace like a floating balloon.
quotes.author: Jean-Pierre de Caussade

quotes.quote: A person is made up of awarenesses. All the awarenesses that have ever been our will ever be exist like barges floating in the ocean.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Floods are acts of God, but flood losses are largely acts of man.
quotes.author: Gilbert F. White

quotes.quote: Be kinder to yourself. And then let your kindness flood the world.
quotes.author: Pema Chodron

quotes.quote: Nobody's strong enough to stand up under a flood of weak material.
quotes.author: Alan Ladd

quotes.quote: The only thing that stops God from sending another flood is that the first one was useless.
quotes.author: Nicolas De Chamfort

quotes.quote: Great floods have flown From simple sources.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: You cannot fold a flood and put it in a drawer, because the winds would find it out and tell your cedar floor.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: All water has a perfect memory and is forever trying to get back to where it was.
quotes.author: Toni Morrison

quotes.quote: The river flows at its own sweet will, but the flood is bound in the two banks. If it were not thus bound, its freedom would be wasted.
quotes.author: Vinoba Bhave

quotes.quote: Yea, foolish mortals, Noah's flood is not yet subsided. Two thirds of the fair world it yet covers.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: The earth will end only when God declares it's time to be over. Man will not destroy this earth. This earth will not be destroyed by a flood.
quotes.author: John Shimkus

quotes.quote: The flood subsides, and the body, like a worn sea-shell emerges strange and lovely.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: The rope that pulls you from the flood can become a noose around your neck.
quotes.author: Khaled Hosseini

quotes.quote: By forces seemingly antagonistic and destructive Nature accomplishes her beneficent designs now a flood of fire, now a flood of ice, now a flood of water; and again in the fullness of time an outburst of organic life.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: When the flood came the rain fell all the harder, water on water gushing down the unlit streets. In the darkness the gurgles sounding all the louder to the sightless eyes.
quotes.author: Angela Abraham

quotes.quote: The greatest flood has the soonest ebb; the sorest tempest the most sudden calm; the hottest love the coldest end; and from the deepest desire oftentimes ensues the deadliest hate.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: A flood is defined as rising water, and it doesn't matter why the water is rising.
quotes.author: Jeff Albright

quotes.quote: The single raindrop never feels responsible for the flood.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: But when the flash flood crosses your path, when the lion leaps at you from the grasses, advanced self-awareness is an unaffordable indulgence. The brain stem does its best.
quotes.author: Peter Watts

quotes.quote: When the flood submerges the whole country, no raindrop may feel responsible. Finally things had lost their weightiness.
quotes.author: Erik Pevernagie

quotes.quote: Florida isn't so much a place where one goes to reinvent oneself, as it is a place where one goes if one no longer wished to be found.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: We ought to be bragging about Florida!
quotes.author: Rick Scott

quotes.quote: Florida means land of flowers, not land of ugly.
quotes.author: Bill Jonson

quotes.quote: Two things Florida can teach the other 49 states:how to make a good margarita and how to deal with the aftermath of a hurricane.
quotes.author: Tom Feeney

quotes.quote: If you can afford a vacation home in Florida, you should be able to pay the taxes.
quotes.author: Ken Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Florida is a very healing place.
quotes.author: Burt Reynolds

quotes.quote: I live in Florida and people are crazy here. And I say that lovingly.
quotes.author: Amy Seimetz

quotes.quote: Florida has tons of entertainment opportunities because Walt Disney World and Universal Studios are there.
quotes.author: Kevin Richardson

quotes.quote: I am absolutely convinced that Florida will become the most exciting place in the world to live and work.
quotes.author: Rick Scott

quotes.quote: Florida is a place of unparalleled diversity of backgrounds, experiences and vision. It makes our culture unique, but it can also make it difficult to define a common identity and create a sense of community that reaches beyond our neighborhoods to all corners of our state.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: It's always sunny in the Sunshine State. Except for at night.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: My love for you is like a Florida sunset. Orange, coral, pink, and lavender, it exists to warm your heart through the inevitable darkness.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: August in Florida is God's way of reminding us who's in charge.
quotes.author: Blaize Clement

quotes.quote: Florida is a strange place: hot, beautiful, ugly. I love it here, and how nothing makes sense but still, somehow, there is a rhythm.
quotes.author: Roxane Gay

quotes.quote: My parents didn't want to move to Florida, but they turned sixty and that's the law.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: The Florida sun seems not much a single thing overhead but a set of klieg lights that pursue you everywhere with an even white illumination.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: I go to Florida sometimes for vacation. I actually really like Florida. It's a weird place, it's surreal. It's so close, but you feel like you're in another world or on an island.
quotes.author: Jemima Kirke

quotes.quote: The one thing I did learn at Florida State, I learned to talk trash, believe that.
quotes.author: Randy Moss

quotes.quote: Florida has its own rhythm, too. People go to work, they watch their children learn and grow and start families of their own. They play in the sun and pass their lives enjoying the outsized blessings that make our state unique.
quotes.author: Jeb Bush

quotes.quote: I like Florida. Everything is in the 80's. The temperatures, the ages and the IQ's.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think I've figured out some order in the universe, but then I find myself in Florida.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: I couldn't adjust to the racism in Florida.
quotes.author: Sidney Poitier

quotes.quote: Every child in South Florida can dance. And every child there is amazing.
quotes.author: Abby Lee Miller

quotes.quote: Here in Florida, we have something special we never enjoyed at Disneyland...the blessing of size. There's enough land here to hold all the ideas and plans we can possibly imagine.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: We are not exposed to ice much in Florida.
quotes.author: Brittany Bowe

quotes.quote: I represent Orlando, Florida, the world's number one vacation destination.
quotes.author: Ric Keller

quotes.quote: Florida...does beguile and gratify me—giving me my first and and last (evidently) sense of the tropics, or a peu pres, the sub tropics, and revealing to me blandness in nature of which I had no idea.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: The state with the prettiest name, the state that floats in brackish water, held together by mangrove roots.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bishop

quotes.quote: Florida is the world's greatest amusement park.
quotes.author: Budd Schulberg

quotes.quote: Florida is a golden word...The very name Florida carried the message of warmth and ease and comfort. It was irresistible.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: I wonder if the people who live in the great state of Florida know why they are able to get their initials on their license plates.
quotes.author: Henry O.Dormann

quotes.quote: I happen to know that Florida is now working on something that could revolutionize its real estate market. It's an alligator that eats crabgrass.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: There is only one problem in taking a winter vacation in Florida. You spend two weeks getting a deep, rich, golden tan— then they hand you the bill and you're pale again.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: In all fairness, he did warn me. I asked him if you could get along in Florida on sixty-five dollars a day. He said, 'If you're an alligator, yes. If you're a tourist, no.'
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: I won't comment on the weather we had. Did you know they named a wine after the first bird who ever flew down to Florida for the winter? Cold duck.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Florida is a wasteland as a result of the Great Freeze of the last fall. Almost all of the Australian pines were killed.
quotes.author: EB White

quotes.quote: As the immense dew of Florida / Brings forth / The big-finned palm / And green vine angering for life.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: As the immense dew of Florida / Brings forth hymn and hymn / From the beholder, / Beholding all these green sides / And gold sides of green sides.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: To Michigan, Florida perfumes shall tenderly come; / Not the perfumes of flowers, but sweeter, and wafted beyond death.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: As amazing as it seems, the state of Florida must certainly be one of the most haunted places in the United States,
quotes.author: Greg Jenkins

quotes.quote: When most people think of Florida, they may think of warm, sunny beaches, vacation attractions, and the night life it has to offer.
quotes.author: Greg Jenkins

quotes.quote: Florida was also very hot and full of mosquitoes and strange creatures such as alligators.
quotes.author: Teresa Wimmer

quotes.quote: Many Spaniards had a hard time earning a living in Florida. The soil along the coast was not good for growing crops, so they were forced to move farther inland.
quotes.author: Teresa Wimmer

quotes.quote: The Florida skies are like no other, with cloud formations that are awesome! Even when it rains, the sun shines through the drops.
quotes.author: Connie Letang

quotes.quote: It's got a good climate you need for all the water sports, plus tennis, swimming, running. It's kind of relaxing on the shore. It's pretty laid back, listening to the water, watching the sunset.
quotes.author: Andrew Maurey

quotes.quote: I came from Michigan seven years ago, and every year I learn to love the winters in Florida even more.
quotes.author: Patrick Ehnis

quotes.quote: For a lot of people in different times in their life, Florida represents a new start.
quotes.author: Larry Reimer

quotes.quote: There are only five bad weather days a year here in Florida, and they aren't even that bad.
quotes.author: Dick Ptomey

quotes.quote: Florida is different things to different people. To some, Florida is a paradise. It is warm water, sun-drenched beaches, mysterious swamps, and stunning coral reefs.
quotes.author: Perry Chang

quotes.quote: It is small towns, pickup trucks, and tomato fields. To still others, it is a vacationland with high-rise hotels, amusement parks, and bumper-to-bumper traffic.
quotes.author: Perry Chang

quotes.quote: Florida is a cultural crossroads where people of different backgrounds have mingled, traded, and sometimes fought.
quotes.author: Perry Chang

quotes.quote: When automobile came into popularity, Florida was among the first to begin work on a network of good roads.
quotes.author: Douglas Waitley

quotes.quote: No winter coats in Florida, no boots, no chains, no salt, no plows and shovels. In the balmy state of Florida, fruits fell in the meanest yard.
quotes.author: Christine Schutt

quotes.quote: After women, flowers are the most lovely thing God has given the world.
quotes.author: Christian Dior

quotes.quote: Flowers... are a proud assertion that a ray of beauty out-values all the utilities of the world.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Flowers are the sweetest things God ever made and forgot to put a soul into.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I'd rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck.
quotes.author: Emma Goldman

quotes.quote: The flower is the poetry of reproduction. It is an example of the eternal seductiveness of life.
quotes.author: Jean Giraudoux

quotes.quote: Flowers don't worry about how they're going to bloom. They just open up and turn toward the light and that makes them beautiful.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: Flowers always make people better, happier and more helpful; they are sunshine, food and medicine to the soul.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.quote: Every flower is a soul blossoming in nature.
quotes.author: Gerard de Nerval

quotes.quote: Flowers are restful to look at. They have neither emotions nor conflicts.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: Flowers are without hope. Because hope is tomorrow and flowers have no tomorrow.
quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

quotes.quote: The flower that smells the sweetest is shy and lowly.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The silence of a flower: a kind of silence which we continually evade, of which we find only the shadow in dreams.
quotes.author: Lewis Thompson

quotes.quote: The flowers take the tears of weeping night, and give them to the sun for the day's delight.
quotes.author: Joseph Cotter

quotes.quote: Flowers leave some of their fragrance in the hand that bestows them.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The breath of flowers is far sweeter in the air than in the hand.
quotes.author: Sir Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: All the flowers of all the tomorrows are in the seeds of today.
quotes.author: Indian Proverb

quotes.quote: Flowers in the city are like lipstick on a woman-it just makes you look better to have a little color.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: The fairest thing in nature, a flower, still has its roots in earth and manure.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: A morning glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: To be overcome by the fragrance of flowers is a delectable form of defeat.
quotes.author: Beverly Nichols

quotes.quote: Flowers have spoken to me more than I can tell in written words. They are the hieroglyphics of angels, loved by all men for the beauty of their character.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: Flowers bring to a liberal and gentlemanly mind, the remembrance of honesty, comeliness, and all kinds of virtue.
quotes.author: John Gerard

quotes.quote: Every flower about a house certifies to the refinement of somebody. Every vine climbing and blossoming tells of love and joy.
quotes.author: Robert G. Ingersoll

quotes.quote: The flowers of late winter and early spring occupy places in our hearts well out of proportion to their size.
quotes.author: Gertrude S. Wister

quotes.quote: If you take a flower in your hand and really look at it, it's your world for a moment.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keeffe

quotes.quote: Flowers seem intended for the solace of ordinary humanity.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: Flowers knew how to preach divinity before men knew how to dissect and botanize them.
quotes.author: H.N. Hudson

quotes.quote: Flowers may beckon towards us, but they speak toward heaven and God.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: A flower's appeal is in its contradictions - so delicate in form yet strong in fragrance, so small in size yet big in beauty, so short in life yet long on effect.
quotes.author: Adabella Radici

quotes.quote: Flowers are words which even a babe may understand.
quotes.author: Arthur Cleveland Coxe

quotes.quote: Where flowers bloom so does hope.
quotes.author: Lady Bird Johnson

quotes.quote: Flowers are love's truest language.
quotes.author: Park Benjamin

quotes.quote: In joy or sadness flowers are our constant friends.
quotes.author: Okakura Kakuzō

quotes.quote: A flower blossoms for its own joy.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Flowers are the music of the earth.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Flowers are not made by singing Oh, how beautiful, and sitting in the shade.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Deep in their roots all flowers keep the light.
quotes.author: Theodore Roethke

quotes.quote: One of the most attractive things about the flowers is their beautiful reserve.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: The flowers take the tears of weeping night and give them to the sun for day's delight.
quotes.author: Joseph S. Cotter, Sr.

quotes.quote: Every flower must grow through dirt.
quotes.author: Laurie Jean Sennott

quotes.quote: Wildflowers don't care where they grow.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Flowers feed the soul.
quotes.author: Hadith Mohammed

quotes.quote: Look at the flowers-for no reason. It is simply unbelievable how happy flowers are.
quotes.author: Osho

quotes.quote: Whatever is truly alive must die. Look at the flowers; only plastic flowers never die.
quotes.author: Anthony De Mello

quotes.quote: Flowers grow out of dark moments.
quotes.author: Corita Kent

quotes.quote: Flowers are happy things.
quotes.author: P G Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The flowers anew, returning seasons bring; But beauty faded has no second spring.
quotes.author: Ambrose Philips

quotes.quote: No flower wants to be at home when it is raining outside!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat Idan

quotes.quote: If dandelions were hard to grow, they would be most welcome on any lawn.
quotes.author: Andrew Mason

quotes.quote: To me, flowers are happiness.
quotes.author: Stefano Gabbana

quotes.quote: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: It’s the time that you spent on your rose that makes your rose so important…People have forgotten this truth, but you mustn’t forget it. You become responsible forever for what you’ve tamed. You’re responsible for your rose.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: She cast her fragrance and her radiance over me. I ought never to have run away from her… I ought to have guessed all the affection that lay behind her poor little stratagems. Flowers are so inconsistent! But I was too young to know how to love her.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: She wore flowers in her hair and carried magic secrets in her eyes.
quotes.author: Arundhati Roy

quotes.quote: The temple bell stops but I still hear the sound coming out of the flower.
quotes.author: Basho

quotes.quote: If we could see the miracle of a single flower clearly our whole life would change.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: The fragrance of flowers spreads only in the direction of the wind. But the goodness of a person spreads in all directions.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: How can one help shivering with delight when one's hot fingers close around the stem of a live flower, cool from the shade and stiff with newborn vigor!
quotes.author: Colette

quotes.quote: One of the most tragic things I know about human nature is that all of us tend to put off living. We are all dreaming of some magical rose garden over the horizon instead of enjoying the roses that are blooming outside our windows today.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Flowers are those little colorful beacons of the sun from which we get sunshine when dark, somber skies blanket our thoughts.
quotes.author: Dodinsky

quotes.quote: Like wildflowers; You must allow yourself to grow in all the places people thought you never would.
quotes.author: E.V.

quotes.quote: I will be the gladdest thing under the sun! I will touch a hundred flowers and not pick one.
quotes.author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quotes.quote: For myself I hold no preferences among flowers, so long as they are wild, free, spontaneous. Bricks to all greenhouses! Black thumb and cutworm to the potted plant!
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Flowers are the music of the ground. From earth’s lips spoken without sound.
quotes.author: Edwin Curran

quotes.quote: I would far rather have two or three lilies of the valley gathered for me by a person I like, than the most expensive bouquet that could be bought!
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gaskell
