quotes.quote: Against a dark sky all flowers look like fireworks. There is something strange about them, at once vivid and secret, like flowers traced in fire in the phantasmal garden of a witch.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Little things seem nothing, but they give peace, like those meadow flowers which individually seem odorless but all together perfume the air.
quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

quotes.quote: A flower is relatively small. Everyone has many associations with a flower – the idea of flowers. You put out your hand to touch the flower – lean forward to smell it – maybe touch it with your lips almost without thinking – or give it to someone to please them. Still – in a way – Nobody sees a flower – really – it is so small it takes time – we haven’t time – and to see takes time, like to having a friend takes time.
quotes.author: Georgia O’Keeffe

quotes.quote: Perfumes are the feelings of flowers.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Flowers have an expression of countenance as much as men or animals. Some seem to smile; some have a sad expression; some are pensive and diffident; others again are plain, honest and upright, like the broad-faced sunflower and the hollyhock.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: I hope that while so many people are out smelling the flowers, someone is taking the time to plant some.
quotes.author: Herbert Rappaport

quotes.quote: The smallest flower is a thought, a life answering to some feature of the Great Whole, of whom they have a persistent intuition.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Break open a cherry tree and there are no flowers, but the spring breeze brings forth myriad blossoms.
quotes.author: Ikkyu Sojun

quotes.quote: People from a planet without flowers would think we must be mad with joy the whole time to have such things about us.
quotes.author: Iris Murdoch

quotes.quote: Who wants flowers when you’re dead? Nobody.
quotes.author: J. D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Stretching his hand up to reach the stars, too often man forgets the flowers at his feet.
quotes.author: Jeremy Bentham

quotes.quote: Happiness held is the seed; Happiness shared is the flower.
quotes.author: John Harrigan

quotes.quote: Love is the flower you’ve got to let it grow.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.quote: One by one she slew her fears, and then planted a flower garden over their graves.
quotes.author: John Mark Green

quotes.quote: What sunshine is to flowers, smiles are to humanity. These are but trifles, to be sure; but scattered along life's pathway, the good they do is inconceivable.
quotes.author: Joseph Addison

quotes.quote: The optimist sees the rose and not its thorns; the pessimist stares at the thorns, oblivious of the rose.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Change is a continuous process. You cannot assess it with the static yardstick of a limited time frame. When a seed is sown into the ground, you cannot immediately see the plant. You have to be patient. With time, it grows into a large tree. And then the flowers bloom, and only then can the fruits be plucked.
quotes.author: Mamata Banerjee

quotes.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
quotes.author: Max Muller

quotes.quote: In the garden the door is always open into the "holy" - growth, birth, death. Every flower holds the whole mystery in its short cycle, and in the garden we are never far away from death, the fertilizing, good, creative death.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Without darkness, nothing comes to birth, As without light, nothing flowers.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep spring from coming.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: A rose dreams of enjoying the company of bees, but none appears. The sun asks: ‘Aren’t you tired of waiting?’ ‘Yes,’ answers the rose, ‘but if I close my petals, I will wither and die.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Always grow flowers, as that will make your way full of flowers. Never grow thorns, as that will make your way thorny. Never want to target someone on an arrow. You may become the target of that arrow. Never make a well in the way of someone. As you may pass by that way sometime.
quotes.author: Rahman Baba

quotes.quote: Many eyes go through the meadow, but few see the flowers in it.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A rose’s rarest essence lives in the thorn.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Minds are like flowers; they open only when the time is right.
quotes.author: Stephen Richards

quotes.quote: Don’t let the tall weeds cast a shadow on the beautiful flowers in your garden.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
quotes.author: Stevie Wonder

quotes.quote: Let us dance in the sun, wearing wild flowers in our hair.
quotes.author: Susan Polis Schutz

quotes.quote: By cultivating the beautiful we scatter the seeds of heavenly flowers, as by doing good we cultivate those that belong to humanity.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: A garden to walk in and immensity to dream in–what more could he ask? A few flowers at his feet and above him the stars.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: You’re only here for a short visit. Don’t hurry, don’t worry. And be sure to smell the flowers along the way.
quotes.author: Walter Hagen

quotes.quote: A flower does not think of competing with the flower next to it. It just blooms.
quotes.author: Zen Shin

quotes.quote: The flu season is when you start off in the morning with a light heart and end up in the evening with a heavy nose.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: In our house the only thing that gets recycled is the flu.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: You know what really shakes you up during the flu season? When you tell the doctor your symptoms and he starts backing away.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: This is the season when you're faced with the problem: What do you say to the person who has everything— and he's breathing on you?
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: A global flu pandemic would kill between seven million and 200 million, depending on which scientist or medical journal you read.
quotes.author: Florence Nightingale

quotes.quote: Beginning in 1918 and lasting less than three years. The Spanish flu epidemic killed up to five percent of the earth's population.
quotes.author: Richard A. Clark

quotes.quote: The swine flu is evolution, isn't it? In a way, it's an evolution of flu.
quotes.author: Alan Tudyk

quotes.quote: The unique nature about the influenza virus is its great potential for changes, for mutation.
quotes.author: Margaret Chan

quotes.quote: The flu can definitely set you up for bacterial pneumonias.
quotes.author: Paul A. Offit

quotes.quote: The flu is very unpredictable when it begins and in how it takes off.
quotes.author: Harvey V. Fineberg

quotes.quote: I never indulge in rhyme or stanza Unless I'm in bed with the influenza.
quotes.author: Quintus Ennius

quotes.quote: When asked what the biggest disaster of the twentieth century was, almost nobody answers Spanish flu. It was the greatest tidal wave of death, perhaps in the whole of human history.
quotes.author: Laura Spinney

quotes.quote: But influenza never makes the list of deadly plagues. It seems so innocuous. It comes around every winter and everyone gets it sooner or later.
quotes.author: Gina Colata

quotes.quote: I know how not to get AIDS. I don't know how not to get the flu.
quotes.author: Alfred W. Crosby

quotes.quote: Flu also, however, seems unavoidable. It is spread through the air and there is a little that can be done to prevent being infected.
quotes.author: Gina Colata

quotes.quote: But for one of the first towns to be hit by the flu, the disease was not easily dismissed— not because it is so deadly but because it is so infectious.
quotes.author: Gina Colata

quotes.quote: But the Spanish flu, erroneously named for a country that didn't suppress reports of the flu ravages, is exceptionally violent.
quotes.author: Don Brown

quotes.quote: The brevity of the influenza pandemic of 1918 posed great problems to doctors at the time...it has poses great problems to historians ever since.
quotes.author: Terence Ranger

quotes.quote: The flu resculpted human populations more radically than anything since the Black Death.
quotes.author: Laura Spinney

quotes.quote: There's nothing quite like flu in terms of the risk.
quotes.author: Tom Frieden

quotes.quote: For centuries, chicken soup has been seen as a folk remedy for coughs and colds, fevers and chills— all the symptoms of the flu.
quotes.author: Dr. Jeremy Brown

quotes.quote: When we're really old, people in the future will interview us, because we lived through one of the biggest events in the human history. Like the Spanish flu of 1918 that killed over 50 million people. Or the great depression. Or Pompeii. Or the Titanic.
quotes.author: Oliver Markus Malloy

quotes.quote: Time to clean up, he knows what to do, washing after playtime can help prevent the flu.
quotes.author: Randy Whetton

quotes.quote: The flu has the potential to be much more serious than is generally presumed.
quotes.author: George Dener

quotes.quote: Chain letters are the postal equivalent of intestinal flu: you get it and pass it along to your friends.
quotes.author: Bob Garfield

quotes.quote: Teenage crush is like flu. If you find a remedy for it, it lasts for a couple of days. If you don't, it still lasts for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: When you get sick with the flu you get infected with flu viruses and they make lots of new flu viruses, but those new viruses are not exact copies of the old ones. They have mutations in them. A lot of those mutations are harmful.
quotes.author: Carl Zimmer

quotes.quote: Marriage, in contrast to the flu, starts with a fever and ends with the chills.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: My sense of divine brings with it a strange sound of music with its glories, a marvellous melody sounding like a multitude of flutes.
quotes.author: Paul Twitchell

quotes.quote: The flute of the infinite is played without ceasing, and it's sound is love.
quotes.author: Kabir

quotes.quote: Sometimes the break in your heart is like the hole in the flute. Sometimes it's the place where the music comes through.
quotes.author: Andrea Gibson

quotes.quote: A flute with no holes is not a flute.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: Playing a flute is like writing a book. You're telling what's in your heartâ€¦ It's easier to play if it's right from your heart. You get the tone, and the fingers will follow.
quotes.author: Eddie Cahill

quotes.quote: May the honey-sweet flute music that flows from Lord Mukunda's lotus mouth fill me with bliss.
quotes.author: Rupa Goswami

quotes.quote: Her grace of motion and of look, the smooth and swimming majesty of step and tread, the symmetry of form and feature, set the soul afloat, even like delicious airs of flute and harp.
quotes.author: Henry Hart Milman

quotes.quote: For me it's the instrument. If I want to think of a flute and the state of the arts I hear a vibrato; I don't know what a flute is unless the person plays it for me.
quotes.author: Morton Feldman

quotes.quote: The flute of the Pied Piper of Hamelin has never left us and it is essential that we train our ear to detect its false notes because in our case the flute is being played by the rats.
quotes.author: Dimitris Mita

quotes.quote: For me it's the instrument. If I want to think of a flute and the state of the arts I hear a vibrato; I don't know what a flute is unless the person plays it for me.
quotes.author: Morton Feldman

quotes.quote: Mirror becomes a razor when it's broken. A stick becomes a flute when it's loved.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: The gauger walked with willing foot, And aye the gauger played the flute; And what should Master Gauger play But Over the Hills and Far Away.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: The sound of the flute will cure epilepsyand sciatic gout.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: Touch not the flute when drums are sounding around; when fools have the word, the wise will be silent.
quotes.author: Johann Gottfried Von Herder

quotes.quote: When you work you are a flute through whose heart the whispering of the hours turns to music. Which of you would be a reed, dumb and silent, when all else sings together in unison?
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Broken heart is flute. I blow into the flute & design walking portrait with empty pen.
quotes.author: basant nayak

quotes.quote: The flute was an alternative to being a small fish in an increasingly bigger pool filled with a number of great guitar players.
quotes.author: Ian Anderson

quotes.quote: The fluteplayer puts breath into a flute, and who makes the music? Not the flute. The Fluteplayer!
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Everyone who plays the flute should learn singing.
quotes.author: James Galway

quotes.quote: I am a hole in a flute that the Christ's breath moves through. Listen to this music.
quotes.author: Hafez

quotes.quote: I am the hole on the flute that Gods breath flows through.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: The only good political movement I've seen lately was Occupy Wall Street. They had no leaders, which was genius. But unfortunately it always ends up with some hippy playing a flute.
quotes.author: John Lydon

quotes.quote: Then clear on a flute of purest gold A sweet little fairy played. And wonderful fairy tales she told and marvelous music made.
quotes.author: Ida Rentoul Outhwaite

quotes.quote: Dry bones make good flutes The Hollow Flute, from Voices Within The Ark Howard Schwartz, Jewish Poets,.
quotes.author: Avner Strauss

quotes.quote: Writing in the electronic world, you imagine a sound, and then you have to go and find it. It's not like imagining a flute and then making that sound materialize. That's easy!
quotes.author: Christopher Young

quotes.quote: Play the flute of felicity! You, yourself, are the melody.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: The Peruvian flute music is . . . cool. In this music, they have not yet invented the industrial revolution that leads to excessive punctuality or the failed experiment they call the nuclear family. This is the music of elements, untarnished, unrehearsed.
quotes.author: Kate Braverman

quotes.quote: The soft complaining flute, In dying notes, discovers The woes of hopeless lovers.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: This little flute of a reed thou hast carried over hills and dales, and hast breathed through it melodies eternally new.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: When the cook makes a mistake, it is the flute player who receives the blows.
quotes.author: Ancient Greek Proverb

quotes.quote: Life is like a flute. It may have many holes and emptiness but if you work on it carefully, it can play magical melodies.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Teach him how you will, a pig will never play the flute.
quotes.author: Robert Jordan

quotes.quote: It is not solid wood that can become a flute, but the empty reed.
quotes.author: Hazrat Inayat Khan

quotes.quote: Life is a living flute, yoga is the art of creating melody and rhythm in it.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The flute is not an instrument that has a good moral effect. It is too exciting.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The flute is the true magical rod that changes all it touches in the inward world; an enchanter's wand at which the secret depths of the soul open. The inward world is the true world," said Vult; "the moonlight that shines into our hearts.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Friedrich Richter

quotes.quote: To blow is not to play on the flute; you must move the fingers.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: When you think about flying, it's nuts really. Here you are at about 40,000 feet, screaming along at 700 miles an hour and you're sitting there drinking Diet Pepsi and eating peanuts. It just doesn't make any sense.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: Flying may not be all plain sailing, but the fun of it is worth the price.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Flying is hours and hours of boredom sprinkled with a few seconds of sheer terror.
quotes.author: Gregory ''Pappy'' Boyington

quotes.quote: Sometimes, flying feels too godlike to be attained by man. Sometimes, the world from above seems too beautiful, too wonderful, too distant for human eyes to see . . .
quotes.author: Charles A. Lindbergh

quotes.quote: The exhilaration of flying is too keen, the pleasure too great, for it to be neglected as a sport.
quotes.author: Orville Wright

quotes.quote: Flying is more than a sport and more than a job; flying is pure passion and desire, which fill a lifetime.
quotes.author: General Adolf Galland

quotes.quote: Flying is a lot like playing a musical instrument; you're doing so many things and thinking of so many other things, all at the same time. It becomes a spiritual experience. Something wonderful happens in the pit of your stomach.
quotes.author: Dusty Mctavish

quotes.quote: Flying has torn apart the relationship of space and time: it uses our old clock but with new yardsticks.
quotes.author: Charles A. Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Once you have learned to fly your plane, it is far less fatiguing to fly than it is to drive a car. You don't have to watch every second for cats, dogs, children, lights, road signs, ladies with baby carriages and citizens who drive out in the middle of block against the lights. Nobody who has not been up in the sky on a glorious morning can possibly imagine the way a pilot feels in free heaven.
quotes.author: William T. Piper

quotes.quote: Flying was a very tangible freedom. In those days, it was beauty, adventure, discovery - the epitome of breaking into new worlds.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: When once you have tasted flight, you will forever walk the earth with your eyes turned skyward, for there you have been, and there you will always long to return.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: There is no sport equal to that which aviators enjoy while being carried through the air on great white wings.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.quote: More than anything else, the sensation of flying is one of perfect peace mingled with an excitement that strains every nerve to the utmost — if you can conceive of such a combination.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.quote: I learned the discipline of flying in order to have the freedom of flight....Discipline prevents crashes.
quotes.author: Captain John Cook

quotes.quote: I have often said that the lure of flying is the lure of beauty. That the reasons flyers fly, whether they know it or not, is the aesthetic appeal of flying.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: Flying alone! Nothing gives such a sense of mastery over time over mechanism, mastery indeed over space, time, and life itself, as this.
quotes.author: Cecil Day Lewis

quotes.quote: Any pilot can describe the mechanics of flying.What it can do for the spirit of man is beyond description.
quotes.author: Barry M. Goldwater

quotes.quote: Flying is inherently dangerous. We like to gloss that over with clever rhetoric and comforting statistics, but these facts remain: gravity is constant and powerful, and speed kills. In combination, they are particularly destructive.
quotes.author: Dan Manningham

quotes.quote: Flying is learning how to throw yourself at the ground and miss.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: There is no more exciting sport than flying, for if you lose, you die.
quotes.author: Christopher Paolini

quotes.quote: Flying is awful, there's nothing to do when you're up in the air. I bloat up, my skin gets dry, and when we hit turbulence, I'm terrified.
quotes.author: Daniela Pestova

quotes.quote: I don't have a fear of flying; I have a fear of crashing.
quotes.author: Billy Bob Thornton

quotes.quote: Why fly? Simple. I'm not happy unless there's some room between me and the ground.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I think it is a pity to lose the romantic side of flying and simply to accept it as a common means of transport....
quotes.author: Amy Johnson

quotes.quote: There are only two emotions in a plane: boredom and terror.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: You haven't seen a tree until you've seen its shadow from the sky.
quotes.author: Amelia Earhart

quotes.quote: The higher we soar the smaller we appear to those who cannot fly.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: There are no signposts in the sky to show a man has passed that way before. There are no channels marked. The flier breaks each second into new uncharted seas.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: That's the thing about flying: You could talk to someone for hours and never even know his name, share your deepest secrets and then never see them again.
quotes.author: Jennifer E. Smith

quotes.quote: Flying can be easy at times, but with the wrong machine or the wrong person at the controls, it is the most difficult thing in the world.
quotes.author: Paul Gallagher

quotes.quote: He who would learn to fly one day must first learn to stand and walk and run and climb and dance; one cannot fly into flying.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: To most people the sky is the limit. To those who love flying, the sky is home.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I was sold on flying as soon as I had a taste for it.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: If you are bored flying, your standards are too low.
quotes.author: Lauran Paine Jr

quotes.quote: In flying I have learned that carelessness and overconfidence are usually far more dangerous than deliberately accepted risks.
quotes.author: Wilbur Wright

quotes.quote: Flying is within our grasp. We have naught to do but take it.
quotes.author: Charles F. Duryea

quotes.quote: We who fly do so for the love of flying. We are alive in the air with this miracle that lies in our hands and beneath our feet.
quotes.author: Cecil Day Lewis

quotes.quote: [Flying] fosters fantasies of childhood, of omnipotence, rapid shifts of being, miraculous moments; it stirs our capacity for dreaming.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol

quotes.quote: All my life, I've never been able to get enough airplanes. This will keep me flying every day.
quotes.author: Astronaut Robert 'Hoot' Gibson

quotes.quote: Flying prevails whenever a man and his airplane are put to a test of maximum performance.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Below twenty, boys are too rash for flying.Above twenty-five they are too prudent.
quotes.author: W.J. Abbott

quotes.quote: Flying is hypnotic and all pilots are victims to the spell. Their world islike a magic island in which the factors of life and death assume their proper values. Thinking becomes clear because there are no earthly foibles or embellishments to confuse it.
quotes.author: Ernest K. Gann

quotes.quote: I fly because it releases my mind from the tyranny of petty things.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Flying without feathers is not easy; my wings have no feathers.
quotes.author: Plautus

quotes.quote: There is no flying without wings.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Angels can fly because they take themselves lightly.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: The good thing about flying solo is it's never boring.
quotes.author: Steve Fossett

quotes.quote: It's only when you're flying above it that you realize how incredible the Earth really is.
quotes.author: Philippe Perrin

quotes.quote: Flying is done largely with the imagination.
quotes.author: Wolfgang Langwiesche

quotes.quote: See driving is like stabbing someone, it's very personal. While flying is like shooting someone, it's more distant.
quotes.author: Bushwick Bill

quotes.quote: Pilots are drawn to flying because it's a perfect combination of science, romance and adventure.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: We are each of us angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another.
quotes.author: Luciano De Crescenzo

quotes.quote: Flying has torn apart the relationship of space and time. It uses our old clock but with new yardsticks.
quotes.author: Charles Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Flying. Whatever any other organism has been able to do man should surely be able to do also, though he may go a different way about it.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Just because there are flaws in aircraft design that doesn't mean flying carpets exist.
quotes.author: Ben Goldacre

quotes.quote: To seize the flying thought before it escapes us is our only touch with reality.
quotes.author: Ellen Glasgow

quotes.quote: The virtue of the soul does not consist in flying high, but in walking orderly.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: The focus and the concentration and the attention to detail that flying takes is a kind of meditation. I find it restful and engaging, and other things slip away.
quotes.author: Harrison Ford

quotes.quote: All the science of flying has been captured in the breadth of an instrument board, but not the religion of it.
quotes.author: Beryl Markham

quotes.quote: You can't keep the birds of sadness from flying over your head, but you can keep them from nesting in your hair.
quotes.author: Sharon Creech

quotes.quote: If anyone wonders why the airlines are not doing well it is because flying has been made such an unpleasant and degrading experience.
quotes.author: Keith Henson

quotes.quote: Anyone can fly. All you need is somewhere to go that you can't get to any other way. The next thing you know, you're flying among the stars.
quotes.author: Faith Ringgold

quotes.quote: If a bird is flying for pleasure, it flies with the wind, but if it meets danger it turns and faces the wind, in order that it may rise higher.
quotes.author: Corrie ten Boom

quotes.quote: One thing about flying that he never got used to was that no matter how awful the weather was on the ground, if you flew high enough you could always find the sun.
quotes.author: Tom Clancy

quotes.quote: Human thought, flying on the trapezes of the star filled universe, with mathematics stretched beneath, was like an acrobat working with a net but suddenly noticing that in reality there is no net.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Life is a frail moth flying Caught in the web of the years that pass.
quotes.author: Sara Teasdale

quotes.quote: Flying fosters fantasies of childhood, of omnipotence, rapid shifts of being, miraculous moments; it stirs our capacity for dreaming.
quotes.author: Joyce Carol Oates

quotes.quote: All really great flying adventures begin at dawn.
quotes.author: Stephen Coonts

quotes.quote: Flying does not rely so much on strength, as on physical and mental co ordination.
quotes.author: Baroness de Laroche

quotes.quote: Every wind is fare when we are flying from misfortune.
quotes.author: Sophocles

quotes.quote: Never confuse motion with action.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Lack of direction, not lack of time, is the problem. We all have twenty-four hour days.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The key to success is to focus our conscious mind on things we desire not things we fear.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes.quote: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Concentration is the secret of strengths in politics, in war, in trade, in short in all management of human affairs.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want.
quotes.author: Ben Stein

quotes.quote: Decide upon your major definite purpose in life and then organize all your activities around it.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Keep focused on the substantive issues. To make a decision means having to go through one door and closing all others.
quotes.author: Abraham Zaleznik

quotes.quote: Most of what we say and do is not essential. If you can eliminate it, you'll have more time, and more tranquillity. Ask yourself at every moment, 'Is this necessary''
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: If you focus on the possible when you experience difficult situations, YOU CAN positively change your outlook, reduce your stress, and concentrate on achieving things that otherwise may not have been possible.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: To focus means to bring your attention to the center, to concentrate on one thing intently in order to gain clarity.
quotes.author: Cheryl Richardson

quotes.quote: It was better to focus on the good and what we had than to focus on what we had lost and were losing.
quotes.author: Paul And Tracey Mcmanus

quotes.quote: The inability to prioritize and focus also contributes to procrastination.
quotes.author: Romuald Andrade

quotes.quote: Most people have no idea of the giant capacity we can immediately command when we focus all of our resources on mastering a single area of our lives.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: A clear vision, backed by definite plans, gives you a tremendous feeling of confidence and personal power.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: All that we are is the result of what we have thought.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Beware lest you lose the substance by grasping at the shadow.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Do whatever you do intensely.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Be occupied, then, with what you really value and let the thief take something else.
quotes.author: Mevlana Rumi

quotes.quote: It is not enough to be busy; so are the ants. The question is: What are we busy about?
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To be everywhere is to be nowhere.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Some of the steps you take may end up being detours or out-and-out mistakes. By staying focused on your vision, though, you'll find even those steps useful in the creating process.
quotes.author: David Emerald

quotes.quote: It's important to focus on what we do best and master one craft at a time.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: An expert is a person who has made all the mistakes that can be made in a very narrow field.
quotes.author: Neils Bohr

quotes.quote: We ve got to remember that we get whatever we focus on in life. If we keep focusing on what we don t want, we ll have more of it. The first step to creating any change is deciding what you do want so that you have something to move toward.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Getting distracted by trifles is the easiest thing in the world? Focus on your main duty
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: When you focus not on what you want, but on what you have, you end up getting more of what you want anyway.
quotes.author: Richard Carlson

quotes.quote: You can't depend on your eyes when your imagination is out of focus.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: You can do only one thing at a time. I simply tackle one problem and concentrate all efforts on what I am doing at the moment.
quotes.author: Maxwell Maltz

quotes.quote: The immature mind hops from one thing to another; the mature mind seeks to follow through.
quotes.author: Harry A. Overstreet

quotes.quote: If you focus on results, you will never change. If you focus on change, you will get results.
quotes.author: Jack Dixon

quotes.quote: Only when your consciousness is totally focused on the moment you are in can you receive whatever gift, lesson, or delight that moment has to offer.
quotes.author: Barbara De Angelis

quotes.quote: It is a process of diverting one's scattered forces into one powerful channel.
quotes.author: James Allen

quotes.quote: Our thoughts create our reality -- where we put our focus is the direction we tend to go.
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Focus on your potential instead of your limitations
quotes.author: Alan Loy McGinnis

quotes.quote: Focus more on your desire than on your doubt, and the dream will take care of itself. You may be surprised at how easily this happens. Your doubts are not as powerful as your desires, unless you make them so.
quotes.author: Marcia Wieder

quotes.quote: We can always choose to perceive things differently. You can focus on what's wrong in your life, or you can focus on what's right.
quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

quotes.quote: Focus should be to encourage and develop creativity in all children without the ultimate goal begin to make all children inventors, but rather to develop a future generation of critical thinkers.
quotes.author: Faraq Mousa

quotes.quote: If you don't pay appropriate attention to what has your attention, it will take more of your attention than it deserves.
quotes.author: David Allen

quotes.quote: The key to being focused is to intensely enjoy whatever you are doing.
quotes.author: David Allio

quotes.quote: A focused man will walk a straighter path to all his successes and therefore will have more to gain.
quotes.author: Roger Asselin

quotes.quote: An even more narrow focus still comes with the hollow puppet of memory.
quotes.author: Nicoletta Baumeister

quotes.quote: If I am centered, then I can reach out to what's happening on the circumference. The ideal is to not lose touch with the centre.
quotes.author: Melanie Circle

quotes.quote: Visualize this thing you want. See it, feel it, believe in it. Make your mental blueprint and begin.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: What people say, what people do, and what they say they do are entirely different things.
quotes.author: Margaret Meade

quotes.quote: What we see depends mainly on what we look for.
quotes.author: Sir John Lubbock

quotes.quote: When meditation is mastered, the mind is unwavering like the flame of a lamp in a windless place.
quotes.author: Bhagavad Gita

quotes.quote: You must not only aim right, but draw the bow with all your might.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Instead of focusing on how much you can accomplish, focus on how much you can absolutely love what you're doing.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: It is wise to direct your anger towards problems â€“ not people; to focus your energies on answers â€“ not excuses.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: Focus is the key to accomplish what is necessary - easy word to spell, it contains only five letters but it is probably one of the most powerful words there are in order to move forward with confidence and with the expected results.
quotes.author: Byron Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Each of my records has a different focus, a different theme.
quotes.author: Mark Edwards

quotes.quote: You don't get results by focusing on results. You get results by focusing on the actions that produce results.
quotes.author: Mike Hawkins

quotes.quote: Focus is a matter of deciding what things you're not going to do.
quotes.author: John Carmack

quotes.quote: Be dramatically willing to focus on the customer at all costs, even at the cost of obsoleting your own stuff.
quotes.author: Scott Cook

quotes.quote: Don't dwell on what went wrong. Instead, focus on what to do next. Spend your energies on moving forward toward finding the answer.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: One reason so few of us achieve what we truly want is that we never direct our focus; we never concentrate our power. Most people dabble their way through life, never deciding to master anything in particular.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: If you just focus on the smallest details, you never get the big picture right.
quotes.author: Leroy Hood

quotes.quote: The sun's energy warms the world. But when you focus it through a magnifying glass it can start a fire. Focus is so powerful!
quotes.author: Alan Pariser

quotes.quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

quotes.quote: Being selectiveâ€”doing lessâ€”is the path of the productive. Focus on the important few and ignore the rest.
quotes.author: Timothy Ferriss

quotes.quote: Instead of focusing on that circumstances that you cannot change â€“ focus strongly and powerfully on the circumstances that you can.
quotes.author: Joy Page

quotes.quote: Very occasionally, if you pay really close attention, life doesn't suck.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Focus on your goals, not your fear. Focus like a laser beam on your goals.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: When you stay focused and keep a commitment you create momentum, and momentum creates momentum.
quotes.author: Rich Fettke

quotes.quote: Any artist that's involved in their work is inevitably going to have a focus in what they do.
quotes.author: Jock Sturges

quotes.quote: Concentration can be cultivated. One can learn to exercise will power, discipline one's body and train one's mind.
quotes.author: Anil Ambani

quotes.quote: Goals provide the energy source that powers our lives. One of the best ways we can get the most from the energy we have is to focus it. That is what goals can do for us; concentrate our energy.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: My main focus is on my game.
quotes.author: Tiger Woods

quotes.quote: One thing at a time: It is important that we focus on the task that is at present in hand.
quotes.author: John Hughes

quotes.quote: So rather than trying to do too many things at once, switch over to a mindset of focusing on just one thing while you are working.
quotes.author: Timo Kiander

quotes.quote: I don't care too much what happened in the past. I prefer to focus on what is coming next and I am really looking forward to it.
quotes.author: Sebastian Vettel

quotes.quote: Prioritizing sharpens your vision so you can focus on the most important things.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Focus on remedies, not faults.
quotes.author: Jack Nicklaus

quotes.quote: Life is short. Focus on what really matters most; you should change your priorities over time.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Concentrated attention is the collection of units of power on a chosen point of intention.
quotes.author: James Arthur Ray

quotes.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Always focus on the front windshield and not the review mirror.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Whenever you want to achieve something, keep your eyes open, concentrate and make sure you know exactly what it is you want. No one can hit their target with their eyes closed.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Focus on the positives and be grateful.
quotes.author: Katrina Bowden

quotes.quote: What you stay focused on will grow.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Focus on your strengths, not your weaknesses. Focus on your character, not your reputation. Focus on your blessings, not your misfortunes.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Focusing is about saying No.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: But when you're beginning, you should try to focus on something you love and your own way of doing things.
quotes.author: Jerry Harrison

quotes.quote: Without goals, you will end up going nowhere, or, you will end up following someone else's map! Develop your map today - set your goals and focus!
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Whenever something bad happens, keep calm, take a few deep breaths and shift the focus to something positive.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Focus on the journey, not the destination. Joy is found not in finishing an activity but in doing it.
quotes.author: Greg Anderson

quotes.quote: Successful people maintain a positive focus in life no matter what is going on around them. They stay focused on their past successes rather than their past failures, and on the next action steps they need to take to get them closer to the fulfillment of their goals rather than all the other distractions that life presents to them.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: It's important to focus on what we do best and master one craft at a time.
quotes.author: Russell Simmons

quotes.quote: Focus on a big dream that includes others; By empowering others you will in turn become empowered.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Wherever you focus your attention and put your energy, that area will bring forth fruit.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Every relationship needs commitment in it in order for it to grow and when the focus is love, we raise our standards.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Success should produce one humble, focused person without a control freak complex.
quotes.author: Monica L. Wofford

quotes.quote: Always try to be positively focused on what you want and adamantly averse to those trying to keep you from it.
quotes.author: Monica L. Wofford

quotes.quote: Do not dwell in the past, Do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: It seems essential, in relationships and all tasks, that we concentrate only on what is most significant and important.
quotes.author: Soren Kierkegaard

quotes.quote: All intelligent thoughts have already been thought; what is necessary is only to try to think them again.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: I have always thought the actions of men the best interpreters of their thoughts.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.quote: If you realized how powerful your thoughts are, you would never think a negative thought.
quotes.author: Peace Pilgrim

quotes.quote: If a man is foolish enough to reveal his thoughts, the least he can do is conceal his whereabouts.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Some people always finish a sentence before starting the thought.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of fools; mindful and mindless.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If we want to direct and focus our lives, career, relationships, achievements, then we must take control of our consistent actions.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: One reason so few of us get/do/become what we truly want is that we never direct our focus in a concentrated way.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: If you keep focusing on or about negative things, your mind will be conditioned to bring them up automatically.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Reach high for stars that lie hidden in your soul. Dream deep, for every dream proceeds a goal.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Nothing good or bad, but thinking makes it so.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Our thoughts determine our responses to life.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: We are not victims of the world. To the extent that we control our thought, we control the world.
quotes.author: John Taylor Wood

quotes.quote: Those who sat back to gloat over their achievements often died with those thoughts.
quotes.author: Eric Van Lustbader

quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you. I could walk through my garden forever.
quotes.author: Alfred Tennyson

quotes.quote: It is a curious thought, but it is only when you see people looking ridiculous that you realize just how much you love them.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Success isn't magic or hocus-pocus. It's simply learning how to focus.
quotes.author: Jack Canfield

quotes.quote: The trouble with many plans is that they are based on the way things are now.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: To be successful, your personal plan must focus on what you want, not what you have.
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Focus on where you want to go, not where you're currently are.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: The only thing you have to fear is not giving 100 percent.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Life is short. Focus from this day forward on making a difference.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: The path to success is to take massive determined action.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Your dreams minus your doubts equal your true worth.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Dream your wildest dreams and you will live a wild life.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord

quotes.quote: Never stop learning. If you learn one new thing everyday, you will overcome 99 percent of your competition.
quotes.author: Joe Carlozo

quotes.quote: Don't wish, wonder, or focus on 'what if?'
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: My special gift is my vision, my commitment, and my willingness to do whatever it takes.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: The starting point of all achievement is desire. Keep in constantly in mind. Weak desire brings weak results, just as a small amount of fire makes a small amount of heat.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Man is what he believes.
quotes.author: Anton Chekov

quotes.quote: It is the mind that makes good or ill. That which makes us happy or sad; rich or poor.
quotes.author: Edmund Spencer

quotes.quote: To succeed, you need to take that gut feeling in what you believe and act on it with all of your heart.
quotes.author: Christy Borgeld

quotes.quote: Ideas shape the course of history.
quotes.author: John Keynes

quotes.quote: Truth is the torch that gleams through the fog without dispelling it.
quotes.author: Claude Adrien Helvetius

quotes.quote: The future is a fog that is still hanging out over the sea, a boat that floats home or does not.
quotes.author: Anne Sexton

quotes.quote: There it is, fog, atmospheric moisture still uncertain in destination, not quite weather and not altogether mood, yet partaking of both.
quotes.author: Hal Borland

quotes.quote: The fog is clearing; life is a matter of taste.
quotes.author: Frank Wedekind

quotes.quote: The truth is a fog, in which one man sees the heavenly host and the other one sees a flying elephant
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Heavy fog is a weird guide! If you go on a journey with him, it takes you from nowhere and leaves you at nowhere!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I see a lot of fog and a few lights. I like it when life's hidden. It gives you a chance to imagine nice things, nicer than they are.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: Let us go in; the fog is rising.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: Even as fog continues to lie in the valleys, so does ancient sin cling to the low places, the depressions in the world consciousness.
quotes.author: DeWitt Bodeen

quotes.quote: Love is a fog that burns with the first daylight of reality.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: And when the fog's over and the stars and the moon come out at night it'll be a beautiful sight.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: I don't think I'm going to do any good work this morning.
quotes.author: David O. Selznick

quotes.quote: Fog and hypocrisy that is to say, shadow, convention, decency these were the very things that lent to London its poetry and romance.
quotes.author: Ada Leverson

quotes.quote: The science hangs like a gathering fog in a valley, a fog which begins nowhere and goes nowhere, an incidental, unmeaning inconvenience to passers by.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: When it's foggy in the pulpit it's cloudy in the pew.
quotes.author: Cavett Robert

quotes.quote: Sometimes it is hard to see in life. If the fog rolls in we can't see anything. Most people get caught up in life that they forget the purpose of life is to be happy.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: At night the fog was thick and full of light, and sometimes voices.
quotes.author: Erin Bow

quotes.quote: You never realized how thick your fog was until it lifted.
quotes.author: J.R. Ward

quotes.quote: We love fog because it shifts old anomalies into the elements surrounding them. It gives relief from a way of seeing.
quotes.author: Eavan Boland

quotes.quote: The fog comes on little cat feet. It sits looking over harbor and city on silent haunches and then moves on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Love feels like this fog. It slinks in from some hidden place and silently overtakes me. It seems so dense, but when I reach into it, there's nothing of substance. Then, before too long, it simply vanishes. That's my perception of love.
quotes.author: Alex Z. Moores

quotes.quote: In nature, everything has a job. The job of the fog is to beautify further the existing beauties!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Inside the fogs, you think better and thus you see better!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: I see a lot of fog and a few lights. I like when life's hidden. Gives you a chance to imagine nice things. Nicer than they are.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: No, it's just mist. A little fog, when it breaks up.
quotes.author: Olivier Assayas

quotes.quote: Human interest stories - they cloud the issues and fog the mind.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: My mind is in a muddle. Like... thick fog. I can't make sense to myself sometimes.
quotes.author: Edward D. Wood Jr.

quotes.quote: The snake, the rat, the cat, the dog / How you going see them if you living in the fog
quotes.author: Earl Simmons

quotes.quote: Scent of dried flowers / And I'm walking through the fog / Walking through the fog / Scent of dried flowers
quotes.author: Catherine Marie Warner

quotes.quote: We feel nothing so jump into the fog / In the hope that we hit the ground upright
quotes.author: Matthew Edward Murphy

quotes.quote: Who believe in misty ways. / Everything is lovely, / In a misty morning glaze. / I like misty water, / I like fog and haze.
quotes.author: Raymond Douglas Davies

quotes.quote: Like a ship at sea, I'm just lost in a fog / My mind is hazy, my thoughts are blue / Guess I'll always be kinda / Lost in a fog without you
quotes.author: Dorothy Fields

quotes.quote: But nobody listens to my plaintiff monologue / I had a dog he's lost in a fog / Me and the dog are just wandering in a fog / Won't some kind gentleman see us home
quotes.author: Vivian Ellis

quotes.quote: Can anyone fly into these grey skies? / Is there somewhere I'm meant to be? / Sea fog comes like a river / Rolls a stone it's rolling
quotes.author: Jesse Quin

quotes.quote: Fog is a cloud close to land or water. People cannot see well in fog.
quotes.author: Helen Frost

quotes.quote: Fog forms in humid air. Humid air holds water vapor. Water vapor is a gas that cannot be seen.
quotes.author: Helen Frost

quotes.quote: In most parts of the world fog has always been a natural phenomenon, clouding the air with tiny water particles when the climatic conditions are right.
quotes.author: Christine L. Corton

quotes.quote: Fog was natural, smoke unnatural.
quotes.author: Christine L. Corton

quotes.quote: And fog was indeed more likely to be experienced in the poorer districts of the capital.
quotes.author: Christine L. Corton

quotes.quote: Fog could thus appear as a kind of food ingested or inhaled, not only by the poor.
quotes.author: Christine L. Corton

quotes.quote: Foggy autumn mornings during longer autumn nights often reaches the dew point temperature and fog forms.
quotes.author: Steven L. Horstmeyer

quotes.quote: Fog is a stratus cloud on the ground.
quotes.author: Steven L. Horstmeyer

quotes.quote: What is a cloud in the air from the vantage point of a valley is fog form the mountain side at the same elevation as the cloud.
quotes.author: Steven L. Horstmeyer

quotes.quote: Fog is not water vapor but condensed liquid or solid water. If a fog is composed of small ice crystals it is termed frozen fog.
quotes.author: Steven L. Horstmeyer

quotes.quote: Fog is most common where water is plentiful and there is a cool surface to chill the air.
quotes.author: Steven L. Horstmeyer

quotes.quote: The fog of life is provided as source of confusion to the mind so that we cannot rely on it and must turn to our feeling and intuitive selves.
quotes.author: Stephen Harrison

quotes.quote: A trees get their sap water entirely through their roots, fog is only a substitute for rain when it condenses and drips on the ground.
quotes.author: Rutherford Platt

quotes.quote: To understand the fog, it helps to first understand the cloud.
quotes.author: David Byrd

quotes.quote: Adversity is much like fog in our lives, and sometimes God will use fog of adversity to teach and direct us.
quotes.author: David Byrd

quotes.quote: Just like driving in the fog, adversity slows us to a crawl and sometimes brings us to a complete stop.
quotes.author: David Byrd

quotes.quote: The fog of adversity slows our pace from the hustle and bustle of life.
quotes.author: David Byrd

quotes.quote: Fog may be unpleasant, and traveling in fog can be hazardous, but breathing fog cannot harm you.
quotes.author: Michael Allaby

quotes.quote: The fog comes / on little cat feet. / It sits looking / over harbor and city / on silent haunches / and then moves on.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: A sudden fog-drift muffled the ocean, / A throbbing of engines moved in it, / At length, a stone's throw out, between the rocks and the vapor, / One by one moved shadow
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: Holding a difficult path between the peril of the sea-fog / And the foam on / the shore granite. / One by one, trailing their leader, six crept by me, / Out of the vapor and into it
quotes.author: Robinson Jeffers

quotes.quote: The fog's gray curtain round me draws, / And leaves no world to me / Save this swift drama of the stirred / And restless sea.
quotes.author: Silas Weir Mitchell

quotes.quote: Forth of the shrouding fog they roll, / As from a viewless world, / Leap spectral white, and, pausing, break, / In thunder hurled.
quotes.author: Silas Weir Mitchell

quotes.quote: The fog slips ghost like into a thousand rooms, / Whirls over sleeping faces, / Spins in an atomy dance round misty street lamps; / And blows in cloudy waves over open spaces . . .
quotes.author: Conrad Potter Aiken

quotes.quote: Follow your image as far as you can no matter how useless you think it is. Push yourself.
quotes.author: Nikki Giovanni

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams and use your natural-born talents and skills to make this a better world for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Paul Watson

quotes.quote: Follow your heart and your mind will create.
quotes.author: Ray Wilkins

quotes.quote: Never follow your dreams. Follow your effort.
quotes.author: Mark Cuban

quotes.quote: The wisest men follow their own direction.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Follow your heart's truth with no need for personal gain other than the feeling produced when doing what you truly love.
quotes.author: Keke Palmer

quotes.quote: Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: At every crossroad, follow your dream. It is courageous to let your heart lead the way.
quotes.author: Thomas Leland

quotes.quote: Follow your dream as long as you live, do not lessen the time of following desire, for wasting time is an abomination of the spirit.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: Follow your passions, follow your heart, and the things you need will come.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: To be happy, follow the heart not the thoughts.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Follow your intuition, listening to your dreams, your inner voice to guide you.
quotes.author: Katori Hall

quotes.quote: Follow your own particular dreams. We are handed a life by peers, parents and society, you can do that or follow your own dreams. Life is short, be a dreamer but be a practical person.
quotes.author: Hugh Hefner

quotes.quote: Follow your most intense obsessions mercilessly.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Follow your heart because it always knows.
quotes.author: Lana Parrilla

quotes.quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Follow your heart and make it your decision.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: People appreciate and follow the person who can persuade them properly. Make that person you.
quotes.author: Vernon Howard

quotes.quote: Your world will follow your idea about yourself.
quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch

quotes.quote: Follow your inner moonlight; don't hide the madness.
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts. That's where true wisdom manifests itself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Where the mind goes, everything follows.
quotes.author: Terry Orlick

quotes.quote: Follow your own path, no matter what people say.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: You can do anything as long as you don't stop believing. When it is meant to be, it will be. You just have to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Keke Palmer

quotes.quote: Have the courage to follow your heart and intuition. They somehow already know what you truly want to become. Everything else is secondary.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.
quotes.author: Jay Weatherill

quotes.quote: Follow your honest convictions and be strong.
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: Follow your instincts and do not let other people's opinion of you become your opinion of yourself.
quotes.author: Sarah Jessica Parker

quotes.quote: Let us follow the truth whither so ever it leads.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Follow your heart and you won't get lost.
quotes.author: Brett Dennen

quotes.quote: It is important to keep your head up and follow what you believe is right.
quotes.author: Ajay Naidu

quotes.quote: Really try to follow what it is that you want to do and what your heart is telling you to do.
quotes.author: Jennifer Aniston

quotes.quote: Don't follow a trend. Follow your heart.
quotes.author: Krist Novoselic

quotes.quote: Follow your passion and you'll be successful.
quotes.author: Duane Ludwig

quotes.quote: Don't follow your feeling. Just follow the word.
quotes.author: Lecrae

quotes.quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
quotes.author: Donovan Bailey

quotes.quote: When it is not in our power to follow what is true, we ought to follow what is most probable.
quotes.author: Rene Descartes

quotes.quote: Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: When you follow your heart, you're never supposed to do things because of what you think people might say. You do it for the opposite reasons.
quotes.author: Will.I.Am

quotes.quote: If you follow the lead of the artists, they will take you places that you could never go on your own.
quotes.author: Jimmy Lovine

quotes.quote: You do have to follow your heart, otherwise you're living a false life.
quotes.author: Eric Mabius

quotes.quote: Don't just dream big; follow through.
quotes.author: Bob Buford

quotes.quote: Knowledge without follow-through is worse than no knowledge.
quotes.author: Charles Bukowski

quotes.quote: Those who are blessed with the most talent don't necessarily outperform everyone else. It's the people with follow-through who excel.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: Good thoughts are no better than good dreams if you don't follow through.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: What makes success is not your genius idea, but the execution and follow-through around it.
quotes.author: Robin Sharma

quotes.quote: Spare your words, your actions will speak for you.
quotes.author: Akiroq Brost

quotes.quote: Follow through. You’d be surprised how many people don’t do that. If you have to stay up all night to get it done, then do that. If you consistently see that you cannot actually get things done in the time frame you committed to, stop over committing.
quotes.author: Amber Hurdle

quotes.quote: You must know in your heart before anyone else does what is going to be good and then follow through.
quotes.author: Bill Budge

quotes.quote: If I say something, I mean it. If I promise something, best as I can, I'm going to follow through. If I say I have your back, I genuinely mean it.
quotes.author: Bonnie Hammer

quotes.quote: Character is the ability to follow through on a resolution long after the emotion with which it was made has passed.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Follow up and follow through until the task is completed, the prize won.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: There aren’t many sure things in life, but one thing I know for sure is that you have to deal with the consequences of your actions. You have to follow through on some things.
quotes.author: Cecelia Ahern

quotes.quote: I can give you a six-word formula for success: Think things through - then follow through.
quotes.author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quotes.quote: Personal excellence can be achieved by a visionary goal, through planning, dedicated execution, and total follow-through.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: The mature mind seeks to follow through.
quotes.author: Harry Allen Overstreet

quotes.quote: Character - in things great and small - is indicated when a man (or person) pursues with sustained follow-through what he feels himself capable of doing.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Diligent follow-up and follow-through will set you apart from the crowd and communicate excellence.
quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

quotes.quote: The faith comes by hearing; the reward by follow-through.
quotes.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

quotes.quote: Many people don't focus enough on execution. If you make a commitment to get something done, you need to follow through on that commitment.
quotes.author: Kenneth Chenault

quotes.quote: I give myself very good advice, but I very seldom follow it.
quotes.author: Lewis Carroll

quotes.quote: Do what you say you're going to do. Follow through means never having to say you're sorry.
quotes.author: Mark Goulston

quotes.quote: Leverage is the ability to apply positive pressure on yourself to follow through on your decisions even when it hurts.
quotes.author: Orrin Woodward

quotes.quote: If you doubt you can accomplish something, then you can't accomplish it. You have to have confidence in your ability, and then be tough enough to follow through.
quotes.author: Rosalynn Carter

quotes.quote: I want to excel at something, to follow through, to not be afraid.
quotes.author: SZA

quotes.quote: Human beings absolutely follow through on who they believe they are.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Let me realize that my past failures at follow-through are no indication of my future performance. They're just healthy little fires that are gonna warm up my ass.
quotes.author: Ze Frank

quotes.quote: It was character that got us out of bed, commitment that moved us into action, and discipline that enabled us to follow through.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Actions speak louder than words.
quotes.author: Becca Fitzpatrick

quotes.quote: We tell God that He can have all of us, and then we give Him none of us. And I would suggest that ‘intent’ without ‘action’ is like a body without a skeleton. It just doesn’t stand up.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life. Don't be trapped by dogma - which is living with the results of other people's thinking. Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice. And most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: I came out of the womb born to sing and dance. I have to follow my heart.
quotes.author: Jennifer Ellison

quotes.quote: Follow your heart, but be quiet for a while first. Ask questions, then feel the answer. Learn to trust your heart.
quotes.author: Carl W. Buechner

quotes.quote: Go ahead and stand up for what you believe in. As I've learned, that's the path to happiness.
quotes.author: Lesley Ann

quotes.quote: You do have to follow your heart, otherwise you're living a false life.
quotes.author: Eric Mabius

quotes.quote: You can't do passion halfway. Living your passion means you're all in. You trust your heart and trust your gut wherever that takes you.
quotes.author: Joe Plumeri

quotes.quote: How wrong we are to ignore our hearts to follow the familiar path.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: Born free to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Dexter Born Free

quotes.quote: Follow your heart. Then root its longing with the facts.
quotes.author: Gina Greenlee

quotes.quote: You can choose to follow your heart always.
quotes.author: Miguel Angel Ruiz

quotes.quote: Wherever you go, go with all your heart.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: You will never follow your own inner voice until you clear up the doubts in your mind.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.quote: Follow your heart but take your brain with you.
quotes.author: Alfred Adler

quotes.quote: Follow your heart. Even though it's on your left, it's always right.
quotes.author: Fannila Tobelli

quotes.quote: Let yourself be silently drawn by the strange pull of what you really love. It will not lead you astray.
quotes.author: Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: To know how to choose a path with heart is to learn how to follow intuitive feeling. Logic can tell you superficially where a path might lead to, but it cannot judge whether your heart will be in it.
quotes.author: Jean Shinoda Bolen

quotes.quote: If you ever find yourself in doubt follow your heart as it will guide you to the right course.
quotes.author: Anurag Prakash Ray

quotes.quote: If you follow your heart and end with a song.
quotes.author: Ella Enchanted

quotes.quote: Heart-flow means listening to your intuition and hunches and following your heart. How can you let your heart lead today?
quotes.author: Amy Leigh Mercree

quotes.quote: Just follow your heart's voice.
quotes.author: Dzien swira

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you look into your heart. Who looks outside, dreams. Who looks inside, awakens.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Always follow your heart ! When your heart feels at peace, rest assured, you are on the right track.
quotes.author: Angie karan

quotes.quote: You must never doubt your ability to achieve anything, become anything, overcome anything and inspire everything.
quotes.author: Tasha Hoggatt

quotes.quote: It's been very important for me to follow my gut or my heart, or whichever organ you want to go by.
quotes.author: Lili Taylor

quotes.quote: I think it's important to have a dream and to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Austin Butler

quotes.quote: Follow your heart and make it your decision.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: What I have to do now is figure where my passion is, and follow my heart; I've proven that if I have the passion for something then I can succeed. I haven't been listening to my heart in the last little while.
quotes.author: Clara Hughes

quotes.quote: Your heart is free, have the courage to follow it.
quotes.author: Braveheart

quotes.quote: If you follow your dreams, it means you follow your heart. If you do follow your heart, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: You can do anything as long as you don't stop believing. When it is meant to be, it will be. You just have to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Keke Palmer

quotes.quote: If you listen to everybody's opinions, I mean, I always say I'd be digging a ditch on the side of the road now if I had listened to what everybody told me what to do. You know, you have to follow your heart, you have to.
quotes.author: Brian Setzer

quotes.quote: I'm reading your heart. I'm asking you to follow it. Begging you.
quotes.author: Bicentennial Man

quotes.quote: Break the rules, stand apart, ignore your head, and follow your heart.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to belong, or be a part of something bigger than themselves, but it's important to follow your heart and be true to yourself in the process.
quotes.author: Emily Giffin

quotes.quote: I think it's imperative to follow your heart and choose a profession you're passionate about, and if you haven't found that 'spark' yet, if you're not sure what you want to do with your lives - be persistent until you do.
quotes.author: Steve Kerr

quotes.quote: Everyone has that inner voice, the one that's a Negative Nancy. I'd say to ignore that voice and to be confident and follow your heart.
quotes.author: Katharine McPhee

quotes.quote: They say you must follow your heart in order to love, because heart know every feeling you are ready to convey.
quotes.author: Simphiwe Dumi

quotes.quote: Stay away from people who try to belittle your faith, goals and ambitions. follow your heart and keep pushing forward.
quotes.author: Ricardo Housham

quotes.quote: Imagine for yourself a character, a model personality whose example you determine to follow, in private as well as in public.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The decision I've made has come from my heart. That's me, to follow my heart.
quotes.author: Craig Stevens

quotes.quote: Don't worry about things that you simply cannot know. Let them fall back and recede like the foam pushed aside by the flanks of a ship. Leave them behind and let your heart power on.
quotes.author: Mark Helprin

quotes.quote: Remembering that you are going to die is the best way I know to avoid the trap of thinking you have something to lose. You are already naked. There is no reason not to follow your heart.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Follow that will and that way which experience confirms to be your own.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Initiative is doing the right thing without being told.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: If you follow your heart, if you listen to your gut, and if you extend your hand to help another, not for any agenda, but for the sake of humanity, you are going to find the truth.
quotes.author: Erin Brockovich

quotes.quote: Follow what you are genuinely passionate about and let that guide you to your destination.
quotes.author: Diane Sawyer

quotes.quote: Follow your heart, go wherever it may lead. Follow your heart and you're sure to succeed!
quotes.author: Faye Diane Kilday

quotes.quote: To reach your destination, follow the directions of your heart. It knows the way.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Do what you feel in your heart to be right - for you'll be criticized anyway.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Listen to advice, but follow your heart.
quotes.author: Conway Twitty

quotes.quote: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your inner voice and most important, have the courage to follow your heart and intuition.
quotes.author: Dr Purushothaman

quotes.quote: Be sure to take the one with a heart.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies. But let the thankful heart sweep through the day and as the magnet finds the iron, so it will find in every hour, some heavenly blessings.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: The one thing you can't trade for your heart's desire is your heart.
quotes.author: Lois McMaster Bujold

quotes.quote: Wherever your heart is, that is where you'll find your treasure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: For us to accept that something is possible in our life, we need a catalyst to shift our thinking--a reason to believe that something is possible.
quotes.author: Dragos Bratasanu

quotes.quote: Once we accept and embrace that something is possible for us, we set into motion a cascade of emotional and physiological processes in our body that support our acceptance.
quotes.author: Dragos Bratasanu

quotes.quote: The truth in your heart is calling you to fulfill your destiny. Together, let's take just a baby step in the pursuit of your dreams today to reclaim your freedom and your life.
quotes.author: Dragos Bratasanu

quotes.quote: Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut instinct.
quotes.author: Paula Abdul

quotes.quote: Great necessities call out great virtues.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Learning is not attained by chance, it must be sought for with ardor and diligence.
quotes.author: Abigail Adams

quotes.quote: Listen to your voice for it is a deep and powerful source of wisdom, beauty and truth, ever flowing through you. Learn to trust it, trust your intuition, and in good time, answers to all your seek to know to know will come, and the path will open before you.
quotes.author: Caroline Joy Adams

quotes.quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: If your actions inspire others to dream more, learn more, do more and become more, you are a leader.
quotes.author: John Quincy Adams

quotes.quote: I'm not afraid of storms, for I'm learning to sail my ship.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Be strong enough to stand alone, be yourself enough to stand apart, but be wise enough to stand together when the time comes.
quotes.author: Mark Amend

quotes.quote: Sometimes opportunities float right past your nose. Work hard, apply yourself, and be ready. When an opportunity comes you can grab it.
quotes.author: Julie Andrews

quotes.quote: Success is liking yourself, liking what you do, and liking how you do it.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Now and then it's good to pause in our pursuit of happiness and just be happy.
quotes.author: Guillaume Apollinaire

quotes.quote: When you're trying to conform to the norm, you lose your uniqueness, which can be the foundation for your greatness.
quotes.author: Dale Archer

quotes.quote: The only difference between successful people and unsuccessful people is extraordinary determination.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: You've got to get to the stage in life where going for it is more important than winning or losing.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: Your life is what your thoughts make it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: A wise man will make more opportunities than he finds.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: They know enough who know how to learn.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Men best successes come after their disappointments.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn't know, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Focus on the present, and enhance your time and life now rather than always working toward tomorrow.
quotes.author: Dr. Laura Berman

quotes.quote: You've got to be very careful if you don't know where you are going, because you might not get there.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: The bird of paradise alights only on the hand that does not grasp.
quotes.author: John Berry

quotes.quote: Blessed are those who can give without remembering and take without forgetting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

quotes.quote: Life consists not in holding good cards but in playing those you hold well.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Do your work with your whole heart and you will succeed - there is so little competition.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.
quotes.author: John Andrew Holmer

quotes.quote: Say to your heart each trying hour; 'This, too, shall pass away.'
quotes.author: Lanta Wilson Smith

quotes.quote: Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
quotes.author: Aliya Abbas

quotes.quote: To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner

quotes.quote: Challenges will come your way. But you must not lose faith or get discouraged by the temporary setbacks and roadblocks.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Nothing is this world is impossible to accomplish if you are determined to pursue it. You have within you immense power, strength, and potential.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Difficulties only make you aware of your strengths and bring out the best in you. They have made you who you are and have helped you reach where you are today.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: So come what may, never give up and never lose hope. No matter how big the troubles are, they cannot keep you down if your determination to get back on your feet is strong enough.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: When the chips are down and you are feeling worn out, give yourself a boost to get yourself back on track.
quotes.author: Dr. Roopleen

quotes.quote: Life has a beautiful way of teaching lessons through the challenges you face.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: Challenges are part of life and can redefine who you are.
quotes.author: Jennifer Pullara

quotes.quote: Be ready to face all the challenges that life may bring, and never lose hope! Be in command of your life. Better your brain by having a better attitude about life.
quotes.author: Chris Mentis

quotes.quote: Let yourself picture everything being better than you've ever dreamed.
quotes.author: Eve Menezes Cunningham

quotes.quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart . Who looks inside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Jung

quotes.quote: Faith is to believe what we do not seem and the reward of this faith is to see what we believe.
quotes.author: St. Augustine

quotes.quote: Everything and anything is possible when you believe, put forth some action, and focus!
quotes.author: Aliya Abbas

quotes.quote: To push forward and show the world that you won't take any more of this nonsense truly defines the person you are and want to be.
quotes.author: Anthony Rosario Wagner
