quotes.quote: Do more of what makes you happy. Make memories that you will cherish forever. Remember that health, family and happiness are the most important things in life. Follow your dreams and don't hold back.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: Life is to be enjoyed, not endured. So follow your dreams, embrace change and live what you love.
quotes.author: Aysel Gunar

quotes.quote: Encourage them to follow one of many dreams that they have been chasing for years. Only to hope inspire many others to follow their dreams while on that journey of life
quotes.author: Antawn Barb & Joe Barb lll

quotes.quote: Regardless of parentage, heritage or origin, dreams are meant to be pursued and grasped and pulled from the sky. If you work hard, educate yourself, strive, and never forget to be kind to others, your dreams can come true.
quotes.author: Michael Lee-Chin

quotes.quote: Dream the biggest dream for yourself. Hold the highest vision of life for yourself.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Lord knows / Dreams are hard to follow / But don't let anyone / Tear them away / Hold On / There will be tomorrow / In time you'll find the way.
quotes.author: Mariah Carey

quotes.quote: It just made me realize how important life is, how short time is, how important it is to follow your dreams and your goals. That's part of who you are and you take away from it by not doing it.
quotes.author: Queen Latifah

quotes.quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
quotes.author: Jackson

quotes.quote: If you haven't dream that you will get there, you will not think about ever taking the steps to be there.
quotes.author: Max Robinson

quotes.quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hardwork.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid of the space between your dreams and reality. If you can dream it, you can make it.
quotes.author: Belva Davis

quotes.quote: Exercise the right to dream. You must face reality-- that which is. But the dream of the reality that ought to be, that must be.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: Man, alone can transform the power of his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone can dream, and make his dream come true.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams, they know the way.
quotes.author: Kobe Yamada

quotes.quote: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Without dreams, there can be no courage. And without courage, there can be no action.
quotes.author: Wim Wenders

quotes.quote: There is only one thing that makes a dream impossible to achieve: the fear of failure.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: If you follow your dreams and keep your desire for success at its highest peak, there is nothing in this world that you can't achieve.
quotes.author: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.quote: The sooner you start taking your dreams seriously, the less time it will take for them to become a reality.
quotes.author: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.quote: Wishful thinking is a delusion. Only action and perseverance will bring your dreams to fruition.
quotes.author: Romeo Marrishaw

quotes.quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the action stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.
quotes.author: James Michener

quotes.quote: It's not what the dream is, it's what the dream does.
quotes.author: John Harrold Johnson

quotes.quote: Reason may fail you. If you are going to do anything with life, you have sometimes move away from it, beyond all measurements. You must follow sometimes visions and dreams.
quotes.author: Bede Jarrett

quotes.quote: The only person who can stop you from achieving your goals and dreams is you--your thoughts and beliefs.
quotes.author: Harish Muralidhar

quotes.quote: The artist's relative lack of adaptation turns out to his advantage; it enables him to follow his own yearnings far from the beaten path and to discover what it is that would meet the unconscious needs of his age.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: Chasing dreams / A sense following / Realizing / Making dreams of tomorrow / Today's memories.
quotes.author: Mary Steffen

quotes.quote: Tell me why does following your dreams / Take you far away from me and I knew that it would / Tell me how to feel the space you left behind / And how to laugh instead of cry and how to say goodbye.
quotes.author: Hailey Steele

quotes.quote: It's hard enough trying to live your life / But not following your dreams made you dead inside / If you don't love what you do.
quotes.author: Daniel O'Donoghue

quotes.quote: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: Follow your dreams. I am not saying it’s going to be easy, but I am saying it’s going to be worth it.
quotes.author: Moffat Machingura

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Magic is the happiness that we create when we give ourselves permission to follow our dreams.
quotes.author: Nattie Kate Mason

quotes.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.
quotes.author: Pablo Picaso

quotes.quote: Believe in your dreams, no matter how impossible they seem.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: Don't tell me the sky's the limit when there are footprints on the moon.
quotes.author: Paul Brandt

quotes.quote: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
quotes.author: Oprah

quotes.quote: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
quotes.author: Paul Valery

quotes.quote: Commitment leads to action. Action brings your dream closer.
quotes.author: Marcia Wieder

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is precisely the possibility of realizing a dream that makes life interesting.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: When you stop chasing your dreams, your dreams start chasing you.
quotes.author: Dez Del Rio

quotes.quote: Dreams come true. Without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: We may place blame, give reasons, and even have excuses; but in the end, it is an act of cowardice to not follow your dreams.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: The only boundaries for me are those I place on myself. I can make my own dreams come true.
quotes.author: Shelly Wu

quotes.quote: As soon as you start to pursue a dream, your life wakes up and everything has meaning.
quotes.author: Barbara Sher

quotes.quote: If your success is not on your own terms, if it looks good to the world but does not feel good in your heart, it is not success at all.
quotes.author: Anna Quindlen

quotes.quote: First say to yourself what you would be; and then do what you have to do.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Once in awhile it really hits people that they don't have to experience the world in the way they have been told.
quotes.author: Alan Keightley

quotes.quote: I have accepted fear as a part of life- specifically the fear of change. I have gone ahead despite the pounding in the heart that says: turn back.
quotes.author: Erica Jong

quotes.quote: Figure out what your purpose is in life, what you really and truly want to do with your time and your life; then be willing to sacrifice everything and then some to achieve it. If you are not willing to make the sacrifice, then keep searching.
quotes.author: Quintina Ragnacci

quotes.quote: A mediocre idea that generates enthusiasm will go further then a great idea that inspires no one.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Ash

quotes.quote: It was the man's dream, and his inspiring attempt to make them come true that remain important.
quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

quotes.quote: Vision without action is merely a dream. Action without vision just passes the time. Vision with action can change the world.
quotes.author: Joel Barker

quotes.quote: When your heart is in your dreams, no request is too extreme.
quotes.author: Jiminy Cricket

quotes.quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.quote: Get mocked at for as much as you can, fail as much as you can, but don't quit. Let every mockery, every failure, be a source of inspiration for you to reach for greatness, and that greatness will silence your critics.
quotes.author: Ajaero Tony Martins

quotes.quote: Chase the vision, not the money. The money will end up following you.
quotes.author: Tony Hsieh

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than starting something and failing ... is not starting something.
quotes.author: Seth Godin

quotes.quote: I don't focus on what I'm up against. I focus on my goals and I try to ignore the rest.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: I knew that if I failed I wouldn't regret that, but I knew the one thing I might regret is not trying.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.quote: It's the possibility of having a dream come true that makes life interesting
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: You don't get in life what you want; you get in life what you are.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: Don't ever let someone tell you, you can't do something. Not even me. You got a dream, you got to protect it.
quotes.author: Steven Conrad

quotes.quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: I've been absolutely terrified every moment of my life and I've never let it keep me from doing a single thing that I wanted to do.
quotes.author: Georgia O'Keefe

quotes.quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there's love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and the day you find out why.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is no passion to be found playing small-in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: It's your place in the world; it's your life. Go on and do all you can with it, and make it the life you want to live.
quotes.author: Mae Jemison

quotes.quote: Follow your passions, follow your heart, and the things you need will come.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: My mission in life is not merely to survive, but to thrive; and to do so with some passion, some compassion, some humour, some style.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Perhaps the biggest tragedy of our lives is that freedom is possible, yet we can pass our years trapped in the same old patterns.
quotes.author: Tara Brach

quotes.quote: Do something wonderful. People may imitate it.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Swim out of your little pond.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Any dream worth dreaming, is worth the effort to make it come true
quotes.author: Evan Gourley

quotes.quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable
quotes.author: Christopher Reeve

quotes.quote: Be willing to be uncomfortable. Be comfortable being uncomfortable. It may get tough, but it's a small price to pay for living a dream
quotes.author: Peter McWilliams

quotes.quote: Cherish your visions and you dreams, as they are the children of your soul; the blueprints of your ultimate achievements
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Capture your dreams and your life becomes full. You can, because you think you can
quotes.author: Nikita Koloff

quotes.quote: Fondness is a poor substitute for friendship.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: No man is much pleased with a companion who does not increase, in some respect, his fondness of himself.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: The fondness we have for self furnishes another long rank of prejudices.
quotes.author: Isaac Watts

quotes.quote: The more things for which you develop a fondness the richer the life you live.
quotes.author: Dan Buettner

quotes.quote: A fondness for power is implanted in most men, and it is natural to abuse it when acquired.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: A fondness for reading changes the inevitable dull hours of our life into exquisite hours of delight.
quotes.author: Baron de Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Showing a greater fondness for their own opinions than for truth, they sought to deny and disprove the new things which, if they had cared to look for themselves, their own senses would have demonstrated to them.
quotes.author: Galileo Galilei

quotes.quote: Affection, like melancholy, magnifies trifles; but the magnifying of the one is like looking through a telescope at heavenly objects; that of the other, like enlarging monsters with a microscope.
quotes.author: Pope Paul VI

quotes.quote: When affection only speaks, truth is not always there.
quotes.author: Thomas Middleton

quotes.quote: Affection cannot be created; it can only be liberated.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Affection is an overpowering craving to be compellingly sought.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Most affections are habits or duties we lack the courage to end.
quotes.author: Henri de Montherlant

quotes.quote: Affection makes your spirit slither out from its concealing spot.
quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston

quotes.quote: Love is the affection of a mind that has nothing better to engage it.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: Our affections are our life. We live by them; they supply our warmth.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.quote: It is expressions of affection rather than money and power that attract real friends.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama XIV

quotes.quote: True happiness must arise from well-regulated affections, and an affection includes a duty.
quotes.author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quotes.quote: Affection is like the noonday sun; it does not need the presence of another to be manifest.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: We may not return the affection of those who like us, but we always respect their good judgment.
quotes.author: Lillian Gordy Carter

quotes.quote: A fondness for martyrdom, especially of the verbal variety, is common to the young.
quotes.author: Barbara Mertz

quotes.quote: One defining symptom of decadence is a fondness for vast and nonsensical extravagance.
quotes.author: Robert Silverberg

quotes.quote: A fondness for reading, which, properly directed, must be an education in itself.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Only a mother knows a mother's fondness.
quotes.author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quotes.quote: Affection reproaches, but does not denounce.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Affection is the broadest basis of a good life.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: A girl's affections should never be won unsought.
quotes.author: Anne Bronte

quotes.quote: To lead men, you have to lead them with affection.
quotes.author: J. R. D. Tata

quotes.quote: Set your affection to infinity and your hate to zero!

quotes.author: CHAMFORT

quotes.quote: The greatest fool may ask more than the wisest man can answer.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Men may live fools, but fools they cannot die.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: With fools forbear to argue--better strive to wake the dead.
quotes.author: Bhartrhari

quotes.quote: Only a fool tests the depth of the water with both feet.
quotes.author: African Proverb

quotes.quote: Fools build houses, and wise men buy them.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: The fool is always beginning to live.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of fools: those who can't change their opinions and those who won't.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Take all the fools out of this world and there wouldn't be any fun living in it, or profit.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Greatest fools are the most often satisfied.
quotes.author: Nicolas Boileau-Despreaux

quotes.quote: Arguing with a fool proves there are two.
quotes.author: Doris M. Smith

quotes.quote: It is the peculiar quality of a fool to perceive the faults of others and to forget his own.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Professing themselves to be wise, they became fools.
quotes.author: Romans

quotes.quote: There is a foolish corner in the brain of the wisest man.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The greatest fools are ofttimes more clever than the men who laugh at them.
quotes.author: George R.R. Martin

quotes.quote: Too many men are afraid of being fools.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: There are two fools in this world. One is the millionaire who thinks that by hoarding money he can somehow accumulate real power, and the other is the penniless reformer who thinks that if only he can take the money from one class and give it to another, all the world's ills will be cured.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Better a witty fool than a foolish wit.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A foolish man is always doing,Yet much remains to be done.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Fools give you reasons, wise men never try.
quotes.author: Oscar Hammerstein

quotes.quote: Humanity is a parade of fools, and I am at the front of it, twirling a baton.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: Wise men learn by other men's mistakes, fools by their own.
quotes.author: H. G. Bohn

quotes.quote: Wise men learn more from fools than fools from the wise.
quotes.author: Cato the Elder

quotes.quote: Wise men don't need advice. Fools won't take it.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The ultimate result of shielding men from the effects of folly is to fill the world with fools.
quotes.author: Herbert Spencer

quotes.quote: Hurry is the weakness of fools.
quotes.author: Baltasar Graciàn

quotes.quote: Logical consequences are the scarecrows of fools and the beacons of wise men.
quotes.author: Thomas H. Huxley

quotes.quote: No man is so foolish but he may sometimes give another good counsel, and no man so wise that he may not easily err if he takes no other counsel than his own. He that is taught only by himself has a fool for a master.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Let a fool hold his tongue and he will pass for a sage.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Young people tell what they are doing, old people what they have done and fools what they wish to do.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: He who laughs at everything is as big a fool as he who weeps at everything.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: The fool has set in his heart that he can get more money through the tiring of his muscle and the starvation of his brain—but he can’t.
quotes.author: William D. Hoard

quotes.quote: He dares to be a fool, and that is the first step in the direction of wisdom.
quotes.author: James Gibbons Huneker

quotes.quote: There are two kinds of fools. One says, 'This is old, therefore it is good.' The other says, 'This is new, therefore it is better.'
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: Sometimes a fool has talent, but never judgment.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: An erudite fool is a greater fool than an ignorant fool.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: An erudite fool is a greater fool than an ignorant fool.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: Wise men profit more from fools than fools from wise men; for the wise men shun the mistakes of fools, but fools do not imitate the successes of the wise.
quotes.author: Marcus Porcius Cato

quotes.quote: When we are born we cry that we are come to this great stage of fools.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Let us be thankful for the fools; but for them the rest of us could not succeed.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A fool is his own informer.
quotes.author: Yiddish Proverb

quotes.quote: By their own follies they perished, the fools.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Those who wish to appear wise among fools, among the wise seem foolish.
quotes.author: Gaius Petronius

quotes.quote: He is a fool who leaves things close at hand to follow what is out of reach.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: Thus we play the fools with the time, and the spirits of the wise sit in the clouds and mock us.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Always the dullness of the fool is the whetstone of the wits.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: God give them wisdom that have it; and those that are tools, let them use their talents.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I do not attack fools, but foolishness.
quotes.author: Jacques du Laurens

quotes.quote: Some are bewilder'd in the maze of schools, / And some made coxcombs nature meant but fools.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Greatest fools are oft most satisfied.
quotes.author: Nicolas Boileau-Despreaux

quotes.quote: A fool there was and he made his prayer / (Even as you and I!) / To a rag and a bone and hank of hair / (We called her the woman who did not care) / But the fool he called her his lady fair— / (Even as you and I!)
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: The wise man does at once what the fool does finally.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Fools, through false shame, conceal their open wounds.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: A wise man may look ridiculous in the company of fools.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: A fool sees not the same tree that a wise man sees.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: And here, poor fool, with all my lore I stand no wiser than before.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Fools act on imagination without knowledge, pedants act on knowledge without imagination.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The learned is happy, nature to explore, the fool Is happy, that he knows no more.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: A fool and his money are soon parted.
quotes.author: George Buchanan

quotes.quote: Great men undertake great things because they are great; fools, because they think them easy.
quotes.author: Luc de Clapiers Marquis de Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: I have always observed that to succeed in the world one should appear like a fool but be wise.
quotes.author: Charles Montesquieu

quotes.quote: A wise man gets more use from his enemies than a fool from his friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Every man is a damn fool for at least five minutes every day; wisdom consists in not exceeding the limit.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A wise man fights to win, but he is twice a fool who has no plan for possible defeat.
quotes.author: Louis L'Amour

quotes.quote: For God's sake give me the young man who has brains enough to make a fool of himself.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: He who asks is a fool for five minutes, but he who does not ask remains a fool forever.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: A common mistake that people make when trying to design something completely foolproof is to underestimate the ingenuity of complete fools.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes.
quotes.author: Bible (Proverbs 12:15)

quotes.quote: If a fool could keep silent he would not be a fool.
quotes.author: Swedish Proverb

quotes.quote: If every fool wore a crown, we should all be kings.
quotes.author: Welsh Proverb

quotes.quote: Learned fools are the greatest fools.
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: No one is a fool always, everyone sometimes.
quotes.author: Roman Proverb

quotes.quote: One fool always finds a greater fool to admire him.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: Only a fool leans upon his own misunderstanding.
quotes.author: Jamaican Proverb

quotes.quote: The learned fool writes his nonsense in better language than the unlearned; but still 'tis nonsense.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: A fool at forty is a fool indeed.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Answer not a fool according to his folly, lest thou also be like unto him. / Answer a fool according to his folly, lest he be wise in his own conceit.
quotes.author: Bible (Proverbs 26:4)

quotes.quote: As a dog returneth to his vomit, so a fool returneth to his folly.
quotes.author: Bible (Proverbs 26:11)

quotes.quote: The idiot who praises, with enthusiastic tone, / All centuries but this, and every country but his own.
quotes.author: W.S. Gilbert

quotes.quote: Truth from his lips prevailed with double sway, / And fools, who came to scoff, remained to pray.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The method by which the fool arrives at his folly was as dear to him as the ultimate wisdom of the wise.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Remember that the fool in the eyes of the gods and the fool in the eyes of man are very different.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The real fool, such as the gods mock or mar, is he who does not know himself.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Ah! I prefer a gentlemanly fool any day. There is more to be said for stupidity than people imagine. Personally I have a great admiration for stupidity. It is a sort of fellow-feeling, I suppose.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Many talk like philosophers, and live like fools.
quotes.author: H. G. Bohn

quotes.quote: A fool is like other men as long as he is silent.
quotes.author: Jacob Cats

quotes.quote: A fool . . . says little, but that little said owes all its weight, like loaded dice, to lead.
quotes.author: William Cowper

quotes.quote: [He] may look like an idiot and talk like an idiot but don't let that fool you: He really is an idiot.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Yet fools and children sometimes tell in play / Some, wise in show, more fools indeed than they.
quotes.author: Michael Drayton

quotes.quote: O Fool, try to carry thyself upon thy own shoulders! / O beggar, to come beg at thy own door!
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Oh! a private buffoon is a light-hearted loon, / If you listen to popular rumour; / From morning to night he's so joyous and bright, / And he bubbles with wit and good humour!
quotes.author: William Schwenck Gilbert

quotes.quote: Come along, Fool / A direct hit of the senses you are disconnected / It's not that it's bad, it's not that it's death / It's just on the tip of your tongue, and you're so silent
quotes.author: Chan Marshall

quotes.quote: He is no fool / If he would choose / To give the thing he cannot keep / To buy what he can never lose
quotes.author: Twila Paris

quotes.quote: Who is more a fool: the fool, or he who follows the fool?
quotes.author: Lexor

quotes.quote: Everybody is somebody's fool.
quotes.author: Michael O'Hara

quotes.quote: Fool me once. Fool me twice. Fool me chicken soup with rice.
quotes.author: Todd Chavez

quotes.quote: Fool me once, shame on you, but teach a man to fool me, and I'll be fooled for the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Virgil van Cleef

quotes.quote: Maybe we're all fools and none of it matters.
quotes.author: Jack Crabb

quotes.quote: Oh sir, we're all fools for most of our lives. It's unavoidable.
quotes.author: Jean Valjean

quotes.quote: I am sick to death of cleverness. Everybody is clever nowadays. You can't go anywhere without meeting clever people. The thing has become an absolute public nuisance. I wish to goodness we still had a few fools left.
quotes.author: Jack Worthing

quotes.quote: Rugby is a beastly game played by gentlemen, soccer is a gentlemen's game played by beasts and US football is a beastly game played by beasts.
quotes.author: Henry Blaha

quotes.quote: Football, wherein is nothing but beastly fury, and extreme violence, whereof proceedeth hurt, and consequently rancour and malice do remain with them that be wounded.
quotes.author: Thomas Elyot

quotes.quote: Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners, only survivors.
quotes.author: Frank Gifford

quotes.quote: Football is easy if you're crazy as hell.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.quote: Football isn't a contact sport; it's a collision sport. Dancing is a contact sport.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Most football players are temperamental. That's 90 percent temper and 10 percent mental.
quotes.author: Doug Plank

quotes.quote: Football is mesmerizing, because it's a figurative war. You go in one direction till you get there, but you get there as a team, not as an individual. Players bond whether they're black or white, much as soldiers do.
quotes.author: Oliver Stone

quotes.quote: Football is, after all, a wonderful way to get rid of your aggressions without going to jail for it.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Brown

quotes.quote: American football makes rugby look like a Tupperware party.
quotes.author: Sue Lawley

quotes.quote: The tactical difference between Association Football and Rugby with its varieties seems to be that in the former the ball is the missile, in the latter men are the missiles.
quotes.author: Alfred E. Crawley

quotes.quote: Let's face it, you have to have a slightly recessive gene that has a little something to do with the brain to go out on the football field and beat your head against other human beings on a daily basis.
quotes.author: Tim Green

quotes.quote: You have to play this game like somebody just hit your mother with a two-by-four.
quotes.author: Dan Birdwell

quotes.quote: As concerning football, I protest unto you that it may rather be called a friendly kind of fight than a play or recreation - a bloody and murdering practise than a fellowly sport or pastime.
quotes.author: Philip Stubbes quotes

quotes.quote: What's the toughest thing in a professional football game? Well, it's being the mother of the quarterback.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: Football is a game played with arms, legs and shoulders but mostly from the neck up.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: To play this game (football) you must have fire in you, and there is nothing that strokes fire like hate.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: In life, as in football, you won't go far unless you know where the goalposts are.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: At the base of it was the urge, if you wanted to play football, to knock someone down, that was what the sport was all about, the will to win closely linked with contact.
quotes.author: George Plimpton

quotes.quote: College football is a sport that bears the same relation to education that bullfighting does to agriculture.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Football fans share a universal language that cuts across many cultures and many personality types. A serious football fan is never alone. We are legion, and football is often the only thing we have in common.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: The essence of football was blocking, tackling, and execution based on timing, rhythm and deception.
quotes.author: Knute Rockne

quotes.quote: Anyone who's just driven 90 yards against huge men trying to kill them has earned the right to do Jazz hands.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: In football everything is complicated by the presence of the opposite team.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: Football combines two of the worst things in American life. It is violence punctuated by committee meetings.
quotes.author: George F. Will

quotes.quote: Football is a simple game based on the giving and taking of passes, of controlling the ball and of making yourself available to receive a pass. It is terribly simple.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: Anybody who watches three games of football in a row should be declared brain dead.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Football is all very well as a game for rough girls, but is hardly suitable for delicate boys.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Some people think football is a matter of life and death. I assure you, it's much more serious than that.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: Football is the ballet of the masses.
quotes.author: Dmitri Shostakovich

quotes.quote: If you have not seen it, FOOTBALL is a game in which men shove one another back and forth for no reason. They do not choose how, when, or whom they shove. They are doing this in order to please one angry old man on the sidelines. This old man is called the 'coach' or 'yelling surrogate' dad who will never be happy.
quotes.author: John Hodgman

quotes.quote: Football is like life. It requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication, and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: Football is a game of mistakes. Whoever makes the fewest mistakes wins.
quotes.author: Johan Cruyff

quotes.quote: Everytime I went away I was deceiving my mum, I would tell her I was going to school but I would be on the street playing football.
quotes.author: Ronaldo Luis Nazario de Lima

quotes.quote: I've never thought about what I could get out of football or where it would take me. I just wanted to play. I'm the same now.
quotes.author: Thierry Henry

quotes.quote: Football is about teammates playing with and for each other and respect of the responsibilities. It is also about respect for your opponents, accepting the glories and the painful moments.
quotes.author: Benjy Pierrecin

quotes.quote: Football has becoming my life, it has given me the chance to help my family and friends, it has given me the opportunity to make a difference in my community.
quotes.author: Benjy Pierrecin

quotes.quote: In football a win is a win no matter what the margin is.
quotes.author: Benjy Pierrecin

quotes.quote: Football is a game of mistakes.
quotes.author: Benjy Pierrecin

quotes.quote: Football has becoming my life, it has given me the chance to help my family and friends.
quotes.author: Benjy Pierrecin

quotes.quote: The football season is the only time of the year when girls whistle at men in sweaters.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The good old days were when football game was something that got people outdoors.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: America is the land of opportunity for soccer.
quotes.author: Ron Newman

quotes.quote: Football is self-expression within an organized framework.
quotes.author: Roger Lemerre

quotes.quote: A man who gives himself up to football, body and soul, will take risks and get himself entagled in such a way as he would never consider in the conduct of his own business.	A man who gives himself up to football, body and soul, will take risks and get himself entangled in such a way as he would never consider in the conduct of his own business.
quotes.author: Sir Frederick Wall

quotes.quote: The English are plagued by industrial football, yet the potential remains enormous.
quotes.author: Miljan Miljanic

quotes.quote: Football is fashionable. Political parties jockey to enlist football men to their cause.
quotes.author: John Williams

quotes.quote: Football attracts a certain percentage of nobodies who want to be somebodies at a football club.
quotes.author: Brian Clough

quotes.quote: Football is like a car. You've got five gears, but the trouble with English teams is that they drive in fourth and fifth all the time.
quotes.author: Ruud Gullit

quotes.quote: In England, soccer is a grey game played by grey people on grey days.
quotes.author: Rodney Marsh

quotes.quote: A man can change wives, political parties or religions, but he cannot change his favorite football team.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: The way you motivate a football team is to eliminate the unmotivated ones.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.quote: A great football team is the right balance and the right mixture of players. Good leaders, good communicators and good technicians. You need people that are strategically astute. People need passion, desire and most importantly, a willingness to keep learning.
quotes.author: Hope Powell

quotes.quote: A football team represents a way of being, a culture.
quotes.author: Michel Patini

quotes.quote: A football team is a like a beautiful woman, when you do not tell her, she forgets she is beautiful.
quotes.author: Arsene Wenger

quotes.quote: A professional football team warms up grimly and disparately, like an army on maneuvers: the ground troops here, the tanks there, the artillery and air force over there.
quotes.author: Ted Solotaroff

quotes.quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Football is an honest game. It's true to life. It's a game about sharing. Football is a team game. So is life.
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.quote: A football team is like a company. All of the people working in a company are not supposed to love each other, but they are supposed to be professional.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Petit

quotes.quote: A good football team plays offense and defense. You have to be aggressive and disrupt.
quotes.author: Vince Flynn

quotes.quote: At least 80 percent of the success of the football team is determined by the fight and spirit that they put into their play.
quotes.author: George Halas

quotes.quote: The heartbeat of a football team is the quarterback position and I think everyone who has any intelligence about the game understands you must have consistency at that position to be a championship team.
quotes.author: Ron Jaworski

quotes.quote: A football team is like a piano; you need eight men to carry it and three who can play the damn thing The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.author: Phil Douglas

quotes.quote: The amazing thing about a football team is we can disagree and fight like brothers, but then we come back together. We are able to be open and honest about things that may offend us.
quotes.author: Benjamin Watson

quotes.quote: As a football team, you head into the season the same way with confidence and a positive mindset that you are going to win a bunch of football games.
quotes.author: Matthew Stafford

quotes.quote: If a team is to reach its potential, each player must be willing to subordinate his personal goals to the good of the team.
quotes.author: Bud Wilkinson

quotes.quote: To be able to get a football team that's capable of competing for world championships, you always got to get a little bit lucky, but you got to have all phases to win it all.
quotes.author: John Elway

quotes.quote: Most football players are temperamental. That's 90 percent temper and 10 percent mental.
quotes.author: Doug Plank

quotes.quote: We can't run. We can't pass. We can't stop the run. We can't stop the pass. We can't kick. Other than that, we're just not a very good football team right now.
quotes.author: Bruce Coslet

quotes.quote: A football team is like a piano. You need eight men to carry it and three who can play the damn thing.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: In football everything is complicated by the presence of the opposite team.
quotes.author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quotes.quote: The pride and presence of a professional football team is far more important than 30 libraries.
quotes.author: Art Modell

quotes.quote: It's something I think probably every football team and sports team in America deals with is having people get out of their comfort zone and being courageous enough to fix other people and not just focus on themselves.
quotes.author: Scott Frost

quotes.quote: We are inclined that if we watch a football game or baseball game, we have taken part in it.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Losing the super bowl is worse than death. With death, you don't have to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: George Allen

quotes.quote: Sure, luck means a lot in football. Not having a good quarterback is bad luck.
quotes.author: Don Shula

quotes.quote: The trouble for today's footballers is they have too many distractions. We used to get our old players coming to watch training with football magazines in their hands. Often than not, they are checking the share prices.
quotes.author: Franz Beckenbauer

quotes.quote: Barcelona's football was simply brilliant. Their superiority was there for the planet to see: the whites were cornered all game. Barcelona play football and dance. They treat the ball with adoration and respect, almost nurturing it. To see this team in action is a delight.
quotes.author: Alfredo Di Stefano

quotes.quote: For me football is more about making the right pass at the right time.
quotes.author: Michel Platini

quotes.quote: At birth, God asks you if you want logic or passion. If you want passion then He next allocates you a football team to support.
quotes.author: John Colquhoun

quotes.quote: We're not just a football team, we're mates. There is a Greek saying: 'History is made by mates.'
quotes.author: Theo Zagorakis

quotes.quote: If you threaten certain spiv players, you must carry it out and not let them get away with it. A football team only has 11 players. It just needs one bad 'un to affect the rest. In ICI, with thousands and thousands of people, you can afford to carry scoundrels. Not in a football team.
quotes.author: Brian Clough

quotes.quote: A man can change wives, political parties or religions, but he cannot change his favourite football team.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeano

quotes.quote: The Croatians don't play well without the ball.
quotes.author: Barry Venison

quotes.quote: I've just named the team I would like to represent Wales in the next World Cup: Brazil.
quotes.author: Bobby Gould

quotes.quote: Some people think football is a matter of life and death. I can assure them it is much more serious than that.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: Me and the wife are breeding our own team. When I get home tonight it'll be 'c'mon hen, we need a centre-back.'
quotes.author: Gordon Strachan

quotes.quote: Life really wouldn't be worth livin' if you didn't have a high school football team to support.
quotes.author: Bob Rutherford

quotes.quote: Coaching a football team is not rocket science and most of the advice is blindingly obvious.
quotes.author: Gary Lineker

quotes.quote: Football is a simple game; 22 men chase a ball for 90 minutes and at the end, the Germans win.
quotes.author: Gary Lineker

quotes.quote: Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners, only survivors.
quotes.author: Frank Gifford

quotes.quote: Any Premiere League football team has a much larger yearly budget than the UK Dementia Research Institute.
quotes.author: Vladimir Hachinski

quotes.quote: I thought I really hurt our football team in the red zone, which is some of the play selections — putting us in some tough spots.
quotes.author: Coach McVay

quotes.quote: There are many people who can say a football team plays badly; there are some people who can say why they are playing badly, but there are only a few who can say what needs to be done to make them play better.
quotes.author: Johan Cruijff

quotes.quote: Money, it's a gas / Grab that cash with both hands / and make a stash. / New car, caviar, four star daydream, / Think I'll buy me a football team.
quotes.author: Pink Floyd

quotes.quote: But a college needs something else besides education. And what this college needs is a good football team and you can't have a good football team unless you have good football players.
quotes.author: Frank

quotes.quote: Studies show that the best way to bring in alumni donations is through a successful athletic department; specifically, a winning football team.
quotes.author: Shannon Beiste

quotes.quote: You can't leave a footprint that lasts if you're always walking on tiptoe.
quotes.author: Marion C. Blakely

quotes.quote: While it is well enough to leave footprints on the sands of time, it is even more important to make sure they point in a commendable direction.
quotes.author: James Branch Cabell

quotes.quote: What footprint do you want to be known for? It's the legacy and the journey that you're on. Trust in yourself. Trust in the passion you have inside yourself.
quotes.author: Drew Waters

quotes.quote: Some people come into our lives, leave footprints in our hearts and minds and we are never the same again.
quotes.author: Jared Leto

quotes.quote: The footprint of the savage traced in the sand is sufficient to attest the presence of man to the atheist who will not recognize God, whose hand is impressed upon the entire universe.
quotes.author: Hugh Miller

quotes.quote: It is our art that has an opportunity to leave a footprint in the sand. They don't wrap fish in our work.
quotes.author: Hugh Newell Jacobsen

quotes.quote: Everybody has to look at his or her own footprint and do the best they can. It's not about being perfect, it's about doing something. If we're looking for perfection, we'll never, ever get there.
quotes.author: Laurie David

quotes.quote: Our past is like a footprint. It only confirms we were there. No burden on our future does it bear. Bring the rain, clear the pane of clutter.
quotes.author: Jeb Dickerson

quotes.quote: Our pictures are our footprints. It's the best way to tell people we were here.
quotes.author: Joe McNally

quotes.quote: Success always leaves footprints.
quotes.author: Booker T Washington

quotes.quote: When you're offstage, that's the footprint. That's the man God's gonna judge.
quotes.author: Bernie Mac

quotes.quote: Footprints in the snow have been unfailing provokers of sentiment ever since snow was first a white wonder in this drab-coloured world of ours.
quotes.author: Kenneth Grahame

quotes.quote: We all leave footprints in the sand, the question is, will we be a big heal, or a great soul.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: So much of religion is exegesis. I would rather follow in the footprints of Christ than all of the dogma.
quotes.author: Christy Turlington

quotes.quote: Animals are footprints of God.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The film industry needs to confront the physical footprint of the way films get made.
quotes.author: Edward Norton

quotes.quote: My goal is to leave this planet with the biggest carbon footprint I can possibly leave.
quotes.author: Denis Leary

quotes.quote: We all leave footprints as we journey through life- make sure yours are worth following.
quotes.author: Bob Teague

quotes.quote: Traveling the paths of greatness, even in someone else's footprints, is a vital means to acquiring skill.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: The footprints of a free-minded man are always towards the forward direction.
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: when you do more than you learn, you leave a distinctive notable footprint on earth.
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: The footprints of an Angel in your life are Love.
quotes.author: Genevieve

quotes.quote: Even when we turn around, there are no footprints behind us. Nor the road we came along, nor the tune we hummed. When we die, No-one will know it's happened.
quotes.author: Kazuya Minekura

quotes.quote: The footprint of the owner is the best manure.
quotes.author: PROVERBS

quotes.quote: You can't leave footprints in the sands of time while sitting down.
quotes.author: Nelson Rockefeller

quotes.quote: If you have a footprint, be happy, because it means that you aren't a shadow!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: The best fertilizer for a piece of land is the footprints of its owner.
quotes.author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quotes.quote: Family is very important to me because that is the footprint we perpetuate. That is, the ripple in the water when the rock first impacts the pool, and it is those waves, that energy that one produces, that determines our direction.
quotes.author: Larry Wilcox

quotes.quote: Like sand on the beach, the brain bears the footprints of the decisions we have made, the skills we have learned, the actions we have taken.
quotes.author: Sharon Begley

quotes.quote: You cannot see faith, but you can see the footprints of the faithful. We must leave behind "faithful footprints" for others to follow.
quotes.author: Dr. Dennis Anderson

quotes.quote: Even though we may all become extinct, we can still leave our footprint in the sand.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Forget your environmental footprint. Think about your ethical footprint. What good is it to build a zero-carbon, energy efficient complex, when the labor producing this architectural gem is unethical at best?
quotes.author: Cameron Sinclair

quotes.quote: The whole universe is but the footprint of the Divine goodness.
quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

quotes.quote: Some friends leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't follow in any footprints, make your own prints. Because, you are the future of tomorrow.
quotes.author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quotes.quote: Footprints, that perhaps another, Travelling o'er life's solemn main, A forlorn and shipwrecked brother, Seeing, shall take heart again.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Wherever man has left his footprint in the long ascent from barbarism to civilization we will find the hoofprint of the horse beside it.
quotes.author: John Moore

quotes.quote: Each marriage bears the footprints of economic and cultural trends which originate far outside marriage.
quotes.author: Arlie Russell Hochschild

quotes.quote: Prudence is the footprint of Wisdom.
quotes.author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quotes.quote: Take nothing but memories, leave nothing but footprints.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Take only memories, leave only footprints.
quotes.author: Chief Seattle

quotes.quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some people stay for awhile, and move our souls to dance. They awaken us to a new understanding, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same.
quotes.author: Flavia Weedn

quotes.quote: Walk so that your footprints bear only the marks of peaceful joy and complete freedom. To do this you have to learn to let go. Let go of your sorrows, let go of your worries. That is the secret of walking meditation.
quotes.author: Nhat Hanh

quotes.quote: As you walk through the valley of the unknown, you will find the footprints of Jesus both in front of you and beside you.
quotes.author: Charles Stanley

quotes.quote: In our faith we follow in someone's steps. In our faith we leave footprints to guide others. It's the principle of discipleship
quotes.author: Max Lucado

quotes.quote: We should not feel separate from nature, we are a part of it. We need to cover our footprints.
quotes.author: Dan Pearson

quotes.quote: Art is, after all, only a trace. Like a footprint which shows that one has walked bravely and in great happiness.
quotes.author: Robert Henri

quotes.quote: If you walk on snow you cannot hide the footprints.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: Lives of great men all remind us We can make our lives sublime, And departing, leave behind us Footprints on the sands of time.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: You never conquer a mountain. You just stand on the top a few moments. Then the wind blows your footprints away.
quotes.author: Vital Signs: The Nature and Nurture of Passion

quotes.quote: Blondes make the best victims. They're like virgin snow that shows up the bloody footprints.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: A good runner leaves no footprints.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: All along the untrodden paths of the future, I can see the footprints of an unseen hand.
quotes.author: Boyle Roche

quotes.quote: Winning wasn't natural for me. It had to be fought for, in the echoes and trodden footprints of my mind.
quotes.author: Markus Zusak

quotes.quote: I am frightened at seeing all the footprints directed towards thy den, and none returning.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: If you are goint to leave footprints in the sands of time, you'd better wear work shoes.
quotes.author: Le Grand Richards

quotes.quote: I will look at the footprints going in and out of the water and dream up a small blue good to talk to.
quotes.author: Gerald Stern

quotes.quote: Making it through the glass ceiling to the other side was simply a matter of running on a path created by every other woman's footprints.
quotes.author: Shonda Rhimes

quotes.quote: The essence of a sculpture must enter on tip-toe, as light as animal footprints on snow.
quotes.author: Hans Arp

quotes.quote: Follow your footprints long enough and they will turn into those of a beast.
quotes.author: Philipp Meyer

quotes.quote: The skin of moss holds the footprints of star-footed birds.
quotes.author: Nancy Willard

quotes.quote: Beyond the Indian hamlet, upon a forlorn strand, I happened on a trail of recent footprints.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Try to discover who I am from my choice of words and colors, as attentive people like yourselves might examine footprints to catch a thief.
quotes.author: Orhan Pamuk

quotes.quote: Be careful your footsteps do not stumble by the stumbling stone.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: The footsteps a child follows are most likely to be the ones his parents thought they covered up.
quotes.author: James Dobson

quotes.quote: The thing is most people are afraid to step out, to take a chance beyond their established identity.
quotes.author: Demi Moore

quotes.quote: Only the footsteps of the blind are short, but their thoughts are long.
quotes.author: Leonid Andreyev

quotes.quote: Step into your track and begin your steps till you reach the end because life is a personal journey.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: As long as you keep on walking on the old paths, you will never have footprints on the new paths!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: As a single footstep will not make a path on the earth, so a single thought will not make a pathway in the mind.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When your footsteps and thoughts carry you down the same path your heart and soul are directing you, you will know without a doubt that you are headed in the right direction.
quotes.author: Molly Friedenfeld

quotes.quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Your footsteps will have more to say about your spiritual life than knowledge attained.
quotes.author: Ricky Maye

quotes.quote: Follow in the footsteps of your fathers' virtue! How could you hope to climb high unless your fathers' will climbs with you?
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Trying to follow in the footsteps of the masters, but it's a lot harder than it looks because even though they had the same size feet as us, they weren't looking down the whole time while they walked to make sure they were doing it right.
quotes.author: Brian Andreas

quotes.quote: Footsteps in the snow suggest where you have been, point to where you were going: but when they suddenly vanish, never dismiss the possibility of flight.
quotes.author: Diane Duane

quotes.quote: The footsteps of a pioneer become ultimately the highway of a nation.
quotes.author: Ameen Rihani

quotes.quote: An individual step in character training is to put responsibility on the individual.
quotes.author: Robert Baden-Powell

quotes.quote: The very first step towards success in any occupation is to become interested in it.
quotes.author: William Osler

quotes.quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: It's not just a question of conquering a summit previously unknown, but of tracing, step by step, a new pathway to it.
quotes.author: Gustav Mahler

quotes.quote: Footsteps are the wonders of staying alive to move forward.
quotes.author: Munia Khan

quotes.quote: People will walk in and walk out of your life, but the one whose footstep made a long lasting impression is the one you should never allow to walk out.
quotes.author: Michael Bassey Johnson

quotes.quote: If you go and your footprints go, you were here but you were never here!
quotes.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

quotes.quote: If you take each challenge one step at a time, with faith in every footstep, your strength and understanding will increase.
quotes.author: James E. Faust

quotes.quote: A stair not worn hollow by footsteps is, regarded from its own point of view, only a boring something made of wood.
quotes.author: Franz Kafka

quotes.quote: Through sheer volume of passing days you will travel a great distance in your lifetime. Imagine where you might stand if your footsteps steered toward a single goal.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Never be afraid to tread the path alone. Know which is your path and follow it wherever it may lead you; do not feel you have to follow in someone else's footsteps.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: If you walk the footsteps of a stranger, you'll learn things you never knew you never knew.
quotes.author: Pocahontas

quotes.quote: Do not seek to follow in the footsteps of the men of old, seek what they sought.
quotes.author: Matsuo Basho

quotes.quote: We ought not to insist on everyone following in our footsteps, nor to take upon ourselves to give instructions in spirituality when perhaps, we do not even know what it is.
quotes.author: Therese Of Lisieux

quotes.quote: Follow in the footsteps of your ancestors, for the mind is trained through knowledge.
quotes.author: Jacob Carruthers

quotes.quote: Where there is a way or path, it is someone else's footsteps. Each of us has to find his own way.
quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

quotes.quote: Come, loveliest season of the year, and every quickened pulse shall beat, your footsteps in the grass to hear, and feel your kisses soft and sweet.
quotes.author: Phoebe Cary

quotes.quote: A world to be born under your footsteps.
quotes.author: Saint-John Perse

quotes.quote: The belief that somewhere out there is the land of joy dogs our footsteps wherever we go.
quotes.author: Eknath Easwaran

quotes.quote: Down the streets of heaven, shall I know a footstep near that listen, wait for here?
quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

quotes.quote: Not from the grand old masters, Not from the bards sublime, Whose distant footsteps echo Through the corridors of time.
quotes.author: H. W. Longfellow

quotes.quote: He with footsteps slow and weary, she with sunny floating hair, He with bowed head, sad and thoughtful, she with lips all cold and white, Struggling to keep back the murmur.
quotes.author: Rose Hartwick Thorpe

quotes.quote: Soon young and eager footsteps Were heard on the frozen street, And a boy dashed into the station, Cover with snow and sleet.
quotes.author: Charles M. Lewis

quotes.quote: The past empowers the present, and the sweeping footsteps leading to this present mark the pathways to the future.
quotes.author: Mary Catherine Bateson

quotes.quote: I cannot stay, for, to tell the truth, I feel quite uneasy at the mark of the footsteps that I see here, all pointing towards your den, and none returning outwards.
quotes.author: Thomas James Aesop

quotes.quote: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Forbidden love provides happiness when there is no happiness.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Physical infidelity is the signal, the notice given, that all fidelities are undermined.
quotes.author: Katherine Anne Porter

quotes.quote: No adultery is bloodless.
quotes.author: Natalia Ginzburg

quotes.quote: Adultery is the application of democracy to love.
quotes.author: Henry Louis Mencken

quotes.quote: Thou shalt not commit adultery.
quotes.author: Bible

quotes.quote: Having something forbidden is exciting, don't you agree?
quotes.author: Allan Dare Pearce

quotes.quote: My last conscious thought was of my biggest mistake- not the boy beside me, but the one i could never have.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Armentrout

quotes.quote: Even though we were never supposed to be together'I can't be with anyone else, no matter the consequences.
quotes.author: Nicole Gulla

quotes.quote: Sinful and forbidden pleasures are like poisoned bread; they may satisfy appetite for the moment, but there is death in them at the end.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: I love him so very much, and he loves me. But we have to keep our love a secret from the world. I don't know what to do, it's breaking my heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I'm just like you. I enjoy the forbidden fruits in life, too.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: Forbidden pleasures alone are loved immoderately; when lawful, they do not excite desire.
quotes.author: Marcus Quintilian

quotes.quote: We always long for the forbidden things, and desire what is denied us.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: There is a charm about the forbidden that makes it unspeakably desirable.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: His hands are saying that he wants to hold her. His feet are saying that he wants to chase after her' He's probably forgotten that I'm here, beside him.
quotes.author: Ai Yazawa

quotes.quote: When unrequited love is the most expensive thing on the menu, sometimes you settle for the daily special.
quotes.author: Miranda Kenneally

quotes.quote: She hated that she was still so desperate for a glimpse of him, but it had been this way for years.
quotes.author: Julia Quinn

quotes.quote: Because what's worse than knowing you want something, besides knowing you can never have it'
quotes.author: James Patterson

quotes.quote: To burn with desire and keep quiet about it is the greatest punishment we can bring on ourselves.
quotes.author: Frederico Lorca

quotes.quote: You wondered how you'd make it through. I wondered what was wrong with you. Because how could you give your love to someone else, yet share your dreams with me? Sometimes the only thing you're looking for, is the one thing you can't see.
quotes.author: Vanessa Williams

quotes.quote: How can you simply be friends with someone when every time you look at them, you're thinking about how much more you really want'
quotes.author: Dawsons Creek

quotes.quote: There is a kind of love, the excess of which forbids jealousy.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: It is not the most lovable individuals who stand more in need of love, but the most unlovable.
quotes.author: Ashley Montagu

quotes.quote: While forbidden fruit is said to taste sweeter, it usually spoils faster.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: I think things that I shouldn't. I dream things that I shouldn't. I want things that I shouldn't and it's all because of one thing; I do care about you.
quotes.author: H.M.Ward

quotes.quote: My eyes are tempted by the smile of an angel, and your lips whisper secrets of forbidden love.
quotes.author: Natasha Harvey

quotes.quote: Love that we can not have is the one that lasts the longest, hurts the deepest and feels the strongest...
quotes.author: Kay Knudsen

quotes.quote: I couldn't shake this feeling that I had uncovered more than something ordinary.
quotes.author: Nicole Gulla

quotes.quote: I am perfectly happy being his friend, in fact I love it... I just have this incredible urge to kiss him, that doesn't go away... and this feeling that we would be perfect together.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: To avoid mistakes and regrets, always consult your wife before engaging in a flirtation.
quotes.author: E.W. Howe

quotes.quote: If love be not thy chiefest motive, thou wilt soon grow weary of a married state, and stray from thy promise, to search out thy pleasures in forbidden places.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Adam was but human— this explains it all. He did not want the apple for the apple's sake; he wanted it only because it was forbidden.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An affair wants to spill, to share its glory with the world. No act is so private it does not seek applause.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Great passions, my dear, don't exist; they're liars' fantasies. What do exist are little loves that may last for a short or a longer while.
quotes.author: Anna Magnani

quotes.quote: Nuptial love maketh mankind; friendly love perfectecth it; but wanton love corrupteth and embaseth it.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Be careful of love. It'll twist your brain around and leave you thinking up is down and right is wrong.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: One reproaches a lover, but can one reproach a husband? When his only fault is that he no longer loves?
quotes.author: Madame de La Fayette

quotes.quote: It is better to be unfaithful than faithful without wanting to be.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: No lover, if he be of good faith, and sincere, will deny he would prefer to see his mistress dead than unfaithful.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Adultery is the most conventional way to rise above the conventional.
quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

quotes.quote: Forbidden love / Oh you shouldn't have forbade it / Cause if this is / Forbidden love / I won't rest until I've made it / If you hadn't made a rule to break / Oh I might just have obeyed it / For a while.
quotes.author: Daniel Hawkins

quotes.quote: Forbidden love, this love of ours is wrong / A hidden love that cannot last for long / We have no right to happiness like this / So let your tears erase my every kiss.
quotes.author: Richard Coles

quotes.quote: there's no way this love could ever survive / I never knew how hard life could be / without you forever beside me / I was so blind, but now I can see / it was never meant to be / Your love is forbidden love / your sweet love is forbidden love.
quotes.author: John West

quotes.quote: I've been tempted by forbidden love before / But why must she be everythin / That I've been praying for / Now this burning in my heart will I ignore / When I know that she'll be knocking at my door.
quotes.author: Alih Shaheed Jones-Muhammad

quotes.quote: Don't let temptation fill your heart with dreams / Don't let your mind run away (Ohhh-ohhh-ohhh) / Forbidden love is never what it seems / And you cry just a little bit (cry just a little bit)
quotes.author: Robert Heatlie

quotes.quote: My heart tells me this is the best and greatest feeling I have ever had. But my mind knows the difference between wanting what you can't have and wanting what you shouldn't want. And I shouldn't want you.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Her skin smells of vintage books and pale moonlight, exotic things, forbidden loves and rainy nights.
quotes.author: Melody Lee

quotes.quote: Bitter always follows the sweet, especially when it comes to love. Especially when it comes to forbidden love.
quotes.author: Karina Halle

quotes.quote: Mind and night will meet, though in silence, like forbidden lovers.
quotes.author: Philip James Bailey

quotes.quote: Fate was cruel to play this trick on her, although if she were honest she knew she only had herself to blame. She had taken the chance and now she had to pay the price.
quotes.author: Emily Arden

quotes.quote: Sinful and forbidden pleasures are like poisoned bread; they may satisfy appetite for the moment, but there is death in them at the end.
quotes.author: Tyron Edwards

quotes.quote: He didn’t know what it was like, wanting something you could never have; how impossible it was to un-want it once you’d let the feeling in.
quotes.author: Katharine McGee

quotes.quote: 'Do people always fall in love with things they can’t have?’ ‘Always,’ Carol said, smiling, too.
quotes.author: Patricia Highsmith

quotes.quote: When you travel, remember that a foreign country is not designed to make you comfortable. It is designed to make its own people comfortable.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: Foreigner. What a loaded term; what an inherently political concept. It should just mean that you’re a stranger in a strange land – a land not of your birth. But the word can be, and oftentimes is used as a pejorative, a dirty word, directed at strangers in strange lands to remind them that they are not from here, and they do not belong here.
quotes.author: Kovie Biakolo

quotes.quote: I have been a foreigner all my life, first as a daughter of diplomats, then as a political refugee and now as an immigrant in the U.S. I have had to leave everything behind and start anew several times, and I have lost most of my extended family.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Travel early and travel often. Live abroad, if you can. Understand cultures other than your own. As your understanding of other cultures increases, your understanding of yourself and your own culture will increase exponentially.
quotes.author: Tom Freston

quotes.quote: I find it really liberating to be in a place where I am a foreigner in every way. I've lived with this all my life - this divide, this bifurcation. And in Italy, I don't feel it. There's none of that tension, only the expectation I place on myself to speak the language well. I find it relaxing. Something drops away, and I observe.
quotes.author: Jhumpa Lahiri

quotes.quote: I think you feel more liberated in a foreign country. You're more open. You understand less about the social constructs that exist in a certain place, so you take people more at face value, and you're also taken more at face value, which makes you more able to be yourself.
quotes.author: Sophie

quotes.quote: People don't know what it's like being the foreigner until they are one.
quotes.author: Amber Liu

quotes.quote: In America, I'm a foreigner because of my Korean heritage. In Asia, because I was born in America, I'm a foreigner. I'm always a foreigner.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: I've moved around so much my whole life, and I've gotten so used to being the Other in situations - the foreigner, the outsider. The first time I've ever felt like there was no separation between me and the other elements was in music.
quotes.author: Abigail Washburn

quotes.quote: To cement a new friendship, especially between foreigners or persons of a different social world, a spark with which both were secretly charged must fly from person to person, and cut across the accidents of place and time.
quotes.author: Cornelia Otis Skinner

quotes.quote: There is one way to understand another culture. Living it. Move into it, ask to be tolerated as a guest, learn the language. At some point understanding may come. It will always be wordless. The moment you grasp what is foreign, you will lose the urge to explain it. To explain a phenomenon is to distance yourself from it.
quotes.author: Peter Hoeg

quotes.quote: I guess, like most foreigners, when you're away, you see your own culture being even more strange. But where I come from and my roots mean a lot. I miss my family and my friends. Something I've realized as I've been traveling is that it's more about the actual people than the actual place.
quotes.author: Alicia Vikander

quotes.quote: Life might be difficult for a while, but I would tough it out because living in a foreign country is one of those things that everyone should try at least once. My understanding was that it completed a person, sanding down the rough provincial edges and transforming you into a citizen of the world.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: I've been a foreigner for the past twenty years. I don't have roots anymore. My roots are in my memory and my writing. That's why memory is so important. Who are you but what you can remember?
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: When we talk about the foreign, the question becomes one of us versus them. But in the end, is one just the opposite side of the other?
quotes.author: Lewis H. Lapham

quotes.quote: My identity and my background still remain with me when I go to a foreign country. I have kept my nationality.
quotes.author: Ken Watanabe

quotes.quote: What was a foreigner, anyway? Is the place you're born the only place you really belong? At what point do you stop being from "away" and start being from "here"?
quotes.author: Blue Balliett

quotes.quote: So, here you are too foreign for home too foreign for here. Never enough for both.
quotes.author: Ijeoma Umebinyuo

quotes.quote: It’s still hard to live in a foreign country with unfamiliar people, even when you’re with the person you love. I don’t have any roots or history of my own here. A person needs their history around them to remember who they were and to remind them of where they’re going. I’m worried about leaving my history and memories behind me.
quotes.author: Alex Z. Moores

quotes.quote: Everything foreign is respected, partly because it comes from afar, partly because it is ready made and perfect.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: A foreigner is a friend I have yet to meet.
quotes.author: Pearl S. Buck

quotes.quote: When you're a foreigner, at the beginning you are far away from the culture. Then, little by little, you start to interact with people, have friends, have a life, and then you feel more comfortable.
quotes.author: Olivier Martinez

quotes.quote: I loved this idea of always being a foreigner. There's this thing where people bring cultures, bring the music together. I love it when the music, when the cultures collide and something sort of new comes out of it.
quotes.author: Hans Zimmer

quotes.quote: Next time you meet a 'foreigner', remember it's only like a window with a different shape to it and the person who's sitting inside is you.
quotes.author: Yoko Ono

quotes.quote: People love to hear the brag of the local boy, because they want him to be great, but the foreigner must deny that he has any outstanding virtue - this is what will endear him to the locals.
quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

quotes.quote: Being in a foreign country means walking a tightrope high above the ground without the net afforded a person by the country where he has his family, colleagues, and friends, and where he can easily say what he has to say in a language he has known from childhood.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: If you do not know his language, you will never understand a foreigner's silence.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: Many countries had a hand in raising me. I am the product of many contradicting philosophies and cultures... My entire universe is comprised of these foreign traditions. If any one of these experiences are to be ignored, I wouldn't be the same.
quotes.author: Masiela Lusha

quotes.quote: No doubt, to a man of sense, travel offers advantages. As many languages as he has, as many friends, as many arts and trades, so many times is he a man. A foreign country is a point of comparison, wherefrom to judge his own.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I used to wonder how a man of birth and spirit could endure to be wholly insignificant and obscure in a foreign country, when he might live with lustre in his own.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: If he were allowed contact with foreigners he would discover that they are creatures similar to himself and that most of what he has been told about them is lies. The sealed world in which he lives would be broken, and the fear, hatred and self-righteousness on which his morale depends might evaporate.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: A foreigner is an individual who is considered either comic or sinister. When the victim of a disaster—preferably natural but sometimes political—the foreigner may also be pitied from a distance for a short period of time.
quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

quotes.quote: The vitality of a culture is in its capacity to assimilate foreign influences. The culture that's defensive and closed condemns itself to decadence.
quotes.author: Juan Goytisolo

quotes.quote: Whenever you go on a trip to visit foreign lands or distant places, remember that they are all someone's home and backyard.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: The misfortune of a young man who returns to his native land after years away is that he finds his native land foreign; whereas the lands he left behind remain for ever like a mirage in his mind.
quotes.author: Brian Aldiss

quotes.quote: It is the destiny of the emigrant that the foreign land does not become his homeland: his homeland becomes foreign.
quotes.author: Alfred Polgar

quotes.quote: My starting point was the search for my identity in foreign places, in places where I am estranged from myself.
quotes.author: Rirkrit Tiravanija

quotes.quote: The best reason for exposing oneself to foreign ways is to generate a sense of vitality and awareness—an interest in life which can come only when one lives through the shock of contrast and difference.
quotes.author: Edward T. Hall

quotes.quote: I had long ago learned that when you are the giant, alien visitor to a remote and foreign culture it is sort of your job to become an object of ridicule. It's the least you can do, really, as a polite guest.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

quotes.quote: Splendid to arrive alone in a foreign country and feel the assault of difference. Here they are all along, busy with living; they don't talk or look like me. The rhythm of their day is entirely different; I am foreign.
quotes.author: Frances Mayes

quotes.quote: Understanding that which is foreign to you is fundamental to cultivating a sense of connection and unity with one another. We are ultimately trying to accomplish the same thing, which is survival and the thriving of a better world.
quotes.author: Adrian Grenier

quotes.quote: Nature is a temple in which living columns sometimes emit confused words. Man approaches it through forests of symbols, which observe him with familiar glances.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: And into the forest I go, to lose my mind and find my soul.
