quotes.quote: I have you fast in my fortress / And will not let you depart, / But put you down in the dungeon / In the round tower of my heart.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: A fortress foiled, which reason did defend, / A sirensong, a fever of the mind, / A maze wherein affection finds no end, / A raging cloud that runs before the wind, / A substance like the shadow of the sun, / A goal of grief for which the wisest run.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Raleigh

quotes.quote: If a man wailed in a woman's eclectically sensitive palms in his time of duress; / felt their latent warmth as the most invincible fortress; / even as the worst of hell descended on earth.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Therefore the best fortress is to be found in the love of the people, for although you may have fortresses they will not save you if you are hated by the people.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: In order to master the unruly torrent of life the learned man meditates, the poet quivers, and the political hero erects the fortress of his will.
quotes.author: José Ortega y Gasset

quotes.quote: She is a fortress build with fortitude. She goes on when she’s deadbeat. She can't quit, because others are watching. She smiles instead.
quotes.author: Tatsiana

quotes.quote: A body makes his own luck, be it good or bad.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Change yourself and fortune will change.
quotes.author: Portuguese (on fortune)

quotes.quote: Good things come when you least expect them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Great actions are not always true sons of great and mighty resolutions.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Happy is the bride that the sun shines on.
quotes.author: Robert Herrick

quotes.quote: It is possible to have too much of a good thing.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
quotes.author: P. H. Myers

quotes.quote: May the wind be always at your back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Sum up at night what thou hast done by day.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The new boat will find the old stones.
quotes.author: Estonian (on perversity)

quotes.quote: Venture a small fish to catch a great one.
quotes.author: English (on buying and selling)

quotes.quote: When fortune calls, offer her a chair.
quotes.author: Yiddish (on fortune)

quotes.quote: When fortune turns against you, even jelly breaks your teeth.
quotes.author: Iranian

quotes.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: A wise man turns chance into good fortune.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Fortune, which has a great deal of power in other matters but especially in war, can bring about great changes in a situation through very slight forces.
quotes.author: Julius Caesar

quotes.quote: Fortune favors the prepared mind.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: Come what may, all bad fortune is to be conquered by endurance.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: The day of fortune is like a harvest day, We must be busy when the corn is ripe.
quotes.author: Goethe

quotes.quote: I've seen the smiling of Fortune beguiling, I've felt all its favours and found its decay.
quotes.author: Alison Cockburn

quotes.quote: There is frequently a poison in fortune's gifts.
quotes.author: Edward Counsel

quotes.quote: The loss of fortune to a true man is but the trumpet challenge to renewed exertion, not the thunder stroke of destruction.
quotes.author: E.H. Chapin

quotes.quote: Fortune may raise up or abuse the ordinary mortal, but the sage and the soldier should have minds beyond her control.
quotes.author: Sir Walter Scott

quotes.quote: We make a goddess of Fortune ... and place her in the highest heaven. But it is not fortune that is exalted and powerful, but we ourselves that are abject and weak.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: It is madness to make fortune the mistress of events, because by herself she is nothing and is ruled by prudence.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: If a man's fortune does not fit him, it is like the shoe in the story; if too large it trips him up, if too small it pinches him.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Fortune does not so much change men, as it unmasks them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Fortune knocks at every man's door once in a life, but in a good many cases the man is in a neighboring saloon and does not hear her.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Fortune is like glass--the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: Fortune has something of the nature of a woman. If she is too intensely wooed, she commonly goes the further away.
quotes.author: Charles V

quotes.quote: He that waits upon fortune, is never sure of a dinner.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Good fortune and evil fortune come to all things alike in this world of time.
quotes.author: Moasi

quotes.quote: Fortune is a great deceiver. She sells very dear the things she seems to give us.
quotes.author: Vincent Voiture

quotes.quote: If a man look sharply and attentively, he shall see Fortune; for though she be blind, yet she is not invisible.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: Behind every great fortune there is a crime.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Fortune is ever seen accompanying industry.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: Fortune is the rod of the weak, and the staff of the brave.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: Fortune brings in some boats that are not steered.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The way of fortune is like the milky way in the sky; which is a number of smaller stars, not seen asunder, but giving light together; so it is a number of little and scarce discerned virtues, or rather faculties and customs, that make men fortunate
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: We should manage our fortune as we do our health - enjoy it when good, be patient when it is bad, and never apply violent remedies except in an extreme necessity
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: No one is satisfied with his fortune, nor dissatisfied with his intellect
quotes.author: Antoinette Deshoulieres

quotes.quote: Fortune and misfortune are two buckets in the same well
quotes.author: German Proverb

quotes.quote: The power of fortune is confessed only by the miserable; for the happy impute all their success to prudence and merit
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: A great fortune is a great slavery.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Fortune sells her wares; she never gives them. In some form or other, we pay for her favors; or we go empty away.
quotes.author: Amelia E. Barr

quotes.quote: No man's fortune can be an end worthy of his being.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: The brave man carves out his fortune and every man is the son of his own works.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes

quotes.quote: Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune.
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: We always take credit for the good and attribute the bad to fortune.
quotes.author: Charles Kuralt

quotes.quote: To attract good fortune, spend a new penny on an old friend, share an old pleasure with a new friend and lift up the heart of a true friend by writing his name on the wings of a dragon.
quotes.author: Proverb

quotes.quote: Fortune, the great commandress of the world, Hath diverse ways to advance her followers: To some she gives honor without deserving; To other some, deserving without honor; Some wit, some wealth,--and some, wit without wealth; Some wealth without wit; some nor wit nor wealth.
quotes.author: George Chapman

quotes.quote: On what a slender threads our fortune and our life hang!
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: That is a dream also, only he has remained asleep, while you have awakened and who knows which of you is the most fortunate?
quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

quotes.quote: All fortune is good fortune, for it either rewards, disciplines, amends, or punishes, and so is either useful or just.
quotes.author: Boethius

quotes.quote: Love, like Fortune, favors the bold.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: This is your karma. You do not understand now, but you will understand later. The source of pain is within your own larger expression of being.
quotes.author: H. Raven Rose

quotes.quote: Instead of comparing our lot with that of those who are more fortunate than we are, we should compare it with the lot of the great majority of our fellow men. It then appears that we are among the privileged.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: I have always believed, and I still believe, that whatever good or bad fortune may come our way we can always give it meaning and transform it into something of value.
quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

quotes.quote: You'll never make a fortune working for the boss man.
quotes.author: Jeannette Walls

quotes.quote: Self-education will make you a fortune.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: I often think how unfairly life's good fortune is sometimes distributed.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: Diligence is the mother of good fortune.
quotes.author: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra

quotes.quote: Each meeting occurs at the precise moment for which it was meant. Usually, when it will have the greatest impact on our lives.
quotes.author: Nadia Scrieva

quotes.quote: The crowning fortune of a man is to be born to some pursuit which finds him employment and happiness, whether it be to make baskets, or broadswords, or canals, or statues, or songs.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The final hour when we cease to exist does not itself bring death, it merely of itself completes the death-process. We reach death at that moment, but we have been a long time on the way.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Oh, I am fortune's fool!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Do you wish to rise? Begin by descending. You plan a tower that will pierce the clouds? Lay first the foundation of humility.
quotes.author: Saint Augustine

quotes.quote: The thing that lies at the foundation of positive change, the way I see it, is service to a fellow human being.
quotes.author: Lech Walesa

quotes.quote: When you have a spiritual foundation, you look at poverty differently then.
quotes.author: Dennis Banks

quotes.quote: Burdens are the foundations of ease and bitter things the forerunners of pleasure.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: Good order is the foundation of all good things.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: A society built upon a foundation of vengeance is a society doomed to destroy itself.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Love is not enough. It must be the foundation, the cornerstone—but not the complete structure. It is much too pliable, too yielding.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: If you have built castles in the air, your work need not be lost; that is where they should be. Now put the foundations under them.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Our comforting conviction that the world makes sense rests on a secure foundation: our almost unlimited ability to ignore our ignorance.
quotes.author: Daniel Kahneman

quotes.quote: Your inner strength is your outer foundation.
quotes.author: Allan Rufus

quotes.quote: That love which does not build a foundation on good sense is doomed.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: The foundation of every state is the education of its youth.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: Believe that you possess a basic goodness, which is the foundation for the greatness you can ultimately achieve.
quotes.author: Les Brown

quotes.quote: The loftiest edifices need the deepest foundations.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: Enjoy your happiness while you have it, and while, you have it do not too closely scrutinize its foundation.
quotes.author: Joseph Farrell

quotes.quote: Mankind must evolve for all human conflict a method which rejects revenge, aggression, and retaliation. The foundation of such a method is love.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: The foundations of a person are not in matter but in spirit.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: It is not the beauty of a building you should look at; it’s the construction of the foundation that will stand the test of time.
quotes.author: David Allan Coe

quotes.quote: Humility is the foundation by which love manifests.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: The foundation of the true joy is in the conscience.
quotes.author: Seneca The Younger

quotes.quote: Faith is the fountain, the foundation and the fosterer of obedience.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.quote: The foundation of joyful independence is being content with yourself; self-love.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: If we would build on a sure foundation in friendship, we must love friends for their sake rather than for our own.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: The foundation of morality should not be made dependent on myth nor tied to any authority lest doubt about the myth or about the legitimacy of the authority imperil the foundation of sound judgment and action.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: In spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart. I simply can't build up my hopes on a foundation consisting of confusion, misery and death.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: Hold prayer in high esteem. It is the foundation of all the virtues, and the source of all grace needed to sanctify ourselves and to discharge the duties of our employment.
quotes.author: Jean-Baptiste de La Salle

quotes.quote: A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
quotes.author: David Brinkley

quotes.quote: And so rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: Obedience to lawful authority is the foundation of manly character.
quotes.author: Robert E. Lee

quotes.quote: You can't build a great building on a weak foundation. You must have a solid foundation if you're going to have a strong superstructure.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: My mind is troubled, like a fountain stirred; And I myself see not the bottom of it.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A kind heart is a fountain of gladness, making everything in its vicinity freshen into smiles.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A beneficent person is like a fountain watering the earth and spreading fertility: it is therefore more delightful and more honourable to give than receive.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: Good and bad ideas both come from the same fountain of speculation and experiment.
quotes.author: Shaun Tan

quotes.quote: There is a Fountain of Youth: It is your mind, your talents, the creativity you bring to your life and the lives of the people you love. When you learn to tap this source, you will truly have defeated age.
quotes.author: Sophia Loren

quotes.quote: The conscious mind may be compared to a fountain playing in the sun and falling back into the great subterranean pool of subconscious from which it rises.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: That which the fountain sends forth returns again to the fountain.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Unlike a fountain that circulates the same water in an enclosed, perpetually recycling system, a human being circulates thoughts in an unlimited reservoir of self. Don't limit yourself to being a mere fountain when you contain an ocean.
quotes.author: Vera Nazarian

quotes.quote: Mind of a loving heart is the fountain of knowledge.
quotes.author: Toba Beta

quotes.quote: The spirit, I think, is a stream, a fountain, and must be continually poured out, for only if it is poured out will more and clearer streams come.
quotes.author: Brenda Ueland

quotes.quote: My pen is an artery, my heart is a fountain.
quotes.author: Jay Electronica

quotes.quote: Nature as a poet, an enthusiastic workingman, becomes more and more visible the farther and higher we go; for the mountains are fountains – beginning places, however related to sources beyond mortal ken.
quotes.author: John Muir

quotes.quote: The world is full of abundance and opportunity, but far too many people come to the fountain of life with a sieve instead of a tank car... a teaspoon instead of a steam shovel. They expect little and as a result they get little.
quotes.author: Ben Sweetland

quotes.quote: The hardest of all is learning to be a well of affection, and not a fountain; to show them we love them not when we feel like it, but when they do.
quotes.author: Nan Fairbrother

quotes.quote: The exposure I have had to beautiful materials across the world, from Japan to Italy, enables me to pull design ideas together. This, combined with years of historical research, has created a great fountain of ideas for me.
quotes.author: Coleen Atwood

quotes.quote: Mountains are like stationary fountains of serenity.
quotes.author: Phoenix

quotes.quote: Friendship flourishes at the fountain of forgiveness.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.quote: The child-soul is an ever-bubbling fountain in the world of humanity.
quotes.author: Friedrich Froebel

quotes.quote: Yoga is the fountain of youth. You're only as young as your spine is flexible.
quotes.author: Bob Harper

quotes.quote: But, Madam, let your grief be laid aside,And let the fountain of your tears be dry'd,In vain they flow to wet the dusty plain,Your sighs are wafted to the skies in vain,Your pains they witness, but they can no more,While Death reigns tyrant o'er this mortal shore.
quotes.author: Phillis wheatley

quotes.quote: Few people know so clearly what they want. Most people can't even think what to hope for when they throw a penny in a fountain.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: A fox can be smarter than a wolf.
quotes.author: Tamuna Tsertsvadze

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, and the early fox gets the bird.
quotes.author: Matshona Dhliwayo

quotes.quote: With foxes we must play the fox.
quotes.author: Criminal Minds

quotes.quote: If you deal with a fox, think of his tricks.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote:
Be like the fox
who makes more tracks than necessary,
some in the wrong direction.
Practice resurrection.
quotes.author: Wendell Berry

quotes.quote: A fox is a wolf who sends flowers.
quotes.author: Ruth Brown

quotes.quote: The fox has many tricks. The hedgehog has but one. But that is the best of all.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The Fox, when he cannot reach the grapes, says they are not ripe.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: A fox should not be on the jury at a goose's trial.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Wolves and foxes tend not to get along. Not just in fables and stories.
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: That's the problem. We're all trying to outfox the fox.
quotes.author: Jeff Davis

quotes.quote: The sleeping fox catches no poultry.
quotes.author: Frank Fenton

quotes.quote: Comrades, if a fox stole your chickens, would you slaughter your pig because he saw the fox? No, you would hunt the fox, find where it lives and destroy it!
quotes.author: Kevin Reynolds

quotes.quote: The fox chases the rabbit around the tree and down the hole. That's how the tie works buddy.
quotes.author: Clive Cussler

quotes.quote: Foxes don't get as many lives as cats.
quotes.author: Souichirou Morizumi

quotes.quote: Run with the fox / Into the wind on to the dawn of tomorrow / Run with the fox / Into the wild into the wild and the cold / Beware of the rocks / And be prepared prepare for love finally grows
quotes.author: Alan White

quotes.quote: Sand dunes fill up all our towns / Foxes howl and the creepers prowl around / The peeling wet bricks of London town / Foxes howl and the way men cower
quotes.author: Edwin Thomas Congreave

quotes.quote: The fox is kinda foxy, Mr. Wolf he's the guy / Who chased Red through the woods and ate grandma / But a dog is a dog, is a dog, is a dog / Unlike the wolf who made a widower of grandpa
quotes.author: Robert F Diggs

quotes.quote: Foxes are only good for / Ruffling feathers, leading lambs to the slaughter / Swans effortlessly beautiful, take care!
quotes.author: Paddy Mcaloon

quotes.quote: You ought to be aware of foxes hiding / Go on there's time for you to sail back to his side / While I forget I ever saw you gliding
quotes.author: Paddy Mcaloon

quotes.quote: The fields are bleeding / It was the age the foxes came for the fields / We were bleeding as we bowed to kneel / And pray for mercy, pray for mercy
quotes.author: Brooke Fraser

quotes.quote: In mythic systems from other parts of the world, the fox may guide a young person from one phase of life to another.
quotes.author: Martin Wallen

quotes.quote: Wild dogs are well adapted to living in different habitats. The Arctic fox has a thick fur, which protects it from below-freezing temperatures.
quotes.author: Michael Leach

quotes.quote: The foxes are kept encloses resembling their natural habitat, they behave much as they do in the wild.
quotes.author: Caroline Arnold

quotes.quote: When people think of foxes, they picture the red fox, with its large white-tipped tail and brilliant flame color fur.
quotes.author: Caroline Arnold

quotes.quote: The fox, among many other animals, was used as a symbol of premonition in ancient Chinese texts.
quotes.author: Xiaofei Kang

quotes.quote: A faithful history of the life even of a fox may be not without its interest, for, to the wise, nothing in nature mean, and truth us never insignificant.
quotes.author: Thomas Smith

quotes.quote: The forest is a great place for many foxes to live. Thy can use the trees for shelter and for stalking their prey.
quotes.author: David Lee

quotes.quote: Red foxes like to live in the forest. They also live in mountains an grasslands.
quotes.author: David Lee

quotes.quote: Foxes live u most habitats in Earth, except in the driest and coldest regions.
quotes.author: Marshall Cavendish Corporation

quotes.quote: Foxes have excellent nightmare vision and a keen sense of smell.
quotes.author: Marshall Cavendish Corporation

quotes.quote: Foxes do not share their kills except with their offspring. If a fox cannot finish a meal, it buries or hides the rest for later.
quotes.author: Marshall Cavendish Corporation

quotes.quote: As they grow, the cubs establish a dominance system: in their first fall, the lower-ranked foxes are forced out of the territory by the more dominant ones.
quotes.author: Marshall Cavendish Corporation

quotes.quote: A fox tries to make its home near good supplies of food.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Russell-Arnot

quotes.quote: Sometimes, foxes will chase their food. At other times, they will just lie quietly, wait for something to come along, and then pounce on it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Russell-Arnot

quotes.quote: An old fox understands the trap.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The sleeping fox catches no poultry.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The cunning of the fox is as murderous as the violence of the wolf.
quotes.author: Thomas Paine

quotes.quote: A fox is a wolf who sends flowers.
quotes.author: Ruth Brown

quotes.quote: The fox changes his fur but not his habits.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The fox condemns the trap, not himself.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: Fox is notorious for having a very thick skin about taking shots at themselves.
quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

quotes.quote: Two eyes and a nose poke out of the snow. The arctic fox can hide in the snow because it has white fur.
quotes.author: Carri Stuhr

quotes.quote: What creature lives in the desert, has huge ears, and walks or furry feet? It rarely drinks water, and it stays up all night. This special animal is the fennec fox.
quotes.author: Kristin Petrie

quotes.quote: Young foxes learn about the world by using their different senses. Like human babies.
quotes.author: Mary Holland

quotes.quote: Foxes unquestionably do far more harm than good.
quotes.author: Pennsylvania. Dept. of Agriculture

quotes.quote: Foxes kill a great many young lambs, and sometimes destroy whole litters of pigs; this means a loss of money.
quotes.author: Pennsylvania. Dept. of Agriculture

quotes.quote: The bountiful supply of food also makes the life of the city fox noticeably different from those living in rural areas. Like us, foxes live in denser populations in cities than in the countryside.
quotes.author: Tristan Donovan

quotes.quote: Foxes are often called sly, and they certainly earn their reputation.
quotes.author: Vicki Redden

quotes.quote: Paired foxes are loyal to each other, and they show a lot of affection. They mate for life.
quotes.author: Vicki Redden

quotes.quote: In any case, it is clear that foxes held a strong cultural significance for the later people of the Levant.
quotes.author: Adele Brand

quotes.quote: Most of the fox's extended family is extinct, and known to u only through paleontology, but the glimpses defy imagination.
quotes.author: Adele Brand

quotes.quote: Life is a lot more fragile than we think. So you should treat others in a way that leaves no regrets. Fairly, and if possible, sincerely.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: Happiness is such a fragile thing, isn't it? So easily burst, like a bubble blown by a child, and always on the verge of being carried away.
quotes.author: Nenia Campbell

quotes.quote: Fragile egos are put on the line every day.
quotes.author: Mary Lou Retton

quotes.quote: How fragile our lives are anyway. How quickly things can change forever.
quotes.author: Nancy E. Turner

quotes.quote: Ideas are the most fragile things in the world, and if you do not write them down, they will be lost forever.
quotes.author: Phil Cooke

quotes.quote: Relationships are like bubbles â€“ they're fragile.
quotes.author: Michael Douglas

quotes.quote: Hope is such a beautiful word, but it often seems very fragile. Life is still being needlessly hurt and destroyed.
quotes.author: Michael Jackson

quotes.quote: Memory is fragile and the space of a single life is brief, passing so quickly that we never get a chance to see the relationship between events; we cannot gauge the consequences of our acts, and we believe in the fiction of past, present, and future, but it may also be true that everything happens simultaneously.
quotes.author: Isabel Allende

quotes.quote: Life is fragile, like the dew hanging delicately on the grass, crystal drops that will be carried away on the first morning breeze.
quotes.author: Dilgo Khyentse Rinpoche

quotes.quote: We are fragile, everyone. We all long for something more. Things are said and things are done and the pieces hit the floor. See how fragile.
quotes.author: Ralston Bowles

quotes.quote: Trust is a fragile thing - difficult to build, easy to break. It cannot be bargained for. Only if it is freely given it can be expected in return.
quotes.author: Peter Lerangis

quotes.quote: There are so many fragile things, after all. People break so easily, and so do dreams and hearts.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Even in our best shape we are a brittle piece of mortality. Your life is a breath, don't waste it.
quotes.author: Lecrae

quotes.quote: There's no time to hold grudges when you've seen how fragile things can really be.
quotes.author: Allison Winn Scotch

quotes.quote: Freedom is fragile and must be protected. To sacrifice it, even as a temporary measure, is to betray it.
quotes.author: Germaine Greer

quotes.quote: Human identity is the most fragile thing that we have, and it's often only found in moments of truth.
quotes.author: Alan Rudolph

quotes.quote: It is sometimes the most fragile things that have the power to endure and become sources of strength.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: It's fragile what we know. It's gone every time we forget. Then someone has to learn it all over again.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley

quotes.quote: Hope is fragile and needs to be tended and renewed.
quotes.author: Patrick Shade

quotes.quote: A man`s ego is just as fragile as a woman`s heart.
quotes.author: Lana Del Rey

quotes.quote: Life is short, fragile and does not wait for anyone. There will never be a perfect time to pursue your dreams and goals other than right now.
quotes.author: Rachael Bermingham

quotes.quote: Hearts are fragile things. That's why you have to be so careful.
quotes.author: Lauren Oliver

quotes.quote: Love is fragile. And we're not always its best caretakers. We just muddle through and do the best we can. And hope this fragile thing survives against all odds.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: Love is a fragile, corruptible thing. And yet I have seen it evince a curious strength. It is beyond any comprehension. Love is a weakness that once in a great while triumphs over strength.
quotes.author: Brent Weeks

quotes.quote: Mortals are such fragile things. Just tender feelings walking around exposed in their delicate shells...Easy to crush.
quotes.author: Melissa Marr

quotes.quote: Most people are fragile. They're fragile in the sense that they're afraid of the unknown, so they cling to each other. They cling to families, traditions, ways of seeing life that protect them from the immensity of the unknown.
quotes.author: Frederick Lenz

quotes.quote: Life is fragile, handle with prayer.
quotes.author: Harold B. Lee

quotes.quote: Life is very fragile and you never know when it is over. Only one instance and then it might be too late to accept Gods offer for forgiveness.
quotes.author: Chuck Norris

quotes.quote: Reality is a fragile thing.
quotes.author: Cornelia Funke

quotes.quote: Peace is a fragile thing. It takes courage to secure it. It takes wisdom to maintain it.
quotes.author: Jenny Shipley

quotes.quote: Things are fragile, but we're all being carried and I think we're all on our path in that sense. As fragile as things are, we're still getting there.
quotes.author: Andrew McMahon

quotes.quote: Fragile as reason is and limited as law is as the institutionalized medium of reason, that's all we have standing between us and the tyranny of mere will and the cruelty of unbridled, undisciplined feeling.
quotes.author: Felix Frankfurter

quotes.quote: Stop and consider! life is but a day; / A fragile dewdrop on its perilous way / From a tree's summit.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: Nature takes just as much cognizance of the deadly snake as of the greatest statesman.
quotes.author: Luther Burbank

quotes.quote: Don't be afraid to admit that you are less than perfect. It is this fragile thread that binds us to each other.
quotes.author: Brian Dyson

quotes.quote: Most men act so toughly and strong on the outside because on the inside, we are scared, weak, and fragile. Men, not women, are the weaker sex.
quotes.author: Jerry Rubin

quotes.quote: The fragile wants tranquility, the antifragile grows from disorder, and the robust doesn't care too much.
quotes.author: Nassim Nicholas Taleb

quotes.quote: An excessively delicate thing is easy to ruin.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Safekeeping is what is appropriate for a needle.
quotes.author: Yoruba Proverb

quotes.quote: Rock is very strong and meditations are very delicate, but this is the mystery of life—the continuity of the delicate van breaks the strongest and the hardest.
quotes.author: Shree Rajneesh

quotes.quote: The finest qualities of our nature, like the bloom of fruits, can be preserved only by the most delicate handling.
quotes.author: Thoreau

quotes.quote: An appearance of delicacy, and even of fragility, is almost essential to beauty.
quotes.author: Burke

quotes.quote: Delicacy is to the mind what fragrance is to the fruit.
quotes.author: A. Pincelot

quotes.quote: True delicacy, that most beautiful heart-leaf of humanity, exhibits itself most significantly in little things.
quotes.author: Mary Howitt

quotes.quote: The hearts of small children are delicate organs. A cruel beginning in the world can twist them into curious shapes.
quotes.author: Carson McCullers

quotes.quote: Like a new baby held in your arms / Be gentle with me / And apologize not / For any pain upon me placed.
quotes.author: Coralie

quotes.quote: She came to you, she didn't belong / You knew she was fragile, not very strong / Delicate, dainty, full of grace / Gossamer, silk, wings of lace.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: The strongest love is the love that can demonstrate its fragility.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Or maybe it's just that beautiful things are so easily broken by the world.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: You are not made of paper. If you were, you would have turned to ash a long time ago.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.quote: If I told you the few things keeping me alive, / Don't run, don't laugh, don’t cry. / Just forgive me for being soft in life, / I am one of those things that die.
quotes.author: Karl Kristina Flores

quotes.quote: Glass & peace alike betrays proof of fragility under repeated blows.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Some blows fall too heavy upon those too fragile.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: Your life is fragile. Your body, mind, and soul need to be protected, loved, and cared for. Make sure your actions provide love and health to yourself.
quotes.author: Avina Celeste

quotes.quote: Life is fragile. We're not guaranteed a tomorrow so give it everything you've got.
quotes.author: Tim Cook

quotes.quote: When you see how fragile and delicate life can be, all else fades into the background.
quotes.author: Jena Morasca

quotes.quote: Everyone's more vulnerable than they seem, and I think men are more vulnerable. Once you get close to a man, the whole thing's a facade anyway. I think manhood is fragile.
quotes.author: Alain De Botton

quotes.quote: The nature of life is fragile. Uncontrollable events happen all the time in life.
quotes.author: Kishore Bansal

quotes.quote: What bends, can break.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: The frame is the reward of the artist.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: The frame is the pimp of painting; it enhances it, but it must never shine at the painting's expense.
quotes.author: Edgar Degas

quotes.quote: The human frame being what it is, heart, body and brain all mixed together, and not contained in separate compartments as they will be no doubt in another million years, a good dinner is of great importance to good talk. One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: A piece of art receives its frame when found offensive.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: For it is only framed in space that beauty blooms.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Frame your mind to mirth and merriment which bars a thousand harms and lengthens life.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Frame in terms of what you want to have in the picture, not about making a nice picture, that anybody can do.
quotes.author: Garry Winogrand

quotes.quote: Your frame of reference is what you see.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: A frame is the foundation from which everything evolves.
quotes.author: Bob Burg

quotes.quote: It's the frames which make some things important and some things forgotten. It's all only frames from which the content rises.
quotes.author: Eve Babitz

quotes.quote: Like creating a masterpiece, quitting is an art: you have to decide what to keep within the frame and what to keep out.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: The frame announces that between the part of reality that was cut away and this part there is a difference and that this segment which the frame frames is an example of nature as representation, nature as sign.
quotes.author: Rosalind E. Krauss

quotes.quote: Frame your world with your words.
quotes.author: Caroline Leaf

quotes.quote: Thoughts frame your portrait, action paints it.
quotes.author: Charles F. Glassman

quotes.quote: Every frame and every scene has to have an intention.
quotes.author: Mira Nair

quotes.quote: The frame of a soul was never made for fame. The frame of a soul was made to serve.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Live the moment. Cherish the present. Anticipate the future. Frame the yesteryear.
quotes.author: Hlovate

quotes.quote: Framing the issue of work-life balance - as if the two were dramatically opposed - practically ensures work will lose out. Who would ever choose work over life?
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Frame thy mind to mirth and merriment, which bars a thousand harms, and lengthens life.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The framing of a problem is often far more essential than its solution.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: One doesn't stop seeing. One doesn't stop framing. It doesn't turn off and turn on. It's on all the time.
quotes.author: Annie Leibovitz

quotes.quote: Nature hath framed strange fellows in her time.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: We look to the history of the time of framing and to the intervening history of interpretation. But the ultimate question must be, what do the words of the text mean in our time.
quotes.author: William J. Brennan, Jr.

quotes.quote: In framing a system, which we wish to last for ages, we should not lose sight of the changes which ages will produce.
quotes.author: James Madison

quotes.quote: Life only has narrative when we frame it and edit it and call it certain things.
quotes.author: Peter Landesman

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, simplistic framing of problems leads to simplistic answers.
quotes.author: Mariana Mazzucato

quotes.quote: The day that each person willingly accepts himself or herself for who he or she is and acknowledges the uniqueness of God's framing process marks the beginning of a journey to seeing the handiwork of God in each life.
quotes.author: Ravi Zacharias

quotes.quote: A resolution to avoid an evil is seldom framed till the evil is so far advanced as to make avoidance impossible.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: You can frame a moment. But you canÂ´t frame life.
quotes.author: Armin Houman

quotes.quote: The framing of how we relate to each other within and across social media platforms will continue to become more sophisticated and nuanced in their expression of how we structure our relationships in our real world lives.
quotes.author: Simon Mainwaring

quotes.quote: Nature that framed us of four elements, warring within our breasts for regiment, doth teach us all to have aspiring minds.
quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quotes.quote: Create with the heart; build with the mind.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: In framing a government which is to be administered by men over men, the great difficulty lies in this: you must first enable the government to control the governed; and in the next place, oblige it to control itself.
quotes.author: Alexander Hamilton

quotes.quote: The thing framed says that nothing framed it; the tongue never made itself to speak, and yet talks against him that did; saying that which is made, is, and that which made it, is not. But this folly is infinite as hell, as much without light or bound as the chaos or the primitive nothing.
quotes.author: Jeremy Taylor

quotes.quote: The line is a way of framing poetry. All verse is measured by lines. The poetic line immediately announces its difference from everyday speech and prose.
quotes.author: Edward Hirsch

quotes.quote: In France every man is either an anvil or a hammer; he is a beater or must be beaten.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: France is an old country that needs to wake up.
quotes.author: Melanie Laurent

quotes.quote: Heads of France lead from a palace, and traditionally they retire to a cloud.
quotes.author: Rosecrans Baldwin

quotes.quote: France is a strong, wealthy country.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Macron

quotes.quote: France was an occupied country, a country that surrendered and was left without the right to choose.
quotes.author: Jean-Marie Le Pen

quotes.quote: France always has plenty men of talent, but it is always deficient in men of action and high character.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: France does not practice revenge.
quotes.author: Francois Fillon

quotes.quote: France will always be a great nation.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: France is the only country where the money falls apart, and you can't tear the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: In France, cooking is a serious art form and a national sport.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: France has neither winter nor summer nor moralsâ€”apart from these drawbacks it is a fine country.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: France is a place where the money falls apart in your hands but you can't tear the toilet paper.
quotes.author: Billy Wilder

quotes.quote: France was long a despotism tempered by epigrams.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: France, famed in all great arts, in none supreme.
quotes.author: Matthew Arnold

quotes.quote: France is the most civilized country in the world and doesn't care who knows it.
quotes.author: John Gunther

quotes.quote: Paris ain't much of a town.
quotes.author: Babe Ruth

quotes.quote: France is a nation devoted to the false hypothesis on which it then builds marvelously logical structures.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: A walk about Paris will provide lessons in history, beauty, and in the point of Life.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: France is the only nation in which astoundingly small numbers of civilized patrons reside.
quotes.author: Gustave Courbet

quotes.quote: There is just one France, one single nation, united in the same destiny.
quotes.author: Francois Hollande

quotes.quote: France cannot be France without greatness.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: In France, history is paralyzing.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Gaultier

quotes.quote: France is a meddow that cuts thrice a yeere.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: France needs to improve training and education and the level of skills of its workforce.
quotes.author: Francois Hollande

quotes.quote: France has never gotten over the fact that it was once a great power and is now just a great nuisance.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: France must be an example to the world in the quality of its food, starting with its children,
quotes.author: Bruno Le Maire

quotes.quote: In France one must adapt oneself to the fragrance of a urinal.
quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

quotes.quote: A mysterious fraternity born out of smoke and danger of death.
quotes.author: Stephen Crane

quotes.quote: Exhaustion is the shortest way to equality and fraternity.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: I wish everyone a wonderful World Cup, played in a spirit of true fraternity.
quotes.author: Pope Francis

quotes.quote: Olympism is a doctrine of the fraternity between the body and the soul.
quotes.author: Pierre de Coubertin

quotes.quote: There are different Klans just like there are different fraternities in college.
quotes.author: David Duke

quotes.quote: I like the religion that teaches liberty, equality and fraternity.
quotes.author: B R Ambedkar

quotes.quote: We represent a fraternity which believes in justice and truth and honorable action in your community men who are endeavoring to be better citizens and to make a great country greater. This is the only institution in the world where we can meet on the level all sorts of people who want to live rightly.
quotes.author: Harry S Truman

quotes.quote: Liberty, equality, fraternity, or death the last, much the easiest to bestow, O Guillotine!
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: The highest political buzz word is not liberty, equality, fraternity or solidarity; it is service.
quotes.author: Arthur Hugh Clough

quotes.quote: A tiny and closed fraternity of privileged men, elected by no one, and enjoying a monopoly sanctioned and licensed by government.
quotes.author: Spiro T. Agnew

quotes.quote: I cannot possibly understand how fraternity can be legally enforced without liberty being legally destroyedâ€¦
quotes.author: Frédéric Bastiat

quotes.quote: The common right is nothing more or less than the protection of all, pouring its rays on each. This protection of each by all, is Fraternity.
quotes.author: Albert Pike

quotes.quote: If we remain grotesquely unequal, we shall lose all sense of fraternity: and fraternity, for all its fatuity as a political objective, turns out to be the necessary condition of politics itself.
quotes.author: Tony Judt

quotes.quote: A "fraternity" is the antithesis of fraternity. The first ... is predicated on the idea of exclusion; the second (that is, the abstract thing) is based on a feeling of total equality.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: Fraternity without absorption, union without fusion.
quotes.author: Wilfrid

quotes.quote: A fraternity is an association of men, selected in their college days by democratic processes, because of their adherence to common ideals and aspirations.
quotes.author: Newton D. Baker

quotes.quote: Fraternity has subtleties.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: Cooperation called fraternity in the classic French formula is as much a part of the democratic ideal as is personal initiative. That cultural conditions were allowed to develop (markedly so in the economic phase) which subordinated cooperativeness to liberty and equality serves to explain the decline in the two latter.
quotes.author: John Dewey

quotes.quote: Either fraternity is spontaneous, or it does not exist. To decree it is to annihilate it. The law can indeed force men to remain just; in vain would it would try to force them to be self-sacrificing.
quotes.author: Frederic Bastiat

quotes.quote: Fraternity among nations, however, touches the deepest desire of human nature.
quotes.author: Hjalmar Branting

quotes.quote: All the freaky people make the beauty of the world.
quotes.author: Michael Franti

quotes.quote: Be eccentric now. Don't wait for old age to wear purple.
quotes.author: Regina Brett

quotes.quote: Do not fear to be eccentric in opinion, for every opinion now accepted was once eccentric.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: How strange when an illusion dies. It's as though you've lost a child.
quotes.author: Judy Garland

quotes.quote: Fear is the freaky troll under the bridge that leads to achievement.
quotes.author: Richie Norton

quotes.quote: If you're not okay with the freaky truth about what you do and why you do it, then why should anyone else be?
quotes.author: Jeetendr Sehdev

quotes.quote: Oddity, like beauty, is in the eye of the beholder. What one person rejects as lunacy, another reveres as truth.
quotes.author: Philip Gulley

quotes.quote: Strange customs do not thrive in foreign soil.
quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

quotes.quote: We have to dare to be ourselves, however frightening or strange that self may prove to be.
quotes.author: May Sarton

quotes.quote: Develop your eccentricities early, and no one will think you're going senile later in life.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: The eccentric never changes themselves, never even contemplates doing that, ... They're always true to their own nature and as far as they're concerned, the rest of society can either like them or not.
quotes.author: David Weeks

quotes.quote: Be virtuous and you will be eccentric.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Let your mind start a journey thru a strange new world. Leave all thoughts of the world you knew before. Let your soul take you where you long to be...Close your eyes let your spirit start to soar, and you'll live as you've never lived before.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: It's strange that words are so inadequate. Yet, like the asthmatic struggling for breath, so the lover must struggle for words.
quotes.author: T.S.Eliot

quotes.quote: The sensibility of man to trifles, and his insensibility to great things, indicates a strange inversion.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.quote: It would be so weird if we knew just as much as we needed to know to answer all the questions of the universe. Wouldn't that be freaky? Whereas the probability is high that there is a vast reality that we have no way to perceive, that's actually bearing down on us now and influencing everything.
quotes.author: George Saunders

quotes.quote: People think that I must be a very strange person. This is not correct. I have the heart of a small boy. It is in a glass jar on my desk.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: I know the dark delight of being strange, The penalty of difference in the crowd, The loneliness of wisdom among fools.
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: There are certain queer times and occasions in this strange mixed affair we call life when a man takes his whole universe for a vast practical joke.
quotes.author: Herman Melville

quotes.quote: Freaky things happen all the time in the world. I suppose everything has to happen for the first time at some point.
quotes.author: John Jeremiah Sullivan

quotes.quote: As life runs on, the road grows strange with faces new -- and near the end. The milestones into headstones change, Neath every one a friend.
quotes.author: James Russell Lowell

quotes.quote: How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: It is the strange fate of man, that even in the greatest of evils the fear of the worst continues to haunt him.
quotes.author: Johann Von Goethe

quotes.quote: It is strange that modesty is the rule for women when what they most value in men is boldness.
quotes.author: Ninon de L'Enclos

quotes.quote: Strange that creatures without backbones have the hardest shells.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: How strange that nature does not knock, and yet does not intrude!
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: It is very strange that the years teach us patience - that the shorter our time, the greater our capacity for waiting.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Taylor

quotes.quote: So many new ideas are at first strange and horrible, though ultimately valuable that a very heavy responsibility rests upon those who would prevent their dissemination.
quotes.author: John Haldane

quotes.quote: Those freckles make you seem like a galaxy of stars, just waiting to be explored and loved.
quotes.author: Nikita Gill

quotes.quote: I'd never seen a creature with so many freckles before. A Big Bang had occurred, originating at the bridge of her nose, and the force of this explosion had sent galaxies of freckles hurtling and drifting to every end of her curved, warm-blooded universe.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Eugenides

quotes.quote: I have never wanted to hide my freckles. I just didn't like the way I looked without them; it didn't look like me.
quotes.author: Cassadee Pope

quotes.quote: I had so many freckles that my mother used to say that they were kisses from the angels. I still have them.
quotes.author: Lara Flynn Boyle

quotes.quote: I've got more freckles than just about anybody. My children didn't get them, thankfully. They have tiny little freckles.
quotes.author: Julianne Moore

quotes.quote: Something that I've learned to love about myself is my freckles. I used to absolutely hate them; I even looked into ways I could get them removed.
quotes.author: Madison Beer

quotes.quote: Her freckles were orange, as if somebody had spray-painted her face with liquid Cheetos.
quotes.author: Rick Riordan

quotes.quote: I don't see myself as beautiful. I was a kid who was freckle-faced, and they used to call me 'hay head.'
quotes.author: Robert Redford

quotes.quote: I am thinking it's a sign / That the freckles in our eyes / Are mirror images / And when we kiss, they're perfectly aligned
quotes.author: The Postal Service

quotes.quote: It is important to me to take care of my skin. In general I don't like to wear foundation; I'm not a fan of the look. I like my skin fresh and natural enough so my freckles show through.
quotes.author: Tracee Ellis Ross

quotes.quote: I was the world's smallest man, covered in freckles with a squeaky, scratchy voice. I still am, but I learned to love myself.
quotes.author: Charlie Day

quotes.quote: I want to get to know every freckle and every curve on a person level.
quotes.author: Jennifer L. Armentroutal

quotes.quote: Girls, their mother interjected, "you must both stop being strange - it is unattractive. And don't forget your hats. It would be absolutely the end for me if you two came down with freckles at a time like this.
quotes.author: Anna Godbersen

quotes.quote: The only remedy is to take the liver of a toad, bind it tight about your throat, stand naked by the full moon in a barrel of eels’ eyes — I have not got spattergroit But the unsightly blemishes upon your visage, young master, They're freckles said Ron furiously.
quotes.author: J.K. Rowling

quotes.quote: My head's higher than his, but we're close enough that I can see the freckles beneath his eyes. If I had to pick a favorite part of Percy's face - which would be impossible, really, but if held at gunpoint and forced to make a selection - it would be that small star-map across his skin. A part of him it feels as though no one else but me is ever close enough to see.
quotes.author: Mackenzi Lee

quotes.quote: He’d never heard of a demon with freckles before.
quotes.author: Michael Scott

quotes.quote: In daylight and up close, he was merciless, all smiles and freckles, the brightest, boldest flame a moth could wish for.
quotes.author: Alexis Hall

quotes.quote: Rew looked like he had put his face up to the sky in a rainstorm of freckles
quotes.author: Adina Rishe Gewirtz

quotes.quote: Having been raised by relations who had always lamented the garish color of her hair and the proliferation of freckles, Evie gave him a skeptical smile. Aunt Florence has always given me a bleaching lotion to make my freckles vanish. But there’s no getting rid of them.
quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

quotes.quote: Tendrils of bright red hair framed her face, a spray of freckles powdered her nose, and she was as plump as a perfectly ripened peach. Raphael probably would have painted out the freckles, and that would have been a mistake. Like brushing cinnamon off cinnamon toast.
quotes.author: E. L. Konigsburg

quotes.quote: He grinned, teeth and dimples and freckles moving like dust in a ray of sunlight.
quotes.author: Alexis Hall

quotes.quote: My ravenous gaze devouring every inch of her visage, from the gentle branching of lines that wing from her sunken eyes to a paltry splattering of freckles that mottle her bottom lip.
quotes.author: Ilse V. Rensburg

quotes.quote: I like when my freckles show or when I do shoots and they accentuate them. It's such a compliment.
quotes.author: Madison Beer

quotes.quote: I love the texture of my skin and I love my freckles and even if my nose gets a little red, I don't mind so much.
quotes.author: Camille Rowe

quotes.quote: I love faces that have freckles. I love faces that have wrinkles. For me, beauty is naturalism, I guess.
quotes.author: Rachel Morrison

quotes.quote: His face with freckles,--and his ears, how quick And curious and intrusive!--And how pale The blue of his big eyes;--and how a tale Of Giants, Trolls or Fairies, bulged them still
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: In their gold coats spots you see; Those be rubies, fairy favours; In those freckles live their savours; I must go seek some dewdrops here, I must go seek some dewdrops here,
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: By heated kisses, mischief, and has brought Some vagrant freckles, while from here and there A few wild locks of vagabond brown hair Escape the old straw hat the sun looks through.
quotes.author: Emily Pauline Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm driving down by Wexford-street and up a winder goes, A girl sticks out 'er 'ead and looks at me, An all-right tart with ginger 'air, and freckles on 'er nose;
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: A laughing young man, sunny with freckles, Climbs a ladder, yells a joke to somebody in the crowd, And then fixes a yellow button one inch west And follows the yellow button with a black button one inch west.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: When you were in dazzling light of the celestial sun; you acquired a distinctive tan, Coating your supple face with profound lines of black; inundating your skin with yellow freckles.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: There may not be one dimple on her hand; And freckles many; ah! a careless nurse, In haste to teach the little thing to walk, May have crumpt up a pair of Dian's legs, And warpt the ivory of a Juno's neck.
quotes.author: John Keats

quotes.quote: In those freckles live their savours: I must go seek some dew-drops here, And hang a pearl in every cowslip's ear.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Four be the things I’d been better without: Love, curiosity, freckles, and doubt.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: I never could imagine the silhouettes of her lips; the freckles prevalent in tandem on her face,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Some sprinkled freckles on his face were seen, Whose dusk set off the whiteness of the skin.
quotes.author: John Dryden

quotes.quote: Muse upon ologies, freckles and fog, Why hermits live lonely and grapes in a bunch, On the ways of a child or the mind of a dog, Or the oyster you bolted last Friday at lunch.
quotes.author: Clarence Michael James Stanislaus Dennis

quotes.quote: On my face the bronze an' freckles O' the suns o' youthful Junes— Thinkin' that no mortal minstrel Ever chanted sich a lay
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: No freckles on the skin: as balm she's sweet: Antoinetta is, her spouse replied, Ambrosia ev'ry way: no fault to hide.
quotes.author: Jean de la Fontaine

quotes.quote: When i greedily gulped saline water from sea waves fresh centers of thirst got doubly stimulated wild freckles of red rash encompassed my lips,
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Thou may'st, too, here thy spots and freckles see, Hast thou but eyes, and what their numbers be.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: She got them at the tanning salon (White freckles) That stencils sticking, let's get it on (White freckes)
quotes.author: Ariel Pink

quotes.quote: the freckles on my face Won't you come and hold my hand now? (Hand now, hand now) I think that you may wanna (wanna)
quotes.author: The Regrettes

quotes.quote: Wrinkle, wrinkle little scar, count the freckles on my arm If freckles don't mean anything, does anything mean anything?
quotes.author: Darwin Deez

quotes.quote: Is green eyes and freckles and your smile In the back of my mind making me feel like I just wanna know you better, know you better, know you better now
quotes.author: Taylor Swift

quotes.quote: Hat, sir, I guess I didn't make it! But whether I'm the rose Of sheer perfection Or freckle on the nose Of life's complexion
quotes.author: Barbra Streisand

quotes.quote: Well, you melt the snow And you grow the roses And you dry the tears And you freckle noses Our little world revolves around You coming up and going down
quotes.author: Miranda Lambert

quotes.quote: You always looked a little out of place All grown out with freckles on your face We'd spend each night with company Just you, the teddy bear, the dolls and me What a funny girl you used to be
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: I'm a free spirit. A spirit that evolves. I'm a diamond. I'm just refining it. Polishing it. Glossing it up.
quotes.author: Simeon Rice

quotes.quote: Let your mind be set free from the control of others influence.
quotes.author: Jeremy Limn

quotes.quote: Every renaissance comes to the world with a cry, the cry of the human spirit to be free.
quotes.author: Anne Sullivan Macy

quotes.quote: I am a wild woman, it would take a warrior to tame my spirit.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: One radical free spirit nonconformist is pretty much like another.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: Here the free spirit of mankind, at length, Throws its last fetters off; and who shall place A limit to the giant's unchained strength, Or curb his swiftness in the forward race?
quotes.author: William C. Bryant

quotes.quote: I am a free spirit. I tell the truth, and I like to mix it up.
quotes.author: Ed Rendell

quotes.quote: There are incalculable resources in the human spirit, once it has been set free.
quotes.author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quotes.quote: I realize I'm a free spirit. I like to be happy. I have to have more control of my happiness.
quotes.author: Chamique Holdsclaw

quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: I die, as I have lived, a free spirit, an Anarchist, owing no allegiance to rulers, heavenly or earthly.
quotes.author: Voltairine de Cleyre

quotes.quote: If you try to tame her she will fly away, because pretty little spirits like her, never like to be caged.
quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

quotes.quote: I am living breathing freedom
quotes.author: Hiroko Sakai

quotes.quote: He had a free spirit. He was so far-reaching, he's the person who likes the wind in his hair.
quotes.author: Carlotta Leon Guerrero

quotes.quote: Your happiness doesn't come free, but you need to be free to be happy.
quotes.author: Nokwethemba Nkosi

quotes.quote: I like to be a free spirit. Some don't like that, but that's the way I am
quotes.author: Princess Diana

quotes.quote: A free spirit takes liberties even with liberty itself.
quotes.author: Francis Picabia

quotes.quote: The only way to deal with an unfree world is to become so absolutely free that your very existence is an act of rebellion.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: You are always free to change your mind and choose a different future, or a different past.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: I am a leaf on the wind. Watch how I soar!
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: They can't chain my spirit! My spirit runs free! Walls can't contain it! Laws can't restrain it! Authority has no power over it!
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: The human spirit: Unbreakable. Relentless. Free.
quotes.author: Garth Brooks

quotes.quote: I'm a free spirit and that definitely comes from my upbringing, so it's definitely shaped me as an artist.
quotes.author: Neon Hitch

quotes.quote: Release your majestic mind, embrace your untamed inner spirit. Break free from captivity, avoid society.. You were born to be free.
quotes.author: Melanie Muller

quotes.quote: Free time is the enemy of progress.
quotes.author: Casey Neistat

quotes.quote: Free time is a terrible thing to waste. Read a book.
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: If finding true love was easy we'd all have a lot more free time.
quotes.author: John Avery

quotes.quote: Write what you know. That should leave you with a lot of free time.
quotes.author: Howard Nemerov

quotes.quote: Spend your free time the way you like, not the way you think you're supposed to.
quotes.author: Susan Cain

quotes.quote: Handmade presents are scary because they reveal that you have too much free time.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: You will be amazed at how much free time you have when you never have to think about money.
quotes.author: Bob Proctor

quotes.quote: We try to 'self-medicate' ourselves against boredom with mobile phones in any given moment of free time.
quotes.author: Alex Bogusky

quotes.quote: Too much free time is certainly a monkey's paw in disguise. Most people can't handle a structureless life.
quotes.author: Douglas Coupland

quotes.quote: Being organized will give you more free time, contribute to a cheerful nature, and add to the peace and security of your home.
quotes.author: Deniece Schofield

quotes.quote: Free time is an illusion. It's what you get when you die and the gods reward you for a life spent working from dawn until midnight.
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: The way we live is changing. Each year, our free time shrinks a little more as computers clamor for an increasing percentage of our attention.
quotes.author: Ruth Reichl

quotes.quote: Make use of all free time at the office and elsewhere for chanting your mantra or reading spiritual books. Avoid indulging in unnecessary gossip and try to talk about spiritual subjects with others.
quotes.author: Mata Amritanandamayi

quotes.quote: Spend 70% of your spare time doing things close to home and the other 30% doing work at the global and national level.
quotes.author: Bill McKibben

quotes.quote: In capitalist society spare time is acquired for one class by converting the whole life-time of the masses into labour-time.
quotes.author: Karl Marx

quotes.quote: Leisure time is that five or six hours when you sleep at night.
quotes.author: George Allen

quotes.quote: The real problem of leisure time is how to keep others from using yours.
quotes.author: Arthur Lacey

quotes.quote: It's not a man's working hours that is important, it is how he spends his leisure time.
quotes.author: Marilynne Robinson

quotes.quote: Nothing adds to a person's leisure time like doing things when they are supposed to be done.
quotes.author: Orlando Aloysius Battista

quotes.quote: Temptation rarely comes in working hours. It is in their leisure time that men are made or marred.
quotes.author: W. N. Taylor

quotes.quote: People would have more leisure time if it weren't for all the leisure-time activities that use it up.
quotes.author: Peg Bracken

quotes.quote: Work is only justified by leisure time. To admit the emptiness of leisure time is to admit the impossibility of life.
quotes.author: Guy Debord

quotes.quote: Spend your leisure time in cultivating an ear attentive to discourse, for in this way you will find that you learn with ease what others have found out with difficulty.
quotes.author: Isocrates

quotes.quote: People want more and more leisure time which means the freedom to do what they want to do, not what they have to do, and as we get richer and richer, more and more people will be able to afford that.
quotes.author: Robert Fogel

quotes.quote: Leisure time is only leisure time when it is earned; otherwise, leisure time devolves into soul-killing lassitude. There's a reason so many new retirees, freed from the treadmill of work, promptly keel over on the golf course: Work fulfills us. It keeps us going.
quotes.author: Ben Shapiro

quotes.quote: Take time off to give to yourself, in a sense to fill yourself up to fullness, to where now you can overflow in giving.
quotes.author: John Gray

quotes.quote: Free time keeps me going.
quotes.author: Gus Van Sant

quotes.quote: Any extra free time you have, you are sleeping, or you're trying to sleep.
quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

quotes.quote: It's a false assumption that people with a lot of money have a lot of free time to shop.
quotes.author: Natalie Massenet

quotes.quote: That's why they call it work, because it's not what you'd prefer to do with your free time.
quotes.author: Diane Lane

quotes.quote: Take some time off to go within, in silence. With that, your charm becomes eternal, your love becomes unconditional & great strength arises.
quotes.author: Sri Sri Ravi Shankar

quotes.quote: Life is like a game of cards. The hand you are dealt is determinism, the way you play it is free will.
quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quotes.quote: Free will is an illusion. People always choose the perceived path of greatest pleasure.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: Free will, though it makes evil possible, is also the only thing that makes possible any love or goodness or joy worth having.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: And one who is just of his own free will shall not lack for happiness; and he will never come to utter ruin.
quotes.author: Aeschylus

quotes.quote: Let all the 'free-will' in the world do all it can with all its strength; it will never give rise to a single instance of ability to avoid being hardened if God does not give the Spirit, or of meriting mercy if it is left to its own strength.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: If God thinks this state of war in the universe a price worth paying for free will...then we may take it it is worth paying.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: The essence of spiritual life is simply to use our free will properly.
quotes.author: Radhanath Swami

quotes.quote: The neutral view of free will is impossible. It involves choice without desire.
quotes.author: R. C. Sproul

quotes.quote: Free will is to mind what chance is to matter.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Free will is not the liberty to do whatever one likes, but the power of doing whatever one sees ought to be done, even in the very face of otherwise overwhelming impulse. There lies freedom, indeed.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Morality pertains only to the sphere of man's free will - only to those actions which are open to his choice.
quotes.author: Ayn Rand

quotes.quote: Man has reason, discrimination and free-will such as it is. The brute has no such thing. It is not a free agent, and knows no distinction between virtue and vice, good and evil. Man, being a free agent, knows these distinctions, and when he follows his higher nature, shows himself far superior to the brute, but when he follows his baser nature can show himself lower than the brute.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Mankind has a free will; but it is free to milk cows and to build houses, nothing more.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The greatest judgment which God himself can, in the present life, inflict upon a man is to leave him in the hand of his own boasted 'free'-will.
quotes.author: Augustus Toplady

quotes.quote: ...free will does not mean one will, but many wills conflicting in one man. Freedom cannot be conceived simply.
quotes.author: Flannery O'Connor

quotes.quote: You can't have it both ways. You can't have both free will and a benevolent higher power who protects you from yourself.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: No one has free will until they are an adult, and by then the choices that were made for them, have already set them on a course that gives limited freedom in the choices to be made.
quotes.author: J.D. Stroube

quotes.quote: The question of free will is insoluble on strictly psychological grounds.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: Free will is the power of choosing good and evil.
quotes.author: Origen

quotes.quote: No tribe unites with another of its own free will.
quotes.author: Arthur Keith

quotes.quote: One of my core beliefs is that belief itself is a choice that can be made of our own free will.
quotes.author: Steve Pavlina

quotes.quote: Our hands we open of our own free will, and the good flies, which we can never recall.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Think of destiny more like potentiality because of an element called - free will.
quotes.author: Ruben Papian

quotes.quote: Contempt for the things people choose of their own free will is, at its heart, contempt for free will.
quotes.author: James Lileks

quotes.quote: Free will does not enable any man to perform good works, unless he is assisted by grace; indeed, the special grace which the elect alone receive through regeneration. For I stay not to consider the extravagance of those who say that grace is offered equally and promiscuously to all
quotes.author: John Calvin

quotes.quote: You have fettered yourself of your own free will, man - break the fetters!
quotes.author: Halldor Laxness

quotes.quote: It is only work that is done as freewill offering to humanity and to nature that does not bring with it any binding attachment.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.quote: It is easy to take liberty for granted, when you have never had it taken from you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing is more difficult, and therefore more precious, than to be able to decide.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The revelation of thought takes men out of servitude into freedom.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Freedom means the opportunity to be what we never thought we would be.
quotes.author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quotes.quote: Everything that is really great and inspiring is created by the individual who can labor in freedom.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not include the freedom to make mistakes.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Freedom in general may be defined as the absence of obstacles to the realization of desires.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: We must be free not because we claim freedom, but because we practice it.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Order without liberty and liberty without order are equally destructive.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to one's dignity as a man.
quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.quote: When a man is denied the right to live the life he believes in, he has no choice but to become an outlaw.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.quote: Better to die fighting for freedom then be a prisoner all the days of your life.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: If you want to be free, there is but one way; it is to guarantee an equally full measure of liberty to all your neighbors. There is no other.
quotes.author: Carl Schurz

quotes.quote: Patterning your life around other's opinions is nothing more than slavery.
quotes.author: Lawana Blackwell

quotes.quote: Freedom is just Chaos, with better lighting.
quotes.author: Alan Dean Foster

quotes.quote: When we lose the right to be different, we lose the privilege to be free.
quotes.author: Charles Evans Hughes

quotes.quote: Liberty is not a means to a higher political end. It is itself the highest political end.
quotes.author: Lord Acton

quotes.quote: Freedom lies in being bold.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: What is freedom? Freedom is the right to choose: the right to create for oneself the alternatives of choice.
quotes.author: Archibald MacLeish

quotes.quote: There are two freedoms - the false, where a man is free to do what he likes; the true, where he is free to do what he ought.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Freedom - to walk free and own no superior.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: He only earns his freedom and his life Who takes them every day by storm.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Freedom is the last, best hope of earth.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The sound of tireless voices is the price we pay for the right to hear the music of our own opinions.
quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson

quotes.quote: To know how to free oneself is nothing; the arduous thing is to know what to do with one's freedom.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: I know but one freedom and that is the freedom of the mind.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: If a thing is free to be good it is also free to be bad. And free will is what has made evil possible. Why, then, did God give them free will? Because free will, though it makes evil possible, is also the only thing that makes possible any love or goodness or joy worth having.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Free will is not the liberty to do whatever one likes, but the power of doing whatever one sees ought to be done, even in the very face of otherwise overwhelming impulse. There lies freedom, indeed.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: Unless the will is free, man has no freedom; and if he has no freedom he is not a moral agent, that is, he is incapable of moral action and also of moral character.
quotes.author: Charles Finney

quotes.quote: The family is the test of freedom; because the family is the only thing that the free man makes for himself and by himself.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Education is the key to unlock the golden door of freedom.
quotes.author: George Washington Carver

quotes.quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: While we are free to choose our actions, we are not free to choose the consequences of our actions.
quotes.author: Stephen Covey

quotes.quote: Freedom is not an end in itself, that how freedom is exercised matters as much as freedom itself.
quotes.author: Stephen Harper

quotes.quote: A man can be free without being great, but no man can be great without being free.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to question and change the established way of doing things.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Freedom is not procured by a full enjoyment of what is desired, but by controlling the desire.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The ability to free your mind from unwanted thoughts is real freedom.
quotes.author: Remez Sasson

quotes.quote: Who speaks of liberty while the human mind is in chains?
quotes.author: Francis Wright

quotes.quote: Freedom is the will to be responsible to ourselves.
quotes.author: Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Liberty, when it begins to take root, is a plant of rapid growth.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: ???Freedom has its life in the hearts, the actions, the spirit of men and so it must be daily earned and refreshed - else like a flower cut from its life-giving roots, it will wither and die.?
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Freedom is not an unlimited license, an unlimited choice, or an unlimited opportunity. Freedom is first of all a responsibility before the God from whom we come.
quotes.author: Alan Keyes

quotes.quote: ?No man can put a chain about the ankle of his fellow man without at last finding the other end fastened about his own neck.?
quotes.author: Frederick Douglass

quotes.quote: ?Freedom is never free.?
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Freedom is the right to live as we wish.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: The Divine Plan is one of Freedom.The inherent nature of man is ever seeking to express itself in terms of freedom,because freedom is the birthright of every living soul.
quotes.author: Ernest Holmes
