quotes.author: Melissa Broder

quotes.quote: If fortune drives the master forth, an outcast in the world, friendless and homeless, the faithful dog asks no higher privilege than that of accompanying him, to guard him against danger, to fight against his enemies.
quotes.author: George Graham Vest

quotes.quote: I'm haunted. We all are, I guess. We're parentless, friendless, unloved, abandoned. The spirits of our deceased emotional anchors and proofs of existence will follow and demean us until we too roam a quiet lifeless world alongside them - unable to speak - our histories written in beach sand.
quotes.author: Jason S. Hornsby

quotes.quote: Be he poor, be he friendless,here he may acquire distinction, the reward of merit alone. Knowledge to him will here unfold her ample page; all the spoils of time, all the treasures of thought, and all the bright domains of a glorious future, may here become his.
quotes.author: Charles Nicholson

quotes.quote: He alone is great and happy who requires neither to command nor to obey in order to secure his being of some importance in this world.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: A man is born alone and dies alone; and he experiences the good and bad consequences of his karma alone; and he goes alone to hell or the Supreme abode.
quotes.author: Chanakya

quotes.quote: Will I try to buy your love. I'm getting friendless, back to the end. Shadows of guilt run through, this time it's better than the last. Guilt from your face, This is wanted to the end there's a smile in me.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art... It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things that give value to survival.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Friends are the family you choose.
quotes.author: Jess C. Scott

quotes.quote: Friends are like rainbows - always there to cheer you up after a storm.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When our friends are present we ought to treat them well; and when they are absent, to speak of them well.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Friends are much better tried in bad fortune than in good.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: True friends visit us in prosperity only when invited, but in adversity they come without invitation.
quotes.author: Theophrastus

quotes.quote: Friends are like melons. Shall I tell you why? To find one good, you must a hundred try.
quotes.author: Claude Mermet

quotes.quote: Friends are as companions on a journey, who ought to aid each other to persevere in the road to a happier life.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: Friends should be like books, few, but hand-selected.
quotes.author: C.J. Langenhoven

quotes.quote: Without friends, no one would want to live, even if he had all other goods.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble...
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Where there are friends, there is wealth.
quotes.author: Titus Maccius Plautus

quotes.quote: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: If all my friends were to jump off a bridge, I wouldn't jump with them, I would be at the bottom to catch them.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Friends are the bacon bits in the salad bowl of life.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Friends are life's finest blessings. "Friend" and "free" are from the same root word; perhaps because you are free to be yourself with a friend.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Friends make memories...the heart preserves them.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: My friends are my estate.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: True friends are the ones who never leave your heart, even if they leave your life for awhile. Even after years apart, you pick up with them right where you left off, and even if they die they're never dead in your heart.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: True friends are those who lift you up when your heart's wings forget how to fly.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: All we can do is to make the best of our friends: love and cherish what is good in them, and keep out of the way of what is bad: but no more think of rejecting them for it than of throwing away a piece of music for a flat passage or two.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: With true friends...even water drunk together is sweet enough.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: Friends are relatives you make for yourself.
quotes.author: Eustache Descamps

quotes.quote: Wherever we are, it is our friends that make our world.
quotes.author: Henry Drummond

quotes.quote: Friends are the most important ingredient in the recipe called life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: F.R.I.E.N.D.S.Fight for you. Respect you. Include you.Encourage you. Need you. Deserve you. Stand by you.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Good friends help you to find important things when you have lost them - your smile, your hope, and your courage.
quotes.author: Doe Zantamata

quotes.quote: Friends are those crazy people who keep coming back, in spite of being exposed to the real you.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: True friends never apart maybe in distance but never in heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: A circle of friends, doesn't always keep perfect relationships.
quotes.author: Anthony Liccione

quotes.quote: Real Friends' are someone who are right next to you when you got in emergency, not in only parties.
quotes.author: Hiroko Sakai

quotes.quote: Truly great friends are hard to find, difficult to leave, and impossible to forget.
quotes.author: G. Randolf

quotes.quote: Friends are like walls. Sometimes you lean on them, and sometimes it's good just knowing they are there.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are kisses blown to us by angels.
quotes.author: Author Unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are the sailors who guide your rickety boat safely across the dangerous waters of life.
quotes.author: Sare and Cate

quotes.quote: No matter whether you believe this or not, your friends command a major proportion of your destiny, they contribute largely to your future. Choose the right friends, keep yourself around like ? minded people, regardless of their background, as long as you share common future aspirations!
quotes.author: Tonny Rutakirwa

quotes.quote: Your friends are very precious things;Their love is like the rarest gem.But friends are hard to find and keepUnless you are a friend to them.
quotes.author: Ann Cragg

quotes.quote: Be careful the friends you choose -for you will become like them.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: Friends share our pain and touch our woundswith a gentle and tender hand.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Friends are God's way of apologizing to us for our families.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When friends stop being frank and useful to each other, the whole world loses some of its radiance.
quotes.author: Anatole Broyard

quotes.quote: Friends are like Peanut Butter ... it sticks to the roof of your mouth, like a friend sticks to you.... and it feels as if they never go away.!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends are the sunshine of life.
quotes.author: John Hay

quotes.quote: Treat your friends as you do your pictures, and place them in their best light.
quotes.author: Jennie Jerome Churchill

quotes.quote: Friends are like stars, they come and go, but the ones that stay are the ones that glow.
quotes.author: Roxy Quiksilver

quotes.quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: True friends can see the hurt in your eyes when everyone else is fooled by your smile.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Side by side or miles apart, dear friends are always close to the heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Good friends are those who care without hesitation, who remember without limitation and who love even without communication.
quotes.author: Philippos

quotes.quote: One friend in a lifetime is much; two are many; three are hardly possible.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: There are good many fools who call me a friend. and also a good many friends who call me a fool.
quotes.author: Chesterton

quotes.quote: A friend in power is a friend lost.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
quotes.author: Santayana

quotes.quote: A friend is a present which you give yourself.
quotes.author: R.L. Stevenson

quotes.quote: Everyone's friend is no one's.
quotes.author: Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: To find a friend one must close one eye to keep him, two.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: There are people whom one should like very well to drop, and would not wish to be dropped by.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: It's what people don't know about each other that makes them such good friends.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some friends are habit. Others a luxury.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: To keep friends, treat them kindly; to kill friends, treat them often.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A true friend remains a friend even when you don't deserve to have a friend.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It is surprising how many friends a man has until he needs one.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A person's five closest friends say a lot about them and where they are heading whether uphill or downhill.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Genuine friendship is at the root of all long lasting relationships.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If I say I am your friend, I will always be your friend, not as long as or until anything. I will always be there for you.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Sometimes, if it is a close friend or relative they will certainly remind you of those skeletons in your closet.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: The people who create long lasting meaningful friendships with others understand that love lives on long after they're gone and therefore they're gone and therefore they're not afraid to invest in meaningful associations.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: Ever lost touch, let a good friendship die cause you never had time to call and say, 'Hi'? You'd better slow down. Don't dance so fast. Time is short. The music won't last.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Monkeys, warm with envious spite, their most obliging friends will bite.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: Those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: A friend is one who loves you, but one who loves you isn't necessarily your friend.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: Friends help us stay lose and keep our perspective in check when we start complaining about life.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Friends comforting each other during times of loss is so very powerful and meaningful.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: My parents told me to choose friends, not because they are popular, attractive, rich, athletic, etc. But because they are good people.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: Real friends are loving in an unconditional manner. They accept you for your faults, the quirky things that you do or so, and regardless of what you do for them.
quotes.author: James Frey

quotes.quote: A real friend is someone who would feel loss if you jumped on a train, or in front of one.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Unknown silences make the real conversations between friends.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: I have great faith in fools. Self-confidence, my friends call it.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Real friends are those who, when you feel you've made a fool of yourself, don't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: A mother is the truest friend we have, when trials heavy and sudden, fall upon us when adversity takes the place of prosperity.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: The quality of your life is your community. Your true wealth are your friends.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Socially, people copy their friends, Professionally, people copy their foes, Culturally, people copy their idols.
quotes.author: Steve Supple

quotes.quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. But if you haven't learnt the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learnt anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Before borrowing from a friend, decide which you need most.
quotes.author: American Proverb

quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: St.Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Misfortune shows those who are not really friends.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: My best friend is the man who in wishing me well wishes it for my sake.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: She had been a teenager once, and she knew that, despite the apparent contradictions, a person's teenage years lasted well into their fifties.
quotes.author: Derek Landy

quotes.quote: I had choosen the path of the black sheep rather than that of the unicorns and puppies.
quotes.author: Magenta Periwinkle

quotes.quote: Your personal truth is your gift to the world.
quotes.author: Jennifer Elisabeth

quotes.quote: To now is to love, to see is a joy, but to lose is hurtful.
quotes.author: Rubye Armorer

quotes.quote: Heredity is what sets the parents of a teenager wondering about each other.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: Adolescence is perhaps nature's way of preparing parents to welcome the empty nest.
quotes.author: Karen Savage and Patricia Adams

quotes.quote: As a teenager you are at the last stage in your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: The best substitute for experience is being sixteen.
quotes.author: Raymond Duncan

quotes.quote: Teenagers complain there's nothing to do, then stay out all night doing it.
quotes.author: Bob Phillips

quotes.quote: Every teenager in the world feels like that, feels broken or out of place, different somehow, royalty mistakenly born into a family of peasants.
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: When you become a teenager, you step onto a bridge. You may already be on it. The opposite shore is adulthood. Childhood lies behind. The bridge is made of wood. As you cross, it burns behind you.
quotes.author: GAIL CARSON LEVINE

quotes.quote: Teenagers. Everything is so apocalyptic.
quotes.author: Kami Garcia

quotes.quote: The older your teenagers are, the more they will have their own ideas and opinions. If you take them seriously, rather than assuming your ideas are always best and the only ones, you will begin to grow a relationship that will extend beyond the hormone-group years.
quotes.author: Kevin Leman

quotes.quote: One of the reasons the teenage years are so agonizing is that in most societies, particularly ours, the adolescent is emotionally neither fish nor fowl.
quotes.author: HERBERT STREAN & LUCY FREEMAN

quotes.quote: As a teenager you are at the last stage in your life when you will be happy to hear that the phone is for you.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: I think the hardest part about being a teenager is dealing with other teenagers - the criticism and the ridicule, the gossip and rumors.
quotes.author: Beverley Mitchell

quotes.quote: Teenagers only have to focus on themselves - its not until we get older that we realize that other people exist.
quotes.author: Jennifer Lawrence

quotes.quote: All teenagers have this desire to somehow run away.
quotes.author: Joan Chen

quotes.quote: If you liked being a teenager, there's something really wrong with you.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: As a teenager, I put a lot of pressure on myself, and a lot of that, for me, was about finding a moral high ground. As I've grown up, I've decided to abandon that because it made me judgmental and also stressed me out.
quotes.author: Veronica Roth

quotes.quote: Being a teenager is an amazing time and a hard time. It's when you make your best friends - I have girls who will never leave my heart and I still talk to. You get the best and the worst as a teen. You have the best friendships and the worst heartbreaks.
quotes.author: Sophia Bush

quotes.quote: Friends may come and go. But two hundred pounds is always two hundred pounds.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: I am my best friend. Other friends may come and go, but I am always here for me.
quotes.author: Louise Hay

quotes.quote: Friends come and go, but true friends leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Yashraj Suman

quotes.quote: Just remember, some come, some go. The ones that stay with you through everything they're your true best friends. Don't let go of them.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Always remember the stronger your position in life, the more enemies you're gonna have, while friends come and go.
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Friends come and go, I really don't have time to be running after people.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Friends come and go but I wouldn't have thought you'd be one of them.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Understand that friends come and go, but with a precious few you should hold on. The older you get, the more you need the people who knew you when you were young.
quotes.author: Mary Schmich

quotes.quote: Friends come & go but there's always a reason.
quotes.author: Joey Parker

quotes.quote: Friends come and go you can't control who stays and who leaves.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Friends come and go, that's why I watch my back and trust only few.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Friends come and go but enemies accumulate.
quotes.author: Arthur Bloch

quotes.quote: Friends are like stars they come and they go but only the true ones glow.
quotes.author: Kushand

quotes.quote: The older you get, the more you live with ghosts.
quotes.author: Nick Tosches

quotes.quote: I would tell 17-year-olds to be proud of who you are. Don't try to change yourself for others. Focus on school and your future. Boys and friends will come and go, just focus on you and your future.
quotes.author: Lea Michele

quotes.quote: Friends come and go but banners hang forever.
quotes.author: Kobe Bryant

quotes.quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life but only true friends leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Everyone's friend is no one's.
quotes.author: Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: To find a friend one must close one eye, to keep him, two.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: One friend in a lifetime is much; two are many; three are hardly possible.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: There are a good many fools who call me a friend, and also a good many friends who call me a fool.
quotes.author: Chesterton

quotes.quote: A friend in power is a friend lost.
quotes.author: Henry Adams

quotes.quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
quotes.author: Santayana

quotes.quote: A friend is a present which you give yourself.
quotes.author: R.L. Stevenson

quotes.quote: There are people whom one should like very well to drop, and would not wish to be dropped by.
quotes.author: Samuel Jackson

quotes.quote: It's what people don't know about each other that makes them such good friends.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Some friends are a habit. others a luxury.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: A true friend remains a friend even when you don't deserve to have one.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: It is surprising how many friends a man has until he needs one.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: If a false friend is one who stabs you in the back, is a true friend one who stabs you in front?
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with a part of another: people are friends in spots.
quotes.author: Santayana

quotes.quote: It is a mark of friendship to imagine the worst possible things about a friend.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: A man's friendships are invalidated by his marriage, but they are also no less invalidated by the marriage of his friends.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Friends come and go, friends come and go / Go like the seasons / I never know, I never know / What to believe in / And it's getting old, it's getting old / But no hard feelings
quotes.author: Gerald Gillum

quotes.quote: Friends come and friends may go / My friend, you're real I know / True self you have shown / You're alright with me / Through thick and thick to thin / I'll love you till the end / You know it's true my friend / You're alright with me
quotes.author: James Samuel III Harris

quotes.quote: When your friends come and go / Because they depended on you / For their own selfish needs / The Lord he won't leave you / Nor will he forsake you
quotes.author: Ann Nesby

quotes.quote: Friends come and go like the spring, or snow / You can make plans but you'll never know / Whether the tide is high, whether the high is low
quotes.author: Jacqueline Cummings

quotes.quote: There's not a person I can trust in this world / I've seen friends come and go / And I'm not falling for it anymore / Everything you said / Everything you've done / Did it mean anything?
quotes.author: Alex Koehler

quotes.quote: Good friends they come, good friends they go / It's just a product of this crazy world and how it goes / What doesn't change is that you'll always be there for me / That's why I see you in everything
quotes.author: Damion Anderson

quotes.quote: Many friends come and go, / You know there's a lot of feelings that I've left behind, / And it's a lonely world, I know, / When your friends are hard to find.
quotes.author: Arlo Guthrie

quotes.quote: So called friends come and go / And things just don't add up / Trying to make my way / Through all this illusion and myth / I don't even have no safety net
quotes.author: Van Morrison

quotes.quote: I could stand to lose my faith in / Friends that come and go / Yeah, they'll be there when you need them, / They say that when you don't / I could give up on my heroes / Could let myself down, too / But what would I do / If I lost my faith in you? / My faith in you
quotes.author: Brantley Keith Gilbert

quotes.quote: When friends come and go / This family is stone / You'll always be with me no matter where I go / Wherever we are / Just look to the stars / And know that you're forever shining in my heart
quotes.author: Kylie Minogue

quotes.quote: Nothing lasts, well she knows, try to hang on / When it's gone, you'll be burned / Fashions and friends come and go / Everyone travels that road in their turn
quotes.author: Joy Lynn White

quotes.quote: His friends come and go like the seasons and tide / He can't keep a women they all realize / He loves them, leaves them, takes what he needs / He's loyal to no one, no one at all
quotes.author: Alexander Barr

quotes.quote: Friends come and friends go / As I go round and round in circles / Love someone change your mind / Decide he was a swine / As you go round and round in circles
quotes.author: Gavin Richard Harrison

quotes.quote: Oh Mrs friend of mine / You know there's friends that come and go / I hope that you'll be mine / Cause there's feelings I don't show
quotes.author: James Anderson

quotes.quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing.. not healing, not curing.. that is a friend who cares.
quotes.author: Henri Wilde

quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Laurence J Peter

quotes.quote: Never part without loving words to think of during your absence. It may be that you will not meet again in this life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: The loss of a friend is like that of a limb, time may heal the anguish of the wound, but the loss cannot be repaired.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Farewell, dearest friend, never to see one another any more till at the right hand of Christ.
quotes.author: Donald Cargill

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: Friendship is delicate as a glass, once broken it can be fixed but there will always be cracks.
quotes.author: Waqar Ahmed

quotes.quote: Letting go of toxic people in your life is a big step in loving yourself.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: Sometimes, you have to give up on people. Not because you don’t care but because they don’t.
quotes.author: Jennifer Green

quotes.quote: Without wearing any mask we are conscious of, we have a special face for each friend.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Although friends come and go through our lives, we still need them. Friends are important because they are there for us and then most of the time we are there for them.
quotes.author: Students at Pierce Middle School

quotes.quote: Sadly, they come and go but there will always be that memory of a certain friend we will cherish for a long time.
quotes.author: Students at Pierce Middle School

quotes.quote: Friends are friends forever. If the Lord's the Lord of them, a friend will not say never 'cause the welcome will not end. Although it's hard to let you go, in the Father's hands we know, a lifetime's not too long to live as friends.
quotes.author: Michael W. Smith

quotes.quote: I hope we'll be friends forever, together we'll always be. I don't think you understand just how much you mean to me. And one day when we part our ways, we'll think back to the past and think about how happy we are 'cause our friendship will always last.
quotes.author: Bridget Davis

quotes.quote: Silence makes the real conversations between friends. Not the saying, but the never needing to say that counts.
quotes.author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quotes.quote: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: The friend who can be silent with us in a moment of despair or confusion, who can stay with us in an hour of grief and bereavement, who can tolerate not knowing... not healing, not curing... that is a friend who cares.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: Close friends are truly life's treasures. Sometimes they know us better than we know ourselves. With gentle honesty, they are there to guide and support us, to share our laughter and our tears. Their presence reminds us that we are never really alone.
quotes.author: Vincent Van Gogh

quotes.quote: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.author: Donna Roberts

quotes.quote: A friend is a hand that is always holding yours, no matter how close or far apart you may be. A friend is someone who is always there and will always, always care. A friend is a feeling of forever in the heart.
quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
quotes.author: Len Wein

quotes.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: A friend is a friend forever and a good one will never leave, never.
quotes.author: Laura Marling

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: That was the thing about best friends. Like sisters and mothers, they could piss you off and make you cry and break your heart, but in the end, when the chips were down, they were there, making you laugh even in your darkest hours.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: The friend who holds your hand and says the wrong thing is made of dearer stuff than the one who stays away.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: I don't want to go to heaven. None of my friends are there.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: A friend can tell you things you don't want to tell yourself.
quotes.author: Frances Ward Weller

quotes.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: That was what a best friend did: hold up a mirror and show you your heart.
quotes.author: Kristin Hannah

quotes.quote: Remember, we all stumble, every one of us. That's why it's a comfort to go hand in hand.
quotes.author: Emily Kimbrough

quotes.quote: Friendship by its very nature consists in loving, rather than in being loved.
quotes.author: Henry Clay Trumbull

quotes.quote: Friends are people who know you really well and like you anyway.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: She's always there for me when I need her; She's my best friend; she's just my everything.
quotes.author: Ashley Olsen

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: A friend is the one who comes in when the whole world has gone out.
quotes.author: Grace Pulpit

quotes.quote: Sometimes family don't understand you..But your friends understand you the most.
quotes.author: Sher E Yazdan

quotes.quote: To my mind, the only possible pet is a cow. Cows love you. . . . They will listen to your problems and never ask a thing in return. They will be your friends forever. And when you get tired of them, you can kill and eat them. Perfect.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: If you go out looking for friends, you're going to find they are very scarce. If you go out to be a friend, you'll find them everywhere.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter, and sharing of pleasures. For in the dew of little things, does the heart find its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who will always be there for you, in good and hard times.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: You are my best friend as well as my lover, and I do not know which side of you I enjoy the most. I treasure each side, just as I have treasured our life together.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: I value the friend who for me finds time on his calendar, but I cherish the friend who for me does not consult his calendar.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: When everything is lonely I can be my best friend.
quotes.author: Conor Oberst

quotes.quote: Friendship means understanding not agreement it means forgiveness not forgetting.I means the memories last even if the contact is lost.
quotes.author: Supriya Parulekar

quotes.quote: Friends are family we choose. They are our kindred spirits, met by chance or good fortune and bound to us by a commonality of interests.
quotes.author: Ariel Books

quotes.quote: Friendship makes prosperity more brilliant, and lightens adversity by dividing and sharing it.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: A principal fruit of friendship is the ease and discharge of the fullness and swellings of the heart which passions of all kinds do cause and induce.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: When adversities flow, then love ebbs; but friendship standeth stiffly in storms.
quotes.author: John Lyly

quotes.quote: In friendship, as in love, we are often more happy from the things we are ignorant than those we are acquianted with.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rouchefoucauld

quotes.quote: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.
quotes.author: Sallust

quotes.quote: The worth of friend is priceless. Friendship is a topic that is deserving of our honor and attention.
quotes.author: Karol Ladd

quotes.quote: The power of a possitive friend is about being a positive influence in the lives of other people. It is no a sweet and fluffy celebration of happy relationships. Rather, it is a compelling work designed to insipre and equip each and every one  of us to build deeper and more meaningful friendships.
quotes.author: Terry Ladd

quotes.quote: But whether you are overly busy or lead a relatively simple life, the powerful principles for being a positive friend hold true.They are  foundational and lasting.
quotes.author: Karol Ladd

quotes.quote: A positive friend is someone who encourages us--who sees who we are, notices the things that we for, and says, 'You go, girl.' That encouragement is so critical to our souls that some of us will go to great lengths to get it.
quotes.author: Terry Ladd

quotes.quote: Close friends support each other in stressful times and help each other to look beyond their own needs and become sensitive to others.
quotes.author: Fred Frankel

quotes.quote: So if you feel like you're happier because a certain friend is in your life, well, that's a genuine feeling--backed up by science.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: If you have a friend you can be weird around, then you have everything.
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: I don't think I hould call you a friend-and that's a compliment. I mean,look a at the word 'friend.' It has 'end' inside of it! You're more like a 'friforever.'
quotes.author: Karen Salmansohn

quotes.quote: I can trust my friends.. These people examine myself, encourage me to grow.
quotes.author: C. Warner

quotes.quote: Friends get you through bad times and help you enjoy the good times.
quotes.author: C. Warner

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is by this meeting that a new workd is born.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.quote: What is a friend? A single sould dwelling in two bodie.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: Never leave a friend behind. Friends are all we have to get us through this life-- and they are the only things from this world that we could hope to see in the next.
quotes.author: Dean Koontz

quotes.quote: A friend is more than a therapist or a confessor, even though a friend can sometimes heal us and offer us God's forgiveness. A friend is that other person with whom we can share our solitue, our silence, and our prayer.
quotes.author: Henri J.M. Nouwen

quotes.quote: No matter how far you take it with your friends,whether you're fighting with them or you hate them for two months, you just really need them, because they're the one's who teach you the most about yourself.
quotes.author: Kate Hudson

quotes.quote: A faithful friend is a strong defense; And he that hath found him found a treasure.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: True friends are like diamonds -- bright, beautiful, valuable, and always in style.
quotes.author: Nicole Richie

quotes.quote: When friendships are real, they are not glass threads or frost work, but the solidest things we can know.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Only a true bestfriend can protect you from your immortal enemies.
quotes.author: Richelle Mead

quotes.quote: If you have two friends in your lifetime, you're lucky. If you have a good friend, you're more than lucky.
quotes.author: S. E. Hilton

quotes.quote: A true friend unbossoms freely, address justly, assists readily, adventure boldly, takes all patiently, defends courageously, and continues a friend unchangeably.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Friends forever, friends forever. When good friend stick together, I know we can weather any storm.
quotes.author: Greg Scelsa

quotes.quote: A friend is there through thick and thin, in sunshine and in rain.
quotes.author: Greg Scelsa

quotes.quote: When two friends understand each other totally, the words are soft and strong like an orchind's perfume.
quotes.author: King Tse

quotes.quote: Friends we will forever be, for no storm can send us apart. A force of friendship from above forever binds us. No matter what evil or troubles may come to us, we will be friends forever and all eternity.
quotes.author: Kevin Grommersch

quotes.quote: Friends are the ones who stick with us when everyone else laughs.They are the ones who cheer you up when you are angry and sad. They are the warmth of the fire in the winter, and the cool breeze of the summer.
quotes.author: Kevin Grommersch

quotes.quote: Don’t walk behind me; I may not lead. Don’t walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows the song in your heart and can sing it back to you when you have forgotten the words.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art… It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Good friends are like stars, you don’t always see them, but you know they are there.
quotes.author: Christy Evans

quotes.quote: A friend is one of the nicest things you can have, and one of the best things you can be.
quotes.author: Douglas Pagels

quotes.quote: A true best friend loves you even when it seems like you’ve gone off the deep end.
quotes.author: Liz Fenton

quotes.quote: Best friends can turn a horrible day, into one of the best days of your life.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Richmond

quotes.quote: There are rare people who will show up at the right time, help you through the hard times and stay into your best times… Those are the keepers.
quotes.author: Nausicca Twila

quotes.quote: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend’s success.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: That’s when I realized what a true friend was. Someone who would always love you – the imperfect you, the confused you, the wrong you – because that is what people are supposed to do.
quotes.author: R.J.L.

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The biggest ingredient in a best friend is someone whose actions you respect and who you can truly be yourself around.
quotes.author: Renee Olstead

quotes.quote: It’s not the length of time we knew someone that makes them so special. It’s what they brought into our lives.
quotes.author: Sandra King

quotes.quote: Be slow to fall into friendship, but when you are in, continue firm and constant.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Life isn't about having a thousand friends, it's about finding the very few right ones you need.
quotes.author: A.R. Asher

quotes.quote: The most memorable people in life will be the friends who loved you when you weren't very lovable.
quotes.author: Aidan Chambers

quotes.quote: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.
quotes.author: Anna Taylor

quotes.quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow-ripening fruit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Foley

quotes.quote: One loyal friend is worth ten thousand relatives.
quotes.author: Euripides

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: A good friend is like a four-leaf clover; hard to find and lucky to have.
quotes.author: Irish Proverb

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself — and especially to feel, or not feel. Whatever you happen to be feeling at any moment is fine with them. That's what real love amounts to — letting a person be what he really is.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Friendship is all about trusting each other, helping each other, loving each other and being crazy together.
quotes.author: O. Henry

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who will always love you — the imperfect, the confused, the wrong you — because that is what people are supposed to do.
quotes.author: R. J. L.

quotes.quote: In the cookie of life, friends are chocolate chips.
quotes.author: Salman Rushdie

quotes.quote: Friends are medicine for a wounded heart, and vitamins for a hopeful soul.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli​

quotes.quote: There is nothing like puking with somebody to make you into old friends.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: We need people in our lives with whom we can be as open as possible. To have real conversations with people may seem like such a simple, obvious suggestion, but it involves courage and risk.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: Don't be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Odd how much it hurts when a friend moves away- and leaves behind only silence.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: True love is when you have to watch a friend leave, with the knowledge that you might never see him again. But you know he'll be in your mind and heart forever.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: When you part from your friend, you grieve not. For that which you love in him may be clearer in his absence, as the mountain to the climber is cleaner from the plain.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: The tender friendships one gives up, on parting, leave their bite on the heart, but also a curious feeling of a treasure somewhere buried.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: Excuse me, then! you know my heart;But dearest friends, alas! must part.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: When a friend leaves you, you move on. When a best friend leaves you, part of you is gone.
quotes.author: Misti Hemlock

quotes.quote: Memories last forever, never do they die. Friends stay together, never say goodbye.
quotes.author: Melina Campos

quotes.quote: You and I will meet again, When we're least expecting it, One day in some far off place, I will recognize your face, I won't say goodbye my friend, For you and I will meet again.
quotes.author: Tom Petty

quotes.quote: But fate ordains that dearest friends must part.
quotes.author: Edward Young

quotes.quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends. If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Good-Bye is an easy word to say but try saying it to a friend. If I never knew you, I'd be safe, but half as real, never knowing I could feel.
quotes.author: Pocahontas

quotes.quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Could we see when and where we are to meet again, we would be more tender when we bid our friends goodbye.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: True friends don't say good-bye, they just take extended leaves of absences from each other.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are no good-byes, where ever you'll be, you'll be in my heart.
quotes.author: Ghandi

quotes.quote: When you part from your friend, you grieve not;For that which you love most in him may beclearer in his absence,as the mountain to the climberis clearer from the plain.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Goodbye, my friend, goodbye. My dear, you are in my heart. Predestined separation promises a future meeting.
quotes.author: Sergei Yesenin

quotes.quote: Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
quotes.author: Trey Parker

quotes.quote: Look for the rainbow in every storm, fly like an angel, good-bye my friend. I know you're gone, you said you're gone, but I can still feel you here.
quotes.author: Spice Girls

quotes.quote: True friends cry when you leave. Fake friends leave when you cry.
quotes.author: Unkown

quotes.quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it be lost.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Happy trails to you, until we meet again.
quotes.author: Dale Evans Rogers

quotes.quote: We only part to meet again.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: The reason it hurts so much to separate is because our souls are connected.
quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

quotes.quote: If you’re brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: The loss of a friend is like that of a limb, time may heal the anguish of the wound, but the loss cannot be repaired.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Be well, do good work, and keep in touch.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Wherever you are you will always be in my heart.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: To say goodbye is to die a little.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: Never part without loving words to think of during your absence. It may be that you will not meet again in this life.
quotes.author: Jean Paul Richter

quotes.quote: Only in the agony of parting do we look into the depths of love.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: Love is missing someone whenever you're apart, but somehow feeling warm inside because you're close in heart.
quotes.author: Kai Knudsen

quotes.quote: Farewell! God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Farewell, dearest friend, never to see one another any more till at the right hand of Christ.
quotes.author: Donald Cargill

quotes.quote: Goodbyes are not forever, are not the end, it simply means I’ll miss you until we meet again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Good friends never say goodbye. They simply say see you soon.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The pain of parting is nothing to the joy of meeting again.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: Friendship is the hardest thing in the world to explain. It's not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: Hold a true friend with both your hands.
quotes.author: Nigerian Proverb

quotes.quote: A real friend is one who walks in when the rest of the world walks out.
quotes.author: Walter Winchell

quotes.quote: The wise man learns more from his enemies than the fool does from his friends.
quotes.author: Baltasar Gracian

quotes.quote: Misfortune tests the sincerity of friends.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: The most beautiful discovery true friends make is that they can grow separately without growing apart.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Foley

quotes.quote: Sometimes being a friend means mastering the art of timing. There is a time for silence. A time to let go and allow people to hurl themselves into their own destiny. And a time to prepare to pick up the pieces when it's all over.
quotes.author: Octvaia Butler

quotes.quote: Who is mighty? He who makes an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Hebrew (on friends and foes)

quotes.quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Keep your friendships in repair.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: Friendship is the only cement that will ever hold the world together.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world possibly not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
quotes.author: Anais Nin

quotes.quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing
quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

quotes.quote: Most of us don't need a psychiatric therapist as much as a friend to be silly with.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: To have a few amazing friends on this side of eternity, this sometimes grotesque amusement park, is the greatest joy.
quotes.author: Ann Lamott

quotes.quote: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.author: Arnold Glasgow

quotes.quote: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark, than alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.quote: Friends are God's way of taking care of us.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A true friend is the best Possession.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Friendship increases by visiting friends but visiting seldom.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, your enemies even closer.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: Make a friend when you don't need one.
quotes.author: Jamaican (on friendship)

quotes.quote: No better relation than a prudent and faithful friend.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: One enemy is too many and a hundred friends too few.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Little friends may prove great friends.
quotes.author: Aesop

quotes.quote: Strangers are just friends waiting to happen.
quotes.author: Rod McKuen

quotes.quote: The best mirror is an old friend.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The road to a friend's house is never long.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: The wolf and the dog agree, at the expense of the goat which together they eat.
quotes.author: Basque (on friends and foes)

quotes.quote: When I eat your bread, I sing your song.
quotes.author: German (on friendship)

quotes.quote: You never really know your friends from your enemies until the ice breaks.
quotes.author: Eskimo (on friends and foes)

quotes.quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
quotes.author: Jim Morrison

quotes.quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
quotes.author: Euripedes

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .
quotes.author: CS Lewis

quotes.quote: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Life is an awful, ugly place to not have a best friend.
quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

quotes.quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: Friendship isn't a big thing it's a million little things.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: There are some people in life that make you laugh a little louder, smile a little bigger, and live just a little bit better.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: Good friends help you find important things when you have lost them. Your smile, you hope, and your courage.
quotes.author: Unknown Author

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson Gentry

quotes.quote: Friendship consists in forgetting what one gives and remembering what one receives.
quotes.author: Alexander Dumas

quotes.quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: To find a friend one must close one eye. To keep him—close two.
quotes.author: Norman Douglas

quotes.quote: [Friends are] God’s apology for relations.
quotes.author: Hugh Kingsmill

quotes.quote: It may be more difficult to make new friends as you get older but it is some consolation to know how easy it is to lose them when you are young.
quotes.author: Jeffrey Bernard

quotes.quote: Thank you for being a friend / Traveled down a road and back again / Your heart is true, you're a pal and a confidant.
quotes.author: Andrew Gold

quotes.quote: What would you think if I sang out of tune? / Would you stand up and walk out on me? / Lend me your ears and I'll sing you a song / And I'll try not to sing out of key / Oh, I get by with a little help from my friends.
quotes.author: Paul McCartney and John Lennon

quotes.quote: For good times and bad times / I'll be on your side forever more / That's what friends are for.
quotes.author: Burt Bacharach and Carole Bayer Sager

quotes.quote: Two sturdy oaks I mean, which side by side, / Withstand the winter's storm, / And spite of wind and tide, / Grow up the meadow's pride, / For both are strong / Above they barely touch, but undermined / Down to their deepest source, / Admiring you shall find / Their roots are intertwined / Insep'rably.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: I was angry with my friend: / I told my wrath, my wrath did end. / I was angry with my foe: / I told it not, my wrath did grow.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: It’s not that diamonds are a girl’s best friend, but it’s your best friends who are your diamonds.
quotes.author: Gina Barreca

quotes.quote: There is nothing I would not do for those who are really my friends. I have no notion of loving people by halves, it is not my nature.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: A friend is one who overlooks your broken fence and admires the flowers in the garden.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
quotes.author: Alice Walker

quotes.quote: Growing apart doesn’t change the fact that for a long time we grew side by side; our roots will always be tangled. I’m glad for that.
quotes.author: Ally Condie

quotes.quote: Find a group of people who challenge and inspire you; spend a lot of time with them, and it will change your life.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Some people arrive and make such a beautiful impact on your life, you can barely remember what life was like without them.
quotes.author: Anna Taylor

quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling.
quotes.author: Arthur Brisbane

quotes.quote: For beautiful eyes, look for the good in others; for beautiful lips, speak only words of kindness; and for poise, walk with the knowledge that you are never alone.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
quotes.author: Buddha

quotes.quote: Friends should be like books, few, but hand-selected.
quotes.author: C.J. Langenhoven

quotes.quote: Friendship is like a glass ornament, once it is broken it can rarely be put back together exactly the same way.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
quotes.author: Clifton Fadiman

quotes.quote: What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: A friend knows the song in my heart and sings it to me when my memory fails.
quotes.author: Donna Roberts

quotes.quote: Friends are those rare people who ask how we are and then wait to hear the answer.
quotes.author: Ed Cunningham

quotes.quote: There is one friend in the life of each of us who seems not a separate person, however dear and beloved, but an expansion, an interpretation, of one’s self, the very meaning of one’s soul.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: Many people will walk in and out of your life, but only true friends will leave footprints in your heart.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: True friends don’t judge each other, they judge other people together.
quotes.author: Emilie Saint-Genis

quotes.quote: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: The real test of friendship is can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?
quotes.author: Eugene Kennedy

quotes.quote: A friend can tell you things you don’t want to tell yourself.
quotes.author: Frances Ward Weller

quotes.quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance; they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: There’s not a word yet for old friends who’ve just met.
quotes.author: Jim Henson

quotes.quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: In the sweetness of friendship let there be laughter and sharing of pleasure. For in the dew of little things the heart finds its morning and is refreshed.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: A single rose can be my garden… a single friend, my world.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.quote: A good friend is a connection to life a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: Let us be grateful to the people who make us happy; they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: Friendship improves happiness, and abates misery, by doubling our joys, and dividing our grief.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.quote: In the End, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King

quotes.quote: Friends are the siblings God never gave us.
quotes.author: Mencius

quotes.quote: Never forget that a true friend is someone who understands your past, believes in your future, and accepts you just the way you are.
quotes.author: Noel Jones

quotes.quote: Ultimately the bond of all companionship, whether in marriage or in friendship, is conversation.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Anybody can sympathise with the sufferings of a friend, but it requires a very fine nature to sympathise with a friend’s success.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is a magnet in your heart that will attract true friends. That magnet is unselfishness, thinking of others first; when you learn to live for others, they will live for you.
quotes.author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quotes.quote: A friendship that can end never really began.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: I value the friend who for me finds time on his calendar, but I cherish the friend who for me does not consult his calendar.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: A friend is a gift you give yourself.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: If you have two friends in your lifetime, you’re lucky. If you have one good friend, you’re more than lucky.
quotes.author: S.E. Hinton

quotes.quote: The great thing about new friends is that they bring new energy to your soul.
quotes.author: Shanna Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Life is partly what we make it, and partly what it is made by the friends we choose.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Don’t make friends who are comfortable to be with. Make friends who will force you to lever yourself up.
quotes.author: Thomas J. Watson

quotes.quote: Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: A friend is one that knows you as you are, understands where you have been, accepts what you have become, and still, gently allows you to grow.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: If you live to be 100, I hope I live to be 100 minus 1 day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: Show me a person who doesn't like french fries and we'll swap lies.
quotes.author: Joan Lunden

quotes.quote: Your french fries are just my french fries on the wrong plate.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: French fries kill more people than guns and sharks, yet nobody's afraid of French fries.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close and your fries closer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The French: a people who have used their sophisticated culture and beautiful language to bequeath to the world the sliced potato.
quotes.author: Bauvard

quotes.quote: Even if I'm eating healthy, I let myself indulge with french fries. That's my favorite thing. You only live once!
quotes.author: Kate Marra

quotes.quote: The French fried potato has become an inescapable horror in almost every public eating place in the country. 'French fries,' say the menus, but they are not French fries any longer. They are a furry-textured substance with the taste of plastic wood.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: It occurs to us that so-called 'freedom fries' kill many more Americans than terrorists ever do.
quotes.author: Terry Mosher

quotes.quote: I may look like a potato now, but one day I'll turn into fries and you'll want me then.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Their secret weapon has always been their french fries. I would say that if they do change the oils, I'll bet they did a million taste tests to make sure nothing has changed. But there's always that risk when you're tampering with a product.
quotes.author: Britt Beemer

quotes.quote: When a couch potato is sliced up and then deep fried that is couch French fries.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: The problem is that we let special-occasion food become everyday food. That goes for soda and french fries.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Gossips are like french fries, crispy when hot but uninteresting once stale.
quotes.author: Spiritaja

quotes.quote: French fries are french fries on the menu. But when the order comes, they're not french fries anymore...they're my fries.
quotes.author: Umar

quotes.quote: Once someone told a potato 'you are fat!'Then it became a french fries and said 'now I am slim... but full of fat.'
quotes.author: Nisha

quotes.quote: I am not telling people to stop eating potato chips and french fries, ... But I and all consumers should have the information we need to make informed decisions about the food we eat.
quotes.author: Bill Lockyer

quotes.quote: This is a good step toward reducing artery-clogging fat in french fries, but it doesn't make french fries a health food.
quotes.author: Margo Wootan

quotes.quote: In a lot of ways that poor little potato' – Evan pointed directly at Jade's French fries – 'symbolizes the reckless consumerism that plagues America.
quotes.author: Francine Pascal

quotes.quote: Blood may be thicker than water, but it's certainly not as thick as ketchup. Nor does it go as well with French fries.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: I was ecstatic when they re-named "French fries" as "freedom fries." Grown men and women in positions of power in the U.S. government showing themselves as idiots.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: There are no clear borders, only merging invisible to the sight.
quotes.author: Dejan Stojanovic

quotes.quote: It's nice to find people who live on the fringe, finding one another and she's just unrelentingly funny.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.quote: Being on the fringes of the world is not the best place for someone who intends to re-create it: here again, to go beyond the given, one must be deeply rooted in it. Personal accomplishments are almost impossible in human categories collectively kept in an inferior situation.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: The lunatic fringe in all reform movements.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: What we perceive as the present is the vivid fringe of memory tinged with anticipation.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The fringed curtains of thine eye advance, And say what thou seest yond.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Caprice in women often infringes upon the rules of decency.
quotes.author: Jean De La Bruyere

quotes.quote: You sometimes find something good in the lunatic fringe. In fact, we have got as part of our social and economic government today a whole lot of things which in my boyhood were considered lunatic fringe, and yet they are now part of everyday life.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: When fringe groups gather, there is power in that.
quotes.author: Ben Hopkins

quotes.quote: Writers are the lunatic fringe of publishing.
quotes.author: Judith Rossner

quotes.quote: Almost every disruption starts at the perceived fringes of today's market.
quotes.author: Scott D. Anthony

quotes.quote: Society isn't a simple organism with one nucleus and a fringe of little feet, it's an infinitely complex living structure and if you try to suppress any part of it by that much, and perhaps more, you diminish, you mutilate the whole.
quotes.author: Maureen Duffy

quotes.quote: There's no reason that there has to be a fringe network that illuminates an urban or a multiethnic experience.
quotes.author: Warren Littlefield

quotes.quote: Too great a display of delicacy can and does sometimes infringe upon de-cency.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The luxury of being half-asleep, exploring the fringes of psychosis in safety.
quotes.author: Ian McEwan

quotes.quote: Every reform movement has a lunatic fringe.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Don't fight the patent, fight the infringement.
quotes.author: Drew Curtis

quotes.quote: The lunatic fringe wags the underdog.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: There is apt to be a lunatic fringe among the votaries of any forward movement.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: At the fringe edge of advancement it's a war of anarchy and chaos.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Outrageous behavior, also known as the lunatic fringe, is the seed bed of innovation and creativity.
quotes.author: Joel Salatin

quotes.quote: People who are against hate are not a fringe minority, not even a silent majority, but are a silenced majority, silenced by the corporate media.
quotes.author: Amy Goodman

quotes.quote: Go to the edge of the cliff and jump off. Build your wings on the way down.
quotes.author: Ray Bradbury

quotes.quote: It is the right of every sovereign nation to determine who can and who cannot legally enter within its borders.
quotes.author: Mike Klepper

quotes.quote: Some of the ideas that come from the fringe of the far right are just so implausible that it is hard to take those ideas seriously.
quotes.author: John Conyers

quotes.quote: We all move on the fringes of eternity and are sometimes granted vistas through fabric of illusion.
quotes.author: Ansel Adams

quotes.quote: The way to find what the mainstream will do tomorrow is to associate with the lunatic fringe today.
quotes.author: Jean-Louis Gassee

quotes.quote: The right of the people to keep and bear arms shall not be infringed, and this without any qualification as to their condition or degree, as is the case in the British government.
quotes.author: St. George Tucker

quotes.quote: A wise person does not fear the edges and fringes, but studies them. Indeed, he or she is often in them, working to make change happen.
quotes.author: Laurie Beth Jones

quotes.quote: When you stand outside, you look around and find that the people you're with live on the fringes.
quotes.author: Lori Lansens

quotes.quote: Two conspirators with a frog, following the line of a whiffletree.
quotes.author: Witold Gombrowicz

quotes.quote: A frog in a well cannot conceive of the ocean.
quotes.author: Zhuangzi

quotes.quote: Don't be a fish; be a frog. Swim in the water and jump when you hit ground.
quotes.author: Kim Young-ha

quotes.quote: Frogs have it made, they get to eat what bugs them.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: We are born princes and the civilizing process makes us frogs.
quotes.author: Eric Berne

quotes.quote: Style, is like a frog: you can dissect the thing, but it somehow dies in the process.
quotes.author: Arthur Quinn

quotes.quote: Frog in the mud is happier than the man, because it has no ambition to reach the stars!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: There is no place in a city that can't be better. There is no toad that can't be a princess, no frog that can't become a prince.
quotes.author: Jaime Lerner

quotes.quote: The frog does not run in the daytime for nothing.
quotes.author: Igbo

quotes.quote: If a frog becomes a king, he will make the whole kingdom muddy!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: If you were called to gallop like the horse, never end up hopping like the frog. Rise up for greatness.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I'd rather be ignored as a frog than eaten as a human.
quotes.author: E.D. Baker

quotes.quote: Frog in a little pond can be much happier than fish in a vast ocean!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: Like a frog, the aphorist waits for something to fly by that he can catch with his tongue.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs.
quotes.author: Cameron Diaz

quotes.quote:
If you have to eat two frogs, eat the ugliest one first.
This is another way of saying that if you have two important tasks before you, start with the biggest, hardest, and most important task first.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: It wasn't a kiss that changed the frog, but the fact that a young girl looked beneath warts and slime and believed she saw a prince. So he became one.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: You have to kiss a lot of frogs before you find your prince.
quotes.author: E. L. James

quotes.quote: Kiss a frog with your eyes wide open. If he turns into a prince you won't miss the transformation, but if he doesn't, you won't be fooled by some wishful illusion in your head.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: The frog croaks loud, and maidens dare not pass but fear the noisome toad and shun the grass.
quotes.author: John Clare

quotes.quote: I wish you were a frog you could change with just a kiss to brace you will make me toad I could fill pails with tears.
quotes.author: Deci Hernandez

quotes.quote: Be kind and tender to the Frog and do not call him names.
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: The Frog is justly sensitive to epithets like these. No animal will more repay a treatment kind and fair. At least so lonely people say who keep a frog (and, by the way,they are extremely rare).
quotes.author: Hilaire Belloc

quotes.quote: Bull father frog was on the log. While many a little fellow around the pool. Upon his stool sat learning how to bellow.
quotes.author: John Bannister Tabb

quotes.quote: A huge frog and I, staring at each other, neither of us moves.
quotes.author: Kobayashi Issa

quotes.quote:
An old frog lived in a dismal swamp. In a dismal kind of way.
And all that he did, whatever befell was to croak the livelong day.
Croak, croak, croak. When darkness filled the air and croak, croak, croak, when the skies were bright and fair.
quotes.author: Horatio Alger Jr

quotes.quote: The best thing that the frog could do; was to gleefully skip around; croak discordantly to pollute the mystical ambience around.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote:
The frog by nature is both damp and cold. Her mouth is large, her belly much will hold. She sits somewhat ascending, loves to be
Croaking in gardens, though unpleasantly.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.quote: The frost which kills the harvest of a year saves the harvest of a century, by destroying the weevil or the locust.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Anger is like ice, and also quick to melt.
quotes.author: Maxim Gorky

quotes.quote: As frost to the bud, and blight to the blossom, even such is self-interest to friendship; for confidence cannot dwell where selfishness is porter at the gate.
quotes.author: Martin Farquhar Tupper

quotes.quote: Black frost. The ground is hard, the air tastes bitter. Your stars cluster in evil signs.
quotes.author: Georg Trakl

quotes.quote: It gets cold in the desert at night, particularly up in the mountains; the stars hammer on the rock and strike frost.
quotes.author: Tanith Lee

quotes.quote: The winter's frost must rend the burr of the nut before the fruit is seen. So adversity tempers the human heart, to discover its real worth.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: The desert is cold early in the morning. Laying down on that sand is like laying on a block of ice.
quotes.author: Steven Michael Quezada

quotes.quote: But frost, like the crystallized dreams of autumn, began to coat the clearing with its sugar glaze.
quotes.author: Victoria Steele Logue

quotes.quote: As frost, raised to its utmost intensity, produces the sensation of fire, so any good quality, overwrought and pushed to excess, turns into its own contrary.
quotes.author: William Matthews

quotes.quote: Mirrors are ice which do not melt: what melts are those who admire themselves in them.
quotes.author: Paul Morand

quotes.quote: Ice burns, and it is hard to the warm-skinned to distinguish one sensation, fire, from the other, frost.
quotes.author: A. S. Byatt

quotes.quote: Cold indeed, and labor lost: Then farewell heat, and welcome frost!
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Thus we build on the ice, thus we write on the waves of the sea; the waves roaring pass away, the ice melts, and away goes our palace, like our thoughts.
quotes.author: Johann Gottfried Herder

quotes.quote: The ice was not only broken; it was shivered into a million fragments.
quotes.author: P G Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The thinner the ice, the more anxious is everyone to see whether it will bear.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: First frost meant letting go, so it was always reason to celebrate.
quotes.author: Sarah Addison Allen

quotes.quote: The frost makes a flower, the dew makes a star.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: Like ice beneath the sun's rays to such poverty did he fall...his fortune melted to water.
quotes.author: Ihara Saikaku

quotes.quote: When a man dies, his secrets bond like crystals, like frost on a window. His last breath obscures the glass.
quotes.author: Anne Michaels

quotes.quote: Autumn can be glorious but menacing too - the long shadows, brisk winds, scurrying leaves, impending frost.
quotes.author: A.S.A. Harrison

quotes.quote: Behold the groves that shine with silver frost, their beauty withered, and their verdure lost!
quotes.author: Alexander Pope
