quotes.quote: The elements and majestic forces in nature, Lightning, Wind, Water, Fire, and Frost, were regarded with awe as spiritual powers, but always secondary and intermediate in character.
quotes.author: Charles Alexander Eastman

quotes.quote: I like this day; I like that sky of steel; I like the sternness and stillness of the world under this frost.
quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.quote: The first and last frosts are the worst.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: The evening praises the day, and the morning a frost.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: He that is surprised with the first frost feels it all the winter after.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: All true friendliness begins with fire and food and drink and the recognition of rain or frost.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: God makes the life fertile by disappointments, as he makes the ground fertile by frosts.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: February dawn frost on the path Where I paced all winter.
quotes.author: Jack Kerouac

quotes.quote: It is the life of the crystal, the architect of the flake, the fire of the frost, the soul of the sunbeam. This crisp winter air is full of it.
quotes.author: John Burroughs

quotes.quote: What miracle of weird transforming Is this wild work of frost and light, This glimpse of glory infinite?
quotes.author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quotes.quote: In the days of the frost seek an minor sun.
quotes.author: Loren Eiseley

quotes.quote: The gods and their tranquil abodes appear, which no winds disturb, nor clouds bedew with showers, nor does the white snow, hardened by frost, annoy them; the heaven, always pure, is without clouds, and smiles with pleasant light diffused.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: A good dog never dies. He always stays. He walks besides you on crisp autumn days when frost is on the fields and winter's drawing near. His head is within our hand in his old way.
quotes.author: Mary Carolyn Davies

quotes.quote: I love snow, snow, and all the forms of radiant frost.
quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quotes.quote: When friendships are real, they are not glass threads or frost-work , but the solidest thing we know.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Wine gives a man nothing it only puts in motion what had been locked up in frost.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Wine gives a man nothing. It neither gives him knowledge nor wit; it only animates a man, and enables him to bring out what a dread of the company has repressed. It only puts in motion what had been locked up in frost.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Terror itself, when once grown transcendental, becomes a kind of courage; as frost sufficiently intense, according to the poet Milton, will burn.
quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

quotes.quote: Day after day, throughout the winter, We hardened ourselves to live by bluest reason In a world of wind and frost.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: One must have a mind of winter To regard the frost and the boughs Of the pine-trees crusted with snow
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: It was, as I have said, a fine autumnal day; the sky was clear and serene, and nature wore that rich and golden livery which we always associate with the idea of abundance. The forests had put on their sober brown and yellow, while some trees of the tendered kind had been nipped by the frosts into brilliant dyes of orange, purple, and scarlet.
quotes.author: Washington Irving

quotes.quote: Against love's fire fear`s frost hath dissolution
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Being frugal does not mean being cheap! It means being economical and avoiding waste.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: By sowing frugality we reap liberty, a golden harvest.
quotes.author: Agesilaus

quotes.quote: Without frugality none can be rich, and with it very few would be poor.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Im not a real frugal or thrifty,.. I just don't waste money on little things that don't matter, but spend on big things that do.
quotes.author: Brian O'Reilly

quotes.quote: How simple and frugal a thing is happiness: a glass of wine, a roast chestnut, a wretched little brazier, the sound of the sea. . . . All that is required to feel that here and now is happiness is a simple, frugal heart.
quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quotes.quote: Frugality is one of the most beautiful and joyful words in the English language, and yet one that we are culturally cut off from understanding and enjoying. The consumption society has made us feel that happiness lies in having things, and has failed to teach us the happiness of not having things.
quotes.author: Elise Boulding

quotes.quote: I have three precious things which I hold fast and prize. The first is gentleness; the second is frugality; the third is humility, which keeps me from putting myself before others. Be gentle and you can be bold; be frugal and you can be liberal; avoid putting yourself before others and you can become a leader among men.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The way to wealth is as plain as the way to market. It depends chiefly on two words, industry and frugality: that is, waste neither time nor money, but make the best use of both. Without industry and frugality nothing will do, and with them everything.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Being frugal doesn’t mean slashing your spending or depriving yourself of things that you enjoy. It means knowing the value of a dollar and making every effort to spend it wisely.
quotes.author: Frank Sonnenberg

quotes.quote: Being frugal, conscious of making money, is not a negative thing. That sensibility of creating value and finding value and reinvesting in those customers is what separates great restaurants from the average ones.
quotes.author: Joe Bastianich

quotes.quote: Living a frugal lifestyle gives you the opportunity to invest more money towards your future.
quotes.author: John Rampton

quotes.quote: It is great wealth to a soul to live frugally with a contented mind.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: Deprive yourself on nothing necessary for your comfort, but live in an honorable simplicity and frugality.
quotes.author: John McDonough

quotes.quote: Frugality may be termed the daughter of Prudence, the sister of Temperance, and the parent of Liberty.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Frugal lifestyle can be very rewarding way of life. Not only do you save money, you learn to enjoy life differently, or as Art Buchwald once said –'the best things in life aren’t things'.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If frugality were established in the state, if our expenses were laid out rather in the necessaries than the superfluities of life, there might be fewer wants, and even fewer pleasures, but infinitely more happiness.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The most substantial people are the most frugal, and make the least show, and live at the least expense.
quotes.author: Francis Moore

quotes.quote: Train your son and daughter to an employment, to frugality, to hold the high front and to walk the fearless step of independence.
quotes.author: Timothy Flint

quotes.quote: Frugal living is simple. Live on less than you earn and be happy with what you have! The rewards will fill both your life and your bank account.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Thrift means that you should always have the best you can possibly afford, when the thing has any reference to your physical and mental health, to your growth in efficiency and power.
quotes.author: Orison Swett Marden

quotes.quote: Thrift is not an affair of the pocket, but an affair of character.
quotes.author: S.W. Straus

quotes.quote: We are not to judge thrift solely by the test of saving or spending. If one spends what he should prudently save, that certainly is to be deplored. But if one saves what he should prudently spend, that is not necessarily to be commended. A wise balance between the two is the desired end.
quotes.author: Owen Young

quotes.quote: Saving is an essential part of planning a prosperous future. Save also part of frugality and avoid waste.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Frugality is enjoying the virtue of getting good value for every minute of your life energy and from everything you have the use of.
quotes.author: Vicki Robin

quotes.quote: Frugal living is about making the most of your limited resources. People who are frugal understand the importance of sticking to a budget, spending their money wisely, and avoiding an attitude of materialism.
quotes.author: Amy Hoover

quotes.quote: Think of frugality as a game. Maintaining a frugal lifestyle will be difficult if you're stuck in the mindset that saving money is something you must do because you're poor. If you consider thriftiness a game and learn to view comparison shopping and coupon clipping as ways to stretch your creative thinking skills, however, the task will be much more enjoyable.
quotes.author: Amy Hoover

quotes.quote: I’m frugal. I’ve always been this way. When I was young, my mom would give me my allowance, and I’d peel off a little each week and have some to spare.
quotes.author: Tyra Banks

quotes.quote: I think frugality drives innovation, just like other constraints do.One of the only ways to get out of a tight box is to invent your way out.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Wealth can only be accumulated by the earnings of industry and the savings of frugality.
quotes.author: John Tyler

quotes.quote: A cardinal principle of the gospel is to prepare for the day of scarcity. Work, industry, frugality are part of the royal order of life.
quotes.author: Keith B McMullin

quotes.quote: Frugality is good if liberality be joined with it. The first is leaving off superfluous expenses; the last is bestowing them to the benefit of others that need. The first without the last begets covetousness; the last without the first begets prodigality.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Because of deep love, one is courageous. Because of frugality, one is generous. Because of not daring to be ahead of the world, one becomes the leader of the world.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: Even Socrates, who lived a very frugal and simple life, loved to go to the market. When his students asked about this, he replied, I love to go and see all the things I am happy without.
quotes.author: Jack Kornfield

quotes.quote: I have come to realize that truly rich people are rich not because they are frugal or they chose to be frugal, but because they are so grateful, contented and full of self-worth that they don't have to prove anything to anyone with material possessions. This way, they appear frugal.
quotes.author: Jan Mckingley Hilado

quotes.quote: I'm known for value for money. I was brought up to be frugal, and it's definitely a factor in my success. I was born in the Fifties, which was a frugal era, and my family had to be very careful with money out of necessity.
quotes.author: John Caudwell

quotes.quote: And a workman, even of the lowest and poorest order, if he is frugal and industrious, may enjoy a greater share of the necessaries and conveniences of life than it is possible for any savage to acquire.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: I have always had a reputation for being frugal - less kind people might call me cheap. But my interest in building up a nest egg goes back to those days in Arnhem when I learned that money can grow, just like trees.
quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

quotes.quote: Were a man to order his life by the rules of true reason, a frugal substance joined to a contented mind is for him great riches; for never is there any lack of a little.
quotes.author: Lucretius

quotes.quote: The principle of diligence and frugality should be observed in everything. This principle of economy is one of the basic principles of socialist economics.
quotes.author: Mao Tse Tung

quotes.quote: It just makes us have to be a little more frugal. Obviously something has to suffer somewhere.
quotes.author: Robert Blackburn

quotes.quote: No one can reap the fruit before planting the trees.
quotes.author: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

quotes.quote: You forget that the fruits belong to all and that the land belongs to no one.
quotes.author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quotes.quote: And the fruits will outdo what the flowers have promised.
quotes.author: François de Malherbe

quotes.quote: While forbidden fruit is said to taste sweeter, it usually spoils faster.
quotes.author: Abigail Van Buren

quotes.quote: Fine fruit is the flower of commodities. It is the most perfect union of the useful and the beautiful that the earth knows. Trees full of soft foliage; blossoms fresh with spring bounty; and, finally, fruit, rich, bloom-dusted, melting, and luscious.
quotes.author: Andrew Jackson Downing

quotes.quote: A fruit is a vegetable with looks and money. Plus, if you let fruit rot, it turns into wine, something brussel sprouts never do.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Taste every fruit of every tree in the garden at least once. It is an insult to creation not to experience it fully. Temperance is wickedness.
quotes.author: Stephen Fry

quotes.quote: Most fruits, if left alone on a tree, eventually do ripen, especially if they're not being yelled at.
quotes.author: Firoozeh Dumas

quotes.quote: The fruit tasted foreign but indigenous, like sunlight a tree had changed through patience.
quotes.author: Pat Conroy

quotes.quote: A basket of ripe fruit is holier than any prayer book.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Forbidden fruit tastes sweet, but its aftertaste is bitter.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest.
quotes.author: Deepika Padukone

quotes.quote: Where there is no fruit, there may be no root.
quotes.author: Sam Storms

quotes.quote: The fruit derived from labor is the sweetest of pleasures.
quotes.author: Luc De Clapiers

quotes.quote: Fruits that blossom first will first be ripe.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Fruit forced is never half so sweet / As that comes quite in season.
quotes.author: Caroline Anne Southey

quotes.quote: Why should be fruit be held inferior to the flower?
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The fruit does not make the tree good or bad but the tree itself is what determines the nature of the fruit. In the same way, a person first must be good or bad before doing a good or bad work.
quotes.author: Martin Luther

quotes.quote: The weakest kind of fruit drops earliest to the ground.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: All fruit grows through abiding, not striving.
quotes.author: Bill Johnson

quotes.quote: No fruit on earth can rival the cemetery's crop
quotes.author: Jose Marti

quotes.quote: If there is a fruit that can be eaten raw, it is beauty.
quotes.author: Alphonse Karr

quotes.quote: There is no fruit which is not bitter before it is ripe.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A tree is known by its fruit a man by his deeds.
quotes.author: Fe-en-Dios

quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing a tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Albert J. Schütz

quotes.quote: Fruit… it’s just God showing off… Look at all the colors I know!.
quotes.author: Dylan Moran

quotes.quote: A tomato may be a fruit, but it is a singular fruit. A savory fruit. A fruit that has ambitions far beyond the ambitions of other fruits.
quotes.author: E. Lockhart

quotes.quote: Every time you eat a fruit for the first time that year you need to make a wish.
quotes.author: André Aciman

quotes.quote: Life without Love is like a tree without blossom and fruit.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Most fruits and vegetables are consumed as a raw commodity, although for centuries humans have transformed these perishable products into more stable, delicious and safer dishes.
quotes.author: Wiley Blackwell

quotes.quote: Balance, peace, and joy are the fruit of a successful life.
quotes.author: Thomas Kinkade

quotes.quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
quotes.author: Mother Theresa

quotes.quote: Good thoughts bear good fruit.
quotes.author: Tim Sanders

quotes.quote: Plant the trees just for beauty, If flowers bloom or fruits ripen, Enjoy it as a gift and appreciate nature as a universal giver.
quotes.author: Debasish Mridha

quotes.quote: Trees are not known by their leaves, nor even by their blossoms, but by their fruits.
quotes.author: Andrea Alban Gosline

quotes.quote: Judge a tree from its fruit, not from its leaves.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Anytime the perfume of orange and lemon groves wafts in the window; the human body has to feel suffused with a languorous well-being.
quotes.author: Frances Mayes

quotes.quote: Some people think that as soon as you plant a tree, it must bear fruit. We must allow it to grow a bit.
quotes.author: Tunku Abdul Rahman

quotes.quote: If you tell me that you desire a fig, I answer you that there must be time. Let it first blossom, then bear fruit, then ripen.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: When god created the earth he created fruit, vegetables, nuts, seeds and herbs to nourish us and to heal us.
quotes.author: Maria Benardis

quotes.quote: As he who wishes the best fruit must pay attention to the land, so must the greatest attention be paid to the soul it fit is to produce fruits worthy of its nature.
quotes.author: Pythagoras

quotes.quote: When one consumes a diet high in fruit and vegetables and occasionally eats deep fried food it is unlikely to have a negative effect on the body.
quotes.author: Maria Benardis

quotes.quote: In ancient Greek mythology, the pomegranate was also known as the 'fruit of the dead'.
quotes.author: Maria Benardis

quotes.quote: Forget perfect on the first try. In the face of frustration, your best tool is a few deep breaths, and remembering that you can do anything once you've practiced two hundred times. Seriously.
quotes.author: Andrea Buchanan

quotes.quote: Frustration is the compost from which the mushrooms of creativity grow.
quotes.author: Tumerica

quotes.quote: Frustration is commonly the difference between what you would like to be and what you are willing to sacrifice to become what you would like to be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: Our frustration is greater when we have much and want more than when we have nothing and want some. We are less dissatisfied when we lack many things than when we seem to lack but one thing.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: No matter how discouraged we get, God has not asked us to do the impossible.
quotes.author: George Grace

quotes.quote: I have had just about all I can take of myself.
quotes.author: S. N. Behrman

quotes.quote: You throw the sand against the wind; And the wind blows it back again.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: When you are angry or frustrated, what comes out? Whatever it is, it's a good indication of what you're made of.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

quotes.quote: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion . . . . I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning up to do afterward.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Frustration is the wet nurse of violence.
quotes.author: David Abrahansen

quotes.quote: Buddha's doctrine: Man suffers because of his craving to possess and keep forever things which are essentially impermanent... this frustration of the desire to possess is the immediate cause of suffering.
quotes.author: Alan Watts

quotes.quote: It's a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: All successful people learn that success is buried on the other side of frustration.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Frustration is the first step toward improvement...It's only when I face frustration and use it to fuel my dedicationthat I feel myself moving forward.
quotes.author: John Bingham

quotes.quote: Is there no way out of the mind.
quotes.author: Sylvia Plath

quotes.quote: At one point he decided enough was enough.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: But better die than live mechanically a life that is a repetition of repetitions.
quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.quote: Every thought derives from a thwarted sensation.
quotes.author: E. M. Cioran

quotes.quote: It is the awareness of unfulfilled desires which gives a nation the feeling that it has a mission and a destiny.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: The torment of human frustration, whatever its immediate cause, is the knowledge that the self is in prison, its vital force and ''mangled mind'' leaking away in lonely, wasteful self-conflict.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Drew

quotes.quote: People need trouble -- a little frustration to sharpen the spirit on, toughen it.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: All that is necessary to break the spell of inertia and frustration is to -- act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.author: Dorothea Brande

quotes.quote: Frustration is an indication of lack of faith and trust in the Lord.
quotes.author: Psalm 119:165

quotes.quote: Frustration is a very positive sign. It means that the solution to your problem is within range, but what you're currently doing isn't working, and you need to change your approach in order to achieve your goal.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Motivation without mobilization means only frustration
quotes.author: Nido Qubein

quotes.quote: Expectation is the mother of all frustration
quotes.author: Antonio Banderas

quotes.quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success
quotes.author: Bo Bennett

quotes.quote: Fear of failure is what fuels me, keeps me on edge and sharp. I'm not as good when I'm comfortable.
quotes.author: Alex Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Now I see that I will never find the light unless, like the candle, I am my own fuel, consuming myself.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: Are you gonna fuel your faith or fuel your fear? I'm all about fueling my faith, especially when it's hard to do so.
quotes.author: Carrie-Anne Moss

quotes.quote: Passion towards a dream is the fuel that fires every trace of impossibility in the environment, paving way for you to win with style.
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: While spirituality provides an efficient and endless fuel for your mind and body, you must burn that fuel with human action towards your goals, dreams, and desires.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Determination is the fuel that propels one to higher virtues.
quotes.author: Aaidh ibn Abdullah al-Qarni

quotes.quote: Empathy fuels connection; sympathy drives disconnection.
quotes.author: Brené Brown

quotes.quote: Their doubt is your fuel for dreams. You just have to drive.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The fuel of ambition is not the problem; it is the focus of ambition that frees or betrays us.
quotes.author: Erwin McManus

quotes.quote: Hope fuels your inspirations while doubts assault your aspirations!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: I am building a fire, and everyday I train, I add more fuel. At just the right moment, I light the match.
quotes.author: Mia Hamm

quotes.quote: The only thing that counts is your dedication to the game. You run on your own fuel; it comes from within you.
quotes.author: Paul Brown

quotes.quote: Fuel your kids' dreams. Sometimes, that means letting them stay up past their bedtimes.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
quotes.author: Steve Maraboli

quotes.quote: Her anger was the fuel she used to keep going.
quotes.author: Stewart O'Nan

quotes.quote: Encouragement is the fuel on which hope runs.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Stand back! I gotta get some rocket fuel out of the fridge!
quotes.author: Adam Savage

quotes.quote: TEAMWORK: the fuel that allows common people attain uncommon results.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: Giving is what fuels us. Giving is our future.
quotes.author: Blake Mycoskie

quotes.quote: Throughout my career, I fed off the fuel of people not being able to understand me.
quotes.author: Eminem

quotes.quote: People acting in their own self-interest is the fuel for all the discovery, innovation, and prosperity that powers the world.
quotes.author: John Stossel

quotes.quote: I think loss can fuel how you lead your whole life.
quotes.author: Martin Short

quotes.quote: Suffering is the fuel in the engine of civilization.
quotes.author: Matthew Woodring Stover

quotes.quote: If you continue to work hard, let that be the fuel to your fire.
quotes.author: Pitbull

quotes.quote: Hope is fuel for living; without it, we'll stop here.
quotes.author: TemitOpe Ibrahim

quotes.quote: Contentment consists not in adding more fuel, but in taking away some fire.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: My fuel for my fire is to be able to provide for my family.
quotes.author: Tony Ferguson

quotes.quote: Reading has been the fuel of my motivation: it has changed the direction in which I have traveled, and it has enhanced my creative imagination more than any other activity I have ever pursued.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: The past not merely is not fugitive, it remains present.
quotes.author: Marcel Proust

quotes.quote: How fugitive and brief is mortal life between the budding and the falling leaf.
quotes.author: Thomas Bailey Aldrich

quotes.quote: Happiness is fugitive; dissatisfaction and boredom are real.
quotes.author: Jack Vance

quotes.quote: There is no reality on this earth except religion and the power of love; all the rest is even more fugitive than life itself.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: There is in most passions a shrinking away from ourselves. The passionate pursuer has all the earmarks of a fugitive.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.quote: Not even for an hour can you bear to be alone, nor can you advantageously apply your leisure time, but you endeavor, a fugitive and wanderer, to escape from yourself, now vainly seeking to banish remorse by wine, and now by sleep; but the gloomy companion presses on you, and pursues you as you fly.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: Hell is of this world and there are men who are unhappy escapees from hell, escapees destined ETERNALLY to reenact their escape.
quotes.author: Antonin Artaud

quotes.quote: The ideal beauty is a fugitive which is never found.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Let us enjoy the fugitive hour. Man has no harbor, time has no shore; it rushes on, and carries us with it.
quotes.author: Alphonse De Lamartine

quotes.quote: Unmarried men are best friends, best masters, best servants, but not always best subjects; for they are light to run away, and almost all fugitives are of that condition.
quotes.author: Francis Bacon

quotes.quote: We are all in a race for dear life: that is to say, we are fugitives from death.
quotes.author: Theodor Reik

quotes.quote: Passing beauties are only the fugitive reflections of the eternal.
quotes.author: Eliphas Levi

quotes.quote: Time was the arch fugitive, always on the run.
quotes.author: Mahasweta Devi

quotes.quote: Anytime there is an escapee, we consider that escapee to be dangerous. The adrenaline is flowing. He wants to get away.
quotes.author: Larry Todd

quotes.quote: The fugitive, brief, though intense satisfactions that come to the nerves through the appetite and passions are not the foundations of joy in this world: they come with a moment's flash, and are disastrous in their flight.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: In youth alone, unhappy mortals live; But, ah! the mighty bliss is fugitive: Discolour'd sickness, anxious labour, come, And age, and death's inexorable doom.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: In a world of fugitives, the person taking the opposite direction will appear to run away.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: What fugitive from his country can also escape from himself.
quotes.author: Horace

quotes.quote: One must always be prepared to switch sides with justice, that fugitive of the winning camp.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.quote: Thought is fugitive; the mind does not repeat itself; if you do not catch the whisperings of the oracle as they come to you, they are lost forever. You must-and this is absolutely essential-convince yourselves that what is offered you this very moment will never be offered again.
quotes.author: Jean Guitton

quotes.quote: Modernity signifies the transitory, the fugitive, the contingent, the half of art of which the other half is the eternal and the immutable.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: I cannot praise a fugitive and cloistered virtue, unexercised and unbreathed, that never sallies out and sees her adversary, but slinks out of the race where that immortal garland is to be run for, not without dust and heat.
quotes.author: John Milton

quotes.quote: People who travel are always fugitives.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: I am supposing, or perhaps only hoping, that our future may be found in the past's fugitive moments of compassion rather than in its solid centuries of warfare.
quotes.author: Howard Zinn

quotes.quote: Poetry is one of the most fugitive arts: it can be assigned to memory, taken and hidden in the mind, smuggled into smoky cabin back rooms, recited there and then conveyed only by speech to another person. It is therefore the most likely to survive colonization.
quotes.author: Eavan Boland

quotes.quote: Memory, with its fugitive adjustments, is the merciful veil to the grim enactments of the first law. It hides the anguish in the human heart which is always craving for perpetuity.
quotes.author: Stacy Aumonier

quotes.quote: We also have a tendency to root for the fugitive. We're always on the side of the animal being chased.
quotes.author: Norman Jewison

quotes.quote: Just as light brightens darkness, discovering inner fulfillment can eliminate any disorder or discomfort. This is truly the key to creating balance and harmony in everything you do.
quotes.author: Deepak Chopra

quotes.quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Fulfillment in life is loving a good woman and killing a bad man.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.quote: The sense of fulfillment is often hidden in acts of kindness.
quotes.author: Todd Stocker

quotes.quote: True fulfillment in life doesnt come from what we get, it comes from what we give.
quotes.author: Marie Forleo

quotes.quote: The essence of greatness is the ability to choose personal fulfillment in circumstances where others choose madness.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: The more intensely we feel about an idea or a goal, the more assuredly the idea, buried deep in our subconscious, will direct us along the path to its fulfillment.
quotes.author: Earl Nightingale

quotes.quote: Success without fulfillment is failure.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quotes.quote: Our fulfillment is not in our isolated human grandeur, but in our intimacy with the larger earth community, for this is also the larger dimension of our being.
quotes.author: Thomas Berry

quotes.quote: n understanding of the natural world and what's in it is a source of not only a great curiosity but great fulfillment.
quotes.author: David Attenborough

quotes.quote: Let not your mind run on what you lack as much as on what you have already.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: Happiness is the real sense of fulfillment that comes from hard work.
quotes.author: Joseph Barbara

quotes.quote: Real fulfillment, for the man who allows absolutely free rein to his desires, and who much dominate everything, lies in hatred.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Be winged arrows aiming at fulfillment and goal.
quotes.author: Paul Klee

quotes.quote: Fulfillment has nothing to do with circumstances.
quotes.author: Gangaji

quotes.quote: The only thing that will stop you from fulfilling your dreams is you.
quotes.author: Tom Bradley

quotes.quote: Happiness and personal fulfillment are the natural consequences of doing the right thing.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: Discontent is the source of all trouble, but also of all progress, in individuals and nations.
quotes.author: Berthold Auerbach

quotes.quote: Fulfillment leaves an empty space where longing used to be.
quotes.author: Laurie Colwin

quotes.quote: A man may fulfill the object of his existence by asking a question he cannot answer, and attempting a task he cannot achieve.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: he fulfillment of every desire only reveals its inadequacy.
quotes.author: Swami Prabhavananda

quotes.quote: And in the end it's not the years in your life that count. It's the life in your years.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: Being what we truly are is the only way to feel good about ourselves.
quotes.author: Lise Bourbeau

quotes.quote: If you look to others for fulfillment, you will never be truly fulfilled.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.quote: Only those who have learned the power of sincere and selfless contribution experience life's deepest joy: true fulfillment.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: Without fear, women can pursue professional success and personal fulfillment-and freely choose one, or the other, or both.
quotes.author: Sheryl Sandberg

quotes.quote: Desire increases when fulfillment is postponed.
quotes.author: Pierre Corneille

quotes.quote: To seek fulfillment is to invite frustration.
quotes.author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quotes.quote: You have everything you need for complete peace and total happiness right now.
quotes.author: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.quote: It widens the rift between mind and heart; the heart does not know how to think in terms of self-fulfillment; the heart. is made for love.
quotes.author: Peter Smith

quotes.quote: When there's fulfillment when there's beauty, when we see God as he truly is—an endless reservoir of fascination— boredom becomes impossible.
quotes.author: Randy Alcorn

quotes.quote: The Lord is near all who call out to Him, all who call out to Him with integrity. He fulfills the desires of those who fear him; He hears their cry for help and saves them.
quotes.author: Psalm 145:18-19

quotes.quote: Hearts that are not surrendered to God can seldom be trusted. Until we surrender our hopes and dreams to Christ, we really have very little way of knowing what would fulfill us.
quotes.author: Beth Moore

quotes.quote: As you think so, shall you become.
quotes.author: Khemetic Wisdom

quotes.quote: Death neither alarms nor frightens one who has had a long career of fruitful toil. The knowledge that my work has been helpful to many fills me with joy and great satisfaction.
quotes.author: Mary Mcleod Bethune

quotes.quote: Your own need to shine out of any dream or creation you can imagine.
quotes.author: James Earl Jones

quotes.quote: Most of us did not learn when we were young that our capacity to be self-loving would be shaped by the work we do and whether that work enhances our well-being.
quotes.author: Bell Hooks

quotes.quote: To create life is to create a life out of what the world has given you. Self-construction is a creative response to circumstances.
quotes.author: K. Anthony Appiah

quotes.quote: Occasionally in life, there are those moments of unutterable fulfillment which cannot be completely explained by those symbols called words. Their meanings can only be articulated by the inaudible language of the heart.
quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quotes.quote: Terrorist violence stems from a more complex set of interrelated factors: psychological needs fulfillment is inseparable from socio-political needs fulfillment.`
quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

quotes.quote: At a low level of needs fulfillment, people with low self-esteem might easily be convinced to participate in terrorist activities to get approval from a certain group.
quotes.author: Frederick Hacker

quotes.quote: Fulfill that which comes to you.
quotes.author: C.G. Jung

quotes.quote: One can discover fulfillment in Nature / like a light tower in the dense mist of life / keep playing in God’s playground / listen to the sounds of day and night.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: The joy in life is his who has the heart to demand it.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Do not look for happiness outside yourself. The awakened seek happiness inside.
quotes.author: Peter Deunov

quotes.quote: You are fully and magnificently equipped to stand up and change the world around you. And to simply sit down and tolerate the world around you is to squander who you are in the process of never being who you are.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Look around and see whom you can serve. This will fill you.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Plant the seed of desire in your mind and it forms a nucleus with the power to attract to itself everything needed for its fulfillment.
quotes.author: Robert Collier

quotes.quote: People want riches; they need fulfillment.
quotes.author: Robert Conklin

quotes.quote: Fulfillment is often more trouble than it is worth.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Jobs are what gives people a sense of fulfillment and self-reliance.
quotes.author: Bob McDonnell

quotes.quote: True success, true happiness lie in freedom and fulfillment.
quotes.author: Dada Vaswani

quotes.quote: The art of fulfillment is the ability to experience not only the thrill of the chase but also the magic of the moment the unbridled joy of feeling truly alive.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.quote: True happiness is a state of fulfillment.
quotes.author: Ashish Sophat

quotes.quote: Happiness is a state of inner fulfillment.
quotes.author: Matthieu Ricard

quotes.quote: A life directed chiefly toward the fulfillment of personal desires will sooner or later always lead to bitter disappointment.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Success based on anything but internal fulfillment is bound to be empty.
quotes.author: Dr. Martha Friedman

quotes.quote: In all of living, have much fun and laughter. Life is to be enjoyed, not just endured.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: Live and work but do not forget to play, to have fun in life and really enjoy it.
quotes.author: Eileen Caddy

quotes.quote: When fun gets deep enough, it can heal the world.
quotes.author: the Oaqui

quotes.quote: Youth expects fun in the getting, age reflects on the fun of having given
quotes.author: Milton Murray

quotes.quote: There is no pleasure in having nothing to do; the fun is having lots to do and not doing it.
quotes.author: Mary Wilson Little

quotes.quote: It's more fun when you're not the only one having it.
quotes.author: the Oaqui

quotes.quote: If you're not having fun - I don't care what you're doing -don't do it.Move on.Find something else, life's too short.
quotes.author: Jerry Doyle

quotes.quote: The further you get away from yourself, the more challenging it is. Not to be in your comfort zone is great fun.
quotes.author: Benedict Cumberbatch

quotes.quote: I am going to keep having fun every day I have left, because there is no other way of life. You just have to decide whether you are a Tigger or an Eeyore.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Make a commitment to having fun. See your best friends and make time for your hobbies and passions.
quotes.author: Robert Holden

quotes.quote: Sometimes, the simple things are more fun and meaningful than all the banquets in the world
quotes.author: E.A. Bucchianeri

quotes.quote: Having fun with our creativity makes us a better artist and a better person.
quotes.author: Gwen Fox

quotes.quote: It's fun to get together and have something good to eat at least once a day. That's what human life is all about — enjoying things.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: You gotta have fun. Regardless of how you look at it, we're playing a game. It's a business, it's our job, but I don't think you can do well unless you're having fun.
quotes.author: Derek Jeter

quotes.quote: He who does not get fun and enjoyment out of every day...needs to reorganize his life.
quotes.author: George Matthew Adams

quotes.quote: Rules should always be bent, if not broken. It's the only way to have any fun.
quotes.author: Alyson Noel

quotes.quote: If you're not having fun, it's your own fault.
quotes.author: Rich DiGirolamo

quotes.quote: If you never did you should. These things are fun, and fun is good.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Even though you're growing up, you should never stop having fun.
quotes.author: Nina Dobrev

quotes.quote: There's no fear when you're having fun.
quotes.author: Will Thomas

quotes.quote: Nothing is fun until you're good at it.
quotes.author: Amy Chua

quotes.quote: It's kind of fun to do the impossible.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.quote: If you're not having fun it's not worth doing.
quotes.author: Tommy Bolin

quotes.quote: I think that success is having fun.
quotes.author: Bruno Mars

quotes.quote: If I quit having fun, then it's time for me to quit working.
quotes.author: Charlaine Harris

quotes.quote: Never, ever underestimate the importance of having fun.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: You must learn to enjoy life and have fun doing what you love.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: People rarely succeed unless they have fun in what they are doing.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: If you obey all the rules, you miss all the fun.
quotes.author: Katharine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Life is more fun if you play games.
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: If it's not fun, you're not doing it right.
quotes.author: Bob Basso

quotes.quote: All the fun's in how you say a thing.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: I think I'll work all my life.When you're having fun, why stop having fun?
quotes.author: Helen Thomas

quotes.quote: As long as I'm having fun, I'm not quitting.
quotes.author: Sue Johanson

quotes.quote: You must have discipline to have fun.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: I try to learn from the past, but I always plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun really is.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Having fun is a choice. There is enough fun for each of us. Choosing to have fun depends on you only.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you want to succeed in anything you do, you have to find some fun in it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No one looks stupid when they're having fun.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Winning is only half of it. Having fun is the other half.
quotes.author: Bum Phillips

quotes.quote: The purpose of fun is to live it.
quotes.author: Bernie DeKoven

quotes.quote: I only do this because I'm having fun.The day I stop having fun, I'll just walk away.
quotes.author: Heath Ledger

quotes.quote: I don't know how to not have fun. I'm dying and I'm having fun, and I'm going to keep having fun every day I've got left.
quotes.author: Randy Pausch

quotes.quote: Old guys can still do fun things.
quotes.author: George H. W. Bush

quotes.quote: I've taken my fun where I've found it.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: Fun is where it's at. That's why you have to be there.
quotes.author: Bernie DeKoven

quotes.quote: It is impossible to live pleasurably without living wisely, well, and justly, and impossible to live wisely, well and justly without living pleasurably.
quotes.author: Epicurus

quotes.quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one has to do.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: He who binds to himself a job /Does the winged life destroy / But he who kisses the joy as it flies / Lives in eternity's sunrise.
quotes.author: William Blake

quotes.quote: By happy alchemy of mind, they turn to pleasure all they find.
quotes.author: Matthew Green

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy life is to delight in duty. When duty becomes delight, then burdens become blessings.
quotes.author: Warren Wiersbe

quotes.quote: If a man insisted always in being serious, and never allowed himself a bit of fun and relaxation, he would go mad or become unstable without knowing it.
quotes.author: Herodotus

quotes.quote: Boys throw stones at frogs for fun. but the frogs don't die for 'fun', but in sober earnest.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: We are so made, that we can only derive intense enjoyment from a contrast and only very little from a state of things.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: People of the same trade seldom meet together, even for the merriment and diversion, but the conversaton ends in a conspiracy against the public, or in some contrivance to raise prices.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: Can you imagine opening a bottle of champaigne with a bottle opener? I can't. It would eliminate half the fun.
quotes.author: Alain De Vogue

quotes.quote: You are quite right if you mean that giving up fun for no reason except that you think it's 'good' to give it up, is all nonsense
quotes.author: Jerry Root

quotes.quote: It is good fun, but it is certainly not good sense; we laugh, and disbelieve.
quotes.author: Jerry Root

quotes.quote: Frame your mind to mirth and merriment, which bars a thousand harms and lengthens life.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I wanna thank you for your love so true / Your tender lovin' keeps my mind on you / I'll pick you up and we'll go out and dance / You kiss my lips and we'll have fun, fun, fun.
quotes.author: Michael Cooper

quotes.quote: When the clouds in the cosmos wanted to have some fun; they clashed playfully against each other; fomenting heavenly droplets of liquid to tumble down in rhapsodic frenzy.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I was drunk and it was fun, / At least I think, for it did not return; / To keep save in my memory, / The last 16 hours lived by me.
quotes.author: Leslie Alexis

quotes.quote: I’m just having fun, but no doubt someone will take this serious / I’m about to take you on a lyrical experience / I’m having fun with words, like when a baby first starts reading books.
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Work can be fun, and men can enjoy it; then it's not labour. / Let's have it so! Let's make a revolution for fun!
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: If you make a revolution, make it for fun, / don't make it in ghastly seriousness, / don't do it in deadly earnest, / do it for fun.
quotes.author: David Herbert Lawrence

quotes.quote: I've taken my fun where I've found it, / An' now I must pay for my fun, / For the more you 'ave known o' the others / The less will you settle to one.
quotes.author: Rudyard Kipling

quotes.quote: We’re so busy watching out for what’s just ahead of us that we don’t take time to enjoy where we are.
quotes.author: Bill Waterson

quotes.quote: Do anything, but let it produce joy.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: The life you have left is a gift. Cherish it. Enjoy it now, to the fullest. Do what matters, now.
quotes.author: Leo Babauta

quotes.quote: Everyone wants to live on top of the mountain, but all the happiness and growth occurs while you’re climbing it.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: Children are the most desirable opponents at scrabble as they are both easy to beat and fun to cheat.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: Searching is half the fun: life is much more manageable when thought of as a scavenger hunt as opposed to a surprise party.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffet

quotes.quote: Sometimes, it's better to bunk a class and enjoy with friends, because now, when I look back, marks never make me laugh, but memories do.
quotes.author: A.P.J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: When you combine boring with fear, you have fun.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: About the only time losing is more fun than winning is when you're fighting temptation.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: Man consists of two parts, his mind and his body, only the body has more fun.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Wealth is not to feed our egos but to feed the hungry and to help people help themselves.
quotes.author: Andrew Carnegie

quotes.quote: We should never forget that no fundraising effort ever succeeds unless one person asks another person for money.
quotes.author: Andrew D. Parker Jr.

quotes.quote: The greatest good you can do for another is not just to share your riches but to reveal to him his own.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: If you need to raise funds from donors, you need to study them, respect them, and build everything you do around them.
quotes.author: Jeff Brooks

quotes.quote: The most important thing is not to let fundraising get you down. Startups live or die on morale. If you let the difficulty of raising money destroy your morale, it will become a self-fulfilling prophecy.
quotes.author: Paul Graham

quotes.quote: You give but little when you give of your possessions.It is when you give of yourself that you truly give.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Only great souls know the grandeur there is in charity.
quotes.author: Jacques Bossuet

quotes.quote: To give away money is an easy matter and in any man's power. But to decide to whom to give it and how large and when, and for what purpose and how, is neither in every man's power nor an easy matter.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: It is one of the most beautiful compensations of life that no person can sincerely try to help another without helping themselves.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Fundraising requires both optimism and realism. Without the first, few if any gift solicitation efforts would be made. Without the second, few if any would succeed.
quotes.author: Howard L. Jones

quotes.quote: Think of giving not as a duty but as a privilege.
quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

quotes.quote: The willingness to share does not make one charitable; it makes one free.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: The price of anything is the amount of life you exchange for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Let your heart feel for the afflictions and distresses of every one, and let your hand give in proportion to your purse; remembering always the estimation of the widow's mite, but, that it is not every one who asketh that deserveth charity; all, however, are worthy of the inquiry, or the deserving may suffer.
quotes.author: George Washington

quotes.quote: It's not just about being able to write a check. It's being able to touch somebody's life.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Every good act is charity. A man's true wealth hereafter is the good that he does in this world to his fellows.
quotes.author: Moliere

quotes.quote: He who wished to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Fundraisers should use pride, not apology, when asking for a gift for a charity that is doing good work.
quotes.author: Henry Rosso

quotes.quote: The value of a man resides in what he gives and not in what he is capable of receiving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Fundraising opportunities will continue to exist throughout the next century. Those opportunities will equal or exceed all current experience or presently held future expectations.
quotes.author: Edgar D. Powell

quotes.quote: Fundraising is not really about money. It's about people.
quotes.author: Larry C. Johnson

quotes.quote: Fundraising is proclaiming what we believe in such a way that we offer other people an opportunity to participate with us in our vision and mission.
quotes.author: Henri

quotes.quote: The charity that is a trifle to us can be precious to others.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Anne Frank

quotes.quote: when we give cheerfully and accept gratefully, everyone is blessed.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: In necessary things, unity; in doubtful things, liberty; in all things, charity.
quotes.author: Anne Baxter

quotes.quote: Charity never humiliated him who profited from it, nor ever bound him by the chains of gratitude, since it was not to him but to God that the gift was made.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: There is so much wretchedness in the world, that we may safely take the word of any mortal professing to need our assistance; and, even should we be deceived, still the good to ourselves resulting from a kind act is worth more than the trifle by which we purchase it.
quotes.author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quotes.quote: Helping people doesn't have to be an unsound financial strategy.
quotes.author: Melinda Gates

quotes.quote: No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
quotes.author: Calvin Coolidge

quotes.quote: Complete possession is proved only by giving. All you are unable to give possesses you.
quotes.author: Andre Gide

quotes.quote: We don't have enough money in our budget to buy everything we need.
quotes.author: Randy Gravon

quotes.quote: A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directs, and the roots spring up and make new trees. The greatest work that kindness does to others is that it makes them kind to themselves.
quotes.author: Lawrence G. Lovasik

quotes.quote: Giving is not just about making a donation. It is about making a difference.
quotes.author: Kathy Calvin

quotes.quote: Giving is the master key to success, in all applications of human life.
quotes.author: Bryant McGill

quotes.quote: Fundraising is the gentle art of teaching the joy of giving.
quotes.author: Hank Rosso

quotes.quote: The small charity that comes from the heart is better than the great charity that comes from the head.
quotes.author: Ivan Panin

quotes.quote: Wherever there is a human being, there is an opportunity for kindness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Charity and personal force are the only investments worth anything.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Donors don't give to institutions. They invest in ideas and people in whom they believe.
quotes.author: G.T. Smith

quotes.quote: In good times and bad, we know that people give because you meet needs, not because you have needs.
quotes.author: Kay Sprinkel Grace

quotes.quote: The wise man does not lay up his own treasures. The more he gives to others, the more he has for his own.
quotes.author: Lao Tzu

quotes.quote: The secret to fundraising comes down to three magic words: before, more, and strategic.
quotes.author: Jay Samit

quotes.quote: While earning your daily bread, be sure you share a slice with those less fortunate.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate.
quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

quotes.quote: Down in their hearts, wise men know this truth: the only way to help yourself is to help others.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Never take more out of life, than you intend to give back.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hensel

quotes.quote: Life is never so busy that there is no time to serve.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Let no one pay me honor with tears, nor celebrate my funeral rites with weeping.
quotes.author: Ennius

quotes.quote: If any of you cry at my funeral, I'll never speak to you again!
quotes.author: Stan Laurel

quotes.quote: Funerals are the rituals we create to help us face the reality of death, to give us a way of expressing our response to that reality with other persons, and to protect us from the full impact of the meaning of death for ourselves. Some funerals fulfill these functions beautifully. Others fail.
quotes.author: Alla Bozarth Campbell

quotes.quote: If we have been pleased with life, we should not be displeased with death, since it comes from the hand of the same master.
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: We know you'd be with us today if heaven wasn't so far away.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Say not in grief: "He is no more", but live in thankfulness that he was.
quotes.author: Hebrew Proverb

quotes.quote: Let no one weep for me or celebrate my funeral with mourning, for I still live as I pass to and fro through the mouths of men.
quotes.author: Quintus Ennius

quotes.quote: For death is no more than a turning of us over from time to eternity.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: Funerals aren't for the dead. They're for the living.
quotes.author: Gavin Extence

quotes.quote: I can't think of a more wonderful thanksgiving for the life I have had than that everyone should be jolly at my funeral.
quotes.author: Lord Mountbatten

quotes.quote: Some people never head a procession until they're dead.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Funerals are pretty compared to death. Funerals are quiet, but deaths not always.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: A funeral is no place for secrets.
quotes.author: Mitch Albom

quotes.quote: A funeral is a pageant whereby we attest our respect for the dead by enriching the undertaker.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: The only reason I might go to the funeral is to make absolutely sure that he's dead.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A funeral eulogy is a belated plea for the defense delivered after the evidence is all in.
quotes.author: Irvin S. Cobb

quotes.quote: If tears could build a stairway and memories a lane, I'd walk right up to heaven and bring you home again.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It is not length of life, but depth of life.
quotes.author: Emerson Ralph Waldo

quotes.quote: Funerals seem less about comforting the souls of these dearly departed than about comforting the people they leave behind.
quotes.author: Rin Chupeco

quotes.quote: When we lose someoe we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote:
When you are born, you cry, and the world rejoices.
When you die, you rejoice, and the world cries.
quotes.author: Buddhist Saying

quotes.quote: While we are mourning the loss of our friend, others are rejoicing to meet him behind the veil.
quotes.author: J Taylor

quotes.quote: The song is ended, but the melody lingers on...
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: In the city a funeral is just an interruption of traffic; in the country it is a form of entertainment.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: The bitterest tears shed over graves are for words left unsaid and deeds left undone.
quotes.author: Harriet Beecher Stowe

quotes.quote: Nowadays, the only occassions that seem to bring families together are weddings and funerals.
quotes.author: Julia Mcnamara

quotes.quote: Visit me before I die. We can enjoy one another's company. A funeral is a rather one-sided affair.
quotes.author: Ralph Webster

quotes.quote: And a funeral, I found out, is like a wedding in reverse, with less time to plan.
quotes.author: J. Lincoln Fenn

quotes.quote: It's better to be last in the traffic lane than first in the funeral procession.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
quotes.author: Norman Cousins

quotes.quote: Even the best of friends cannot attend each other's funeral.
quotes.author: Kehlog Albran

quotes.quote: A man is not completely born until he is dead.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: After a funeral, a feast .
quotes.author: W. G. Benham

quotes.quote: Some people don't attend funeral not because they don't want to but they are not emotionally strong to see anybody GO.
quotes.author: Neeraj Bhanot

quotes.quote: All men are born truthful, and die liars.
quotes.author: Vauvenargues

quotes.quote: Life starts with a bottle and ends with a bier.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: For many people, life begins almost the same way it ends; creation and cremation.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: To be born healthy is an accident; to die healthy also takes an accident.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: The three most important events of human life have nothing to do with intelligence; birth, marriage and death.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There are millions of people in the world but most of them just drift along, afraid of death and even more afraid of life.
quotes.author: Indira Gandhi

quotes.quote: I refused to attend his funeral. But I wrote a very nice letter explaining that I approved of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Who wants flowers when you're dead? Nobody.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: There are worse things in life than death. Have you ever spent an evening with an insurance salesman?
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Why is it that we rejoice at birth and grieve at a funeral? It is because we are not the person involved.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: In this world nothing is certain but death and taxes.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: On the plus side, death is one of the few things that can be done as easily lying down.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: The only way you can become a legend is in your coffin.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: They say such nice things about people at funerals that it makes me sad to realize that I'm going to miss mine by just a few days.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: Death is nature's way of telling you to slow down.
quotes.author: Ulysses Press

quotes.quote: Any man who says he is not afraid of death is a liar.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I do not approve of mourning; I approve only of remembering.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: Death is like the rumble of distant thunder at a picnic.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Everything passes, everything wears out. everything breaks.
quotes.author: French Proverb

quotes.quote: When you cease to make a contribution, you begin to die.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Death is no more than passing from on e room into another. But there's difference for me, you know. Because in that other room I shall be able to see.
quotes.author: Hellen Keller

quotes.quote: Let no one weep for me, or celebrate my funeral with mourning; for I still live, as I pass to and from through the mouths of men.
quotes.author: Quintus Ennius

quotes.quote: Death is a very dull, dreary affair, and my advice to you is to have nothing whatsoever to do with it.
quotes.author: W.Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death.
quotes.author: Annie Lennox

quotes.quote: Since the day of my birth, my death began its walk. It is walking toward me, without hurrying.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Death most resembles a prophet who is without honor in his own land or a poet who is a stranger among his people.
quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

quotes.quote: Death is the only teacher you will learn something from.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: Death of emotions is only scary because you are afraid of the light.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: Facing death when you are alive get's you use to the fact.
quotes.author: Joseph Demakis

quotes.quote: The lesson of the Funk Dog: “You can forget what it used to feel like to feel good about life; feeling rotten—or just a low-grad funk—seems normal and therefore acceptable. I just don’t believe that God intended for any of his creatures to be petted with sticks.
quotes.author: Jill Conner Browne

quotes.quote:
We all get in a funk sometimes.
It doesn't mean you're failing, or ungrateful, or stupid, or lost.
It means you're human.
quotes.author: Scott Stabile

quotes.quote: The Funk happens. For all of us. We can’t be happy all the time. We don’t need to be.
quotes.author: Scott Stabile

quotes.quote: Don't kill the game with your 'funk', elevate it with your humility.
quotes.author: T.F. Hodge

quotes.quote: I like the New York style of funk, the California style of funk, but the South I never felt like - and Atlanta particularly - got the credit for taking their lessons and progressing on it.
quotes.author: Killer Mike

quotes.quote: When I was younger, I was listening to a lot of Armenian music, you know, revolutionary music about freedom and protest. In the 70s I was listening to soul and the Bee Gees and ABBA, and funk.
quotes.author: Serj Tankian

quotes.quote: My plays are for the kind of black people who relate to funk music, to Parliament-Funkadelic. When those guys get out of a spaceship - the idea that black people are from outer space, there's a poetic truth to that. We are this vast people.
quotes.author: Suzan-Lori Parks

quotes.quote: There's a lot of people over time who have brought out all these funky records that everybody has started jumping on like a catch phrase... When Planet Rock came out, then you had all of the electro funk records.
quotes.author: Afrika Bambaataa

quotes.quote: All music is dance music. But when people think of dance music, they think of techno or just house. Anything you can dance to is dance music. I don't care if it's classical, funk, salsa, reggae, calypso; it's all dance music.
quotes.author: Afrika Bambaataa

quotes.quote: I'm the renegade of funk. I've made house, techno, rock, funk, reggae... That's why I've been on so many different labels.
quotes.author: Afrika Bambaataa

quotes.quote: Dancin' and singin' and movin' to the groovin / And just when it hit me somebody turned around and shouted / Play that funky music white boy / Play that funky music right
quotes.author: Robert W. Parissi

quotes.quote: Yeah, there was a funky singer / Playin' in a rock and roll band / And never had no problems yeah / Burnin' down one night stands
quotes.author: Robert W. Parissi

quotes.quote: I got a funky, funky style with a funky swag / I bought the funky, funky Nikes, got the hat to match
quotes.author: Thomas Allen

quotes.quote: I could ride forever in my old funky rolls / Just give me a bad hat and some old funky clothes / We don't care if folks are laughing / When we're on the road
quotes.author: Ronald Miller

quotes.quote: I could ride forever in my old funky rolls / She ain't even paid for but she's mine I suppose
quotes.author: Ronald Miller

quotes.quote: Funky crime funky crime / Don't you know funk's colors blind / Well I've committed a funky crime / Against a state of mind
quotes.author: MIchael Peter Balzary

quotes.quote: So I will play the game like it should be played / Drop the funk into the mix so the place will never fade / Ship it the the stations in your jurisdiction
quotes.author: Leon Sylvers III

quotes.quote: Shaking themselves they did a dance / before my eyes as Lucy was snoring / All eight of them turned on music from chests / a strange form of haunting and funky sounds / moving in sync within their limited bounds.
quotes.author: Sonia Walker

quotes.quote: Get a hold of your funky store everybody come on the floor / get on the beat & scream / everybody clap your hands now don't let anybody tell you that you can't make it
quotes.author: Mario William Vitale

quotes.quote: Funk is a many spledored thing. Funk is a nasty vibe, and a sweet sexy feeling; Funk is funkiness, a natural release of the essence within.
quotes.author: Rickey Vincent

quotes.quote: Funk is a high, but it is also down at the bottom, the low-down earthy essence, the bass elements.
quotes.author: Rickey Vincent

quotes.quote: Someone 'funky-looking' is generally thought of as someone colorful and amusing, yet unkempt, undisciplined, somewhere between exotic and ridiculous.
quotes.author: Rickey Vincent

quotes.quote: Funkiness in a person's behavior or attitudes can mean anything from an ego trip, to a protest, to escapism. Funkiness is much more than a style, it is a means to a style.
quotes.author: Rickey Vincent

quotes.quote: Funk(y)' also signifies honest expression and integrity, because the artistic and/or material products that accrue from such exertion reflect a high level of commitment to one's work.
quotes.author: T. Bolden

quotes.quote: Effusive and amorphous, the funk impulse is a central component of all black music-from antebellum ring shouts and gospels to blues, jazz, funk, and hip-hop.
quotes.author: T. Bolden

quotes.quote: Funk, a fusion of jazz, rhythm and blues, and rock, was a popular trend in African American music during in the late 1970s. The roots of this genre, however, run wide and deep.
quotes.author: T. Bolden

quotes.quote: The oldest meaning of 'funk,' one that I didn't know until I started looking it up, is spark. (It seems to be related to 'punk,' a connection that opens even more seventies pathways.)
quotes.author: Thomas Hine

quotes.quote: Funk speaks then of panic and stink, but also of ebullience and improvisation.
quotes.author: Thomas Hine

quotes.quote: One kind of funk is a panic or depression; the seventies had plenty of panic, and economically, the years of the Great Funk were the worst since the Great Depression of the 1930s.
quotes.author: Thomas Hine

quotes.quote: An even older meaning of 'funk,' stretching back four centuries, is that it's an unpleasant smell, redolent of old cheese and crevices of the body.
quotes.author: Thomas Hine

quotes.quote: Funk is the unending cycle of life. It's the ultimate concept wherever your imagination will take it.
quotes.author: Xenobia Bailey

quotes.quote: Funk never dies. It is eternal. It just smells a little different from time to time.
quotes.author: Questlove

quotes.quote: Funk is fun. And it's also a state of mind. But it's all the ramifications of that state of mind. Once you've done the best you can, funk it!
quotes.author: George Clinton

quotes.quote: If you fake the funk, your nose will grow.
quotes.author: Bootsy Collins

quotes.quote: Funk is the absence of any and everything you can think of, but the very essence of all that is. And saying that, I'm saying funk is anything that we create in our minds that we want to do, what we want to be, but we don't have the resources.
quotes.author: Bootsy Collins

quotes.quote: When you talking about funk music you just talking about a collage of a lot of different types of music. They used strings, they had brass, they had vocalist.
quotes.author: Killer Mike

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares about you, try missing a couple of payments.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: That is the best-to laugh with someone because you think the same things are funny.
quotes.author: Gloria Vanderbilt

quotes.quote: Expecting the world to treat you fairly because you are a good person is a little like expecting the bull not to attack you because you are a vegetarian.
quotes.author: Dennis Wholey

quotes.quote: Doing nothing is hard, you never know when you're done.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Comedy is simply a funny way of being serious.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: If you die in an elevator, be sure to push the Up button.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: If you're going to do something tonight that you'll be sorry for tomorrow morning, sleep late.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: When life gives you lemons, squirt someone in the eye.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: Why do they call it "rush hour" when nothing moves?
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: Weather forecast for tonight: dark.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Everything is funny, as long as it's happening to somebody else.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: From there to here, and here to there, funny things are everywhere.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Men cannot live by bread alone; he must have peanut butter.
quotes.author: James A. Garfield

quotes.quote: Everything is changing. People are taking the comedians seriously and the politicians as a joke.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Thinking is one thing no one has ever been able to tax.
quotes.author: Charles Kettering

quotes.quote: The best ideas come as jokes. Make your thinking as funny as possible.
quotes.author: David Ogilvy

quotes.quote: Accept who you are. Unless you're a serial killer.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: As you get older three thing happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can't remember the other two.
quotes.author: Norman Wisdom

quotes.quote: Never go to bed mad. Stay up and fight
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Never trust people who smile constantly. They're either selling something or not very bright.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Light travels faster than sound. This is why some people appear bright until you hear them speak.
quotes.author: Alan Dundles

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Never miss a good chance to shut up.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Never trust people who smile constantly. They're either selling something or not very bright.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: Puns are the highest form of literature.
quotes.author: Alfred Hitchcock

quotes.quote: Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away.
quotes.author: Paul Terry

quotes.quote: The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Life is short, smile while you still have teeth.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: The heart of animals is the foundation of their life, the sovereign of everything within them, the sun of their microcosm, that upon which all growth depends, from which all power proceeds.
quotes.author: William Harvey

quotes.quote: The dogs were really keening now, like Irish widows.
quotes.author: Thomas Keneally

quotes.quote: The household cat is really a tiger that has underwent three counselling programs.
quotes.author: Valeriu Butulescu

quotes.quote: Properly trained, a man can be dog's best friend.
quotes.author: Corey Ford

quotes.quote: In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: The fate of animals is of far greater importance to me than the fear of appearing ridiculous.
quotes.author: Emile Zola

quotes.quote: Did you ever walk into a room and forget why you walked in? I think that is how dogs spend their lives.
quotes.author: Sue Murphy

quotes.quote: Never stand between a dog and the fire hydrant.
quotes.author: John Peer

quotes.quote: Always remember, a cat looks down on man, a dog looks up to man, but a pig will look man right in the eye and see his equal.
quotes.author: Sir Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Dogs are better than human beings because they know but do not tell.
quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

quotes.quote: The best thing about animals is that they don't talk much.
quotes.author: Thornton Wilder

quotes.quote: No matter how much cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: There is something about the outside of a horse that is good for the inside of a man.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Some people talk to animals. Not many listen though. That's the problem.
quotes.author: A. A. Milne

quotes.quote: Anybody who doesn't know what soap tastes like never washed a dog.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: There is no psychiatrist in the world like a puppy licking your face.
quotes.author: Ben Williams

quotes.quote: Never break a promise to an animal. They're like babiesâ€”they won't understand.
quotes.author: Tamora Pierce

quotes.quote: If you think dogs can't count, try putting three dog biscuits in your pocket and then giving Fido only two of them.
quotes.author: Phil Pastoret

quotes.quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.
quotes.author: Tim Burton

quotes.quote: Dogs come when they're called; cats take a message and get back to you later.
quotes.author: Mary Bly

quotes.quote: From the dog's point of view, his master is an elongated and abnormally cunning dog.
quotes.author: Mabel Louise Robinson

quotes.quote: A cat is a puzzle for which there is no solution.
quotes.author: Hazel Nicholson

quotes.quote: The other day when I was walking through the woods, I saw a rabbit standing in front of a candle making shadows of people on a tree.
quotes.author: Steven Alexander Wright

quotes.quote: Animals are such agreeable friends -- they ask no questions, they pass no criticisms.
quotes.author: George Eliot

quotes.quote: God loved the birds and invented trees. Man loved the birds and invented cages.
quotes.author: Jacques Deval

quotes.quote: The cow is of the bovine ilk: One end is moo, the other, milk.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: I wonder if other dogs think poodles are members of a weird religious cult.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: If a dog jumps in your lap, it is because he is fond of you; but if a cat does the same thing, it is because you lap is warmer.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead
