quotes.quote: Our task must be to free ourselves by widening our circle of compassion to embrace all living creatures and the whole of nature and its beauty.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: A person who has never owned a dog has missed a wonderful part of life.
quotes.author: Bob Barker

quotes.quote: The love for all living creatures is the most noble attribute of man.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: Dogs and philosophers do the greatest good and get the fewest rewards.
quotes.author: Diogenes

quotes.quote: No man can fully understand the meaning of love unless he’s owned by a dog.
quotes.author: Gene Hill

quotes.quote: We can judge the heart of a man by his treatment of animals.
quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

quotes.quote: A dog has one aim in life, to bestow his heart.
quotes.author: J. R. Ackerley

quotes.quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

quotes.quote: If you pick up a starving dog and make him prosperous he will not bite you. This is the principal difference between a dog and man.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.
quotes.author: Martin Buber

quotes.quote: Dogs are not our whole life, but they make our lives whole.
quotes.author: Roger Caras

quotes.quote: If a dog will not come to you after having looked you in the face, you should go home and examine your conscience.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution... but who wants to live in an institution?
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: My advice to you is get married: if you find a good wife you'll be happy; if not, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: When you see a married couple walking down the street, the one that's a few steps ahead is the one that's mad.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Marriage is a relationship in which one person is always right and the other is the husband!
quotes.author: Prady

quotes.quote: Husband is the head of the family and wife is the neck that turns the head around!
quotes.author: Payal

quotes.quote: We always hold hands. If I let go, she shops.
quotes.author: Nabil

quotes.quote: You know… There is a name for people who are always wrong about everything all the time… Husband!
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Marriage is when a man looses his bachelors degree and woman gets her masters degree.
quotes.author: Ramakochhar

quotes.quote: Strong marriages are built on loving things people do in the present, not on the memories of the things they did in the past.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Focus on continually changing and growing in order to make sure you are someone your spouse would still choose today.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Successful couples don't escape difficult times; they change and adapt, forging a stronger relationship.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Being in love isn't enough. Staying in love happens when you and your spouse work out how to embrace change, solve problems, and treat each other when the going gets tough.
quotes.author: Dr. Steven Craig

quotes.quote: Behind every successful man is a surprised woman
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: By all means marry; if you get a good wife, you'll be happy. If you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Marriage is the perfection of what love aimed at, ignorant of what it sought.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote:
Congratulations!
Cheer's to another year of suffering and misery.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a walk in the park... Jurrasic Park.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Looking back through the years, I must have been so in love with you, Imagine, I stick with you for years. Congratulation to me.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I didn't find out what happiness means until I got married... and then it was too late.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No part of her life should be outside of her relationship to her husband and outside of subordination to him.
quotes.author: Edward D. Andrews

quotes.quote: This subordination of wife to husband has a practical aspect in that it creates a greater effectiveness in their working together as one.
quotes.author: Edward D. Andrews

quotes.quote: Married couple should have an understanding of their spouse suffering from inherent sin, imperfection, and human weakness, so as to make allowances for falling short. Just how bad is it?
quotes.author: Edward D. Andrews

quotes.quote: Every husband must love his wife as himself and every wife must respect her husband.
quotes.author: Joanne Cleave

quotes.quote: The husband should fulfill his marital duty to his wife, and likewise the wife to her husband.
quotes.author: Joanne Cleave

quotes.quote: A woman is bound to her husband as long as he lives.
quotes.author: Joanne Cleave

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a 'perfect marriage' or a 'perfect spouse'. Come on, get real! Marriage is a flawed institution. if you but into that theory.
quotes.author: Shobha Dé

quotes.quote: I believe what a husband needs from wife is not a woman who just keeps trying harder to figure out marriage. Instead, a husband needs a woman who loves God, abides Christ, and follows Him all the days of her life.
quotes.author: Ashley Davis Bush

quotes.quote: The key to a great marriage is the quality of the habits you share together. Healthy, positive habits create and extraordinarily happy marriage.
quotes.author: Ashley Davis Bush

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold a marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: Happy marriages begin when we marry the ones we love, and they blossom when we love the ones we marry.
quotes.author: Tom Mullen

quotes.quote: It is not lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: What counts in making a happy marriage is not so much how compatible you are, but how you deal with incompatibility.
quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: There is nothing nobler or more admirable than when two people who see eye to eye, keep house as man and wife, confounding their enemies and delighting their friends.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin; they just can't face each other, but still they stay together.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: I had some words with my wife, and she had some paragraphs with me.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
quotes.author: Alec Baldwin

quotes.quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: If husband and wife wake up with a commitment to worship and serve, they will be delighted in their marriage.
quotes.author: Ryan Frederick

quotes.quote: As husband and wife, to have a happy life together, you must have confidence and respect, you must have substantial agreement in you faith.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Too many husbands and wives enter into marriage with the idea that their spouse exists for one purpose: to make them happy.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a reform school..Instead of you reforming (your spouse), (he or she) will instead influenced you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: When a husband and wife are concerned only about their own individual desires, the stage is set for conflict.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The perfect marriage is a uniting of three persons--a man and a woman and God. That is what makes marriage holy.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: I promise to love you and do my best for you / I need you to help me to find my strength / Walk with me all through my life / My lover my husband my wife / Share this journey with me / Write this story with me
quotes.author: Elvin Ross

quotes.quote: I can see you / On your wedding day / With the one you love / To share the way / A life ahead of you / Youth left behind / Go out and make yourself / Some memories
quotes.author: Elvin Ross

quotes.quote: You may find comfort in your husband or your wife / When your mother is gone.
quotes.author: Traditional

quotes.quote: You shall not commit adultery. / Do be pure in heart and mind. / Love your husband or wife, keep your heart clean.
quotes.author: Dana Dirksen

quotes.quote: Bless this day / Pinnacle of life / Husband joined to wife / The heart leaps up to behold / This golden day
quotes.author: Stephen Sondheim

quotes.quote: We stood at the altar, repeating our vows for life / For better or worse, forever a husband and wife / Love's not always easy and dreams don't all come true / Why'd you lose your faith in me, I never gave up on you
quotes.author: Toby Keith

quotes.quote: A man and a woman are meant for each other / Are meant for each other as husband and wife / From this moment forward, I promise to love thee/ I promise to love thee the rest of my life
quotes.author: Harvey Schmidt

quotes.quote: Knew the time was right, to be husband and wife / Us both dressed alike in the purest white / Such a beautiful gown, friends and family around / ignore the cold feet now, time to take these vows
quotes.author: Sean Garret

quotes.quote: I didn't say your marriage didn't have a chance. The way that sounds. I- Alright, look. There are certain things that a man says to his wife when he's just trying to, I don't know, fill the silence!
quotes.author: Phil Rosenthal

quotes.quote: You don't know anything about married life. Only married people understand.
quotes.author: Kôgo Noda

quotes.quote: You can not expect married life to be all daisies, you know.
quotes.author: John Harrison

quotes.quote: Wow. You'll get to enjoy the most magical part of married life: the beginning.
quotes.author: James L. Brooks

quotes.quote: Mom, is this what married life is all about? Years of laundry and cooking and aggravation and then you die?
quotes.author: Brenda Hampton

quotes.quote: Married life is like dandruff - it falls heavily upon your shoulders - you get a lot of free advice about it - but up to date nothing has been found to cure it.
quotes.author: Sam Taylor

quotes.quote: Well, all married people quarrel in public; because, it's one of the nice things about being married!
quotes.author: P.J. Wolfson

quotes.quote: Father asked us what was God's noblest work, Anna said men, but I said babies. Men are often bad but babies never are.
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: I don't dislike babies, though I think very young ones rather disgusting.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: Being pregnant is an occupational hazard of being a wife.
quotes.author: Queen Victoria

quotes.quote: A child will fall asleep in the car five minutes before you reach your destination.
quotes.author: Murphy

quotes.quote: When you need to carry a child, he or she will want to walk. When you want them to walk they will want to be carried.
quotes.author: Murphy

quotes.quote: I knew I was an unwanted baby when I saw that my bath toys were a toaster and a radio.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: Children are great observers of life. They say many funny, strange, surprising things about everything and with an honesty that can give pause to their wisdom.
quotes.author: Martin Nadergaard Andersen

quotes.quote: Very new things and very old things are much alike. Everything is a circle. Both ends meet. There is nothing much older or more wrinkled-looking than a baby just born.
quotes.author: Monica Shannon

quotes.quote: I have no time to grow old...I am too busy for that. It is very idle to grow old.
quotes.author: George Macdonald

quotes.quote: I can't decide if I want a baby. My friends are like, 'Oh, you'll learn this great stuff, like how to survive on two hours' sleep.' If I want to learn that I'll just become a political prisoner.
quotes.author: Cathryn Michon

quotes.quote: I can't have children because I have white couches.
quotes.author: Carrie Snow

quotes.quote: Giving birth is little more than a set of muscular contractions granting passage of a child. Then the mother is born.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I wonder why they say you have a baby. The baby has you.
quotes.author: Gallagher

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like having an eight-pound to-do list. Every moment of the day is filled with something to feed, wipe, bathe, or put down.
quotes.author: Kathleen Laccinole

quotes.quote: I used to be excellent. Now that I have a baby and I couldn't tell you what day it is.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: I've got two wonderful children— and two out of five ain't bad.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: We went all out with new things for our first child and the second one had nothing but hand-me-downs. The bronzed baby shoes almost killed him.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: If this baby's half as bad as our least bad one, we're still ruined.
quotes.author: Hal (Malcolm in the Middle)

quotes.quote: Children: You spend the first two years of their life teaching them how to walk and talk. The next sixteen? Spent telling them to sit down and shut up.
quotes.author: Manhardeep Singh

quotes.quote: Some babies are sweet and pink as peaches; / others are wrinkled, and scream like herons; / dispositions not optional / all sales final.
quotes.author: Barbara Crooker

quotes.quote: A baby's cry is precisely as serious as it sounds.
quotes.author: Jean Liedloff

quotes.quote: A baby is a blank check made payable to the human race.
quotes.author: Barbara Christine Seifert

quotes.quote: Every baby born into the world is a finer one than the last.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.quote: A baby is an inestimable blessing and bother.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Having my baby fall asleep in my arms takes away all of my worries and stresses. A sense of complete and total peace comes over me.
quotes.author: Maria Jose Ovalle

quotes.quote: When your first baby drops her pacifier, you sterilize it. When your second baby drops her pacifier, you tell the dog: 'Fetch!'.
quotes.author: Bruce Lansky

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like suddenly getting the world's worst roommate.
quotes.author: Anne Lamott

quotes.quote: Having a baby is like taking your lower lip and forcing it over your head.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.quote: Babies are always more trouble than you thought and more wonderful.
quotes.author: Charles Osgood

quotes.quote: Having a baby is one of the most wonderful things in your life, as well as the hardest thing in your life.
quotes.author: Nuno Bettencourt

quotes.quote: A baby is a wishing well. Everyone puts their hopes, their fears, their pasts, their two cents in.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Bard

quotes.quote: The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.
quotes.author: Johnny Depp

quotes.quote: Our offense is like the Pythagorean Theorem. There is no answer.
quotes.author: Shaquille O'Neal

quotes.quote: There are really only two plays: Romeo and Juliet, and put the darn ball in the basket.
quotes.author: Abe Lemmons

quotes.quote: The only difference between a good shot and a bad shot is if it goes in or not.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: This is basketball, not figure skating. You don't get extra points for degree of difficulty.
quotes.author: Bob Hurley

quotes.quote: Basketball is like photography, if you don't focus, all you have is the negative.
quotes.author: Dan Frisby

quotes.quote: A tough day at the office is even tougher when your office contains spectator seating.
quotes.author: Nik Posa

quotes.quote: What is so fascinating about sitting around watching a bunch of pituitary cases stuff a ball through a hoop?
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Basketball, a game which won't be fit for people until they set the basket umbilicus-high and return the giraffes to the zoo.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: If you meet the Buddha in the lane, feed him the ball.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Shooting is just like toenails. They may fall off occasionally, but you know they'll always come back.
quotes.author: Charles Johnson

quotes.quote: I'm not against taking shots, but I am against taking bad shots.
quotes.author: Hank Iba

quotes.quote: You don't play against opponents, you play against the game of basketball.
quotes.author: Bobby Knight

quotes.quote: "The invention of basketball was not an accident.It was developed to meet a need. Those boys simply would not play â€œDrop the Handkerchief.
quotes.author: James Naismith

quotes.quote: This [basketball] is the second most exciting indoor sport, and the other one shouldn't have spectators.
quotes.author: Dick Vertleib

quotes.quote: If you make every game a life and death proposition, you're going to have problems. For one thing, you'll be dead a lot.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: Basketball is not an equal opportunity game. If you can't shoot it well, you don't get to shoot.
quotes.author: Bob Hurley

quotes.quote: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: You can say something to popes, kings and presidents, but you can't talk to officials. In the next war they ought to give everyone a whistle.
quotes.author: Abe Lemmons

quotes.quote: The secret is to have eight great players and four others who will cheer like crazy.
quotes.author: Jerry Tarkanian

quotes.quote: Believe that the loose ball that you are chasing has your name wirtten on it.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: We have a great bunch of outside shooters. Unfortunately, all our games are played indoors.
quotes.author: Weldon Drew

quotes.quote: Not only is there more to life than basketball, there's a lot more to basketball than basketball.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Basketball is a fast-paced and exiting sport.
quotes.author: Siyavush Saidian

quotes.quote: Basketball has always enjoyed great popularity. Within a decade.
quotes.author: Siyavush Saidian

quotes.quote: Men paly basketball in in their underwear, which seems just right to me.
quotes.author: Anna Quinden

quotes.quote: It was so bad, my travel agent called me with a play - and I wrote it down.
quotes.author: Benny Dees

quotes.quote: The more Final Fours you go to, the more cousins you find you have who need tickets.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: Whenever you lose, there's going to be criticism. That's why they invented talk radio.
quotes.author: Rudy Tomjanovich

quotes.quote: Life is an endless series of bounces, some as predictable as the rebound of a basketball, others as unpredictable as the rebound of a football.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Life is bigger than football or basketball but the same rules maintain.
quotes.author: John A. Andrews

quotes.quote: If I weren't earning $3 million a year to dunk a basketball, most people on the street would run in the other direction if they saw me coming.
quotes.author: Charles Barkley

quotes.quote: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.quote: Old basketball players never die. They just sit in front of you at the movies.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: A champion is someone who gets up when he can't
quotes.author: Jack Dempsey

quotes.quote: I've failed over and over again in my life. And that's why I succeed.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: You have to have a real love of your sport to carry you through all the bad times.
quotes.author: Nancy Greene

quotes.quote: At five feet three inches tall, Muggsy Bogues was the shortest player ever to play professional basketball. Throughout his career, he was snickered at, underestimated, and counted out.
quotes.author: Ryan Holiday

quotes.quote: Possession of the ball is the key to winning in football, basketball and the game of life.
quotes.author: J.Laing Burns

quotes.quote: I viewed it as a business, but I always viewed it as a game. An opportunity to show my skills, my basketball skills, amongst the best in the world.
quotes.author: Laura Lyseight

quotes.quote: Possession of the ball is the key to winning in football, basketball and the game of life.
quotes.author: J.Laing Burns

quotes.quote: I viewed it as a business, but I always viewed it as a game. An opportunity to show my skills, my basketball skills, amongst the best in the world.
quotes.author: Laura Lyseight

quotes.quote: The NBA was no glamour league at the start. But none of us complained. We were getting paid to play a child's game, and that was good enough.
quotes.author: Bob Cousy

quotes.quote: There's a spiritual side to basketball. The court is a safe haven, a place where players can seek solitude or find community and lifelong friendships.
quotes.author: Jackie MacMullan

quotes.quote: You can't play football alone, can't play baseball alone, but you could take a basketball and find a hoop anywhere.
quotes.author: Bernard King

quotes.quote: When you talk about the American game, basketball is the true American game.
quotes.author: Bernard King

quotes.quote: Basketball meant family because basketball meant friendships.
quotes.author: Charlie Scott

quotes.quote: I had a lot of voids in my life, and basketball gave me a sense of satisfaction, a sense of identity.
quotes.author: John Thompson

quotes.quote: All aspects of the game of basketball are controlled by forces.
quotes.author: John J. Fontanella

quotes.quote: Without forces, a basketball or a basketball player would always move in a straight line with a constant speed.
quotes.author: John J. Fontanella

quotes.quote: Basketball is not usually thought of as a game of contact, pushes and pulls by one player on another are part of the game.
quotes.author: John J. Fontanella

quotes.quote: They predict that a basketball will always bounce to the same height that it is dropped from.
quotes.author: John J. Fontanella

quotes.quote: When the basketball first contacts the floor, it is said to have potential energy (energy of position/height) and kinetic energy.
quotes.author: John J. Fontanella

quotes.quote: In basketball and in life, I have always maintained the philosophy of 'next play,' what it means is that whatever you have just done is not as important as what you are doing right now.
quotes.author: Mike Krzyzewski

quotes.quote: In basketball there is no goalie like there is in soccer, lacrosse, field hokey, water polo, and probably more.
quotes.author: Mike Huff

quotes.quote: Basketball has no specialists, like a punter in football or a libero in volleyball.
quotes.author: Mike Huff

quotes.quote: Basketball demands from each player the widest range of skills of any of the team sports.
quotes.author: Mike Huff

quotes.quote: Not only is there more to life than basketball, there's a lot more to basketball than basketball.
quotes.author: Mike Huff

quotes.quote: Basketball is a beautiful game when it is played in what I personally believe is the right way, with every player knowing and executing his or her role within the team concept.
quotes.author: Mike Huff

quotes.quote: The strength of the team is each individual member. The strength of each member is the team.
quotes.author: Phil Jackson

quotes.quote: Nervous means you want to play. Scared means you don't want to play.
quotes.author: Sherman Alexie

quotes.quote: They say that nobody is perfect. Then they tell you practice makes perfect. I wish they'd make up their minds.
quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

quotes.quote: Everyone has the fire, but the champions know when to ignite the spark.
quotes.author: Amit Ray

quotes.quote: The road to a friend's house is never long.
quotes.author: Danish Proverb

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Friends: people who borrow my books and set wet glasses on them.
quotes.author: Edwin Arlington Robinson

quotes.quote: The holy passion of Friendship is so sweet and steady and loyal and enduring a nature that it will last through a whole lifetime, if not asked to lend money.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A loyal friend laughs at your jokes when they're not so good, and sympathizes with your problems when they're not so bad.
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasgow

quotes.quote: Friends are like melons. Shall I tell you why? To find one good, you must a hundred try.
quotes.author: Claude Mermet

quotes.quote: No one is completely unhappy at the failure of his best friend.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: Friendship is born at that moment when one person says to another, 'What! You too? I thought I was the only one.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: You can't make a circle of friends with a compass.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: I have lost friends, some by deathâ€¦others by sheer inability to cross the street.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: A true friend never gets in your way, unless you happen to be going down
quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

quotes.quote: The imaginary friends I had as a kid dropped me because their friends thought I didn't exist.
quotes.author: Aaron Machado

quotes.quote: The best way to keep your friends is not to give them away.
quotes.author: Wilson Mizner

quotes.quote: For all the advances in medicine, there is still no cure for the common birthday.
quotes.author: John Glenn

quotes.quote: Life would be infinitely better if we could be born at the age of 80 and gradually approach 18.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Birthdays are good for you. Statistics show that the people who have the most live the longest.
quotes.author: Rev. Larry Lorenzoni

quotes.quote: My Birthday! What a difference sound That word had in my youthful ears; And how each time the day comes round, Less and less white its mark appears.
quotes.author: Thomas Moore

quotes.quote: As you get older, three things happen.The first is your memory goes, and I can't remember the other two.
quotes.author: Norman Wisdom

quotes.quote: Birthdays are a great time to stop and appreciate gravity. Sure, it makes things sag as you get older, but it also keeps your cake from flying all over the room so you don't have to chase it.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: You're getting old when the only thing you want for your birthday is not to be reminded of it.
quotes.author: Felix Severn

quotes.quote: Old age is like a plane flying through a storm. Once you are aboard there is nothing you can do about it.
quotes.author: Golda Meir

quotes.quote: Old age is like everything else. To make a success of it, you've got to start young.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: After 30, a body has a mind of its own.
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: The Best way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
quotes.author: H. V. Prochnow

quotes.quote: Age is something that doesn't matter, unless you are a cheese.
quotes.author: Billie Burke

quotes.quote: Age is strictly a case of mind over matter. If you don't mind, it doesn't matter.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: Growing old is like being increasingly penalized for a crime you have not committed.
quotes.author: Anthony Powell

quotes.quote: Wisdom doesn't necessarily come with age. Sometimes age just shows up all by itself.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: I'm at an age when my back goes out more than I do.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: A diplomat is a man who always remembers a woman's birthday, but never remembers her age.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: When you turn thirty, a whole new thing happens: you see yourself acting like your parents.
quotes.author: Blair Sabol

quotes.quote: We know we're getting old when the only thing we want for our birthday is not to be reminded of it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You know you are getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: The best birthdays of all are those that haven't arrived yet.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Birthdays are nature's way of telling us to eat more cake.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When I was little I thought, isn't it nice that everybody celebrates on my birthday? Because it's July 4th.
quotes.author: Gloria Stuart

quotes.quote: At the age of 20, we don't care what the world thinks of us; at 30, we worry about what it is thinking of us; at 40, we discover that it wasn't thinking of us at all.
quotes.author: John M Eades

quotes.quote: The first sign of maturity is the discovery that the volume knob also turns to the left.
quotes.author: Jerry M. Wright

quotes.quote: Last week the candle factory burned down. Everyone just stood around and sang, 'Happy Birthday.'
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you live to the age of a hundred, you have it made because very few people die past the age of a hundred.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Aging seems to be the only available way to live a long life.
quotes.author: Kitty Collins

quotes.quote: To me, old age is always 15 years older than I am.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: The older you get the better you get, unless you are a banana.
quotes.author: Betty White

quotes.quote: That’s the time of your life when even your birthday suit needs pressing.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: First you forget names; then you forget faces; then you forget to zip up your fly; and then you forget to unzip your fly.
quotes.author: Branch Rickey

quotes.quote: Just remember once you're over the hill, you begin to pick up speed.
quotes.author: Charles Schultz

quotes.quote: Inside every older person is a younger person – wondering what the hell happened.
quotes.author: Cora Harvey Armstrong

quotes.quote: The really frightening thing about middle age is the knowledge that you'll grow out of it.
quotes.author: Doris Day

quotes.quote: Those who love deeply never grow old; they may die of old age, but they die young.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: A friend never defends a husband who gets his wife an electric skillet for her birthday.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Time is a dressmaker specializing in alterations.
quotes.author: Faith Baldwin

quotes.quote: Middle age occurs when you are too young to take up golf and too old to rush up to the net.
quotes.author: Franklin Pierce Adams

quotes.quote: People ask me what I'd most appreciate getting for my eighty-seventh birthday. I tell them, a paternity suit.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: All the world is a birthday cake, so take a piece, but not too much.
quotes.author: George Harrison

quotes.quote: Middle age is the awkward period when Father Time starts catching up with Mother Nature.
quotes.author: Harold Coffin

quotes.quote: When a man has a birthday, he takes a day off. When a woman has a birthday, she takes at least three years off.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: If you survive long enough, you’re revered-rather like an old building.
quotes.author: Katherine Hepburn

quotes.quote: One of the best parts of growing older? You can flirt all you like since you’ve become harmless.
quotes.author: Liz Smith

quotes.quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Age is an issue of mind over matter. If you don’t mind, it doesn’t matter.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I wanted to buy a candle holder, but the store didn’t have one. So, I got a cake!
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: Today is the oldest you have been, and the youngest you will ever be. Make the most of it!
quotes.author: Nicky Gumbel

quotes.quote: Middle age is when you’ve met so many people that every new person you meet reminds you of someone else.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Middle age is when you’re sitting at home on a Saturday night and the telephone rings and you hope it isn’t for you.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: You are only young once, but you can stay immature indefinitely.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote:
"Of late I appear to have reached that stage when people who look old
who are only my age."
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: Here is the test to find whether your mission on earth is finished: If you're alive, it isn't.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Last year my birthday cake looked like a prairie fire.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: For my birthday I got a humidifier and a dehumidifier…I put them in the same room and let them fight it out.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: They say that age is all in your mind. The trick is keeping it from creeping down into your body.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: You know you are getting old when the birthday candles on your birthday cake start to cost more than the cake itself
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Birthdays are good for you. The more you have, the longer you live.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Artificial intelligence is a wonderful thing. I told my computer that today is my birthday and it said that I need an upgrade.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Eventually you reach a point when you stop lying about your age and start bragging about it.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: From our birthday, until we die, is but the winking of an eye.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Some men break your heart in two, / Some men fawn and flatter, / Some men never look at you; / And that cleans up the matter.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Break ups aren't fair. Why does only one person have power? We both agreed to start dating. Why do you get to make the decision to end it? Shouldn't it be a joint decision too
quotes.author: Alyssa Rose Ivy

quotes.quote: I know one husband and wife who, whatever the official reasons given to the court for the break up of their marriage, were really divorced because the husband believed that nobody ought to read while he was talking and the wife that nobody ought to talk while she was reading.
quotes.author: Vera Brittain

quotes.quote: I break up very well. I am a good breaker-upper.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: Living apart is hardly possible if people have children together. It can also be more expensive to maintain two homes. But then, it's expensive to break up when you live in one property.
quotes.author: Deborah Moggach

quotes.quote: When one door closes another door opens. Usually a refrigerator.
quotes.author: Bonnie McFarlane

quotes.quote: The best way to mend a broken heart is time and girlfriends.
quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quotes.quote: When your ex says ‘You’ll never find anyone like me’. Say ‘that’s the point’.
quotes.author: Drake

quotes.quote: All discarded lovers should be given a second chance, but with somebody else.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The difference between a divorce and a legal separation is that a legal separation gives a husband time to hide his money.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: The heart was made to be broken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Why do you have to break up with her? Be a man. Just stop calling.
quotes.author: (Joey) Friends

quotes.quote: I've never been married, but I tell people I'm divorced so they won't think something is wrong with me.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: There is a good way to break up with someone and it doesn't include a Post-it.
quotes.author: (Carrie) Sex and the City

quotes.quote: It's relaxing to go out with my ex-wife because she already knows I'm an idiot.
quotes.author: Warren Thomas

quotes.quote: You know what is the worst thing about being rejected? The lack of control. If I could only control the where and how of being dumped, it wouldn't seem as bad.
quotes.author: Rob Fleming

quotes.quote: I will always love the false image I had of you.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Your heart is my piñata.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Relationships are hard. It's like a full-time job, and we should treat it like one. If your boyfriend or girlfriend wants to leave you, they should give you two weeks' notice. There should be severance pay, and before they leave you, they should have to find you a temp.
quotes.author: Bob Ettinger

quotes.quote: Every time I look at you, I get a fierce desire to be lonesome.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: How could I be sleeping with this peculiar man... Surely only true love could justify my lack of taste.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: I love to shop after a bad relationship. I don't know. I buy a new outfit and it makes me feel better. It just does. Sometimes if I see a really great outfit, I'll break up with someone on purpose.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: For a while we pondered whether to take a vacation or get a divorce. We decided that a trip to Bermuda is over in two weeks, but a divorce is something you always have.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: When a man steals your wife, there is no better revenge than to let him keep her.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: I broke up with someone, and she said, "You'll never find anyone like me again" And I'm thinking, "I hope not!" Does anybody end a bad relationship and say, "By the way, do you have a twin?"
quotes.author: Larry Miller

quotes.quote: What a lovely surprise to finally discover how unlonely being alone can be.
quotes.author: Ellen Burstyn

quotes.quote: I don't think marriages break up because of what you do to each other. They break up because of what you must become in order to stay in them.
quotes.author: Carol Grace

quotes.quote: Breakups were so painful, especially the relationships that haven't even started.
quotes.author: David

quotes.quote: A breakup would imply she was my girlfriend. She was a girl who was my friend who is now a girl who is not my friend.
quotes.author: Sheldon Cooper

quotes.quote: You love me, you say, and I think you do, / But I know so many who don’t, / And how can I say I’ll be true to you / When I know very well that I won’t? / I have journeyed long and my goal is far, / I love, but I cannot bide, / For as sure as rises the morning star, / With the break of day I’ll ride. / I was doomed to ruin or doomed to mar / The home wherever I stay, / But I’ll think of you as the morning star / And they call me Break o’ Day.
quotes.author: Henry Lawson

quotes.quote: Breaking up is like knocking over a Coke machine. You can't do it in one push. You gotta rock it back and forth a few times, and then it goes over.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: My girlfriend said she wanted me to be more like her Ex. So I dumped her.
quotes.author: Azgraybebly Joslan

quotes.quote: There is one thing I would break up over and that is if she caught me with another woman. I wouldn't stand for that.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: Divorce is the psychological equivalent of a triple coronary bypass.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Blakeley

quotes.quote: Divorce is the one human tragedy that reduces everything to cash.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: If someone breaks your heart, just punch them in the face. Seriously. Punch them in the face and go get some ice cream.
quotes.author: Frank Ocean

quotes.quote: He taught me housekeeping; when I divorce I keep the house.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: My mother always said don't marry for money, divorce for money.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.quote: In our family we don't divorce our men -- we bury them.
quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

quotes.quote: I'm so miserable without you, it's almost as if you're here!
quotes.author: Billy Ray Cyrus

quotes.quote: A divorce is like an amputation: you survive it, but there's less of you.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: Money may not buy happiness, but I'd rather cry in a Jaguar than on a bus.
quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

quotes.quote: When a man opens a car door for his wife, it's either a new car or a new wife.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: Relationships, like cars, should undergo regular services to make sure they are still roadworthy.
quotes.author: Zygmunt Bauman

quotes.quote: To attract men, I wear a perfume called 'New Car Interior.'
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Always focus on the front windshield and not the review mirror.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: The car has become an article of dress without which we feel uncertain, unclad, and incomplete in the urban compound.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: Any man who can drive safely while kissing a pretty girl is simply not giving the kiss the attention it deserves.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: If all the cars in the United States were placed end to end, it would probably be Labor Day Weekend.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: It is amazing how may drivers, even at the Formula One Level, think that the brakes are for slowing the car down.
quotes.author: Mario Andretti

quotes.quote: The car has become the carapace, the protective and aggressive shell, of urban and suburban man.
quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

quotes.quote: More books, more racing and more foolishness with cars and motorcycles are in the works.
quotes.author: Brock Yates

quotes.quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: If you own a home with wheels on it and several cars without, you just might be a redneck.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: We all know that small cars are good for us. But so is cod liver oil. And jogging.
quotes.author: Jeremy Clarkson

quotes.quote: A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: We're in a giant car heading towards a brick wall and everyone's arguing over where they're going to sit.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: If you think nobody cares if you're alive, try missing a couple of car payments.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: A car can massage organs which no masseur can reach. It is the one remedy for the disorders of the great sympathetic nervous system.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: The best car safety device is a rear-view mirror with a cop in it.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.quote: Straight roads are for fast cars, turns are for fast drivers.
quotes.author: Colin Mcrae

quotes.quote: In the old days drivers were fat and tires were skinny.
quotes.author: Jose Froilan Gonzalez

quotes.quote: Women are like cars: we all want a Ferrari, sometimes want a pickup truck, and end up with a station wagon.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: If your car could travel at the speed of light, would your headlights work?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: It is amazing how quickly the kids learn to drive a car, yet are unable to understand the lawn mower, snowblower and vacuum cleaner.
quotes.author: Ben Berger

quotes.quote: Bicycling is a big part of the future. It has to be. There's something wrong with a society that drives a car to work out in a gym.
quotes.author: Bill Nye

quotes.quote: Cars and bumper cars are two very different things. NEVER sleep in a bumper car.
quotes.author: Craig Benzine

quotes.quote: Everything in life is somewhere else, and you get there in a car.
quotes.author: E. B. White

quotes.quote: With each replacement of parts, a car slowly becomes Chinese.
quotes.author: Mr. Kuniyasu

quotes.quote: Take care of your car in the garage, and the car will take care of you on the road.
quotes.author: Amit Kalantri

quotes.quote: Environmentalists have a very conflicted relationship with their cars.
quotes.author: Tom Arnold

quotes.quote: To get to know a country, you must have direct contact with the earth. It's futile to gaze at the world through a car window.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A car for every purse and purpose.
quotes.author: Alfred P. Sloan

quotes.quote: Not having to own a car has made me realize what a waste of time the automobile is.
quotes.author: Diane Johnson

quotes.quote: Someday we'll look back on this moment and plow into a parked car.
quotes.author: Evan Davis

quotes.quote: Don't get your fuel from the same place your car does
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: It is amazing how may drivers, even at the Formula One Level, think that the brakes are for slowing the car down.
quotes.author: Alan Jones

quotes.quote: The cars we drive say a lot about us.
quotes.author: Alexandra Paul

quotes.quote: When you are fitted in a racing car and you race to win, second or third place is not enough.
quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

quotes.quote: It's a waste of energy to be angry with a man who behaves badly, just as it is to be angry with a car that won't go.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Flying cars are not a very efficient way to move things from one point to another.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: A real patriot is the fellow who gets a parking ticket and rejoices that the system works.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Shutting off the thought process is not rejuvenating; the mind is like a car battery - it recharges by running.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Living with a conscience is like driving a car with the brakes on.
quotes.author: Budd Schulberg

quotes.quote: The racing driver needs to be fed a diet of other racing drivers.
quotes.author: Carroll Smith

quotes.quote: The winner ain't the one with the fastest car; it's the one who refuses to lose.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: There’s a lot of stress, but once you get in the car, all that goes out the window.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.quote: The longest journey begins with a single step, not with a turn of the ignition key.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: What’s behind you doesn’t matter.
quotes.author: Enzo Ferrari

quotes.quote: Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that’s what you’re looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A muscle is like a car. If you want it to run well early in the morning, you have to warm it up.
quotes.author: Florence Griffith Joyner

quotes.quote: Every time I see an adult on a bicycle, I no longer despair for the future of the human race.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: You can have any color you like as long as it's black.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Faster, Faster, until the thrill of speed overcomes the fear of death.
quotes.author: Hunter Thompson

quotes.quote: Take it easy driving, the life you save may be mine.
quotes.author: James Dean

quotes.quote: Stealing a man's wife, that's nothing, but stealing his car, that's larceny.
quotes.author: James M. Cain

quotes.quote: We aren’t addicted to oil, but our cars are.
quotes.author: James Woolsey

quotes.quote: Why worry about death, it’ll come sooner or later.
quotes.author: Jim Dunn

quotes.quote: People don’t take trips…Trips take people.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: he way I drive, the way I handle a car, is an expression of my inner feelings.
quotes.author: Lewis Hamilton

quotes.quote: I know a lot about cars, man. I can look at any car's headlights and tell you exactly which way it's coming.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: The lead car is absolutely unique, except for the one behind it which is identical.
quotes.author: Murray Walker

quotes.quote: If you’re in control, you’re not going fast enough.
quotes.author: Parnelli Jones

quotes.quote: If one day the speed kills me. Do not cry, because I was smiling.
quotes.author: Paul Walker

quotes.quote: Every parent knows that for a kid, the car is chloroform.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.quote: My wife wants sex in the back of the car, and she wants me to drive.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: If the car feels like it is on rails, you are probably driving too slow.
quotes.author: Ross Bentley

quotes.quote: When it comes to cars, only two varieties of people are possible - cowards and fools.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: A dream without ambition is like a car without gas—you're not going anywhere.
quotes.author: Sean Hampton

quotes.quote: I couldn’t repair your brakes, so I made your horn louder.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: When everything is coming your way, you’re in the wrong lane.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I replaced the headlights in my car with strobe lights, so it looks like I'm the only one moving.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you don't look back at your car after you park it, you own the wrong car.
quotes.author: Truth

quotes.quote: Hug your kids at home, but belt them in the car.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Leave sooner, drive slower, live longer.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When a cat speaks, it's because it has something to say, unlike humans who are the great refuse containers of speech.
quotes.author: V.L. Allineare

quotes.quote: A tom cat hijacked a plane, stuck a pistol into the pilot's ribs and demanded: Take me to the canaries.
quotes.author: Bob Monkhouse

quotes.quote: Cats always seem so very wise, when staring with their half-closed eyes. Can they be thinking, "I'll be nice, and maybe she will feed me twice?
quotes.author: Bette Midler

quotes.quote: The problem with cats is that they get the exact same look on their face whether they see a moth or an axe-murderer.
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: Dogs come when they're called; cats take a message and get back to you later.
quotes.author: Mary Bly

quotes.quote: All cats love fish but fear to wet their paws.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.quote: The trouble with sharing one's bed with cats is that they'd rather sleep on you than beside you.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Cats are kindly masters, just so long as you remember your place
quotes.author: Paul Gray

quotes.quote: Your cat will never threaten your popularity by barking at three in the morning. He won't attack the mailman or eat the drapes, although he may climb the drapes to see how the room looks from the ceiling.
quotes.author: Helen Powers

quotes.quote: The cat does not offer services. The cat offers itself. Of course he wants care and shelter. You don't buy love for nothing. Like all pure creatures, cats are practical.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: No amount of time can erase the memory of a good cat, and no amount of masking tape can ever totally remove his fur from your couch.
quotes.author: Leo Dworken

quotes.quote: If a dog jumps in your lap, it is because he is fond of you; but if a cat does the same thing, it is because your lap is warmer.
quotes.author: Alfred North Whitehead

quotes.quote: The cat seldom interferes with other people's rights. His intelligence keeps him from doing many of the fool things that complicate life.
quotes.author: Carl V. Vechten

quotes.quote: Cats' hearing apparatus is built to allow the human voice to easily go in one ear and out the other.
quotes.author: Stephen Baker

quotes.quote: Even overweight, cats instinctively know the cardinal rule: when fat, arrange yourself in slim poses.
quotes.author: John Weitz

quotes.quote: Any cat who misses a mouse pretends it was aiming for the dead leaf.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: A cat's got her own opinion of human beings. She don't say much, but you can tell enough to make you anxious not to hear the whole of it.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Cats never strike a pose that isn't photogenic.
quotes.author: Lillian Jackson Braun

quotes.quote: No matter how much the cats fight, there always seem to be plenty of kittens.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: After scolding one's cat one looks into its face and is seized by the ugly suspicion that it understood every word. And has filed it for reference.
quotes.author: Charlotte Gray

quotes.quote: The cat is, above all things, a dramatist.
quotes.author: Margaret Benson

quotes.quote: The reason cats climb is so that they can look down on almost every other animalâ€¦it's also the reason they hate birds.
quotes.author: KC Buffington

quotes.quote: If animals could speak, the dog would be a blundering outspoken fellow; but the cat would have the rare grace of never saying a word too much.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Cats will amusingly tolerate humans only until someone comes up with a tin opener that can be operated with a paw.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: In ancient times cats were worshipped as gods; they have not forgotten this.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: There is something about the presence of a cat... that seems to take the bite out of being alone.
quotes.author: Louis J. Camuti

quotes.quote: Cats only pretend to be domesticated if they think there's a bowl of milk in it for them.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: An ordinary kitten will ask more questions than any five year old.
quotes.author: Carl Van Vechten

quotes.quote: A cat determined not to be found can fold itself up like a pocket handkerchief if it wants to.
quotes.author: Louis J. Camuti

quotes.quote: If cats could talk, they wouldn't.
quotes.author: Nan Porter

quotes.quote: Cats know how to obtain food without labor, shelter without confinement, and love without penalties.
quotes.author: W.L. George

quotes.quote: Cats can work out mathematically the exact place to sit that will cause most inconvenience.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: A cat can be trusted to purr when she is pleased, which is more than can be said for human beings.
quotes.author: William Ralph Inge

quotes.quote: I believe cats to be spirits come to earth. A cat, I am sure, could walk on a cloud without coming through.
quotes.author: Jules Verne

quotes.quote: A cat isn't fussy - just so long as you remember he likes his milk in the shallow, rose-patterned saucer and his fish on the blue plate. From which he will take it, and eat it off the floor.
quotes.author: Arthur Bridges

quotes.quote: It is impossible for a lover of cats to banish these alert, gentle, and discriminating little friends, who give us just enough of their regard and complaisance to make us hunger for more.
quotes.author: Agnes Repplier

quotes.quote: There are two means of refuge from the miseries of life music and cats.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.quote: I had been told that the training procedure with cats was difficult. It’s not. Mine had me trained in two days.
quotes.author: Bill Dana

quotes.quote: A kitten is the delight of a household. All day long a comedy is played out by an incomparable actor.
quotes.author: Champfleury

quotes.quote: Owners of dogs will have noticed that, if you provide them with food and water and shelter and affection, they will think you are God. Whereas owners of cats are compelled to realize that, if you provide them with food and water and affection, they draw the conclusion that they are God.
quotes.author: Christopher Hitchens

quotes.quote: As anyone who has ever been around a cat for any length of time well knows, cats have enormous patience with the limitations of the humankind.
quotes.author: Cleveland Amory

quotes.quote: There is, incidentally, no way of talking about cats that enables one to come off as a sane person.
quotes.author: Dan Greenberg

quotes.quote: A cat can purr its way out of anything.
quotes.author: Donna Mccrohan

quotes.quote: As every cat owner knows, nobody owns a cat.
quotes.author: Ellen Perry Berkeley

quotes.quote: One cat just leads to another.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: A cat has absolute emotional honesty, human beings, for one reason or another, may hide their feelings, but a cat does not.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Everything I know I learned from my cat. When you're hungry, eat. When you're tired, nap in a sunbeam. When you go to the vet’s, pee on your owner.
quotes.author: Gary Smith

quotes.quote: How we behave toward cats here below determines our status in heaven.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: The phrase domestic cat is an oxymoron.
quotes.author: George Will

quotes.quote: I have studied many philosophers and many cats. The wisdom of cats is infinitely superior.
quotes.author: Hippolyte Taine

quotes.quote: Cats are connoisseurs of comfort.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: I have felt cats rubbing their faces against mine and touching my cheek with claws carefully sheathed. These things, to me, are expressions of love.
quotes.author: James Herriot

quotes.quote: You cannot look at a sleeping cat and feel tense.
quotes.author: Jane Pauley

quotes.quote: I love cats because I enjoy my home and little by little, they become its visible soul.
quotes.author: Jean Cocteau

quotes.quote: Way down deep, we’re all motivated by the same urges. Cats have the courage to live by them.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: Cats seem to go on the principle that it never does any harm to ask for what you want.
quotes.author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quotes.quote: The smallest feline is a masterpiece.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.quote: Cats do care. For example they know instinctively what time we have to be at work in the morning and they wake us up twenty minutes before the alarm goes off.
quotes.author: Michael Nelson

quotes.quote: I used to love dogs until I discovered cats.
quotes.author: Nafisa Joseph

quotes.quote: A kitten is in the animal world what a rosebud is in the garden.
quotes.author: Robert Southey

quotes.quote: Cats have it all admiration, an endless sleep, and company only when they want it.
quotes.author: Rod McKuen

quotes.quote: There are few things in life more heartwarming than to be welcomed by a cat.
quotes.author: Tay Hohoff

quotes.quote: A cat is an example of sophistication minus civilization.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dogs have owners, cats have staff.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Like all pure creatures, cats are practical.
quotes.author: William S. Burroughs

quotes.quote: The hardest years in life are those between ten and seventy.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Life is like an onion; you peel off one layer at a time and sometimes you weep.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: If life gives you lemons, make some kind of fruity juice.
quotes.author: Conan O'Brien

quotes.quote: Too many people spend money they haven't earned, to buy things they don't want, to impress people they don't like.
quotes.author: Will Smith

quotes.quote: If you're gonna be two-faced at least make one of them pretty.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: To write a diary every day is like returning to one's own vomit.
quotes.author: Enoch Powell

quotes.quote: I really don't think I need buns of steel. I'd be happy with buns of cinnamon.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Money never made a man happy yet, nor will it. The more a man has, the more he wants. Instead of filling a vacuum, it makes one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The man who says his wife can't take a joke, forgets that she took him.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is like a taxi. The meter just keeps a-ticking whether you are getting somewhere or just standing still.
quotes.author: Lou Erickso

quotes.quote: The secret of staying young is to live honestly, eat slowly, and lie about your age.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: Another good thing about being poor is that when you are seventy your children will not have you declared legally insane in order to gain control of your estate.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: God made woman beautiful and foolish; beautiful, that man might love her; and foolish, that she might love him.
quotes.author: Tara Reid

quotes.quote: Don't waste a minute not being happy. If one window closes, run to the next window. Or break down a door.
quotes.author: Brooke Shields

quotes.quote: In every circle of friends there's always that one person everyone secretly hates. Don't have one? Then it's probably you.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: A word to the wise ain't necessary. It's the stupid ones who need the advice.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: As long as you know men are like children, you know everything!
quotes.author: Coco Chanel

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: I like women, I don't understand them, but I like them.
quotes.author: Sean Connery

quotes.quote: You are the CEO of your life. Some people need to be hired and some need to be fired.
quotes.author: Robert Downey Jr.

quotes.quote: Keep seeing the glass half-full and it will dawn upon you that it's probably your turn to buy.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: If you can't beat them, arrange to have them beaten.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Never follow someone else's path; unless you're in the woods and you're lost and you see a path, then by all means, you should follow that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Too much money ain't enough money.
quotes.author: Lil Wayne

quotes.quote: You don't have to be smart to laugh at farts, but you have to be stupid not to.
quotes.author: Louis C.K.

quotes.quote: The secret to a happy marriage? Do whatever your wife tells you. â€˜Yes, dear.' And breathe.
quotes.author: Denzel Washingto

quotes.quote: The crime of loving is forgetting.
quotes.author: Maurice Chevalier

quotes.quote: I ask people why they have deer heads on their walls. They always say because it's such a beautiful animal. There you go. I think my mother is attractive, but I have photographs of her.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Not only is life a bitch, it has puppies.
quotes.author: Adrienne Gusoff

quotes.quote: The trouble with children is that they're not returnable.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: I wish I could trade my heart for another liver, so I could drink more and care less.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: It's not enough to succeed. Others must fail.
quotes.author: Gore Vidal

quotes.quote: You must never underestimate the power of the eyebrow.
quotes.author: Jack Black

quotes.quote: Husbands are like fires - they go out when unattended.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: The most beautiful makeup for a woman is passion. But cosmetics are easier to buy.
quotes.author: Yves St. Laurent.

quotes.quote: Men should be like Kleenex, soft, strong and disposable.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: A bore is a man who, when you ask him how he is, tells you.
quotes.author: B.L. Taylor

quotes.quote: If you marry a man who cheats on his wife, you'll be married to a man who cheats on his wife.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: When a man steals your wife there is no better revenge than to let him keep her.
quotes.author: Sacha Guitry

quotes.quote: Did you visit the Parthenon during your trip to Greece?” Shaquille O’Neal: “I can’t really remember the names of the clubs we went to.
quotes.author: Shaquille O’Neal

quotes.quote: I’ve never really wanted to go to Japan. Simply because I don’t like eating fish. And I know that’s very popular out there in Africa.
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.quote: Crack is cheap. I make too much money to ever smoke crack. Let’s get that straight. OK? We don’t do crack. We don’t do that. Crack is whack.
quotes.author: Whitney Houston

quotes.quote: I still love her. But she’s retarded, too.
quotes.author: Guy Ritchie

quotes.quote: I thought Europe was a country.
quotes.author: Kellie Pickler

quotes.quote: According to most studies, people’s number one fear is public speaking. Number two is death. Death is number two. Does that seem right? That means to the average person, if you have to go to a funeral, you’re better off in the casket than doing the eulogy.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: I asked my brother-in-law, the father of four boys, ‘If you had it to do all over again, would you still have kids?’ ‘Yes,’ he said. ‘Just not these four.
quotes.author: Sheila Lee

quotes.quote: I just realized that ‘Let me check my calendar’ is the adult version of ‘Let me ask my mom.
quotes.author: Noelle Chatham

quotes.quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn’t afford. Then I want to move in with them.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Whoever established the high road and how high it should be should be fired.
quotes.author: Sandra Bullock

quotes.quote: Sometimes I am amazed that my wife and I created two human beings from scratch yet struggle to assemble the most basic of IKEA cabinets.
quotes.author: John Kinnear

quotes.quote: Instant gratification takes too long.
quotes.author: Carrie Fisher

quotes.quote: When your children are teenagers, it’s important to have a dog so that someone in the house is happy to see you.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: When your mother asks, ‘Do you want a piece of advice?’ it is a mere formality. It doesn’t matter if you answer yes or no. You’re going to get it anyway.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: WebMD is updating its server because of a virus. Well, they think it was a virus, but it could also be malaria, kidney failure, a heart murmur, gallstones, or possibly appendicitis.
quotes.author: Crystal Lowery

quotes.quote: If you are not yelling at your kids, you are not spending enough time with them.
quotes.author: Reese Witherspoon

quotes.quote: User: the word computer professionals use when they mean ‘idiot.
quotes.author: Great Funny Quotes: Sweeten Your Life with Laughter

quotes.quote: Sometimes you lie in bed at night and you don’t have a single thing to worry about. That always worries me!
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: As soon as the hospital made me put on one of those little gowns, I knew the end was in sight.
quotes.author: Adam Joshua Smargon

quotes.quote: My father always said, ‘Never trust anyone whose TV is bigger than their bookshelf.
quotes.author: Emilia Clarke

quotes.quote: The lion and the calf shall lie down together, but the calf won’t get much sleep.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: “I make Jessica Simpson look like a rock scientist.
quotes.author: Tara Reid

quotes.quote: My definition of an intellectual is someone who can listen to the William Tell Overture without thinking of the Lone Ranger.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: I won’t go into a big spiel about reincarnation, but the first time I was in the Gucci store in Chicago was the closest I’ve ever felt to home.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: I don’t believe in reincarnation, and I didn’t believe in it when I was a hamster.
quotes.author: Shane Richie

quotes.quote: It’s really hard to maintain a one-on-one relationship if the other person is not going to allow me to be with other people.
quotes.author: Axl Rose

quotes.quote: Bigamy is having one husband or wife too many. Monogamy is the same.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Not sure which is harder on a relationship: sharing a dresser for three years or sharing an iPhone charger for one day.
quotes.author: Rhea Butcher

quotes.quote: Before you criticize someone, you should walk a mile in their shoes. That way when you criticize them, you are a mile away from them and you have their shoes.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: You know there is a problem with the education system when you realize that out of the three Rs, only one begins with an R.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: I once bought my kids a set of batteries for Christmas with a note on it saying, toys not included.
quotes.author: Bernard Manning

quotes.quote: Once again we find ourselves enmeshed in the holiday season, that very special time of year when we join with our loved ones in sharing centuries-old traditions such as trying to find a parking space at the mall.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: That's the true spirit of Christmas: people being helped by people other than me.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when everybody wants his past forgotten and his present remembered. What I don't like about office Christmas parties is looking for a job the next day.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Aren't we forgetting the true meaning of this day - the birth of Santa?
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: The one thing women don't want to find in their stockings on Christmas morning is their husband.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: One of the most glorious messes in the world is the mess created in the living room on Christmas Day. Don't clean it up too quickly.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: A lovely thing about Christmas is that it's compulsory, like a thunderstorm and we all go through it together.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: People are so worried about what they eat between Christmas and New Year, but they really should be worried about what they eat between the New Year and Christmas.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Once again, we come to the Holiday Season, a deeply religious time that each of us observes in his own way, by going to the mall of his choice.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, your enemies closer, and receipts for all major purchases.
quotes.author: Bridger Winegar

quotes.quote: The worst gift is a fruitcake. There is only one fruitcake in the entire world, and people keep sending it to each other.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: Never worry about the size of your Christmas tree. In the eyes of children, they are all 30 feet tall.
quotes.author: Larry Wilde

quotes.quote: Remember that the important thing is not what you give, or how you wrap it. The important thing, during this very special time of year, is that you save the receipt.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Mail your packages early, so the post office can lose them in time for Christmas.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: I stopped believing in Santa Clause when I was six. Mother took me to see him in a department store, and he asked for my autograph.
quotes.author: Shirley Temple

quotes.quote: Santa Claus has the right idea. Visit people only once a year.
quotes.author: Victor Borge

quotes.quote: Even before Christmas has said Hello, it's saying 'Buy Buy'.
quotes.author: Robert Paul

quotes.quote: My husband bought fruitcake one year. He ate some of it, but I wrapped the rest and gave it back to him for Christmas. The next year, I found it amongst my presents from him. It developed from there.
quotes.author: Rikki Rosenberg

quotes.quote: Santa is very jolly because he knows where all the bad girls live.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: My wife, like many women, actually LIKES wrapping things. If she gives you a gift that requires batteries, she wraps the batteries separately, which to me is very close to being a symptom of mental illness.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Christmas is a baby shower that went totally overboard.
quotes.author: Andy Borowitz

quotes.quote: I left Santa gluten-free cookies and organic soy milk and he put a solar panel in my stocking.
quotes.author: Earthman Adam

quotes.quote: At Christmas, tea is compulsory. Relatives are optional.
quotes.author: Robert Godden

quotes.quote: Christmas is a time when kids tell Santa what they want and adults pay for it. Deficits are when adults tell the government what they want--and their kids pay for it.
quotes.author: Richard Lamm

quotes.quote: The Supreme Court has ruled that they cannot have a nativity scene in Washington, D.C. This wasn't for any religious reasons. They couldn't find three wise men and a virgin.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: I love Christmas. I receive a lot of wonderful presents I can't wait to exchange.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: As long as there was coffee in the world, how bad could things be?
quotes.author: Cassandra Clare

quotes.quote: Some of the world's most effective thoughts happen over a brew of morning's coffee
quotes.author: Prabhukrishna M

quotes.quote: Way too much coffee. But if it weren't for the coffee, I'd have no identifiable personality whatsoever.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: I would rather suffer from coffee than be senseless.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Coffee is a language in itself
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: I was taken by the power that savoring a simple cup of coffee can have to connect people and create community.
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: People don't stop eating, and they don't stop drinking coffee.
quotes.author: Magic Johnson

quotes.quote: When traveling with someone, take large dose of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.quote: Behind every successful woman is a substantial amount of coffee.
quotes.author: Stephanie Piro

quotes.quote: He was my cream, and I was his coffee â€“ And when you poured us together, it was something.
quotes.author: Josephine Baker

quotes.quote: Adventure in life is good; consistency in coffee even better.
quotes.author: Justina Chen

quotes.quote: It's amazing how the world begins to change through the eyes of a cup of coffee.
quotes.author: Donna A. Favors

quotes.quote: The powers of a man's mind are directly proportioned to the quantity of coffee he drinks.
quotes.author: James Mackintosh

quotes.quote: If this is coffee, please bring me some tea; but if this is tea, please bring me some coffee.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: I could smell myself awake with that coffee.
quotes.author: Jaesse Tyler

quotes.quote: Coffee first. Schemes later.
quotes.author: Leanna Renee Hieber

quotes.quote: The second cup of coffee is never as good as the first.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Once you wake up and smell the coffee, it's hard to go back to sleep.
quotes.author: Fran Drescher

quotes.quote: I had some dreams, they were clouds in my coffee.
quotes.author: Carly Simon

quotes.quote: I can't imagine a day without coffee. I can't imagine!
quotes.author: Howard Schultz

quotes.quote: The morning cup of coffee has an exhilaration about it which the cheering influence of the afternoon or evening cup of tea cannot be expected to reproduce.
quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quotes.quote: Coffee is a language in itself.
quotes.author: Jackie Chan

quotes.quote: Coffee is good for talent, but genius wants prayer.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Coffee, the favorite drink of the civilized world.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: If I asked for a cup of coffee, someone would search for the double meaning.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Our culture runs on coffee and gasoline, the first often tasting like the second.
quotes.author: Edward Abbey

quotes.quote: Coffee is a way of stealing time that should by rights belong to your older self.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: Good communication is just as stimulating as black coffee, and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Coffee is the common man's gold, and like gold, it brings to every person the feeling of luxury and nobility.
quotes.author: Sheik-Abd-al-Kadir

quotes.quote: Black coffee must be strong and very hot; if strong coffee does not agree with you, do not drink black coffee. And if you do not drink black coffee, do not drink any coffee at all.
quotes.author: Andre Simon

quotes.quote: Coffee was a food in that house, not a drink.
quotes.author: Patricia Hampl

quotes.quote: A morning coffee is my favorite way of starting the day, settling the nerves so that they don't later fray.
quotes.author: Marcia Carrington

quotes.quote: No coffee can be good in the mouth that does not first send a sweet offering of odor to the nostrils.
quotes.author: Henry Ward Beecher

quotes.quote: Coffee in England always tastes like a chemistry experiment.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: I like coffee because it gives me the illusion that I might be awake.
quotes.author: Lewis Black

quotes.quote: I orchestrate my mornings to the tune of coffee.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: The coffee was so strong it snarled as it lurched out of the pot.
quotes.author: Betty MacDonald

quotes.quote: Without my morning coffee, I'm just like a dried-up piece of goat.
quotes.author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quotes.quote: Coffee is a beverage that puts one to sleep when not drank.
quotes.author: Alphonse Allais

quotes.quote: Even bad coffee is better than no coffee at all.
quotes.author: David Lynch

quotes.quote: I never laugh until I've had my coffee.
quotes.author: Clark Gable

quotes.quote: I think if I were a woman I'd wear coffee as a perfume.
quotes.author: John William Van Druten

quotes.quote: Science may never come up with a better office communication system than the coffee break.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: No matter what historians claimed, BC really stood for Before Coffee.
quotes.author: Cherise Sinclair

quotes.quote: I don't see the point in caffeine without coffee. Or coffee without caffeine, for that matter.
