quotes.author: Robyn Schneider

quotes.quote: Given enough coffee I could rule the world.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: There's nothing sweeter than a cup of bitter coffee.
quotes.author: Rian Aditia

quotes.quote: It turned out people truly did cry into their coffee cups.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: The coffee is prepared in such a way that it makes those who drink it witty: at least there is not a single soul who, on quitting the house, does not believe himself four times wittier that when he entered it.
quotes.author: Charles de Secondat Montesquieu

quotes.quote: Coffee makes us severe, and grave, and philosophical.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: What goes best with a cup of coffee? Another cup.
quotes.author: Henry Rollins

quotes.quote: I put instant coffee in a microwave oven and almost went back in time.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: A mathematician is a device for turning coffee into theorems.
quotes.author: Alfred Renyi

quotes.quote: Do you know how helpless you feel if you have a full cup of coffee in your hand and you start to sneeze?
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Caffeine and sugar, the two basic food groups.
quotes.author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quotes.quote: It is inhumane, in my opinion, to force people who have a genuine medical need for coffee to wait in line behind people who apparently view it as some kind of recreational activity.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Chocolate and coffee? Together? Whoever came up with that combination should have won a Nobel Peace Prize. Or at least a subscription to Reader's Digest.
quotes.author: Darynda Jones

quotes.quote: I poured a compass into my coffee, to give the flavor some direction.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Free yourself from the slavery of tea and coffee and other slop kettles!
quotes.author: William Cobbett

quotes.quote: If your eyes hurt after you drink coffee, you have to take the spoon out of the cup.
quotes.author: Norm Crosby

quotes.quote: I believe humans get a lot done, not because we're smart, but because we have thumbs so we can make coffee.
quotes.author: Flash Rosenberg

quotes.quote: I've taken up meditation. I like to have an espresso first to make it more challenging.
quotes.author: Betsy Salkind

quotes.quote: Coffee has two virtues: it is wet and warm.
quotes.author: Dutch Proverb

quotes.quote: When I wake up in the morning, I just can't get started until I've had that first, piping hot pot of coffee. Oh, I've tried other enemas...
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: I have measured out my life with coffee spoons.
quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

quotes.quote: Decaffeinated coffee is kind of like kissing your sister.
quotes.author: Bob Irwin

quotes.quote: It must be slow, for I have been drinking it for sixty-five years and I am not yet dead.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: Coffee: creative lighter fluid.
quotes.author: Floyd Maxwell

quotes.quote: Never drink black coffee at lunch; it will keep you awake in the afternoon.
quotes.author: Jilly Cooper

quotes.quote: These angry zombies were rushing to work, and their eyes flashed fair warning: Don't mess with us. We haven't had our coffee.
quotes.author: Joan Frank

quotes.quote: Coffee in England is just toasted milk.
quotes.author: Christopher Fry

quotes.quote: No matter how much strong coffee we drink, almost any after dinner speech will counteract it.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: I judge a restaurant by the bread and by the coffee.
quotes.author: Burt Lancaster

quotes.quote: Why do they always put mud into coffee on board steamers? Why does the tea generally taste of boiled boots?
quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quotes.quote: There isn't enough coffee in the United States to keep everyone awake during a Presidential election campaign.
quotes.author: Donald W. Brown

quotes.quote: There are various theories as to what characteristics, what combination of traits, what qualities in our men won [World War II]… but, speaking from my own observation of our armed forces, I should say the war was won on coffee.
quotes.author: Ilka Chase

quotes.quote: Making coffee has become the great compromise of the decade. It's the only thing "real" men do that doesn't seem to threaten their masculinity. To women, it's on the same domestic entry level as putting the spring back into the toilet-tissue holder or taking a chicken out of the freezer to thaw.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Almost all my middle-aged and elderly acquaintances, including me, feel about 25, unless we haven't had our coffee, in which case we feel 107.
quotes.author: Martha Beck

quotes.quote: I began wearing hats as a young lawyer because it helped me to establish my professional identity. Before that, whenever I was at a meeting, someone would ask me to get coffee.
quotes.author: Bella Abzug

quotes.quote: Coffee, (which makes the politician wise, / And see thro' all things with his half-shut eyes).
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: What would life be without coffee? But then, what is it even with coffee?
quotes.author: King Louis XV

quotes.quote: They said I could be anything, so I decided to be caffeinated!
quotes.author: Lizzie Chantree

quotes.quote: The irony of good customer service is that over time it will bring in more new customers than promotions and price slashing ever did!
quotes.author: Susan Ward

quotes.quote: If you're not serving the customer, your job is to be serving someone who is.
quotes.author: Jan Carlzon

quotes.quote: Be dramatically willing to focus on the customer at all costs, even at the cost of obsoleting your own stuff.
quotes.author: Scott D. Cook

quotes.quote: Thank your customer for complaining and mean it. Most will never bother to complain. They'll just walk away.
quotes.author: Marilyn Suttle

quotes.quote: Thank you for calling customer service. If you're calm and rational, press 1. If you're a whiner, press 2. If you're a hot head, press 3."
quotes.author: Randy Glasbergen

quotes.quote: There's a place in the world for any business that takes care of its customers-after the sale.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: A smile is a curve that sets things straight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The single most important thing is to make people happy. If you are making people happy, as a side effect, they will be happy to open up their wallets and pay you.
quotes.author: Derek Sivers

quotes.quote: Nobody cares how much you know, until they know how much you care.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Customer service is not a department, it's everyone's job.Â
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Your satisfaction is our top priority. So if you could try to act really satisfied, that would be a big help.
quotes.author: Randy Glasbergen

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as â€˜hard sell' and â€˜soft sell.' There's only â€˜smart sell' and â€˜stupid sell.'
quotes.author: Leo Burnett

quotes.quote: One customer well taken care of could be more valuable than $10,000 worth of advertising.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: If we can keep our competitors focused on us while we stay focused on the customer, ultimately we'll turn out all right.
quotes.author: Jeff Bezos

quotes.quote: Spend a lot of time talking to customers face to face. You'd be amazed how many companies don't listen to their customers.
quotes.author: Ross Perot

quotes.quote: Swallowing your pride occasionally will never give you indigestion.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Customers long to interact with - even relate to - employees who act like there is still a light on inside.
quotes.author: Chip Bell

quotes.quote: Although your customers won't love you if you give bad service, your competitors will.
quotes.author: Kate Zabriskie

quotes.quote: A satisfied customer â€” we should have him stuffed!
quotes.author: John Cleese

quotes.quote: You know your business model is broken when you're suing your customers.
quotes.author: Paul Graham

quotes.quote: If you have a job without aggravations, you don't have a job.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: The only thing worse than training employees and losing them is not training them and keeping them.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: I like to listen. I have learned a great deal from listening carefully. Most people never listen.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Customers who are merely satisfied remain your customers only as long as everything goes their way.
quotes.author: Chip Bell

quotes.quote: Customer: A person who indirectly pays for all your vacations, hobbies, and golf games and gives you the opportunity to better yourself.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Customers are like teeth. If you don't take care of them they go away one by one until there are none.
quotes.author: Jerry Flanagan

quotes.quote: It is not the employer who pays the wages. Employers only handle the money. It is the customer who pays the wages.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: Deep down, we believe that the problem put simply, is THEM. They, of course, believe WE are the problem.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A brand not responding on Twitter is like hanging up the phone on customers. With millions watching.
quotes.author: Dave Kerpen

quotes.quote: Good customer service costs less than bad customer service.
quotes.author: Sally Gronow

quotes.quote: The nature of any human being, certainly anyone on Wall Street, is 'the better deal you give the customer, the worse deal it is for you'.
quotes.author: Bernard Madoff

quotes.quote: There is only one boss. The customer. And he can fire everybody in the company from the chairman on down, simply by spending his money somewhere else.
quotes.author: Sam Walton

quotes.quote: Unless you have 100% customer satisfaction, you must improve.
quotes.author: Horst Schulze

quotes.quote: Sales without Customer Service is like stuffing money into a pocket full of holes.
quotes.author: David Tooman

quotes.quote: Right or wrong, the customer is always right.
quotes.author: Marshall Field

quotes.quote: One of the top ways CSRs can deal with stress is through humor. Exposing yourself to humor and determining the nature of your own sense of humor is the initial step in using this approach to cope with stress. When you laugh, it helps reduce muscle tension, release anger, deal with the unexpected, and increase your sense of overall joy.
quotes.author: Pattie Gibson

quotes.quote: Do you talk funny throughout the rest of your talk? This helps you to engage as many of the customers as you can on a personal level. If you look like you're enjoying it and you look happy, chances are other people will start to as well.
quotes.author: David Nihill

quotes.quote: An immediate attention-grabbing start with a strong laugh as he rapidly humanized your work. A great example of starting strong.
quotes.author: David Nihill

quotes.quote: Getting a quick laugh can be a great way to lighten the mood. Move forward from there with an anecdote or a personal story. This should establish affinity. It should tell them who you are, what your passion is, and why they should have your passion, too.
quotes.author: David Nihill

quotes.quote: It should be relevant and engaging and have the key elements of a good story as outlined in Comedy Habit. Start with a Story. The dopamine released with those early laughs will immediately put at ease, this will further drive engagement and break down barriers.
quotes.author: David Nihill

quotes.quote: Acknowledging the obvious is known in comedy as calling the room. It means vocalizing exactly what's going on in.
quotes.author: David Nihill

quotes.quote: Do you have an hour of funny Customer Service stories? or Could you make a Human Resource training film teaching people to get along better. Each time, I blurted out. Yes! Truthfully, I only had a vague notion of how to pull these things off, at the time.
quotes.author: Ross Shafer

quotes.quote: On his first day at the office, he showed up with a rubber chicken, just to make sure he always thought funny.
quotes.author: Ross Shafer

quotes.quote: There are a lot of funny people in my trade. So, I am acutely aware that if I don't give my customers more than what they expect, in my case laughs, they won't come back. And brother, I need them to come back. I need them to tell their friends and family I am funny. These laughers are my customer base. And I want them to be happy.
quotes.author: Ross Shafer

quotes.quote: A far-reaching exploration of the humour, wittiness and repartee dominant among the First Nations people of North America, as witnessed, experienced and created directly by themselves, and with the inclusion of outside but reputalbe sources necessarily familiar with the indigenous sense of humour as seen from an objective perspective.
quotes.author: Drew Hayden Taylor

quotes.quote: Being funny is hard work and not everyone is a natural. How to Be Funny is a witty guide that teaches readers precisely how to be funnier in everyday life.
quotes.author: Jon Macks

quotes.quote: Work at being funny, you will learn to use humor to, improve your public speaking, end an argument, avoid getting beaten yup, get a raise at work, make people think you're smart. You will see that being funny can make you more popular, enable you to pass the time in prison without being violated by large angry men.
quotes.author: Jon Macks

quotes.quote: Funny people get noticed at work. No, we're not talking about the idiot who photocopies his buttocks in the mailroom, or the moron who wastes valuable internet time forwarding non-original emails to everyone all day.
quotes.author: Jon Macks

quotes.quote: just see funny: Humor is an effective way to boost morale at work, connect with others on a ... People may laugh at that specific moment.
quotes.author: 2002 · ‎Snippet view

quotes.quote: One of the best ways to deal with stress in your life is through humor. Humor in the workplace can lead to more productive workers, which enhances profitability. Surrounding yourself with humor that you enjoy and determining the nature of
quotes.author: Pattie Odgers

quotes.quote: I remember the time I was kidnapped and they sent a piece of my finger to my father. He said he wanted more proof.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: You can tell what was the best year of your father's life, because they seem to freeze that clothing style and ride it out.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is pretending the present you love most is soap on a rope.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: To be a successful father, there's one absolute rule: when you have a kid, don't look at it for the first two years.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There should be a children's song, if you're happy and you know it, keep it to yourself and let your dad sleep.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: My daughter got me a World's Best Dad mug. So we know she's sarcastic.
quotes.author: Bob Odenkirk

quotes.quote: Men should always change diapers. It's a very rewarding experience. It's mentally cleansing. It's like washing dishes, but imagine if the dishes were your kids, so you really love the dishes.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: Remember: What dad really wants is a nap. Really.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Lately all my friends are worried that they're turning into their fathers. I'm worried that I'm not.
quotes.author: Dan Zevin

quotes.quote: My wife just let me know I'm about to become a father for the first time. The bad news is that we already have two kids.
quotes.author: Brian Kiley

quotes.quote: My sisters and I can still recite Dad's grilling rules: Rule No. 1: Dad is in charge. Rule No. 2: Repeat Rule No. 1.
quotes.author: Connie Schultz

quotes.quote: I gave my father $100 and said, Buy yourself something that will make your life easier. So he went out and bought a present for my mother.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I've been to war. I've raised twins. If I had a choice, I'd rather go to war.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: I know that if my mom fell and screamed for help, my dad would jump right up to rescue her as soon as it was halftime.
quotes.author: Bruce Cameron

quotes.quote: My dad used to say, always fight fire with fire, which is probably why he got thrown out of the the fire brigade.
quotes.author: Harry Hill

quotes.quote: I asked my dad for a BB gun, but he said we were a tribe of worriers, not warriors.
quotes.author: Hilary Price

quotes.quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: I love my dad, because even though he has Alzheimer's, he remembers the important things. He can't remember my name, but last week he told me exactly how much money I owe him.
quotes.author: Thyra Lees-Smith

quotes.quote: My father had a profound influence on me, he was a lunatic.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: When you're young, you think your dad is Superman. Then you grow up, and you realize he's just a regular guy who wears a cape.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: My father makes money the American way. He trips over stuff and sues people.
quotes.author: Dominic Dierkes

quotes.quote: My father refused to spend money on me as a kid. One time I broke my arm playing football, and my father tried to get a free x-ray by taking me down to the airport and making me lie down with the luggage.
quotes.author: Glenn Super

quotes.quote: Having children is like having a bowling alley installed in your brain.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: Dad taught me everything I know. Unfortunately, he didn't teach me everything he knows.
quotes.author: Al Unser

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is great because you can ruin someone from scratch.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: If you ever want to torture my dad, tie him up and right in front of him, refold a map incorrectly.
quotes.author: Cathy Ladman

quotes.quote: I'm so ugly. My father carries around a picture of the kid who came with his wallet.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Whenever I fail as a father or husband, a toy and a diamond always works.
quotes.author: Shahrukh Khan

quotes.quote: Dad always thought laughter was the best medicine, which I guess is why several of us died of tuberculosis.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: My father only hit me once, but he used a Volvo.
quotes.author: Bob Monkhouse

quotes.quote: Never raise your hand to your kids. It leaves your groin unprotected.
quotes.author: Red Buttons

quotes.quote: I don't have a kid, but I think that I would be a good father, especially if my baby liked to go out drinking.
quotes.author: Eugene Mirman

quotes.quote: A father is a man who expects his son to be as good a man as he meant to be.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: When I was a boy of 14, my father was so ignorant I could hardly stand to have the old man around. But when I got to be 21, I was astonished at how much the old man had learned in seven years.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: My father carries around the picture of the kid who came with his wallet.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: If the new American father feels bewildered and even defeated, let him take comfort from the fact that whatever he does in any fathering situation has a fifty percent chance of being right.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The older I get, the smarter my father seems to get.
quotes.author: Tim Russert

quotes.quote: A father carries pictures where his money used to be.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I never got along with my dad. Kids used to come up to me and say, My dad can beat up your dad. I'd say Yeah? When?
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family-the provider for all, and the enemy of all.
quotes.author: August Strindberg

quotes.quote: When I was a kid, I said to my father one afternoon, Daddy, will you take me to the zoo? He answered, If the zoo wants you, let them come and get you.
quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

quotes.quote: Those who can't dance say the music is no good.
quotes.author: Jamaican Proverb

quotes.quote: He who cannot dance says the stage is not ready
quotes.author: Tamil proverb

quotes.quote: Dancing is the art of getting your feet out of the way faster than your partner can step on them.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Part of the joy of dancing is conversation. Trouble is, some men can't talk and dance at the same time.
quotes.author: Ginger Rogers

quotes.quote: No one dances sober, unless he is insane.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Lesser dancers stumble, better dancers syncopate.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: There are short-cuts to happiness, and dancing is one of them.
quotes.author: Vicki Baum

quotes.quote: There is a bit of insanity in dancing that does everybody a great deal of good.
quotes.author: Edwin Denby

quotes.quote: Dance, even if you have nowhere to do it but your living room.
quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.quote: Dancing is a perpendicular expression of a horizontal desire.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: When I dance, people think I'm looking for my keys.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.quote: When people start dancing, they dance like they don't know they are doing it.
quotes.author: Nusrat Fateh Ali Khan

quotes.quote: Dance like nobody's looking.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Dance like no one is watching... Because they are not... They are checking their phone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dancing is wonderful training for girls, it's the first way you learn to guess what a man is going to do before he does it.
quotes.author: Christopher Morley

quotes.quote: Dancing is like a shower: one wrong turn and you're in hot water!
quotes.author: Mad Magazine

quotes.quote: We're fools whether we dance or not, so we might as well dance.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Dance first. Think later. It's the natural order.
quotes.author: Samuel Beckett

quotes.quote: Dance enables you to find yourself and lose yourself at the same time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Toe dancing is a dandy attention getter, second only to screaming.
quotes.author: Agnes deMille

quotes.quote: Dance isn't something that can be explained in words. It has to be danced.
quotes.author: Paige Arden

quotes.quote: Dancing is like bank robbery. It takes split-second timing.
quotes.author: Twyla Tharp

quotes.quote: Break dance not bones.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nice men marry dancers. Real men become Dancers!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Dance music is like a virus: it has affected so many different genres.
quotes.author: Avicii

quotes.quote: Dance for yourself. If someone understands, good. If not, no matter.
quotes.author: Louis Horst

quotes.quote: The one thing that can solve most of our problems is dancing.
quotes.author: James Brown

quotes.quote: Nobody cares if you can't dance well. Just get up and dance.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: When you dance, your purpose is not to get to a certain place on the floor. It's to enjoy each step along the way.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Do a loony goony dance Cross the kitchen floor, Put something silly in the world that ain't been there before.
quotes.author: Shel Silverstein

quotes.quote: Never give a sword to a man who can't dance.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: Dancing is like dreaming with your feet.
quotes.author: Constanze Mozart

quotes.quote: If you can't get rid of the skeleton in your closet, you'd best teach it to dance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance. Waiting for the bathroom.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: Dance like it hurts. Love like you need money. Work when people are watching.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: A charity ball is like a dance except it's tax deductible.
quotes.author: P.J. O’Rourke

quotes.quote: If a man doesn't know how to dance he doesn't know how to make love, there I said it!
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: If people stand in a circle long enough, they'll eventually begin to dance.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: It ain't no sin, to take off your skin and dance around in your bones.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: You can teach an elephant to dance, but the likelihood of its stepping on your toes is very high.
quotes.author: Gary Moss

quotes.quote: And those who were seen dancing were thought to be insane by those who could not hear the music.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Dance is a song of the body. Either of joy or pain.
quotes.author: Martha Graham

quotes.quote: Let your life lightly dance on the edges of time like dew on the tip of a leaf.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.quote: Love, the quest; marriage, the conquest; divorce, the inquest.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: The difference between a divorce and a legal separation is that a legal separation gives a husband time to hide his money.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: The only time my wife and I had a simultaneous orgasm was when the judge signed the divorce papers.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: To get over my divorce, I got a prescription to live at the Playboy Mansion for a while.
quotes.author: James Caan

quotes.quote: Whoever said Marriage is a 50-50 proposition laid the foundation for more divorce fees than any other short sentence in our language.
quotes.author: Austin Elliot

quotes.quote: Today, it is easier to get divorced in most states than to get a transmission repaired properly.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Marriages don't last. When I meet a guy, the first question I ask myself is: is this the man I want my children to spend their weekends with?
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I bequeath all my property to my wife on the condition that she remarry immediately. Then there will be at least one man to regret my death.
quotes.author: Heinrich Heine

quotes.quote: There are four stages in a marriage. First there's the affair, then the marriage, then children and finally the fourth stage, without which you cannot know a woman, the divorce.
quotes.author: Norman Mailer

quotes.quote: My wife Mary and I have been married for forty-seven years and not once have we had an argument serious enough to consider divorce. Murder, yes, but divorce, never.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: You know why divorces are so expensive? Because they're worth it.
quotes.author: Willie Nelson

quotes.quote: A 99-year-old man is filing for divorce from his 96-year-old wife, making them the world's oldest divorced couple. It's got to be weird when a divorce lawyer is fighting for your kids to get custody of you.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: Divorce is a declaration of independence with only two signers.
quotes.author: Gerald F. Lieberman

quotes.quote: I'd marry again if I found a man who had $15 million and would sign over half of it to me before the marriage and guarantee he'd be dead in a year.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: A divorce is like an amputation: you survive it, but there's less of you.
quotes.author: Margaret Atwood

quotes.quote: The happiest time of anyone's life is just after the first divorce.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: Getting divorced just because you don't love a man is almost as silly as getting married just because you do.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: A divorce lawyer is a chameleon with a law book.
quotes.author: Marvin Mitchelson

quotes.quote: Its easier to get a divorce than pass the driving test. Now its just a basic form-filling exercise.
quotes.author: Paul Coleridge

quotes.quote: Divorce is the psychological equivalent of a triple coronary bypass.
quotes.author: Mary Kay Blakely

quotes.quote: For a while we pondered whether to take a vacation or get a divorce. We decided that a trip to Bermuda is over in two weeks, but a divorce is something you always have.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I should have known something was wrong with my first wife. When I brought her home to meet my parents, they approved of her.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: You can't stay married in a situation where you are afraid to go to sleep in case your wife might cut your throat.
quotes.author: Mike Tyson

quotes.quote: Being divorced is like being hit by a Mack truck. If you live through it, you start looking very carefully to the right and to the left.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: In every marriage more than a week old, there are grounds for divorce. The trick is to find and continue to find grounds for marriage.
quotes.author: Robert Anderson

quotes.quote: My divorce came to me as a complete surprise. That's what happens when you haven't been home in eighteen years.
quotes.author: Lee Trevino

quotes.quote: She cried and the judge wiped her tears with my checkbook.
quotes.author: Tommy Manville

quotes.quote: When I divorced I went through the various stages of grieving: anger, denial, and dancing around with my settlement check.
quotes.author: Maura Kennedy

quotes.quote: The only solid and lasting peace between a man and his wife is, doubtless, a separation.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: Just another of our many disagreements. He wants a no fault divorce, whereas I would prefer to have the bastard crucified.
quotes.author: J. B. Handelsman

quotes.quote: A New York divorce is in itself a diploma of virtue.
quotes.author: Edith Wharton

quotes.quote: I got divorced recently. It was a mixed marriage. I'm human, he's Klingon.
quotes.author: Carol Leifer

quotes.quote: I'm not upset about my divorce. I'm only upset I'm not a widow.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Ah, yes, divorce from the Latin word meaning to rip out a man's genitals through his wallet.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: I look a divorce this way: it's better to have loved and lost, then to live with that bitch for the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Steve McGrew

quotes.quote: Workaholicism is such a tough addiction to get over. I had to divorce my wife because she was an enabler.
quotes.author: Dave Mordal

quotes.quote: Divorce sucks. Let me tell you, after five years of marriage, it is devastating to have the person with the good credit move out.
quotes.author: Rich Vos

quotes.quote: My husband and I have never considered divorce. Murder sometimes, but never divorce.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: He taught me housekeeping; when I divorce I keep the house.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: My mother always said don't marry for money, divorce for money.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.quote: Divorces are made in heaven.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: A lawyer is never entirely comfortable with a friendly divorce, anymore than a good mortician wants to finish his job and then have the patient sit up on the table.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Divorce, a bugle blast that separates the combatants and makes them fight at long range.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: In our family, we don't divorce our men, we bury them.
quotes.author: Ruth Gordon

quotes.quote: You should be prepared for anything during divorce proceedings, even the truth.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: In Palm Springs, they think homelessness is caused by bad divorce lawyers.
quotes.author: Garry Trudeau

quotes.quote: A lot of people have asked me how short I am. Since my last divorce, I think I'm about $100,000 short.
quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

quotes.quote: A bachelor is a selfish, undeserving guy who has cheated some woman out of a divorce.
quotes.author: Don Quinn

quotes.quote: American husbands are the best in the world; no other husbands are so generous to their wives, or can be so easily divorced.
quotes.author: Elinor Glyn

quotes.quote: War and drink are the two things man is never too poor to buy.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: Drink because you are happy, but never because you are miserable.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: One martini is alright, two is too many, three is not enough.
quotes.author: James Thurber

quotes.quote: An intelligent man is sometimes forced to be drunk to spend time with his fools.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Here's to alcohol, the rose colored glasses of life.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: The worst thing about some men is that when they are not drunk they are sober.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: The problem with the world is that everyone is a few drinks behind.
quotes.author: Humphrey Bogart

quotes.quote: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, That's as good as they're going to feel all day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: I try to convince myself that it's the alcohol talking. But alcohol can't talk. It just sits there. It can't even get itself out of the bottle.
quotes.author: David Levithan

quotes.quote: This is one of the disadvantages of wine: it makes a man mistake words for thought.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: A bottle of wine contains more philosophy that all the books in the world.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: There is no bad whiskey. There are only some whiskeys that aren't as good as others.
quotes.author: Raymond Chandler

quotes.quote: A man is a fool if he drinks before he reaches the age of 50, and a fool if he doesn't afterward.
quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quotes.quote: One can drink too much, but one never drinks enough.
quotes.author: Edward Burke

quotes.quote: Stay busy, get plenty of exercise, and don't drink too much. Then again, don't drink too little.
quotes.author: Herman Smith-Johannsen

quotes.quote: Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Give me a woman who loves beer and I will conquer the world.
quotes.author: Kaiser Wilhelm

quotes.quote: There comes a time in every woman's life when the only thing that helps is a glass of champagne.
quotes.author: Bette Davis

quotes.quote: Champagne for my real friends and real pain for my sham friends.
quotes.author: Tom Waits

quotes.quote: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: The first glass is for myself, the second for my friends, the third for good humor, and the forth for my enemies.
quotes.author: William Temple

quotes.quote: Better belly burst than good liquor be lost.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: I drink to make other people more interesting.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: There are more old drunkards than old physicians.
quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Everybody's got to believe in something. I believe I'll have another beer.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: A man's true character comes out when he's drunk.
quotes.author: Charlie Chaplin

quotes.quote: Man, being reasonable, must get drunk; the best of life is but intoxication.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: One reason I don't drink is that I want to know when I am having a good time.
quotes.author: Lady Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: Writer's block is a fancy term made up by whiners so they can have an excuse to drink alcohol.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: A drunk man's words are a sober man's thoughts.
quotes.author: Steve Fergosi

quotes.quote: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Alcohol is the anesthesia by which we endure the operation of life.
quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

quotes.quote: Drink today, and drown all sorrow; you shall perhaps not do tomorrow.
quotes.author: John Fletcher

quotes.quote: You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: He that drinks fast, pays slow.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: 24 hours in a day, 24 beers in a case. Coincidence?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: I know I should give up drinking; but I am not a quitter
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you ever reach total enlightenment while drinking beer, I bet it makes beer shoot out your nose.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: Either give me more wine or leave me alone.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: I am a drinker with writing problems.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: No soldier can fight unless he is properly fed on beef and beer.
quotes.author: John Churchill

quotes.quote: Good people drink good beer.
quotes.author: Hunter S. Thompson

quotes.quote: We drink and we die and continue to drink.
quotes.author: Dennis Leary

quotes.quote: I get no kick from champagne, / Mere alcohol doesn't thrill me at all, / So tell me why should it be true / That I get a kick out of you.
quotes.author: Cole Poter

quotes.quote: In 1969 I gave up women and alcohol. It was the worst 20 minutes of my life.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.quote: Alcohol...enables parliament to do things at eleven at night that no sane person would do at eleven in the morning.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I have a rare intolerance to herbs which means I can only drink fermented liquids, such as gin.
quotes.author: Julie Walters

quotes.quote: It was my uncle George who discovered that alcohol was a food well in advance of medical thought.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: And he that will go to bed sober, Falls with the leaf still in October.
quotes.author: John Fletcher

quotes.quote: Best while you have u have it use your breath, There is no drinking after death.
quotes.author: John Fletcher

quotes.quote: We drink one another's healths and spoil our own.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: Claret is the liquor for boys; port, for men; but he who aspires to be a hero must drink brandy.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: I always keep a supply of stimulant handy in case I see a snake— which I also keep handy.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Unfortunately, one of the by-products of drinking alcohol is not increased self-awareness; hence. the difficulty in letting a drinker know that he has had enough, that she has a drinking problem, or that he should not get behind the wheel of that car, especially if the car is still in the showroom.
quotes.author: Will & Grace

quotes.quote: My daddy, he'd walk forty miles for liquor but not forty inches for kindness.
quotes.author: Cold Mountain

quotes.quote: The chief reason for drinking is the desire to behave in a certain way, and to be able to blame it on alcohol.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: I drink too much. The last time I give a urine sample, it has an olive in it.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I don't drink anymore. I don't drink any less either.
quotes.author: Elsie (While You Were Sleeping)

quotes.quote: When it comes to drunks, we do our best because we would hope for and expect the same from our friends. Sometimes— okay, make that most of the time— things get a little messy, but that doesn't mean they can't get a little funny,too.
quotes.author: Will & Grace

quotes.quote: It takes only one drink to get me drunk. The trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: I distrust camels, and anyone else who can go a week without a drink.
quotes.author: Joe E. Ellis

quotes.quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I like to have a martini, two at the very most. After three I'm under the table, after four I'm under my host.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Too much of anything is bad, but too much Champagne is just right.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Time is never wasted when you're wasted all the time.
quotes.author: Catherine Zandonella

quotes.quote: Love makes the world go round? Not at all. Whiskey makes it go round twice as fast.
quotes.author: Compton Mackenzie

quotes.quote: The only time I ever enjoyed ironing was the day I accidentally got gin in the steam iron.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Alcohol removes inhibitions – like that scared little mouse who got drunk and shook his whiskers and shouted: “Now bring on that damn cat!
quotes.author: Eleanor Early

quotes.quote: My Grandmother is over eighty and still doesn't need glasses. Drinks right out of the bottle.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Not everyone who drinks is a poet. Some of us drink because we're not poets.
quotes.author: Dudley Moore

quotes.quote: When we drink, we get drunk. When we get drunk, we fall asleep. When we fall asleep, we commit no sin. When we commit no sin, we go to heaven. So, let’s all get drunk and go to heaven!
quotes.author: Brian O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Stop worrying about the potholes in the road and enjoy the journey.
quotes.author: Babs Hoffman

quotes.quote: Always focus on the front windshield and not the rear view mirror.
quotes.author: Colin Powell

quotes.quote: Americans will put up with anything provided it doesn’t block traffic.
quotes.author: Dan Rather

quotes.quote: Normal is getting dressed in clothes that you buy for work and driving through traffic in a car that you are still paying for in order to get to the job you need to pay for the clothes and the car, and the house you leave vacant all day so you can afford to live in it.
quotes.author: Ellen Goodman

quotes.quote: Driving fast on the track does not scare me. What scares me is when I drive on the highway I get passed by some idiot who thinks he is Fangio.
quotes.author: Juan Manuel Fangio

quotes.quote: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Men can read maps better than women cause only the male mind could conceive of one inch equaling a hundred miles.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Love may be the best driving wheel, but anger is a pretty good second.
quotes.author: Steven Tyler

quotes.quote: I couldn't repair your brakes, so I made your horn louder.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: There are two things no man will admit he cannot do well, drive and make love.
quotes.author: Stirling Moss

quotes.quote: You never really learn to swear until you learn to drive.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Never lend your car to anyone to whom you have given birth.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A tree never hits an automobile except in self defense.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Driving is a spectacular form of amnesia. Everything is to be discovered, everything to be obliterated.
quotes.author: Jean Baudrillard

quotes.quote: Until you've learned to drive, you've never really learned how to swear.
quotes.author: Robert Paul

quotes.quote: Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: People that insist upon drinking and driving, are putting the quart before the hearse.
quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: Why do you need a driver's license to buy liquor when you can't drink and drive?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The Easter Bunny ate all of the carrots we left for him. What a pig.
quotes.author: Steve Carell

quotes.quote: My mom used to say that Greek Easter was later because then you get stuff cheaper.
quotes.author: Amy Sedaris

quotes.quote: My favorite Catholic holiday is Easter. For those of you that don't know, Easter is the day we celebrate Jesus rising from the grave and coming back to Earth as a rabbit that hides colored eggs.
quotes.author: Adam Ferrara

quotes.quote: Easter is not a passport to another world; it is a quality of perception for this one.
quotes.author: W.P. Lemon

quotes.quote: Passover and Easter are the only Jewish and Christian holidays that move in sync, like the ice skating pairs we saw during the winter Olympics.
quotes.author: Marvin Olasky

quotes.quote: That first Easter must have been awkward, because you know the apostles had already divided up Jesus' stuff.
quotes.author: William Ader

quotes.quote: Happy Easter everyone! Jesus dies, comes back from the dead â€” and we get chocolate eggs. It's like turn-down service from God.
quotes.author: Dennis Leary

quotes.quote: Easter is so disappointing. You suffer all the way through lent, and what do you get for it? A ham.
quotes.author: Garrison Keillor

quotes.quote: I lied on my Weight Watchers list. I put down that I had 3 eggs... but they were Cadbury chocolate eggs.
quotes.author: Caroline Rhea

quotes.quote: Most people outside of America won't get it. It's the Easter bunny. It's another lie and I don't understand why we had to invent this character.
quotes.author: Todd Rundgren

quotes.quote: Easter has been cancelled - they found the body.
quotes.author: Jim Butcher

quotes.quote: There's nothing better than a good friend, except a good friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: If you believe in the Easter Bunny, it means you believe in a fat, purple bunny, which is pooping multi-color eggs in your garden.
quotes.author: Alex Antunes

quotes.quote: In your Easter bonnet, with all the frills upon it, you'll be the grandest lady in the Easter parade.
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: All I really need is love, but a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt!
quotes.author: Lucy Van Pelt

quotes.quote: Good Idea: Finding Easter eggs on Easter. Bad Idea: Finding Easter eggs on Christmas.
quotes.author: Jack Handy

quotes.quote: Unfortunately there is nothing more inane than an Easter carol. It is a religious perversion of the activity of Spring in our blood.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: Easter says you can put truth in a grave, but it won't stay there.
quotes.author: Clarence W. Hall

quotes.quote: If this is an Easter egg, then you must be the Easter Bunny.
quotes.author: Romeo Muller

quotes.quote: I'm waiting for the Easter Wabbit. When he comes in looking so fluffy and cute with his wittle basket of Easter eggs... BANG! Easter Wabbit stew.
quotes.author: Warren Foster

quotes.quote: The last time was Easter morning. The church bells were ringing.
quotes.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quotes.quote: I said a prayer that the Easter Bunny gets all his work done.
quotes.author: Joseph C. Cavella

quotes.quote: Rabbits are important. What about Easter time? Whenever you think of Easter, you think of the Easter bunny.
quotes.author: Yoram Gross

quotes.quote: I always felt Batman was best suited to the role of gritty urban crime detective, but now you guys have got him up against Santas, and Easter bunnies? I'm sorry, but that's not my Batman!
quotes.author: Paul Dini

quotes.quote: No presents for Christmas? That's like Easter without high-stakes poker.
quotes.author: Steven Levitan

quotes.quote: You're like Santa Claus and the Easter Bunny combined - just as charming, and just as fake.
quotes.author: Daniel Wallace

quotes.quote: Christmas and Easter bring wonderful treasures, but spirits and pumpkins bring far greater pleasures.
quotes.author: George Tibbles

quotes.quote: You'll just fall asleep and then you'll see Santa Claus and the Easter Bunny.
quotes.author: Thom Eberhardt

quotes.quote: Every day's a rebirth. Every day is Easter. Just remember to color your eggs happy colors, like yellow and baby blue.
quotes.author: Mark Ellinger

quotes.quote: Fun fact. Each year my mom has Easter tea with her friend named Bunny. Okay not that fun.
quotes.author: Carter Bays

quotes.quote: We have Christmas and Thanksgiving, and Easter, although we're not exactly sure we celebrate them on the right days.
quotes.author: Henry De Vere Stacpoole

quotes.quote: We are fighting for God's green earth and daytime and Christmas and Easter eggs and all that's sacred and good.
quotes.author: Alan Ball

quotes.quote: Easter. The joy of candy, colors, creativity and costuming. A season unlike any other.
quotes.author: Grant Morrison

quotes.quote: I believe in Santa Claus. I believe in the Easter Bunny. I believe in the Tooth Fairy. But I don't believe in you. This is battery acid. Now, you disappear!
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: Here comes Peter Cottontail / Hopping down the bunny trail / Hippity hopping, Easter's on its way
quotes.author: Jack Rollins

quotes.quote: Bringing every girl and boy / Baskets full of Easter joy / Things to make your Easter bright and gay
quotes.author: Jack Rollins

quotes.quote: Try to do the things you should / Maybe if you're extra good / He'll roll lots of Easter eggs your way
quotes.author: Jack Rollins

quotes.quote: You'll wake up on Easter morning / And you'll know that he was there / When you find those chocolate bunnies / That he's hiding everywhere
quotes.author: Jack Rollins

quotes.quote: Things will lighten up the sky / East At Easter / We'll go walking hand in hand / Cause all across the land it will be East At Easter
quotes.author: Charles Burchill

quotes.quote: I'll be all in clover / And when they look you over / I'll be the proudest fella / In the Easter parade!
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: In your Easter bonnet / With all the frills upon it / You'll be the grandest lady / In the Easter parade!
quotes.author: Irving Berlin

quotes.quote: March me down to the seven seas / Bury me with a ruby ring / Kiss me baby on an Easter Sunday day / Make my haze blow away / I said blow away
quotes.author: The Black Crowes

quotes.quote: I find a place I started from / The wild is calling, this time I follow / Easter parade
quotes.author: Paul Gnerard Buchana

quotes.quote: Throwing hats up in the air / A city perfect in every detail / Easter parade
quotes.author: Paul Gnerard Buchana

quotes.quote: Radio across the morning air / A crowd of people everywhere / And then the people, all running forward / Easter parade
quotes.author: Paul Gnerard Buchana

quotes.quote: You're the spirit of Christmas, my star on the tree / You're the Easter Bunny to Mummy and me
quotes.author: Edward Madden

quotes.quote: Christmas and Easter can be subjects for poetry, but Good Friday, like Auschwitz, cannot. The reality is so horrible it is not surprising that people should have found it a stumbling block to faith.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Do not abandon yourselves to despair. We are the Easter people and hallelujah is our song.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II (Karol Wojtyła)

quotes.quote: Easter is the only time when it's perfectly safe to put all your eggs in one basket.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Too many women think Easter Sunday is Decoration Day.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: There are always some churchgoers whom the preacher doesn't remember from one Easter to the next.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: After the egg hunt on Easter Sunday, a young farm boy decided to play a prank. He went to the chicken coop and replaced every single egg with a brightly colored one.
quotes.author: Jim Kraus

quotes.quote: Easter is not the celebration of the cost of sin, but of its end.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr.

quotes.quote: Easter is the celebration of out release and celebration from the crucifixion/ego thoughts to our acceptance of the resurrection/Holy Spirit's thoughts.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr.

quotes.quote: Easter is a sign of peace and forgiveness for Jesus, as well as all our brothers and sisters.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr.

quotes.quote: Easter is the symbol of releasing our grievances towards others, as well as ourselves.
quotes.author: Gene Skaggs Jr.

quotes.quote: Preparing for Easter is a concise, handy companion for the faithful of all Christian traditions and the curious to help them deepen their knowledge and consideration of this holy season.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Easter is seen as a time of spiritual preparation for the day we later celebrate and welcome the 'grand miracle' Christ accomplish through the cross.
quotes.author: C. S. Lewis

quotes.quote: Marriage is a three-ring circus. First the engagement ring, the the wedding ring, then the suffering.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: Never get married in the morning, because you never know who you'll meet that night.
quotes.author: Paul Hornung

quotes.quote: The most important four words for a successful marriage: â€˜I'll do the dishes.'
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Marriage is a workshopâ€¦ where husband works and wife shops.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Why do married people live longer than single people? I think it's because married people make a special effort to live longer than their partner â€“ just so they can have the last word.
quotes.author: Janet Periat

quotes.quote: Never try to impress a woman, because if you do she'll expect you to keep up the standard for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy marriage remainsâ€¦ a secret.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a deck of cards. In the beginning all you need is two hearts and a diamond. By the end, you wish you had a club and a spade.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The bonds of matrimony are like any other bonds â€“ they mature slowly.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: Marriage: A legal or religious ceremony by which two persons of the opposite sex solemnly agree to harass and spy on each other for ninety-nine years, or until death do them join.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Marriage is just a fancy word for adopting an overgrown male child who cannot be handled by his parents anymore.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Marriages don't work when one partner is happy and the other is miserable. Marriage is about both people being equally miserable.
quotes.author: Forget Paris

quotes.quote: They say marriages are made in heaven, but so is thunder and lightning.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: A good marriage is like a casserole: only those responsible for it really know what goes in it.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Marriage: It's an agreement in which a man loses his bachelor degree and a woman gains her masters.
quotes.author: Pacifist Ray

quotes.quote: Marriage lets you annoy one special person for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Marriage is a relationship in which one person is always right and the other is the husband!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man is incomplete until he is married. After that, he is finished.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: Marriage is nature's way of ensuring that a woman picks up some mothering experience before she has her first child.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: By all means marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy. If you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Marriage is just a fancy word for adopting an overgrown male child who cannot be handled by his parents anymore.
quotes.author: Genevieve Nnaji

quotes.quote: Always get married in the morning. That way if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted the whole day.
quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

quotes.quote: All marriages are happy. It's the living together afterward that causes all the trouble.
quotes.author: Raymond Hull

quotes.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Marrying a man is like buying something you've been admiring for a long time in a shop window. You may love it when you get it home, but it doesn't always go with everything else in the house.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: Spouse: someone who'll stand by you through all the trouble you wouldn't have had if you'd stayed single.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: The longest sentence you can form with two words is: I do.
quotes.author: H.L Mencken

quotes.quote: Engagement marks the end of a whirlwind romance and beginning of an eternal love story.
quotes.author: Rajeev Ranjan

quotes.quote: The highest happiness on earth is marriage.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Grow old with me! The best is yet to be.
quotes.author: Robert Browning

quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
quotes.author: Nora Ephron

quotes.quote: I couldn’t have dreamed you into existence because I didn’t even know I needed you. You must have been sent to me.
quotes.author: Kamand Kojouri

quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: Chains do not hold marriage together. It is threads, hundreds of tiny threads which sew people together through the years.
quotes.author: Simone Signoret

quotes.quote: And I’d choose you; in a hundred lifetimes, in a hundred worlds, in any version of reality, I’d find you and I’d choose you.
quotes.author: Kiersten White

quotes.quote: We have the greatest pre-nuptial agreement in the world. It’s called love.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: All commands from your lips are sweet, I say, and now have you not said the sweetest of all? Marry you!
quotes.author: Byron Caldwell Smith

quotes.quote: Marriages aren't fireproof. Sometimes you get burned.
quotes.author: Alex Kendrick

quotes.quote: For you I make the promise of fidelity / Now and for eternity / No one could replace this vow / For you I'd take your hand and heart / And everything / And add to them a wedding ring
quotes.author: Kenny Lerum

quotes.quote: It's a beautiful night / We're looking for something dumb to do / Hey baby / I think I wanna marry you
quotes.author: Ari Levine

quotes.quote: Is it the look in your eyes / Or is it this dancing juice? / Who cares baby / I think I wanna marry you
quotes.author: Ari Levine

quotes.quote: A great engagement doesn't just happen-you make it happen by setting realistic goal and then working hard to achieve them.
quotes.author: Zondervan

quotes.quote: Many couples enter engagement with already stressed family relationships.
quotes.author: Zondervan

quotes.quote: Having a great engagement in those months before you get marries could be compared to having a great pregnancy before you become parents.
quotes.author: Zondervan

quotes.quote: Transitional times are stressful, but having a great engagement can lead to a great marriage.
quotes.author: Zondervan

quotes.quote: Spend time reminding yourself of your goal to enjoy this engagement process, minimize external stress, and cherish your fiance.
quotes.author: Zondervan

quotes.quote: If you want a great engagement, set appropriate physical boundaries, get into accountability groups or same-sex friendships.
quotes.author: Greg Smalley

quotes.quote: If you want to increase your chances of having what we would consider a successful engagement, it's imperative that you visualize what needs to happen.
quotes.author: Greg Smalley

quotes.quote: God uses marriage to accomplish a very important goal - to help us become like Christ.
quotes.author: Greg Smalley

quotes.quote: The Bible takes engagement very seriously, and for that reason we should too.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: In modern Western culture, engagement is not a serious thing.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Many people today, particularly those of the youngest generations, are afraid of commitment. They don't want to be 'tied down.'
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Most of us view engagement as a 'trial period,' a chance to 'test the waters' before plunging into the deep ocean of marriage.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: As far as society is concerned, nothing is truly binding about engagement; nothing is really etched in stone.
quotes.author: Myles Munroe

quotes.quote: Engagement is a worthy declaration to the public, church or society that the couple is planning to marry soon.
quotes.author: Nurra Hooper

quotes.quote: Courtship may come after engagement but it may differ in some cultures, churches, communities and etc.
quotes.author: Nurra Hooper

quotes.quote: Some people or cultures take engagement as marriage.
quotes.author: Nurra Hooper

quotes.quote: Christian marriage is an institution ordained by God for the long-term relationship between one man and one woman.
quotes.author: Nurra Hooper

quotes.quote: Start your marriage respecting each other so that people around you will respect you.
quotes.author: Nurra Hooper

quotes.quote: Falling in love with someone and finding out they want to spend the rest of their life with you is one of the most exhilarating of all human experiences.
quotes.author: Gary Thomas

quotes.quote: Depending upon who you are and where you have been, each of you will have your own expectations about what love, romance, and marriage will look like.
quotes.author: Gary Thomas

quotes.quote: No matter whom you date and eventually marry, every one is a flawed sinner-beginning with you.
quotes.author: Gary Thomas

quotes.quote: Take time in pre-engagement or pre-marriage conversations to understand the balance of baggage and burdens vs blessings.
quotes.author: Gary Thomas

quotes.quote: Every wedding day is different, and every individual faces it with fears, delusions, fantasies, doubts, excitement, joy, laughter, and even tears.
quotes.author: Gary Thomas

quotes.quote: There is virtually nothing you can do that has more power to enhance your life than to build and protect a great and happy marriage.
quotes.author: Howard J. Markman

quotes.quote: The perfect marriage is a uniting of three persons--a man and a woman and God. That is what makes marriage holy.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Marriage is a holy bond because it permits two people to help each other work out their spiritual destinies. God declared marriage to be good.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Nothing brings more joy than a good marriage, and nothing brings more misery than a bad marriage.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: First there's the promise ring, then the engagement ring, then the wedding ring..soon after..comes suffer..ing!
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin; they just can't face each other, but still they stay together.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: Nowadays in other to reduce cost, engagement is done a day before the church wedding.
quotes.author: Cecilia Gbemisola Obisakin

quotes.quote: Often an engagement ring marking this obligation, is given by the man to his intended bride.
quotes.author: Cecilia Gbemisola Obisakin

quotes.quote: The ring not only signifies their intent to marry, but also publicly identifies the couple.
quotes.author: Cecilia Gbemisola Obisakin

quotes.quote: The engagement ring, on the fourth finger is a sign of promise and marriage commitment to someone who is very dear to your heart.
quotes.author: Cecilia Gbemisola Obisakin

quotes.quote: Families are like fudge - mostly sweet, with a few nuts.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: Home, nowadays, is a place where part of the family waits till the rest of the family brings the car back.
quotes.author: Earl Wilson

quotes.quote: A family is a unit composed not only of children but of men, women, an occasional animal, and the common cold.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: The advantage of growing up with siblings is that you become very good at fractions.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Children really can brighten up a house, because they never turn the lights off.
quotes.author: Ralph Bus

quotes.quote: All the men in my family were bearded, and most of the women.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: I grew up with six brothers. That's how I learned to dance -waiting for the bathroom.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: The advantage of having only one child is that you always know who did it.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
quotes.author: Buddy Hackett

quotes.quote: The reason grandparents and grandchildren get along so well is that they have a common enemy.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Having a child makes you a parent; having two, you are a referee.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: Nothing in life is fun for the whole family. There are no massage parlors with ice cream and free jewelry.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: The other night I ate at a real nice family restaurant. Every table had an argument going.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: One day you will do things for me that you hate. That is what it means to be family.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: From the ages of 8-18, me and my family moved around a lot. Mostly we would just stretch, but occasionally one of us would actually get up to go to the fridge.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Family is just accident...They don't mean to get on your nerves. They don't even mean to be your family, they just are.
quotes.author: Marsha Norman

quotes.quote: I think the family is the place where the most ridiculous and least respectable things in the world go on.
quotes.author: Ugo Betti

quotes.quote: If minutes were kept of a family gathering, they would show that members not present and subjects discussed were one and the same.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Family is a blessing. Just keep saying that when you are irritated by something a family member says.
quotes.author: Marcelina Hardy

quotes.quote: In the family sandwich, the older people and the younger ones can recognize one another as the bread. Those in the middle are, for a time, the meat.
quotes.author: Anna Quidlen

quotes.quote: In a household of toddlers and pets, we discover this rule of thumb about happy families, that they are least two-thirds incontinent.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Family: A social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with closet space.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I realized my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house.
quotes.author: Anthony Anderson

quotes.quote: If you cannot get rid of the family skeleton, you may as well make it dance.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The great advantage of living in a large family is that early lesson of life's essential unfairness.
quotes.author: Nancy Mitford

quotes.quote: In some families, please is described as the magic word. In our house, however, it was sorry.
quotes.author: Margaret Laurence

quotes.quote: If you don't believe in ghosts, you've never been to a family reunion.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Family love is messy, clinging, and of an annoying and repetitive pattern, like bad wallpaper.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Some family trees bear an enormous crop of nuts.
quotes.author: Wayne H.

quotes.quote: For the first time ever I was taking the family on the road. We stayed with my in-laws, which on life's list of experiences ranks right below sitting in a tub full of scissors.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: Humans are not proud of their ancestors, and rarely invite them round to dinner.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Never let an angry sister comb your hair.
quotes.author: Patricia McCann

quotes.quote: I know family comes first, but shouldn't that mean after breakfast?
quotes.author: Jeff Lindsay

quotes.quote: I looked up my family tree and found out I was the sap.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Your basic extended family today includes your ex-husband or -wife, your ex's new mate, your new mate, possibly your new mate's ex and any new mate that your new mate's ex has acquired.
quotes.author: Delia Ephron

quotes.quote: Family: a social unit where the father is concerned with parking space, the children with outer space, and the mother with the closet space.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I realized my family was funny, because nobody ever wanted to leave our house.
quotes.author: Anthony Anderson

quotes.quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
quotes.author: Buddy Hackett

quotes.quote: Children really brighten up a household. They never turn the lights off.
quotes.author: Ralph Bus

quotes.quote: All of us have moments in our lives that test our courage. Taking children into a house with white carpet is one of them.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Children are a great comfort in your old age-and they help you reach it faster, too.
quotes.author: Lionel Kauffman

quotes.quote: The advantage of growing up with siblings is that you become very good at fractions.
quotes.author: Robert Breault

quotes.quote: The reason grandparents and grandchildren get along so well is that they have a common enemy.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: When I was a kid, I said to my father one afternoon, Daddy, will you take me to the zoo? He answered, If the zoo wants you, let them come and get you.
quotes.author: Jerry Lewis

quotes.quote: I gave my father $100 and said, â€œBuy yourself something that will make your life easier.â€ So he went out and bought a present for my mother.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: My daughter got me a World's Best Dad mug. So we know she's sarcastic.
quotes.author: Bob Odenkirk

quotes.quote: Fathers Day, when you get that lethal combination of alcohol and new power tools.
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: I remember the time I was kidnapped and they sent a piece of my finger to my father. He said he wanted more proof.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: To be a successful father, there's one absolute rule: when you have a kid, don't look at it for the first two years.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: He has always provided me a safe place to land and a hard place from which to launch.
quotes.author: Chelsea Clinton

quotes.quote: My Father had a profound influence on me, he was a lunatic.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is pretending the present you love most is soap-on-a-rope.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Just once on Father's Day I wish my kids would give me a #1 Dad mug instead of one with my actual ranking.
quotes.author: Andy Borowitz

quotes.quote: When you're young, you think your dad is Superman. Then you grow up, and you realize he's just a regular guy who wears a cape.
quotes.author: Dave Attell

quotes.quote: I've been to war. I've raised twins. If I had a choice, I'd rather go to war.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: You can tell what was the best year of your father's life, because they seem to freeze that clothing style and ride it out.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: There should be a children's song: If you're happy and you know it, keep it to yourself and let your dad sleep.
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: She got her looks from her father. He's a plastic surgeon.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: For Father's Day we got my dad a t-shirt that says do not resuscitate. He wears it whenever mom takes him to the ballet.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: Dad always thought laughter was the best medicine, which I guess is why several of us died of tuberculosis.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: I just sit there and make up songs and sing to [my son] in gibberish. I'm very good at gibberish now.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: I want my son to wear a helmet 24 hours a day. If it was socially acceptable I'd be the first one to have my kid in a full helmet and like a cage across his face mask.
quotes.author: Will Arnett

quotes.quote: Father's Day is important because, besides being the day on which we honor Dad, it's the one day of the year that Brookstone does any business.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: I have mixed emotions when I receive my Fathers Day gifts. I'm glad my children remember me. I'm disappointed they think I dress like that.
quotes.author: Mike Dugan

quotes.quote: Never raise your hand to your kids. It leaves your groin unprotected.
quotes.author: Red Buttons

quotes.quote: Nouvelle Cuisine, roughly translated, means: I can't believe I paid ninety-six dollars and I'm still hungry.
quotes.author: Mike Kalin

quotes.quote: I always cook with wine. Sometimes I even add it to the food.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: After a good dinner one can forgive anybody, even one's own relations.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: An onion can make people cry but there's never been a vegetable that can make people laugh.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Strength is the capacity to break a chocolate bar into four pieces with your bare hands - and then eat just one of the pieces.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: I really don't think I need buns of steel. I'd be happy with buns of cinnamon.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Large, naked, raw carrots are acceptable as food only to those who live in hutches eagerly awaiting Easter.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: I come from a family where gravy is considered a beverage.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I don't eat lobsters, shrimp, or crawfish because I don't eat anything that looks like I should step on it.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Seize the moment. Remember all those women on the "Titanic" who waved off the dessert cart.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The most remarkable thing about my mother is that for thirty years she served the family nothing but leftovers. The original meal has never been found.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: Cauliflower is nothing but cabbage with a college education.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Vegetables are a must on a diet. I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: The 12-step chocoholics program: Never be more than 12 steps away from chocolate!
quotes.author: Terry Moore

quotes.quote: A slice of pie without cheese is like a kiss without a squeeze.
quotes.author: Stephen King

quotes.quote: At a formal dinner party, the person nearest death should always be seated closest to the bathroom.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: As a child my family's menu consisted of two choices: take it or leave it.
quotes.author: Buddy Hackett

quotes.quote: Never order barbecue in a place that also serves quiche.
quotes.author: Lewis Grizzard

quotes.quote: Life expectancy would grow by leaps and bounds if green vegetables smelled as good as bacon.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Americans will eat garbage provided you sprinkle it liberally with ketchup.
quotes.author: Henry James

quotes.quote: Do you know what breakfast cereal is made of? It's made of all those little curly wooden shavings you find in pencil sharpeners!
quotes.author: Roald Dahl

quotes.quote: When the waitress asked if I wanted my pizza cut into four or eight slices, I said, 'Four. I don't think I can eat eight.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: I'll have a double cappuccino, half-caf, non-fat milk, with enough foam to be aesthetically pleasing, but not so much that it would leave a moustache.
quotes.author: Niles Crane

quotes.quote: Humor keeps us alive. Humor and food. Don't forget food. You can go a week without laughing.
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Sacred cows make the best hamburger.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The trouble with eating Italian food is that five or six days later, you're hungry again.
quotes.author: George Miller

quotes.quote: I'm not sure what makes pepperoni so good if it's the pepper or the oni.
quotes.author: Ulrik Stephens

quotes.quote: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.quote: Red meat is not bad for you. Now, blue-green meat, that's bad for you!
quotes.author: Tom Smothers

quotes.quote: It's so beautifully arranged on the plate - you know someone's fingers have been all over it.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Cakes are healthy too, you just eat a small slice.
quotes.author: Mary Berry

quotes.quote: Fish is the only food that is considered spoiled once it smells like what it is.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: Promises and pie-crust are made to be broken.
quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

quotes.quote: I've been on a diet for two weeks and all I've lost is two weeks.
quotes.author: Totie Fields

quotes.quote: Anything is good if it's made of chocolate.
quotes.author: Jo Brand

quotes.quote: Watermelon - it's a good fruit. You eat, you drink, you wash your face.
quotes.author: Enrico Caruso

quotes.quote: Wait. Why am I thinking about Krispy Kremes? We're supposed to be exercising.
quotes.author: Meg Cabot

quotes.quote: Snack time heals all wounds.
quotes.author: Bridger Winegar

quotes.quote: Eat food. Not too much. Mostly plants.
quotes.author: Michael Pollan

quotes.quote: Your diet is a bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.quote: We are living in a world today where lemonade is made from artificial flavors and furniture polish is made from real lemons.
quotes.author: Alfred E. Newman
