quotes.quote: Probably one of the most private things in the world is an egg before it is broken.
quotes.author: M.F.K. Fisher

quotes.quote: A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Food is our common ground, a universal experience.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: We all eat, and it would be a sad waste of opportunity to eat badly.
quotes.author: Anna Thomas

quotes.quote: Never eat more than you can lift.
quotes.author: Miss Piggy

quotes.quote: Food, glorious food! / Hot sausage and mustard! / While we're in the mood / Cold jelly and custard! / Peas, pudding and / saveloys! / What next is the question? / Rich gentlemen have it, boys / Indigestion!
quotes.author: Lionel Bart

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When you see a couple walking down the street holding hands and laughing, you look over to your side and the only thing you're holding is a half eaten sandwich.
quotes.author: Violet Matters

quotes.quote: The only thing I like better than talking about food is eating.
quotes.author: John Walters

quotes.quote: Wine is botled poetry.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: If we shake out all of the crumbs from all of the keyboards in the world, we can end world hunger
quotes.author: Matthew Dolkart

quotes.quote: There is no love sincerer than the love of food.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Soup is just a way of screwing you out of a meal.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.quote: Food is symbolic of love when words are inadequate.
quotes.author: Alan D. Wolfelt

quotes.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt.
quotes.author: Charles M. Shulz

quotes.quote: Togetherness, exactly. You can't make pizza without cheese. Well, you could, but it would just be bad pizza, though.
quotes.author: Brendan Leonard

quotes.quote: Food always comes to those who love to cook.
quotes.author: Brad Bird

quotes.quote: The most heavily advertised foods are consumed the most. No surprise.
quotes.author: Morgan Spurlock

quotes.quote: When there was food it was very much a comfort for me, I'm definitely a food addict.
quotes.author: Julie

quotes.quote: Food? That's ridiculous. Why would anyone wanna bury food? Hm. Unless they're trying to age it for flavor.
quotes.author: Duane Capizzi

quotes.quote: Why don't we make natural foods? They're better bound for people's health.
quotes.author: Jay Sommers

quotes.quote: I love watermelons but I believe you got to kill it to eat it.
quotes.author: Sergeant R. Lee Ermey

quotes.quote: Food is... love. You cooking with love, good food. You make people happy. You artiste! Not small not small.
quotes.author: Gauri Shinde

quotes.quote: Fast food, feed me fast / I've been waiting for an aeon / And I just won't last / I want fast food, I want food fast
quotes.author: Peter Dennis Blanford Townshend

quotes.quote: The lettuce heads cried, 'don't chop us in half' / And they screamed for their vegetable lives / The cook just smiled, and he let out a laugh / And his eyes shone like knives
quotes.author: Robert Steven Reiser

quotes.quote: The cream separated, and the milk was skimmed / And the fork ran away with the spoon / The curtains were drawn, and the lights were dimmed / And music filled the room
quotes.author: Robert Steven Reiser

quotes.quote: Food, glorious food! / We're anxious to try it / Three banquets a day / Our favorite diet!
quotes.author: Lionel Bart

quotes.quote: Food is, of course, everywhere, and is inextricably bound to our daily lives.
quotes.author: Amelia Carruthers

quotes.quote: Food' is rife with contradictions. It is a corporal pleasure turned into the eternal sin of gluttony, as well as a vehicle for community, friendship and sharing that is, on a personal level, intractably individual.
quotes.author: Amelia Carruthers

quotes.quote: Part of the secret of a success in life is to eat what you like and let the food fight it out inside.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Good food is the foundation of genuine happiness.
quotes.author: Georges Auguste Escoffier

quotes.quote: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food.
quotes.author: Hippocrates

quotes.quote: For those to whom food and fine dining are readily available, it represents freedom and community, for those lacking this most fundamental of needs, it is an all consuming concern.
quotes.author: Amelia Carruthers

quotes.quote: Food has social meaning and significance beyond its nutritive function; it is also expressive.
quotes.author: University of Clifornia Press

quotes.quote: Food is a basic thing that humans want and need in order to live together in societies.
quotes.author: University of Clifornia Press

quotes.quote: Food is central to religious traditions throughout the world.
quotes.author: University of Clifornia Press

quotes.quote: Food is object of hunger and desire.
quotes.author: University of Clifornia Press

quotes.quote: Food is not only about nutrition. Mealtimes can be an opportunity for caring and thoughtfulness.
quotes.author: Grethe Berg

quotes.quote: Food is vital, but also associated with enjoyment.
quotes.author: Grethe Berg

quotes.quote: Bananas are one of my loveliest fruit ever! Only one is enough to make you feel happy and relaxed as well!
quotes.author: Alexandra Slattenschek

quotes.quote: We cannot survive without food, but more importantly, we cannot by healthy and happy without the right foods.
quotes.author: Karen Wang Diggs

quotes.quote: Every time you eat a hamburger you are having a relationship with thousands of people you never met.
quotes.author: John Robbins

quotes.quote: Something about the smell of creamed butter and sugar or just-baked cookies wafting in the air makes everything seem right.
quotes.author: Rebecca Firth

quotes.quote: Baking a batch of cookies will bring back enthusiasm to youngsters who are 'dying or boredom.'
quotes.author: Jean Paré

quotes.quote: Hot dogs are the essence of summer. Hot dogs are one of our favorite comfort foods, evoking fond memories of childhood and fun times at picnics and family cookouts.
quotes.author: Becky Mercuri

quotes.quote: Fruit and vegetables have been an important constituent of the human diet from time immemorial.
quotes.author: Cranfield University

quotes.quote: Fruit and vegetables are doubtless eaten for their unique taste and flavor, yet their health and healing properties have been known for centuries.
quotes.author: Cranfield University

quotes.quote: The ideal peach will be full of sweetness and juice and free of bruises.
quotes.author: Kelly Alexander

quotes.quote: You always have the power of choice and the power to heal your body. You have choice over your thoughts,actions, words and every morsel you eat.
quotes.author: Joy McCarthy

quotes.quote: Let's be frank, the Italians' technological contribution to humankind stopped with the pizza oven.
quotes.author: Bill Bryson

quotes.quote: Lunch Hollywood-style---a hot dog and vintage wine.
quotes.author: Harry Kurnitz

quotes.quote: Garlic bread--it's the future, I've tasted it.
quotes.author: Peter Kay

quotes.quote: Sue wants a barbecue, Sam wants to boil a ham, Grace votes for bouillabaisse stew, Jake wants a weeny-baker, steak and a layer cake, He'll get a tummy ache too.
quotes.author: Johnny Mercer

quotes.quote: People often feed the hungry so that nothing may disturb their own enjoyment of a good meal.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Never serve oysters in a mouth that has no paycheck in it.
quotes.author: P.J.O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Cheese it is a peevish elf. It digest all things but itself.
quotes.author: John Ray

quotes.quote: An egg is always an adventure.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: When I ask for a watercress sandwich, I do not mean a load with a field in the middle of it.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: One doughnut doesn't do a thing. You've got to eat twenty a day for five weeks before you get results.
quotes.author: Renee Zellweger

quotes.quote: Football is like life - it requires perseverance, self-denial, hard work, sacrifice, dedication and respect for authority.
quotes.author: Vince Lombardi

quotes.quote: American football makes rugby look like a Tupperware party.
quotes.author: Sue Lawley

quotes.quote: We can't run. We can't pass. We can't stop the run. We can't stop the pass. We can't kick. Other than that, we're just not a very good football team right now.
quotes.author: Bruce Coslet

quotes.quote: Football is, after all, a wonderful way to get rid of your aggressions without going to jail for it.
quotes.author: Heywood Hale Braun

quotes.quote: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I wouldn't ever set out to hurt anyone deliberately unless it was, you know, important -like a league game or something.
quotes.author: Dick Butkus

quotes.quote: It was really difficult for us, playing in the midday sun with that three o'clock kick-off.
quotes.author: David Beckham

quotes.quote: The reason women don't play football is because 11 of them would never wear the same outfit in public.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Most football players are temperamental. That's 90% temper and 10% mental.
quotes.author: Doug Plank

quotes.quote: The thing about football - the important thing about football - is that it is not just about football.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: You get hit the hardest when trying to run or hide from a problem. Like the defense on a football field, putting all focus on evading only one defender is asking to be blindsided.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: I like football. I find its an exciting strategic game. Its a great way to avoid conversation with your family at Thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

quotes.quote: Football is the ballet of the masses.
quotes.author: Dmitri Shostakovich

quotes.quote: Football: A sport that bears the same relation to education that bullfighting does to agriculture.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: [Books are] vital to learning. Half the population don't go to football matches but that doesn't make football any less important.
quotes.author: John Sutherland

quotes.quote: But a college needs something else besides education. And what this college needs is a good football team and you can't have a good football team unless you have good football players.
quotes.author: Bert Kalmar

quotes.quote: No, I love football, I think it's a great sport but in this case, I don't think football likes me.
quotes.author: Julie Plec

quotes.quote: Some human institution confuse me but football is a total mystery.
quotes.author: Glen A. Larson

quotes.quote: Oh please, shoes are way more petty than a football game!
quotes.author: David Litt

quotes.quote: Football practice - - where men are men and necks are nothing.
quotes.author: Sam Taylor

quotes.quote: The football field is not a place for you to be using your powers to save the day.
quotes.author: Alfred Gough

quotes.quote: Winning football games is too small a thing to live for. And I love football as much as anybody. But even championship trophies will collect dust and one day be forgotten. It's just that so far this has all been about us.
quotes.author: Alex Kendrick

quotes.quote: Football is the most popular sport in America because it is so fantastic. And that, right there?
quotes.author: Peter Landesman

quotes.quote: Life holds many pleasures for me. But... nothing... nothing beats the thrill of playing on that field every Sunday. Football is my life. Beyond the field, nothing else matters.
quotes.author: Nichole Millard

quotes.quote: I had it all: career, someone I loved. Football gave me everything and then took it all away.
quotes.author: Dick Wolf

quotes.quote: Football possesses its own community of followers but the sport also imposes itself of broader communities, upon which it has various impacts.
quotes.author: Brendon Batson

quotes.quote: Football is regarded as a 'representational' sport.
quotes.author: Brendon Batson

quotes.quote: The beautiful moments of football might be rare, but it is not surprising that they get a disproportionately large share of the attention.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: Teams that win ugly, playing football the wrong way, will find that they do not endure in the fans' heart. Football is capable of far more than that.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: If you aim for beauty in football, then you will not get it. If you sim instead to win, then that is when you might create beauty.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: In the cases of both happiness and aesthetics in football, it is plausible that this unexpected structure is exhibited.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: The philosophy of win at all costs also produces what is ugly in football.
quotes.author: Stephen Mumford

quotes.quote: Football players run, pass, and push as they try to score and stop their opponents from scoring.
quotes.author: John Crossingham

quotes.quote: Football is a rough sport, so protection is seriously--even during a practice.
quotes.author: John Crossingham

quotes.quote: Football is a very popular sport that is played by people of all ages, from grade-schoolers to trained professionals.
quotes.author: Siyavush Saidian

quotes.quote: Football grew out of the sports of rugby and soccer.
quotes.author: Ray McClellan

quotes.quote: But, ultimately, we are all slaves to our culture, our understanding, our genetic code, and this is what makes the game of football not just the world's favorite pastime, but an endlessly fascinating study of human endeavor.
quotes.author: Craig Foster

quotes.quote: Football is the game played when the people of the world come together. It is the common language that unites everyone no matter their race, nationality, culture and religious background.
quotes.author: Craig Foster

quotes.quote: Football has also been used as a kind of peace offering.
quotes.author: Craig Foster

quotes.quote: This is a game that knows no boundaries, respect no borders, and asks for no treaties or accords beginning its work. Football works only to bring people together.
quotes.author: Craig Foster

quotes.quote: If football is the world's most popular sport, and if Brazil is football's most successful nation, then the consequences of such a reputation must be far-reaching and unique.
quotes.author: Alex Bellos

quotes.quote: The happiness promised by football is of course over-determined.
quotes.author: Sara Ahmed

quotes.quote: Football signifies not only the national game but also the opportunity for new identifications, where you can embody hope for the nation by filling up an empty place alongside its national hero.
quotes.author: Sara Ahmed

quotes.quote: By implications, the world of football promises freedom, allowing you not only to be happy but to become a happy object, by bringing happiness to others, who cheer as you score.
quotes.author: Sara Ahmed

quotes.quote: Give us all a touchdown / Football is our heart and soul / It's Thursday night football / And we're ready to go!
quotes.author: Tommy Ramone

quotes.quote: Yeah, I need some action / And some satisfaction / The crowd's going crazy / We love football
quotes.author: Tommy Ramone

quotes.quote: Football's coming home / Everyone seems to know the score / They've seen it all before / They just know / They're so sure
quotes.author: David Baddiel

quotes.quote: A football tradition / So everybody get up / And feast your eyes / On the highlight of small town life / It's Friday night
quotes.author: Brantley Keith Gilbert

quotes.quote: The only thing that lasts longer than a friend's love is the stupidity that keeps us from knowing any better.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: I have three kinds of friends: those who love me, those who pay no attention to me, and those who detest me.
quotes.author: Sébastien-Roch Nicolas

quotes.quote: If you have good friends, no matter how much life is sucking, they can make you laugh.
quotes.author: P.C. Cast

quotes.quote: A true friend is one who overlooks your failures and tolerates your success.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Friendship is being there when someone's feeling low and not being afraid to kick them.
quotes.author: Randy K. Milholland

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends.
quotes.author: John Churton Collins

quotes.quote: Nothing makes you happier than your friend's failure.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Real friends don't get offended when you insult them. They smile and call you something even more offensive.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We are best friends. Always remember that when you fall, I'll pick you up, after I finish laughing.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Being friendless taught me how to be a friend. Funny how that works.
quotes.author: Colleen Wainwright

quotes.quote: Friends come and go, like the waves of the ocean, but the true ones stay, like an octopus on your face.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends buy you a lunch. Best friends eat your lunch.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Friends were like clothes: fine while they lasted but eventually they wore thin or you grew out of them.
quotes.author: David Nicholls

quotes.quote: Nothing more cheerful than talking about our friend's shortcomings.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Friendship is like peeing in your pants. Everyone can see it, but only you can feel the warm feeling inside.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I don't like to commit myself about heaven and hell - you see, I have friends in both places.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A friend doesn't go on a diet because you are fat.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: True friendship comes when the silence between two people is comfortable.
quotes.author: David Tyson

quotes.quote: If your friends don't make fun of you, they're not really your friends.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A true friend stabs you in the front.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Friends give you a shoulder to cry on. But best friends are ready with a shovel to hurt the person that made you cry.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Treat your friend as if he might become an enemy.
quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

quotes.quote: A friend is like a good bra: hard to find, comfortable, supportive, always lifts you up, makes you look better, never lets you down or leaves you hanging, and always close to your heart.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No one is completely unhappy at the failure of his best friend.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A friend is one who has the same enemies as you have.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: Most people enjoy the inferiority of their best friends.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: I always like to know everything about my new friends, and nothing about my old ones.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: One good reason to only maintain a small circle of friends is that three out of four murders are committed by people who know the victim.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: God gave us our relatives; thank God we can choose our friends.
quotes.author: Ethel Mumford

quotes.quote: Good friends don't let you do stupid thingsâ€¦alone.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: An old friend will help you move. A good friend will help you move a dead body.
quotes.author: Jim Hayes

quotes.quote: He's the kind of friend who will always be there when he needs you.
quotes.author: Adam Christing

quotes.quote: Having friends you like who are like you is a form of narcissism.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peters

quotes.quote: I don't need a friend who changes when I change and who nods when I nod; my shadow does that much better.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.quote: When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun.'
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
quotes.author: Jane Austen

quotes.quote: Show me a friend in need and I'll show you a pest.
quotes.author: Joe Lewis

quotes.quote: Only your real friends will tell you when your face is dirty.
quotes.author: Silican proverb

quotes.quote: A friend who is near and dear may in time become as useless as a relative.
quotes.author: George Ade

quotes.quote: Between friends, differences in taste or opinion are irritating in direct proportion to their triviality.
quotes.author: W.H. Auden

quotes.quote: Laughing at our friends, we avenge the disappointment they have caused.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: It is the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: It is not enough to succeed, a friend must fail.
quotes.author: La Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: A friend in need is a friend to be avoided.
quotes.author: Samuel Hall Lord

quotes.quote: I don't like to commit myself about heaven and hell - you see, I have friends in both places.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never join with your friend when he abuses his horse or his wife, unless the one is about to be sold, the other to be buried.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: A true friend is someone who thinks that you are a good egg even though he knows that you are slightly cracked.
quotes.author: Bernard Meltzer

quotes.quote: When you're in jail, a good friend will be trying to bail you out. A best friend will be in the cell next to you saying, 'Damn, that was fun.'
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Friends are people who know you really well and like you anyway.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
quotes.author: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.quote: One sure way to lose another woman's friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements.
quotes.author: Marcelene Cox

quotes.quote: There are three faithful friends, an old wife, an old dog, and ready money
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: A good friend will help you move. But a best friend will help you move a dead body.
quotes.author: Jim Hayes

quotes.quote: There is nothing better than a friend, unless it is a friend with chocolate.
quotes.author: Linda Grayson

quotes.quote: A good friend is a connection to life - a tie to the past, a road to the future, the key to sanity in a totally insane world.
quotes.author: Lois Wyse

quotes.quote: You don't lose friends because real friends can never be lost. You lose people masquerading as friends and you're better for it
quotes.author: Mandy Hale

quotes.quote: Men kick friendship around like a football and it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it falls to pieces.
quotes.author: Anne Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and to have her nonsense respected.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: Friendship will not stand the strain of very much good advice for very long.
quotes.author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quotes.quote: The imaginary friends I had as a kid dropped me because their friends thought I didn't exist.
quotes.author: Aaron Machado

quotes.quote: I have lost friends, some by death...others by sheer inability to cross the street.
quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

quotes.quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quotes.quote: Only your real friends will tell you when your face is dirty.
quotes.author: Silican proverb

quotes.quote: I bet dying vultures have lots of awkward moments with their friends.
quotes.author: Guy Endore-Kaiser

quotes.quote: Show me a genuine case of platonic friendship, and I shall show you two old or homely faces.
quotes.author: Austin O'Malley

quotes.quote: My mother used to say that there are no strangers, only friends you haven't met yet. She's now in a maximum security twilight home in Australia.
quotes.author: Dame Edna Everage

quotes.quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
quotes.author: Margaret Walker

quotes.quote: You can't make a circle of friends with a compass.
quotes.author: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quotes.quote: When a woman becomes her own best friend life is easier
quotes.author: Diane Von Furstenberg

quotes.quote: Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I've always said that in politics, your enemies can't hurt you, but your friends will kill you.
quotes.author: Ann Richards

quotes.quote: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Whoever says Friendship is easy has obviously never had a true friend!
quotes.author: Bronwyn Polson

quotes.quote: I thank God for creating gay men. Because if it wasn't for them, us fat women would have no one to dance with.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Bisexuality immediately doubles your chances for a date on Saturday night.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: My brother is gay and my parents don't care, as long as he marries a doctor.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: Why is it that, as a culture, we are more comfortable seeing two men holding guns, than holding hands?
quotes.author: Ernest Gaines

quotes.quote: My cousins gay, I always tell him that in our family tree, he's in the fruit section.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I once had a large gay following, but I ducked into an alleyway and lost him.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: We had gay burglars the other night. They broke in and rearranged the furniture.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: The sodomy laws have been overturned, so now we can overturn each other.
quotes.author: Craig Kilborn

quotes.quote: They say you can't tell guys are gay just by looking. But if two guys are kissing, you can figure at least one of them is gay.
quotes.author: Bill Braudis

quotes.quote: My high school had a Head Start program for homosexuals, it was called Drama Club.
quotes.author: Bob Smith

quotes.quote: The heterosexuals who hate us should just stop having us.
quotes.author: Lynda Montgomery

quotes.quote: When I was in the military, they gave me a medal for killing two men and a discharge for loving one.
quotes.author: Leonard Matlovich

quotes.quote: A dreamcatcher works, if your dream is to be gay.
quotes.author: Demetri Martin

quotes.quote: Let me tell you about gays in the military. I don't want any gay people hanging around me while I'm killing kids. I just don't want to see it.
quotes.author: Bill Hicks

quotes.quote: Every gay guys GPS system would tell him to go straight.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: I'm actually all for gay marriage. Just the thought of having a man around the house.
quotes.author: Daniel Tosh

quotes.quote: My cousin is gay, in school while other kids were dissecting frog, he was opening flies.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: The only queer people are those who don't love anybody.
quotes.author: Rita Mae Brown

quotes.quote: The single best thing about coming out of the closet is that nobody can insult you by telling you what you've just told them.
quotes.author: Rachel Maddow

quotes.quote: Self pity becomes your oxygen. But you learned to breathe it without a gasp. So, nobody even notices you're hurting.
quotes.author: Paul Monette

quotes.quote: Sweet mother, I cannot weave – slender Aphrodite has overcome me with longing for a girl.
quotes.author: Sappho

quotes.quote: Democracy! Bah! When I hear that I reach for my feather boa!
quotes.author: Allen Ginsberg

quotes.quote: Let's make a law that gay people can have birthdays, but straight people get more cake--you know, to send the right message to kids.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: I think God is a callous bitch not making me a lesbian. I'm deeply disappointed by my sexual interest in men.
quotes.author: Diamanda Galás

quotes.quote: My own belief is that there is hardly anyone whose sexual life, if it were broadcast, would not fill the world at large with surprise and horror.
quotes.author: W Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It angered him that his sexuality was an issue at all. As far as he was concerned, who he decided to sleep with was his business alone.
quotes.author: Christina Westover

quotes.quote: The tide of history only advances when people make themselves fully visible.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter what you do in the bedroom as long as you don't do it in the street and frighten the horses.
quotes.author: Daphne Fielding

quotes.quote: Rejecting your gay or transgender child won't make them straight. It will only mean you will lose them.
quotes.author: Christina Engela

quotes.quote: I hate the word homophobia. It's not a phobia. You're not scared. You're an asshole.
quotes.author: Morgan Freeman

quotes.quote: It always seemed to me a bit pointless to disapprove of homosexuality. It's like disapproving of rain.
quotes.author: Francis Maude

quotes.quote: Openness may not completely disarm prejudice, but it's a good place to start.
quotes.author: Jason Collins

quotes.quote: When all Americans are treated as equal, no matter who they are or whom they love, we are all more free.
quotes.author: President Barack Obama

quotes.quote: If homosexuality is a disease, let's all call in queer to work: 'Hello. Can't work today, still queer.'
quotes.author: Robin Tyler

quotes.quote: This world would be a whole lot better if we just made an effort to be less horrible to one another.
quotes.author: Ellen Page

quotes.quote: We should indeed keep calm in the face of difference, and live our lives in a state of inclusion and wonder at the diversity of humanity.
quotes.author: George Takei

quotes.quote: It takes some intelligence and insight to figure out you're gay and then a tremendous amount of balls to live it and live it proudly.
quotes.author: Jason Bateman

quotes.quote: Being gay is natural. Hating gay is a lifestyle choice.
quotes.author: John Fugelsang

quotes.quote: I think being gay is a blessing, and it's something I am thankful for every single day.
quotes.author: Anderson Cooper

quotes.quote: Never be bullied into silence. Never allow yourself to be made a victim. Accept no one's definition of your life; define yourself.
quotes.author: Harvey Fierstein

quotes.quote: The poetry you read has been written for you, each of you - black, white, Hispanic, man, woman, gay, straight.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: The beauty of standing up for your rights is others see you standing and stand up as well.
quotes.author: Cassandra Duffy

quotes.quote: What is straight? A line can be straight, or a street, but the human heart, oh, no, it's curved like a road through mountains.
quotes.author: Tennessee Williams

quotes.quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
quotes.author: Boethius

quotes.quote: Everybody’s journey is individual. You you fall in love with a boy, you fall in love with a boy. The fact that many Americans consider it a disease says more about them than it does about homosexuality.
quotes.author: James Baldwin

quotes.quote: I was not ladylike, nor was I manly. I was something else altogether. There were so many different ways to be beautiful.
quotes.author: Michael Cunningham

quotes.quote: But I'm not a saint yet. I'm an alcoholic. I'm a drug addict. I'm homosexual. I'm a genius. Of course, I could be all four of these dubious things and still be a saint.
quotes.author: Truman Capote

quotes.quote: It isn't possible to love and part. You will wish that it was. You can transmute love, ignore it, muddle it, but you can never pull it out of you. I know by experience that the poets are right: love is eternal.
quotes.author: E.M. Forster

quotes.quote: From a religious point of view, if God had thought homosexuality is a sin, he would not have created gay people.
quotes.author: Howard Dean

quotes.quote: You don´t have to be gay to be a supporter - you just have to be a human.
quotes.author: Daniel Radcliffe

quotes.quote: I had a wonderful experience on the golf course today. I had a hole in nothing. Missed the ball and sank the divot.
quotes.author: Don Adams

quotes.quote: Although golf was originally restricted to wealthy, overweight Protestants, today it's open to anybody who owns hideous clothing.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Golf is a fascinating game. It has taken me nearly forty years to discover that I can't play it.
quotes.author: Ted Ray

quotes.quote: Show me a man who is a good loser and I'll show you a man who is playing golf with his boss.
quotes.author: James Murray

quotes.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I'm hitting fewer spectators.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: While playing golf today I hit two good balls. I stepped on a rake.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Golf is the hardest game in the world to play, and the easiest to cheat at.
quotes.author: Dave Hill

quotes.quote: Golf, like the measles, should be caught young, for, if postponed to riper years, the results may be serious.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The only time my prayers are never answered is on the golf course.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Nothing dissects a man in public quite like golf.
quotes.author: Brent Musberger

quotes.quote: Golf is an ideal diversion but a ruinous disease.
quotes.author: Gerald Ford

quotes.quote: I don't like to watch golf on television because I can't stand people who whisper.
quotes.author: David Brenner

quotes.quote: Most people play a fair game of golf, If you watch them.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: Golf is played by twenty million mature American men whose wives think they are out having fun.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: The only sure rule in golf is he who has the fastest cart never has to play the bad lie.
quotes.author: Mickey Mantle

quotes.quote: If you think it's hard to meet new people, try picking up the wrong golf ball.
quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

quotes.quote: The uglier a man's legs are, the better he plays golf. It's almost a law.
quotes.author: H G Wells

quotes.quote: I tried real hard to play golf, and I was so bad at it they would have to check me for ticks at the end of the round because I'd spent about half the day in the woods.
quotes.author: Jeff Foxworthy

quotes.quote: If there is any larceny in a man, golf will bring it out.
quotes.author: Paul Gallico

quotes.quote: Golf is a game in which you yell 'fore', shoot six, and write down five.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: They say golf is like life, but don't believe them. Golf is more complicated than that.
quotes.author: Gardner Dickinson

quotes.quote: It's good sportsmanship to not pick up lost golf balls while they are still rolling.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Golf without mistakes is like watching haircuts. A dinner without wine.
quotes.author: Jim Murray

quotes.quote: If you are going to throw a club, it is important to throw it ahead of you, down the fairway, so you don't have to waste energy going back to pick it up.
quotes.author: Tommy Bolt

quotes.quote: Golf is the only game I know where you call a foul on yourself.
quotes.author: Joe Torre

quotes.quote: Give me golf clubs, fresh air and a beautiful partner, and you can keep the clubs and the fresh air.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: The reason they call it 'golf' is that all the other 4 letter words were used up.
quotes.author: Leslie Nielsen

quotes.quote: Competitive golf is played mainly on a five-and-a-half-inch course... the space between your ears.
quotes.author: Bobby Jones

quotes.quote: Over the years, I've studied the habits of golfers. I know what to look for. Watch their eyes. Fear shows up when there is an enlargement of the pupils. Big pupils lead to big scores.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: Don't play too much golf. Two rounds a day are plenty.
quotes.author: Harry Vardon

quotes.quote: The average golfer doesn't play golf. He attacks it.
quotes.author: Jack Burke

quotes.quote: For me, the worst part of playing golf, by far, has always been hitting the ball.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: If you drink, don't drive. Don't even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Go play golf. Go to the golf course. Hit the ball. Find the ball. Repeat until the ball is in the hole. Have fun. The end.
quotes.author: Chuck Hogan

quotes.quote: If you break 100, watch your golf. If you break 80, watch your business.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: The only thing a golfer needs is more daylight.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: I am relying on the theory that playing golf is just like riding a bike and that I haven't forgotten how.
quotes.author: Jennifer Wyatt

quotes.quote: I regard golf as an expensive way of playing marbles.
quotes.author: G.K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: It took me seventeen years to get three thousand hits in baseball. It took one afternoon on the golf course.
quotes.author: Hank Aaron

quotes.quote: To find a man's true character, play golf with him.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: Golf is a game whose aim is to hit a very small ball into an ever smaller hole, with weapons singularly ill-designed for the purpose.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.quote: Golf... is the infallible test. The man who can go into a patch of rough alone, with the knowledge that only God is watching him, and play his ball where it lies, is the man who will serve you faithfully and well.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The least thing upset him on the links. He missed short putts because of the uproar of the butterflies in the adjoining meadows.
quotes.author: P.G. Wodehouse

quotes.quote: The value of routine; trusting your swing.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: Golf epitomizes the tame world. On a golf course nature is neutered. The grass is clean, a lawn laundry that wipes away the mud, the insect, the bramble, nettle and thistle, an Eezy-wipe lawn where nothing of life, dirty and glorious, remains. Golf turns outdoors into indoors, a prefab mat of stultified grass, processed, pesticided, herbicided, the pseudo-green of formica sterility...The enemy of wildness, it is a demonstration of the absolute dominion of man over wild nature.
quotes.author: Jay Griffiths

quotes.quote: I started watching golf for the first time yesterday. I`m really worried about myself. I was actually enjoying it.
quotes.author: Ewan McGregor

quotes.quote: A great golfer’s métier is his or her golfing skill, coupled with the mastery of good sportsmanship, rendering him or her an ambassador for the sport.
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: He loved the game. The battle that raged inside each player's head. The little ball that sat motionless, defying you to hit it. No defenders, no game clock, no excuses. And maybe that's why the highs were so high and the lows felt so low. Could you in the moment quiet your thoughts and execute? It was glorious when you did!
quotes.author: Philip Wyeth

quotes.quote: Golf sits in that beautiful junction between perfection and frustration.
quotes.author: Colleen Ferrary Bader

quotes.quote: There's a reason why golfers walk forward to their next shot. It's to move on.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote: You ought to take more exercise, if you're inclined to have a liver. Play golf.
quotes.author: Daphne du Maurier

quotes.quote: There are many things you can successfully fake in business…but a good golf swing isn’t one of them.
quotes.author: Bobby Darnel

quotes.quote: A boss once told me, 'Colleen, it's not about the meeting, it's about the scotch after the meeting. You either need to learn to drink or take up golf.' Turns out I'm not a good scotch drinker.
quotes.author: Colleen Ferrary Bader

quotes.quote: Golf has some drawbacks. It's possible, by too much of it, to destroy the mind.
quotes.author: Sir W.G. Simpson

quotes.quote: Light is found on the green.
quotes.author: J.R. Rim

quotes.quote:
With many twists and holes
Life is much like a golf game:
Without bats you cannot Play.
quotes.author: Ana Claudia Antunes

quotes.quote: Be a mind beater-not a ball beater.
quotes.author: Moe Norman

quotes.quote: The difference between a good golf shot and a bad one is the same as the difference between a beautiful and a plain woman --a matter of millimetres.
quotes.author: Ian Fleming

quotes.quote: When we watch pro golfers, we expect them to play well, to make the shots we know we can’t, and to be entertaining. Their expectation, however, is very different. They expect to succeed!
quotes.author: Lorii Myers

quotes.quote: The uglier a man's legs are, the better he plays golf. It's almost a law.
quotes.author: H. G. Wells

quotes.quote: It takes exactly eighteen shots tae polish off a fifth o' a bottle o' Scotch, thus, a game o' golf equates tae eighteen holes.
quotes.author: Steve Alten

quotes.quote: A well hit golf shot is a feeling that goes up the shaft, right through your hands and into your heart.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Perhaps more than any other sport, golf focuses pressure on the player. There are no time constraints, as there are in other sports. Your competitors are not allowed to hinder you, as they are in other sports. The pressure originates in yourself; it builds from doubts. A two-foot putt on the practice green doesn’t spark many doubts. A two-foot putt to win a bet or a tournament or a Masters is another thing entirely.
quotes.author: Joe Posnanski

quotes.quote:
It is surely quite superfluous to mention / To a person who has been here half an hour / That Golf is what engrosses the attention
Of the people, with an all-absorbing power.
quotes.author: Robert Fuller Murray

quotes.quote: Golf, golf, golf -- is all the story! / In despair my overburdened spirit sinks / Till I wish that every golfer was in glory / And I pray the sea may overflow the links.
quotes.author: Robert Fuller Murray

quotes.quote: I drove a golf-ball into the air / It fell to earth, I knew not where / For, so swiftly it flew, the sight / Could not follow it in its flight.
quotes.author: Robert Fuller Murray

quotes.quote: Long, long afterward, in a whin / I found the golf-ball, black as sin / But the five shillings are missing still! / They haven't turned up, and I doubt if they will.
quotes.author: Robert Fuller Murray

quotes.quote:
Behold, my child, this touching scene,
The golfer on the golfing-green / Pray mark his legs’ uncanny swing / The golf-walk is a gruesome thing!
quotes.author: Ellis Parker Butler

quotes.quote:
And does the man walk always so?
Nay! nay I my child, and eke, oh! no! / It is a gait he only knows / When he has on his golfing clothes.
quotes.author: Ellis Parker Butler

quotes.quote:
ALL of us play our very best game / Any other time / Golf or billiards, it’s all the same / Any other time / Lose a match and you always say,
'Just my luck! I was ‘off’ to-day!
quotes.author: Andrew Barton Paterson

quotes.quote: And there's many neat cottages with gardens very nice / And picturesque villas, which can be rented at a reasonable price / Besides, there's a golf course for those that such a game seeks / Which would prove a great attraction to the knights of clubs and cleeks.
quotes.author: William Topaz McGonagall

quotes.quote: Like clubs inside my golf bag / each verse a different face / Some to drive straight down the course / others lift and then embrace.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: My swing is then adjusted / as words take off and fly / And landing safe beyond the trap / to make the devil cry.
quotes.author: Kurt Philip Behm

quotes.quote: Till saints and angels hymn for evermore / The miracle of your astounding score / And He who keeps all players in His sight / Walking the royal and ancient hills of light / Standing benignant at the eighteenth hole / To everlasting Golf consigns your soul.
quotes.author: Siegfried Sassoon

quotes.quote: I don't play golf to feel bad, I play bad golf, but I feel good.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: There is no movement in golf that cannot be made more difficult through diligent study and practice.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: The golf swing has been endlessly analyzed, and yet it still remains a mystery. And only one secret has emerged, one swing of thought that always works. And that thought is: Don't think. But you can't just forget not to think. You must remember not to remember to think.
quotes.author: Henry Beard

quotes.quote: Golf is Not a great sport. If you can smoke and drink while you're doin' it, it's not a sport.
quotes.author: Michael Connelly

quotes.quote: Mini-golf is a lot like life. It can be difficult. It can be rewarding. And there are windmills.
quotes.author: Joe Tessitore

quotes.quote: In order to develop a golf swing your thoughts must run in the right direction.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: If you want to hook a ball turn both hands toward the right side on the grip or shaft. This position should feel sort of unnatural and should permit you to hook the ball without altering your golf swing.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Hitting down is an important part of iron play. With the exception of the putter and the driver remember that you hit down on every other shot in golf.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: There's an old saying in golf that when the wind blows the men are separated from the boys. It means, in so many words, that if you can golf when the wind is blowing you're a man; if not, you're still a boy.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Muscular freedom is probably more important in golf than in any other sport, but very few players take the trouble to get loosened up.
quotes.author: Ben Hogan

quotes.quote: Enjoyment of golf, regardless of the level you play at, is primarily based on how closely you play to your level of ability.
quotes.author: Steve Bann

quotes.quote: It is not possible to play golf consistently well without sound mental skills. However, every person playing the game has the basis of good mental skills for golf.
quotes.author: Steve Bann

quotes.quote: Every golfer worthy of the name should have some acquaintance with the principles of golf course design, not only for the betterment of his game, but for his own selfish enjoyment. -Bobby Jones
quotes.author: Geoff Shackelford

quotes.quote: As golf conquered the United States in the decades preceding World War I, the British import took on new forms. Americans infatuated with golf established country and golf clubs, built ornate club houses, laid out inland park courses, experimented with new types of equipment, and even modified time-honored rules.
quotes.author: George B. Kirsch

quotes.quote: Morning is wonderful. Its only drawback is that it comes at such an inconvenient time of day.
quotes.author: Glen Cook

quotes.quote: Mornings are pure evil from the pits of hell, which is why I don't do them anymore.
quotes.author: Rachel Caine

quotes.quote: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not.
quotes.author: Ursula Le Guin

quotes.quote: Everyone wants me to be a morning person. I could be one, only if morning began after noon.
quotes.author: Tony Smite

quotes.quote: Every morning is a battle between the superego and the id, and I am a mere foot soldier with mud and a snooze button on her shield.
quotes.author: Catherynne Valente

quotes.quote: Every morning I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Every morning brings new potential, but if you dwell on the misfortunes of the day before, you tend to overlook tremendous opportunities.
quotes.author: Harvey Mackay

quotes.quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: It is a good morning exercise for a research scientist to discard a pet hypothesis every day before breakfast. It keeps him young.
quotes.author: Konrad Lorenz

quotes.quote: Good morning is a contradiction of terms.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: My alarm clock is clearly jealous of my amazing relationship with my bed.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Every single day I wake up and make up my mind that I am going to work really hard. Then my mind laughs at me and says 'Good joke.' Then we laugh for some more time and I go back to bed.
quotes.author: Gehenna Toss

quotes.quote: Do you wish me a good morning, or mean that it is a good morning whether I want it or not; or that you feel good this morning; or that it is a morning to be good on?
quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

quotes.quote: Good morning, this is God. I will be handling all of your problems today. I will not need your help, so have a miraculous day.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Keep the dream alive: Hit the snooze button.
quotes.author: Punit Ghadge

quotes.quote: Good morning, and a special welcome to those of you who are new to the field of quantum solar energy conversion.
quotes.author: Mary Archer

quotes.quote: Next week, or next month, or next year, I'll kill myself. But I might as well last out my month's rent which has been paid up, and my credit for breakfast in the morning.
quotes.author: Jean Rhys

quotes.quote: The average, healthy, well-adjusted adult gets up at seven-thirty in the morning feeling just plain terrible.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: I'm sorry for people who don't drink. They wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: I wake up every morning at nine and grab for the morning paper. Then I look at the obituary page. If my name is not on it, I get up.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
quotes.author: Sam Goldwyn

quotes.quote: Do you wake up in the morning and say to yourself, ' I think I won't think today'? It's too late: you're already thinking!
quotes.author: Byron Katie

quotes.quote: If you have only one smile in you, give it to the people you love. Don't be surly at home then go out in the street and start grinning 'Good Morning' at total strangers.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.quote: Today's goals: Coffee and kindness. Maybe two coffees and then kindness.
quotes.author: Nanea Hoffman

quotes.quote: I like freedom. I wake up in the morning and say, 'I don't know, should I have a popsicle or a donut?' You know. Who knows.
quotes.author: Oscar Nunez

quotes.quote: Never face facts; if you do you'll never get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Marlo Thomas

quotes.quote: If you get up in the morning and think the future is going to be better, it is a bright day. Otherwise, it is not.
quotes.author: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: A man is a success if he gets up in the morning and gets to bed at night, and in between he does what he wants to do.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: I hate when I dream of alarm clocks going off.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: There are two ways of waking up in the morning. One is to say, ‘Good morning, God,’ and the other is to say, ‘Good God, morning!'
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: The lawyer’s first thought in the morning is how to handle the case of the ringing alarm clock.
quotes.author: Edward Packard Jr

quotes.quote: What irritates me most of all about these morning people is their horribly good temper, as if they have been up for three hours and already conquered France.
quotes.author: Timur Vermes

quotes.quote: I love the early hours of the day. It’s a nice place to visit but I wouldn't want to live there.
quotes.author: James Lileks

quotes.quote: Some people wake up drowsy. Some people wake up energized. I wake up dead.
quotes.author: James Marsden

quotes.quote: It sounds plausible enough tonight, but wait until tomorrow. Wait for the common sense of the morning.
quotes.author: H.G. Wells

quotes.quote: Some mornings I just feel like breaking the damn alarm but then one thing always stops me. I paid hundreds of dollars to buy my phone.
quotes.author: Job Might

quotes.quote: Good Morning Sunshine; thank you for filtering / stringently through my dingily dilapidate window / embedding optimistic rays of hope in my life.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: I live a fast life / Funny thing is she wasn't saying that last night / I can't believe what we did last night / I'm gonna wake up in the morning sun / Roll over, telling everyone / I can't believe what we did last night.
quotes.author: Edwin Z. Perez

quotes.quote: I never make the same mistake twice. I make it five or six times, just to be sure.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: It’s sad, but sometimes moving on with the rest of your life, starts with goodbye.
quotes.author: Carrie Underwood

quotes.quote: They must often change, who would be constant in happiness and wisdom.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.quote: So long, and thanks for all the fish!
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: Don't cry because it’s over. Smile because it happened.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Any girl can be glamorous. All you have to do is stand still and look stupid.
quotes.author: Hedy Lamarr

quotes.quote: Nothing makes the earth seem so spacious as to have friends at a distance, they make the latitudes and longitudes.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: Don't ever tell anybody anything. If you do, you start missing everybody.
quotes.author: J.D. Salinger

quotes.quote: Goodbyes, they often come in waves.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: It is so hard to leave until you leave and then it is the easiest goddamned thing in the world.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go, others whenever they go.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: If you're brave enough to say goodbye, life will reward you with a new hello.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: I'm sorry, if you were right, I'd agree with you.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Every new beginning comes from some other beginning’s end.
quotes.author: Semisonic

quotes.quote: I'll see you in another life. When we are both cats.
quotes.author: Tom Cruise

quotes.quote: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
quotes.author: Tryon Edwards

quotes.quote: Goodbyes make you think. They make you realize what you've had, what you've lost, and what you've taken for granted.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: True friends don't say goodbye, I told myself. They just take extended leaves of absences from each other.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don't listen to your inner fatty, she’s an evil bitch.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I wear black when I workout. It’s like a funeral for my fat.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: It's been a pleasure and a privilege to meeting you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: We’ll meet again, Don't know where, don’t know when, But I know we'll meet again, Some sunny day.
quotes.author: Vera Lynn

quotes.quote: Farewell! God knows when we shall meet again.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: One day I may be meeting you and hearing how you've changed your life by saying, "Farewell to Fat".
quotes.author: Richard Simmons

quotes.quote: A man never knows how to say goodbye; a woman never knows when to say it.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: It's time to say goodbye, but I think goodbyes are sad and I'd much rather say hello. Hello to a new adventure.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Didn't know how to say farewell so I slapped him in the face and ran away
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: 90% of men kiss their wife goodbye when they leave the house. 10% kiss their house goodbye when they leave the wife.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote:
A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car.
But if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A graduation ceremony is an event where the commencement speaker tells thousands of students dressed in identical caps and gowns that 'individuality' is the key to success.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Your families are extremely proud of you. You can't imagine the sense of relief they are experiencing. This would be a most opportune time to ask for money.
quotes.author: Gary Bolding

quotes.quote: The best advice I can give anybody about going out into the world is this: Don't do it. I have been out there. It is a mess.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: The college graduate is presented with a sheepskin to cover his intellectual nakedness.
quotes.author: Robert M. Hutchins

quotes.quote: Graduation: a ritual event where they award you a diploma, in the hope that you have learned enough to be able to read it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Commencement speeches were invented largely in the belief that outgoing college students should never be released into the world until they have been properly sedated.
quotes.author: Garry Trudeau

quotes.quote: When they hand you your diploma, keep moving. Just in case they try to take it back.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If you feel that you have both feet planted on level ground, then the university has failed you.
quotes.author: Robert Goheen

quotes.quote: There is a good reason they call these ceremonies 'commencement exercises'. Graduation is not the end; it's the beginning.
quotes.author: Orrin Hatch

quotes.quote:
Graduation day is tough for adults.
They go to the ceremony as parents.
They come home as contemporaries.
After twenty-two years of child-raising,
they are unemployed.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: At graduation you get to wear a cap and gown, but it's a good idea to also wear something underneath it.
quotes.author: Greg Tamblyn

quotes.quote: Every year, many, many stupid people graduate from college. And if they can do it, so can you.
quotes.author: John Green

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, try to hide your astonishment.
quotes.author: Harry Banks

quotes.quote: Follow your passion, stay true to yourself, never follow someonelse's path unless you're in the woods and you're lost and you see a path then by all means you should follow that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: The tassel's worth the hassle!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: So long as your desire to explore is greater than your desire to not screw up, you're on the right track.
quotes.author: Ed Helms

quotes.quote: You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself in any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. You are the guy who'll decide where to go.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: It doesn't matter that your dream came true if you spent your whole life sleeping.
quotes.author: Jerry Zucker

quotes.quote: If you can find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn't lead anywhere.
quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

quotes.quote: Remember, when it comes to applying for jobs, books ARE judged by their cover!
quotes.author: Patricia Akins

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in bed with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Bette Reese

quotes.quote: All that stands between the graduate and the top of the ladder is the ladder.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Even if you are on the right track, you will get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: The man who graduates today and stops learning tomorrow is uneducated the day after.
quotes.author: Newton D. Baker

quotes.quote: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
quotes.author: Sarah Brown

quotes.quote: You’re going to fall down, but the world doesn’t care how many times you fall down, as long as it’s one fewer than the number of times you get back up.
quotes.author: Aaron Sorkin

quotes.quote: Success is often the result of taking a misstep in the right direction.
quotes.author: Al Bernstein

quotes.quote: Academe, n.: An ancient school where morality and philosophy were taught. Academy, n.: A modern school where football is taught.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Try putting your iPhones down every once in a while and look at people’s faces. People's faces will tell you amazing things.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Don’t treat your heart like an action figure wrapped in plastic and never used.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.quote: Patience! The windmill never strays in search of the wind.
quotes.author: Andy J. Sklivis

quotes.quote: I think sleeping was my problem in school. If school had started at 4:00 in the afternoon, I'd be a college graduate today.
quotes.author: George Foreman

quotes.quote: The Lord gave us two ends: one to sit on and the other to think with. Success depends on which one we use the most.
quotes.author: Ann Landers

quotes.quote: Just remember, you can't climb the ladder of success with your hands in your pockets.
quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quotes.quote: Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other, and scarce in that.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: People will frighten you about a graduation….They use words you don’t hear often… ‘And we wish you Godspeed.’ It is a warning, Godspeed. It means you are no longer welcome here at these prices.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: So, what’s it like in the real world? Well, the food is better, but beyond that, I don’t recommend it.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Yes, the lectures are optional. Graduation is also optional.
quotes.author: Bob Bickford

quotes.quote: You will never become a howling success by just howling.
quotes.author: Bob Harrington

quotes.quote: Isn’t it funny how day by day nothing changes, but when you look back, everything is different?
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.quote: You can only be young once. But you can always be immature.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: The trouble with learning from experience is that you never graduate.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Of course there’s a lot of knowledge in universities: the freshmen bring a little in; the seniors don’t take much away, so knowledge sort of accumulates.
quotes.author: Dr. A. Lawrence Lowell

quotes.quote: Life has a very simple plot: first you’re here and then you’re not.
quotes.author: Eric Idle

quotes.quote: Never go to your high school reunion pregnant or they will think that is all you have done since you graduated.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: I learned law so well, the day I graduated I sued the college, won the case, and got my tuition back.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: To those of you who received honours, awards and distinctions, I say well done. And to the C students, I say you, too, can be president of the United States.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: Lisa, if you don’t like your job you don’t strike. You just go in every day, and do it really half-assed. That’s the American way.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: It is indeed ironic that we spend our school days yearning to graduate and our remaining days waxing nostalgic about our school days.
quotes.author: Isabel Waxman

quotes.quote: I learned many great lessons from my father, not the least of which is that you can fail at what you don’t want, so you might as well take a chance on doing what you love.
quotes.author: Jim Carrey

quotes.quote: The unfortunate, yet truly exciting thing about your life, is that there is no core curriculum. The entire place is an elective. So if there's any real advice I can give you it's this. College is something you complete. Life is something you experience.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: Life is my college. May I graduate well, and earn some honors!
quotes.author: Louisa May Alcott

quotes.quote: Life has no remote. Get up and change it yourself.
quotes.author: Mark A. Cooper

quotes.quote: If opportunity doesn’t knock, build a door.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: I’m sick of following my dreams man. I’m just going to ask where they’re going and hook up with them later.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: If they can make penicillin out of moldy bread, they can sure make something out of you.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.quote: Big pay and little responsibility are circumstances seldom found together.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.quote: Be wise, because the world needs wisdom. If you cannot be wise, pretend to be someone who is wise, and then just behave like they would.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.quote: Education is an admirable thing, but it is well to remember from time to time that nothing worth knowing can be taught.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: At commencement you wear your square-shaped mortarboards. My hope is that from time to time you will let your minds be bold, and wear sombreros.
quotes.author: Paul Freund

quotes.quote: My formula for success is rise early, work late, and strike oil.
quotes.author: Paul Getty

quotes.quote: Don't ever rob a bank. Enjoy life. Have fun. Choose to be happy now; don't wait until you're ‘successful', because honestly, I was a happy when we were unemployed and scrounging around for a buck.
quotes.author: Peter Farrelly

quotes.quote: When I was your age, we didn't have the Internet in our pants. We didn't even have the Internet not in our pants. That's how bad it was.
quotes.author: Richard Costolo

quotes.quote: The advantage of a classical education is that it enables you to despise the wealth that which it prevents you from achieving.
quotes.author: Russell Green

quotes.quote: Fifty percent of all doctors graduate in the bottom half of their class – Hope your surgery went well!
quotes.author: Simone Elkeles

quotes.quote: Life is an improvisation. You have no idea what’s going to happen next and you are mostly just making things up as you go along.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: Success is relative. It is what we can make of the mess we have made of things.
quotes.author: T.S. Eliot

quotes.quote: The difference between school and life? In school, you’re taught a lesson and then given a test. In life, you’re given a test that teaches you a lesson.
quotes.author: Tom Bodett

quotes.quote: One thing about the school of experience is that it will repeat the lesson if you flunk the first time.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, try, try again. Then quit. There’s no point in being a damn fool about it.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: Sixty years ago I knew everything; now I know nothing. Education is the progressive discovery of our own ignorance.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: If at first you don’t succeed, find out if the loser gets anything.
quotes.author: William Lyon Phelps

quotes.quote: Summing up, it is clear the future holds great opportunities. It also holds pitfalls. The trick will be to avoid the pitfalls, seize the opportunities, and get back home by six o'clock.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Men's fame is like their hair, which grows after they are dead, and with just as little use to them.
quotes.author: George Villiers

quotes.quote: I'm a big woman. I need big hair.
quotes.author: Aretha Franklin

quotes.quote: I'm undaunted in my quest to amuse myself by constantly changing my hair.
quotes.author: Hillary Rodham Clinton

quotes.quote: I've discovered that how I look is not a function of anything as ephemeral as my hair.
quotes.author: Judith Light

quotes.quote: Men don't get smarter as they grow older, they just lose their hair.
quotes.author: Mary Astor

quotes.quote: What a curious way to do your hair— or, rather, not to do it.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: I'm losing my hair where I want hair, and getting hair where I don't.
quotes.author: Billy Crystal

quotes.quote: I'm fine, but you're obviously having a bad hair day.
quotes.author: Kristy Samson

quotes.quote: I've had hangovers before, but this time even my hair hurts.
quotes.author: Rock Hudson

quotes.quote: If you want to get ahead in business, you've got to have serious hair.
quotes.author: Melanie Griffith

quotes.quote: My blackness has never been in my hair. Blackness is not a hairstyle.
quotes.author: Bertha Gilkey

quotes.quote: You never see a man walking down the street with a woman who has a little potbelly and a bald spot.
quotes.author: Elayne Boosler

quotes.quote: The tenderest spot in a man's makeup is sometimes the bald spot on top of his head.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: My real hair color is kind of a dark blonde. Now I just have mood hair.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: I'm not offended by all the dumb-blonde jokes because I know that I'm not dumb. I also know I'm not blonde.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: I refuse to think of them as chin hairs. I think of them as stray eyebrows.
quotes.author: Janette Barber

quotes.quote: Oh, who is that young sinner with the handcuffs on his wrists? / And what has he been after that they groan and shake his fists? / And wherefore is he wearing such a conscience-stricken air? / Oh, they're taking him to prison for the colour of his hair.
quotes.author: A.E. Housman

quotes.quote: You look like you comb your hair with an eggbeater.
quotes.author: Lawrence Dorfman

quotes.quote: I got my hair highlighted because I felt that some strands were more important than others.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: A celebrity is any well-known TV or movie star who looks like he spends more than two hours working on his hair.
quotes.author: Steve Martin

quotes.quote: I read somewhere that hair grows until you reach 40, then it goes in the opposite direction, into the head, and out the ears, nose and other odd places.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: I cleaned the attic with the wife the other day. Now I can't get the cobwebs out of her hair.
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: Even geniuses can get things wrong. Look at Einstein’s unfortunate choice of a hairdresser.
quotes.author: Joss Stirling

quotes.quote: Naturally curly hair is a curse, and don't ever let anyone tell you different.
quotes.author: Mary Ann Shaffer

quotes.quote: Her hair was a glory of tendrils for the snaring of husbands.
quotes.author: Michael Chabon

quotes.quote: If my hair gets any frizzier, I'll shave it to the scalp. Or light it on fire. Whichever is easier.
quotes.author: Victoria Scott

quotes.quote: My toes are a total wreck, my fingernails worse, and god knows my hair could use a registered nurse.
quotes.author: Jack Bunbury

quotes.quote: A pony is a childhood dream. A horse is an adult treasure.
quotes.author: Rebecca Carroll

quotes.quote: The horse, with beauty unsurpassed, strength immeasurable, and grace unlike any other, still remains humble enough to carry a man upon his back.
quotes.author: Amber Senti

quotes.quote: There’s something about the outside of a horse that is good for the inside of a man.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I would travel only by horse, if I had the choice.
quotes.author: Linda McCartney

quotes.quote: I am still under the impression that there is nothing alive quite so beautiful as a horse.
quotes.author: John Galsworthy

quotes.quote: A man on a horse is spiritually, as well as physically, bigger than a man on foot.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: I can make a General in five minutes, but a good horse is hard to replace.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: When riding a horse, we borrow freedom.
quotes.author: Helen Thomson

quotes.quote: Horses lend us the wings we lack.
quotes.author: Pam Brown

quotes.quote: Courage is being scared to death but saddling up anyway.
quotes.author: John Wayne

quotes.quote: Every horse is good for something.
quotes.author: Laura Hillenbrand

quotes.quote: Any horse has a chance in a race.
quotes.author: Laird Doyle

quotes.quote: And I love my horse, he try to ignore me / Scratch my back and you'll force me to dump / Dump, dump, dump, put 'em on stunt / And drive my horse into the sun
quotes.author: Anthony L Ray

quotes.quote: White shining silver studs with their nose in flames, / He saw horses, horses, horses, horses, horses, horses, horses, horses. / Do you know how to pony like bony maroney
quotes.author: Byron Gay

quotes.quote: Horses have played essential roles in the development of many civilizations.
quotes.author: Ann T. Bowling

quotes.quote: Horsemen have always been susceptible to one great foible, and that is the belief that the categories and terms and concepts they apply to their art are ones their horses hold, too.
quotes.author: Stephen Budiansky

quotes.quote: Horses are exciting pets. They love to graze and gallop. A horse can take you for a ride!
quotes.author: Colleen Dolphin

quotes.quote: Horses live in stables when they are not outside.
quotes.author: Colleen Dolphin

quotes.quote: Most horses would prefer to stay in the paddock grazing and enjoying the company of other horses than to do anything a human can offer.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: The best way to catch a horse is not to try to. Approach the horse openly. It will see you, no matter how sneaky you are.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: A clever horse will learn to snatch bites of hay out of your hand or dart into the bucket and grab a mouthful before retreating out of range.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: All horses are different and reactions to being caught can vary greatly.
quotes.author: Iain Coleman

quotes.quote: We love seeing our Advanced and Grand Prix horses together with the oxen and the donkeys, the ponies and the pleasure horses cantering across the fields, enjoying themselves together. That is pure enjoyment.
quotes.author: Uta Gräf

quotes.quote: But we know that horses who are also allowed to be horses enjoy their training more and work with us more happily.
quotes.author: Uta Gräf

quotes.quote: The enjoyment in riding develops into the blissful state a rider experiences when truly becoming one with a happy and motivated horse.
quotes.author: Uta Gräf

quotes.quote: A happy horse is less likely to injure itself and is less likely to be subject to infection and dis-ease.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: Emotional stress affects the immune system, so happy horses are usually much more resistant.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: Like us, horses respond to other things in their environment and life, for example, other aggressive horses or animals, noises, solitude, etc.
quotes.author: Hetty Tapper

quotes.quote: True horsemanship is an art form and a challenge taken on by many individuals drawn to this amazing animal called the horse.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: I think that of all nature's gifts few are a precious as the horse.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Great horses also are made and not born.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Every horse is different, and what works with one doesn't necessarily work on another.
quotes.author: Craig Cameron

quotes.quote: Galloping down leafy trails, jumping over fences, and winning ribbons at shows--these are the activities that make owning a horse lots of fun.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: Owning a horse or a pony is a big responsibility. Your horse relies on you to look after him properly.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: Most horses need several years of training before they become quite and reliable.
quotes.author: Lesley Ward

quotes.quote: I've got a great theory: happy horses run well.
quotes.author: G Whateley

quotes.quote: Horses are not machines, but every time I asked her to, she went out and got the job done.
quotes.author: G Whateley

quotes.quote: In order for your horse to be truly healthy, she needs to be happy too.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: The way horses see the world is an important key to providing them with an environment that will make them happy.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: Movement is another requirement of the horse, and is also left over from the days when all horses were wild.
quotes.author: Audrey Pavia

quotes.quote: My horse was so late getting home, he tiptoed into the stable.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: One reason why birds and horses are happy is because they are not trying to impress other birds and horses.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: Horse sense is the thing a horse has which keeps it from betting on people.
quotes.author: W.C Fields

quotes.quote: A horse walks into a bar, and the barman says why the long face?. The horse replies: I'm deeply troubled by the anthropomorphic aspects of my existence and the extent to which I am now protected by law.
quotes.author: Bill Bailey

quotes.quote: My horse's jockey was hitting the horse. The horse turns around and says why are you hitting me, there is nobody behind us!
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Although we’ve come to the end of the road, still I can’t let you go. It’s unnatural. You belong to me, I belong to you.
quotes.author: Brittney Reel

quotes.quote: If I had a single flower for every time I think about you, I could walk forever in my garden.
quotes.author: Claudia Ghandi
