quotes.quote: I missed you even when I was with you. That’s been my problem. I miss what I already have, and I surround myself with things that are missing.
quotes.author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when one person is missing, the whole world seems depopulated.
quotes.author: Lamartine

quotes.quote: For everything you have missed, you have gained something else, and for everything you gain, you lose something.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I wish that you were here, or I were there, or we were together anywhere.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I dropped a tear in the ocean. The day you find it shall be the day I will stop missing you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Love reckons hours for months, and days for years; and every little absence is an age.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Time goes by a lot slower when you miss the one you love.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Each time I miss you, a star falls down from the sky. So if one looked up at the sky and found it dark, with no stars, it is all your fault. You made me miss you too much!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I’m a fish out of water without you, flitting and filleting in your absence as abstinence makes the heart go flounder.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Nothing makes a room emptier than wishing she's going to be in it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: When I miss you, I don’t have to go far, I just have to look inside my heart because that’s where I’ll find you.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: I think we dream so we don’t have to be apart so long. If we’re in each other’s dreams, we can play together all night.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Your absence has gone through me, Like thread through a needle, Everything I do is stitched with its color.
quotes.author: W.S. Merwin

quotes.quote: I have a brain to think of you. Eyes to look at you. Heart to love you. Hands to comfort you. Toes to walk with you. Mouth to say I miss you and feet to kick you, if you don't miss me too.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Here is a test to find whether your mission on earth is finished â€“ If you're alive it isn't.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
quotes.author: A.A. Milne

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to be effective, you have never been in the dark with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Betty Reese

quotes.quote: To succeed in life, you need three things: a wishbone, a backbone and a funny bone.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Silent gratitude isn't much use to anyone.
quotes.author: Gladys Berthe Stern

quotes.quote: You grow up the day you have your first real laugh â€“ at yourself.
quotes.author: Ethel Barrymore

quotes.quote: My theory is that if you look confident you can pull off anything â€“ even if you have no clue what you're doing.
quotes.author: Jessica Alba

quotes.quote: A smile is an inexpensive way to change your looks.
quotes.author: Charles Gordy

quotes.quote: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Laugh and the world laughs with you, snore and you sleep alone.Â
quotes.author: Anthony Burgess

quotes.quote: I believe that ifÂ lifeÂ gives you lemons, you should make lemonade. And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Wine is constant proof that God loves us and loves to see us happy.Â
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Eddison

quotes.quote: You can't have everything. Where would you put it?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: When I hear someone sigh that life is hard, I am tempted to ask, â€˜compared to what?'
quotes.author: Sydney Harris

quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: Life is like a sewerâ€¦ what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.Â
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: We are all here on earth to help others; what on earth the others are here for I don't know.Â
quotes.author: W. H. Auden

quotes.quote: Goal setting is similar to travelling from point A to point B within a city. If you clearly understand what the goal is, you will definitely reach the destination because you know its address.
quotes.author: Thomas Abreu

quotes.quote: Even if you are on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it.
quotes.author: Dwight Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Many of us spend half our time wishing for things we could have if we didn't spend half our time wishing.
quotes.author: Alexander Woollcott

quotes.quote: The reason so few people are successful is no one has yet found a way for someone to sit down and slide uphill.
quotes.author: W. Clement Stone

quotes.quote: I know worrying works, because none of the stuff I worried about ever happened.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Follow your passion, stay true to yourself, never follow someone else's path unless you're in the woods and you're lost and you see a path then by all means you should follow that.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: We can see a thousand miracles around us every day. What is more supernatural than an egg yolk turning into a chicken?
quotes.author: Rutherford Platt

quotes.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairsâ€¦ one step at a time.
quotes.author: Joe Girard

quotes.quote: If at first you don't succeed, think how many people you've made happy.
quotes.author: H. Duane Black

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are absolutely unique. Just like everyone else.Â
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: Life is a shipwreck but we must not forget tosing in the lifeboats.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: Live each day like it's your second to the last. That way you can fall asleep at night.
quotes.author: Jason Love

quotes.quote: Knowledge is knowing tomato is a fruit; wisdom is not putting it in a fruit salad.
quotes.author: Miles Kington

quotes.quote: Dreams come true all the time, just not for the dreamers.
quotes.author: Eoin Colfer

quotes.quote: I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Certainly there are things in life that money can't buy, but it's very funny â€“Â  Did you ever try buying them without money?
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: People often say that motivation doesn't last. Well, neither does bathing â€“ that's why we recommend it daily.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: There are three sides to every story: yours, his and the truth.
quotes.author: Madge Kennedy

quotes.quote: Copy me and you're already 5 steps behind.

Thousands of people have eaten in my kitchen

quotes.quote: One day..I'm gonna make the onions cry

quotes.author: Paul Theroux

I mean, it is just beautiful. Beautiful. I love what you’ve done with this house. Make sure you put it all away.

quotes.quote: An egg is always an adventure.

quotes.quote: The hardest thing in the world to understand is the income tax.

quotes.quote: Stop worrying about the world ending today. It's already tomorrow in Australia.

quotes.quote: The first time I sang in the church choir; two hundred people changed their religion

quotes.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.

quotes.quote: Life imposes things on you that you can’t control, but you still have the choice of how you’re going to live through this.

quotes.quote: The human race has one really effective weapon, and that is laughter.

quotes.quote: I am still determined to be cheerful and happy in whatever situation I find myself.

quotes.quote: Blessed is he who makes his companions laugh.

quotes.quote: Happy are those who have given up worrying once and for all.

quotes.quote: He is a wise man who does not grieve for the things which he has not, but rejoices for those which he has

quotes.quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: The happiness of you life depends on the quality of your thoughts.

quotes.quote: Mirth, and even cheerfulness, when employed as remedies in low spirits, are like hot water to a frozen limb.

quotes.quote: The most wasted of all days is that in which we have not laughed.

quotes.quote:
Dost thou love life?
Then do not squander time, for that is the stuff life is made of.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Life is like a guided tour, where we are the tourists, our inner voice is the guide and the destiny is like a travel company which tries to give us the best possible 'package' that our 'Karma' can afford!

quotes.quote: Life is cruising the ocean while watching a beautiful sunrise.

quotes.quote: Life is a meaningless existence unless equality exists for every living soul.

quotes.quote: Life is the rustling of leaves as the wind blows. You will experience the true meaning of life once you show appreciation for the simple things God provides daily.
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: Developing a cheerful disposition can permit an atmosphere wherein one's spirit can be nurtured and encouraged to blossom and bear fruit. Being pessimistic and negative about our experiences will not enhance the quality of our lives. A determination to be of good cheer can help us and those around us to enjoy life more fully.
quotes.author: Barbara Winder

quotes.quote: Life teaches you many lessons, many good, some bad. Just learn from the good and forget the bad.

quotes.quote: Life is a succession of moments. To live each one is to succeed.

quotes.quote: When we do the best we can, we never know what miracle is wrought in our life, or in the life of another.

quotes.quote: Do not be afraid of life. Believe that life is worth living and your belief will create the fact.

quotes.quote: According to this third important mental law, your outer life is a mirror image to your inner life.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: Everything you have in your life today you have attracted to yourself by the person you are, by the way you think. You can change your life because you can change the person you are. You can change your thoughts that you think.

quotes.quote: The most important things in life that are free are common sense, knowledge, and opportunities. If you acquire one of the three, the others will fall with in your grasp.
quotes.author: Jean Watson

quotes.quote: We need to accept that most things in life are beyond our control, but they are generally good.

quotes.quote: Even in life, it is wise to find good people and experiences, instead of complaining about the bad ones; while keeping in mind that even the good experiences will not last forever.
quotes.author: D. S. Pandit

quotes.quote: The greater danger for most of us lies not in setting our aim too high and falling short; but in setting our aim too low, and achieving our mark.

quotes.quote: If you were born without wings, do nothing to prevent them form growing.

quotes.quote: If you do not hope, you will not find what is beyond your hopes.
quotes.author: St. Clement of Alexandra

quotes.quote: Other times we feel discouraged, drained and spiritually weak and need inspiration and added strength to keep ourselves striving to build the life that we envisioned to continue to move forward.

quotes.quote: No on said life was easy - there are always challenges, and hurdles along the way that must be overcome.
quotes.author: J.D.Rockefeller

quotes.quote: And I truly believe that the information, thoughts, ideas and inspiration that we feed our mind, soul and spirit with has a direct correlation with the quality and ultimately the direction of our life's unfolding.
quotes.author: J.D.Rockefeller

quotes.quote: Having children gives your life purpose. Right now my purpose is to get some sleep.

quotes.quote: To me old age is always fifteen year older than I am.

quotes.quote: By the time you're eighty years old you've learned everything. You only have to remember it.

quotes.quote: I was introduced to a beautiful young lady as a man in his nineties. Early nineties, I insisted.

quotes.quote: I don't know how you feel about old age, but in my case I didn't even see it coming. It hit me from the rear.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: I'm at the age when my back goes out more than I do.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: Eighty is a wonderful age - especially if you're ninety.

quotes.quote: An elderly woman in a nursing home declined her pastor's suggestion that she get a hearing aid. 'At 91, I've hear enough,' she said.

quotes.quote: In youth we want to change the world. In old age we want to change youth.

quotes.quote: I'm now old enough to personally identify every object in antique stores.

quotes.quote: Forty is the old age of youth; fifty is the youth of old age.

quotes.quote: Children are a great comfort in your old age-and they help you reach it faster too.

quotes.quote: Oh to be old again,' said a young corpse.

quotes.quote: A man in love is not complete until he is married. Then he is finished.

quotes.quote: An archeologist is the best husband any woman can have; the older she gets, the more interested he is in her.

quotes.quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
quotes.author: Joan Crawford

quotes.quote: Love is a lot like a backache, it doesn't show up on X-rays, but you know it's there.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Romantic love is mental illness. But it's a pleasurable one.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

quotes.quote: I love you no matter what you do, but do you have to do so much of it?
quotes.author: Jean Illsley Clarke

quotes.quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Love is blind but marriage is a real eye-opener
quotes.author: Pauline Thomason

quotes.quote: Love doesn't drop on you unexpectedly; you have to give off signals, sort of like an amateur radio operator.
quotes.author: Helen Gurley Brown

quotes.quote: I had a dream that i still loved you...I think I woke up screaming.
quotes.author: Christine

quotes.quote: It wasn't love at first sight. It took a full five minutes.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: I love you so much I'd fight a bear for you. Well not a grizzly bear because they have claws, and not a panda bear because they know Kung Fu... But a care bear, I'd definitely fight a care bear for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you text 'I love you' to a person and the person writes back an emoji - no matter what that emoji is, they don't love you back.
quotes.author: Chelsea Peretti

quotes.quote: I almost had a psychic girlfriend but she left me before we met.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Love is an ocean of emotions entirely surrounded by expenses.
quotes.author: Thomas Dewar

quotes.quote: I love you more than coffee, but please don't make me prove it.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Evans

quotes.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
quotes.author: Fulton J. Sheen

quotes.quote: If you love 'em in the morning with their eyes full of crust; if you love 'em at night with their hair full of rollers, chances are, you're in love.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: You can't put a price tag on love. But if you could, I'd wait for it to go on sale.
quotes.author: Hussein Nishah

quotes.quote: In any perfect relationship men should remember it's a matter of direction; she takes what's right and you take what's left.
quotes.author: Solitaire Parke

quotes.quote: Love is not having to hold in your farts anymore.
quotes.author: Bree Luckey

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for 20 years – then we met.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Love is a sweet dream and marriage is the alarm clock.
quotes.author: Jewish Proverb

quotes.quote: Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.
quotes.author: Judith Viorst

quotes.quote: Love is an electric blanket with somebody else in control of the switch.
quotes.author: Cathy Carlyle

quotes.quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
quotes.author: Erich Segal

quotes.quote: If only one could tell true love from false love as one can tell mushrooms from toadstools.
quotes.author: Katherine Mansfield

quotes.quote: In love, somehow, a man's heart is always either exceeding the speed limit, or getting parked in the wrong place.
quotes.author: Rowland

quotes.quote: Honesty is the key to a relationship. If you can fake that, you're in.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Love is like a tornado, picks you up off your feet and sometimes takes half your house.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If love is the answer, could you rephrase the question?
quotes.author: Lilly Tomlin

quotes.quote: Love thy neighbor, just watch out for the husband
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is the only kind of fire which is never covered by insurance.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Love is fun but, it is not going to pay the bills.
quotes.author: Jessica Martin

quotes.quote: A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: People should fall in love with their eyes closed.
quotes.author: Andy Warhol

quotes.quote: My phone battery lasts longer than most of my relationships nowadays.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: If she happens to fall, I'll be there to laugh at first and then help her up afterwards.
quotes.author: J.A. Redmerski

quotes.quote: The four most important words in any marriage...I'll do the dishes.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My last love is just like that thong peter griffin borrowed from me... Never getting it back.
quotes.author: Refinnej Sin

quotes.quote: Love is like finding a needle in a hay stack!
quotes.author: FaithHopeNLove

quotes.quote: We're like Romeo & Juliet.. Except for the dying part of course.
quotes.author: Justina

quotes.quote: They say that love is more important than money, but have you ever tried to pay your bills with a hug?
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The more she turned right the more I turned wrong.
quotes.author: Mark W. Boyer

quotes.quote: I was nauseous and tingly all over. I was either in love or I had smallpox.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Love is a temporary insanity curable by marriage.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: Love conquers all things--expect poverty and toothache.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Do you know what it means to come home at night to a woman who'll give you a little love, a little affection, a little tenderness? It means you're in the wrong house, that's what it means.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Love is blind, but marriage restores its sight.
quotes.author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quotes.quote: Love is a kind of military service.
quotes.author: Ovid

quotes.quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
quotes.author: Amy Bloom

quotes.quote: Oh, how absurd and delicious it is in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it--no life can be complete without it.
quotes.author: Barbara Pym

quotes.quote: If it is your time, love will track you down life a cruse missile.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Being in love with yourself means never having to say you're got a headache.
quotes.author: Ellie Laine

quotes.quote: A guy knows he's in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: I've been in love with the same woman for 41 years. If my wife ever finds out, she'll kill me!
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Some people claim that marriage interferes with romance. There's no doubt about it. Anytime you have a romance, your wife is bound to interfere.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: I love mankind... It's people I can't stand.
quotes.author: Linus Van Pelt

quotes.quote: I never loved another person the way I loved myself.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: But love is not fashionable any more, the poets have killed it. They wrote so much about it that nobody believed them.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The world's tragedy is that men love women, women love children, and children love hamsters.
quotes.author: Joanna Trollope

quotes.quote: My husband and I fell in love at first sight. Maybe I should have taken a second look.
quotes.author: Mia Farrow

quotes.quote: Love is an exploding cigar that you willingly smoke.
quotes.author: Lynda Barry

quotes.quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: If you never want to see a man again, just tell him 'I love you. I want to marry you. I want to have children.' They leave skid marks.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Every love's the love before in a duller dress.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Love is not the dying moan of a distant violin--it's the triumphant twang of a bedspring.
quotes.author: S. J. Perelman

quotes.quote: There's only one kind of love that lasts--unrequited love. It stays with you forever.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Love is something sent from heaven to worry the hell out of you.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: Those who are faithful know only the trivial side of love; it is the faithless who know love's tragedies.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love was only the dirty trick nature played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: I believe in love and marriage, but not necessarily with the same person.
quotes.author: John Travolta

quotes.quote: Love is the delightful interval between meeting a beautiful girl and discovering that she looks like a haddock.
quotes.author: John Barrymore

quotes.quote: Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Love is like quicksilver in the hand...Leave the fingers open and it stays in the palm. Clutch it, and it darts away.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: There is always something ridiculous about the passions of people whom one has ceased to love.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
quotes.author: Miguel de Unamuno

quotes.quote: Many man has fallen in love with a girl in a light so dim he would not have chosen a suit by lit.
quotes.author: Maurice Chevalier

quotes.quote: Love. Of course, love. Flames for a year, ashes for 30.
quotes.author: Giuseppi di Lampedusa

quotes.quote: Love is not merely blind but mentally afflicted.
quotes.author: Alice Thomas Ellis

quotes.quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love...what (women) like is to be a man's last romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: My wife and I thought we were in love--but it turned out to be benign.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Love and scandal are the best sweeteners of tea.
quotes.author: Henry Fielding

quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I had rather hear my dog bark at a crow, than a man swear he loves my.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Love is the history of a woman's life; it is but an episode in a man's.
quotes.author: Madame De Stael

quotes.quote: Love is like any other luxury. You have no right to it unless you can afford it.
quotes.author: Anthony Trolloper

quotes.quote: When one is in love one begins by deceiving one's self. And one ends by deceiving others. That is what the world calls a romance.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
quotes.author: Ben Hecht

quotes.quote: The best love affairs are those we never had.
quotes.author: Norman Lindsay

quotes.quote: Love for me is like a pretzel. Twisted and salty.
quotes.author: Emmy Gay

quotes.quote: Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: A man falls in love through his eyes, a woman through her ears.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wyatt

quotes.quote: The fickleness of the women I love is only equaled by the infernal constancy of the women who love me.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Love us the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: Nothing takes the taste out peanut butter quite life unrequited love.
quotes.author: Charlie Brown

quotes.quote: They say love's like the measles--all the worse when it comes late in life.
quotes.author: Douglas William Jerrold

quotes.quote: How alike are the groans of love to those of the dying.
quotes.author: Malcolm Lowry

quotes.quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
quotes.author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quotes.quote: A girl must marry for love, and keep on marrying until she finds it.
quotes.author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quotes.quote: I had some words with my wife, and she had some paragraphs with me.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
quotes.author: Alec Baldwin

quotes.quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Marriage is really tough because you have to deal with feelings ... and lawyers.
quotes.author: Richard Pryor

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful invention: then again, so is the bicycle repair kit.
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a phone call in the night: first the ring, and then you wake up.
quotes.author: Evelyn Hendrickson

quotes.quote: Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: A good marriage would be between a blind wife and a deaf husband.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for twenty years. Then we met.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: All marriages are happy. It's the living together afterward that causes all the trouble.
quotes.author: Raymond Hull

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: There is nothing in the world like the devotion of a married woman. It is a thing no married man knows anything about.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Before marriage, a man declares that he would lay down his life to serve you; after marriage, he won't even lay down his newspaper to talk to you.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: I'm going to get married again because I'm more mature now, and I need some kitchen stuff.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.quote: Always get married in the morning. That way if it doesn't work out, you haven't wasted the whole day.
quotes.author: Mickey Rooney

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a game of chess, except the board is flowing water, the pieces are made of smoke and no move you make will have any effect on the outcome.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: By all means, marry. If you get a good wife, you'll become happy; if you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: In my house I'm the boss, my wife is just the decision maker.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: My wife and I tried to breakfast together, but we had to stop or our marriage would have been wrecked.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: They say love is blind...and marriage is an institution. Well, I'm not ready for an institution for the blind just yet.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: My wife and I have the secret to making a marriage last. Two times a week, we go to a nice restaurant, a little wine, good food. She goes on tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: Marriage: A legal or religious ceremony by which two persons of the opposite sex solemnly agree to harass and spy on each other for ninety-nine years, or until death do them join.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: The only mistake for which people are congratulated is marriage.
quotes.author: Ratna Deep

quotes.quote: When you see a married couple walking down the street, the one that's a few steps ahead is the one that's mad.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Love is one long sweet dream and marriage is the alarm clock!
quotes.author: Zeenat Essa

quotes.quote: Marriage is an adventure, like going to war.
quotes.author: G. K. Chesterton

quotes.quote: More marriages might survive if the partners realized that sometimes the better comes after the worse.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Marriage is when a man looses his bachelors degree and woman gets her masters degree.
quotes.author: Rama Kochhar

quotes.quote: To keep your marriage brimming, with love in the loving cup, whenever you're wrong, admit it; whenever you're right, shut up.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Before I got married I had six theories about raising children; now, I have six children and no theories.
quotes.author: John Wilmot

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a deck of cards. All you need in the beginning is two hearts and a diamond. After 10 years you need a club and spade.
quotes.author: Carrie

quotes.quote: The husband who wants a happy marriage should learn to keep his mouth shut and his checkbook open.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Marriage: sometimes soulmates, sometimes cellmates.
quotes.author: Rory Elder

quotes.quote: Marriage is getting to have a sleep over with your best friend, every single night of the week.
quotes.author: Christie Cook

quotes.quote: Marriage is the bond between a person who never remembers anniversaries and another who never forgets them.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Marriage is a workshop where the husband works and the wife shops.
quotes.author: Riaz Nassurally

quotes.quote: All my friends are getting married. I guess I'm just at that age where people give up.
quotes.author: Amy Schumer

quotes.quote: Marriage is a relationship in which one person is always right and the other is the husband!
quotes.author: Prady

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: There's a way of transferring funds that is even faster than electronic banking. It's called marriage.
quotes.author: James Holt McGavran

quotes.quote: My husband and I married for better or worse!! He couldn't have done better and I couldn't have done worse!
quotes.author: Rhonda

quotes.quote: Getting married is like trading the adoration of many for the sarcasm of one.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quotes.quote: Marriage is give and take. You'd better give it to her or she'll take it anyway.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: Getting married is a lot like getting into a tub of hot water. After you get used to it, it ain't so hot.
quotes.author: Minnie Pearl

quotes.quote: Marriages are made in heaven. But so again, are thunder and lightning.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: In Hollywood a marriage is a success if it outlasts milk.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Marriage is popular because it combines the maximum of temptation with the maximum of opportunity.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: The secret of a happy marriage remains a secret.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution... but who wants to live in an institution?
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: They dream in courtship, but in wedlock wake.
quotes.author: Alexander Pope

quotes.quote: Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is a long conversation which always seems too short.
quotes.author: Andre Maurois

quotes.quote: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they’re too old to do it.
quotes.author: Ann Bancroft

quotes.quote: Marriage – a book of which the first chapter is written in poetry and the remaining chapters in prose.
quotes.author: Beverley Nichols

quotes.quote: You know there is a name for people who are always wrong about everything all the time… Husband!
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: An ideal wife is any woman who has an ideal husband.
quotes.author: Booth Tarkington

quotes.quote: For marriage to be a success, every woman and every man should have her and his own bathroom. The end.
quotes.author: Catherine Zeta-Jones

quotes.quote: The trouble with some women is that they get all excited about nothing – and then marry him.
quotes.author: Cher

quotes.quote: What’s the best way to have your husband to remember your anniversary? Get married on his birthday.
quotes.author: Cindy Garner

quotes.quote: Marriage is an attempt to solve problems together which you didn’t even have when you were on your own.
quotes.author: Eddie Cantor

quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that’s what you’re looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Love is a lot like a backache; It doesn’t show up on X-Rays, but you know it’s there.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: In olden times, sacrifices were made at the altar, a practice which is still very much practiced.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: My wife dresses to kill, she cooks the same way.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: We always hold hands. If I let go, she shops.
quotes.author: Henry Youngman

quotes.quote: Marriage must incessantly contend with a monster that devours everything: familiarity.
quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

quotes.quote: Any intelligent woman who reads the marriage contract, and then goes into it, deserves all the consequences.
quotes.author: Isadora Duncan

quotes.quote: My wife, Mary, and I have been married for forty-seven years, and not once have we had an argument serious enough to consider divorce; murder, yes, but divorce, never.
quotes.author: Jack Benny

quotes.quote: Husbands and wives are so irritating. But without them, who would we blame for misplacing our socks?
quotes.author: Janet Periat

quotes.quote: So Why do married people live longer than single people? I think it’s because married people make a special effort to outlive their partner – just so they can have the last word.
quotes.author: Janet Periat

quotes.quote: Marrying a man is like buying something you’ve been admiring for a long time in a shop window. You may love it when you get it home, but it doesn’t always go with everything else in the house.
quotes.author: Jean Kerr

quotes.quote: My marriage is a continuous process of getting used to things I hadn't expected. Before we got married, I caught her in my arms. Now I catch her in my pockets.
quotes.author: Joginder Singh

quotes.quote: Marriage is not just spiritual communion and passionate embraces; Marriage is also three-meals-a-day and remembering to carry the trash out.
quotes.author: Joyce Brothers

quotes.quote: Sometimes I wonder if men and women really suit each other. Perhaps they should just live next door and visit now and then.
quotes.author: Katherine Hepburn

quotes.quote: Marriage is like vitamins: We supplement each other’s minimum daily requirements.
quotes.author: Kathy Mohnke

quotes.quote: If love is the answer, could you rephrase the question.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: When you have a baby, love is automatic, when you get married, love is earned.
quotes.author: Marie Osmond

quotes.quote: Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

quotes.quote: If you love ’em in the morning with their eyes full of crust; If you love ’em at night with their hair full of rollers, chances are, you’re in love.
quotes.author: Miles Davis

quotes.quote: When a man brings his wife flowers for no reason, there’s a reason.
quotes.author: Molly McGee

quotes.quote: Whatever you look like, marry a man your own age; As your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: When a man opens the car door for his wife, it’s either a new car or a new wife.
quotes.author: Prince Philip

quotes.quote: When you’re in love, it’s the most glorious two-and-a-half days of your life.
quotes.author: Richard Lewis

quotes.quote: I think men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage – they’ve experienced pain and bought jewelry.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: If you want to know how your girl will treat you after marriage, just listen to her talking to her little brother.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: If you want your wife to listen to you, then talk to another woman; she will be all ears.
quotes.author: Sigmund Freud

quotes.quote: A kiss without a mustache is like an egg without salt.
quotes.author: Spanish Proverb

quotes.quote: She is the only evidence of God I have seen, with the exception of the mysterious force that removes one sock from the dryer every time I do my laundry.
quotes.author: St Elmo's Fire

quotes.quote: Many a man in love with a dimple makes the mistake of marrying the whole girl.
quotes.author: Stephen Leacock

quotes.quote: A guy knows he’s in love when he loses interest in his car for a couple of days.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: A good marriage is one where each partner secretly suspects they got the better deal.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Some mornings I wake up grouchy. Other mornings I just let him sleep.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Don’t make love by the garden gate, love is blind but the neighbors ain’t.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Marriage is like a walk in the park… Jurassic Park.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The most important four words for a successful marriage: I’ll do the dishes.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: My most brilliant achievement was my ability to be able to persuade my wife to marry me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Many people spend more time in planning the wedding than they do in planning the marriage.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Mathematics may be defined as the subject in which we never know what we are talking about, nor whether what we are saying is true.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: Mathematics is made of 50 percent formulas, 50 percent proofs, and 50 percent imagination.
quotes.author: J. H. Poincare

quotes.quote: Philosophy is a game with objectives and no rules. Mathematics is a game with rules and no objectives.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the art of giving the same name to different things.
quotes.author: J. H. Poincare

quotes.quote: Mathematics consists in proving the most obvious thing in the least obvious way.
quotes.author: George Polya

quotes.quote: In mathematics, you don't understand things. You just get used to them.
quotes.author: Johann Von Neumann

quotes.quote: A tragedy of mathematics is a beautiful conjecture ruined by an ugly fact.
quotes.author: Sinai Robins

quotes.quote: Mathematics is like love; a simple idea, but it can get complicated.
quotes.author: George Polya

quotes.quote: If people do not believe that mathematics is simple, it is only because they do not realize how complicated life is.
quotes.author: Johann Von Neumann

quotes.quote: Mathematics is like checkers in being suitable for the young, not too difficult, amusing, and without peril to the state.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: The essence of mathematics is not to make simple things complicated, but to make complicated things simple.
quotes.author: S. Gudder

quotes.quote: There are two ways to do great mathematics. The first is to be smarter than everybody else. The second way is to be stupider than everybody else -- but persistent.
quotes.author: Raoul Bott

quotes.quote: Arithmetic is being able to count up to twenty without taking off your shoes.
quotes.author: Mickey Mouse

quotes.quote: The greatest unsolved theorem in mathematics is why some people are better at it than others.
quotes.author: Adrian Mathesis

quotes.quote: Mathematics is not a deductive science – that's a cliché. When you try to prove a theorem, you don't just list the hypotheses, and then start to reason. What you do is trial and error, experimentation, guesswork.
quotes.author: Paul Halmos

quotes.quote: Mathematics should be fun.
quotes.author: Peter J. Hilton

quotes.quote: Mathematics is written for mathematicians.
quotes.author: Copernicus

quotes.quote: Mathematics is the supreme judge; from its decisions there is no appeal.
quotes.author: Tobias Dantzig

quotes.quote: The essence of mathematics resides in its freedom.
quotes.author: Georg Cantor

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a great motivator for all humans.. Because its career starts with zero and it never end (infinity).
quotes.author: Shobha Radhakrishnan

quotes.quote: The study of mathematics, like the Nile, begins in minuteness but ends in magnificence.
quotes.author: Charles Caleb Colton

quotes.quote: Do the math, do the math baby it's the curse of money, once you got it, fool you got it.
quotes.author: Ice Cube

quotes.quote: Goodbye, some many niggas, lied to have funny what a muthafucka do for math.
quotes.author: 2Pac

quotes.quote: Very good at doin' math it's funny that you ask, we was speedin to the bag.
quotes.author: Two Feet

quotes.quote: Put your money on the table and get your math on, break it down split it up get your laugh on.
quotes.author: The Notorious B.I.G.

quotes.quote: To keep me on that right path and right math cause you plus nothin is everything.
quotes.author: Lecrae

quotes.quote: Even went out his way so you could check in an extra bag now you wanna divide the yam like it equate the math.
quotes.author: Kanye West

quotes.quote: If you can do the math on that then do the science too move around wit 4 pound or a 9 or two
quotes.author: Jadakiss

quotes.quote: Contemplating know how to work my math and bred story I don't work my fingers to the bone until they bled storin'
quotes.author: Timbaland and Magoo

quotes.quote: I gets duece 5 a show, do 5 a week let y'all do the math, that's aight for me.
quotes.author: Terror Squad

quotes.quote: I was lousy at math, a failed historian I was the quarterback in the back of the class.
quotes.author: Phil Vassar

quotes.quote: And lyric which so heavily rhytmic In magic do I build, but math do be equally compatible.
quotes.author: Big Pun

quotes.quote: Never shot handbrawl but I smoke a little grass, who? Clever with the math Queens remember boom bash tricks?
quotes.author: Organized Konfusion

quotes.quote: What do you do when you don't have a friend I'm sittin in class trying to focus on math.
quotes.author: Andiroo

quotes.quote: A math-a-gician, I was taught to subtract anything to distrct the type of paper that I'm trying to attract.
quotes.author: Ray Cash

quotes.quote: I all want to do is walk up and tak to you I all want to do is write up my math for you.
quotes.author: Snow

quotes.quote: Brolic, extra large, dynamic, crack your ceramic in half go aginst the grain, we feedin you math.
quotes.author: U-God

quotes.quote: Here I am bored, man, sittin in my class how much longer? Yo, let me get this bathroom pass.
quotes.author: Diamond Shell

quotes.quote: So, study the maths, study the code study yuh gyal, study the road.
quotes.author: Popcaan

quotes.quote: Arithmetic is numbers you squeeze from your head to your hand to your pencil to your paper till you get the answer.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Dear Math, please grow up and solve your own problems, I'm tired of solving them for you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I am still waiting for the day I'll use mathematics integration in real Life.
quotes.author: Derrick Obedgiu

quotes.quote: Mathematics is a game played according to certain simple rules with meaningless marks on paper.
quotes.author: David Hilbert

quotes.quote: That awkward moment when you finish a math problem and your answer isn't even one of the choices.
quotes.author: Ritu Ghatourey

quotes.quote: Math is fun, it teaches you life and death information, like when you're cold, you should go to a corner since it's 90 degrees there.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If there is a 50-50 chance that something can go wrong, then 9 times out of ten it will.
quotes.author: Paul Harvey

quotes.quote: But in the new (math) approach, the important thing is to understand what you're doing, rather than to get the right answer.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: Arithmetic is where numbers fly like pigeons in and out of your head.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.quote: Mathematics is not a deductive science that's a clichÃ©. When you try to prove a theorem, you don't just list the hypotheses, and then start to reason. What you do is trial and error, experimentation, guesswork.
quotes.author: Paul Halmos

quotes.quote: Children are a great comfort in your old age â€“ and they help you reach it faster, too
quotes.author: Lionel

quotes.quote: Neurotics build castles in the air; psychotics live in them. My mother cleans them.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: My mother never breast fed me, she told me she only liked me as a friend.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: My mom said she learned how to swim. Someone took her out in the lake and threw her off the boat. That's how she learned how to swim. I said, 'Mom, they weren't trying to teach you how to swim.'
quotes.author: Paula Poundstone

quotes.quote: The best way to keep children at home is to make the home atmosphere pleasant, and let the air out of the tires.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: I know how to do anything I'm a mom.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: You should never say anything to a woman that even remotely suggests that you think she's pregnant unless you can see an actual baby emerging from her at that moment.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Nobody loves me but my mother, And she could be jivin' too.
quotes.author: B. B. King

quotes.quote: My mom's favorite Stevie Wonder song is, "I Just Called to Say Someone You Don't Know Has Cancer."
quotes.author: Damien Fahey

quotes.quote: If your kids are giving you a headache, follow the directions on the aspirin bottle, especially the part that says â€˜keep away from children.
quotes.author: Susan Savannah

quotes.quote: My mom said the only reason men are alive is for lawn care and vehicle maintenance.
quotes.author: Tim Allen

quotes.quote: My mother tried to kill me when I was a baby. She denied it. She said she thought the plastic bag would keep me fresh.
quotes.author: Bob Monkhouse

quotes.quote: I asked Mom if I was a gifted child. She said they certainly wouldn't have paid for me.
quotes.author: Calvin

quotes.quote: Delusions are often functional. A mother's opinions about her children's beauty, intelligence, goodness, et cetera ad nauseam, keep her from drowning them at birth.
quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.quote: I want to have children, but my friends scare me. One of my friends told me she was in labor for 36 hours. I don't even want to do anything that feels good for 36 hours.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I can remember the first time I had to go to sleep. Mom said, Steven, time to go to sleep. I said, 'But I don't know how. She said, 'It's real easy. Just go down to the end of tired and hang a left. So I went down to the end of tired, and just out of curiosity I hung a right. My mother was there, and she said i thought I told you to go to sleep.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote:
The most remarkable thing about my mother is that for thirty years she served the family nothing but leftovers.
The original meal has never been found.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: As long as a woman can look ten years younger than her own daughter, she is perfectly satisfied.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I am sitting here looking at the most amazing person I have ever seen, smart, funny, caring, and absolutely stunning! Yes, I am looking in the mirror!
quotes.author: Ash Sweeney

quotes.quote: The way I feel, if the kids are still alive when my husband gets home from work, I've done my job.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: Raising a kid is part joy and part guerilla warfare.
quotes.author: Ed Asner

quotes.quote: I had to get back to work. NBC has me under contract. The baby and I only have a verbal agreement.
quotes.author: Tina Fey

quotes.quote: So thank you for reminding me about the importance of being a good mom and a great volunteer as well.
quotes.author: George W. Bush

quotes.quote: I love to play hide and seek with my kid, but some days my goal is to find a hiding place where he can't find me until after high school.
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The worst feature of a new baby is its mother's singing.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: It's not over until the fat lady sings, but even after she sings, packs up and goes home, my mom will still be saying goodbye to me on the phone.
quotes.author: Just Lamenting

quotes.quote: When your mother asks, 'Do you want a piece of advice?' it is a mere formality. It doesn't matter if you answer yes or no. You're going to get it anyway.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: If a woman has to choose between catching a fly ball and saving an infant's life, she will choose to save the infant's life without even considering if there is a man on base.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: When I was a boy, my mother wore a mood ring. When she was in a good mood it turned blue. In a bad mood, it left a big red mark on my forehead.
quotes.author: Jeff Shaw

quotes.quote: My mother's menu consisted of two choices: Take it or leave it.
quotes.author: Buddy Hackett

quotes.quote: A sweater is a garment worn by a child when the mother feels chilly.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: A suburban mother's role is to deliver children; obstetrically once and by car forever after.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: A mother need only step into the shower to be instantly reassured she is indispensable to every member of her family.
quotes.author: Lynne Williams

quotes.quote: Oh, to be only half as wonderful as my child thought I was when he was small, and only half as stupid as my teenager now thinks I am.
quotes.author: Rebecca Richards

quotes.quote: One time I ran out of the store and took the bus home by myself after my mother asked a sales clerk where the 'underpants' counter was. Everyone in the store heard her. I had no choice.
quotes.author: Phyllis Theroux

quotes.quote: My sister said one: 'Anything I don't want Mother to know, I don't even think of, if she's in the room.'
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: I love it when mothers get so mad they can't remember your name. 'Come here, Roy, er, Rupert, er, Rutabaga...what is your name, boy? And don't lie to me, because you live here, and I'll find out who you are.'
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: No matter how old a mother is, she watches her middle-aged children for signs of improvement.
quotes.author: Florida Scott-Maxwell

quotes.quote: I took my mother-in-law to Madame Tussaud's Chamber of Horrors and one of the attendants said 'keep her moving sir, we're stocktaking.'
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: Behind every successful man stands a surprised mother-in-law.
quotes.author: Hurbert Murphy

quotes.quote: I can always tell when the mother-in-law is coming to stay-the mice throw themselves on the traps.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: A mother is not a person to lean on, nut a person to make learning unnecessary.
quotes.author: Dorothy Canfield Fisher

quotes.quote: The future destiny of the child is always the work of the mother.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: Mothers are fonder than fathers of their children because they are more certain they are their own.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: The phrase 'working mothers' is redundant.
quotes.author: Jane Sellman

quotes.quote: Blaming mother is just a negative way of clinging to her still.
quotes.author: Nancy Friday

quotes.quote: The story of a mother's life: Trapped between a scream and a hug.
quotes.author: Cathy Guisewite

quotes.quote: Before becoming a mother, I had a hundred theories on how to bring up children. Now I have seven children and only one theory: Love them, especially when they least deserve to be loved.
quotes.author: Kate Samperi

quotes.quote: Anyone who doesn't miss the past never had a mother.
quotes.author: Gregory Nunn

quotes.quote: Be like duck,' my mother used to tell me. 'Remain calm on the surface and paddle like hell underneath.'
quotes.author: Michael Caine

quotes.quote: My mother used to tell me that 'man gives the award, God give the reward.' I don't need another plaque'
quotes.author: Denzel Washington

quotes.quote: I've seen diapers, and my mother is right. 'What's in the poo-poo is like the Bible: The truth is in there.'
quotes.author: Celine Dion

quotes.quote: Why the grandparents and grandchildren get along so well? They have the same enemy--the mother.
quotes.author: Claudette Colbert

quotes.quote: I'd asked my mother what she did during the war when her flat was blown up. She remembered taking a bottle of shocking perfume, by Schiaparelli. She said, 'When there's nothing left, you stick to the superfluous.'
quotes.author: Jane Birkin

quotes.quote: Motherhood is a journey. Yet while becoming a mother is a path that is well worn, navigated by billions of women across the globe throughout human history, the experience is brand new for each woman every time a baby enters this world.
quotes.author: Jill Kozio

quotes.quote: Motherhood is an adventure that defies explanation; you just have to experience it for yourself.
quotes.author: Jill Kozio

quotes.quote: Motherhood is the ultimate opportunity to learn the lesson of surrender. The more rigid you are, the harder the process is.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: Motherhood may force you to find a new way to define yourself.
quotes.author: Cherie Carter-Scott

quotes.quote: As a mother, you will of necessity give birth to the motherhood mindset that for a time will act like the North Star in orienting your path in life.
quotes.author: Daniel N. Stern

quotes.quote: As the practical realities of life demand more of you attention, the motherhood mindset will recede.
quotes.author: Daniel N. Stern

quotes.quote: You always been your mother's daughter, and this relationship, whether good or bad, has always been near the center of your identity.
quotes.author: Daniel N. Stern

quotes.quote: All mothers want validation for their identity, and to that end you will probably find yourself developing support network.
quotes.author: Daniel N. Stern

quotes.quote: Motherhood will also mold you in unexpected, amazing ways, but becoming a mama doesn't mean leaving the woman you are behind.
quotes.author: Jill Koziol

quotes.quote: Pregnancy is about more than simply growing a baby. It's about becoming a mama.
quotes.author: Jill Koziol

quotes.quote: Motherhood changes you long before the baby is born.
quotes.author: Jill Koziol

quotes.quote: Motherhood is about defining an experience as any human being can undergo.
quotes.author: Danielle Crittenden

quotes.quote: Even is motherhood has been a lifelong desire, once it arrives, many women find themselves feeling lost somewhere who they were before and who they think they should be now.
quotes.author: Alexandra Sacks

quotes.quote: The older I get the more of my mother I see in myself.
quotes.author: Betty Friedan

quotes.quote: As we carry our baby inside us, we know almost nothing about it that distinguishes it from anyone's baby-except that we love it unlike any other baby.
quotes.author: Roni Jay

quotes.quote: Making a decision to have a child-it's momentous. It is to decide forever to have your heart go walking around outside your body.
quotes.author: Elizabeth Stone

quotes.quote: Life is always rich and steady time when you are waiting for something to happen or to hatch.
quotes.author: E.B. White

quotes.quote: When a woman, gives birth her waters break and she pours out the child and the child runs free.
quotes.author: Jeanette Winterson

quotes.quote: For nine months I grew a human being inside my belly and then I pushed it out my vagina and now I'm feeding it with my boob. Biology is so...weird.
quotes.author: Heather Armstrong

quotes.quote: Life is a flame that is always burning itself out, but it catches fire again everytime a child is born.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: Giving birth is little more than a set of muscular contractions granting passage of a child. Then the mother is born.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Give me a treat, or leave me alone. It's Monday
quotes.author: Paige

quotes.quote: Mondays are mundane, like Tuesdays minus 24 hours.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: What we do on Sunday absolutely doesn't matter unless it meets us on Monday. Changes us on Monday. Transforms us on Monday.
quotes.author: Judah Smith

quotes.quote: Hey I know it's Monday but it's also a new day, a new week, and in that lies a new opportunity for something special to happen.
quotes.author: Michael Ely

quotes.quote: Every Monday morning is new hope.
quotes.author: Maira Kalman

quotes.quote: The biggest thrill wasn't in winning on Sunday but in meeting the payroll on Monday.
quotes.author: Art Rooney

quotes.quote: Monday is an awful way to spend 1/7 of your life.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Imagine having Mondays as a holiday and then it wold be the best thing. Will someone please assist me in making it a official holiday and solve all our Monday blues.
quotes.author: Rolland Mars

quotes.quote: Employers are at their happiest on Mondays. Employees are at their happiest on Fridays.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Mondays are the start of the work week which offer new beginnings 52 times a year!
quotes.author: David Dweck

quotes.quote: What about Monday- That could be our one day we look at things the same way, and wear funny shoes.
quotes.author: Kevin Dalton

quotes.quote: Don't let a day of the week have so much power over your happiness. Monday.
quotes.author: Andrea L'Artiste

quotes.quote: Mondays are a good day to make statements, not Friday.
quotes.author: Ernie Els

quotes.quote: There is nothing more dreadful than having to go walking on one's own on Monday.
quotes.author: Thomas Bernhard

quotes.quote: It was a strangely disorienting feeling, to have something you'd relied on for so long start to change, like finding out that gravity no longer worked on Mondays.
quotes.author: Maggie Stiefvater

quotes.quote: Don't mess with anybody on a Monday. It's a bad, bad day.
quotes.author: Louise Fitzhugh

quotes.quote: If only one of the presidential candidates would make it part of his platform to do something about making Monday part of the weekend. I think he would get a lot of votes.
quotes.author: Thomas Wayne

quotes.quote: Mondays are a lot like getting fat. They make you feel sad, sometimes angry and there is not much scope for liking either fat or Mondays for any reason.
quotes.author: Gary Moll

quotes.quote: Monday is the day of silence, day of the whole white mung bean, which is sacred to the moon.
quotes.author: Chitra Banerjee Divakaruni

quotes.quote: Sometimes it pays to stay in bed in Monday, rather than spending the rest of the week debugging Monday's code.
quotes.author: Dan Salomon

quotes.quote: All men tend to become angry and irritated on the start of the week. It is the start of the week but is the end of all fun and happiness in life.
quotes.author: Venus Rivers

quotes.quote: Even the best weeks start with monday
quotes.author: Nice Peter

quotes.quote: On Monday mornings I am dedicated to the proposition that all men are created jerks.
quotes.author: H. Allen Smith

quotes.quote: This has been such a Monday! I wish I stayed in bed, and I wish that yesterday had never happened.
quotes.author: Lisa Mantchev

quotes.quote: Monday is a great for becoming too busy to die.
quotes.author: Roy Station

quotes.quote: There are no miracles on Mondays.
quotes.author: Amy Neftzger

quotes.quote: If each day is a gift, I would like to know where I can return Mondays.
quotes.author: John Wagner

quotes.quote: On Monday, when the sun is hot, I wonder to myself a lot. Now is it true, or is it not, that what is which and which is what?
quotes.author: A.A. Hodge

quotes.quote: Work in a way that you look forward to Monday mornings
quotes.author: Swami Parthasarathy

quotes.quote: You don't want to have to come into work on Monday already apologizing. I try to save my apologies for what I've done later in the week.
quotes.author: Ike Barinholtz

quotes.quote: Candy is natures way of making up for Mondays.
quotes.author: Rebecca Gober

quotes.quote: Don't let the Monday morning quarterbacks stop you from being bold. You've got to set a high bar.
quotes.author: Antonio Villaraigosa

quotes.quote: Monday morning you sure look fine.
quotes.author: Lindsey Buckingham

quotes.quote: Believe on Monday the way you believe on Sunday.
quotes.author: Rita Schiano

quotes.quote: Monday, Monday, so good to me; Monday morning, it was all I hoped it would be.
quotes.author: John Phillips

quotes.quote: So. Monday. We meet again. We will never be friends—but maybe we can move past our mutual enmity toward a more-positive partnership.
quotes.author: Julio Alexi Genao

quotes.quote: I must break the routines and become a person who becomes productive every Monday. I must break the mindset of unhappiness and turn myself into a happy magnet for Mondays.
quotes.author: Leggy Saul

quotes.quote: Okay, it's Monday but who said Mondays have to suck? Be a rebel and have a great day anyway.
quotes.author: Kimberly Jiménez

quotes.quote: You are in control. Never allow your Monday to be manic.
quotes.author: Andrea L’Artiste

quotes.quote: Find a job you like and you will add five days to every week.
quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.quote: Monday is great if I can spend it in bed. I’m a man of simple pleasures, really.
quotes.author: Arthur Darvill

quotes.quote: Last Monday nite / I saw a fight / Between Wednesday and Thursday / Over Saturday nite / Tuesday asked me what was going on / I said "Sunday's in the meadow / And Friday's in the corn".
quotes.author: John Prine

quotes.quote: It is a custom in Ireland, among shoemakers, if they intoxicate themselves on Sunday, to do no work on Monday; and this they call making a Saint Monday or keeping Saint Crispin's day. Many here adopted this good custom from the example of the shoemakers.
quotes.author: Maria Edgeworth

quotes.quote: Monday, n. In Christian countries, the day after the baseball game.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: "As Monday goes, so goes the week," dames say. Refreshed, renewed, use well the initial day. And see! thy neighbour already seeks his labour.
quotes.author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quotes.quote: Red beans were traditionally cooked while the Monday wash was drying on the line, and since New Orleans humidity made that an all-day job, the beans cooked for many hours.
quotes.author: Rima Collin and Richard Collin

quotes.quote: It's just another manic Monday / I wish it was Sunday / 'Cause that's my fun day / My I don't have to run day.
quotes.author: Prince Nelson

quotes.quote: To Banbury came I, O profane one! / Where I saw a Puritane-one / Hanging of his cat on Monday / For killing of a mouse on Sunday.
quotes.author: Richard Brathwaite

quotes.quote: My good man, Crillon, hang yourself for not having been at my side last Monday at the greatest event that's ever been seen and perhaps ever will be seen.
quotes.author: Henri IV (of Navarre)

quotes.quote: You know you're getting older when every day seems like Monday.
quotes.author: Kitty Carlisle

quotes.quote: He who is not tipsy on Sunday is not worth shaking hands with on Monday.
quotes.author: Albanian Proverb

quotes.quote: Mondays are the potholes in the road of life.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: When life gives you Monday, dip it in glitter and sparkle all day.
quotes.author: Ella Woodword

quotes.quote: Let me ask you something. When you come in on Monday and you're not feeling real well, does anyone ever say to you, "Sounds like someone has a case of the Mondays?"
quotes.author: Peter Gibbons

quotes.quote: Beautiful. Relaxed. But always in the back of your mind, there's the knowledge that it'll soon be Monday. There's no future in being a Sunday-night girl.
quotes.author: Sharon Carter

quotes.quote: We're waiting for the chirp, chirp, chirp, of an eaglet being born, / Waiting for the chirp, chirp, chirp, on this humid Monday morning, in this... / Congressional incubator.
quotes.author: John Adams with Dr. Benjamin Franklin and Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: Monday is a funny thing / Still waiting for the phone to ring / Will my imagination take it slow / After Saturday, my life is changed / In a moment it was rearranged / Strange how easy it is letting go / And I miss your face / Like the sun was in my eyes / And now I'm running blind.
quotes.author: Nick Carter

quotes.quote: You brought your Sunday morning sunshine / Here into my Monday morning rain. / You taught me happiness just one time, / It keeps on coming back again.
quotes.author: Harry F. Chapin

quotes.quote: Easter Monday in the city - / Rattle, rattle, rumble, rush; / Tom and Jerry, Nell and Kitty, / All the down-the-harbour “push,” / Little thought have they, or pity, / For a wanderer from the bush.
quotes.author: Barcroft Henry Thomas Boake

quotes.quote: Always remember that you are unique. Just like everybody else.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
quotes.author: Elvis Presley

quotes.quote: Life begins at 40 - but so do fallen arches, rheumatism, faulty eyesight, and the tendency to tell a story to the same person, three or four times.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: Don't worry about the world coming to an end today. It is already tomorrow in Australia.
quotes.author: Charles Schulz

quotes.quote: Opportunity is always knocking. The problem is that most people have the self-doubt station in their heads turned up way too loud to hear it.
quotes.author: Brian Vaszily

quotes.quote: The only time I don't have any problems in this world is when I am already six feet below the ground.
quotes.author: James Jason

quotes.quote: When you have failed at being nice, you've actually succeeded in being mean. Success is everywhere if you know where to look for it.
quotes.author: Katina Ferguson

quotes.quote: Remember, today is the tomorrow you worried about yesterday.
quotes.author: Dale Carnegie

quotes.quote: The process of learning is a nonstop orgy of wonderment.
quotes.author: Lev Grossman

quotes.quote: The trouble with being punctual is that nobody's there to appreciate it.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: Aspire to inspire before we expire.
quotes.author: Eugene Bell Jr.

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: When you pray be careful of how you respond to what you get. I read somewhere that if you pray for rain. Don't complain about the mud!
quotes.author: Hyacinth Mottley

quotes.quote: The road to success is dotted with many tempting parking spaces.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Watching a person who successfully loses fifty pounds and changes her life is more inspirational than listening to a fitness coach with a perfect body.
quotes.author: Martin Meadows

quotes.quote: If laughter is the best medicine, let's OD together.
quotes.author: Michael P. Clutton

quotes.quote: I enjoy growing older and wiser and learning from my mistakes every single day.
quotes.author: Ellen DeGeneres

quotes.quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
quotes.author: Kyle Chandler

quotes.quote: Here is a test to find whether your mission on earth is finished â€“ If you're alive it isn't.
quotes.author: Richard Bach

quotes.quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Life is like the stock market. Some days you're up. Some days you're down. And some days you feel like something the bull left behind.
quotes.author: Paula Wall

quotes.quote: Goal setting is similar to travelling from point A to point B within a city. If you clearly understand what the goal is, you will definitely reach the destination because you know its address.
quotes.author: Thomas Abreu

quotes.quote: I find television very educational. Every time someone turns it on, I go in the other room and read a book.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Never hold discussions with the monkey when the organ grinder is in the room.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: I believe that if life gives you lemons, you should make lemonade. And try to find somebody whose life has given them vodka, and have a party.
quotes.author: Ron White

quotes.quote: If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping with a mosquito.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.quote: Always do right. This will gratify some people and astonish the rest.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: I always wanted to be somebody, but now I realize I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You'll have to use the stairs, one step at a time.
quotes.author: Joe Girard

quotes.quote: It took me fifteen years to discover I had no talent for writing, but I couldn't give it up because by then I was too famous.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Quality questions create a quality life. Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
quotes.author: Anthony Robbins

quotes.quote: I have never known a man who died from overwork, but many who died from doubt.
quotes.author: Charles Horace Mayo

quotes.quote: To succeed in life you need three things: A wishbone, a backbone, and a funny bone.
quotes.author: Reba McEntire

quotes.quote: Never look back. If Cinderella had looked back and picked up the shoe, she would have never found her prince.
quotes.author: Selena Gomez

quotes.quote: We must overcome the notion that we must be regular. It robs you of the chance to be extraordinary.
quotes.author: Uta Hagen

quotes.quote: I would rather fail in a cause that would ultimately succeed than succeed in a cause that would ultimately fail.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.quote: All you need in this life ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: To me, success is merely the process of fulfilling your own hopes and dreams— not by the standards set by society— but by the standards set by me.
quotes.author: George Pataki

quotes.quote: Success is the space one occupies in the newspaper.
quotes.author: Elias Canetti

quotes.quote: Success is a science; if you have the conditions, you get the result.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: The best advice I've ever received is, 'No one else knows what they're doing either.'
quotes.author: Ricky Gervais

quotes.quote: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney Company

quotes.quote: Ambition is like a treadmill...you no sooner get to the end of it then you begin again.
quotes.author: Josh Billings

quotes.quote: Good advice is something a man gives when he is too old to set a bad example.
quotes.author: Francois de la Rochefoucauld

quotes.quote: Ambition is not a vice of little people.
quotes.author: Montaigne

quotes.quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Life is like a sewer… what you get out of it depends on what you put into it.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: You can't have everything. Where would you put it?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Bad decisions make good stories.
quotes.author: Ellis Vidler

quotes.quote: Optimist: someone who figures that taking a step backward after taking a step forward is not a disaster, it’s more like a cha-cha.
quotes.author: Robert Brault

quotes.quote: Even a stopped clock is right twice every day. After some years, it can boast of a long series of successes.
quotes.author: Marie Von Ebner-Eschenbach

quotes.quote: Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.quote: The trouble with having an open mind, of course, is that people will insist on coming along and trying to put things in it.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: It could be that your purpose in life is to serve as a warning to others.
quotes.author: Ashleigh Brilliant

quotes.quote: If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: When I hear somebody sigh, Life is hard, I am always tempted to ask, ‘Compared to what?
quotes.author: Sydney Harris

quotes.quote: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: We don't stop playing because we grow old; we grow old because we stop playing.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: First rule of leadership: everything is your fault.
quotes.author: A Bug's Life

quotes.quote: Husbands should be like Kleenex: soft, strong, and disposable.
quotes.author: Clue (1985)

quotes.quote: Some people play hard to get. I play hard to want.
quotes.author: Andrew Dice Clay

quotes.quote: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
quotes.author: The Godfather, Part II (1974)

quotes.quote: All I've ever wanted was an honest week's pay for an honest day's work.
quotes.author: Bilko

quotes.quote: I have strong feelings about gun control. If there's a gun around, I want to be controlling it.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
quotes.author: Winnie the Pooh

quotes.quote: I'm bigger than you and higher up the food chain. Get in my belly.
quotes.author: Austin Powers

quotes.quote: You know, it takes two to get one in trouble.
quotes.author: She Done Him Wrong

quotes.quote: A bird may love a fish, Signore, but where would they live?
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: What exactly is the function of a rubber duck?
quotes.author: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (2002)

quotes.quote: Do you know how hard it is to find a decent man in this town? Most of them think monogamy is some kind of wood.
quotes.author: Peggy Brandt

quotes.quote: Fish are friends, not food.
quotes.author: Barry Humphries

quotes.quote: Do or do not, there is no try.
quotes.author: Jedi Master Yoda in Star Wars Episode V: The Empire Strikes Back

quotes.quote: May the Force be with you.
quotes.author: Star Wars

quotes.quote: When women go wrong, men go right after them.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Get busy living or get busy dying.
quotes.author: Tiffany

quotes.quote: Death cannot stop true love, it can only delay it for a little while.
quotes.author: Cary Elwes

quotes.quote: I live at home with my parents. It's just temporary ... 'til they die.
quotes.author: Gordon (Kevin Kirkpatrick), Gamers (2006)

quotes.quote: You can't handle the truth!
quotes.author: A Few Good Men

quotes.quote: I make up a new dance move. It's called the â€œmove on with your life".
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: You can put a cat in an oven, but that don't make a biscuit.
quotes.author: White Men Can't Jump

quotes.quote: You'll live to be a hundred if you give up all the things that make you want to.
quotes.author: Interiors (1978)

quotes.quote: The path of the righteous man is beset on all sides...
quotes.author: Samuel L. Jackson
