quotes.quote: What's the difference between a wife and a job? After 10 years a job still sucks.
quotes.author: What Woman Want

quotes.quote: Insanity runs in my family. It practically gallops.
quotes.author: Arsenic and Old Lace

quotes.quote: Some things are not meant to last, they just take a place in your heart and make you smarter the next time.
quotes.author: Alex and Emma

quotes.quote: Yeah... you're a legend in your own mind.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: You know how men are. They think â€˜No' means â€˜Yes' and â€˜Get lost' means â€˜Take me, I'm yours.'
quotes.author: Megara

quotes.quote: Truth hurts. Maybe not as much as jumping on a bicycle with a seat missing, but it hurts.
quotes.author: Leslie Nielsen

quotes.quote: The doctors say he has a 50-50 chance of surviving, but there's only a ten percent chance of that.
quotes.author: Gregory Hines

quotes.quote: The key is, to not think of death as an end, but as more of a very effective way to cut down on your expenses.
quotes.author: Love and Death (1975)

quotes.quote: Life is a drama full of tragedy and comedy. You should learn to enjoy the comic episodes a little more.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.quote: Well, it's not the men in your life that counts, it's the life in your men.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: I feel the need to express something, but I don't know what it is I want to express.
quotes.author: Interiors (1978)

quotes.quote: Husbands are like wine, they take a long time to mature.
quotes.author: Letters to Juliet

quotes.quote: Between two evils I always pick the one I never tried before.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Gentlemen, you can't fight in here! This is the War Room!
quotes.author: Bud Abbott

quotes.quote: My husband and I fell in love at first sight... maybe I should have taken a second look.
quotes.author: Holly Reed (Mia Farrow) in Crimes and Misdemeanors

quotes.quote: Stupid is as stupid does.
quotes.author: Forrest Gump

quotes.quote: A baby changes your dinner party conversation from politics to poops.
quotes.author: Maurice Johnston

quotes.quote: Adolescence is perhaps nature's way of preparing parents to welcome the empty nest.
quotes.author: Karen Savage and Patricia Adams

quotes.quote: We spend the first twelve months of our children's lives teaching them to walk and talk and the next twelve telling them to sit down and shut up.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: My second favorite household chore is ironing. My first one being hitting my head on the top bunk bed until I faint.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Children are a great comfort in your old age- and they help you reach it faster too.
quotes.author: Lionel Kauffman

quotes.quote: Having one child makes you a parent; having two you are a referee.
quotes.author: David Frost

quotes.quote: When a child is locked in the bathroom with water running and he says he's doing nothing but the dog is barking, call 911.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Kids are like buckets of disease that live in your house.
quotes.author: Louis C. K.

quotes.quote: I used to believe my father about everything but then I had children myself & now I see how much stuff you make up just to keep yourself from going crazy.
quotes.author: Brian Andreas

quotes.quote: Parenting will eventually produce bizarre behavior, and I'm not talking about the kids. Their behavior is always normal.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Never have more children than you have car windows.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Do your kids a favor-don't have any.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: It is amazing how quickly the kids learn to drive a car, yet are unable to understand the lawnmower, snowblower, or vacuum cleaner.
quotes.author: Ben Bergor

quotes.quote: To be a successful father there is one absolute rule: when you have a kid don't look at it for the first two years.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: 24/7 â€“ Once you sign on to be a mother, that's the only shift they offer.
quotes.author: Jodi Picoult

quotes.quote: All of us have moments in our lives that test our courage. Taking children into a house with a white carpet is one of them.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: What is a home without children. Quiet.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: If your kids are giving you a headache, follow the directions on the aspirin bottle, especially the part that says, keep away from children.
quotes.author: Susan Savannah

quotes.quote: Before I got married I had six theories about bringing up children; Now I have six children and no theories.
quotes.author: John Wilmot

quotes.quote: The first half of our lives is ruined by our parents and the second half by our children.
quotes.author: Clarence Day

quotes.quote: Everybody knows how to raise children, except the people who have them.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Always be nice to your children because they are the ones who will choose your rest home.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The biggest thing I remember is that there was just no transition. You hit the ground diapering.
quotes.author: Paul Reiser

quotes.quote: A child is a curly dimpled lunatic.
quotes.author: Ralph Emerson

quotes.quote: Men should always change diapers. It's mentally cleansing. It's like washing dishes, but imagine if the dishes were your kids, so you really love the dishes.
quotes.author: Chris Martin

quotes.quote: Parents are the bones on which children cut their teeth.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: Few things are more satisfying than seeing your own children have teenagers of their own.
quotes.author: Doug Larson

quotes.quote: Raising kids is part joy and part guerilla warfare.
quotes.author: Ed Asner

quotes.quote: Having children is like living in a frat house, nobody sleeps, everything's broken, and there's a lot of throwing up.
quotes.author: Ray Romano

quotes.quote: Children aren't happy without something to ignore, and that's what parents were created for.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: I don't think my parents liked me. They put a live teddy bear in my crib.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Now, as always, the most automated appliance in a household is the mother.
quotes.author: Beverly Jones

quotes.quote: You can learn many things from chidren. How much patience you have for instance.
quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

quotes.quote: A three year old child is a being who gets almost as much fun out of a fifty-six dollar set of swings as it does out of finding a small green worm.
quotes.author: Bill Vaughan

quotes.quote: Fatherhood is pretending the present you love most is soap on a rope.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: In general my children refuse to eat anything that hasn't danced on television.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: A truly appreciative child will break, lose, spoil, or fondle to death any really successful gift within a matter of minutes.
quotes.author: Russell Lynes

quotes.quote: Parenthood is a lot easier to get into then out of.
quotes.author: Bruce Lanskiy

quotes.quote: Like all parents, my husband and I just do the best we can, and hold our breath, and hope we've set aside enough money to pay for our kids' therapy.
quotes.author: Michelle Pfeiffer

quotes.quote: I believe that we parents must encourage our children to become educated, so they can get into a good college that we cannot afford.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: Think of stretch marks as pregnancy service stripes.
quotes.author: Joyce Armor

quotes.quote: Insanity is hereditary you get it from your kids.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.quote: Most children threaten at times to run away from home. This is the only thing that keeps some parents going.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The most remarkable thing about my mother is that for thirty years she served the family nothing but leftovers. The original meal has never been found.
quotes.author: Calvin Trillin

quotes.quote: I figure that if the children are alive when I get home, I've done my job.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: The problem with children is that you have to put up with their parents.
quotes.author: Charles De Lint

quotes.quote: I am not allowed to sing, dance, laugh or wear short skirts. Having a teenage daughter is like living with the Taliban.
quotes.author: Kathy Lette

quotes.quote: The truth is that parents aren't really interested in justice. They just want quiet.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: Usually the triumph of my day is, you know, everybody making it to the potty.
quotes.author: Julia Roberts

quotes.quote: When my kids become wild and unruly, I use a nice safe playpen. When they're finished, I climb out.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Parents are not givers of jobs, or money tellers, or means to inheritance. They are givers of education, affection, sane principles and love.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Sons and daughters are protected not with money, but being examples of rectitude.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Flipping burgers is not beneath your dignity. Your grandparents had a different word for burger flipping, they call it opportunity.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: If you mess up, it's not your parents' fault, so don't whine about your mistakes, learn from them.
quotes.author: Vincenzo Berghella

quotes.quote: Children begin by loving their parents; as they grow older they judge them; sometimes they forgive them.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Children nowadays are tyrants. They contradict their parents, gobble their food, and tyrannize their teachers.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Times are bad. Children no longer obey their parents, and everyone is writing a book.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: Parents should leave books lying around marked 'forbidden' if they want their children to read.
quotes.author: Doris Lessing

quotes.quote: Children are a great comfort in your old age, and they help you reach it faster, too.
quotes.author: Lionel Kauffman

quotes.quote: Children really brighten up a household. They never turn the lights off.
quotes.author: Ralph Bus

quotes.quote: It kills you to see them grow up. But I guess it would kill you quicker if they didn't.
quotes.author: Barbara Kingsolver

quotes.quote: The one thing children wear out faster than shoes is parents.
quotes.author: John Plomp

quotes.quote: If nature had arranged that husbands and wives should have children alternatively, there would never be more than three in a family.
quotes.author: Laurence Housman

quotes.quote: Adorable children are considered to be the general property of the human race. (Rude children belong strictly to their mothers.)
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Sometimes, when I look at my children, I say to myself, 'Lillian, you should have stayed a virgin.'
quotes.author: Lillian Carter

quotes.quote: You see much more of your children once they leave home.
quotes.author: Lucille Ball

quotes.quote: The trouble with children is that they are not returnable.
quotes.author: Quentin Crisp

quotes.quote: A small boy is a noise with dirt on it.
quotes.author: Tom Corr

quotes.quote: If there were no schools to take the children from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
quotes.author: Edgar W. Howe

quotes.quote: There was never a child so lovely but his mother was glad to get him to sleep.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: I want my children to have all the things I couldn't afford. Then I want to move in with them.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: There are three ways to get something done: do it yourself, employ someone, or forbid your children to do it.
quotes.author: Mona Crane

quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a tough child. If you parboil them first for seven hours, they will always come out tended.
quotes.author: W.C. Fields

quotes.quote: If children grew up according to early indications, we should have nothing but geniuses.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.quote: The best way to keep children home is to make the home atmosphere pleasant - and let the air out of the tires.
quotes.author: Dorothy Parker

quotes.quote: Human beings are the only creatures on earth that allow their children to come back home.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: The moment you have children yourself, you forgive your parents everything.
quotes.author: Susan Hill

quotes.quote: The most effective form of birth control I know is spending the day with my kids.
quotes.author: Jill Bensley

quotes.quote: You know your children are growing up when they stop asking you where they came from and refuse to tell you where they're going.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: There are only two things a child will share willingly - communicable diseases and his mother's age.
quotes.author: Dr.Benjamin Spock

quotes.quote: Any kid'll run any errand for you if you ask at bedtime.
quotes.author: Red Skelton

quotes.quote: Familiarity breeds contempt, and children.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: One hour with a child is like a ten-mile run.
quotes.author: Joan Benoit Samuelson

quotes.quote: Do not breed. Nothing gives less pleasure than childbearing. Pregnancies are damaging to health, spoil the figure, wither the charms, and it's the cloud of incertitude forever hanging over those events that darkens a husband's mood.
quotes.author: Marquis De Sade

quotes.quote: Few parents nowadays pay any regard to what their children say to them. The old-fashioned respect for the young is fast drying out.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: There's only one true superpower amongst human beings, and that is being funny. People treat you differently if you can make them laugh.
quotes.author: Jeff Garlin

quotes.quote: As a comedian you are making yourself vulnerable in order to make others happy.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: Comedians are really writers who don't have pens and pencils about them, but they riff.
quotes.author: Carl Reiner

quotes.quote: Comedians are a much rarer and far more valuable commodity than all the gold and precious stones in the world.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: A joker is near akin to a buffoon; and neither of them is the least related to wit.
quotes.author: Lord Chesterfield

quotes.quote: The difficulty with humorists is that they will mix what they believe with what they don’t—whichever seems likelier to win an effect.
quotes.author: John Updike

quotes.quote: Comedians by and large are some of the most sensitive people on earth. Even if they're socially callous.
quotes.author: Dave Chappelle

quotes.quote: For some reason, comedians are still children. The social skills somehow never reach us, so we say exactly what we think without weighing the results.
quotes.author: Bob Newhart

quotes.quote: Comedians are sociologists. We're pointing out stuff that the general public doesn't even stop to think about, looking at life in slow-motion and questioning everything we see.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: All comedians are people who really deeply consider the human experience not only a dirty trick perpetrated by a totally meaningless procedure of accidents, but an unbearable ordeal every day, which can be made tolerable only by mockery in one form or another.
quotes.author: William Saroyan

quotes.quote: If you're a comedian, you can change peoples lives for the better in much smaller increments - not their entire life, but for 15 minutes or a half hour.
quotes.author: T. J. Miller

quotes.quote: Most comedians want to be the architect of their own embarrassment. They have horrible self-esteem issues. I would rather push myself into the mud. I don't want to be pushed into the mud. I think that is probably true. I think most people struggle with self-acceptance. But comedians get a chance to self externalize.
quotes.author: Mike Myers

quotes.quote: Being a funny person does an awful lot of things to you. You feel that you mustn't get serious with people. They don't expect it from you, and they don't want to see it. You're not entitled to be serious, you're a clown.
quotes.author: Fanny Brice

quotes.quote: You never have a comedian who hasn't got a very deep strain of sadness within him or her. Every great clown has been very near to tragedy.
quotes.author: Margaret Rutherford

quotes.quote: I guess funny people are attracted to funny people, and then you get comedy marriages.
quotes.author: Casey Wilson

quotes.quote: There is definitely a pressure for funny people to be funny. People want them to perform all the time.
quotes.author: Marsha Thomason

quotes.quote: I always was a funny guy, the class clown. I had a very funny dad and an extremely funny grandmother.
quotes.author: Charlie Day

quotes.quote: A comedian's body is funny as well as his mind being funny, his whole personage is funny.
quotes.author: Bobby Darin

quotes.quote: Funny people don't really laugh very much.
quotes.author: Tim Heidecker

quotes.quote: Good comedians are great philosophers.
quotes.author: Reggie Watts

quotes.quote: Comedians are not usually actors, but imitations of actors.
quotes.author: Johann Georg Zimmermann

quotes.quote: The funniest comedians are in touch with their emotional level.
quotes.author: John Krasinski

quotes.quote: Comedians are always hitting the topical notes that are on everybody's minds.
quotes.author: Yakov Smirnoff

quotes.quote: Comedians talk to other comedians the way jazz musicians can talk to each other.
quotes.author: David Steinberg

quotes.quote: Many comedians have a dark side that lets them take a negative thing and turn it funny.
quotes.author: Rachel Dratch

quotes.quote: A comedian is not a person who opens a funny door - he's the person who opens a door funny.
quotes.author: Chuck Jones

quotes.quote: Any comedian who tells you how dark and dangerous they are, they're not dark and dangerous.
quotes.author: Patton Oswalt

quotes.quote: Comedians have a huge carte blanche and the ability to get away with saying a lot of things.
quotes.author: Marilyn Manson

quotes.quote: Humorists always sit at the children's table.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Humorists can never start to take themselves seriously. It's literary suicide.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The humorist has a good eye for the humbug; he does not always recognize the saint.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: Being a humorist is not a voluntary thing. You can tell this because in a situation where saying a funny thing will cause a lot of trouble, a humorist will still say the funny thing. No matter how inappropriate.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: No humorist is under any obligation to provide answers and probably if you were to delve into the literary history of humour it's probably all about not providing answers because the humorist essentially says: this is the way things are.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Comedians have a tendency to have a limited range, they tend to do one thing and do it very well, but it's limited.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: Comedians can articulate some important and profound ideas that address a lot of the hypocrisy we're inundated with (in the media).
quotes.author: Ted Alexandro

quotes.quote: There are comedians who focus on everything that is external. They focus on politics and the news, what's going on in that city and that night.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: Comedians are thinkers. The best ones are akin to philosophers, in my opinion.
quotes.author: Ted Alexandro

quotes.quote: A humorist is a person who feels bad, but who feels good about it.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: Every comedian comes to a fork in the road where they have to decide if they're going to make jokes about other people or make jokes about themselves. I chose myself.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: Being a comedian is an incredible thing, but it can be scary sometimes.
quotes.author: Bill Burr

quotes.quote: A comedian needs to have his own filters, needs to know his audience, how far he can push things.
quotes.author: Jeff Dunham

quotes.quote: To become the best comedian, I must be well-rounded.
quotes.author: T. J. Miller

quotes.quote: You have to be delusional to be a comedian.
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: It's really easy to be funny. You get a lot of funny people in a room, the show is funny.
quotes.author: Jill Soloway

quotes.quote: Comedians have the ability to feel other emotions.
quotes.author: Bill Burr

quotes.quote: Most comedians come from a dark past and have a lot of sadness.
quotes.author: Molly Shannon

quotes.quote: Great humorists are great insulters.
quotes.author: Dick Cavett

quotes.quote: A humorist doesn't really do that much note-taking.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: A politician needs the ability to foretell what is going to happen tomorrow, next week, next month, and next year. And to have the ability afterwards to explain why it didn't happen.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Politics is the only art whose artists regularly disown their masterpieces.
quotes.author: Raheel Farooq

quotes.quote: Every politician has a promising career. Unfortunately, most of them do not keep those promises.
quotes.author: Jarod Kintz

quotes.quote: Politics, noun. A strife of interests masquerading as a contest of principles. The conduct of public affairs for private advantage.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: It's easier to fool people than to convince them they have been fooled.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Politics is war without bloodshed, while war is politics with bloodshed.
quotes.author: Mao Tse-Tung

quotes.quote: Politicians and diapers have one thing in common. They should both be changed regularly, and for the same reason.
quotes.author: José Maria de Eça de Queiroz

quotes.quote: Politicians and sports coaches both need to be smart enough to master the game, but dumb enough to think it matters.
quotes.author: David Mitchell

quotes.quote: Politicians are the same all over. They promise to build bridges even when there are no rivers.
quotes.author: Nikita Khrushchev

quotes.quote: The Democrats are the party of government activism, the party that says government can make you richer, smarter, taller, and get the chickweed out of your lawn. Republicans are the party that says government doesn't work, and then get elected and prove it.
quotes.author: P.J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: Since a politician never believes what he says, he is quite surprised to be taken at his word.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: The problem with political jokes is they get elected.
quotes.author: Henry Cate VII

quotes.quote: Everything is changing. People are taking their comedians seriously and the politicians as a joke.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Politics is the art of looking for trouble, finding it everywhere, diagnosing it incorrectly, and applying the wrong remedies.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Being president is like running a cemetery: you've got a lot of people under you and nobody's listening.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: The lavish and shameful use of money to gain political office wouldn't be so bad if the office ever got anything out of it.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Everything is changing. People are taking their comedians seriously and the politician as a joke.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Politics are too serious a matter to be left to the politicians.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: It is inexcusable for scientists to torture animals; let them make their experiments on journalists and politicians.
quotes.author: Henrik Ibsen

quotes.quote: A politician, one that would circumvent God.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: Every politician should have been born an orphan and remain a bachelor.
quotes.author: Bathroom Readers' Institute

quotes.quote: A politician thinks of the next election; a statesman, of the next generation.
quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

quotes.quote: In politics, a lie unanswered becomes truth within 24 hours.
quotes.author: Willie Brown

quotes.quote: In politics, nothing happens by accident. If it happened, you can bet it was planned that way.
quotes.author: Franklin Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Give me control of a nation's money and I care not who makes the laws.
quotes.author: Mayer Amschel Rothschild

quotes.quote: I have sacrificed everything in my life that I consider precious in order to advance the political.
quotes.author: Edith Galt

quotes.quote: In order to become the master, the politician poses as the servant.
quotes.author: Charles De Gaulle

quotes.quote: Politics has become so expensive that it takes a lot of money even to be defeated.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: Radical changes in world politics leave America with a heightened responsibility to be, for the world, an example of a genuinely free, democratic, just and humane society.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: The end move in politics is always to pick up a gun.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: I can't let important policy decisions hinge on the fact that an election is coming up every 90 days.
quotes.author: Gerhard Schroder

quotes.quote: One of the penalties for refusing to participate in politics is that you end up being governed by your inferiors.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: You can't separate oil and politics.
quotes.author: Ian Rankin

quotes.quote: In Washington the only relationship that mattered was the one that served as an adjunct to political influence.
quotes.author: Steve Pieczenik

quotes.quote: Political speeches are like steer horns. A point here, a point here.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Politics and war that my sons may have liberty to study mathematics and philosophy.
quotes.author: John Adams

quotes.quote: Many politicians are in the habit of laying it down as a self evident proposition that no people ought to be free till they are fit to use their freedom.
quotes.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

quotes.quote: Politics is war without bloodshed while war is politics with bloodshed.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Every Communist must grasp the truth, 'Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun'.
quotes.author: Mao Zedong

quotes.quote: Man is by nature a political animal.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: Owning a home is a keystone of wealth… both financial affluence and emotional security.
quotes.author: Suze Orman

quotes.quote: Real estate is an imperishable asset, ever increasing in value. It is the most solid security that human ingenuity has devised. It is the basis of all security and about the only indestructible security.
quotes.author: Russell Sage

quotes.quote: The smallest patch of green to arrest the monotony of asphalt and concrete is as important to the value of real estate as streets, sewers and convenient shopping.
quotes.author: James Felt

quotes.quote: In any market, in any country, there are developers who make money. So I say all of this doom and gloom, but there will always be people who make money, because people always want homes.
quotes.author: Sarah Beeny

quotes.quote: As soon as the land of any country has all become private property, the landlords, like all other men, love to reap where they never sowed, and demand a rent even for its natural produce.
quotes.author: Adam Smith

quotes.quote: There have been few things in my life which have had a more genial effect on my mind than the possession of a piece of land.
quotes.author: Harriet Martineau

quotes.quote: Before you start trying to work out which direction the property market is headed, you should be aware that there are markets within markets.
quotes.author: Paul Clitheroe

quotes.quote: Look at market fluctuations as your friend rather than your enemy; profit from folly rather than participate in it.
quotes.author: Warren Buffett

quotes.quote: It’s tangible, it’s solid, it’s beautiful. It’s artistic, from my standpoint, and I just love real estate.
quotes.author: Donald Trump

quotes.quote: Now, one thing I tell everyone is learn about real estate. Repeat after me: real estate provides the highest returns, the greatest values and the least risk.
quotes.author: Armstrong Williams

quotes.quote:
And that real estate is a sound long-term investment.
And like the real estate market, crime will always trend upwards
quotes.author: Steve Franks

quotes.quote: Up until three years ago I was a regular ol' real estate agent, putting people in homes, speculating on property, that was my job.
quotes.author: Ramin Bahrani

quotes.quote: Being afraid of hurricanes is perfectly rational because they can be quite sinister and destructive. But a fear of real estate agents, a term which here means 'people who assist in the buying and selling of houses,' would be an irrational fear.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: Real estate business... living from mortgage to mortgage... stealing credit like a thief. And the garage - that was a business!
quotes.author: Abraham Polonsky

quotes.quote: How would you like to make money in Real Estate? You seem real easy and willing to put out, so roll in the cream cheese, roll in the cream cheese.
quotes.author: Mark Leveson

quotes.quote: In a town with a ten percent vacancy rate a real estate agent is God, and that's what I am: a real estate agent.
quotes.author: Christopher Markus

quotes.quote: Nothing brings down real estate prices like a good old fashioned gang war.
quotes.author: Dan Houser

quotes.quote: I sold you a house now it's a work store / Real estate sales are the oldest turf war / We've got P? so you know it hurts more / You're on a lease if you're major label
quotes.author: Roland Pemberton

quotes.quote: What's your sales pitch sir? There ain't know telling / I own the same house that I'm selling, yelling / I made a deal today with selling real estate
quotes.author: Roland Pemberton

quotes.quote: You ain't got enough ducats to shell out / Well I'm in front, and yo I feel great / Check out the story to the glory of the real estate
quotes.author: Larry Muggerud

quotes.quote: I used to catch trains (yeah), now it's planes flying / Now I'm real estate and diamond chain buying / I used to count change, now it's eight-figure deals / And I spent about a million on the wheels (yeah) / I can't believe what I've achieved
quotes.author: Russell Vitale

quotes.quote: Get ahead, fall behind / That's the deal, never mind / Try to win, never can / Its because of the real estate man
quotes.author: David Lachlan Thrussell

quotes.quote: So it's time to move on to real estate / And get cake selling big estates
quotes.author: Clifford N Harris

quotes.quote: Encouraging me to use the growing power and ease of the internet to gather, understand, and disseminate information is the best real estate advice I received.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: For those in the real estates business, the information and the speed with one can disseminate and obtain the information are powerful tools.
quotes.author: Donald J. Trump

quotes.quote: Smart real estates investors don't like to waste money. But they don't cut corners that will cost them later.
quotes.author: Don R. Campbell

quotes.quote: Sophisticated real estate investors aren't lucky; they're smart.
quotes.author: Don R. Campbell

quotes.quote: The bottom line is that proven real estate investment systems are systems with a solid history of success.
quotes.author: Don R. Campbell

quotes.quote: Real estate investment us all about long-term wealth creation, and there is always an element of financial risk involved in investing.
quotes.author: Don R. Campbell

quotes.quote: Real estate cannot be lost or stolen, nor can it be carried away. Purchased with common sense, paid for in full, and managed with reasonable care, it is about the safest investment in the world.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: A funny thing happens in real estate. When it comes back, it comes back up like gangbusters.
quotes.author: Barbara Corcoran

quotes.quote: Land monopoly is not only monopoly, but it is by far the greatest of monopolies; it is a perpetual monopoly, and it is the mother of all other forms of monopoly.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: Buying real estate is not only the best way, the quickest way, the safest way, but the only way to become wealthy.
quotes.author: Marshall Field

quotes.quote: If you do not like real estate, all you have to do is make hamburgers, build a business around that hamburger, and franchise it.
quotes.author: Robert Kiyosaki

quotes.quote: If you don't own a home, buy one. If you own a home, buy another one. If you own two homes, buy a third. And, lend your relatives the money to buy a home.
quotes.author: John Paulson

quotes.quote: To sell real estate, you must learn the art of being able to relate to your clients and understand their investment goals.
quotes.author: Susan Smith Alvis

quotes.quote: Real estate investment and purchases are the largest purchases anyone is likely to make.
quotes.author: Susan Smith Alvis

quotes.quote: Real estate enables you to work for yourself.
quotes.author: Susan Smith Alvis

quotes.quote: Real estate is a team sport and to achieve long term success in real estate, you must have a great team.
quotes.author: Phil Pustejovsky

quotes.quote: Top producing real estate agents are a wealth of knowledge.
quotes.author: Phil Pustejovsky

quotes.quote: You'll discover that becoming a successful real estate investor involves thinking like and doing what other successful investors do.
quotes.author: Phil Pustejovsky

quotes.quote: Real estate is a rarely a get-rich-quick endeavor, but when you stick with it, it is usually a stay rich long term experience.
quotes.author: Phil Pustejovsky

quotes.quote: Real estate can provide you with a lifestyle and freedom beyond your wildest dreams.
quotes.author: Cory Boatright

quotes.quote: What I love about real estate is that you can fit your work into little bits of time - if you do it correctly!
quotes.author: Cory Boatright

quotes.quote: Buying real estate as an investment can bring great rewards.
quotes.author: David Reed

quotes.quote: Holding real estate an watching its value rise over the long term is a nice way to retirement for many people.
quotes.author: David Reed

quotes.quote: Real estate investment needs commitment. You need to decide that it's right for you get involved.
quotes.author: David Reed

quotes.quote: Investing in real estate is all about numbers.
quotes.author: Dolf de Roos

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet service to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: My wife and I were happy for 20 years - then we met.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: Whenever I date a guy, I think, is this the man that I want my children to spend their weekends with?
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Love is a two-way street constantly under construction.
quotes.author: Carroll Bryant

quotes.quote: Remember, beneath every cynic there lies a romantic, and probably an injured one.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: I almost had a psychic girlfriend but she left me before we met.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Marriage is a wonderful institution, but who wants to live in an institution?
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Women marry men hoping they will change. Men marry women hoping they will not. So each is inevitably disappointed.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I don't see how being married could be any worse than listening to you talk for twenty years, but that still ain't much of a recommendation for it.
quotes.author: Larry McMurtry

quotes.quote: I was married by a judge. I should have asked for a jury.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Marriage has no guarantees. If that's what you're looking for, go live with a car battery.
quotes.author: Frederick Ryder

quotes.quote: Love is telling someone their hair extensions are showing.
quotes.author: Natasha Leggero

quotes.quote: An archaeologist is the best husband any woman can have; the older she gets the more interested he is in her.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: Keep your eyes wide open before marriage, half shut afterwards.
quotes.author: Laurence J Peter

quotes.quote: The most important thing in a relationship between a man and a woman is that one of them must be good at taking orders.
quotes.author: Linda Festa

quotes.quote: Honesty is the key to a relationship. If you can fake that, you're in.
quotes.author: Richard Jeni

quotes.quote: I can't make you love me. But I can fill my pantry with your favorite snacks and offer you a weekly stipend of $75.
quotes.author: Rob Delaney

quotes.quote: Relationships are hard. It's like a full-time job, and we should treat it like one. If your boyfriend or girlfriend wants to leave you, they should give you two weeks' notice. There should be severance pay, and before they leave you, they should have to find you a temp.
quotes.author: Bob Ettinger

quotes.quote: It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party.
quotes.author: Nick Hornby

quotes.quote: Before marriage, a man declares that he would lay down his life to serve you; after marriage, he won't even lay down his newspaper to talk to you.

quotes.quote: The only true love is love at first sight; second sight dispels it.
quotes.author: Israel Zangwill

quotes.quote: My girlfriend told me that she was seeing another man. I told her to rub her eyes.
quotes.author: Emo Philips

quotes.quote: True love is singing karaoke Under Pressure and letting the other person sing the Freddie Mercury part.
quotes.author: Mindy Kaling

quotes.quote: If you text I love you to a person and the person writes back an emoji â€” no matter what that emoji is, they don't love you back.
quotes.author: Chelsea Peretti

quotes.quote: Some people ask the secret of our long marriage. We take time to go to a restaurant two times a week. A little candlelight, dinner, soft music and dancing. She goes Tuesdays, I go Fridays.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: Save a boyfriend for a rainy day â€” and another, in case it doesn't rain.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Marry a man your own age; as your beauty fades, so will his eyesight.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: The difference between being in a relationship and being in prison is that in prisons they let you play softball on the weekends.
quotes.author: Agatha Christie

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: There's no easy way to break off any relationship. It's like the mozzarella cheese on a good slice of pizza. No matter how far you pull the slice away from your mouth it just gets thinner and longer but never snaps.
quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

quotes.quote: To symbolize out great relationship. I'd like you to have this framed x-ray.
quotes.author: Pat Williams

quotes.quote: Men who have a pierced ear are better prepared for marriage-they've experienced pain and bought jewelry
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: By all means marry; of you get a good wife, you'll be happy. If you get a bad one, you'll become a philosopher.
quotes.author: Socrates

quotes.quote: Love is blind - marriage is the eye-opener
quotes.author: Pauline Thomason

quotes.quote: The best way to get most husbands to do something is to suggest that perhaps they're too old to do it.
quotes.author: Shirley MacLaine

quotes.quote: My husband forgot my birthday and my anniversary. I didn't feel bad. On the contrary. Give me a guilty husband any day. Some of my best outfits come from his guilt.
quotes.author: Betty Walker

quotes.quote: I married Miss Right. I just didn't know her first name was Always.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: If you want your wife to pay undivided attention to every word you say, talk in your sleep.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: When a man and woman marry they become one. The trouble starts when they try to decide which one.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: Some women spend the first part of their lives looking for a husband, and the last part wondering where he is.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: You know the honeymoon is over when the husband takes his wife off the pedestal and puts her on a budget.
quotes.author: David Young

quotes.quote: When a husband brings his wife flowers for no reason, there's a reason.
quotes.author: Marian Jordan

quotes.quote: My husband says I treat him like he's a god; every meal is a burnt offering.
quotes.author: Rhonda Hansome

quotes.quote: My husband and I are either going to buy a dog or have a child. We can't decide whether to ruin our carpet or ruin our lives.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: I figure when my husband comes home from work, if the kids are still alive, then I've done my job.
quotes.author: Roseanne Barr

quotes.quote: The power by which a woman charms a lover and terrifies a husband.
quotes.author: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.quote: My husband and I fell in love at first sight. Maybe I should have taken a second look.
quotes.author: Mia Farrow

quotes.quote: An Ideal Husband Life is a near-death experience.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Failed relationships can be described as so mch wasted make-up.
quotes.author: Marian Keyes

quotes.quote: You know you're happily married, when you'd rather come home than go out.
quotes.author: Heinz Ruhmann

quotes.quote: Marrying means to halve one's rights and double one's duties
quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quotes.quote: Most women try to change a man and then they have changed him, they do not like them.
quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is where he's a little bit blind, and she's a little bit deaf.
quotes.author: Loriot

quotes.quote: A husband is living proof that a wife can take a joke.
quotes.author: Hugh Payne

quotes.quote: How do husbands sort their laundry? 'Filthy' and 'Filthy but Wearable.'
quotes.author: Hugh Payne

quotes.quote: The most effective way to remember your wife's birthday is to forget it once.
quotes.author: Hugh Payne

quotes.quote: Marriage is the process of finding out what kind of person your spouse would really have preferred.
quotes.author: Hugh Payne

quotes.quote: Behind every successful man stands a surprised mother-in-law.
quotes.author: Hugh Payne

quotes.quote: Honolulu: it's got everything, Sand for the children, sun for the wife, sharks for the wife's mother.
quotes.author: Ken Dodd

quotes.quote: The thing to remember is that in marriage the husband and wife are one - and the husband is the one.
quotes.author: Helen Deutsch

quotes.quote: There are four sacred bonds in this life: A parent and child, a husband and wife, a priest and confessor... and manager-talent.
quotes.author: Mitch Glazer

quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a 'perfect marriage' or a 'perfect spouse'. Come on, get real! Marriage is a flawed institution. if you but into that theory.
quotes.author: Shobha Dé

quotes.quote: A happy marriage is the union of two good forgivers.
quotes.author: Robert Quillen

quotes.quote: After marriage, husband and wife become two sides of a coin; they just can't face each other, but still they stay together.
quotes.author: Al Gore

quotes.quote: I had some words with my wife, and she had some paragraphs with me.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: A good wife always forgives her husband when she's wrong.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: When a husband and wife are concerned only about their own individual desires, the stage is set for conflict.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Too many husbands and wives enter into marriage with the idea that their spouse exists for one purpose: to make them happy.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Marriage is not a reform school..Instead of you reforming (your spouse), (he or she) will instead influenced you.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: Retirement is wonderful. It's doing nothing without worrying about getting caught at it.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: The trouble with retirement is that you never get a day off.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.quote: Happiness is being retired and spending all of my kids' inheritance before I die!
quotes.author: Anon

quotes.quote: Age is only a number, a cipher for the records. A man can't retire his experience. He must use it.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.quote: Retirement kills more people than hard work ever did.
quotes.author: Malcolm Forbes

quotes.quote: Gainfully unemployed, very proud of it, too.
quotes.author: Charles Baxter

quotes.quote: Retired is being tired twice, I've thought, first tired of working, then tired of not.
quotes.author: Richard Armour

quotes.quote: Retirement, a time to do what you want to do, when you want to do it, where you want to do it, and, how you want to do it.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: When some people retire, it's going to be mighty hard to be able to tell the difference.
quotes.author: Virginia Graham

quotes.quote: While some people can't wait until their retirement, others feel cheated that they have to retire at all.
quotes.author: Catherine Pulsifer

quotes.quote: Sooner or later I'm going to die, but I'm not going to retire.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: In retirement, every day is Boss Day and every day is Employee Appreciation Day.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: To retire is to begin to die.
quotes.author: Pablo Casals

quotes.quote: For retirement brings repose, and repose allows a kindly judgment of all things.
quotes.author: John Sharp

quotes.quote: Sometimes it's hard to tell if retirement is a reward for a lifetime of hard work or a punishment.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: When a man retires, his wife gets twice the husband but only half the income.
quotes.author: Chi Chi Rodriguez

quotes.quote: Retirement is the ugliest word in the language.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Your best retirement plan for retiring happy and prosperous - don't be a burden on others.
quotes.author: Ernie J Zelinski

quotes.quote: I'm now as free as the breeze â€” with roughly the same income.
quotes.author: Gene Perret

quotes.quote: If you are going to go broke before retirement, retire first.
quotes.author: Dave Erhard

quotes.quote:
Like life, retirement can be full of surprises.
Take when you retire, for example.
quotes.author: Talbot Boggs

quotes.quote: Life Is Too Short--So Kiss Slowly, laugh insanely, love truly, and live with passion.
quotes.author: Andy Vogt

quotes.quote: I can't help it, I run up to him and put my arms around him. Shocked he pulls away, just a little because my arms are still around him and he lifts my head to look at him and kisses me.
quotes.author: Sara Daniell

quotes.quote: The Dictionary defines Soul Mate as: A person who is perfectly suited to another in temperament. Before I met mine, I didn't know I was bonkers.
quotes.author: James Hauenstein

quotes.quote: My wife is really sentimental. One Valentine's Day I gave her a ring and to this day she has never forgotten those three little words that were engraved inside Made in Taiwan!
quotes.author: Leopold Fetchner

quotes.quote: If you text 'I love you' to a person and the person writes back an emoji no matter what that emoji is, they don't love you back.
quotes.author: Chelsea Peretti

quotes.quote: Absence sharpens love, presence strengthens it.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Marriage is the promise of eternal love. As a man of honor I cannot promise eternally what I’ve never felt momentarily.
quotes.author: Kate and Leopold

quotes.quote: Come on up here, darlin’. We could use a little sump’m around here besides the smell of lumber.
quotes.author: The Notebook

quotes.quote: Otis always told me love is a leap. Lamentably, I was never inspired to jump.
quotes.author: Kate and Leopold

quotes.quote: Some things are not meant to last, they just take a place in your heart and make you smarter the next time.
quotes.author: Alex and Emma

quotes.quote: It doesn’t matter who, when, or where…you can always use a hug.
quotes.author: Hope Floats

quotes.quote: I would rather fight with you than make love to anyone else.
quotes.author: The Wedding Date

quotes.quote: A wonderful thing, as time goes by, to be with someone who looks into your face, when you’ve gotten old, and still sees what you think you look like.
quotes.author: The Bachelor

quotes.quote: Hearts will never be practical, until they are made unbreakable.
quotes.author: The Wizard of Oz

quotes.quote: If you’re not willing to sound stupid, you’re not worthy of falling in love.
quotes.author: A Lot Like Love

quotes.quote: Nice Greek girls who don’t find a husband, work in the family restaurant. So here I am, day after day, year after year, thirty and way past my expiration date.
quotes.author: My Big Fat Greek Wedding

quotes.quote: I don’t wanna need you, ‘coz I can’t have you.
quotes.author: Bridges of Madison County

quotes.quote: The being in love is better than the falling in love.
quotes.author: Simply Irresistible

quotes.quote: Twas a Funny Little Fellow of the very purest type, for he had a heart as mellow, as an apple over ripe.
quotes.author: James Whitcomb Riley

quotes.quote: While a maelstrom of unendingly romantic titillation; a world eternally tranquil freedom, was the bedsheet of the miraculously everlasting night.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Too mysterious is too bad; as it imprisons a boundless myriad of explosive emotions deep within the fast diminishing soul.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet service to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: I recently read that love is entirely a matter of chemistry. That must be why my wife treats me like toxic waste.
quotes.author: David Bissonette

quotes.quote: You can't put a price tag on love, but you can on all its accessories.
quotes.author: Melanie Clark

quotes.quote: My wife is really sentimental. One Valentine's Day I gave her a ring and to this day she has never forgotten those three little words that were engraved inside â€” Made in Taiwan!
quotes.author: Leopold Fetchner

quotes.quote: I love you. You annoy me more than I ever thought possible. But I want to spend every irritating minute with you.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find that one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Your words are my food, your breath my wine. You are everything to me.
quotes.author: Sarah Bernhardt

quotes.quote: If you text 'I love you' to a person and the person writes back an emoji â€” no matter what that emoji is, they don't love you back.
quotes.author: Chelsea Peretti

quotes.quote: Love is a lot like a backache, it doesn't show up on X-rays, but you know it's there.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: Real love amounts to withholding the truth, even when you're offered the perfect opportunity to hurt someone's feelings.
quotes.author: David Sedaris

quotes.quote: But too romantic is too good; as it makes you feel alive beyond your own self; as it makes you feel alive for the most fulfilling mission for which God sent you upon on planet earth.
quotes.author: Nikhil Parekh

quotes.quote: She has attained the permanence, she dreamed of, where old stones lie sunning untended stalks blow over her even and swift, like young men running.
quotes.author: Louise Bogan

quotes.quote: Always in the heart she loved, Others had lived, -- she heard their laughter. She lies where none has lain before, Where certainly none will follow after.
quotes.author: Louise Bogan

quotes.quote: THERE’S a rare Soul of Poesy which may be But concentrated by the chastened dreams of constant hearts.
quotes.author: Charles Harpur

quotes.quote: A romantic ruin am I Funny how I catch the eye The vacuum slowly sucks you in.
quotes.author: Richard Thompson

quotes.quote: I'm sorry I'm less romantic than I am funny It's hard coping with my heart, always kept me running walking.
quotes.author: Ice God the Macgyver

quotes.quote: Just you and me at a crossroads then Ain't it funny how we were old friends accidentally thrown together did we intend to be the romantic novel you never want to end.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: Baby I'm a hopeless romantic You pick the sounds for the background to our drive into town.
quotes.author: Natasha Bedingfield

quotes.quote: I want to be romantic But I haven't a chance You've got a sense of humor And humor is death to romance.
quotes.author: Ella Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: Romantic moves we won't have to score Like you were saying what you really want Ah, it's funny you should ask me now It was all right there in the story I just read I'm hard to break and you still ache.
quotes.author: Steve Miller

quotes.quote: Stolen moments in the smoky room monday mornings that would come too soon crazy summers that would never end when the time was spent loving you.
quotes.author: Elton John

quotes.quote: To romantic coastal towns if you want to say I love you then put that toilet seat down.
quotes.author: Brad Paisley

quotes.quote: I gave her laughter, she wanted diamonds I was romantic, she treated my cruelly Where is the mercy, where is the love?
quotes.author: Mick Jagger

quotes.quote: It's kinda frantic we all long to be romantic you try to give yourself away.
quotes.author: Bob Mould

quotes.quote: They say good things take time, that's why I run slow.
quotes.author: Amanda Brooks

quotes.quote: You run funny but you don't run so badly.
quotes.author: Jean Echenoz

quotes.quote: The pleasure of jogging and running is rather like that of wearing a fur coat in Texas in August: the true joy comes in being able to take the damn thing off.
quotes.author: Joseph Epstein

quotes.quote: If you come to think of it, you never see deer, dogs, and rabbits worrying about their menus, and yet they run much faster than humans.
quotes.author: Emil Zapotek

quotes.quote: I learned not to take the lead if I wasn't sure where the finish line was.
quotes.author: Pat Petersen

quotes.quote: Even if you fall flat on your surface at least you are moving forward.
quotes.author: Sue Luke

quotes.quote: Even in high school, you were some kind of fruitcake if you ran, like you were naked in the wind. Nobody else did it; there were no cheerleaders or anything like that,
quotes.author: Charlie Rodgers

quotes.quote: Running is like mouthwash; if you can feel the burn, it's working.
quotes.author: Brian Tackett

quotes.quote: A Sunny day in winter' is a nice way of describing the seasoned runner. I've heard worse.
quotes.author: Roger Robinson

quotes.quote: When I jog I joggle.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Another patron in the restaurant learned of my run, and he sang me an impromptu song opera-style about how what I was doing was crazy. It caught me off guard, and all I could do was laugh!
quotes.author: Jeff Grabosky

quotes.quote: I had my personal soundtrack of echoing cows as I ran through the hills. At the time it seemed quite funny, and if nothing else, it kept my spirits up.
quotes.author: Jeff Grabosky

quotes.quote: Choosing how many days per week to run is like finding a life partner. You just know when it's right.
quotes.author: Meghan KIta

quotes.quote: Before getting finally straightened out, he dealt with his problems in two ways, both a bit extreme. He went on what he calls his divorce diet, and he started running a hundred miles a week. The net result? 'I lost 40 pounds,' he says. '150 if you include my wife.'
quotes.author: Feherty

quotes.quote: Funny dad, you ran six miles; I stayed here eating frozen waffles and lookie here: we both ended up in the same place!'
quotes.author: Peter Sagal

quotes.quote: Long distance running is 90 percent mental and the other half is physical.
quotes.author: Rich Hall

quotes.quote: Act like a horse. Be dumb. Just run.
quotes.author: Jumbo Eliott

quotes.quote: No doubt a brain and some shoes are essential for marathon success. Although if it comes down to a choice, pick the shoes. More people finish marathons with no brains than with no shoes.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.quote: I used to jog but the ice cubes kept falling out of my glass.
quotes.author: David Lee Roth

quotes.quote: I've always felt that long, slow distance produces long, slow runners.
quotes.author: Sebastian Coe

quotes.quote: Run like you stole something.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Jogging is for people who aren't intelligent enough to watch television.
quotes.author: Victoria Wood

quotes.quote: I love running cross country....On a track, I feel like a hamster.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: I run so my goals in life will continue to get bigger instead of my belly.
quotes.author: Bill Kirby

quotes.quote: The trouble with jogging is that by the time you realize you're not in shape for it, it's too far to walk back.
quotes.author: Franklin Jones

quotes.quote: I go running when I have to. When the ice cream truck is doing sixty.
quotes.author: Wendy Liebman

quotes.quote: Good things come slow - specially in distance running.
quotes.author: Bill Dellinger

quotes.quote: My doctor told me that jogging could add years to my life. I think he was right. I feel ten years older already.
quotes.author: Milton Berle

quotes.quote: There was nothing like a Saturday - unless it was the Saturday leading up to the last week of school and into summer vacation. That of course was all the Saturdays of your life rolled into one big shiny ball.
quotes.author: Nora Roberts

quotes.quote: It's not that we spend five days looking forward to just two. It's that most people do what they enjoy most on those two days. Imagine living a life where everyday are your Saturdays and Sundays. Make everyday your weekend. Make everyday a play-day
quotes.author: James A. Murphy

quotes.quote: I told myself that I was going to live the rest of my life as if it were Saturday.
quotes.author: Chip Gaines

quotes.quote: Love me like Saturday night, like three glasses of champagne, like the room is spinning, like you're drunk on my love.
quotes.author: C.J. Carlyon

quotes.quote: Saturday night is perfect for writers because other people have 'plans.'
quotes.author: Mike Birbiglia

quotes.quote: When you are unemployed, weekends are seven days long.
quotes.author: Mokokoma Mokhonoana

quotes.quote: Different cocktails for different Saturday nights.
quotes.author: Drew Barrymore

quotes.quote: Saturday mornings, I’ve learned, are a great opportunity for kids to sneak into your bed, fall back asleep, and kick you in the face.
quotes.author: Dan Pearce

quotes.quote: Saturday is the mightiest day of the week. It's unshakably, overwhelmingly superior. Not only is it a day off of school, the following day is also a day off, like some kind of Super Saiyan bargain sale.
quotes.author: Wataru Watari

quotes.quote:
Oh my sweet Saturday,
I have been waiting for you for six long days
quotes.author: Charmaine J Forde

quotes.quote: Sunday would be lost without Saturday, and I would be lost without you.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Saturday is what gives us a weekend of enjoyment.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Without Saturday, Sunday would just be another day of the week.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Come on, no one works Saturday night!
quotes.author: Rob Grant

quotes.quote: Does anybody remember when Saturday night meant date night?
quotes.author: Joss Whedon

quotes.quote: Ah. I love these lazy Saturdays. Ah. I love these real Saturdays. They're so relaxing.
quotes.author: Matt Groening

quotes.quote: Worth all your roses and snow / Is the blaze of light on a Saturday night / When the barrows are set in a row.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: And you haven't a penny to spend / But you dream that you've pounds and pounds / And arm in arm with your only friend / You make your Saturday rounds.
quotes.author: Edith Nesbit

quotes.quote: In the market of Clare, so cheery the glare / Of the shops and the booths of the tradespeople there / That I take a delight on a Saturday night / In walking that way and in viewing the sight.
quotes.author: Eugene Field

quotes.quote: I saw you wholly to my mind / On Saturday - even one who shrined / All that was best of womankind.
quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

quotes.quote: I wish I could sleep / But I'm tied down / Dirty in these borrowed sheets / It's been a week / And I've singing to my feet, yeah / But I won't admit defeat 'til / Saturday, Saturday, Saturday / Well, come my way
quotes.author: Fisher Joel

quotes.quote: Stone cold sober in the broad daylight / Downtown dancing on Saturday night / Thinking about you makes me feel all right / It's the way that you love me the way that you love me
quotes.author: Richard C. Giles

quotes.quote: Missed the Saturday dance / Heard they crowded the floor / Couldn't bear it without you / Don't get around much anymore
quotes.author: Duke Ellington

quotes.quote: My Saturday was going pretty well until I realized it was Sunday!
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: On this Saturday, remember that you are the master of your fate and the captain of your soul.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Its Saturday I plan on doing nothing and plenty of it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Today is Saturday, which means that the only decision that you should be making is whether to have a bottle or a glass of wine.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: No wedding Saturday within the month of June / But what it is, is something true / Made up of these three words that I must say to you / I just called to say I love you
quotes.author: Peter Breiner

quotes.quote: Saturday night is when you want to do what you want to do and not what you have to do.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: Saturday night happens to be when most people take part in whatever is the current entertainment trend.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: Saturday is still the busiest shopping day of the week, but the opening of stores on Sundays has made it less distinctively busy.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: Saturday night still does have a distinct personality and effect on most people. People still act differently on a Saturday night for no reason other than it's Saturday night.
quotes.author: Susan Orlean

quotes.quote: To me, it always seemed as though Saturday night was the down-home night.
quotes.author: Russell Endo

quotes.quote: I suppose any policeman who's been in Harlem for a month of Saturday nights has had all the experiences he'll ever need, as far as handling violence goes.
quotes.author: Russell Endo

quotes.quote: Saturday night is a time to try new things. Maybe that's why so many people in the older generation had to lose their lives on Saturday night.
quotes.author: Russell Endo

quotes.quote: Saturday night is the night for daring deeds.
quotes.author: Russell Endo

quotes.quote: Earlier this century Saturday was 'bath night'. Wash day. Bed sheets got changed.
quotes.author: Lloyd Jones

quotes.quote: In the postwar years, in quick time, Saturday became the cornerstone of a new social pattern.
quotes.author: Lloyd Jones

quotes.quote: Saturdays are a chance to wake up extra early and enjoy the freedom to do whatever I want.
quotes.author: Michael Crews MBA CFP®

quotes.quote: Saturdays are an escape from school, work, and 'have to' tasks.
quotes.author: Michael Crews MBA CFP®

quotes.quote: I think having more Saturdays sounds great, and having every day be Saturday sound even better.
quotes.author: Michael Crews MBA CFP®

quotes.quote: Sleeping in on a Saturday always feels like a little bit of heaven.
quotes.author: Carla Kringer

quotes.quote: There were many reasons to regard Saturday as the second best day after Friday.
quotes.author: R. Phillip Ritter

quotes.quote: I look forward to packing in the activities to live life to the fullest. To me, Saturdays are invaluable.
quotes.author: Michael Crews MBA CFP®

quotes.quote: It's easier to floss with barbed wire than admit you like someone in middle school.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: School is learning things you don't want to know, surrounded by people you wish you didn't know, while working toward a future you don't know will ever come.
quotes.author: Dave Kellett

quotes.quote: The most important thing we learn at school is the fact that the most important things can't be learned at school.
quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

quotes.quote: In school they told me Practice makes perfect. And then they told me Nobody's perfect, so then I stopped practicing.
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: We all learn by experience but some of us have to go to summer school.
quotes.author: Peter De Vries

quotes.quote: You can drag my body to school but my spirit refuses to go.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: As long as teachers give tests, there will always be prayer in schools.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A man who has never gone to school may steal from a freight car; but if he has a university education, he may steal the whole railroad.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.quote: There are only two places in the world where time takes precedence over the job to be done: school and prison.
quotes.author: William Glasser

quotes.quote: School is one long illness with symptoms that switch every five minutes so you think it's getting better or worse. But really it's the same thing for years and years.
quotes.author: Helen Oyeyemi

quotes.quote: As long as algebra is taught in school, there will be prayer in school.
quotes.author: Cokie Roberts

quotes.quote: You send your child to the schoolmaster, but 'tis the schoolboys who educate him.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: If there were no schools to take the children away from home part of the time, the insane asylums would be filled with mothers.
quotes.author: Edgar W. Howe

quotes.quote: School is practice for future life, practice makes perfect and nobody's perfect, so why practice?
quotes.author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quotes.quote: You can't learn in school what the world is going to do next year.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.quote: In school one learns to ask stupid questions of life.
quotes.author: Marty Rubin

quotes.quote: Show me the man who enjoyed his schooldays and I will show you a bully and a bore.
quotes.author: Robert Morley

quotes.quote: School is the advertising agency which makes you believe that you need the society as it is.
quotes.author: Ivan Illich

quotes.quote: The trouble with school is they give you the answer, then they give you the exam. That's not life....
quotes.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

quotes.quote: Schools kill time and creativity. Find ways to workaround these limitations.
quotes.author: Gossy Ukanwoke

quotes.quote: In recalling their school years, students mostly remember their teachers, and not the courses they took.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Every time you stop a school, you will have to build a jail. What you gain at one end you lose at the other. It's like feeding a dog on his own tail. It won't fatten the dog.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: There is nothing on earth intended for innocent people so horrible as a school.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: No school without spectacular eccentrics and crazy hearts is worth attending.
quotes.author: Saul Bellow

quotes.quote: I said school starts tomorrow. I didn't say I was going to be there.
quotes.author: Kim Harrison

quotes.quote: School days, I believe, are the unhappiest in the whole span of human existence.
quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

quotes.quote: I go to school, but I never learn what I want to know.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: When I say I miss school, I mean my friends and the fun. Not the school.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: A child educated only at school is an uneducated child.
quotes.author: George Santayana

quotes.quote: School means work and work means death. Let's all go take a nap.
quotes.author: Emma Shannon

quotes.quote: Today is the first day of the rest of you life.
quotes.author: Charles Dederich

quotes.quote: The most important day of a person’s education is the first day of school, not Graduation Day.
quotes.author: Harry Wong

quotes.quote: You’re off to great to great places. Today is your first day! Your mountain is waiting, so get on your way!
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.quote: I’ve always loved the first day of school better than the last day of school. Firsts are best because they are beginnings.
quotes.author: Jenny Han

quotes.quote: All children start their school careers with sparkling imaginations, fertile minds, and a willingness to take risks with what they think.
quotes.author: Ken Robinson

quotes.quote: School bells are ringing loud and clear; vacation’s over, school is here.
quotes.author: Winifred C. Marshal

quotes.quote: Let us remember: One book, one pen, one child and one teacher can change the world.
quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

quotes.quote: It’s one of my favorite seasons of the year: Back to School. As a kid, I loved fresh school supplies, new outfits, the change of seasons, and the chance to crack open a new textbook.
quotes.author: Dana Perino

quotes.quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.quote: High school is what kind of grows you into the person you are. I have great memories, good and bad, some learning experiences and some that I’ll take with me the rest of my life.
quotes.author: Giancarlo Stanton

quotes.quote: But if there's a school bus, there needs to be a school!
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: I have to get back in school somewhere. I can't just go home and tell my mother I got kicked out of school.
quotes.author: Michael Schiffer

quotes.quote: Back to school. Back to school, to prove to Dad that I'm not a fool. I got my lunch packed up, my boots tied tight, I hope I don't get in a fight.
quotes.author: Tim Herlihy

quotes.quote: This is not a gay school. We just have a zero tolerance harassment policy.
quotes.author: Ryan Murphy

quotes.quote: No state schools are cheap.
quotes.author: Bonnie Turner

quotes.quote: It's my first day of high school. I have seven new notebooks, a skirt I hate, and a stomach ache.
quotes.author: Laurie Halse Anderson

quotes.quote: School spirit' is a curious term. The phrase might sound as if it refers to a ghost or other undead phantasm haunting an educational establishment like very old gum clinging to a trophy case. What 'school spirit' actually refers to is the belief one particular school is better than another.
quotes.author: Daniel Handler

quotes.quote: It's been two weeks. That's like a decade in high school years.
quotes.author: Rob Thomas

quotes.quote: My father sent me to a school that looked a lot like this one. A military academy in Pennsylvania. Perhaps you've heard of it. The Armitage School.
quotes.author: William P. Kennedy

quotes.quote: Do you think you can handle all of your classes? Don't forget your school happens to be one of the top public schools in the greater Los Angeles area. I'm sure the work load must be tremendous.
quotes.author: Nathanael Coffman

quotes.quote: It's the last day of school! Well, big brother, can you believe it? My last day of school. No more reading, writing, arithmetic! No more learning forever!
quotes.author: Craig Schulz

quotes.quote: Private schools have diversity, mum. There are millionaires, billionaires.
quotes.author: Tom Leopold

quotes.quote: Well, you should be excited at the chance to go back to school. I remember you wanted to return to school, and while it's not the same one.
quotes.author: Raita Honjou

quotes.quote: What I hate most about school is that my mom can't read me my bedtime stories.
quotes.author: Dan Houser

quotes.quote: Because now that you're out of school, you'll be taking a real test.
quotes.author: Greg Johnson

quotes.quote: Ain't no registration / Ain't no student loan / You may not learn to read or write / But you will surely learn to roll dem bones / Get on back to school.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Found myself a matchbook / Beside some hotel bed / Opened it up and looked inside / And this is what it said / Get on back to school.
quotes.author: Jimmy Buffett

quotes.quote: Moving at the High School Hop / Everybody's hopping, everybody's rocking / Bopping at the High School Hop.
quotes.author: Jerry Lee Lewis

quotes.quote: Well open up, honey / It's your lover boy me that's a knocking / Why don't you listen to me, sugar / All the cats are at the High School rocking.
quotes.author: Jerry Lee Lewis

quotes.quote: I can't wait to get to school each day / And wait for you to pass my way / And bell starts to ring / An angel starts to sing.
quotes.author: Brian Holland

quotes.quote: Well we can't salute ya can't find a flag / If that don't suit ya that's a drag / School's out for summer / School's out forever / School's been blown to pieces.
quotes.author: Alice Cooper

quotes.quote: I'm so glad that school is in / An I can see my old classmates again / I worked and slaved the summer through / Doing all the things my mama told me to do.
quotes.author: Josie Cotton

quotes.quote: Let me tell you about scientific management / And the theft of its concealment / The Birmingham School of Business School / In Birmingham / It's main theme
quotes.author: Dave Bush

quotes.quote: Monday morning school day / Eat your breakfast, arrest your books / You're late for school
quotes.author: Corey Hart

quotes.quote: What did you learn in school today / Dear little boy of mine? / I learned that Washington never told a lie / I learned that soldiers seldom die / I learned that everybody's free / And that's what the teacher said to me
quotes.author: Tom Paxton

quotes.quote: When some loud braggart tries to put me down / And says his school is great / I tell him right away / Now what's the matter buddy / Ain't you heard of my school / It's number one in the state
quotes.author: Michael Love

quotes.quote: So be true to your school now / Just like you would to your girl or guy / Be true to your school now / And let your colors fly
quotes.author: Michael Love

quotes.quote: You never have to worry / If you save your lunch money / So you'll have the chance / To get your ticket in a hurry / For the high school dance.
quotes.author: Edmund Sylvers

quotes.quote: Dance to the beat of the band / We're gonna dance at the high school dance / Boogie to the beat of the band, ooh / Boogie to the high school dance.
quotes.author: Edmund Sylvers

quotes.quote: Remember back in high school / When you couldn't wait / For the very first dance / You lay your homework was the rule / And just thinking about the music / Puts you in a trance.
quotes.author: Edmund Sylvers

quotes.quote: Just like in other parts of your life , you will get out of middle school what you put into it.
quotes.author: Sandy Silverthorne

quotes.quote: You could just go to school, do the work and get through it, or you could really dive in and take advantage of all the cool opportunities that are now available to you.
quotes.author: Sandy Silverthorne

quotes.quote: Extracurricular activities are the things that can make your middle school experience rich, fun, and rewarding.
quotes.author: Sandy Silverthorne

quotes.quote: We treat people in the schools like children, not adults. We don't treat them like professionals. The only way to attract bright people to education is to give them working conditions where they can use their minds.
quotes.author: Carl D. Glickman

quotes.quote: The secret is to steal-to walk into another teacher's classroom and say, 'Give me that.'
quotes.author: Harry Wong

quotes.quote: Well-prepared teachers are the most distributed school resource.
quotes.author: Linda Darling-Hammond

quotes.quote: Even in schools with weak or threadbare cultures, it is usually possible to find some things worth celebrating. Those stories, values, traditions, heroes or heroines provide a viral starting point for updating, reinvigorating, and reframing the school's identity and culture.
quotes.author: Lee G. Bolman

quotes.quote: Lord, grant that I may always desire more than I can accomplish
quotes.author: Michelangelo

quotes.quote: You can learn anything you need to learn to achieve any goal you set for yourself. There are no limits except the limits you place on your imagination.
quotes.author: Brian Tracy

quotes.quote: The 5 most common words heard by a school principal: 'Have you got a minute?'
quotes.author: John Blaydes

quotes.quote: Scientists are peeping toms at the keyhole of eternity.
quotes.author: Arthur Koestler

quotes.quote: Electricity is actually made up of extremely tiny particles called electrons, that you cannot see with the naked eye unless you have been drinking.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: When science finally locates the center of the universe, some people will be surprised to learn they're not it.
quotes.author: Bernard Bailey

quotes.quote: Science has now determined there is a direct relationship between the way the ball bounces and the cookie crumbles.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I see they found out the universe is 80 million years older than we thought. It's also been lying about its weight.
quotes.author: Bill Maher

quotes.quote: Being a scientist is like doing a jigsaw puzzle in a snowstorm at night, with some pieces missing, and with no idea what the finished picture looks like.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Sometimes I think the surest sign that intelligent life exists elsewhere in the universe is that none of it has tried to contact us.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Electricity is really just organized lightning.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: If we knew what we were doing, it wouldn't be called research.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Nothing travels faster than the speed of light, with the possible exception of bad news, which obeys its own set of laws.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: What is a scientist after all? It is a curious man looking through a keyhole, the keyhole of nature, trying to know what's going on.
quotes.author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quotes.quote: Science, never solves a problem without creating ten more.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: That's the whole problem with science. You've got a bunch of empiricists trying to describe things of unimaginable wonder.
