quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: If your result needs a statistician then you should design a better experiment.
quotes.author: Ernest Rutherford

quotes.quote: An important scientific innovation rarely makes its way by gradually winning over and converting its opponents: What does happen is that the opponents gradually die out.
quotes.author: Max Planck

quotes.quote: Only two things are infinite, the universe and human stupidity, and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Every science begins as philosophy and ends as art.
quotes.author: Will Durant

quotes.quote: The goal of science and engineering is to build better mousetraps. The goal of nature is to build better mice.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Science is a wonderful thing if one does not have to earn one's living at it.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: I know I am getting better at golf because I am hitting fewer spectators.
quotes.author: Gerald R. Ford

quotes.quote: The reason women don't play football is because 11 of them would never wear the same outfit in public.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: All hockey players are bilingual. They know English and profanity.
quotes.author: Gordie Howe

quotes.quote: The first half was even, the second half was even worse.
quotes.author: Pat Spillane

quotes.quote: Sports are the reason I am out of shape. I watch them all on TV.
quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

quotes.quote: Baseball is almost the only orderly thing in a very un-orderly world. If you get three strikes, even the best lawyer in the world can't get you off.
quotes.author: Bill Veeck

quotes.quote: Wrestling is ballet with violence.
quotes.author: Jesse Ventura

quotes.quote: Playing polo is like trying to play golf during an earthquake.
quotes.author: Sylvester Stallone

quotes.quote: If a tie is like kissing your sister, losing is like kissing your grandmother with her teeth out.
quotes.author: George Brett

quotes.quote: Rugby is a beastly game played by gentlemen; soccer is a gentleman's game played by beasts; football is a beastly game played by beasts.
quotes.author: Henry Blaha

quotes.quote: I've never lost a game I just ran out of time.
quotes.author: Michael Jordan

quotes.quote: If you make every game a life-and-death thing, you're going to have problems. You'll be dead a lot.
quotes.author: Dean Smith

quotes.quote: Baseball is like church. Many attend, few understand.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: I don't have any tricky plays, I'd rather have tricky players.
quotes.author: Abe Lemons

quotes.quote: You win some, lose some, and wreck some.
quotes.author: Dale Earnhardt

quotes.quote: I think football would become an even better game if someone could invent a ball that kicks back.
quotes.author: Eric Morecambe

quotes.quote: The rules of soccer are very simple, basically it is this: if it moves, kick it. If it doesn't move, kick it until it does.
quotes.author: Phil Woosnam

quotes.quote: Pro football is like nuclear warfare. There are no winners, only survivors.
quotes.author: Frank Gifford

quotes.quote: Serious sport is war minus the shooting.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: If a man watches three football games in a row, he should be declared legally dead.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The breakfast of champions is not cereal, it's the opposition.
quotes.author: Nick Seitz

quotes.quote: One day of practice is like one day of clean living. It doesn't do you any good.
quotes.author: Abe Lemmons

quotes.quote: If practice makes perfect, and no one is perfect, why practice?
quotes.author: Derek P.

quotes.quote: If you think it's hard to meet new people, try picking up the wrong golf ball.
quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

quotes.quote: To me, boxing is like a ballet, except there's no music, no choreography, and the dancers hit each other.
quotes.author: Jack Handey

quotes.quote: The only way to prove that you're a good sport is to lose.
quotes.author: Ernie Banks

quotes.quote: I figure practice puts your brains in your muscles.
quotes.author: Sam Snead

quotes.quote: It's a round ball and a round bat, and you got to hit it square.
quotes.author: Pete Rose

quotes.quote: The trouble with referees is that they know the rules, but they do not know the game.
quotes.author: Bill Shankly

quotes.quote: The NFL, like life, is full of idiots.
quotes.author: Randy Cross

quotes.quote: That awkward moment when you're wearing Nike's and you can't do it.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The fewer rules a coach has, the fewer rules there are for players to break.
quotes.author: John Madden

quotes.quote: Tennis and golf are best played, not watched.
quotes.author: Roger Kahn

quotes.quote: Losing is the great American sin.
quotes.author: Jerome Holtzman

quotes.quote: If you can beat a team 6-5, you're better off than losing 5-4.
quotes.author: Casey Stengel

quotes.quote: The most important thing about batting is getting the bat to hit the ball.
quotes.author: Michael Holding

quotes.quote: Football games turn on things that are done by players.
quotes.author: Willie Miller

quotes.quote: I knew I had to win today, otherwise she would have beaten me.
quotes.author: Heather Watson

quotes.quote: It's bad to get hit on your chin. Because it's attached to your head.
quotes.author: Rex Hudler

quotes.quote: Solo homers usually come with no one on base.
quotes.author: Ralph Kinner

quotes.quote: As the ball gets softer, it loses its hardness.
quotes.author: Geoff Boycott

quotes.quote: In order to start winning, we have to stop losing.
quotes.author: Emmanuel Arceneaux

quotes.quote: It's hard to get a hit if you strike out.
quotes.author: Larry Dieker

quotes.quote: We need the players, because without the players we wouldn't have a team.
quotes.author: Howard Wilkinson

quotes.quote: Better teams win more often than the teams that are not so good.
quotes.author: Tom Watt

quotes.quote: Tis not that rural sports alone invite, but all the grateful country breathes delight.
quotes.author: John Gay

quotes.quote: Baseball is the only field of endeavor where a man can succeed three times out of ten and be considered a good performer.
quotes.author: Ted Williams

quotes.quote: Baseball is like church. Many attend; few understand.
quotes.author: Leo Durocher

quotes.quote: Baseball is 90% mental. The other half is physical.
quotes.author: Yogi Berra

quotes.quote: Just sports. Playing games versus playing - sports?
quotes.author: Filmtwob

quotes.quote: If stress burned calories, I'd be a supermodel.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The field of consciousness is tiny. It accepts only one problem at a time.
quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

quotes.quote: There cannot be a stressful crisis next week. My schedule is already full.
quotes.author: Henry Kissinger

quotes.quote: The time to relax is when you don't have time for it.
quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

quotes.quote: Stress is basically a disconnection from the earth, a forgetting of the breath.
quotes.author: Natalie Goldberg

quotes.quote: Stress is when you wake up screaming and you realize you haven't fallen asleep yet.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Reality is the leading cause of stress among those in touch with it.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: It's not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it.
quotes.author: Hans Selye

quotes.quote: It is not a daily increase, but a daily decrease. Hack away the inessentials.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
quotes.author: William James

quotes.quote: There is more to life than increasing its speed.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.quote: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.quote: Resistance creates suffering. Stress happens when your mind resists what is. The only problem in your life is your mind's resistance to life as it unfolds.
quotes.author: Dan Millman

quotes.quote: Stress is caused by being 'here' but wanting to be 'there.'
quotes.author: Eckart Tolle

quotes.quote: If you ask what is the single most important key to longevity. I would have to say it is avoiding worry, stress and tension. And if you didn't ask me, I'd still have to say it.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers.
quotes.author: Fred Rogers

quotes.quote: You can't always control what goes on outside, but you can always control what goes on inside.
quotes.author: Wayne Dyer

quotes.quote: Your head is feeling achy, filled with worries and with stress / sometimes you question if today you truly gave your best / It throbs and it runs, it hurts and it pounds / at times you feel that it never calms down.
quotes.author: Pamela Macdonald

quotes.quote: A stress, say, of a megadyne / That tension I would sooner suffer / Than meet again with such a duffer!
quotes.author: James Clerk Maxwell

quotes.quote: 'Tis war and stress, with never a pause to mourn for a stout heart gone / Till the souls of the Nation Builders shall know that the work is done.
quotes.author: George Essex Evans

quotes.quote: White Star of Womanhood, whose rays / Thro’ years of peace and years of stress / Shed wide o’er all thy people’s ways / The light of nobleness
quotes.author: George Essex Evans

quotes.quote: Life is stress by definition.
quotes.author: Paul Attanasio

quotes.quote: It's like every time I think about how stressed I am, I just end up more stressed. I'm like a big, growing snowball of nerves.
quotes.author: Michael Dante DiMartino

quotes.quote: I mean, what job out there doesn't stress you out of your mind?
quotes.author: Carl W. Adams

quotes.quote: I'm not stressed beyond the stress induced by telling you how stressed I am.
quotes.author: David Shore

quotes.quote: Wish we could turn back time, to the good old days / When our momma sang us to sleep but now we're stressed out
quotes.author: Tyler Joseph

quotes.quote: O beautiful for pilgrim feet / Whose stern impassioned stress / A thoroughfare of freedom beat / Across the wilderness!
quotes.author: Mormon Tabernacle Choir

quotes.quote: Changes, conflicts, and upheavals in some of society's basic values also contribute to the general experience of stress.
quotes.author: Dorothy H.G. Cotton

quotes.quote: The experience of stress is defined first by the person's realization that something is at stake.
quotes.author: Cary L. Cooper

quotes.quote: Over the past 2 decades there has been an increasing belief that the experience of stress has undesirable consequences for health.
quotes.author: Annabel Broome

quotes.quote: Stress may affect health but, at the same time, a state of ill health can both act as a significant source of stress and also sensitize the person to other sources of stress by reducing their ability to cope.
quotes.author: Annabel Broome

quotes.quote: Social support can help you de-stress as it accumulates synthesis of the hormone Oxycontin, which fights stress and anxiety.
quotes.author: Shining Universe Energy

quotes.quote: Fight stress by doing a repetitive, bilateral and rhythmic activity, which functions in a similar manner as meditation.
quotes.author: Shining Universe Energy

quotes.quote: Research has shown that the process of planting and growing can help relieve stress and anxiety.
quotes.author: Shining Universe Energy

quotes.quote: Stress and depression are also triggered by the desire to please others, say your parents, co-workers, friends, spouse, or children.
quotes.author: Shining Universe Energy

quotes.quote: Plan your activities and thoughts using a to-do list, to reduce stress while boosting productivity.
quotes.author: Shining Universe Energy

quotes.quote: Stress is a forerunner of several physical ailments and mental illnesses is increasing our vulnerability all the time.
quotes.author: Chandru Gidwani

quotes.quote: Stress can serve as a powerful motivating force for creativity and achievement.
quotes.author: Chandru Gidwani

quotes.quote: Not all stress is bad. We sometimes hear people sat 'I work better under pressure or 'I thrive on competition'.
quotes.author: Chandru Gidwani

quotes.quote: You have to remember that most stress reactions are self-induced.
quotes.author: Chandru Gidwani

quotes.quote: The right frame of mind is what is termed 'calm energy'- that is, a state of high motivation with no fear or anxiety.
quotes.author: Chandru Gidwani

quotes.quote: Studies show that laughter reduces stress, lowers blood pressure, elevates mood, and boosts the immune system.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: Incorporate a good chuckle into your day to reduce stress and promote relaxation and happiness.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: Hobbies have been medically proven to reduce stress and increase happiness.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: If you find yourself devoting inordinate chunks to time to work, or bringing stress from work home with you, ask yourself how it is affecting your relationships.
quotes.author: Alex A. Lluch

quotes.quote: In Eastern philosophies, stress is considered to be an absence of inner peace.
quotes.author: Brian Luke Seaward

quotes.quote: I Western culture. stress can be described as a loss of emotional control.
quotes.author: Brian Luke Seaward

quotes.quote: A little bit of summer is what the whole year is all about.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: Oh, the summer night, has a smile of light, and she sits on a sapphire throne.
quotes.author: Bryan Procter

quotes.quote: A little bit of summer is what the whole year is all about.
quotes.author: John Mayer

quotes.quote: What good is the warmth of summer, without the cold of winter to give it sweetness.
quotes.author: John Steinbeck

quotes.quote: Oh, the summer night, has a smile of light, and she sits on a sapphire throne.
quotes.author: Bryan Procter

quotes.quote: The summer night is like a perfection of thought.
quotes.author: Wallace Stevens

quotes.quote: And so with the sunshine and the great bursts of leaves growing on the trees, just as things grow in fast movies, I had that familiar conviction that life was beginning over again with the summer.
quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quotes.quote: It’s a smile, it’s a kiss, it’s a sip of wine … it’s summertime!
quotes.author: Kenny Chesney

quotes.quote: Summer means happy times and good sunshine. It means going to the beach, going to Disneyland, having fun.
quotes.author: Brian Wilson

quotes.quote: In summer, the song sings itself.
quotes.author: William Carlos Williams

quotes.quote:
Our one wish is that the summer never ends!
In the summer, I will get a golden tan.
quotes.author: Paul Dini

quotes.quote: It's summer / The heat is blazing like the fourth of July / I got the air con on and its blasting on high / So just grab something cool and jump in your ride / Pick up everybody, I'll be waiting outside
quotes.author: Tim James

quotes.quote: More important than a summer of fun? More important than making new friends? More important than sharing?
quotes.author: Charles Addams

quotes.quote: It's summer / The heat is blazing like the fourth of July / I got the air con on and its blasting on high / So just grab something cool and jump in your ride / Pick up everybody, I'll be waiting outside
quotes.author: Tim James

quotes.quote: You burn so deep with your love so sweet / And you satisfy and mystify my fever /Summer fever, fever, summer fever / Fever, summer fever
quotes.author: Donna Summer

quotes.quote: We're almost in a party zone / Cause summer days and nights / Aren't meant to spend alone
quotes.author: Edward Mike Love

quotes.quote: Here comes summer / School is out, oh happy days / Here comes summer / Gonna grab my girl and run away / If she's willing / We'll go steady right away / Now let the sun shine bright on my happy summer home
quotes.author: Jerry Paul Keller

quotes.quote: Summer summer summertime / Time to sit back and unwind / Here it is the groove slightly transformed / Just a bit of a break from the norm
quotes.author: Craig Simpkins

quotes.quote: There's an air of love and of happiness / And this is the Fresh Prince's new definition of summer madness
quotes.author: Craig Simpkins

quotes.quote: Summer time it's like this see / Jiggin' around with the sun top down / The radio blarin' at the best summer sound / In the palm of my hands got the sun / And the sea and the summer vibrations
quotes.author: Anika Bostelaar

quotes.quote: I feel the summer air now / Blowing though my hair now / I think I'm on top / On top of the world now
quotes.author: Ryan Potter

quotes.quote: And that summer, summer, summer / We went driving in your car / And that summer, summer, summer / We were down for living fast / And that summer, summer, summer / We would always go too far / And that summer, summer, summer / We went driving in your car
quotes.author: Ryan Potter

quotes.quote: When summer time has come, and all / The world is in the magic thrall / Of perfumed airs that lull each sense / To fits of drowsy indolence; / When skies are deepest blue above, / And flow'rs aflush,--then most I love
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: Above the rocks of grief and tears! / 'Tis wealth enough of joy for me / In summer time to simply be.
quotes.author: Paul Laurence Dunbar

quotes.quote: Let summer day be changed from day, / Like following surges of the ebb and flow; / And flow brings breath of saltiness and blithe spray, / And ebb long music of seas plashing low.
quotes.author: Augusta Davies Webster

quotes.quote: Sometimes tigers appear in night dreams / Chased by children's therapeutic schemes / A time when summer shadows are long / Wrapped inside faithful sing-a-long-songs.
quotes.author: Jean Elizabeth Ward

quotes.quote: As summer vacations glide past tomorrow / They leave behind thoughts of sorrows / There by the daring sea as we bravely / Dive into tranquility and pray / Oh let it be, please, let it be, once again, today.
quotes.author: Jean Elizabeth Ward

quotes.quote: Ice within my heart / Feels like the icicles hanging / I miss summer time
quotes.author: Jean Elizabeth Ward

quotes.quote: Summer and nature explanation are a natural pairing. Typically, kids and their parents enjoy at least a portion of the summer together.
quotes.author: Lisa Jo Rudy

quotes.quote: The lovely summer flowers / Spread a beauty all around / And charm the golden hours As we pace the garden round./ The lovely summer flowers / Yielding fragrance on the air / When wash'd by sparkling showers / They appear more sweet and fair. / The lovely summer flowers! / How delightful one and all / When dew-drops among the bowers / Like as many diamonds fall!
quotes.author: Andrew Park

quotes.quote: The loveliest bud in the bower where she blows / The spring may return, and the summer resuming / Its mantle of gold / may lie bright on the stream.
quotes.author: Andrew Park

quotes.quote: As summer matures and autumn approaches, eastern forests bear fruit in the most literal sense. Many species of trees, shrubs, and wildflowers enclose their seeds in fleshy fruits.
quotes.author: John C. Kricher

quotes.quote: A mustard. Blooms from early spring trough late summer. Bright yellow flower clusters. Deeply lobed leaves.
quotes.author: John C. Kricher

quotes.quote: In early summer, the entire archipelago except for the northernmost island of Hokkaido enters the rainy season, known in Japanese as baiu, or 'plum blossom rains', the time when flowering plums begin producing fruit.
quotes.author: C. W. Nikoru

quotes.quote: Once the rainy season is over, summer in Japan is steaming hot. The average humidity in Tokyo in the summer is consistently over eighty percent.
quotes.author: C. W. Nikoru

quotes.quote: Heat and cold alike last only till the equinox.
quotes.author: Japanese Proverb

quotes.quote: Despite the shortness of the summer, traditional Japanese clothing, housing, and lifestyles are geared primarily for that reason.
quotes.author: C. W. Nikoru

quotes.quote: Summer conditions of warmer temperatures, long daylight hours and pools of water.
quotes.author: Edward Paul Ortleb

quotes.quote: Summer silence can be filled with blessings from all our sense. We can breathe in a myriad of fragrances carried on summer breezes and breathe away the stress of living in the past lane of modern life.
quotes.author: Yvonne Martinez Ward

quotes.quote: Though summer silence is not often still or quite, we can breathe in the summer silence and store memories of summer's gifts for those long winter days ahead when the sun doesn't shine brightly.
quotes.author: Yvonne Martinez Ward

quotes.quote: Summer is finally here! School is out and I am kicking back my heels and watching the clouds go by.
quotes.author: Yvonne Martinez Ward

quotes.quote: Summer is a season if bounty, but more than any other fruit, it's watermelon that marks the season of those hazy, lazy days of rest and relaxation, of slurping and dribbling watermelon juice down my chin.
quotes.author: Yvonne Martinez Ward

quotes.quote: Summer is a time to be happy. It is a grand season! I absorb summer's deep array of color which adds beauty to my eyes.
quotes.author: Yvonne Martinez Ward

quotes.quote: During summer vacation, you get to do all your favorite things; cook hot dogs over a campfire (while being eaten alive by mosquitoes).
quotes.author: Bruce Lansky

quotes.quote: In the summer, the choice is ours. Generally, no homework or term papers are due in the summer.
quotes.author: Neill Seltzer

quotes.quote: The coldest winter I ever spent was a summer in San Francisco.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: A lot of parents pack up their troubles and send them off to summer camp.
quotes.author: Raymond Duncan

quotes.quote: Being a child at home alone in the summer is a high risk occupation. If you call your mother at work thirteen times an hour, she can hurt you.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Summer vacation: where you drink triple, see double and act single.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Summer: Hair gets lighter. Skin gets darker. Water gets warmer. Drinks get colder. Music gets louder. Nights get longer. Life gets better
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Being a new teacher is like trying to fly an airplane while building it.
quotes.author: Rick Smith

quotes.quote: Being a teacher is a lot like being a rock star.
quotes.author: Heidi McDonald

quotes.quote: Being a teacher is not a 9 - 5 job.
quotes.author: Heidi McDonald

quotes.quote: Educators are the only people who lose sleep over other people's children.
quotes.author: Nicholas A. Ferroni

quotes.quote: If you really want to know about the future, don’t ask a technologist, a scientist, a physicist. No! Don’t ask somebody who’s writing code. No, if you want to know what society’s going to be like in 20 years, ask a kindergarten teacher.
quotes.author: Clifford Stoll

quotes.quote: Teachers are the only professionals who have to respond to bells every forty-five minutes and come out fighting.
quotes.author: Frank McCourt

quotes.quote: In becoming a teacher, I've lost my mind ... but found my heart and soul.
quotes.author: Heidi McDonald

quotes.quote: Scornful of teacher's rod and binding rule forever broken and without avail.
quotes.author: Claude Mckay

quotes.quote: You are a teacher, you are a head and for everyone you are a leader.
quotes.author: Mewlana Jalaluddin Rumi

quotes.quote: Time is a great teacher, but unfortunately it kills all its pupils.
quotes.author: Louis-Hector Berlioz

quotes.quote: A teacher's job is to take a bunch of live wires and see that they are well-grounded.
quotes.author: D. Martin

quotes.quote: Sunday is a teacher's day of REST: the REST of the laundry, the REST of the housework, and grade the REST of the papers.
quotes.author: Heidi McDonald

quotes.quote: As long as teachers give tests, there will always be prayer in schools.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A very wise old teacher once said: I consider a day's teaching wasted if we do not all have one hearty laugh.
quotes.author: Gilbert Highet

quotes.quote: A cross-eyed teacher can keep twice the number of children in order than any other, because the pupils do not know who she's looking at.
quotes.author: John R. Kemble

quotes.quote: What a polite game tennis is. The chief word in it seems to be "sorry" and admiration of each other's play crosses the net as frequently as the ball.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.quote: Good shot, bad luck, and hell are the five basic words to be used in a game of tennis, though these, of course, can be slightly amplified.
quotes.author: Virginia Graham

quotes.quote: The depressing thing about tennis is that no matter how good I get, I'll never be as good as a wall.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: An otherwise happily married couple may turn a mixed doubles game into a scene fromÂ Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf.
quotes.author: Rod Laver

quotes.quote: Why has slamming a ball with a racquet become so obsessive a pleasure for so many of us? It seems clear to me that a primary attraction of the sport is the opportunity it gives to release aggression physically without being arrested for felonious assault.
quotes.author: Nat Hentoff

quotes.quote: Whoever said, "It's not whether you win or lose that counts," probably lost.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: Tennis is not a gentle game. Psychologically, it is vicious. That people are only just beginning to come to terms with this fact illustrates just how big a con trick has been perpetrated on the non-playing tennis public - and even a few players, usually losing players - for decades.
quotes.author: Richard Evans

quotes.quote: Tennis is a psychological sport, you have to keep a clear head. That is why I stopped playing.
quotes.author: Boris Becker

quotes.quote: Though your game is hardly the best, you can fray your opponent's nerves by methodically bouncing the ball at least ten times before your serves.
quotes.author: Arnold J. Zarett

quotes.quote: The serve was invented so the net could play.
quotes.author: Bill Cosby

quotes.quote: 'Oh and Oh' is a tennis term . . . . It's a nice way of saying you took your opponent to pieces.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: The fifth set is not about tennis, it's about nerves.
quotes.author: Boris Becker

quotes.quote: If you can keep playing tennis when somebody is shooting a gun down the street, that's concentration.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: Tennis: a racquet sport in which two players compete to see who has the shortest temper, the worst memory, the poorest eyesight, and the slowest watch.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: In tennis, the addict moves about a hard rectangle and seeks to ambush a fuzzy ball with a modified snow-shoe.
quotes.author: Elliot Chaze

quotes.quote: She comes from a tennis playing family. Her father's a dentist.
quotes.author: BBC 2

quotes.quote: I have always considered tennis as a combat in an arena between two gladiators who have their racquets and their courage as their weapons.
quotes.author: Yannick Noah

quotes.quote: Tennis is a perfect combination of violent action taking place in an atmosphere of total tranquillity.
quotes.author: Billie Jean King

quotes.quote: The trouble with me is that every match I play against five opponents: umpire, crowd, ball boys, court, and myself.
quotes.author: Goran IvaniÅ¡eviÄ‡

quotes.quote: Life is like a game of tennis; the player who serves well seldom loses.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The primary conception of tennis is to get the ball over the net and at the same time to keep it within the bounds of the court; failing this, within the borders of the neighborhood.
quotes.author: Elliot Chaze

quotes.quote: Tennis and golf are best played, not watched.
quotes.author: Roger Kahn

quotes.quote: Tennis is an addiction that once it has truly hooked a man will not let him go.
quotes.author: Russell Lynes

quotes.quote: What is the single most important quality in a tennis champion? I would have to say desire, staying in there and winning matches when you are not playing that well.
quotes.author: John McEnroe

quotes.quote: When I was 40, my doctor advised me that a man in his 40's shouldn't play tennis. I heeded his advice carefully and could hardly wait to reach 50 to start again.
quotes.author: Hugo Black

quotes.quote: Tennis; a racket sport in which two players compete to see who has the shortest temper, the worst memory, the poorest eyesight and the slowest watch.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Tennis is mostly mental. You win or lose the match before you even go out there.
quotes.author: Venus Williams

quotes.quote: You don't have to be pretty for people to come and see you play. At the same time, if you're a good athlete, it doesn't mean you're not a woman.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: Behind every tennis player there is another tennis player
quotes.author: John McPhee

quotes.quote: No one is more serious about his game than a weekend tennis player.
quotes.author: Jimmy Cannon

quotes.quote: I play Cinderella tennis. That is I don't quite get to the ball.
quotes.author: Larry Adler

quotes.quote: The worst thing I ever said to a tennis umpire was, 'Are you sure?'
quotes.author: Rod Laver

quotes.quote: If you see a tennis player as if he is working hard, that means he isn't very good.
quotes.author: Helen Wills Moody

quotes.quote: Tennis is a young man's game. Until you're twenty-five, you can play singles. From twenty-five to thirty-five, you should play doubles. I won't tell you exactly how old I am, but when I played, there were twenty-eight men on the court—just on my side of the net.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: In lawn tennis mixed, the basic chivalry move is to pretend to serve less fiercely to the woman taken to the man. This is particularly useful if your first service tends to be out in any case.
quotes.author: Stephen Potter

quotes.quote: Andrea Jaeger plays tennis like she's double-parked.
quotes.author: Mary Carillo

quotes.quote: What a polite game tennis is. The chief word in it seems to be 'sorry' and admiration of each other's play crosses the net as frequently as the ball.
quotes.author: J.M. Barrie

quotes.quote: Pavarotti is very difficult to pass at the net in tennis, with or without a racquet.
quotes.author: Peter Ustinov

quotes.quote: No doubt about it... every day in every way my game grows stronger. I saw one enthusiast the other day playing with his racket out of the press. I'll have to try that.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Men hate to lose. I beat my husband once at tennis. I asked him, 'Will we ever make love again?' He said, 'Yes...but not with each other.'
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: Anybody who can dial a telephone can master tennis scoring in about fifteen minutes.
quotes.author: Sally Poplin

quotes.quote: I call tennis the McDonald's of sport—you go in, they make a quick buck out of you and you're out.
quotes.author: Pat Cash

quotes.quote: New Yorkers love it when you spill your guts out there. Spill your guts at Wimbledon and they make you stop and clean it up.
quotes.author: Jimmy Connors

quotes.quote: I'd as soon write free verse as play tennis with the net down.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: If you can react the same way to winning and losing, that's a big accomplishment. That quality is important because it stays with you the rest of your life, and there's going to be a life after tennis that's a lot longer than your tennis life.
quotes.author: Chris Evert Lloyd

quotes.quote: Love is very much like a tennis match...you'll never win consistently until you learn to serve well.
quotes.author: Dan P. Herod

quotes.quote: He's quick enough to play tennis by himself.
quotes.author: Jim Killingsworth

quotes.quote: It’s one-on-one out there, man. There ain't no hiding. I can't pass the ball.
quotes.author: Pete Sampras

quotes.quote: Greatest thing in life: Winning a tennis match. Second greatest thing in life: Losing a tennis match
quotes.author: Jimmy Connors

quotes.quote: Tennis was never work for me, tennis was fun. And the tougher the battle and the longer the match, the more fun I had
quotes.author: Jimmy Connors

quotes.quote: When you do something best in life, you don't really want to give that up – and for me it’s tennis.
quotes.author: Roger Federer

quotes.quote: Girls had never been important. I’d had a girlfriend or two and had liked them a lot but it wasn't love, because my first love was tennis.
quotes.author: Boris Becker

quotes.quote: The tennis ball doesn't know how old I am. The ball doesn't know if I'm a man or a woman or if I come from a communist country or not. Sport has always broken down these barriers.
quotes.author: Martina Navratilova

quotes.quote: I can't become satisfied, because if I get satisfied, I’ll be like, 'Oh, I've won Wimbledon, I've won the U.S. Open. Now can I relax?' But now people are really going to be fighting to beat me.
quotes.author: Serena Williams

quotes.quote: Actually, I tossed it nicely, landed nicely, like airplane. No warning, beautiful. That's the art of throwing racquets.
quotes.author: Goran Ivanisevic

quotes.quote: When the Williams sisters play tennis, it gets pretty hot. When they start grunting, I'm in.
quotes.author: Robin Williams

quotes.quote: Sex doesn't interfere with your tennis; it’s staying out all night trying to find it that affects your tennis
quotes.author: Andre Agassi

quotes.quote: When I play, I feel like in a theatre, why should I look ugly then, because I'm a tennis player?
quotes.author: Anna Kournikova

quotes.quote: I asked my doctors if I'd be able to play singles tennis and they said I could. That made me very happy since I haven't played in five years.
quotes.author: Walter Cronkite

quotes.quote: The Thanksgiving tradition is, we overeat. â€˜Hey, how about at Thanksgiving we just eat a lot?' But we do that every day Oh. What if we eat a lot with people that annoy the hell out of us?
quotes.author: Jim Gaffigan

quotes.quote: Archeologists 10,000 years from now will believe this was a sacred feast where gravy boats were worshipped.
quotes.author: Just Bill

quotes.quote: How to cut a turkey the Republican way: give 1% of your guests 99% of the meat.
quotes.author: Andy Borowitz

quotes.quote: It was dramatic to watch my grandmother decapitate a turkey with an ax the day before Thanksgiving. Nowadays the expense of hiring grandmothers for the ax work would probably qualify all turkeys so honored with gourmet status.
quotes.author: Russell Baker

quotes.quote: I'm looking forward to seeing pie this Thanksgiving more than members of my own family.
quotes.author: Damien Fahey

quotes.quote: My cooking is so bad my kids thought Thanksgiving was to commemorate Pearl Harbor.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: I celebrated Thanksgiving in an old-fashioned way. I invited everyone in my neighborhood to my house, we had an enormous feast, and then I killed them and took their land.
quotes.author: Jon Stewart

quotes.quote: When I was a kid in Indiana, we thought it would be fun to get a turkey a year ahead of time and feed it and so on for the following Thanksgiving. But by the time Thanksgiving came around, we sort of thought of the turkey as a pet, so we ate the dog. Only kidding. It was the cat!
quotes.author: David Letterman

quotes.quote: You can tell you ate too much for Thanksgiving when you have to let your bathrobe out.
quotes.author: Jay Leno

quotes.quote: Most turkeys taste better the day after; my mother's tasted better the day before.
quotes.author: Rita Rudner

quotes.quote: On this Thanksgiving day, let us be grateful that we were not born turkeys.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: A new survey found that 80 percent of men claim they help cook Thanksgiving dinner. Which makes sense, when you hear they consider saying that smells good to be helping.
quotes.author: Jimmy Fallon

quotes.quote: Last Thanksgiving I shot my own turkey. It was fun. That shotgun going, Blam! Everybody at the supermarket just staring. Why track them when I know where they are?
quotes.author: Kenny Rogerson

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving dinners take eighteen hours to prepare. They are consumed in twelve minutes. Half-times take twelve minutes. This is not coincidence.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is a magical time of year when families across the country join together to raise America's obesity statistics. Personally, I love Thanksgiving traditions: watching football, making pumpkin pie, and saying the magic phrase that sends your aunt storming out of the dining room to sit in her car.
quotes.author: Stephen Colbert

quotes.quote: We're having something different this year for Thanksgiving. Instead of a turkey, we're having a swan. You get more stuffing.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving, man. Not a good day to be my pants.
quotes.author: Kevin James

quotes.quote: What we're really talking about is a wonderful day set aside on the fourth Thursday of November when no one diets. I mean, why else would they call it Thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: An optimist is a person who starts a new diet on Thanksgiving Day.
quotes.author: Irv Kupcinet

quotes.quote: A lot of Thanksgiving days have been ruined by not carving the turkey in the kitchen.
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is an emotional time. People travel thousands of miles to be with people they see only once a year. And then discover once a year is way too often.
quotes.author: Johnny Carson

quotes.quote: It took me three weeks to stuff the turkey. I stuffed it through the beak.
quotes.author: Phyllis Diller

quotes.quote: You know that just before the first Thanksgiving there was one wise old Native American woman saying, Don't feed them. If you feed them, they'll never leave.
quotes.author: Dylan Brody

quotes.quote: I dropped the turkey after rubbing olive oil all over it. I rinsed it off, rubbed the oil on again, and cooked it. Didn't tell anybody for 10 years... I just told them last year. Oh well, it didn't kill anybody or make them sick!
quotes.author: Debbie K. Jefferson

quotes.quote: We began to view Thanksgiving as just another paid holiday.
quotes.author: Shari MacDonald

quotes.quote: The observance of Thanksgiving Day had been derived from the Pilgrim Fathers.
quotes.author: Robert Tracy McKenzie

quotes.quote: I pray for you, that all your misgivings will be melted to thanksgivings.
quotes.author: Jim Elliot

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving Day, a function which originated in New England two or three centuries ago when those people recognized that they really had something to be thankful for -- annually, not oftener -- if they had succeeded in exterminating their neighbors, the Indians, during the previous twelve months instead of getting exterminated by their neighbors, the Indians.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving Day became a habit, for the reason that in the course of time, as the years drifted on, it was perceived that the exterminating had ceased to be mutual and was all on the white man's side, consequently on the Lord's side; hence it was proper to thank the Lord for it and extend the usual annual compliments.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The funny thing about Thanksgiving ,or any big meal, is that you spend 12 hours shopping for it then go home and cook,chop,braise and blanch. Then it's gone in 20 minutes and everybody lies around sortof in a sugar coma and then it takes 4 hours to clean it up.
quotes.author: Ted Allen

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving-giving thanks in everything-prepares the way that God might show us His fullest salvation in Christ.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: It's only when you live the prayer of thanksgiving that you live the power of trusting God.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is the one thing God asks to be done in everything and always--- He knows what precedes the miracle.
quotes.author: Ann Voskamp

quotes.quote: America has developed a pie tradition unequivocally and unapologetically at the sweet end of the scale, and at no time is this better demonstrated than at Thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Janet Clarkson

quotes.quote: In 1863, Abraham Lincoln declared two Thanksgivings. One was held in August. The second, held in November, was to give thanks for the nation's blessings. This fall celebration caught on and has been a tradition ever since.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving has many symbols, including turkeys, Pilgrims, and pumpkins. The cornucopia or "horn of plenty", is a symbol for the Thanksgiving harvest. This cone-shaped horn is often filled with fruits, nuts, vegetables, and sometimes even flowers.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: Why do so many people shop for cars around Thanksgiving? It's a good time to buy an autumn-mobile.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: Why is Thanksgiving such a smart holiday? Because it's in Know-vermber.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: What's the sleepiest thing at Thanksgiving dinner?Your nap-kin.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: Which weigh more, a pound of fruit or a pound of nuts? Neither, they both weigh a pound.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: What do police officers eat on Thanksgiving? Corn on the cop.
quotes.author: Linda Bozzo

quotes.quote: My first thought in the morning is thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: My first thought in the morning is thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is a nice thought.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: I know what I'm having for Thanksgiving and it ain't turkey.
quotes.author: Anthony T. Hincks

quotes.quote: Why wait until the first Tuesday after Thanksgiving to give. Just give a little every day and help somebody along the way.
quotes.author: Charmaine J. Forde

quotes.quote: Gratitude is the inward feeling of kindness received. Thankfulness is the natural impulse to express that feeling. Thanksgiving is the following of that impulse.
quotes.author: Henry Van Dyke

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is a spiritual exercise, necessary to the building of a healthy soul. It takes us out of the stuffiness of ourselves into the fresh breeze and sunlight of the will of God.
quotes.author: Elisabeth Elliot

quotes.quote:
Don't wait until the fourth Thursday in November, to sit with family and friends to give thanks.
Make every day a day of Thanksgiving!
quotes.author: Charmaine J Forde

quotes.quote: Living in thanksgiving daily is a habit; we must open our hearts to love more, we must open our arms to hug more, we must open our eyes to see more and finally, we must live our lives to serve more.
quotes.author: Farshad Asl

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is an attitude that must be rooted in the ‘gift of life’ if we ever hope to be thankful for the ‘gifts’ of life.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is not only being aware of the abundance of good in the world but embracing it.
quotes.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving is not some formulaic action based on a tedious ledger that neatly tallies everything I have received so I can determine if being thankful is warranted or not. Rather, it’s appreciating the fact that I have already received the privilege of living life which in and of itself will fill the whole of my ledger for the whole of my life.
quotes.author: Craig D. Lounsbrough

quotes.quote: The purest form of thanksgiving unto God is a reflected in our knowledge and understanding about who He is, not what we receive from Him! Thanksgiving is a continuous celebration of God's awesome nature and Supreme Being!
quotes.author: Israelmore Ayivor

quotes.quote: It was as if God had become not only the object of my praise and thanksgiving but my creative partner as well.
quotes.author: David Brazzeal

quotes.quote: Thanksgiving means thanking the givers.
quotes.author: Vikrmn

quotes.quote: Inside some of us is a thin person struggling to get out, but they can usually be sedated with a few pieces of chocolate cake.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: You know what the secret to weight loss is? Don't eat much.
quotes.author: Simon Cowell

quotes.quote: Diets are for those who are thick and tired of it.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Successful weight loss takes programming, not willpower.
quotes.author: Phil Mcgraw

quotes.quote: Exercise is a dirty word. Every time I hear it I wash my mouth out with chocolate.
quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

quotes.quote: The cardiologist's diet: If it tastes good, spit it out.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Probably nothing in the world arouses more false hopes than the first four hours of a diet.
quotes.author: Dan Bennett

quotes.quote: The second day of a diet is always easier than the first. By the second day, you are off it.
quotes.author: Jackie Gleason

quotes.quote: At the end of every diet, the path curves back to the trough.
quotes.author: Mason Cooley

quotes.quote: Saying yes to the skinny jeans by saying no to the donuts.
quotes.author: Betsy Canas Garmon

quotes.quote: Here's the secret to weight loss: It's all about crowding out, not cutting out.
quotes.author: Kathy Freston

quotes.quote: When I buy cookies I eat just four and throw the rest away. But first I spray them with Raid so I won't dig them out of the garbage later. Be careful, though, because that Raid really doesn't taste that bad.
quotes.author: Janette Barber

quotes.quote: I have gained and lost the same ten pounds so many times over and over again my cellulite must have dÃ©jÃ  vu.
quotes.author: Jane Wagner

quotes.quote: Drinking three glasses of water before every meal will help you lose weight, because you will burn a lot of calories running to the bathroom.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: My doctor told me to stop having intimate dinners for four. Unless there are three other people.
quotes.author: Orson Welles

quotes.quote: My advice if you insist on slimming: Eat as much as you like, just don't swallow it.
quotes.author: Harry Secombe

quotes.quote: I lied on my Weight Watchers list. I put down that I had 3 eggs, but they were Cadbury chocolate eggs.
quotes.author: Caroline Rhea

quotes.quote: A diet is a plan, generally hopeless, for reducing your weight, which tests your will power but does little for your waistline.
quotes.author: Herbert B. Prochnow

quotes.quote: The first thing you lose on a diet is brain mass.
quotes.author: Margaret Cho

quotes.quote: A diet is just code for a time when you eat food you dislike and still feel hungry.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The biggest seller is cookbooks and the second is diet books, how not to eat what you've just learned how to cook.
quotes.author: Andy Rooney

quotes.quote: If you believe that weight loss requires self-deprivation, I'm going to teach you otherwise.
quotes.author: Robert Atkins

quotes.quote: I'm allergic to food. Every time I eat it breaks out into fat.
quotes.author: Jennifer Greene Duncan

quotes.quote: I tried every diet in the book. I tried some that weren't in the book. I tried eating the book. It tasted better than most of the diets.
quotes.author: Dolly Parton

quotes.quote: The only way to lose weight is to check it as airline baggage.
quotes.author: Peggy Ryan

quotes.quote: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: The trouble with jogging is that by the time you realize you're not in shape for it, it's too far to walk back.
quotes.author: Franklin Jones

quotes.quote: No one wakes up in the morning and says, I want to gain 150 pounds and I will start right now!
quotes.author: Tricia Cunningham

quotes.quote: Weight loss is not the key to your dreams. The truth is there is no lock and the door is flimsy.
quotes.author: Golda Poretsky

quotes.quote: It would be far easier to lose weight permanently if replacement parts weren't so handy in the refrigerator.
quotes.author: Hugh Allen

quotes.quote: Avoid any diet that discourages the use of hot fudge.
quotes.author: Don Kardong

quotes.quote: To promise not to do a thing is the surest way in the world to make a body want to go and do that very thing.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Whenever I feel like exercise, I lie down until the feeling passes.
quotes.author: Robert Hutchins

quotes.quote: I have a great diet. You're allowed to eat anything you want, but you must eat it with naked fat people.
quotes.author: Ed Bluestone

quotes.quote: I hate it when I think I'm buying organic vegetables but when I get home I discover they're just regular donuts.
quotes.author: Robin McCauley Lynch

quotes.quote: A diet is when you watch what you eat and wish you could eat what you watch.
quotes.author: Hermione Gingold

quotes.quote: Thou shouldst eat to live, not live to eat.
quotes.author: Cicero

quotes.quote: It's called diet, because all the other 4-letter words were taken.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: An optimist is a person who starts a new diet on Thanksgiving Day.
quotes.author: Irv Kupcinet

quotes.quote: A balanced diet is having a cupcake in each hand.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I'm on that new diet where you eat everything and pray for a miracle.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When we lose twenty pounds. We may be losing the twenty best pounds we have! We may be losing the pounds that contain our genius, our humanity, our love and honesty.
quotes.author: Woody Allen

quotes.quote: I'm not overweight. I'm just nine inches too short.
quotes.author: Shelley Winters

quotes.quote: I've been on a diet for two weeks and all I've lost is fourteen days.
quotes.author: Totie Fields

quotes.quote: Seize the moment. Remember all those women on the Titanic who waved off the dessert cart.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: The heart, like the stomach, wants a varied diet.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: I never worry about diets. The only carrots that interest me are the number you get in a diamond.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.quote: Chopsticks are one of the reasons the Chinese never invented custard.
quotes.author: Spike Milligan

quotes.quote: We ought to have a diet salad dressing called '500 Islands.'
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: From the day on which she weighs 140, the chief excitement of a woman's life consists in spotting people who are fatter than she is.
quotes.author: Helen Rowland

quotes.quote: I wonder if there is woman in the world strong-minded enough to shed ten pounds or twenty,— And say, there now, that's plenty.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Eat a third, drink a third, and leave empty in your stomach the remaining third. If anger overtakes you there will be room for the expansion of your stomach, and you will not suffer from apoplexy.
quotes.author: Gittin

quotes.quote: She's got this real funny idea about a diet; you don't get fat if no one sees you eating.
quotes.author: Gloria Naylor

quotes.quote: I think thou art in the habit of eating a great deal, and that thy power of restraining appetite is more slender than a hair, whilst an appetite such as thou nourishest would rupture a chain and a day may come it will tear thee up.
quotes.author: Sheikh Sa'Di

quotes.quote: I'm on a whiskey diet. I've lost three days already!
quotes.author: Tommy Cooper

quotes.quote: A gourmet who thinks of calories is like a tart who looks at her watch.
quotes.author: James Beard

quotes.quote: In the course of my life, I have often had to eat my words, and I must confess that I have always found it a wholesome diet.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: No diet will remove all the fat from your body because the brain is entirely fat. Without a brain, you might look good, but all you could do is run for public office.
quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

quotes.quote: I don't diet. I just don't eat as much as I'd like to.
quotes.author: Linda Evangelista

quotes.quote: I lost so much weight, people kept looking at my ankles. Why not? That's where my pants were.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: I just went on a great diet. There are only three things you can't put in your mouth— a knife, a fork, and a spoon!
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: My wife has come up with a very simple device to make me lose weight. It's called a food bill.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Doctor, Doctor I'm on a diet and it's making me irritable. Yesterday I bit someone's ear off. Oh dear, that's a lot of calories.
quotes.author: Meg Jokes

quotes.quote: Image the weight you are losing if going to the person you hate.
quotes.author: English Lion

quotes.quote: Vegetables are a must on a diet. I suggest carrot cake, zucchini bread, and pumpkin pie.
quotes.author: Jim Davis

quotes.quote: Eat, drink, and be merry, for tomorrow ye diet.
quotes.author: Lewis C. Henry

quotes.quote: We can all put weight on or lose weight.
quotes.author: Keith Emerson

quotes.quote: Your bank account. Good food choices are good investments.
quotes.author: Bethenny Frankel

quotes.quote: Don't dig your grave with your knife and fork.
quotes.author: English Proverb

quotes.quote: Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: The older you get, the tougher it is to lose weight, because by then your body and your fat are really good friends.
quotes.author: Bob Hope

quotes.quote: A balanced diet is a cookie in each hand.
quotes.author: Barbara Johnson

quotes.quote: Eat as much as you like just don't swallow it.
quotes.author: Steve Burns

quotes.quote: Champagne is appropriate for breakfast, lunch or dinner.
quotes.author: Madeline Puckette

quotes.quote: Nothing represents the idea of convivial sharing so clearly as wine.
quotes.author: Paul Lukacks

quotes.quote: It takes a lot of good beer to make great wine
quotes.author: Brian O'Donnell

quotes.quote: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often, but I'm well preserved.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Men are like wine - some turn to vinegar, but the best improve with age.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.quote: A bottle of good wine, like a good act, shines ever in the retrospect.
quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quotes.quote: I like on the table, when we're speaking, the light of a bottle of intelligent wine.
quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

quotes.quote: Better is old wine than new, and old friends like-wise.
quotes.author: Charles Kingsley

quotes.quote: The wine in the bottle does not quench thirst.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.quote: One not only drinks wine, one smells it, observes it, tastes it, sips it and â€“ one talks about it.
quotes.author: King Edward VII

quotes.quote: Wine makes every meal an occasion, every table more elegant, every day more civilized.
quotes.author: Andre Simon

quotes.quote: Give me wine to wash me clean of the weather-stains of cares
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: Accept what life offers you and try to drink from every cup. All wines should be tasted; some should only be sipped, but with others, drink the whole bottle.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: Penicillin cures, but wine makes people happy.
quotes.author: Alexander Fleming

quotes.quote: Too much of anything is bad, but too much Champagne is just right.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Age is just a number. It's totally irrelevant unless, of course, you happen to be a bottle of wine.
quotes.author: Joan Collins

quotes.quote: Being a wine enthusiast means you care more about quality than quantity.
quotes.author: Jean-Claude Carrière

quotes.quote: Either give me more wine or leave me alone.
quotes.author: Rumi

quotes.quote: A gourmet meal without a glass of wine just seems tragic to me somehow.
quotes.author: Kathy Mattea

quotes.quote: I don't go by the ratings. I buy wine that tastes good. Statistically, anybody's ability to predict what will be a good wine a decade from now is limited.
quotes.author: Richard Thaler

quotes.quote: A man will be eloquent if you give him good wine.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.quote: In victory, you deserve Champagne. In defeat you need it.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: The Americans have no liking for wine unless it is sweet.
quotes.author: Gustave Koerner

quotes.quote: I'll have a glass of your most expensive red wine mixed with a glass of your cheapest white wine served in a dog bowl. Silly straws all around, please.
quotes.author: April Ludgate

quotes.quote: A meal without wine is like a day without sun
quotes.author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quotes.quote: Anyone who tries to make you believe that he knows all about wines is obviously a fake.
quotes.author: Leon Adams

quotes.quote: Wine to me is passion. It's family and friends. It's warmth of heart and generosity of spirit. Wine is art. It's culture. It's the essence of civilization and the art of living.
quotes.author: Robert Mondavi

quotes.quote: If I did one of those wine and paint nights the instructor would be like wow look at you, you are really good at wine.
quotes.author: Denise

quotes.quote: I rather like bad wine; one gets so bored with good wine.
quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

quotes.quote: One of the disadvanages of wine is that it makes a man mistake words for thoughts.
quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

quotes.quote: Wine is a living liquid containing no preservatives. Its life cycle comprises youth, maturity, old age, and death. When not treated with reasonable respect it will sicken and die.
quotes.author: Julia Child

quotes.quote: Wine makes daily living easier, less hurried with fewer tensions and more tolerance.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: One should always be drunk. That's all that mattersâ€¦But with what? With wine, with poetry, or with virtue, as you chose. But get drunk.
quotes.author: Charles Baudelaire

quotes.quote: In wine there is wisdom, in beer there is Freedom, in water there is bacteria.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Always keep a bottle of Champagne in the fridge for special occasions. Sometimes, the special occasion is that you've got a bottle of Champagne in the fridge.
quotes.author: Hester Browne

quotes.quote: Now wines are wonders; great wines are magical; and winemakers are mad. Like horse fanciers, they are always trying to improve the breed.
quotes.author: William E. Massee

quotes.quote: I love everything that is old; old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wines.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The discovery of a wine is of greater moment than the discovery of a constellation. The universe is too full of stars.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Great wine requires a mad man to grow the vine, a wise man to watch over it, a lucid poet to make it, and a lover to drink it.
quotes.author: Salvador Dali

quotes.quote: Compromises are for relationships, not wine.
quotes.author: Sir Robert Scott Caywood

quotes.quote: Wine is the most healthful and most hygienic of beverages.
quotes.author: Louis Pasteur

quotes.quote: Artists and poets still find life's meaning in a glass of wine.
quotes.author: Joy Sterling

quotes.quote: Like human beings, a wine's taste is going to depend a great deal on its origins and its upbringing.
quotes.author: Linda Johnson-Bell

quotes.quote: Wine cheers the sad, revives the old, inspires the young, makes weariness forget his toil.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Making good wine is a skill. Fine wine is an art.
quotes.author: Robert Mondavi

quotes.quote: The wine-cup is the little silver well, Where truth, if truth there be, doth dwell.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: I'm like old wine. They don't bring me out very often, but I'm well preserved.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.quote: Wine is inspiring and adds greatly to the joy of living.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: A sweetheart is a bottle of wine, a wife is a wine bottle.
quotes.author: Baudelaire

quotes.quote: Let us have wine and women, mirth and laughter--sermons and soda water the day after.
quotes.author: Lord Byron

quotes.quote: Life is good, but wine is better.
quotes.author: Fernando Pessoa

quotes.quote: I feel sorry for people who don't drink. They wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: There can't be good living where there is not good drinking.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.quote: Life's too short to keep great wine in the cellar. Let me tell you about the great ones we saved, only to discover they're no longer so good.
quotes.author: Cliff Hakim

quotes.quote: Wine drinking, like many activities, can be as simple or as involved as the individual wishes to make it. It can be as uncomplicated as enjoying a glass with a meal or a friend.
quotes.author: George Kerridge

quotes.quote: The best way to assess wine is to look at it first, smell it and then taste it.
quotes.author: George Kerridge

quotes.quote: Tasting a bottle of wine was a ritual: tipping, swirling, sniffing, and tasting. Most people wait for a birthday, holiday, or graduation to decant that special bottle.
quotes.author: Cliff Hakim

quotes.quote: Wine is first and foremost a social game; only secondarily an interest life music or collecting. It is all about human relations, bonding, ritual... all the maneuvers of social life - and all under the influence, however mild and benign, of alcohol.
quotes.author: Hugh Johnson

quotes.quote: Man is the only machine that needs to be lubricated with alcohol.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Alcohol is a good preservative for almost everything but secrets.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Man has been exhorted to love his enemies, but so far alcohol is the only enemy he has learned to love.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: Alcohol is like success; both are all right until they go to your head.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: What every drunk needs is to get more blood into his alcohol stream.
quotes.author: Evan Esar

quotes.quote: I have taken more out of alcohol than alcohol has taken out of me.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.quote: The wine tasted like a urine sample from someone who is gravely ill.
quotes.author: Frank Muir

quotes.quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the Bible says love your enemy.
quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

quotes.quote: The English have a miraculous power to change wine into water.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Wine is at the same time simpler than people say and more complex than they think.
quotes.author: Hugh Johnson

quotes.quote: We are all mortal until the first kiss and the second glass of wine.
quotes.author: Eduardo Galeana

quotes.quote: Quickly bring me a beaker of wine, so that I may wet my mind and say something clever.
quotes.author: Aristophanes

quotes.quote: There appears to be a learning curve for alcohol consumption.
quotes.author: Raymond McHenry

quotes.quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: In 1969 I gave up women and alcohol. It was the worst 20 minutes of my life.
quotes.author: George Best

quotes.quote: I only take a drink on two occasions. When I'm thirsty and when I'm not.
quotes.author: Brendan Behan

quotes.quote: I have made an important discovery that alcohol. taken in sufficient quantities, produces all the effects of intoxication.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I takes only one drink to get me drunk. The trouble is, I can't remember if it's the thirteenth or the fourteenth.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: You're not drunk if you can lie on the floor without holding on.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Whiskey is by far the most popular of all remedies that won't cure a cold.
quotes.author: Jerry Vale

quotes.quote: No man goes before his time - unless the boss leaves early.
quotes.author: Groucho Marx

quotes.quote: Hard work never killed anybody, but why take a chance?
quotes.author: Edgar Bergen

quotes.quote: What is the difference between unethical and ethical advertising? Unethical advertising uses falsehoods to deceive the public; ethical advertising uses truth to deceive the public.
quotes.author: Vilhjalmur Stefansson

quotes.quote: My son is now an 'entrepreneur.' That's what you're called when you don't have a job.
quotes.author: Ted Turner

quotes.quote: The easiest job in the world has to be coroner. Surgery on dead people. What’s the worst thing that could happen? If everything went wrong, maybe you’d get a pulse.
quotes.author: Dennis Miller

quotes.quote: If you had to identify in one word the reason why the human race has not achieved and never will achieve its full potential, that word would be 'meetings.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: I will always choose a lazy person to do a hard job, because a lazy person will find an easy way to do it.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: Never go to a doctor whose office plants have died.
quotes.author: Erma Bombeck

quotes.quote: Oh, you hate your job? Why didn't you say so? There's a support group for that. It's called EVERYBODY, and they meet at the bar.
quotes.author: Drew Carey

quotes.quote: I like work; it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours.
quotes.author: Jerome K. Jerome

quotes.quote: It's a recession when your neighbor loses his job; it's a depression when you lose yours.
quotes.author: Harry S. Truman

quotes.quote: When a man tells you that he got rich through hard work, ask him: Whose?
quotes.author: Don Marquis

quotes.quote: Doing nothing is very hard to do...you never know when you're finished.
quotes.author: Leslie Nielsen

quotes.quote: The best way to appreciate your job is to imagine yourself without one.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: I always arrive late at the office, but I make up for it by leaving early.
quotes.author: Charles Lamb

quotes.quote: A lot of fellows nowadays have a B.A., M.D., or Ph.D. Unfortunately, they don't have a J.O.B.
quotes.author: Fats Domino

quotes.quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
quotes.author: Ray Kroc

quotes.quote: In modern business it is not the crook who is to be feared most, it is the honest man who doesn't know what he is doing.
quotes.author: William Wordsworth

quotes.quote: The only thing that ever sat its way to success was a hen.
quotes.author: Sarah Brown

quotes.quote: If you don't know what to do with many of the papers piled on your desk, stick a dozen colleagues initials on them and pass them along. When in doubt, route.
quotes.author: Malcolm S. Forbes

quotes.quote: Anyone can do any amount of work, provided it isn't the work he's supposed to be doing at that moment.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: I think Smithers picked me because of my motivational skills. Everyone says they have to work a lot harder when I’m around.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: When we're unemployed, we're called lazy; when the whites are unemployed it's called a depression.
quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

quotes.quote: A celebrity is a person who works hard all his life to become well known, then wears dark glasses to avoid being recognized.
quotes.author: Fred Allen

quotes.quote: Don't stay in bed, unless you can make money in bed.
quotes.author: George Burns

quotes.quote: The first thing a new employee should do on the job is learn to recognize his boss' voice on the phone.
quotes.author: Martin Buxbaum

quotes.quote: If A equal success, then the formula is A = X + Y + Z. Where X is work. Y is play and Z is keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: God put me on this Earth to accomplish a certain number of things. Right now, I am so far behind I will never die.
quotes.author: Bill Watterson

quotes.quote: Ambition is a poor excuse for not having sense enough to be lazy.
quotes.author: Charlie McCarthy

quotes.quote: I am a friend of the working man, and I would rather be his friend, than be one.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: If hard work is the key to success, most people would rather pick the lock.
quotes.author: Claude McDonald

quotes.quote: Work is the greatest thing in the world, so we should always save some of it for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Don Herold

quotes.quote: Time is an illusion. Lunchtime is doubly so.
quotes.author: Douglas Adams

quotes.quote: It's better to have one person working with you than three people working for you.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.quote: Why do people say they wish every day was Friday? If it was always Friday, we’d be here every freakin’ day.
quotes.author: Ed Bernard

quotes.quote: People who never do any more than they get paid for, never get paid for any more than they do.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Most people work just hard enough not to get fired and get paid just enough money not to quit.
quotes.author: George Carlin

quotes.quote: I’ve got all the money I’ll ever need, if I die by four o’clock.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: It takes less time to do a thing right, than it does to explain why you did it wrong.
quotes.author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quotes.quote: Son, if you really want something in this life, you have to work for it. Now quiet! They’re about to announce the lottery numbers.​
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: Lisa, if you don’t like your job you don’t strike. You just go in every day and do it really half-assed. That’s the American way.
quotes.author: Homer Simpson

quotes.quote: A professional is a man who can do his job when he doesn’t feel like it; an amateur is one who can’t when he does feel like it.
quotes.author: James Agate

quotes.quote: Show me a man who is a good loser and I’ll show you a man who is playing golf with his boss.
quotes.author: James Patrick Murray

quotes.quote: I try to take one day at a time, but sometimes several days attack me at once.
quotes.author: Jennifer Yane

quotes.quote: You don't get paid for the hour. You get paid for the value you bring to the hour.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.quote: The elevator to success is out of order. You’ll have to use the stairs… one step at a time.
quotes.author: Joe Girard

quotes.quote: People are still willing to do an honest day’s work. The trouble is they want a week’s pay for it.
quotes.author: Joey Adams

quotes.quote: Early to bed and early to rise probably indicates unskilled labor.
quotes.author: John Ciardi

quotes.quote: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: you wouldn't have a job if he was any smarter.
quotes.author: John Gotti

quotes.quote: There’s no secret about success. Did you ever know a successful man who didn’t tell you about it?​
quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

quotes.quote: When my boss asked me who is the stupid one, me or him? I told him everyone knows he doesn't hire stupid people.
quotes.author: Kooper Salmo

quotes.quote: All you need in this life is ignorance and confidence, and then success is sure.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Never interrupt your enemy when he is making a mistake.
quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quotes.quote: An expert is a man who has made all the mistakes which can be made in a very narrow field.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: People who work sitting down get paid more than people who work standing up.
quotes.author: Ogden Nash

quotes.quote: Work is a necessity for man. Man invented the alarm clock.
quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

quotes.quote: Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: I love my job only when I'm on vacation.
quotes.author: Rick Tocquigny

quotes.quote: By working faithfully eight hours a day you may eventually get to be boss and work twelve hours a day.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.quote: Every day I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I’m not there, I go to work.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: The taxpayer – that’s someone who works for the federal government but doesn’t have to take the civil service examination.
quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

quotes.quote: Nothing is so embarrassing as watching someone do something that you said couldn't be done.
quotes.author: Sam Ewing

quotes.quote: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Scott Adams

quotes.quote: The closest to perfection a person ever comes is when he fills out a job application form.​
quotes.author: Stanley J. Randall

quotes.quote: Why join the navy if you can be a pirate?
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.quote: Whenever you are asked if you can do a job, tell 'em, Certainly, I can! Then get busy and find out how to do it.
quotes.author: Teddy Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
quotes.author: Tim Notke

quotes.quote: Are you aware that rushing toward a goal is a sublimated death wish? It’s no coincidence we call them “deadlines.
quotes.author: Tom Robbins

quotes.quote: I need a six-month vacation, twice a year.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The human race is faced with a cruel choice: work or daytime television.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Some days, the best thing about my job is that the chair spins.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Even if you're on the right track, you'll get run over if you just sit there.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: An expert is a man who tells you a simple thing in a confused way in such a fashion as to make you think the confusion is your own fault.
quotes.author: William Castle

quotes.quote: It’s a shame that the only thing a man can do for eight hours a day is work. He can’t eat for eight hours; he can’t drink for eight hours; he can’t make love for eight hours. The only thing a man can do for eight hours is work.
quotes.author: William Faulkner

quotes.quote: A lot of people quit looking for work as soon as they find a job.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Don’t be distracted by criticism. Remember, the only taste of success some people have is when they take a bite out of you.
quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: Yoga class helps me calm down from the agonizing stress of trying to get to yoga class on time.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: Yoga is a way of getting totally drunk – not on alcohol but on life. You know, they call it divine.
quotes.author: Sadhguru

quotes.quote: I tried yoga once but took off for the mall halfway through class, as I had a sudden craving for a soft pretzel and world peace.
quotes.author: Terri Guillemets

quotes.quote: Calming the mind is yoga. Not just standing on the head.
quotes.author: Swami Satchidananda

quotes.quote: Yoga is the fountain of youth. You’re only as young as your spine is flexible.
quotes.author: Bob Harper

quotes.quote: Meditation is a duty to the self. In the moment in which you become aware of your own self, you become beautiful. Because, in the moment in which you concentrate on the self, your frequency changes and the universe around you changes in the exact same way. That is a funny law.
quotes.author: Yogi Bhajan

quotes.quote: Yoga is about revealing happiness. Yoga means "union," union with your own inherent radiant happiness. You can only BE that happiness. So be it!
quotes.author: Steve Ross

quotes.quote: I love yoga. I love Eastern philosophy. It's metaphysical and redundant and absolutely pedantic.
quotes.author: Fielding Mellish (Woody Allen)

quotes.quote: There doesn't seem to be a recognized yoga of art, not that it matters, for there is one anyway, and I don't have to pretend to myself, as I should to students, that I know what it means. Suppose I call it Sutra-Yoga. Sutra, like strophe & verse, means the turn, the vortical twist of the mind in the imagined form.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: I talked to a wild group last night. I knew it the minute someone yelled "Louder!" during the silent meditation.
quotes.author: Robert Orben

quotes.quote: Yoga class is great. You can close your eyes and imagine yourself in a relaxing place. Like on your sofa, not doing yoga.
quotes.author: Grant Tucker

quotes.quote: The only yoga stretch I've perfected is the yawn.
quotes.author: Grant Tucker

quotes.quote: Reaching under the couch for something is the closest I'll ever get to yoga.
quotes.author: Grant Tucker

quotes.quote: My favourite yoga position is the downward-facing nap.
quotes.author: Grant Tucker

quotes.quote: What was the woman angry after her yoga class? She was bent out of shape.
quotes.author: Peter Crumpton

quotes.quote: My wife claims to be good at yoga, but I think she's a poser.
quotes.author: Peter Crumpton

quotes.quote: Yoga is not about tightening your ass. It's about getting your head out of it.
quotes.author: Eric Paskel

quotes.quote: Well people are doing it all over Europe. I mean, standing up, doing yoga day and night. They hardly ever stop. I mean, some countries have given up chairs completely.
quotes.author: Melody Hanson

quotes.quote: Some days you eat salads and go do yoga, some days you eat cupcakes and refuse to put on pants. It's called balance
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If you fall, I'll be there. - mat
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: I do Yoga to relieve stress... Just kidding I drink wine in yoga pants
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Yoga believes in transforming the individual before transforming the world.
quotes.author: Swami Satchidananda

quotes.quote: Yoga. Because punching people is frowned upon.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: No woman ever gets given a fur coat for good reasons; if it's not to keep her on her back, it's to get her off his.
quotes.author: Neil Bartlett

quotes.quote: Behind every beautiful fur, there is a story. It is a bloody, barbaric story.
quotes.author: Mary Tyler Moore

quotes.quote: Even if you buy a fur glove with the little trim, and you think 'Oh, my God, it's just a little trim,' that animal got clubbed.
quotes.author: Eva Mendes

quotes.quote: Fur is not murder, but it is quite expensive.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: A man does not buy his wife a fur coat to keep her warm, but to keep her pleasant.
quotes.author: Seymour Hicks

quotes.quote: Fur only looks good on its original owner. Be comfortable in your own skin, and let animals keep theirs.
quotes.author: Tim Howard
