quotes.quote: Finest fur may cover toughest meat.
quotes.author: Chief Joseph

quotes.quote: There is no moral distinction between fur and other materials made from animals, such as leather, which also is the result of the suffering and death of sentient beings.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: Never buy a fur from a vegetarian.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.quote: There is no morally coherent difference between fur and other animal clothing, such as leather, wool, etc., just as there is no morally coherent distinction between meat and milk or eggs.
quotes.author: Gary L. Francione

quotes.quote: Fur used to turn heads, now it turns stomachs.
quotes.author: Rue McClanahan

quotes.quote: There is no need for fur - since there are compassionate alternatives.
quotes.author: Joaquin Phoenix

quotes.quote: Abuse yourself all you want - just leave animals out of it. Don't wear fur.
quotes.author: Steve-O

quotes.quote: Fur is only of use to the animal that wears it.
quotes.author: Brigitte Bardot

quotes.quote: There's always a way to wear fur.
quotes.author: Anna Wintour

quotes.quote: The discussion of fur is childish.
quotes.author: Karl Lagerfeld

quotes.quote: Saving animals is as simple as choosing synthetic alternatives instead of real fur.
quotes.author: Natalie Imbruglia

quotes.quote: On leather jackets: That's the next step. You have to take one step at a time. It was easier to start with fur.
quotes.author: Dan Matthews

quotes.quote: I look at every piece of furniture and every object as an individual sculpture.
quotes.author: Kelly Wearstler

quotes.quote: Every mind is a room packed with archaic furniture.
quotes.author: Dee Hock

quotes.quote: Just say the lines and don't trip over the furniture.
quotes.author: Noel Coward

quotes.quote: I used to sell furniture for a living. The trouble was, it was my own.
quotes.author: Les Dawson

quotes.quote: One can furnish a room very luxuriously by taking out furniture rather than putting it in.
quotes.author: Francis Jourdain

quotes.quote: Most modern fantasy just rearranges the furniture in Tolkien's attic.
quotes.author: Terry Pratchett

quotes.quote: They are good furniture pictures, unworthy of praise, and undeserving of blame.
quotes.author: John Ruskin

quotes.quote: In a modern loft, you can't just fill a space with furniture. Each piece has to be perfect.
quotes.author: Nate Berkus

quotes.quote: No furniture is so charming as books.
quotes.author: Sydney Smith

quotes.quote: Pick your furniture like you pick a wife; it should make you feel comfortable and look nice, but not so nice that if someone walks past it they want to steal it.
quotes.author: Justin Halpern

quotes.quote: By acquiring all of your furniture from different eras and places and things that are expensive and inexpensive, it will make your end product have a great spirit.
quotes.author: Kelly Wearstler

quotes.quote: You cannot separate the old furniture from the memories and the memories from the old furniture!
quotes.author: Mehmet Murat ildan

quotes.quote: That is originally why the concept evolved to include accessories. We found that furniture sells better when you show it with accessories.
quotes.author: Joseph Roth

quotes.quote: Forget the floor plans. Arrange the furniture where it is the most comfortable and will look best.
quotes.author: Albert Hadley

quotes.quote: Furniture is meant to be used and enjoyed.
quotes.author: Natalie Morales

quotes.quote: Furniture and food are ways that people define their attitude toward life. They'll buy better stuff if it's offered to them.
quotes.author: Terence Conran

quotes.quote: Most furniture is not made for people - they are made for the people who sell them.
quotes.author: Laura Huxley

quotes.quote: Furniture that is too obviously designed is very interesting, but too often belongs only in museums.
quotes.author: Milo

quotes.quote: Make sure furniture decor has similar scale. It's all about scale, proportion, measuring, being conscious of the overall plan.
quotes.author: Michael S. Smith

quotes.quote: Furniture! Thank God, I can sit and I can stand without the aid of a furniture warehouse.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It's very hard, feeling that you're no more than a piece of unwanted furniture in this world.
quotes.author: Anton Chekhov

quotes.quote: No building was safe from the furniture, the pictures, the human beings that it would presently contain.
quotes.author: Graham Greene

quotes.quote: We are living in a world today where lemonade is made from artificial flavors and furniture polish is made from real lemons.
quotes.author: Alfred Newman

quotes.quote: There is no fury like an ex-wife searching for a new lover.
quotes.author: Cyril Connolly

quotes.quote: Many people lose their tempers merely from seeing you keep yours.
quotes.author: Frank Moore Colby

quotes.quote: Vice is like a fury to the vicious mind, And turns delight itself to punishment.
quotes.author: Ben Jonson

quotes.quote: Fury reigns down on those who ignore in the wisdom of fear itself.
quotes.author: Abdulkadir Abdullahi Mohamed Mirre

quotes.quote: I understand a fury in your words but not your words.
quotes.author: William Shakespeare

quotes.quote: The enemy fought with savage fury, and met death with all its horrors, without shrinking or complaining: not one asked to be spared, but fought as long as they could stand or sit.
quotes.author: Davy Crockett

quotes.quote: Fury itself supplies arms.
quotes.author: Virgil

quotes.quote: He was a silent fury who no torment could tame.
quotes.author: Jack London

quotes.quote: No fury more righteous than that of a sinner accused of the wrong sin.
quotes.author: Audre Lorde

quotes.quote: Heaven has no rage like love to hatred turned, nor hell a fury like a woman scorned.
quotes.author: William Congreve

quotes.quote: There is no passion so much transports the sincerity of judgement as doth anger.
quotes.author: Michel de Montaigne

quotes.quote: Abused patience turns to fury.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: She was fury, she was wrath, she was vengeance.
quotes.author: Sarah J. Maas

quotes.quote: Anger is one of the sinners of the soul.
quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: The future is not as loud as war, but it is relentless. It has a terrible fury all its own.
quotes.author: Lauren Beukes

quotes.quote: In the fury of the moment I can see the master's hand in every leaf that trembles, in every grain of sand.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: It is a struggle; for though the black man fights passively, he nevertheless fights; and his passive resistance is more effective at present than active resistance could possibly be. He bears the fury of the storm as does the willow tree.
quotes.author: James Weldon Johnson

quotes.quote: Beware of him that is slow to anger; for when it is long coming, it is the stronger when it comes, and the longer kept. Abused patience turns to fury.
quotes.author: Francis Quarles

quotes.quote: There is no fury like that against one who, we fear, may succeed in making us disloyal to beliefs we hold with passion, but have not really won.
quotes.author: Learned Hand

quotes.quote: Every stroke our fury strikes is sure to hit ourselves at last.
quotes.author: William Penn

quotes.quote: The best thing about the future is that it comes one day at a time.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The future rewards those who press on. I don't have time to feel sorry for myself. I don't have time to complain. I'm going to press on.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Let the future tell the truth, and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla

quotes.quote: America's future will be determined by the home and the school. The child becomes largely what he is taught; hence we must watch what we teach, and how we live.
quotes.author: Jane Addams

quotes.quote: The secret of your future is hidden in your daily routine.
quotes.author: Mike Murdock

quotes.quote: The future starts today, not tomorrow.
quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

quotes.quote: When I look into the future, it's so bright it burns my eyes.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.quote: Map out your future - but do it in pencil. The road ahead is as long as you make it. Make it worth the trip.
quotes.author: Jon Bon Jovi

quotes.quote: The only thing we know about the future is that it will be different.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The future is always beginning now.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Those who live in the past limit their future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The future is not some place we are going, but one we are creating. The paths to it are not found but made, and the activity of making them changes both the maker and the destination.
quotes.author: John Schaar

quotes.quote: Planning is bringing the future into the present so that you can do something about it now.
quotes.author: Alan Lakein

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.quote: Optimism is a strategy for making a better future. Because unless you believe that the future can be better, you are unlikely to step up and take responsibility for making it so.
quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

quotes.quote: A speculator is a man who observes the future, and acts before it occurs.
quotes.author: Bernard Baruch

quotes.quote: The future is not an inheritance, it is an opportunity and an obligation.
quotes.author: Bill Clinton

quotes.quote: People can foresee the future only when it coincides with their own wishes, and the most grossly obvious facts can be ignored when they are unwelcome.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: Tomorrow may never come to us. We do not live in tomorrow. We cannot find it in any of our title-deeds. The man who owns whole blocks of real estate, and great ships on the sea, does not own a single minute of tomorrow. Tomorrow! It is a mysterious possibility, not yet born. It lies under the seal of midnight--behind the veil of glittering constellations.
quotes.author: E. H. Chaplin

quotes.quote: We did not come to fear the future. We came here to shape it.
quotes.author: Barack Obama

quotes.quote: Our future will be shaped by the assumptions we make about who we are and what we can be.
quotes.author: Rosabeth Moss Kanter

quotes.quote: Nobody knows what the future will bring, but it's a good bet that there will be a delivery charge.
quotes.author: Tom Wilson

quotes.quote: The future remains uncertain and so it should, for it is the canvas upon which we paint our desires. Thus always the human condition faces a beautifully empty canvas.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: You don't need to predict the future. Just choose a future -- a good future, a useful future -- and make the kind of prediction that will alter human emotions and reactions in such a way that the future you predicted will be brought about. Better to make a good future than predict a bad one.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: There is no justification for present existence other than its expansion into an indefinitely open future.
quotes.author: Simone De Beauvoir

quotes.quote: Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.quote: Never let the future disturb you. You will meet it, if you have to, with the same weapons of reason which today arm you against the present.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.quote: I know not what the future holds, but I know who holds the future.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: The future is an opaque mirror. Anyone who tries to look into it sees nothing but the dim outlines of an old and worried face.
quotes.author: Jim Bishop

quotes.quote: He who pays not no attention to his future is always penalized.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Rather than wasting time on yesterday that is gone, it is better to invest your time in tomorrow that is not yet born
quotes.author: RVM

quotes.quote: You cannot change your future, but you can change your habits, and surely your habits will change your future.
quotes.author: Dr. Abdul Kalam

quotes.quote: Our future accomplishments are determined entirely by how every second in our life is put to a useThe future is the cumulation of many nows.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: Your future is created by what you do today not tomorrow.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness.
quotes.author: Nicole Kidman

quotes.quote: We may not be able to prepare the future for our children, but we can at least prepare our children for the future.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.quote: The minute you alter your perception of yourself and your future, both you and your future begin to change.
quotes.author: Marilee Zdenek

quotes.quote: When it comes to the future, there are three kinds of people: those who let it happen, those who make it happen, and those who wonder what happened.
quotes.author: John M. Richardson, Jr.

quotes.quote: The future is not a result of choices among alternative paths offered by the present, but a place that is created--created first in the mind and will, created next in activity. The future is not some place we are going to, but one we are creating.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: Show me someone who doesn't dream about the future and I'll show you someone who doesn't know where they are going
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: The vast possibilities of our great future will become realities only if we make ourselves responsible for that future.
quotes.author: Gifford Pinchot

quotes.quote: He who controls the present, controls the past. He who controls the past, controls the future.
quotes.author: George Orwell

quotes.quote: The future lies before you, like paths of pure white snow. Be careful how you tread it, for every step will show.
quotes.author: unknown

quotes.quote: People are always shouting they want to create a better future. It's not true. The future is an apathetic void of no interest to anyone. The past is full of life, eager to irritate us, provoke and insult us, tempt us to destroy or repaint it. The only reason people want to be masters of the future is to change the past.
quotes.author: Milan Kundera

quotes.quote: The future is not something we enter. The future is something we create.
quotes.author: Leonard I. Sweet

quotes.quote: The future belongs to those who prepare for it today.
quotes.author: Malcolm X

quotes.quote: Run to meet the future or it's going to run you down.
quotes.author: Anthony J. D'Angelo

quotes.quote: You can never plan the future by the past.
quotes.author: Edmund Burke

quotes.quote: In this bright future you can't forget your past.
quotes.author: Bob Marley

quotes.quote: I never think of the future. It comes soon enough.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: Posture is paramount to your future.
quotes.author: Cindy Ann Peterson

quotes.quote: Prediction is very difficult, especially about the future.
quotes.author: Niels Bohr

quotes.quote: Present thinking people kill the future.
quotes.author: Ken Blanchard

quotes.quote: Destiny is no matter of chance. It is a matter of choice. It is not a thing to be waited for, it is a thing to be achieved.
quotes.author: William Jennings Bryan

quotes.quote: Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F. Kennedy

quotes.quote: You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past. You realize that our mistrust of the future makes it hard to give up the past.
quotes.author: Chuck Palahniuk

quotes.quote: Your current thoughts are creating your future life. What you think about the most or focus on the most will appear as your life.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: The fact that there is a general belief in a future life is no evidence of its truth.
quotes.author: Clarence Darrow

quotes.quote: Belief in God and a future life makes it possible to go through life with less of stoic courage than is needed by skeptics.
quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

quotes.quote: People never leave, we are always here in our past and future lives.
quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

quotes.quote: As for a future life, every man must judge for himself between conflicting vague probabilities.
quotes.author: Charles Darwin

quotes.quote: The direction in which education starts a man will determine his future life.
quotes.author: Plato

quotes.quote: What you are thinking now is creating your future life.
quotes.author: Rhonda Byrne

quotes.quote: Our beliefs in a rich future life are of little importance unless we coin them into a rich present life.
quotes.author: Thomas Dreier

quotes.quote: The thought of the future life with its prerogatives and joys helps to make the trials of the present seem light and transient.
quotes.author: Billy Graham

quotes.quote: The future is the worst thing about the present.
quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

quotes.quote: We cannot build the future by avenging the past.
quotes.author: T.H. White

quotes.quote: The future is no more uncertain than the present.
quotes.author: Walt Whitman

quotes.quote: Life is a series of collisions with the future.
quotes.author: Jose Ortega Y Gasset

quotes.quote: The future is not a gift, it is an achievement.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.quote: The future belongs to the learners-not the knowers.
quotes.author: The future belongs to the learners-not the knowers.

quotes.quote: There is no future for a people that deny their past.
quotes.author: Adam Clayton Powell

quotes.quote: Faith is all that dreamers need to see into the future.
quotes.author: Jim Stovall

quotes.quote: The future is an imagined now, a projection of the mind.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.quote: Limitless is your potential. Magnificent is your future.
quotes.author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quotes.quote: You can analyze the past, but you have to design the future.
quotes.author: Edward de Bono

quotes.quote: No matter what your past has been, your future is spotless.
quotes.author: Hugh B. Brown

quotes.quote: Telling a story in a futuristic world gives you this freedom to explore things that bother you in contemporary times.
quotes.author: Suzanne Collins

quotes.quote: Futurism: This was a movement of intellectuals who wanted to replace tradition with the modern world of machinery, speed, violence, and public relations. It proves that we should be careful what intellectuals wish for, because we might get it.
quotes.author: Brad Holland

quotes.quote: The illiterate of the 21st century will not be those who cannot read and write, but those who cannot learn, unlearn, and relearn.
quotes.author: Alvin Toffler

quotes.quote: What is funny is when you do a futuristic movie, you immediately get to be fashionable because you're creating something that doesn't exist.
quotes.author: Olivier Theyskens

quotes.quote: The future will look futuristic only because we will be trying to make it look futuristic.
quotes.author: Anonymous

quotes.quote: If we define Futurism as an exploration beyond accepted limits, then the nature of limiting systems becomes the first object of exploration.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: For time and the world do not stand still. Change is the law of life. And those who look only to the past or the present are certain to miss the future.
quotes.author: John F Kennedy

quotes.quote: The danger of the past was that men became slaves. The danger of the future is that man may become robots.
quotes.author: Erich Fromm

quotes.quote: Your dreams of today will create your future.
quotes.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quotes.quote: To be a futurist, in pursuit of improving reality, is not to have your face continually turned upstream, waiting for the future to come. To improve reality is to clearly see where you are, and then wonder how to make that better.
quotes.author: Warren Ellis

quotes.quote: The future is not something we enter. The future is something we create.
quotes.author: Leonard Sweet

quotes.quote: Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed citizens can change the world; indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
quotes.author: Margaret Mead

quotes.quote: The most futuristic aspect of the House of the Future was that it was made almost entirely of plastic.
quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

quotes.quote: The only shoes that look futuristic are Crocs, but they would be terrible to use in a futuristic movie.
quotes.author: Olivier Theyskens

quotes.quote: Those who speak of progression but are afraid of change are self-repressed and therefore unable to reach any further than their eyes can already see.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: We disagree with the assertion that great teachers can be replaced by online alternatives. The futuristic claim that technology will triumph over teachers ignores all the social and relational dimensions of teaching and learning.
quotes.author: Andy Hargreaves

quotes.quote: A lot of the futuristic space stuff seemed to me to be a very cool form of science-fiction, so that was my first real baptism in the genre.
quotes.author: J. Michael Straczynski

quotes.quote: The two designs are completely different. The first is totally futuristic, the second is more classical. You can of course get very excited about doing something completely out of the ordinary, just like the Olympic stadium in its time. But each to his or her own taste.
quotes.author: Franz Beckenbauer

quotes.quote: The concept of progress acts as a protective mechanism to shield us from the terrors of the future.
quotes.author: Frank Herbert

quotes.quote: We are called to be architects of the future, not its victims.
quotes.author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quotes.quote: Futurism is almost like a vaccination. You inject a little bit of a denatured pathogen to prepare your body in case you encounter it for real.
quotes.author: Jamais Cascio

quotes.quote: If you are victimized by a negative character, which is characterized by laziness, irresponsibility, low self-esteem, irresolution and wavering, you will lose control of your future.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: You may not get everything you want in the future, but you may get a lot if you are determined and well-prepared.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: In a future time when most human thought has been accelerated by artificial intelligence and external memory can be shared on a universal matrix.
quotes.author: Masaki Yamada

quotes.quote: We have no future because our present is too volatile. We have only risk management. The spinning of the given moment's scenarios. Pattern recognition.
quotes.author: William Gibson

quotes.quote: Sustainable development is the pathway to the future we want for all. It offers a framework to generate economic growth, achieve social justice, exercise environmental stewardship and strengthen governance.
quotes.author: Ban Ki-moon

quotes.quote: The human brain had a vast memory storage. It made us curious and very creative.Those were the characteristics that gave us an advantage, curiosity, creativity and memory. And that brain did something very special. It invented an idea called the future.
quotes.author: David Suzuki

quotes.quote: There is nothing like a dream to create the future.
quotes.author: Victor Hugo

quotes.quote: In visual futurism, the line between total fantasy and futuristic is a thread of reality.
quotes.author: Syd Mead

quotes.quote: If you waste your time, you waste yourself and your future, and you are likely to have an unhappy future.
quotes.author: Dr T.P.Chia

quotes.quote: Everything is temporary and will Be End Again. I die daily as I peel away the many layers of Me—the deadness of who I was only moments ago— as I am doing now. We are futuristic after all; the present is just momentum.
quotes.author: Carol K. Ras

quotes.quote: Love in the sixteenth century is still love in the 21st century.
quotes.author: Gerry Goldsmith

quotes.quote: The human race had long ago overcome its childhood terror of the merely alien in appearance. That was a fear which could no longer survive after the first contact with friendly extraterrestrial races.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: I was ambassador to a planet full of things that would tell me with a straight face that two and two are orange.
quotes.author: Terry Carr

quotes.quote: Life got awfully boring with only humans to talk to.
quotes.author: Larry Niven

quotes.quote: Why is any object we don't understand always called a 'thing?'
quotes.author: Harold Livingston

quotes.quote: We all want different things from Mars.
quotes.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quotes.quote: There is a special sadness in achievement, in the knowledge that a long-desired goal has been attained at last, and that life must now be shaped toward new ends.
quotes.author: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: In science fiction, it's the world within that's really existing, and the world without is only a projection of it. At least, when the within isn't interesting, the without isn't either.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Science fiction may conceivably be a primitive beginning of a new form of heroic epic; Beckett and similar types of literary nihilism the primitive beginnings of a new antithetical pessimism.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Science fiction frequently tries to imagine what life would be like on a plane as far above us as we are above savagery; its setting is often of a kind that appears to us as technologically miraculous. It is thus a mode of romance with a strong inherent tendency to myth.
quotes.author: Northrop Frye

quotes.quote: Science fiction writers foresee the inevitable, and although problems and catastrophes may be inevitable, solutions are not.
quotes.author: Isaac Asimov

quotes.quote: Everything is becoming science fiction. From the margins of an almost invisible literature has sprung the intact reality of the 20th century.
quotes.author: J.G. Ballard

quotes.quote: Science fiction is never about the future, in the same way, history is rarely about the past: they're both parable formats of examining or commenting on the present.
quotes.author: A.A. Gill

quotes.quote: It's not technology that limits us. We're the limitation. Our technology is an expression of our intelligence and creativity, so the limitations of our technology are a reflection of our own limitations. We can't fundamentally advance technology until we fundamentally advance ourselves.
quotes.author: Christian Cantrell

quotes.quote: Looking back at that time it would be easy to understand how this could happen. The robots had no desire to conquer or control the world. The human-like robots were no more than a benevolent force trying to help humans be comfortable and happy during their short lives.
quotes.author: Rick Bohm

quotes.quote: What man is really anti-progressive? For he is only anti-certain-people's-visions-for-the-future.
quotes.author: Criss Jami

quotes.quote: The only limitations on the future of humankind are those we impose upon ourselves.
quotes.author: Jacque Fresco

quotes.quote: An element of human invention transforms the natural into the cultural, rendering a higher life form an invention, an effect of the operation of biopower.
quotes.author: Neil Gerlach

quotes.quote: While many futurists and business leaders believe that robots and automation are taking jobs from humans, I believe that it's humans who are taking the jobs away from robots.
quotes.author: Jacob Morgan

quotes.quote: The future is less about management and the ability to recall information or taught skills, and more about the ability to use critical thinking, problem-solving, collaboration, and adaptability.
quotes.author: Sean A. Culey

quotes.quote: Today's science is tomorrow's technology.
quotes.author: Edward Teller

quotes.quote: In a future time when most human thought has been accelerated by artificial intelligence and external memory can be shared on a universal matrix... GITS 2.
quotes.author: Masaki Yamada

quotes.quote: Science fiction is not quirky anymore; we live in a futuristic world now.
quotes.author: Bonnie Hammer

quotes.quote: A lot of the futuristic space stuff seemed to me to be a very cool form of science-fiction, so that was my first real baptism in the genre.
quotes.author: J. Michael Straczynski
